# language_name:      Arifama-Miniafia
# ISO 639-3:          aai
# year_short:         2009
# year_long:          
# title:              Tur Gewasin O Baibasit Boubon The New Testament in the Miniafia Language of Oro Province, Papua New Guinea
# URL:                http://pngscriptures.org/aai/

# copyright_long:     TUR GEWASIN O BAIBASIT BOUBUN The New Testament in the Miniafia Language of Oro Province, Papua New Guinea  copyright © 2009 Wycliffe Bible Translators, Inc. 40001001	Iti i Jesu ana’a’agir wabih, aiwob ana efane i David ana rara’ane tufuw naatu omatanenane i Abraham ana rara’ane tufuw. Naatu iti i hai gin anayimih.
40001002	Abraham natun i Isaac, naatu Isaac natun i Jacob, Jacob natun i Judah, Judah i taitin tuwahinah bairi hitufuw.
40001003	Naatu Judah natunatun i Perez tain Zerah hairi hitufuw, hinah wabin Tamar. Naatu Perez natun i Hezron, Hezron natun i Ram,
40001004	Ram natun i Aminadab, Aminadab natun i Nashon, Nashon natun i Salmon.
40001005	Naatu Salmon natun i Boaz, hinah wabin Rahab, naatu Boaz natun i Obed, hinah wabin Ruth, naatu Obed natun i Jesse.
40001006	Jesse natun i David, aiwob orot. David natun i Solomon, naatu Solomon hinah i orot Uriah ana kwafur.
40001007	Solomon natun i Rehoboam, Rehoboam natun i Abaijah, Abaijah natun i Asa,
40001008	Asa natun i Jehosafat, Jehosafat natun i Jehoram, Jehoram natun i Uzaiah,
40001009	Uzaiah natun i Jotham, Jotham natun i Ahaz, Ahaz natun i Hezekiah.
40001010	Naatu Hezekiah natun i Manasseh, Manasseh natun i Amon, Amon natun i Josiah,
40001011	Josiah natun i Jeconiah, Jeconiah taitin tuwahinah bairi hibitutufuw ana veya’amaim baiyow matar Babilon sabuw hina hibuwih hire hin Babilonamaim hima.
40001012	Babilonane himatabir maiye hinan ufunamaim Jeconiah natun i Shealtiel, naatu Shealtiel natun i Zerubbabel,
40001013	Zerubbabel natun i Abiud, naatu Abiud natun i Eliakim, Eliakim natun i Azor,
40001014	Azor natun i Zadok naatu Zadok natun i Akim, Akim natun i Eliud,
40001015	Eliud natun i Eleazar, Eleazar natun i Mathan, Mathan natun i Jacob,
40001016	Jacob natun i Joseph, Joseph aawan i Mary, naatu Mary natun i Jesu, it isan Keriso tarouw ta’o.
40001017	Imih Abraham ana veya’amaim busuruf re na David ana veya’amaim titit, agi’agir kwerekweren etei 14, naatu David ana veya’amaim re na hin Babilon hima’ama i 14, naatu Babilon hima’am imaim busuruf na Keriso ana veya’amaim titit i na’atube 14. *
40001018	Jesu Keriso ana tufuw an i iti na’atube busuruf. Jesu hinah Mary i orot Joseph bai’awanin isan ana rum hi’o, baise hairi nanabin hima’am ana veya, Mary Anun Kakafiyin re targabuw yan wanawanan rara bobokafuf i so’ob.
40001019	Naatu Joseph i orot gewasin, imih men kok boro bebeyanamaim Mary tibiya’uhuw; imih wa’iwa’iramaim Mary kwahirin isan bogaigiwas.
40001020	Baise ma binotanot tasinafumih, Regah ana tounamatar kakafiyin mimumaim tit eo, “Joseph, David ana agir, Mary bai na bai’awanin isan men inabirumih, anayabin iti i God Anunin Kakafiyinane yan matar.
40001021	I boro kek orot nayai, o wabin Jesu iniwab, anayabin i boro ana sabuw hai bowabow kakafihine niyawasih.” *
40001022	Sawar iti etei himamatar i abisa God ana dinab orot wanawananamaim eo Buk Atamaninamaim kikirum i na iturobe.
40001023	m “Babin biyan numin boro yan namatar, nataub kek orot nayai wabin Immanuel hiniwab” anayabin God it biyatamaim.
40001024	Joseph matan nuw mimisir ufunamaim, Regah ana tounamatar biyun na’atube Mary bai i’awan hairi hin ana bar.
40001025	Baise Joseph i Mary hairi inu’e hima hin Mary taub kek orot yai, naatu Joseph kek bai wabin Jesu iwab eaf.
40002001	Judea wanawanan Herod bi’aiwob ana veya’amaim, merar bar ta wabin Bethlehem imaim Jesu tufuw. Nati’imaim orot so’obayah afa daman baiyabayah veya yeninane hina Jerusalem hitit,
40002002	naatu sabuw hibatiyih, “Jew hai aiwob kek tutufuw i menamaim inu’in? Aki ana daman veya yeninane yey a’itin imih kwafirinamih ana.”
40002003	Aiwob orot Herod iti tur nonowar i ana not kasiy, naatu Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw etei’imak auman hai not kasiy.
40002004	Basit firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah etei eaf hina ibatiyih, “Keriso i boro menamaim natufuw?”
40002005	Hiya’afut hio, “Judea wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Bethlehemamaim. Anayabin dinab orot iti na’atube Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum,
40002006	‘Judah tafaram wanawanan, bar merar etei hai aiwob wanawanahimaim, O Bethlehem wab boro nara’at, anayabin one boro nabatanenayan orot natufuw, ayu au sabuw Israel nabonawiyih.’”
40002007	Imaibo Herod veya yenin nanawan hina hima’am eaf hirun wa’iwa’iramaim ibatiyih, kok taso’ob veya abistanamaim daman yey hi’itin.
40002008	Naatu au Bethlehem biyafarih i’uwih eo, “Kwanan kek kwananuwih gewas kwana’itin naatu kwanamatabir au tur kwana’owen, saise ayu’ubo anan anakwafir.”
40002009	Aiwob orot iti na’atube eo hinonowar ufunamaim hitit hin, naatu daman ta’imon veya yeninane hi’itin hinan au nah i’iyon na kek inu’in tafanamaim nutanub bat.
40002010	Nati daman hi’i’itin ana veya hiyasisir naatu hikawasa men kafaita.
40002011	Bar wanawanan hirun kek hinah Mary hairi hi’itih, suh hiyowen kek hikwafir. Imaibo hai kaukufet hirufamen hai siwar gold, frankincense , naatu myrrh hibotaiten kek hisiwar.
40002012	Naatu matabir maiye Herod biyan titamih hio’o, baise fai hai mimumaim God imatnuwih, naatu ef ta hibai hin hai tafaram hitit.
40002013	Nanawan orot hinan ufunamaim, Regah ana tounamatar Joseph ana mimumaim tit iu, “Kumisir kek hinah hairi kubuwih kwabihir kwan Egypt imaim kwanama’am boro ana’obo kwanatit, anayabin Herod i kek asabuninamih ana ef enunuwet.”
40002014	Basit Joseph misir kek hinah hairi buwih gugumin wanawanan hibihir hin Egypt hitit,
40002015	nati’imaim hima’am Herod morob. Imih sawar iti himamatar i abisa Regah ana dinab orot iwan Buk Atamaninamaim kikirum i na i turobe, “Egyptane ayu Natu abotait tit.”
40002016	Herod veya yenin nanawan hai baifuwen titita’ur ana veya, yan so’ar gagamat bufut naatu orotokek nati Bethlehem wanawanan naatu bar merar nati sisibinamaim iyabowat hai kwamur rou’ab au babe re’er etei asabunuw isan ana baiyowayah iyunih hitit. Iti na’atube eo biyunih anayabin i veya abisa’amaim nanawan daman hi’itin hio nonowar imaim sinaf.
40002017	Naatu abisa dinab orot Jeremiah eo kikirum i na yabin matar.
40002018	“Ramah bar meraramaim yuwen atubob gagamin maiyow re’er hinowar, tibikirir naatu tererey, Rachel natunatun isah erererey men ekokok hini’awafut, anayabin ana kek etei himorob sawar.”
40002019	Herod momorob ufunamaim, Joseph Egypt ma’ama Regah ana tounamatar Joseph ana mimumaim tit iu,
40002020	“Kumisir kek hinah hairi kubuwih kwamatabir maiye kwan au Israel, anayabin sabuw iyab kek asabuninamih hi’o i himoroboka.”
40002021	Basit Joseph matan nuw misir, Jesu hinah hairi buwih himatabir maiye hina Israel hitit.
40002022	Baise Arselaus tamah Herod ana efan bai, Judea wanawanan ma bi’aiwob Joseph ana tur nowar, naatu imaim na ma’amih bir. Mimumaim auman God imatanuw, imih i au Galilee na’at na,
40002023	bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim bar wowab ma, saise abisa dinab oro’orot Buk Atamaninamaim hi’o hikikirum i na yabin matar, “Jesu isan boro hinao i Nazareth matuwan”.
40003001	Kwamur bai’ab na’atube sawar ufunamaim, John Baptist Judea arar yan tit busuruf binan
40003002	eo, “Bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwanihamiyen, anayabin mar ana aiwob i na iyubin.”
40003003	Dinab orot Isaiah, Buk Atamaninamaim John isan kikirum iti na’atube eo, “Orot ta arar yan tit bat eafa’af, Regah ana ef kwayabuna, naatu ana ef kwaimutufur.”
40003004	John ana faifuw i camel bunibuninamaim sakir iyoun, ana kikir i bobaituw ta kanabinamaim naiwan kik, ana bay i sisik naatu kaiyar tafu.
40003005	Jerusalem wanawanan, Judea wanawanan bar merar etei naatu sabuw nati Jordan harew sisibin hima’am etei ikwei hina.
40003006	Hai bowabow kakafih hi’e’en, Jordan harewamaim John bapataito itih.
40003007	Baise i wanawanahimaim Pharisee naatu Sadducee maumurih na’in bapataito bainamih hinan itih eo, “Kwa i kokobe aso’ob hira’at! Yait eo kwanowar God ana baimakiy nabiyafar boro wan kwanabibir?
40003008	Turobe kakafihine dogor baikitabir kwanabaib i boro a yawas gewasinamaim ni’obaiyi, kwa i anababatun dogor baikitabir matar.
40003009	Men kwananot kwanao, ‘Abraham i aki ai agir,’ baise a tur ao’owen, God karam kabay iti boro nabow nasinaf Abraham wawawan hinamatar.
40003010	God ana kariwak i wan iur, ai an wairoronika tarinamih yai inu’in, ai menatan ebiw ro’on men gewasin boro natar nare wairaf wan nayara’ah na’arah.
40003011	“Ayu i dogor baikitabiren ana bapataito harewamaim abit. Baise orot ayu ufu’umaim enan ana fair i ra’at ayu natabiru, an ana sumasum ayu men karam boro ana’abar. I boro Anun Kakafiyin naatu wairafamaim bapataito nit.
40003012	I umanamaim i raububuna’en ana fok ema’am, imaim boro rice narab narububunai ani’anin korom nayai, naatu hain wairaf aidahin in etoto’ab wan nayara’ah na’arah.”
40003013	Nati ana veya’amaim, Jesu Galilee ine tit na Jordan tit, John bapataito baitinin isan.
40003014	Baise John rutawiy eo, “O i karam boro ayu bapataito ititu, baise aisim ayu isou kunan?”
40003015	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Boun abisa au’uwi i kusinaf, anayabin ef iti’imaim God ana kok gewasin isan yayakitifuw boro tanasinaf yabih hinamatar.” Naatu John ibasit Jesu bapataito itin.
40003016	Jesu bapataito baib ufunamaim matabir yen tafan bat. Nati ana maramaim mar botawiy God Anunin Kakafiyin itin mamu imak na’atube rob re na Jesu tar gabuw, naatu tafanamaim marakaw.
40003017	Mar wanawanan Orot fanan hinowar eo, “Iti kek i ayu Natu ta’imon, au yabow, I isan ayu abiyasisir.”
40004001	Imaibo Anun Kakafiyin Jesu nawiy hin arar yan imaim Demon kakafin routubunin isan.
40004002	Auyit 40 gugumin 40 na’atube bay en ma yoyoyoban ufunamaim bayumih morob.
40004003	Basit Demon Mowan na Jesu biyan tit eo, “O God Natun na’at, kabay iti ku’uwih tebotabiren rafiy tematar ku’aa.”
40004004	Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum i iti na’atube eo, ‘Orot boro men bay akisin niyawasimih, baise God awanamaim tur abisa etitit boro i niyawasih.’”
40004005	Naatu Demon Mowan Jesu nawiy hin Jerusalem hitit, Tafaror Bar afe’en hiyen tafantoro’ot bat.
40004006	Jesu iu, “O God Natun na’at, kukununuw kure. Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo, ‘God ana tounamatar boro o isa niyafarih, umah yanamaim inare hinabuwi, naatu kabay boro men a natakakirimih.’”
40004007	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Baise Buk Atamaninamaim iban eo maiye, ‘Regah a God men routobonamaim inanawiyimih.’”
40004008	Naatu Demon Mowan iban Jesu nawiy maiye hiyen hin oyaw manin tafantoro’ot bat, tafaram tutufin ana gewasin etei ana aiwob auman i’obaiy
40004009	eo, “Su inayowen ayu inakwafiru, sawar iti etei boro o anit”.
40004010	Jesu iya’afut iu eo, “Demon Mowan na kutabaratait! Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo, ‘Regah a God akisinamo inakwafir isan inabow.’”
40004011	Imaibo Demon Mowan nati’imaim Jesu ihamiy tabaratait, naatu God ana tounamatar hina Jesu hitafafar hinawiy bairi hin.
40004012	John dibur bar ma’am Jesu ana tur nowar, basit matabir na Galilee tit,
40004013	naatu Nazareth ihamiy na Capernaum imaim ma, harew kukuf sisibin Naphtali, Zeburun wawawan hai me’emaim,
40004014	saise tur abisa dinab orot Isaiah wanawananamaim titit i na iturobe.
40004015	“Zeburun ana me, Naphtali ana me, ef yan in tor re’ere, Jordan harew rounane, Galilee wanawanan Eteni Sabuw hai me’emaim,
40004016	sabuw gugumin ma’ayah boro marakaw hina’itin; naatu sabuw iyab morob kakafin ana me’emaim gugumin wanawanan tema’am marakaw boro isah nakusisiar narun.”
40004017	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu busuruf binan eo, “Bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwanihamiyen, anayabin mar ana aiwob ina iyubin”.
40004018	Jesu Galilee tor rewarewan remor inan orot ainuf hairi itih, Simon wabin ta Peter, tain Andrew hairi tor yan siy bowamih buwat hiya’ay.
40004019	Jesu eaf eo, “Kwana kwai’ufnunu bairit tan boro ani’obaiyi orot isah kwanaway”.
40004020	Mar ta’imonamo hai buwat hitumar Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40004021	Hin kafa’imo, orot rou’ababo ainuf hairi itih, James tain John hairi, Zebedee natunatun. Tamah bairi wa tafan hima hai buwat hitatar futifut, Jesu bai’ufnunin isan ea’afih ana veya,
40004022	mar ta’imonamo wa hihamiy naatu tamah auman wa tafan hihamiy ma, i hairi Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40004023	Galilee wanawanan Jesu runtit Jew hai Kou’ay Bar * gidigidihimaim mar ana aiwob isan tur gewasin binan, naatu sabuw yarug yumatah ta ta, sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am etei iyawasih.
40004024	Jesu ana tur ra’at in Syria tafaram wanawanan etei hinowar, basit sabuw sawusawuwih, ah umah kafikafirih, rara ani’anih, kokom ani’anih, koko’aw, mayamayay naatu sabuw afa hai sawow yumatah ta ta etei hiteten hina Jesu iyawasih.
40004025	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow Galilee’ine naatu Bar Merar Etei Umat Rororon wanawanahimaim naatu Jerusalem, Judea naatu Jordan wanawanan auman sabuw etei Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40005001	Jesu sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hinan itih, basit heher yen in koun yan mare ana bai’ufununayah hina sisibinamaim himarir.
40005002	Naatu busuruf i’obaibiyih eo,
40005003	“Sabuw iyab ayubih ana’amorob tebaib boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin mar ana aiwob boro ninowah hinab. *
40005004	Sabuw iyab hiyababan tererey God boro ni’afutih baigegewasin nitih.
40005005	Sabuw iyab taiyuwih teyayara’iyih boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin me tafaram boro ninowah hinab.
40005006	Sabuw iyab gewasin sinaf isan hi’amorob sikah emamamah boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro nitih hinab nasusuwih.
40005007	Sabuw iyab tekakabeber boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro nakabibirih.
40005008	Sabuw iyab dogoroh uhew boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro hina’itin.
40005009	Sabuw iyab tufuw ma gewas isan tebowabow boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin God boro natunatumih nabuwih.
40005010	Sabuw iyab gewasin tisisinaf isan hirouw tibi’a’akirih boro baigegewasin hinab, anayabin mar ana aiwob boro hinab.
40005011	“Kwabi’ufununu isan sabuw boro tur kakafin hina’uwi, hinarabi hini’a’a’akiri naatu baifuwenamaim tur kakafih maiyow hina’u’uwi isan, baigegewasin boro kwanab.
40005012	Kwaniyasisir naatu kwanakawasa, anayabin a siwar gagamin na’in auyom maramaim inu’in boro kwanab. Ef ta’imon nati na’atube marasika dinab oro’orot hirouw hi’a’a’akirih.
40005013	“Kwa i riy na’atube sabuw etei isah. Baise riy naniyan nabi’en na’at boro men karam hiniwa’an naniyan namatar maiye’emih, naatu sawar isan ana gewasin boro men ta nama, imih boro hinisaroun haw nare, sabuw tafan hinawas kamakamar hinaremor.
40005014	“Kwa i tafaram ana marakaw. Bar merar gagamin oyaw wan hiwowab ebatabat boro men karam hinibun wa’irimih.
40005015	Na’atube orot babin men ta ramef ito’ab noukwat wanawanan tarafut inumih. Baise ana sisikofamaim boro nasikof bar wanawanan etei namarakaw kawin hinama.
40005016	Ef ta’imon nati na’atube a marakaw sabuw etei matahimaim kwanabotawiy, saise abisa gewasin kwabowabow hina’itin * naatu Tamat maramaim wabin hinabora’ara’ah. *
40005017	“Ayu anan men kwananot Moses ana ofafar naatu dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen baihamiyen isan ao’omih. Ayu men i kouseiren isan anamih, baise sinaf yabih matar isan. *
40005018	Anababatun a tur a’owen, mar tafaram ema’am wanawananamaim kirum kikimin maiyow hikikirum, naatu pen wanamaim abisa hikukuyowan boro men ta anakusairimih, baise etei boro anasinaf yabih hinamatar.
40005019	Orot yait ofafar kikimin maiyow itin yabin en rouw eastu’ub naatu sabuw afa i’obaiyih nati na’atube tisisinaf, mar ana aiwobomaim ibo boro hina’itfuruw, anayabin en hinarouw hinao, baise orot yait iti ofafar ia’ait naatu sabuw afa ebi’obaiyih mar ana aiwobomaim i boro orot gagamin.
40005020	A tur ao’owen o yait abosunusunub nara’at Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah inananatabirih na’at, o i nuhinafot mar ana aiwobomaim i kurur.
40005021	“Tur marasika hio uwatanah hinonowar i hio kwanowar, men sabuw kwana’asbunuw, naatu orot yait sabuw ea’asbunuwih boro ofafar nafatum hinibatiy.
40005022	Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait taintuwan isan yan nasoso’ar boro ofafar nafatum hinibatiy, naatu orot yait taintuwan isan fudirin en narouw nao’o, i boro kaniser hinibatiy. Baise orot yait taintuwan na’oraraf anayabin en nao, nati orot i enan kakafin ana wairaf wan nayenamih.
40005023	“Isan imih gem kakafiyin tafamaim o a siwar ya’inamih ibai kuyey, naatu nati’imaim o nuhi nataseb, tai ta o isa i yan esoso’ar.
40005024	Basit a siwar nati gem tafanamaim inihamiy na’in, o inamatabir maiye inan tai airi kwanao gewas uma kwanabow kwanitonuw, imaibo inamatabir inan a siwar God initin.
40005025	“Ofafar ta ina’astu’ub taituwa baibatiyihimih nabuwi kwanan, airi kwanao gewas kwanitonuw, veya kikimin nama’am na’at, imaibo inan baibatiyenamaim inarun, anayabin nati’imaim tura boro nabuwi baibatiyenayan orot gagamin umanamaim naya’i, naatu baibatiyenayan orot boro nabuwi furisiman nitih hinabuwi kwanan dibur bar hinayaruyi.
40005026	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati’imaim o boro inama kabay hio na’atube inatubuni, imaibo boro hinabotait inatit.
40005027	“Tur hio uwatanah hibi’obaibiy i hio kwanowar, turanah a’aawah ufuh men kwanan.
40005028	Naatu boun a tur ao’owen orot yait matanawat nuw babin itin ana notamaim hairi baiwa’anamih enotanot ana notamaim hairi hiwa’anaka.
40005029	Imih o mata asukwafune nuw kwaneyan, o in bowabow kakafin kusisinaf, kukubai kwisaroun, men basit mata ta’imon ana kakafinamaim o biya etei tan wairaf wan tayen ta’arah.
40005030	Na’atube uma asukwafune eof kwaneyan, ku’afuw kwisaroun men basit uma ta’imon ana of kwanekwanemaim o biya etei tan wairaf wan tayen ta’arah.
40005031	“Moses ana ofafaramaim eo, ‘Orot yait aawan nakwakwahir gewasin kwahikwahiren ana fef nakirum babin nitin nab auman nan.’
40005032	Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait nibobowen aawan nakwahir nan orot ta ni’awan, hairi hinabiwa’an i men babin ana ubar, baise orot ana ubar anayabin i kok imih babin esisinaf, naatu orot yait nati babin bai bi’awan auman bowabow kakafin esisinaf.
40005033	“Tur marasika hio uwatanah hinonowar i hio kwanowar, ‘A omatanen men kwana’astu’ub, baise sinafumih God kwao’omatan i kwanasinaf.’
40005034	Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, God wabinamaim men asir kwanao kwanifaro’omih, na’atube auyom mar isan, anayabin nati i God ana ma’ama efan.
40005035	Me yan auman men isan kwanifaro, anayabin nati i God an ana baibiyarir efan, Jerusalem auman, anayabin nati i ata aiwob gagamin God ana tafaram.
40005036	Naatu o taiyuw auman men arib isan inao baifaro’omih, anayabin o men karam boro arib ta inab inau nikwes o nafurum.
40005037	Imih inakwahir o inarufut, anayabin abisa awamaim iya’abar i’o etitit i Demon Kakafin biyanane enan.
40005038	“Marasika ana tur hio kwanowar, ‘Orot yait mata nakubai, ibo matan kukubai, naatu orot yait wa nimarir, ibo wan kwimarir.’
40005039	Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, orot yait isa nasisinaf kakaf men wan inay, rebareb rounane nifafar inatatabir rounane’ebo nifafar.
40005040	Naatu orot yait niyaso’ar baibatiyimih nabuwi kwananan, a biya baibiyon baban nikiya’ub nabaib, a biya baibiyon tafan auman inikiya’ub initin.
40005041	Baiyowayan orot ta nan nakwarari ana hafoy abarin veya ta’imon airi namih nao, ina’abar veya rou’ab airi kwanan.
40005042	Orot babin ta isa sawaramih nafefeyani kwitin, naatu orot babin ta a sawar bai na mar kafai imaim bowamih nao, kwitin ebai en.
40005043	“Marasika ana tur hio a’a’agir hinonowar i hio kwanowar, ‘Taituwa kwaniyabuwih naatu a kamabiy sabuw kwanimat gigigirih.’
40005044	Baise boun a tur ao’owen, a kamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih naatu sabuw iyab terurukoukuwi isah kwanayoyoban.
40005045	Saise kwa boro Tamat auyom maramaim natunatumih nabuwi, anayabin God sinaf sabuw gewasih kakafih etei tafahimaim veya erararan, sabuw iyab gewasin tisisinaf naatu kakafin tisisinaf etei God taun ebitih.
40005046	Sabuw kabay o’onayah tisisinaf na’atube kwanasinaf sabuw iyabowat isa tibiyabowawat isah kwanabiyabow, God boro men ana siwar gewasin ta nitimih.
40005047	Naatu Eteni Sabuw taih tuwah akisih hai merar tiyiy na’atube kwanasinaf taituwa akisih hai merar kwanayiyi, ana gewasin boro men kwanabaimih.
40005048	A yawas uhew bitan kwanama, Tamat auyom maramaim ana yawas uhew bitan ema’am na’atube.
40006001	“Yate nanub, men iti baifa’i isan a bowabow gewasih sabuw nahimaim kwanabowamih, nati na’atube kwanasisinaf na’at, Tamat maramaim boro men a baiyan nitimih.
40006002	“Imih veya ta akir wairafin sawar inabitin men inakurereb sabuw etei hinanowaramih, men sabuw wanawanah rerekabih Kou’ay Bar wanawanan, naatu ef gagamih yahimaim sabuw itih baifa’ih isan tisisinafube kwanasinafumih, anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati sabuw i boro men hai siwar ta God nitihimih.
40006003	Isan imih akir wairafin inabibais, wa’iwa’iramaim inibais, saise a’of iti sisib ema’am men naso’ob o abisa kusisinaf.
40006004	Iti sawar i wa’iwa’iramaim inasinaf, saise Tamat maramaim o abisa wa’iwa’iramaim isisinaf na’iti boro a baiyan nit.
40006005	“Naatu yoyobanamih men wanawanah rerekabih tisisinafube, kwanasinafumih, anayabin i tekokok Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hinabat hinayoyoban, o ef na’ih awah kaukusebamaim hinabat hinayoyoban, saise sabuw hina’itih, baise anababatun a tur ao’owen, nati sabuw hai baiyan i hibaika.
40006006	Baise o yoyobanamih a bar inarun, etawan inahir, Tamat wa’iwa’iramaim ema’am isan inayoyoban, naatu Tamat abisa wa’iwa’iramaim isinaf i’itin boro a baiyan nit.
40006007	Naatu yoyobanamih men a tur nidun namomonamih, Eteni Sabuw iyab God men hisusu’ub i na’atube tisisinaf. Tenotanot yoyoban manin hinayoyoban God boro hai yoyoban nanowar.
40006008	Men i hai sinaf kwani’u’ur, anayabin abisa inotanot Tamat i so’obabo o kubifefeyan.
40006009	Imih iti na’atube kwanayoyoban, ‘Tamai maramaim, O wab i kakafiyin.
40006010	A aiwob tan, tafaramamaim a kok atasinaf, maramaim tisisinaf na’atube,
40006011	Biyai ana fair isan mar etei ai bay initi.
40006012	Ai kakafih kunotawiyen, taituwai hai kakafin anonotawiyen na’atube.
40006013	Men routobonamaim inanawiyi’imih, baise kakafihine inatar fafari, a aiwob, a fair, a marakaw nama wanatowan, Amen .’
40006014	“Taituwa o isa bowabow kakafin hisisinaf inanotawiyen, Tamat maramaim o a kakafih auman boro nanotawiyen.
40006015	Baise hai kakafih men inanotanotwiyen na’at, o a kakafin auman Tamat boro men nanotawiyen.
40006016	“Kwanayoyohar * ana veya men sabuw wanawanah rerekabih kwani’u’urih, anayabin nati na’atube teyoyohar, saise taituwah hina’itih yoharayah hinarouw hinifa’ih isan. Anababatun a tur ao’owen nati sabuw hai baiyan i hibaika.
40006017	Baise kwanayoyohar ana veya yumat kwanasouwen arib raiy kwanay kwanisuwar,
40006018	saise sabuw afa boro men hina so’ob kwa i kwayoyohar, baise Tamat wa’iwa’iramaim ema’ama, o abisa akisimo isinaf i’itin boro a baiyan nit.
40006019	“A sawar gewasih iti tafaramamaim inaya inatototo, ganidor boro na’aan fufur naatu simur boro na’arah, naatu bainowah auman boro a bar hinakwib hinarun a sawar hinabain.
40006020	Imih a sawar etei maramaim inaya inatoto, saise ganidor boro men hina’aan, naatu simur boro men na’arah, naatu bainowah boro men a bar hinakwib hinarun hina bainuwihimih.
40006021	A toto abuyoy menamaim kuya’aya, o dogor boro imaim mar etei nama.
40006022	“Matat i biyat ana hinow, matat gewasin, biyat etei boro marakawin.
40006023	Baise matat kakafin, biyat tutufin etei boro gugumin kakafin, naatu nati gugumin i wanu’umin kakafin.
40006024	“Orot ta’imon men karam boro orot gagamih rou’ab isah nabow, ana gewasin orot ta i boro nakwahir, naatu orot ta isan niyabow, orot ta ana tur i boro nanowar naatu orot ta boro nifutuw.
40006025	“Isan imih a tur ao’owen, ayawas isan men kwaniyababan, a tom isan, biya isan, naatu ar faifuw isan. Kwanotanot yawas i sawar gagamin ar faifuw naatu a tom hairi natabirih?
40006026	Kwanuw mamu kwa’itah, men masaw tebob naatu men masaw tefafour, na’atube aurih bay ana korom en * baise Tamat maramaim kaifih bay ebitih. Imih kwa i men mamu ekakaifih na’atube ekakaifimih.
40006027	Imih yababan men karam boro a yawas nakumanin kwanama’amih *
40006028	“Naatu aisim ar faifuw isah kwabiyababan? Sigar beran kwanuw kwa’itih, men kafai hibow raro’oh ebababan, o biyah isan ar faifuw tesasakiramih.
40006029	Baise a tur ao’owen, aiwob orot Solomon toto buyoy wairafin, ana faifuw eo’osen i men ta iti beran ana gewasinabe’emih.
40006030	God kaiyar fotan ebi’osen wainih kwana’itin, fotan iti boun natasasar, maras boro nakimow nare wairaf wan hinayara’aten hina’arah. Baise kwa i Tamat God uman yanamaim ekakaifi, aisim men kwabitumitum?
40006031	Imih men kwaniyababan kwanao, au ar au faifuw boro menamaim anabow ana’osen, naatu bay boro menamaim anabow ana, harew menamaim anahun anatom?
40006032	Eteni Sabuw i sawar iti isah tibiyababan, naatu Tamat maramaim kwa a yababan etei i so’ob.
40006033	Baise wan i mar ana aiwob naatu ma gewasin * kwananuwih kwanab, naatu sawar iti etei boro tafan naya’abar nit kwanabow.
40006034	Isan imih maras isan men kwaniyababan, anayabin maras ibo akisin ana yababan. Na’atube veya ta’ita’imon hai yababan men inabo’ay inanot a yababan nara’atamih.
40007001	“Taituwa hai kakafin men ina’itin inibibatiyih, God boro nibatiyi.
40007002	Anayabin God boro ef ta’imon taituwa ibibatiyih na’atube, o boro nibatiy, naatu fufun ta’imon taituwa ifufufunihimaim, o boro nafufuni.
40007003	“Aisim taituwa matah mutusukwar i’itin kikin ku’o naatu o mata ahay gagamin yi ebatabat men kui’itin.
40007004	O taituwa isan boro mi’itube awa fariniwa’an inao, ‘Aro nekuna mata mutusukwar abosair.’ Naatu baise o mar etei i matan ahay yi ebatabat.
40007005	Wanawan rerekabih, mat o taiyuw mata a’ahay ina’uy, saise boro inanuw gewas taituwa matan ana ahay ina’uy.
40007006	“Abisa kakafiyin men haru aninamih kwanitih, boro hinatatabir hinayubi. Naatu a nugunug men for nahimaim kwanarub nare, boro tafan hinayen hinawasu’uru’um.
40007007	“Inafefeyan boro inab, inanuwet boro inatita’ur, naatu inarukikitar etawan boro isa nabotawiy.
40007008	Anayabin orot yait efefeyan boro nab, orot yait enunuwet boro natita’ur naatu orot yait erurukikitar etawan boro isan nabotawiy.
40007009	“O yait natu, wahimih fefeyan kabay ibai itin ean?
40007010	Na’atube siyamih rererey kok ibai itin ean?
40007011	En baise Kwa i bowabow kakafih sinafuyah, baise kwaso’ob natunat boro siwar gewasih kwanitih, imih Tamat maramaim i ma tainin erubirub orot yait efefeyan boro siwar gewasin nitin.
40007012	Imih sawar etei taituwa isah inabow, o kukok isa tebowabow na’atube, anayabin Moses ana ofafar naatu dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen an anababatun i iti’imaim ku’ay inu’in.
40007013	“Etawan awan kukurinamaim kwanarun kwan, anayabin etawan awan gagamin, naatu ef awan hahabin inarun inanan yomaninamaim i gurugurusen ema’am naatu sabuw moumurih na’in imaim tenan.
40007014	Baise etawan awan kukurin naatu ef awan tuwafutin inarun inanan yomaninamaim i yawas ema’am, naatu sabuw matan ta’amo imaim tenan.
40007015	“Mata to niwa’an dinab baifufuwenayah hinanan kwana’itih, anayabin hinanan ufuhine ana itinin boro sheep na’atube, baise dogoroh wanawanan ana itinin i haru tuwetuwenih. *
40007016	Hai bowabowamaim boro kwana’inanih, agor ro’on boro men kiw tafanamaim inima’ub, naatu wanob ro’on boro men kiw tafanamaim inima’ub? *
40007017	Ai gewasin boro niw gewas, baise ai wanawanan kour nabiw ro’on boro nukunukuwin.
40007018	Ai gewasin boro men ro’on nukunukuwin nayai, na’atube ai kakafin boro men ro’on gewasin nayai.
40007019	Ai menatan men ebiw gewas boro natar nare nab nan wairaf wan nayara’ah na’arah.
40007020	Imih dinab baifufuwenayah boro hai bowabowamaim kwana’inanih.
40007021	“Men sabuw etei ayu wabu hisu’ub teo, ‘Regah, Regah’ boro mar ana aiwobomaim hinarun, baise sabuw iyabowat ayu Tamai ana kok tisisinafuwat boro hinarun.
40007022	Baibatebat ana veya nanan, sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinao, Regah, Regah, o wabimaim aki tur abai aorereb, o wabimaim aki demon kakafih anunih hibihir, naatu o wabimaim aki ina’inan moumurih na’in asinaf.
40007023	Imaibo ayu boro anauwih anao, Ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab. Biyau’umaim kwatit sa’ab kwan, bowabow kakafih sinafuyah.
40007024	“Isan imih orot yait au tur nowar ebobosiyasiyar, * i orot not wairafin ana bar to tafan wowab batabat na’atube.
40007025	Taun gagamin yar, harew tit, naatu wowog tit bar babin, baise bar men ufar re’emih, anayabin bar ana bubu an i to wanawanan rouw re wowab.
40007026	Baise orot yait au tur nowar naatu men ebobosiyasiyar, i orot aurin not en bar ana bubu dones yan rouw wowowab na’atube.
40007027	Taun yar, harew tit, naatu wowog babin, bar babinakouw, naatu nati bar re’ere i ra’iy tagurugurus sawar.”
40007028	Jesu iti tur eo in sasawar ufunamaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in Jesu binan hinonowar isan hifofofor men kafaita.
40007029	Anayabin bi’obaiyih ana itinin i roubabaruwen ana fair isan ma’am na’atube, men Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah na’atube’emih.
40008001	Jesu oyaw wanane re nan ana veya’amaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40008002	Naatu orot ta biyan kokom ani’anin na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Regah inakokok na’at basit biyou iniwa’an nigewasin.”
40008003	Jesu uman ru’atayan orot biyan butubun eo, “Ayu akokok, biya igewasin.” Mar ta’imonamo orot biyan kokom etei hihururuw hire orot biyan igewasin.
40008004	Naatu Jesu orot iu, “Men orot babin ta ana tur inaowenamih, baise mutufor kwen firis biya enutitiy naatu Moses ana obaiyunen tur eo na’atube, sibor inayai sabuw etei matahimaim hina’itin o biya igewasin.”
40008005	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu na Capernaum titit, basit Roman baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin na baibais isan Jesu ifefeyan.
40008006	“Regah, ayu au bowayan orot ta i sawow, an uman himorob, baremaim inu’in, misir isan men karam, biyan ebababan kwanekwan.”
40008007	Basit Jesu eo, “Boro anan a orot aniyawas.”
40008008	Baiyowayan orot ukwarin Jesu iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu men orot gewasu boro inan au bar wanawanan inarun, baise turawat kuo au bowayan orot eyawas.
40008009	Anayabin ayu i roubabaruwen ana fair biyau’umaim ema’am, naatu baiyowayah etei ayu bab’umaim tema’am, imih baiyowayan orot ta isan anao, ‘Ni’imaim kwen,’ i boro nan, naatu orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti imaim kuna,’ i boro nan, naatu au bowayan orot ta isan anao, iti kusinaf, i boro nasinaf, imih turawat kuo au orot boro nayawas.”
40008010	Jesu iti tur nonowar ifofofor men kafaita, naatu sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan tatabir isah eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, Israel wanawanan men kafa’imo orot ta ana baitumatum gagamin iti na’atube bitumatum atita’urimih.
40008011	A tur ao’owen, sabuw moumurih boro veya yeninane naatu veya ra’iyinane hinan mar ana aiwobomaim hina run, gem sisibinamaim hai efan hinabow Abraham, Isaac, naatu Jacob bairi hiniyasisir.
40008012	Baise sabuw iyab mar ana aiwobomaim hitarur i boro maramaim hinabow hinarauw hinare gugumin wanawanan hinarun. Nati’imaim hinama hinarerey wah hinanib kakikak hiniwa’an.”
40008013	Imaibo Jesu baiyowayan orot ukwarin iu, “Aubar kwen, naatu abisa kubitumatum i boro namatar.” Naatu nati ana veya’amaim akir wairafin bar sawow inu’in yawas.
40008014	Naatu Jesu na Peter ana bar titit, Peter rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab inu’in itin.
40008015	Basit Jesu babin uman baib ana veya’amaim, ana sawow i en misir bay bogaigiwas.
40008016	Birabirab sabuw wagabur kouh hiyen hima’am hibow hina Jesu biyan hitit, naatu awanawat eaf eo wagabur hibihir hititit, naatu sabuw afa hisawow hibow hinan auman etei iyawasih.
40008017	Sawar iti himamatar i dinab orot Isaiah eo kikirum na iturobe, “I akisinamo it ata sawow ata biyababan ebobosairen.”
40008018	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiruru’ay Jesu itih, basit ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Kwabobuna tarabon harew kukuf rewan rounane.”
40008019	Naatu ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot ta na Jesu isan eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, ayu o menamaim kwenan ayu boro imaim airit tanan.”
40008020	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Sigarafor i hai batar tema’am, naatu mamu hai batar tema’am imaim ti’inu’in, baise Orot Natun inure in biyan tubaiwa’an isan aurin efan en.”
40008021	Bai’ufununayah orot tabo na Jesu isan eo, “Regah karam wan itihamiyu atan tamai momorob atayai’ibo atan ati’uf nuni airit tanan?”
40008022	Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu kwi’ufnunu tan, iyab himomorob taiyuwih boro hinaya’ih.” *
40008023	Naatu Jesu wa isra’at ana bai’ufununayah hiyen bairi hiboy hirabon.
40008024	Naniyan meyemeye yabat gagamin misir wan kikiy yen wa iwanasum. Baise Jesu wa uranane nuhin bur inu’in ufu’ufut.
40008025	Bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibunibun hio, “Regah, iniyawasi, wa iu’unun kafa’imo tana morob.”
40008026	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa aisim kwabirubir? A not men nakabom, * ayu kwanitutumu boro men kwanamorobomih.” Imaibo misir kwarar yabat kotar eotanih mar ta’imon nuwarob eafuw.
40008027	Ana bai’ufununayah hifofor hio, “Iti orot i abi orot? Karam yabat naatu kotar boro fanan hinab hinanutanub.”
40008028	Naatu hirabon hina harew kukuf rewan rounane tafaram wabin Gadara hititit ana veya, orot rou’ab marasika wagabur kouh hito hirun rah yanamaim hima’ama hitit, hai itinin i birubir naatu nati efanamaim men yait ta reremoramih, anayabin hibirubir orot rou’ab isah. Baise Jesu nati’imaim titit ana veya, hairi hina Jesu biyan hitit.
40008029	Hiwow hio, “God Natun, aki isai mi’itube inasinafumih kunan? Aki baimakiy initi’imih, bo aki ai baimakiy ana veya binatit.”
40008030	Naatu nati’imaim for i men ef yok hima hi’u’ufar.
40008031	Imih wagabur Jesu hifefeyan hio, “Aki inanuni ana titit akokok iniyuni anan for wanawanah ana run.”
40008032	Jesu eo, “Kwatit kwan.” Hirouwatait hinunuw hin for wanawanah hirun, for himisir fan hinunuw hire hin harew kukuf yan hire hi’aa tomatom himorob.
40008033	Orot nati for hima’uten hima’am himisir hibihir hin bar merar hitit, abisa’awat himamatar hai tur hi’owen naatu orot rou’ab isah abisa mamatar auman hai tur hi’owen.
40008034	Imaibo sabuw nati bar merar hima’am etei hitit hina Jesu bairi hitar naatu hi’i’itin ana veya hifefeyan hiu hai tafaram ihamiy tit.
40009001	Jesu wa afe’en yen naatu matabir maiye rabon na ana bar ana meraramaim tit.
40009002	Nati’imaim sabuw afa orot ta an uman murubin emo’emomaim hiwan hi’abar hina Jesu biyan hitit, naatu Jesu sabuw hai baitumatum itin, basit orot an uman murubin isan eo, “Natu men iniyababan, o a bowabow kakafih i anotanotawiyen.”
40009003	Naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot i tur kakafin maiyow eo God ebi’ib.”
40009004	Jesu abisa hinotanot itin naatu eo, “Kwa aisim dogor wanawanan not kakafih kwanotanot?
40009005	Ef menatan i hamehamen, orot ana kakafih notawiyen isan anao i hamehamen ai anau namisir nabat nareremor i hamehamen?
40009006	Baise kwakakasiy, imih ani’obaiyi kwana’itin, orot Natun i tafaramamaim fair bai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.” Naatu orot an uman murubin isan eo, “Kumisir a ir kunuw kubai a ubar kwen.”
40009007	Orot misir ana ir nuw bai ana ubar in.
40009008	Sabuw iti na’atube matar hi’i’itin ana mar hai hibir ra’at * naatu God wabin hibora’ara’ah fair iti na’atube orot bitih isan.
40009009	Jesu efan nati ihamiy remor inan auman, kabay o’onayan wabin Matthew ana bowabow efanamaim ma’am itin naatu iu, “Kumisir kwi’ufnunu.” Matthew ma’am misir Jesu iufunun hairi hin.
40009010	Jesu Matthew ana baremaim ma bay hi’au, ana maramaim kabay o’onayah naatu bowabow kakafih sinafuyah moumurih maiyow hina Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hikofanih bay aa ana efanamaim himare.
40009011	Naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hi’itih ana maramaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiyih, “Aisim kwa a bai’obaiyenayan kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw kakafih bairi hima bay te’aa?”
40009012	Jesu hio nowar naatu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw aurih sawow en adanafur orot boro men hinakok, baise sabuw iyab sawusawuwih boro adanafur orot hinakok.
40009013	Kwa Buk Atamaninamaim kwabiyab tur yabin kwa’itin? ‘Ayu i akokok kabeber, men sibor.’”
40009014	Naatu John Baptist ana bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibatiy hio, “Aisim aki naatu ofafar bai’ufununayah bairi mar etei ayoyohar naatu o a bai’ufununayah i en?”
40009015	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Men karam sabuw orot boubun tatatabin ana yasisir isan hitaruru’ay, hitama orot yawasin hitabotouw, baise mar boro nanan orot boro hinabosair naatu nati ana veya’amaim imaibo hinifoufur hinirowarow.
40009016	Na’atube faifuw atamanin boro men karam hinab faifuw boubun hinafitimih, anayabin faifuw boubun hinasasauw ana veya boro nakaro’om natakweb mahar nara’at.
40009017	Na’atube men yait ta wine boubun ebai wine ana kibub atamaninamaim eriririmih, anayabin wine boubun boro nara’at naatu kibub natafofor wine nasuwa na re, imih wine boubun i boro wine ana kibub boubunamaim hinarir, saise hairi boro gewasih hinabat.”
40009018	Iti na’atube eo auman Tafaror Bar kaifenayan orot ta na Jesu biyan tit nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Ayu natu babitai i veya boun morob, baise akokok inan umawat inabutubun nayawas.”
40009019	Basit Jesu misir ana bai’ufununayah bairi orot hi’ufunun hin.
40009020	Naatu babin ta ana faifuwamaim rara bota’ar ma’am kwamur etei 12 sasawar, na Jesu ufunane tit,
40009021	ana notamaim eo, “Jesu ana faifuw tainin ana butubun boro ana yawas.” Naatu ana faifuw tainin butubun.
40009022	Jesu tatabir babin itin eo, “Natu men iniyababan, abai tumatumamaim kubigewasin.” Iti na’at eo ana veya’amaim, mar ta’imonamo babin igewasin.
40009023	Imaibo Jesu na Kou’ay Bar kaifenayan orot ana bar wanawanan run. Sabuw hiru’ay hima hirerey itih, naatu rerey ana fik hibababin nowar.
40009024	Jesu eo, “Iti kek babitai i matan fot inu’in, men morobomih, kwamisir ufun kwatit.” Baise sabuw isan himarib, anayabin i hiso’ob kek i morob.
40009025	Basit sabuw etei himisir ufun hitit sawar, imaibo Jesu run in kek inu’in ana efanamaim tit, naatu babitai uman bai imisiruw yawas misir.
40009026	Iti sisinaf ana tur ra’at tasasar in nati tafaram hima’am ana fofonin etei hinowar.
40009027	Jesu efan nati itumar tit remor inan, orot rou’ab matah fim hitit hi’ufunun hin hi’af hio, “David uwan, kwiwanbabani.”
40009028	Jesu na bar wanawanan run naatu orot rou’ab hina biyan hitit, Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Kwabitumatum ayu boro aniyawasi?” Hairi hiya’afut hio, “Regah abitumitum.”
40009029	Basit Jesu hairi matah botobonen eo, “Kwabitumatum na’atube isa namatar.”
40009030	Hairi matah higewasin hinuw naatu Jesu eofafarih eo, “Men yait ta ana tur kwana’owen.”
40009031	Baise hairi hitit hin Jesu ana tur hibosemor ra’at, nati tafaram hima’am ana fofonin etei hinowar.
40009032	Orot rou’ab hinan ufut sabuw afa orot ta yoyom hirab awan igug ma’am hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit.
40009033	Naatu Jesu yoyom mowan nun tit orot busuruf tur eo sabuw etei hifofor hio, “Sawar iti na’atube Israel wanawananamaim men ta i’itin bounabo ta’i’itin.”
40009034	Baise Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hio, “Iti i Demon Hai Ukwarin fair itin imih demon nunih titit.”
40009035	Jesu bar awan awan run tit sabuw inanawanih bar merar hai Kou’ay Baremaim sabuw i’obaibiyih, mar ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin eo hinowar naatu sabuw hai sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hinan etei iyayawasih.
40009036	Jesu iti rou’ay gagamin maiyow hinan itih yan baban, anayabin hai not kwaris naatu aurih baibais en, ana itinin i sheep na’atube aurih nabatanenayan orot en.
40009037	Basit ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “Masaw i gagamin na’in baise ana fourayah i men moumurih.
40009038	Imih masaw matuwan isan kwanayoyoban saise bowayah afa niyafarih hinan bay hinafour, anayabin bay i hiyamur.”
40010001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah etei 12 eaf ayuwih hina, sawow yumatah ta ta, feher yumatah ta ta, sabuw biyahimaim baiyawasih isan fair itih naatu igegewasinih.
40010002	Naatu iti i bai’ufununayah nah 12 wabih, wantoro’ot i Simon wabin ta Peter tufuturan Andrew hairi, James tufuturan John hairi, orot Zebedee natunatun.
40010003	Philip, Bartholomew hairi, kabay onayan wabin Matthew i Thomas hairi, naatu Alpheus natun James i Thaddeus hairi,
40010004	tafaram kafafarayan orot wabin Simon. Jesu ana yanuwayan orot Judas Iscariot hairi.
40010005	Orot nah 12 Jesu iyunih hititit iuwih eo, “Ufun Sabuw * hai tafaramamaim men kwanan naatu Samaria sabuw hai bar hai meraramaim men kwanarun.
40010006	Baise kwanan Israel sabuw bobaituw na’atube hikasiy tema’am biyahimaim kwanarun kwaniyawasih.
40010007	Kwanan iti tur i kwanabinan, Mar ana aiwob i na iyubinaka.
40010008	Sawusawuwih kwaniyawasih, murumurubih kwanao hinamisir, sabuw iyab biyah kokom ani’anih kwaniyawasih naatu demon kakafih kwananunih hinatit. Sawar ana baiyan en kwabaib, imih kwanabow ana baiyan en.
40010009	Men kabay ta kwanab a koukut kwaniwan, * naiw a kikiramaim kwanarobere auman kwananamih.
40010010	Remor isan men hafoy ta kwanab, men biya baibiyon ta, a baibiyon ta, tu ta, kwanabow auman kwananamih. * anayabin bowayah abis kikimin tibitin boro nakaram.
40010011	“Kwanan bar merar kikimin o bar merar gagamin kwanarur, sabuw iyab merarayow wairafih kwananuwihih, naatu i hai baremaim kwanama, a bowabow kwanisawar imaibo kwihamiyih kwanan.
40010012	Naatu bar runamih sabuw a merarayow kwanitih. *
40010013	Naatu sabuw bar wanawanan tufuw ana merarayow hinabaib, basit a merarayow kwanihamiy nati baremaim nama, baise men hinabaib a tufuw ana merarayow kwanabosair kwanab maiye.
40010014	Orot babin yait a merar men nay naatu a tur men nanonowar, kwanamisir ura kwanarutatab efan nati kwanihamiy kwanan efan ta.
40010015	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana veya God Sodom, Gomorah sabuw boro nakabibirih, baise nati bar merar sabuw hai baimakiy i boro God tafan nayara’ah gagamin na’in hinab.
40010016	“Kwananowar, kwa i bobaituw sheep na’atube haru fairih wanawanahimaim abiyuni kwanatit kwananamih, imih kok na’atube kwanakakaf naatu mamu imak na’atube kwananutanub.
40010017	“Mata toniwa’an sabuw isah, anayabin boro hinabuw hinafatumi kwanan kanisel nahimaim hibabatiy, naatu Kou’ay Baremaim boro hinaborabirabi.
40010018	Ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan boro aiwob sabuw naatu gawan orot gagamih na’atube Ufun Sabuw nahimaim Tur Gewasin kurereb nowar isan boro hinarab hinataini.
40010019	Baise hinafatum hinabuw baibabatiyimih kwanan men kwaniyababan tur isan, o tur o isan, hinabibatiy ana veya’amaim tur boro imaim natit kwanao.
40010020	Anayabin nati tur i men o a notamaim tit kuo’omih, baise Tamat Anunin o iwani awa rukirir kuo.
40010021	“Orot ain boro tain baban nao namorob, regah boro natun nifa’ifa’i baban nao namorob, na’atube kek boro hinah tamah hinifa’ifa’ih babah hinao hinamorob.
40010022	Ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan sabuw boro hinifa’ifa’i, baise orot yait nabat kikin nabowabow yomaninamaim boro yawas natita’ur.
40010023	Bar merar ta’amaim hinarukoukuw kwanabia’akir, kwanabihir kwanan bar merar ta, anababatun a tur ao’owen, Israel wanawanan bar merar etei boro men kwanabow kwanisawaribo Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanamih.
40010024	“Kirum kek boro men ana bai’obaiyen orot na natabirimih, na’atube akir wairafin boro men ana orot ukwarin na natabirimih.
40010025	Baise kirum kek na kok ana bai’obaiyen orot na’atube mataramih, basit i ukwarin na rerekab na kirum gewas, na’atube akir wairafin nabow gewas ana orot ukwarin boro nayara’ah ibe namatar, baise bar matuwan orot isan Beelzebul hinarouw hinao na’at, i ana akir wairafin isah boro tur kakafin maiyow hina’uwih wabih hini’a’afiy.
40010026	“Baise sabuw isah men kwanabir, anayabin abisa sum wanawanan wa’iwa’irin inu’in boro hina botait nirereb, naatu sawar baibunuwenamaim ti’inu’in etei boro hinatit hinibebeyan sabuw etei hinaso’ob.
40010027	Abisa wa’iwa’iramaim ao kwanonowar sabuw etei nahimaim kwanao hinanowar, naatu abisa akisimo ao kwanonowar, kwanayen gem tafahimaim kwanabat kwanabinan sabuw etei hinanowar.
40010028	Sabuw biya te’a’asabun isan men kwanabirumih, anayabin anun boro men hina’asabunimih, baise God isan i kwanabir, anayabin i boro biya naatu anun hairi’ika na’asbunuwen hinamorob.
40010029	Mamu kwikwik rou’ab hai baiyan i one toea’maim boro inatubun, baise mamu ta boro men Tamat so’oba’e namorob haw nare’emih.
40010030	Naatu kwa ukwarimaim arib i etei God iyab sawar.
40010031	Imih men kwanabir, Tamat ana yabow kwa isa i ra’at men mamu kwikwik na’atube’emih.
40010032	“Orot yait sabuw etei nahimaim ayu isou eo’orereb, ayu auman boro maramaim na’atube ana sinaf Tamai nanamaim.
40010033	Baise orot babin yait sabuw etei nahimaim ayu ekwakwahiru, ayu auman mar Tamai nanamaim boro ibo anakwahir.
40010034	“Men kwananot ayu i tufuw abai tafaramamaim anan, En. Ayu i men tufuw abai ananamih, baise kauseb abai anan.
40010035	Ayu anan anayabin ‘Kek orot boro tamah hairi hinagam, babitai boro hinah hairi hinagam, babine boro rawan babin hairi hinagam.
40010036	Imih orot ana kamabiy anababatun i boro i taiyuwin ana rara.’
40010037	“Orot yait ana yabow ayu isou ikikimin naatu hinah tamah isah ebiyabow kwanekwan i men karam boro ni’ufnunu, na’atube orot yait ana yabow ayu isou ikikimin naatu i natun orot naatu babitai isah ebiyabow kwanekwan, i men karam boro ni’ufnunu.
40010038	Naatu orot babin yait ana onaf men na’abar ayu nabi’ufnunu i men karam boro ayu airi ani’of.
40010039	Orot babin yait taiyuwin ana yawas enunuwih boro ana yawas nikasiy, baise orot babin yait ana yawas isou ebi’inuw boro natita’ur.
40010040	“Orot yait kwa a merar eyiyi, ayu au merar eyiyi, naatu orot yait ayu au merar eyiyi, i orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana merar eyiyi.
40010041	Orot babin yait dinab orot * ana merar eyiyi, anayabin i dinab orot, nati orot boro dinab orot ana baiyan turin nab. Naatu orot yait, orot ana yawas mutufurin ana merar eyiy, anayabin i orot ana yawas mutufurin boro orot ana yawas mutufurin ana baiyan turin nab.
40010042	Naatu orot babin yait kek kikimin harewawat hun itin etomatom, anayabin i ayu au bai’ufununayan, anababatun a tur ao’owen i ana baiyan boro nab.”
40011001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 roube’aten tur bitih ufunamaim efan nati itumar naatu na Galilee wanawanan bar merar afa imaim sabuw i’obaibiyih naatu binan.
40011002	John Baptist dibur bar ma’am Jesu bowabow bigan nowar, basit ana bai’ufununayah orot afa iyunih hin Jesu hibatiy.
40011003	“Ku’o anowar, John isa eo anonowaraban o iti ina, ai aki boro orot tabo isan anama anakaif?”
40011004	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwamatabir kwan abisa kwa’i’itin naatu kwanonowar i John ana tur kwana’owen.
40011005	Matah fim higewasin, ah kafikafirih higewasin hibat tereremor, sabuw biyah kokom ani’anih etei higewasin, tainih gugurih tur tenonowar, murumurubih hiyawas maiye timimisir, naatu Tur Gewasin i yababan sabuw isah tibibinan.
40011006	Orot yait ayu asisinaf isan erekasiy auman ebitumatum, i boro men baigegewasin nab.”
40011007	John ana bai’ufununayah hinan ufut, Jesu sabuw ibatiyih, “Arar yan kwatit kwanan John abisa sisinaf itinamih kwanot kwan? Kotar wadar i’inuwas inu’in itinamih kwan?
40011008	Ai abisa itinamih kwan? Orot eabur gewas batabat itinamih kwan? Baise sabuw hai abur gewasin i bar gewasihimaim tema’am.
40011009	Kwa’o anowar, abisa itinamih kwan, dinab orot? Turobe, baise a tur ao’owen iti orot i dinab etei natabirih.
40011010	Anayabin iti orot John isan i Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum. ‘Ayu au kob abarayan boro wan o namaim aniyun nan, i boro o a ef nayabuna.’*
40011011	“Anababatun a tur ao’owen John Baptist baibin hitatoub wanawanahimaim i orot gagamin ta hitoub hiyai. Baise orot yait mar ana aiwobomaim ebikek boro John nan natabir.
40011012	John Baptist bibinan ana veya na iti boun titit, sabuw fairih i mar ana aiwob bain isan hai fairamaim hibiturafef.
40011013	Anayabin Dinab oro’orot naatu ofafar bukamaim hikikirum i hima hio inan John natit.
40011014	Imih iti tur inanowar bainamih inakokok na’at basit kubai, anayabin dinab orot Elijah matabir maiye namih hio kikirum, i John ana efan bai na titika.
40011015	Imih o yait tain nama’am na’at tur inanowar.
40011016	“Itinin boro abisa’amaim iti boun ana sabuw isah anao kwanowar, sabuw iti boun hai itinin i kek gidigidih ahar efanamaim tema, hai ofonah bairi fafowamih tibi’afa’afa na’atube.
40011017	‘Aki tabin ana ew atatabor, baise kwa men kwabenaben, naatu morob ana ew atatabor baise kwa men kwarerey.’
40011018	“John nan ana veya’amaim i yohar naatu harew fokarih men tom, naatu sabuw etei hio, iti orot i yoyom koun hiyen ema’am.
40011019	Baise Orot Natun nan i bay eaa, harew fokarin tom, sabuw etei hio, ’Iti orot kwa’itin, anaa, anatom kakafin! Kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah bairi hiof tema’am.’ Baise God ana so’ob i turobe sinafumaim tit yabin emamatar.”
40011020	Bar merar moumurih maiyow Jesu ina’inanen moumurih na’in sinaf, baise sabuw men hikokok boro hai kakafihine hisisinaf dogor baikitabir hitab, imih Jesu yan so’ar iuwih eo.
40011021	“Kwa Chorazin sabuw bai’akir kakafin boro kwanab, naatu kwa Bethsaida sabuw bai’akir kakafin boro kwanab! Iti ina’inan kwa biyamaim asisinaf, Taiya sabuw naatu Sidon sabuw wanawanahimaim atasisinaf na’at, marasika boro ar faifuw kakafih hita’osen, yuh wah gao hitarab, hai kakafihine dogor baikitabir hitabaika.
40011022	Baise a tur aowen, baibatebat ana veya’amaim Taiya sabuw naatu Sidon sabuw hai baikwatutunen i boro ana fofonin, baise kwa abai kwatutunen boro tafan hiya’abar kwanab.
40011023	Naatu kwa Capernaum sabuw wab yen maramaim inu’in boro nare moroboyah hai efanamaim na’in. Ina’inan iti boun kwa biyamaim asisinaf marasika Sodom sabuw biyahimaim ata sisinaf na’at, iti boun ana veya i boro tama.
40011024	Baise a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana veya, Sodom sabuw hai baikwatutunen i boro ana fofonin, baise kwa a baikwatutunen boro tafan hiya’abar kwanab.”
40011025	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu yoyoban eo, “Tamai mar tafaram ana Regah a merar ayiyi, anayabin not gewasih sabuw so’oso’obayah hai notamaim ibun wa’ir ma’am natunat bereberefiy biyahimaim iwa’an ebirerereb.
40011026	Turobe Tamai, abisa kokokomaim isinaf temamatar imih gewasin.
40011027	“Sawar etei’imak i ayu Tamai itu. Men yait ta so’ob ayu i God Natun, naatu men yait ta so’ob God i ayu Tamai, imih sabuw iyab ayu arurubinih boro ani’obaiyih i auman hiso’ob God i ayu Tamai.
40011028	“Kwa iyabowat bit kwa’abar tun rarabi, kwana ayu biyau, ayu boro efan anit kwaniyarir.
40011029	Ayu au bai’obaiyen hamehamen kwanab kwani’ufunun, anayabin ayu i taiyuwu ayara’iyu anutanub, imih kwanan ayu biyu’umaim boro biya tuniwa’an.
40011030	Anayabin ayu au bai’obaiyen i kiririn imih an bi’obaiyi i boro hamehamen.”
40012001	Veya bai’ab na’atube sawar ufunamaim, Jesu Baiyarir Ana Veya sanabey wanawanah remor inan ana bai’ufununayah a himorob, basit sanabey afa hirut hikeb ro’oro’oh hibow hi’aa.
40012002	Naatu ofafar bai’obaibiyenayah hi’itih basit Jesu hi’u, “A bai’ufununayah ku’itih, abis tisisinaf i ata ofafar te’a’a’stu’utu’ub, anayabin boun i Baiyarir ana veya.
40012003	Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana sabuw bairi aa himomorob ana maramaim, David God ana bar wanawanan run, rafiy God isan hisibor hi’inu’in, bow ana sabuw bairi hi’aa, Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin? Nati i ofafar hi’astu’ub, anayabin nati sibor i hi’ofafar firis akisihimo hinabow hina, men David ana sabuw o men yait ta’aamih.
40012004	Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana sabuw bairi aa himomorob ana maramaim, David God ana bar wanawanan run, rafiy God isan hisibor hi’inu’in, bow ana sabuw bairi hi’aa, Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin? Nati i ofafar hi’astu’ub, anayabin nati sibor i hi’ofafar firis akisihimo hinabow hina, men David ana sabuw o men yait ta’aamih.
40012005	Naatu Moses ana ofafar ta kwaiyab kwa’itin? Baiyarir ana veya firis terun Tafaror Bar teyayabuna men ofafar te’a’astu’ub? En.
40012006	Baise boun i a tur ao’owen, sawar gagamin anababatun i na tit, men iti Tafaror Bar na’atube’emih.
40012007	Buk Atamaninamaim i iti na’atube eo, ‘Kabeber i akokok men sibor.’ Kwa iti sawar yabin anababatun kwatasoso’ob na’at sabuw gewasih boro men kwatakusairih.
40012008	Anayabin Orot Natun i Baiyarir Tamah anababatun.”
40012009	Jesu nati efan itumar na hai Kou’ay Bar ta wananwanan run,
40012010	orot ta uman murubin ma’ama’amaim, naatu sabuw afa nati’imaim hima’am i ef hinunuwet Jesu gamin uwin isan, imih Jesu hibatiy hio, “It ata ofafaramaim Baiyarir ana veya orot babin boro taniyawas ai en?”
40012011	Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo o orot ta a sheep Baiyarir ana veya hub tare’er, boro itatain tayen o itihamiy ta’in tamorob?
40012012	Orot ana yawas i ra’at kwanekwan men for na’atube’emih. Isan imih Baiyarir ana veya orot babin tanabibais i men tasisinaf kakaf ofafar ta’a’astu’ubimih.”
40012013	Imaibo orot uman murubin isan eo, “Uma ku’otofair a’itin.” Naatu orot uman otofair naatu uman igewasin uman rounane na’atube matar.
40012014	Basit Pharisee Jesu hihamiy hitit ufun, rabin morob isan hiyakitifuw.
40012015	Jesu rabinamih hiyayanuw tur nowar naatu efan nati ihamiy sa’ab in, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hi’itin hi’ufunun bairi hinan, iyabowat hisawow hinan etei iyawasih.
40012016	Naatu eo fafarih eo, “Sabuw afa hai tur men kwana’owenamih.
40012017	Iti i abisa dinab orot Isaiah ana bukamaim kikirum na iturobe.
40012018	‘Iti orot i ayu isau bowamih arubin, ayu au yabow orot, i isan ayu abiyasisir, Ayu Anunu boro anitin, naatu i boro ma gewas isan sabuw tutufin etei isah naorerereb.
40012019	I boro men nagam naatu boro men fanan aumetawat niwow; Fanan boro men ef gagamin yanamaim hinanowar.
40012020	Sawasaw ririmih hikimow tere’er boro men na’abar faifiyen, na’atube ana marakaw kikimin etoto’ab boro men nihamiy, baise boro nihamiy nato’ab nanan ma gewas ana fair nara’at.
40012021	Naatu sabuw etei hai not hai baitumatum i biyanamaim hinayai.’”
40012022	Imaibo sabuw afa orot ta matan fim naatu demon awan gugin toun bububur ma’am hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit iyawas naatu misir tur eo naatu matan igewasin nuw.
40012023	Sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in Jesu abisa iwa’an hi’i’itin hai hikasiy ra’at hio, “Iti orotom David uwan ta?”
40012024	Baise Pharisees hinonowar hio, “Iti orot demon enununih, anayabin demon hai ukwarin wabin Beelzebul fair itin, nati esisinaf.”
40012025	Jesu abisa hinotanot so’ob, naatu uwih eo, “Tafaram ta’imon hinakusib rou’ab namatar hinabiyow boro men manin hiniyowamih, naatu bar meraramaim o ain uf rara’amaim hinakusib hinabiyow hai ma boro hini’afiy.
40012026	Imih Demon Ana Aiwob wanawananamaim hinakusib taiyuwih hinabiyow, i ana aiwob wanawanan ana fair boro naririm.
40012027	Naatu kwa i ayu Beelzebul fair baitu demon nunih kwarouw kwa’o. Bo kwa a bai’ufununayah i yait ana fairamaim demon tenununih? Isan imih kwa taiyuw abai’ufununayah hai sinafumaim ebi’obaiyi God ana baibatiyen i wan kwamara’at.
40012028	Baise ayu i God Anunin Kakafiyin ana fairamaim demon anununih, imih nati ebi’obaiyit mar ana aiwob i na tit kwa wanawananamaim.
40012029	“Orot fairin ana bar boro men asir hinarun ana sawar hinabainomih, baise wantoro’ot orot hinab hinafatum nabat, imaibo ana sawar hinabainuw.
40012030	“Orot yait ayu airi men abita’imon i ayu au wosai, naatu orot yait men ayu ibaisu airi bobaituw abigenamih, nati orot i wasgeyayan.
40012031	Ana’an nati isan imih a tur ao’owen, bowabow kakafih ta ta naatu bai’ib tur ta ta God boro nanotawiyen, baise orot yait Anun Kakafiyin ni’ib isan tur kakafin na’o, i ana bowabow kakafih boro men nanotawiyimih.
40012032	Naatu orot yait Orot Natun isan tur kakafin na’o nabigigim boro ana bowabow kakafin nanotawiyen, baise orot yait God Anun Kakafiyin isan na’o nabi’iyab, i boro tafaramamaim men nanotawiy na’atube maramaim.
40012033	“A ai inakaif gewas boro ro’on gewasin inab, a ai men inakaif gewas ro’on boro kakafin inab, anayabin ai i boro ro’onamaim ina’inan.
40012034	Kwa i tuwamorob foufuh, dogor wanawanan kakafin ema’am boro mi’itube tur gewasih kwana’o. Anayabin abisa dogor wanawanan ema’am i awamaim etitit.
40012035	Orot gewasin ana bar wanawanan sawar gewasih ya ti’inu’in boro nabow naya taiten, naatu orot kakafin ana bar wanawanan sawar kakafih ya ti’inu’in boro naya taiten.
40012036	Imih a tur ao’owen, baibatebat ana maramaim sabuw etei awahimaim tur abisa hi’o boro God ana tur hina’owen aisim nati tur hi’o.
40012037	Naatu o taiyuw a tur io’omaim God boro nibatiyi, naatu o taiyuw a turamaim boro naorereb o i gewas o kakaf.”
40012038	Imaibo Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa himisir hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki akokok ina’inan ta iniwa’an ana’itin.”
40012039	Baise Jesu iyafut eo, “Kwa iti mar boun nan ana sabuw a fanasair ra’at, ina’inan itinamih kwa’o. Baise ina’inan boro men ta kwana’itinamih, ina’inan ta’imon nati dinab orot Jonah biyanamaim kwa’itinika.
40012040	Jonah siy gagamin tonan yan wanawanan in fai tounu auyit tounu na’atube, Orot Natun boro fai tounu auyit tounu me wanawanan na’in.
40012041	Jonah binan Nineveh sabuw hinonowar ufunamaim hai bowabow kakafih hisisinaf etei hihamiyen, imih baibatebat ana veya boro hinamisir kwa kwabiwa’an kakaf isan boro hina’uwi, anayabin binan iti boun abit i men marasika Jonah bibinan na’atube’emih!
40012042	Na’atube tafaram Sheba hai aiwob babin Solomon ana binan gewasin nowaramih ana tafaram ef yok na’in ihamiy na tur nowar, imih baibatebat ana veya boro namisir, kwabiwa’an kakaf isan na’uwi, anayabin Solomon bibinan i men boun ayu abibinan na’atube’emih!
40012043	“Demon kakafin orot biyanamaim ema’am tenun etit i boro watu owararinamaim ma baiyarir isan ana efan nanuwet, naatu efan men natitita’ur na’at,
40012044	i boro na’o, ‘Ayu boro anamatabir maiye au ubar anan.’ Naatu namatabir nan ana bar natitit, ana bar wanawanan i owararin naatu hirereb hiyabuna inu’in boro na’itin.
40012045	Imaibo boro namatabir maiye demon kakafih anababatun etei seven nanawiyih bairi hinan nati bar hinasusuw hinama. Naatu nati orot i boro na’af narauwabon men marasika ma’am na’atube’emih. Imih iti sabuw boun hima kakafih tesisinaf boro isah na’atube namatar.”
40012046	Jesu eo, sabuw hima hinonowar ana tur baisawarina’e, hinah taitin hina hitit ufun hibat hi’o, “Aki akokok Jesu bairi ana’o.”
40012047	Basit orot ta run Jesu iu, “Hinat taiti hina ufun tebatabat, tekokok bairi kwana’o.” *
40012048	Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu hinai naatu taitu anababatun ana’o inanowar.”
40012049	Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah isah uman fufunih eo, “Ayu hinai naatu taitu i iti tema’am ku’itih.
40012050	Orot yait ayu Tamai maramaim eo na’atube fanan bai esisinaf i ayu taiu, ayu rubu naatu ayu hinai.”
40013001	Nati veya ta’imon Jesu bar itumar tit na harew kukuf sisibinamaim sabuw bai’obaiyih isan mara’iy.
40013002	Naatu sabuw moumurih maiyow hiru’ay hi’ar bebera’uh itih, basit wa bai inatait tafan mare, sabuw baise dones yan himarir hima.
40013003	Imaibo ma sawar moumurih na’in oroubonamaim eo hima hinowar. Naatu ana oroubon ta i iti na’atube eo, “Ana veya ta orot masaw bowayan ana ub tanumamih tit in.
40013004	Ana ub afa tata’asiyen i ef yanamaim hire, naatu mamu hire hibow hi’aa,
40013005	Ana ub afa i to’ato yan hire’ere ana kamar men gagamin imih saisewat hikubounih hiyen. Anayabin kamar baban i fokarin.
40013006	Baise veya yey ana mar wabuburinamaim ub etei hi’arat, naatu hikimow hire anayabin wairoroh men babanika hire.
40013007	Ub afa kokor wanawanan hire, naatu kokor ana fafa’amaim isuken.
40013008	Naatu ub afa i me gewasin yan hire hikuboubunih hiyen gewas ro’oro’oh hiya, afa hibiw 100 na’atube, afa i 60 na’atube, afa i 30 na’atube.
40013009	Imih o yait tain nama’am tur inanowar.”
40013010	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina hibatiy hi’o, “Aisim oroubonamaim sabuw kubi’obaiyih?”
40013011	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orereb ana so’ob wa’iwa’irin mar ana aiwob isan i God kwa it, men iti sabuw itihimih.
40013012	Imih orot yait orereb ana so’ob biyan ema’am, God boro tafan naya’abar nitin ana so’ob nara’at, baise orot yait nati so’ob men biyan ema’am naatu ana so’ob kikimin nati biyanamaim ema’am God boro nabosair.
40013013	Ana’an nati ayu oroubonamaim sabuw abi’obaiyih. Sabuw matah ema’am baise boro men hina’itin, Tainih ema’am baise boro men hinanowar naniyan hinab.
40013014	Dinab orot Isaiah ana Bukamaim eo kikirum i na ibiturobe. ‘Iti sabuw tur hinanowar, baise boro men naniyan hinabaimih matah ema’am baise boro men hina’itinimih.
40013015	Anayabin ukwarih fokar, tainih higibud, matah hibofafaren. Sawar iti men hitasinaf, karam tur boro hitanowar, abis emamatar hita’itin hai not takusib, tur naniyan hitab, kakafih hitihamiyen, hita’intabir ayu atiyawasih.’
40013016	Baise Kwa i kwabiyasisir, anayabin matayan kwa’i’itin naatu tain yan tur kwanonowar.
40013017	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab orot moumurih na’in naatu sabuw gewasih hikok kwanekwan, kwa abisa kwa’i’itin i hita’itin naatu abisa kwanonowar i hitanowar. Baise nati ana maramaim sawar men matar boro hita’itin.”
40013018	“Tain kwanarub ub tanumayan ana oroubon ao kwananowar naniyan kwanab, yabin kwanaso’ob.
40013019	Sabuw iyab mar ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin ao tenonowar naatu naniyan men tabaib i ub ef yanamaim orot ta’asiy re’er na’atube, Tur Gewasin tenonowar ana maramaim demon kakafin ena hai not ebikwaris.
40013020	Naatu orot ana ub afa to yan hire’ere ana itinin i sabuw iyab tur tenonowar ana maramaim i tibiyasisir.
40013021	Baise dogoroh wanawanan nati ub wairoron i men re eof barur, imih Tur Gewasin isan hina’uwih hinarurukaukuwih boro mar ta’imonamo hai baitumatum hinihamiy.
40013022	Naatu orot ana ub afa fotan wanawanan hire’er ana itinin i sabuw iyab tur tenonowar, baise iti tafaram ana yasisir isan tibiyababan naatu totobuyoy hai not ebikwaris imih tur ana ro’on men emamatar.
40013023	Baise orot ana ub me gewasin yan ta’asiy hire’ere ana itinin i sabuw iyab Tur Gewasin tenowar naatu naniyan tabai tiw tehahamu, afa ro’oh 100, afa 60, afa 30.”
40013024	Jesu oroubon tabo iti na’atube eo, “Mar ana aiwob i iti na’atube, ana veya ta orot ana ub bow in ana masawamaim tanum.
40013025	Baise gugumin sabuw etei hi’inu’in ufut, orot ana rakit mowan fotan kakafih bow na sanabey wanawanah tanum naatu bihir.
40013026	Sanabey hikuboubunih hiyey wanawanahimaim fotan kakafih auman hikubounih bairi hiyen.
40013027	“Orot ana bowayah hina hio, ‘Regah, o ub gewasih a masawamaim itanum, baise aisim fotan kakafih auman hikuboubunih teyey?’
40013028	“Orot iyafutih eo, ‘Rakit sabuw afa hisinaf.’ Naatu akir wairafih hibatiy hio, ‘Bo kukokok anan fotan ana uyarir?’
40013029	“Orot iyafutih eo, ‘En. Fotan kakafih kwana’u’uyarir boro sanabey afa auman kwana’uyarir.
40013030	Imih kwaihamiyih bairi hinayen hiniw naatu tarin ana veya boro tarayah aniyafarih hinan, fotan wan hinatar hinafatum hinabow hinan hina’afusar, imaibo sanabey hinatar hinabow hinan bar hinaya.’”
40013031	Jesu ana oroubon tabo eo, “Mar ana aiwob ana itinin ta i iti na’atube, orot ana ai momor ro’on kikimin maiyow bai in ana masaw yan tanum.
40013032	Iti ai ro’on i men ai ro’on afa gagamih na’atube’emih, baise tanum kuboun yey ana veya’amaim ra’at ai gagamin na’in matar naatu mamu hina famefamenamaim hibatar hima.”
40013033	Jesu iban oroubon tabo eo maiye, “Mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube. Babin yeast ebai ana faraw wanawanan eyai ekamat inu’in era’at eyey na’atube.”
40013034	Jesu sawar iti etei isah i oroubonamaim eo sabuw rou’ay gagamin bi’obaiyih; ana bai’obaiyenamaim i mar etei oroubonamaim sabuw bi’obaiyih.
40013035	Iti na’atube sisinaf anayabin abisa dinab orot eo kikirum tan titurobe isan. “Ayu i boro oroubonamaim anao sabuw hinowar, naatu tafaram mamatar ana buriburin men hisoso’ob etei anao hinanowar.”
40013036	Jesu sabuw rou’ay ihamiyih naatu na bar wanawanan run, ana bai’ufununayah ufun hina hirun hibatiy hio, “Masaw yan fotan kakafin ana oroubon i kukubuna anowar.”
40013037	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot ub gewasih tatanum i Orot Natun.
40013038	Masaw ana itinin i tafaram, naatu ub gewasin i sabuw iyab mar ana aiwob isan tebowabow, naatu ub kakafin i Demon Kakafin natunatun.
40013039	Naatu rakit orot ub kakafin bai na masaw yan tatanum i Demon Mowan. Naatu masaw biyamur i mar yomanin na’atube, masaw fourayah i God ana tounamatar.
40013040	“Imih mar yomanin iti ub kakafih hi’uyarir hifatum hibow hin hi’a’afusar na’atube boro namatar.
40013041	Orot Natun boro ana tounamatar niyafarih hinatit, sinaf kakafih naatu sabuw iyab bowabow kakafin kura’ahih hima kakafih tisisinaf etei i ana aiwob wanawananamaim boro fotan kakafin na’atube hinatar hinafatum.
40013042	Naatu hinabow hinan wairaf wan hinaya hina’afusar, nati’imaim boro na’arahih wah takitak niwa’an hina’in hinarerey.
40013043	Imaibo God ana sabuw gewasih nabow mar ana aiwobomaim hinarun veya na’atube hinararan. Imih o yait tain nama’am iti tur inanowar.
40013044	“Mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube, orot ta nugunug hibun inu’in itin bai, naatu me nati nugunug titita’urimaim kair maiye ibun, naatu yasisir auman in ana sawar etei sabuw hitobon naatu matabir maiye na nati me tutubun na’atube.
40013045	“Naatu mar ana aiwob itinin tabo iti na’atube. Orot sawar tobonayan wakek enunuwet na’atube.
40013046	Wakek nuwet inan wakek ta gewasin ana baiyan gagamin na’in tita’ur, naatu na ana sawar etei yataiten hitobon kabay bai in nati wakek tutubun na’atube.
40013047	“Iban maiye mar ana aiwob i buwat na’atube. Orot siy bowayan ana buwat eya ema’am siy i yumatah ta ta te’ona’on.
40013048	Naatu buwat awan ekakaratan ana veya etab erun dones yan ema siy gewasih ikiyarir fetan iwan, naatu kakafih ikiyarir ebow ebis rouruwen na’atube.
40013049	Imih mar yomanin nanan itinin i boro nati na’atube. God boro ana tounamatar niyafarih hinatit hinan sabuw gewasih wanawanahimaim sabuw kakafih hinabow
40013050	wairaf wan hiyara’aten na’arahih hina’in hina rerey wah takitak niwa’an.”
40013051	Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Oroubon iti ao’oban naniyah kwabow?” Ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hio, “Naniyah abow.”
40013052	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Isan imih, ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot yait mar ana aiwob isan bai’obaiyen hibitin i bar matuwan matar, imih nati bar wanawanan ana sawar boubuh naatu atamanih etei boro nayataiten.”
40013053	Jesu iti oroubon eo hinonowar ufunamaim nati efan itumar,
40013054	naatu remor na i ana bar meraramaim tit Kou’ay Bar ta wanawanan run, busuruf sabuw i’obaibiyih. Naatu sabuw hima hinonowar hifofor hio, “Iti orot ana ukwar rerekab naatu ina’inanen sinaf isan ana fair i menamaim bow?
40013055	Iti orot tamah i bar wowabayan naatu hinah i Mary naatu James, Joseph, Simon, Judas i taitin.
40013056	Naatu taitin baibitar auman bairit iti tama’am, imih iti sawar etei i menamaim bow?”
40013057	Iti na’atube hio hina’ufut hin. Jesu iuwih eo, “Dinab orot tafaram afa’amaim i tekakafiy, baise i ana bar meraramaim naatu i tain tuwan i men tekakafiy.”
40013058	Naatu nati’imaim men ina’inan moumurih sinafumih, anayabin nati sabuw aurih baitumatum en.
40014001	Nati ana veya’amaim Herod tafaram Galilee ana kaifayan orot Jesu bowabow ana tur nowar.
40014002	Naatu ana orot ukwarih hai tur eowen eo, “Ni’i orot i John Baptist, morobone yawas maiye, imih fair bai nati ina’inan isisinaf.”
40014003	Herod i John Baptist bai fatum in dibur yari’iy aawan Herodias baiyasisirin isan.
40014004	John tur fokarin maiyow Herod Herodias i tain Philip aawan bai bi’aawan isan gam iu, “O i ofafar iastu’ub tai aawan ibai i’awan.” Tur fokarin iti eo isan Herod yan bai dibur yari’iy.
40014005	Herod kok i John ta’asabun, baise Jew sabuw isah bir, anayabin John hi’i’itin i dinab orot ta na’atube.
40014006	Naatu Herod ana tufuw isan hibiyasisir ana veya’amaim, Herodias natun babitai run sabuw rou’ay gagamin nahimaim benaben, Herod itin iyasisir gagamin maiyow.
40014007	Naatu taiyuwin isan eo baifaro babitai eomatan eo, “Abisa kukokok boro anit?”
40014008	Naatu babitai hinah ana turamaim na eo, “Ayu akokok boun John Baptist ukwarin tew yan iniwan inab inan initu.”
40014009	Aiwob orot iti tur nonowar i uwan yi, baise sabuw rou’ay gagamin matahimaim eomatan, imih ana baiyowayah orot iuwih babitai ana kokok hisinaf.
40014010	John dibur bar wanawananamaim ma’am hin sikan hi’afuw,
40014011	ukwarin tew yan hiwan hibai hina babitai hitin, bai in hinah itin (so’ob John i morob).
40014012	John ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hibai hin hiyai, imaibo hin Jesu ana tur hiowen.
40014013	Jesu John ana tur nonowar ufunamaim, wa bai akisinamo efan nautanubinamaim in. Baise sabuw menamaim inan i ana tur hinowar, ababawat bar merar ta ta hirun hitit hi’ufunun hin.
40014014	Jesu wa biyut ana veya nuwanuw sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow i’itih iyababan, naatu hai sabuw sawusawuwih hibow hinan etei iyayawasih.
40014015	Veya re birabirab auman Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hin hiu, “Veya i re sawar. Igewasin sabuw iniyafarih hinan bar merar yubinamaim bay hinatobon hinaa hinayawas.” (Anayabin iti efan i arar yan sabuw en).”
40014016	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Men karam asir ana’uwih hinan. Gewasin, kwa a efanamaim bay kwana’itin kwanitih hina hinayawas.”
40014017	Baise hiya’afut hio, “Aki ai efanamaim rafiy fafar etei umat roun naatu siy rou’ab na’atumo ti’inu’in, men karam boro iti sabuw rou’ay gagamin anituwih.”
40014018	Jesu eo, “Kwabow kwana kwaitu.”
40014019	Naatu sabuw iuwih fotan yan himare, imaibo Jesu rafiy fafar umat roun, siy rou’ab auman bow au mar nuw ra’at, God ana merar yi sawar, basit rafiy imseseb ana bai’ufununayah itih, naatu ana bai’ufununayah hibow sabuw hifaramih hi’aa.
40014020	Sabuw etei hi’aa yah iw, naatu ana bai’ufununayah bay rebareb hi’aa hi’inu’in hibow hibiwan sakasak etei 12 hiwan foten.
40014021	Orot iti bay hi’aa hibiyab etei 5,000 kek babin men auman hiyabamih.
40014022	Jesu matan kabiy ana bai’ufununayah iuwih wa hibai wan hirabon hin harew kukuf rewan rounane na’at. Naatu Jesu ma sabuw iyafarih hai au bar hin.
40014023	Sabuw iyafarih hinan ufut akisinamo yen in oyawamaim yoyoban isan. Naatu nati’imaim, akisinamo ma’am mar bu’u’um.
40014024	Iti ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah i hire hin hikukuyowen ana veya yabat misir wa rab naatu kotar nahine na kufutih.
40014025	Mar sibisib auman Jesu riy tafanamaim bat ana bai’ufununayah isah remor na.
40014026	Riy tafan bat remor nan ana bai’ufununayah hi’i’itin ana maramaim, hai bir ra’at hio, “Iti i wagabur mowan.” Hikirir hirerey.
40014027	Baise Jesu mar ta’imon eaf eo, “Men kwanabir, ayu anan.”
40014028	Naatu Peter iya’afut eo, “Anababatun o na’at, basit ku’uwu riy tafan abat ana biya atit.”
40014029	Jesu eo, “Kuna.” Peter wa afe’en isure riy tafan bat in Jesu biyan tit.
40014030	Baise kotar gagamin bababin naniyan bai, ana bir ra’at, basit busuruf unun re, re’ere auman Regah isan ererey eaf eo, “Regah kwiyawasu.”
40014031	Jesu mar ta’imon eof nunuw uman bai iu eo, “A baitumatum men nikikimin, aisim kukakasiy.”
40014032	Naatu hairi wa tafan hiyey ana veya kotar bababin nutanub.
40014033	Imaibo bai’ufununayah wa tafan hima’am Jesu hibora’ah hio, “O i anababatun God Natun!”
40014034	Hirabon hina rewan rounane hitit naatu hin Genesaret, imaim hai wa hitain yen.
40014035	Naatu nati’imaim sabuw Jesu hi’i’inan ana veya, tur hiyafar nati tafaram wanawanan bar merar gidigidihimaim, sabuw sawusawuwih etei hibow hina Jesu biyan hitit.
40014036	Naatu ana faifuw taininawat butubunin isan hifefeyan, naatu sabuw iyab ana faifuwawat hibubutubun i etei hiyawas.
40015001	Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa Jerusalemane hina Jesu hibatiy hio,
40015002	“Aisim o a bai’ufununayah, bai’obaiyen ata a agir hibitit men tebobosiyasiyar, naatu umah sauwena’e ere kato auman bay te’au?”
40015003	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo kwa aisim God ana obaiyunen tur kwa’astu’ub uwatanah hai binanakwar kwabi’ufunun?
40015004	Anayabin God eo, ‘Hinat tamat kwanakakafiyih’ naatu ‘yait hinah tamah isan tur kakafin na’u’uwih i boro hina’asabun namorob.’
40015005	Baise kwa a bai’obaiyenamaim, orot ta boro hinat tamat isah iti na’atube inao, ‘Sawar iti o atabibaisi i God ana siwaramih ayai, imih boro men karam anibaisi.’
40015006	Sinaf iti na’atube’eban hinat tamat kwakakafiyih? En! Baise, kwa asinaf iti’imaim God ana obaiyunen tur kwayara’iy kwa taiyuw abai’obaiyen kwabi’ufunun.
40015007	Wanawan rerekabih! Isaiah i tur anababatunamaim kwa isa eo kirum,
40015008	‘Iti sabuw ufurihiwat ayu tirursagiyu, baise hai notamaim i ef yok na’in tema’am.
40015009	Hai kwafiren ayu isou i wanawanan nikuwat; men basit orot hai notamaim ofafar hikikirum sabuw kwati’obaiyih hiti’ufunun.’”
40015010	Imaibo Jesu rou’ay eaf ayuwih iuwih eo, “Abisa ao kwananutanub kwananowar naatu kwanasinaftobon yabin kwanab.
40015011	Abisa orot awanamaim erur i men biyan ebobokarit, baise abisa orot awanamaim etitit i biyan ebobokarit.”
40015012	Imaibo bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibatiy, “Pharisee abisa i’o isan hai naniyan ibi’afiy iso’ob?”
40015013	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ai menatan ayu Tamai maramaim men tatanum i boro an wairoron etei na’uy ra’ah.
40015014	Nati Pharisee biyahimaim kwanahaiw, anayabin i matah fim na’atube sabuw afa matah fim tibi’unawiyih, naatu boro etei hinan hub hinare.”
40015015	Peter eo, “Oroubon anayabin kuo anowar.”
40015016	Naatu Jesu uwih eo, “Kwa auman boro’ika tur hai yabih men kwaso’obamih?
40015017	Abistan awatamaim erur i en kabutitamaim etit naatu en uratane ere’er i kwaso’ob ai en?
40015018	Baise abisa awatamaim etitit i dogor wanawananane etitit, naatu i boun orot biyan ebobokarit.
40015019	Anayabin abisa orot dogoromaim etitit i not kakafin, sabuw rauw morob, turanah a’aawah ufuh na, baiwa’an kwanekwan, bain, baifufuwen, naatu yanuw koutabitabir.
40015020	Iti sawar i boun orot babin ebi’afiy, baise uma sauwena’e ere kato bay ina’aa boro men ni’afiyimih.”
40015021	Jesu nati efan ihamiy naatu in tafaram Taiya Sidon hairi wanawanahimaim bar merar afa imaim tit.
40015022	Canaan babin nati’imaim ma’ama na Jesu isan rerey eo, “Regah, David uwan, kukabibiru; ayu natu babitai i demon kakafih wanawanan hirun hiforatoun hibonawiy bai’akir kakafin maiyow ebaib.”
40015023	Baise Jesu men babin isan tur ta eo. Imih ana bai’ufununayah hina hifefeyan hio, “Babin ku’u sa’ab en, rerey ufut enan.”
40015024	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Orot Natun nan i Israel sabuw sheep na’atube hikasiy hima’am akisih isah na.”
40015025	Baise babin na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen eo, “Regah Jesu kwibaisu.”
40015026	Jesu eo, “Kek hai bay men karam boro tanarouw nare haru hina’aan.”
40015027	Babin iya’afut eo, “Turobe Regah, baise bay momosarih tamah ana gemane tere’ere haru tebow te’aa.”
40015028	Imaibo Jesu eo, “Babin o a baitumatum i ra’at kwanekwan, imih abisa kukokok i namatar.” Naatu nati ana maramaim natun babitai yawas.
40015029	Jesu efan nati ihamiy naatu Galilee harew kukuf rewarewan remor in, imaibo oyaw ta sisibinamaim yen in tafan mare.
40015030	Sabuw moumurih maiyow hai sabuw ah kafikafirih, matah fim, ah umah murumurubih, awah gugih naatu sawusawuwih afa moumurih maiyow auman hibow hina Jesu nanamaim hiya, naatu etei’imak iyawasih.
40015031	Awah gugih tur hio, ah umah murubih higewasin, ah kafikafirih hibat hiremor, naatu matah fim higewasin hinuw sawar hi’itah isan, sabuw hifofofor men kafaita. Naatu Israel hai God wabin hibora’ara’ah.
40015032	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah eaf hina biyan hitit naatu iuwih eo, “Ayu sabuw aitih abiyababan anayabin hina bairi ama’ama veya tounu sawar naatu boun hai efanamaim men abisa ta ema’am boro hina’aan. Ayu men akokok a murumurubih aniyafarih hai ubar hinan. Hinanan boro efamaim bayumih hinigagamat.”
40015033	Naatu ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hio, “Iti arar yan bay boro menamaim tanab nakaram iti rakit gagamin tana’afuwagiy?”
40015034	Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa rafiy bai’ab kwabobotanen?” Hiya’afut hio, “Rafiy fafar etei seven , naatu siy gidigidih kwafur ta.”
40015035	Basit Jesu sabuw iuwih me yan himarir.
40015036	Jesu rafiy fafar seven naatu siy auman bow God ana a merar yiy, naatu imseseb ana bai’ufununayah itih hibow sabuw hifaramih.
40015037	Hi’aa etei yah iw, naatu bai’ufununayah bay sabuw hi’aa rebarebah hibiwanen sakasak etei seven hiwanfoten.
40015038	Sabuw etei 4000 na’atube bay hi’aa, kek baibin men auman hiyabamih.
40015039	Imaibo Jesu sabuw iyafarih hinan ufunamaim, wa bai rabon na tafaram wabin Magadan imaim tit.
40016001	Pharisee naatu Sadducees afa hikok i Jesu hitikubibiruw, imih hina hio, “Aki akokok ina’inan ta marane ini’obaiyi saise anaso’ob o i anababatun God ana fair ibai.”
40016002	Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “Rabirab mar ebiwuwun kwa’i’itin, boro kwanao, maras boro veya gewasin nayen.
40016003	Naatu mar auman gagub niwuwun naatu turin nafufurum kwana’itin boro kwanao, boun boro nayar. Kwa i gagub akisin ana itinin kwaso’ob boro kwanao, baise abisa iti boun temamatar hai yabih men karam boro kwanaso’ob. *
40016004	Mar iti boun ana sabuw hai fanasair naatu hai tafa’asar i ra’at, ina’inan isah tinunuwet. En! Baise ina’inan ta’imon ebi’obaiyi i Jonah ana i’inan.” Basit Jesu sabuw nati’imaim ihamiyih hima i sa’ab in.
40016005	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah harew kukuf hirabon hina rewan rounane hiyey ana maramaim, nuhih taseb hio, “It rafiy men ta tabai auman tarabonamih.”
40016006	Jesu iten ya’ih eo, “Mata to niwa’an kwanakaifi gewas, Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai yeast isan.”
40016007	Naatu bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hibabatiy hio, “It rafiy baina’e tanan isan ma eo?”
40016008	Jesu abisa isan hio i naniyan bai, imih ibatiyih, “Aisim rafiy ta baina’e tanan isan taiyuw kwakasiy kwama kwabibabatiyi? Kwa a baitumatum i kikimin anababatun.
40016009	A not boro’ika kwarisin ema’am. Sabuw etei 5, 000 rafiy fafar faive’imo imaim abituwih isan nuhi bur? naatu kwaso’ob sakasak etei bai’ab kwaiwanfoten?
40016010	Na’atube rafiy sevenimo sabuw 4, 000 abituwih sakasak etei bai’ab kwaiwanfoten?
40016011	Aisim a not boro’ika hikwaris ayu rafiy isan ao kwararouw, en baise Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai yeast isan kwanakaifi gewasomih ao.”
40016012	Imaibo bai’ufununayah naniyan hibai, Jesu i men yeast maiyow rafiy wanawanan teyai’iyai isan matah toniwa’anamih, baise Pharisee naatu Sadducee hai bai’obaiyen isan matah toniwa’an.
40016013	Jesu na Caesarea Philipi wanawananamaim titit ana veya, ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Sabuw Orot Natun isan mi’itube teo kwanonowar?”
40016014	Hiya’afut hio, “Sabuw afa i teo John Baptist, afa Elijah, afa i Jeremiah, naatu afa teo i dinab orot ta.”
40016015	Ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih eo, “Bo kwa ayu isau i mi’itube kwa’o?”
40016016	Simon Peter iya’afut eo, “O i God Tafa eof nowah * God ma’ama wanatowanin Natun.”
40016017	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Simon, Jonah natun abigegewasini. Anayabin nati tur anababatun i men orot ta biyanane na irererebamih, baise marane Tamai mutufor o it.
40016018	Imih a tur ao’owen o i Peter. * Iti kabay tafanamaim ayu boro au ekaleisia anawowab. Naatu morob ana fair boro men kafa’imo natafufur nare’emih.
40016019	Ayu boro mar ana tufatan anit; abisa iti tafaramamaim kututufatan, maramaim boro ana tufatan. Naatu abisa iti tafaramamaim kururufam, maramaim boro ana rufam.”
40016020	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah awah bofot eo, “Ayu i Tafau hi’of nowah * imih men yait ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”
40016021	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu busuruf ana bai’ufununayah isah tur mutufor iuwih eo, “Ayu i anan Jerusalem ana tit biyababan gagamin maiyow boro anab, orot ai’in * biyahine, Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah biyahine, hina’asabunu ana morob. Baise veya tounu ufunamaim morobone boro anamisir maiye.”
40016022	Peter bai hin nabinamaim eo, “Regah, iti na’atube men akokok isa namatar”.
40016023	Jesu tatabir Peter kwarar iu, “Au’uf kwen, Satan! O i kabay kiru nou kuyayare, anayabin o a not i men God enotanot na’atube kunotanotamih. O i orot babin hai notabe kunotanot.”
40016024	Imaibo Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “O yait inakok ayu airit namih, taiyuw ina kwahiri a onaf ina’abar ini’ufnunu airit tanan.
40016025	Anayabin orot yait taiyuwin ana yawas isan ebowabow boro nikasiy. * Baise orot yait ana yawas ayu isau ebi’inuw boro natita’ur.
40016026	Tafaram wanawanan sawar tutufin etei ibai aur karam, baise inamomorob ana veya ana gewasin boro inab? En anababatun. Boro men kafa’imo nati sawaramaim a yawas inatubun inab maiye’emih.
40016027	Anayabin Orot Natun i Tamah ana fair ana bonamanamarinamaim nan, ana tounamatar kakafiyih bairi, imaibo nati ana maramaim i boro orot babin hibowabow ana fofoninamaim hai baiyan nitih.
40016028	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, sabuw afa iti kwama tur kwanonowar boro morobo’e kwanama’am Orot Natun ni’aiwob maramaim nanan kwana’itin.”
40017001	Veya etei six sasawar ufunamaim Peter naatu James tain John hairi Jesu buwih bairi akisimo nawiyih hiyen hin oyaw gagamin tafantoro’ot hitit.
40017002	Naatu nati’imaim matah yan hi’itin Jesu ana yumat botabir, ana itinin i veya’abe matar, ana faifuw i hikwes anababatun marakaw ta na’atube.
40017003	Imaibo, Moses Elijah hairi hitit Jesu bairi hio ana bai’ufununayah hi’itih.
