40017004	Peter Jesu isan eo, “Regah, gewasin aki iti ama’ama, o ina kokok na’at ayu boro sis tounu ana wowab ta o isa, ta Moses isan, naatu ta Elijah isan.”
40017005	Baise iti na’at bat eo auman, sakuk ana marakawin auman na tar gabuwih, naatu sakuk wanawanan orot fanan hinowar eo, “Iti kek i ayu Natu, au yabow anababatun, i isan ayu abiyasisir, tain kwanarub nao’o kwananowar.”
40017006	Bai’ufununayah iti orot fanawat hinonowar ana maramaim hai bir ra’at yumatah au babe me yan hira’iy.
40017007	Baise Jesu na butubunih eo, “Kwamisir, men kwanabirumih.”
40017008	Imaibo nah hitara’ah hinunuw ra’at men yait ta hi’itin, baise Jesu akisinamo batabat hi’itin.
40017009	Oyaw wanane hire hinan basit Jesu awah bofot eo, “Abisa oyaw wan kwa’i’itin men yait ta ana tur kwana’owen. Kwanama, Orot Natun morobone namisiribo.”
40017010	Naatu bai’ufununayah Jesu hibatiy hio, “Bo aisim Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah teo Elijah i boro mat nan.”
40017011	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Tur anababatun. Elijah i boro mat nan sawar etei nayabuna.
40017012	Baise a tur a’owen, Elijah i na titaka, baise sabuw men hi’inan, imih hai kokomaim sawar kakafih isan hisinaf. Ef nati ta’imon Orot Natun boro na’atube isan hinasinaf umahimaim ni’akir.”
40017013	Imaibo bai’ufununayah naniyan hibai, Jesu i John Baptist isan hai tur eo’owen.
40017014	Hire hina sabuw rau’ay gagamin biyah hititit ana maramaim, orot ta na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen
40017015	eo, “Regah au kek kwiwanbaban, au kek i sawow kakafin bai ebimamayay, mar etei en wairaf wan eyey, naatu harew yan ere’er.
40017016	Ayu abai ana a bai’ufununayah isah, baise i men karam boro hitiyawas.”
40017017	Jesu eawar foten eo, “Kwa sabuw isa i baitumatum en naatu a ef i kwasa’ir. Kwanotanot ayu boro bairi maninaka tanama? Naatu kwanotanot abit boro maninaka ana’abar bairi tanan? Kek kwabai kwana a’itin.”
40017018	Jesu demon kakafin kwarar tatab naatu kek ihamiy bihir tit. Nati ana maramaim kek mar ta’imon yawas.
40017019	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina akisinamo biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Aisim aki demon kakafin men anun tit?”
40017020	Jesu iuwih eo, “Anayabin, kwa a baitumatum i kikimin maiyow. Anababatun a tur ao’owen, a baitumatum iti ai momor ro’on na’atube nama’am na’at, iti oyaw isan boro kwanao, ‘Iti’imaim kwen ni’imaim kubat.’ Karam boro namatar, boro men abisa ta isa nafokaramih.
40017021	* Sawar iti na’atube i yoyoban naatu yoharamaim boro hinamatar men abisa ta’amaim.”
40017022	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina Galilee hibita’imon ana maramaim iuwih eo, “Orot Natun boro baban hinao hinab gawan sabuw umahimaim hinayai.
40017023	Nati sabuw boro hina’asabun namorob, veya tounu ufunamaim boro morobone na misir maiye.” Ana bai’ufununayah hai yababan ra’at.
40017024	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hina Capernaum hititit ana maramaim, Tafaror Bar ana kabay o’onayah hina Peter hibatiy hio, “O a bai’obaiyenayan Tafaror Bar isan kabay ebibaiyan?”
40017025	Peter iyafutih eo, “Jesu i Tafaror Bar isan kabay ebibaiyan.” Peter na bar wanawanan rur ana maramaim Jesu i wan awan tara’ah eo, “Peter o kunotanot sawar etitit naatu erur na’atube orot ta’ita’imon ana kabay aiwob isan i yait ebibaiyan, bar matuwan o nanawan sabuw?”
40017026	Peter iya’afut eo, “Nanawan sabuw.” Iti na’atube eo imaibo Jesu eo, “Tur anababatun bar matuwan i asir tema’am kwanekwan.
40017027	Baise men basit sabuw isah tanasinaf kakaf, kabay o’onayah yah naso’ar, imih inan harew kukufamaim initokar siy wan inatatain awan inabohai’i kabay inab inan airit isat inibaiyan.”
40018001	Nati ana maramaim bai’ufununayah hina Jesu biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Mar ana aiwobomaim yait i orot gagamin?”
40018002	Jesu kek kikimin eaf na nahimaim bat.
40018003	Imaibo eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, o yait ayawas men inabotabir inan iti kek gidigidih na’atube mar ana aiwobomaim boro men inarun.
40018004	Isan imih orot yait taiyuwin yare iti kek kikiminabe emamatar mar ana aiwobomaim i orot gagamin.
40018005	“Naatu orot yait kek kikimin iti na’atube ayu wabu’umaim ana merar eyiy, i ayu au merar eyiy.
40018006	Baise orot yait iti kek kikimin ayu bitutumu eoraraf in bowabow kakafin esisinaf, gewasin nati orot i boro sikan aumor hina’utan taiy yan hinitaiy nare na’atomatom namorob.
40018007	“Tafaram i kakafin wanawanan run, imih nati sawaramaim sabuw bonawiyih bowabow kakafin tisisinaf. Sawar kakafih nati na’atube i boro hinamatar, baise orot yait biyanamaim iti sawar temamatar i boro kakafin anababatun nab.
40018008	O yait uma o a nabonawiy kakafin inasisinaf na’at, ku’afuw kwisaroun, saise a uma duboduboh inan ma’ama wanatowan inarun. Men basit a uma hai ubaramaim o biya etei itan wairaf wan itayen ta’arahi.
40018009	Naatu mata nuw kwanekwan kakafin kusisinaf, kukubai kwisaroun. Mata rounawat saise inan ma’ama wanatowan inarun, men basit mata ta’imon ana ubaramaim mata rou’abaka inan wairaf wan inayen na’arahi.
40018010	“Abisa kusisinaf i inaso’ob men kek gidigidih inanuw furuwih, a tur ao’owen anayabin kek gidigidih hai tounamatar mar etei maramaim Tamai nan tebatabat.
40018011	Orot Natun nan ana’an i sabuw kasikasiyih bow baiyawasih isan na.
40018012	“Orot ana bobaituw 100 hitama’am ta’imon takakasiy isan a not i mi’itube kwanotanot? Ana bobaituw 99 tihamiyen oyaw wan hitama, i tare tan ta’imon kakasiy tanuwih ai en?
40018013	Naatu ana bobaituw tatita’ur tabaib ana maramaim, a tur ao’owen ana for ta’imon isan boro tiyasisir men kafaita, men 99 isah ebiyasisir na’atube anayabin i men hikasiy.
40018014	Imih ef ta’imon nati na’atube Tamat maramaim men ekokok boro ana kek kikimin ta nakasiy.
40018015	“O taituwa ta wanawanamaim isa bowabow kakafin nasisinaf na’at wa’iwa’iramaim inan biyan ana kakafin matanamaim ini’obaiy. Inao fana nanonowar na’at i boro airi kwanitafen tutur.
40018016	Baise inao men nanonowar, orot ta’imon o rou’ab inabuwih bairi kwanan, saise o abisa’awat inao orot rou’ab boro sif hinaruboun. Buk Atamaninamaim hio na’atube.
40018017	Baise hinao men nanonowar na’at, basit ekaleisia matahimaim kwanakurereb kwanao, naatu ekaleisia hinao men nanowar na’at, basit kwanihamiy eteni orot na’atube nama o tax o’onayan na’atube nama.
40018018	“Anababatun a tur ao’owen, abisa iti tafaramamaim ku’a’uh maramaim boro ana’uh. Naatu abisa iti tafaramamaim kururufam maramaim boro anarufam.
40018019	“Iban ao maiye, orot rou’ab iti tafaramamaim abisa isan hairi hibasit tefefeyan, Tamai maramaim boro isah nasinaf.
40018020	Orot rou’ab o tounu ayu wabu’umaim tekuku’ay, ayu i nati wanawanahimaim bairi.”
40018021	Imaibo Peter na Jesu biyan tit ibatiy, “Regah, ayu taiu isau mar etei bowabow kakafih nasisinaf mar boro bai’ab ana kakafih ana notawiyen? Ana kakafih ana notawiyen nayen seven nanatabir?”
40018022	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men seven , baise mar etei 70 tafanamaim seven auman. *
40018023	“Anayabin aiwob maramaim ana itinin i aiwob orot ana akir wairafih hai bowabow nunutitiy na’atube.
40018024	Nuteteyan ana bowabow busuruf ana veya aiwob orot kabay million na’atube orot ta bai ma bowabow hibai hina hirun.
40018025	Naatu nati akir wairafin aiwob orot ana kabay wan yin isan aurin men karam. Imih aiwob orot iuwih orot aawan, natunatun naatu ana sawar etei hitabow hitan sabuw afa hitatobon hai akir wairafihimih hitabow, saise nati kabayamaim aiwob orot ana kabay wan tab isan eo.
40018026	“Baise akir wairafin aiwob orot nanamaim sun yowen fefeyan eo, ‘Regah a kokok yate nanub naatu ayu boro ana sinaftobon a sawar etei wah anayow anit.’
40018027	Aiwob orot ana akir wairafin itin yan baban naatu ana kabay wan yin isan auman ibagun naatu iu tit ana ubar in.
40018028	“Baise nati akir wairafin tit in naatu ana kabay bai’abamo bowayan turan biyanamaim bai ma’am biyan tit, eof sikan bai eo, ‘Au kabay o biya inu’in boun wan inay initu.’
40018029	“Bow turan orot nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan eo, ‘Yate nanub mar kafai ayu boro a kabay wan anay anit.’
40018030	“Baise orot men kok boro turan fanan tanowar, imih bai furisiman itih hibai hin dibur bar hiya’ariy. Naatu orot turan iu, ‘Iti’imaim inama au kabay wan inay initu imaibo inatit.’
40018031	Akir wairafih afa iti sawar matar hi’itin men hiyasisir, imih hin abisa’awat himamatar isan aiwob orot ana tur hiowen.
40018032	“Imaibo aiwob orot ana akir wairafin eaf na iu eo, ‘O i anababatun orot kakaf. Ayu au kabay gagamin maiyow o biyamaim ma’am i asafam, anayabin ayu ifefeyanu.
40018033	Gewasin bow tura itakabibir o akakabibiri na’atube.’
40018034	Aiwob orot yan so’ar tatabir ana dibur kaifenayah iuwih hifatum dibur hiya’ariy naatu iu, ‘Iti’imaim inama’am au kabay wan inay initu imaibo inatit.’”
40018035	“Ef ta’imon ayu Tamai maramaim kwa ta’ita’imon isa boro iti na’atube nasinaf, o yait taituwa ana kakafin men dogor tutufin etei inanotanotawiy na’at.”
40019001	Jesu iti tur eo in sawar ufunamaim, Galilee ihamiy in Judea wanawananamaim tit, Jordan harew rewan rounane.
40019002	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin hi’ufunun hinan etei iyawasih.
40019003	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hina Jesu an hitain hibatiy hio, “Orot aawan nasisinaf kakaf isan karam boro nakwahir, naatu na kwakwahir i ofafar e’astu’ub ai en?”
40019004	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo aneika God orot babin hairi sinafih himamatar isan Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwaitin?”
40019005	Tur an i nati imih God eo, “Orot boro hinah tamah nihamiyih, aawan hairi hinita’imon biyah rou’ab, baise hairi hinita’imon biyah ta’imon namatar.
40019006	Imih hairi men biyah rou’ab baise ta’imon. Abisa God bita’imon men yait ta natarbounih.”
40019007	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hibatiy maiye hio, “Bo aisim Moses ana ofafar ta kirum eo, ‘Orot aawan kwahirinamih, kwahikwahiren ana fef nakirum babin nitin nab nan.’”
40019008	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa a tafa’asaramaim, imih Moses ibasit baibin kwahiren isan eo, baise aneika i men iti na’atube ma’ama’amih.
40019009	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, orot yait aawan anayabin en asir nakwahir, naatu nare babin ta ufun nan hairi hinibiwa’an i bowabow kakafin esisinaf.”
40019010	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiy hio, “Orot babin hairi hai ma kakaf nati na’atube tama’am, gewasin men hitatabin, monok baibitar hitama.”
40019011	Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Men orot etei boro iti bai’obaiyen hini’ufununimih, baise iyabowat God rurubinihiwat boro hini’ufunun.
40019012	Ef hai yabih moumurih na’in, imih orot men tetatabinamih, afa men tetatabin anayabin afa i yahoh fim, orot afa i yahoh tebowabow, naatu afa i God ana bowabow isan tenotanot, imih men tetatabin. Orot yait iti bai’obaiyen bainamih nakok, basit nab i akisin.”
40019013	Sabuw afa kek gidigidih Jesu uman tafah tayara’aten yoyoban isan hibow hinan, ana bai’ufununayah sabuw hikwararih hiotanih.
40019014	Baise Jesu eo, “Kek kwaihamiyih tena biyau tetit, men kwana’otanih. Anayabin sabuw iyab iti kek hai baitumatum na’atube God ana aiwobomaim tema’am.”
40019015	Basit Jesu kek tafah yara’aten isah yoyoban sawar, imaibo ihamiyih in.
40019016	Ana veya ta orot ta na Jesu ibatiy eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, sawar menatan gewasin anasinaf boro ma’ama wanatowan anab?”
40019017	Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Aisim sawar gewasin isan ayu kubibatiyu? God akisinamo i orot gewasin. O inakok ma’ama wanatowan bain ma’amih, basit ofafar ini’ufunun.”
40019018	Orot Jesu ibatiy eo, “Ofafar i menatan?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men tura ina’asabun, turanah a’aawah bairi men kwaniwa’an, men inabain, men orot babin afa isah inayanuw,
40019019	hinat tamat inakakafiyih * naatu o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube taituwa isah iniyabow.”
40019020	Orot iya’afut eo, “Iti ofafar etei asinaf sawar, abisa’awat tema’am boro anasinaf?”
40019021	Jesu iu eo, “O inakok a yawas baigewasinamih. Basit inan a sawar etei sabuw hai sawaramih initih hinatobon, naatu kabay inab yababan wairafih initih. O inan ini’ufununu, nati na’atube inasinaf maramaim o boro isa sawar nakaram.”
40019022	Orot iti tur nonowar ana maramaim yababan auman ana ubar in, anayabin i aurin sawar etei karam.
40019023	Naatu Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Tur anababatun au’uwi. Orot sawar wairafin i men karam mar ana aiwobomaim narun, boro isan nafokar.
40019024	Au’uwi maiye camel sou’umaim sorabon isan i fokar, anayabin koun butun gagamin. Ef ta’imon nati na’atube orot sawar wairafin i men karam mar ana aiwobomaim narun, boro isan nafokar.”
40019025	Bai’ufununayah iti tur hinonowar ana maramaim hifofofor men kafaita. Naatu hio, “Yait i boro yawas nab?”
40019026	Jesu mutufor nuw itih eo, “Sawar etei orot isah i hifokar, baise God isan sawar etei i men fokarihimih.”
40019027	Basit Peter misir eo, “Kwi’iti, aki ai sawar etei ai hamiyen o abi’ufununi abisa boro anab?”
40019028	Jesu iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Tafaram nabobotabir ana maramaim, Orot Natun boro ana urama’ama bonamanamarinamaim namare. Naatu kwa ayu au bai’ufununayah na 12 auman boro urama’amamaim kwanamare Israel sabuw hai big etei 12 kwanakaifih kwanama.
40019029	Sabuw iyab ayu wabu’umaim hai bar hai me, taituwah, ruburubuh, hinahinah tamahinah hihamiyen ayu tibi’ufununu boro hai yawas tafan ana ya’abar anitih. Naatu yawas wanatowan auman anitih hinab.
40019030	Baise sabuw iyab boun wan hi’iyon tenan boro hinan hini’uf naatu sabuw iyab hi’uf tenan boro hinan wan hini’iyon. Imih sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim orot gagamih tema’am maramaim boro aurih efan en. Baise sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim God isan tibi’akir maramaim boro orot gagamih hinama.”
40020001	“God nabi’aiwob ana maramaim i boro iti na’atube. Ana veya ta orot masaw matuwan, sabuw afa tobon ana masawamaim bowamih tit na.
40020002	Bowayah bow naatu veya ta’imon ana baiyan isan bairi hio hibibasit ufunamaim iyafarih hin grape ana masawamaim * hibow.
40020003	“ Nine korok na’atube tit maiye na ahar efanamaim. Orot afa hai bowabow en asir hibatabat itih.
40020004	Basit eo, ‘Igewasin kwa auman boro kwanan au masawamaim kwanabow, naatu kwa a baiyan boro etei anafofonin anit.’ Naatu bowamih hin.
40020005	Auyit naatu three korok hairi tit inan i bowabow ta’imon sinaf sabuw asir hibatabat itih naatu uwih hin ana masaw hibow.
40020006	Naatu veya re five korok na’atube, orot tit na maiye, ahar efanamaim titit. Sabuw afa’abo hibatabat itih eo, ‘Kwa aisim asir kwabatabat veya re?’
40020007	“Hiya’afut hio, ‘Men yait ta tubuni.’ “Basit orot eo, ‘Kwanan au masawamaim kwabow.’ Naatu ana masaw bowamih hin.
40020008	“Veya re birabirab auman, masaw matuwan ana orot ukwarin eaf na iu, ‘Sabuw ina’afih hinan hai baiyan initih, uf hinan hai baiyan wan initih naatu wan hinan uf initih,’ basit eafih hina hirun sawar.
40020009	“Imaibo orot iyab five korok hibusuruf hibowabow, hai baiyan itih, veya ta’imon ana fofonin.
40020010	Orot mat hina hibowabow, hai biyan bainamih hinan i hinotanot boro hai baiyan gagamin hitab, baise i auman baiyan ta’imon hibai, veya ta’imon ana fofonin.
40020011	“Hai kabay hibai sawar hitit hibat. Basit higam masaw matuwan hiu,
40020012	‘Iti sabuw i veya re’er auman hina men manin hibag, baise aki bairi ai baiyan ta’imon iti. Aki ai baiyan i boro gagamin atab, anayabin aki mar auman ana a bow in veya re.’
40020013	“Masaw matuwan misir orot ta isan eo, ‘Au begon inaso’ob. Ayu men asinaf kakafemih. Anayabin kwa i kwaibasit veya ta’imon ana baiyan isan, imih kwabow in veya re ana fofonin ait.
40020014	Abisa abit i kwabai a ubar kwan. Iti oro’orot uf hinan i ayu arubinih hina, imih hai kabay abitih i kwa bairi a baiyan ta’imon.
40020015	Anayabin ayu au sawar, au kokomaim au kabay mi’itube anim, ayu akisu. Men orot babin ta isan anasisinaf gewas isan ya naso’aramih.’”
40020016	Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “Sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim orot gagamih tema’am boro maramaim aurih efan en. Baise sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim God isan tibi’akir maramaim boro orot gagamih hinama.”
40020017	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi au Jerusalem hinan efamaim buwih nabin akisihimo hai tur eowen eo,
40020018	“Tanan Jerusalemamaim Orot Natun boro sabuw hinab. Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hinitih rabin asabunin morobomih hinao.
40020019	Naatu hinab Eteni Sabuw hinitih, hina’u hi’i’iyab hinarab hina’onaf namorob. Baise veya baitonin ufunamaim boro namisir maiye.”
40020020	Imaibo Zebedee aawan natunatun rou’ab bairi Jesu baifefeyanimih hina nanamaim sun yowen natunatun rou’ab isah fefeyan baibaisinamih eo.
40020021	Jesu ibatiy eo, “Abisa kukokok?” Babin iya’afut eo, “Ayu akokok inao matanu o ina bi’aiwob ana maramaim, ayu natunatu hairi sisib roun roun hinamare bairi kwani’aiwob.”
40020022	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Kwa men kwaso’ob abisa isan kwafefeyanu. Karam ayu au harew ana tomatom turin boro kwanatom?” Tufuturan hairi hiya’afut hio, “Aki karam.”
40020023	Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu harew atomatom boro kwanatom, baise ta au asukwafune mare ta au beyawane mare. Ayu men karam boro anarubin. Nati efan i sabuw iyab ayu Tamai isah bobogaigiwas i hai efan.”
40020024	Bai’ufununayah etei ten iti tur hinonowar orot tufuturan hairi isan yah so’ar.
40020025	Baise Jesu etei eaf ayuwih i’uwih eo, “Kwanaso’ob orot iyab Eteni Sabuw tekakaifih i God men tebitumitum, imih i taiyuwih hai fairamaim sabuw tibiruwih fanah tebai tibi’ufununih.
40020026	Baise kwa wanawanamaim men iti na’atube nama’amih. O yait inakok bai’ukwarinamih, basit taituwa isah inabow ini’akir.
40020027	Naatu O yait inakok wan bai’iyon bai’ukwarinamih, basit taituwa isah ini’akir.
40020028	Iti na’atube kwanasinaf, anayabin Orot Natun nan i men sabuw isan bowamih namih, baise nabow ana yawas sabuw isah ni’inuw saise i ana yawasamaim sabuw niyawasih.”
40020029	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi tafaram Jericho hitumar hitit, basit sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40020030	Hinan efamaim orot rou’ab matah fim hima’am Jesu ana tur hinowar, basit hi’af Jesu hifefeyan hio, “David uwan kwiwanbabani.”
40020031	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hinan orot rou’ab hikwararih awah fotamih hi’uwih, baise hairi awah aumetawat hi’af hio, “Regah David uwan kwiwanbabani.”
40020032	Jesu inan bat naatu hairi eafih hina ibatiyih eo, “Kwakokok abisa isa anasinaf?”
40020033	Orot rou’ab hiya’afut hio, “Regah aki akokok matai hinigewasin ananuw.”
40020034	Jesu hairi itih iyababan basit matah bobotobonen ana maramaim mar ta’imonamo hairi matah higewasin himisir Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
40021001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi au Jerusalem hirun hinan, hina bar merar ta wabin Bethage hitit, Olive Oyawemaim * imaim burut tebatabat , Jesu ana bai’ufununayah rou’ab wan iyunih
40021002	eo, “Kwanan bar merar nati namaim kwanatitit boro donkey hi’utan ebatabat kwana’itin naatu donkey boubun auman sisibinamaim ebatabat. Hairi kwanarufamen kwanabow kwanan.
40021003	Orot ta nati’imaim nabibatiyi ana tur kwana’owen, ‘Regah ekokok naatu boro nihamiyen kwanabow kwanan.’ Baise ana tur kwana’owen boro niyafarih hinamatabir maiye.”
40021004	Iti sawar himamatar abisa God ana dinab orot eo kikirum ina i turobe.
40021005	“Jerusalem sabuw hai tur kwana’owen, a aiwob enan kwa’itin, taiyuwin yare donkey afe’en mara’at enan, ana donkey boubun tafanamaim mara’at enan.”
40021006	Basit Jesu ana bai’ufununayah eo baimanih na’at hin hisinaf.
40021007	Donkey hibai hina hai faifuw tafah hibosairen hiyabar afa rabod rourih hi’afuw ef yan hiyabar.
40021008	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hai faifuw hibosairen hiyabar afa ai raurih hi’afuw hiyabar.
40021009	Sabuw Jesu nanane hinan, naatu ufunane hinan fanah sib hiwow hio, “David natun tanabora’ara’ah God nigegewasin Regah wabinamaim enan God tanabora’ara’ah!”
40021010	Jesu na Jerusalem rur, kawasa ra’at uruw giririf retenafut, sabuw hibatebat hio, “Iti orot yait?”
40021011	Rou’ay gagamin hiyafutih hio, “God ana dinab orot wabin Jesu, Galilee wanawananamaim tafaram Nazareth orot.”
40021012	Naatu Jesu na Tafaror Bar run. Sabuw iyab nati hima hai sawar hitotobon rauw nunih hai urama’ama, hai gemogem bora’aten, kabay hisuwa hire, urama’ama afe’eh hima mamu imak hitotobon bow israuwen ufun hitit.
40021013	Naatu iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim God eo hikikirum i iti na’atube eo, ‘Ayu au Tafaror Bar i yoyoban ana bar,’ baise kwa abisa kwasisinaf i kwabotabir bainowah hai watu matar.”
40021014	Sabuw matah fim naatu ah umah kakafih hina Tafaror Bar hirun Jesu etei iyawasih.
40021015	Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah Jesu sawar gewasih sisinaf hi’itin yah so’ar. Kek auman Tafaror Bar wanawanan fanah sib Jesu hibora’ara’ah hio, “Orokaiwa David natun, ensairen.”
40021016	Jesu hiu, “Iti kek teo kunonowar?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anonowar. Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum kwaiyab kwa’itin, mi’itube hikirum? ‘Kek gidigidih naatu kek sosof ini’obaiyih merarayow gewasin anababatun baitinin isan.’”
40021017	Naatu nati’imaim ihamiyih hima i tit in Bethany bar merar imaim mar fo in.
40021018	Mar auman Jesu au merar gagamin matabir inan, basit bayumih morob.
40021019	Naatu ef rewanamaim ai fafou batabat itin, basit na ai an tit, baise men ro’on ta itin, raurinawat. Basit ai isan eo, “O i boro men iniw.” Mar ta’imonamo ai fenem.
40021020	Ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin hifofor men kafaita, naatu hio, “Ai fafou mi’itube’emih mar ta’imon fenem?”
40021021	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Men erekasiy auman kwanasinafumih, baise kwanitumatum. Karam abis iti boun ai fafou isan asisinaf boro kwanasinaf namatar. Baise men iti akisin. Karam oyaw isan kwanao, kumisir kwen riy yan kubat boro namatar.
40021022	Initumatum abisa isan kuyoyoban boro inab.”
40021023	Jesu matabir maiye Tafaror Baremaim run bat bi’obaibiyih. Basit Firis ukwarih naatu Jew hai orot ukwarih hina Jesu biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “O yait fair it iti sawar kusisinaf, naatu yait ibasit ina kubowabow?”
40021024	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu auman au baibat ta’imon kwa anibatiyi kwanao ananowar, imaibo ayu boro anao kwananowar, ayu fair menamaim abai abowabow.
40021025	John ana fair menane bai sabuw bapataito itih Godane bai, ai orot maiyow biyahine bai?” Hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Mi’itube tanao? Godane tanao’o i boro nao bo aisim John men kwaitumitum.
40021026	Baise it orot biyanane fair bain tanao, sabuw isah tabirubir anayabin sabuw etei tebitumatum John i God ana dinab orot ta.”
40021027	Imih sabuw Jesu isan hiya’afut hio, “Aki men aso’ob.” Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu auman boro men anao kwananowar, baibasit menane abai iti sawar asisinaf.
40021028	“Kwa mi’itube kwanotanot? Ana veya ta orot natunatun bairi hima’am basit orot natun ain isan eo, ‘Aro ayu akokok boun inan grape ana masaw inabow.’
40021029	“Naatu kek tamah iya’afut eo, ‘Ayu men akokok.’ Baise ma kafai ana not botabir re in masaw bow.
40021030	“Naatu orot na maiye natun uf isan tit tur i ta’imonaban eo, naatu kek rufut eo, ‘Basit, Regah boro anan.’ Baise kwahir bar ma men in masaw bowamih.
40021031	Naatu kek menatan i tamah fanan bai?” Hima’am hio, “Kek ain.” Jesu uwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen. Kwa kabay o’onayah naatu sagasagadiy i sabuw kakafih kwarouw kwao, baise i boro wan hini’iyon hinan mar ana aiwob hinab.
40021032	Anayabin John Baptist na ef gewasin bai’ufnunin isan bi’obaiyi, kwa men kwaitumitumimih, baise kabay o’onayah, naatu sagasagadiy hitumitum, sawar i kwa’itin, baise men kafa’imo a not uf kwabotabir kwaitumitumimih.”
40021033	Jesu eo maiye, “Oroubon tabo kwananowar. Orot me matuwan ana veya ta masaw bo grape tanum, fur ear ituwafut naatu Wine bunubunuw ana hub bai naatu ana masaw sabuw bowayah uwih hima’uh hima i tafaram afa bai nanawanamih in.
40021034	Naatu grape hiyamur bairuhin ana veya kakabom, basit orot ana akir wairafih iyafarih hina bowayah biyah ibo au nowahine ai ro’oh bairut isan.
40021035	“Baise bowayah himisir orot ana akir wairafih hibow, ta hibai hirab, ta hi’asabun morob, naatu ta kabayamaim hirab.
40021036	Orot ana akir wairafih afa’abo iyafarih hina, moumurihika men marasika biyafarih na’atube’emih, baise bowayah himisir akir wairafih hibow, wan hinan isah hisisinaf na’atube hisinaf hibow hirouw.
40021037	Uftoro’ot i natun iyun na bowayah isah, not eo, ‘Sabuw boro natu hinakakafiy.’
40021038	“Baise bowayah orot natun nan hi’itin hio, ‘Iti orot masaw matuwan natun enan kwanatabai tarab emorob, saise iti sawar etei boro it ata sawaramih tanabow.’
40021039	Hina kek hibai fur ufunane hirouw re hitit hibai hi’asabun morob.”
40021040	Naatu Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Masaw matuwan namatabir nanan iti sabuw bowayah isah boro mi’itube nasinaf?”
40021041	Hiya’afut hio, “Nati orot bowayah etei boro narauw hinamorob, naatu masaw boro nab sabuw afa nitih hinama hinakaif, saise ai ro’oh hinabiyamur bowayah boro hinirut ibo au nowan hinitin.”
40021042	Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin. ‘Kabay nati bar wowabayah hi’itin kakafin hirouw hikwakwahir, I botabir na taf ana wabat matar, iti sawar i Regah sinaf, ana itinin gewasin maiyow ta’i’itin.’
40021043	“Isan imih a tur ao’owen. Mar ana aiwob kwa biyamaim tema’am boro nabosairen sabuw iyab ub gewasih hitanum teyey boro i nitih.
40021044	“Orot yait iti agim afe’en nare narabirab i boro natarsisib, baise agim nare orot babin narabirab boro mutufor nifofob.”
40021045	Firis hai ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah Jesu ana oroubon eo hinowar hitatam.
40021046	Imih bain fatuminamih himisir, baise sabuw rou’ay hina hima’ama isah hibir. Anayabin sabuw etei Jesu hi’i’itin i God ana dinab orot ta.
40022001	Naatu Jesu iban maiye oroubon tabo sabuw hai tur eowen eo,
40022002	“Mar ana Aiwob ana itinin i boro iti na’atube. Ana veya ta aiwob orot natun tabin isan ana hiyuw bogaigiwas.
40022003	Naatu ana akir wairafih iyunih kob hin sabuw iyabowat hiyuw aamih hibowabow isah, baise etei’imak hikwahir hima.
40022004	“Imih aiwob orot iban maiye ana akir wairafih afa’abo iyunih eo, ‘Kwanan sabuw iyabowat na hiyuw aamih au’uwih hai tur kwana’owen, masanuw etei arauw hitab, naatu hiyuw etei abogaigiwas sawar, imih kwanan tabin ana hiyuw tanaa.’
40022005	“Baise hin hi’o, sabuw hiyuw aayah tur men hinowar, hai kokomaim hire nanabin hin. Orot ta au masaw in, orot ta re ana sitow bowamih in.
40022006	Naatu sabuw afa akir wairafih hibow hirouw, afa hi’asbunubunuw himorob.
40022007	Aiwob orot anababatun yan so’ar, basit ana baiyowayah iyafarih hin sabuw ana akir wairafih hi’asbunubunuw etei hibow hirouw himorob naatu hai bar etei hi’afusar.
40022008	“Imaibo aiwob orot ana akir wairafih afa’abo eaf hina iuwih eo, ‘Tabin ana hiyuw i abogaigiwas sawar, baise sabuw au’uwih men yait ta namih.
40022009	Imih kwanatit kwanan ef gagamih yahimaim sabuw kwana’i’itih etei kwana’uwih hinan tabin ana hiyuwamaim hinarun.’
40022010	Basit akir wairafih hitit hin ef gagamih yahimaim orot babin hi’itih etei hibow, kakafin, gewasin etei hiteten hinatabin ana efanamaim hitit.
40022011	“Aiwob orot na nanawan hai merar yi ibabatiyih inan, basit orot ta tabin ana faifuw usina’e na ma’am itin.
40022012	Naatu ibatiy eo, ‘Au begon, o mi’itube’emih tabin ana faifuw usina’e ina irun kuma’am, etawan menane irun?’ Baise orot men tur ta eo.
40022013	“Basit aiwob orot ana akir wairafih iuwih eo, ‘Orot an uman kwafatum kwabai kwan ufun kwaisaroun ere gugumin wanawanan nama, narerey wan nitarfofor naso’ob.’”
40022014	Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “Sabuw moumurih na’in God ea’afih, baise matan ta’amo boro narubinih.”
40022015	Basit Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah afa hin sa’ab akisihimo hiku’ay Jesu baikubibiruwin isan hiyakitifuw.
40022016	Imaibo hai bai’ufununayah afa naatu Herod ana kou’ay sabuw afa hin Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki aso’ob. O i anababatun turamaim kuo, God ana sabuw isah abisa ekokokomaim kubi’obaiyih, abisa sabuw tenotanot isan men kubiyababan, anayabin o men orot babin ufuhine ku’i’itin.
40022017	Imih kuo anowar. Caesar isan kabay tanabibaiyan boro ata ofafar tana’astu’ub, ai en? O mi’itube kunotanot?”
40022018	Jesu mar ta’imon hio hai tur naniyan bai uwih eo, “Kwa i wanawan rerekabih! Aisim ayu kwabikubibiruwu?
40022019	Kabay kwabai kwana kwai’obaiyu aitin.” Naatu kabay hibai hina hitin.
40022020	Itin sawar imaibo eo, “Iti kabayamaim i yait ayubin naatu wabin tema’am?”
40022021	Hiya’afut hio, “Caesar.” Basit Jesu iuwih eo, “Abisa Caesar nowan Caesar kwanitin, naatu abisa God nowan God kwanitin.”
40022022	Iti na’at eo hinonowar ana maramaim hifofor men kafaita. Naatu hihamiy himatabir maiye hin.
40022023	Nati veya ta’imon kau’ay ta wabin Sadducee hai sabuw afa hina Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Sabuw morobone boro men hinayawas maiye.”
40022024	Naatu hio maiye, “Bai’obaiyenayan Moses eo tautabin orot ain natun en namomorob tain boro tuwah ana kwafur ni’aawan, saise hairi hina’in kek hinatufuw tuwah efanin.
40022025	Imih marasika orot, ain uf nah etei seven hima’am, basit orot ain tabin naatu kek en morob. Ana kwafur tain i’aawan.
40022026	I auman kek en morob. Naatu tain ta bo kwafur i’aawan maiye. Kek en morob ef ta’imon na’atube hisinaf re in yomanin hi’asa’ub.
40022027	Uf toro’ot, babin morob.
40022028	Orot etei i babin ta’imon hi’aawan, imih ana maramaim morobone hinamimisir maiye, babin i boro menatan ni’aawan?”
40022029	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa i a not hikwaris. Anayabin Buk Atamanin men kwaso’ob, naatu God ana fair auman men kwaso’ob.
40022030	Anayabin morobone hinamimisir ana veya tounamatar maramaim tabina’e tema’am na’atube bairi boro hinama.
40022031	Naatu morobone hinamisir maiye isan God eo Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwa’itin ei en? God iti na’atube eo,
40022032	‘Ayu i Abraham ana God, Isaac ana God, naatu Jacob ana God.’ Nati God i sabuw yawasih hai God men sabuw murubih hai Godamih.”
40022033	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin iti tur hinonowar, hifofor men kafaita, anayabin abisa bi’obaiyih i tur anababatun.
40022034	Jesu tur eo Sadducee sabuw hai tur etei rabirab ana maramaim Pharisee sabuw hi’itin. Basit etei hina hita’imon.
40022035	Wanawanahimaim ofafar so’obayan orot ta na Jesu ikubibiruw eo,
40022036	“Bai’obaiyenayan, obaiyunen tur menatan i gagamin ofafar etei wanawanahimaim?”
40022037	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Regah, a God isan dogor tutufin etei, a not tutufin etei, naatu biya tutufin etei iniyabuw.
40022038	Iti ofafar i gagamin naatu ofafar ana ukwarin.
40022039	Naatu ofafar bairou’abin i iti. ‘Taituwa isah iniyabow o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube.’
40022040	Moses ana ofafar tutufin etei naatu God ana dinab oro’orot hai bai’obaiyen etei i iti ofafar rou’ab tebi’ukwarih.”
40022041	Pharisee sabuw hiru’ay hita’imon, basit Jesu ibatiyih
40022042	eo, “Kwa a notamaim Keriso isan mi’itube kwanotanot? I boro orot yait natun?” Naatu i hiya’afut hio, “Keriso i boro David ana agirane nan.”
40022043	Naatu Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Bo aisim Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim David iwanasum, Regah isan eo,
40022044	‘Regah au Regah isan eo, Umau au asukwafune kumare inama’am. Ana maramaim ayu boro anatit a kamabiy sabuw anabow babamaim anaya.’
40022045	“David Roubininenayan orot isan i ana Regah rauw eo, imih men karam Roubininenayan orot i David ana agir narauw nao.”
40022046	Men yait ta Jesu ana tur wan yimih. Nati ana veya’amaim men yait ta baibat afa bow na Jesu ibatiyimih.
40023001	Imaibo Jesu sabuw rou’ay gagamin naatu i ana bai’ufununayah isah eo,
40023002	“Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee i Moses ana ofafar etei hisora’ub.
40023003	Imih abistan tibi’obaiyi i kwanabosiyasiyar, baise men kwani’u’urih. Anayabin abisa teo i men na’atube tisisinafumih.
40023004	Ofafar fokarih maiyow sabuw tuwabuh hiyara’ah hi’abar tibi’akir, naatu i men kafa’imo boro umah hina’ofere hinibaisih bit nakereremih.
40023005	“Sawar etei bebeyanamaim tisisinaf sabuw itihimih. God ana Tur ai kanabihimaim hikirum, ukwarih, umah, hai faifuwamaim hikubabaren sabuw itihimih.
40023006	Hiyuw hai mar tekokok efan gewasih hinabow hinamare hinama, naatu Kou’ay Bar wanawanan tekokok efan gewasih imaim hinama.
40023007	Hai kok gagamin i ahar efanamaim sabuw hinakakafiyih, hai merar hinay hinabora’ara’ahih bai’obaiyenayah gewasih hinarouw.
40023008	“Baise kwa men bai’obaiyenayah hinarauw hina’omih. Anayabin kwa etei i ain uf, naatu a Bai’obaiyenayan i ta’imon.
40023009	Men yait ta iti tafaramamaim Tamat kwana’omih, anayabin kwa Tamat i ta’imonamo maramaim ema’am.
40023010	Naatu men yait ta kwa isa bai’obaiyenayah narouw nao, anayabin kwa A Bai’obaiyenayan i ta’imon Keriso akisin.
40023011	Orot gagamin kwa wanawananamaim i orot yait taintuwan isah ebi’akir.
40023012	Orot yait taiyuwin ebobora’ah God boro nayare, naatu orot yait taiyuwin eyayare God boro nabora’ah orot gagamin namatar.
40023013	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanah rerekabih! Sabuw mar ana aiwobomaim run isan hai etawan kwahir, naatu kwa run isan kwakwahir, sabuw afa runamih tisisinaftobon baise kwa men kwabibasit boro hinarun.
40023014	Yababan boro kanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawan rerekabih! Kwafur baibin kwai’a’afiyih hai sawar kwabowabow, naatu iti baifa’i isan kwai’o’orot yoyoban manimanih kwayoyoyoban
40023015	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanan rerekabih! Tafaram, tafaram un boy kwabai sabuw dogoroh baikitabirin a kou’ayomaim run isan kwa’u’uwih, naatu orot ta’imon kwabai a kou’ayomaim erur i ana kakafin tafan kwaya’abar kwai’afiy kakafin natun matar kwa bairi kwanan kwani’akiramih.
40023016	“Yababan boro kwanab! Mata fimih! A bai’obaiyenamaim sabuw kwai’obaiyih kwao, ‘Orot yait Tafaror Bar isan na’obaifaro, nati ana’obaifaro yabin en, baise orot yait Tafaror Bar wanawanan gold isan na’obaifaro, nati anao matanen i nakakafiy.’
40023017	Mata hifim kwabobosa! Sawar menatan i gagamin, gold o Tafaror Bar? Baise Tafaror Bar i gagamin anayabin i wanawananamaim gold i kakafiyih himatar ti’inu’in.
40023018	Iban maiye sabuw kwai’obaiyih kwao, ‘Orot yait sibor ana gem kakafiyin isan nao’obaifaro, nati anao baifaro i yabin en, baise gem kakafiyin afe’enamaim siwar isan na’obaifaro nati ana’obaifaro i nakakafiy.’
40023019	Mata hifim kwabobosa! Sawar menatan i gagamin, siwar o sibor ana gem kakafiyin tafanamaim siwar tena kakafiyin kakafiyin temamatar i gagamin?
40023020	Isan imih orot yait sibor ana gem kakafiyin isan eobaifaro, sawar etei nati gem tafaramamaim ti’inu’in auman isah eobaifaro.
40023021	Na’atube orot yait Tafaror Bar isan eobaifaro, i God nati wanawananamaim ema’am auman isan eobaifaro.
40023022	Naatu orot yait mar isan eobaifaro i God ana urama’ama efan isan eobaifaro, anayabin nati i God ana ma’ama efan.
40023023	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee, wanawanan rerekabih! Kwa i fiyow yamurih gewasih, bay hai momon, bay matah haibaib gewasih i roumukur kwayai God kwabitin, baise ofafar gagamih ma gewas isan, kabeber, bosunusunub isan eo i kwakwahiren. Ofafar iti i gagamih, gewasin i kwatabosiyasiyar ofafar afa auman.
40023024	Bonawiyenayah mata fim! Ofafar rimiyafof totomar i kwarurububuna, baise camel koun butun i kwatotonan.
40023025	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu Pharisee wanawanan rerekabih! A kerowas naatu a tew ufuhine i kwasasouwen, baise wanawanah i kato rabirabih, bain, bai’o’orot, kabat, gamin baiyow awan karatan inu’in.
40023026	Mata hifim kwabobosa Pharisee! Gewasin a tew naatu a kerowas wanawanahine wan kwanasouwen, saise ufuhine auman boro hinigewasih.
40023027	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee. wanawan rerekabih! Kwa a’itinin i rah ufunane tewowab gewas ebatabat na’atube, baise wanawanan i orot babin hai rarik awan karatan masin kakafin.
40023028	Imih kwa ayumat i nati na’atube, ufunane sabuw matahimaim a’itinin i gewasin, baise wanawananamaim a kakafin naatu a tafasar i ra’at.
40023029	“Yababan boro kwanab, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu Pharisee, wanawan rerekabih! dinab oro’orot hai yawas gewasih naatu sabuw hai yawas mutufurih himomorob hai rah i kwabobuna’en kwama kwabi’aburen.
40023030	Naatu kwao, aki ai a’agir hima’am hai veya’amaim bairi ata ma’am aki boro men dinab oro’orot ata rauw hitamorobomih.
40023031	Imih nati turamaim kwa taiyuw kwao’orereb kwa uwatanah i dinab oro’orot hi’asbunubunuw himorob.
40023032	Imih abisa uwatanah hibubusuruf hisisinaf i kwaisawar nuhi efot.
40023033	“Kok hai yumat! naatu kok natunatun! God ana baimakiy boro kwanahaiw?
40023034	Isan imih a tur ao’owen, dinab oro’orot, bai’obaiyenayah naatu orot not wairafih boro aniyafarih hinan. Baise boro kwanabow kwanarauw hinamorob, afa boro kwana’onafih, naatu boro kwanarouw hinamorob, afa boro Kou’ay bar wanawanan kwanawabirih, naatu bar merar ta ta’amaim kwaninunih kwanaremor.
40023035	Sinaf ana an nati isan, sabuw gewasih himorob hai rara susuwa anabit etei boro kwa tafa nayen baimakiy kwanab. Abel orot gewasin momorob ana veya’ika re na Berakiah natun Zechariah, iti Tafaror Bar naatu sibor kakafiyin hai founamaim kwarab momorob i ana veya’amaim tit.
40023036	Imih tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, Sabuw himorob hai rara re’er hai bit etei kwa iti boun yawasih kwama’am boro kwanab.
40023037	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! dinab oro’orot etei i’asbunuw himorob, naatu kob abarayah hiyunih hinan etei kabayamaim irauw himorob. Mar etei a kok kwanekwan umau’umaim natunat atabuwih hitan ta’imon hitamatar. Kokorere natunatun ita’imonih ebaba’afuwih na’atube, baise o men kafa’imo baibasit itu.
40023038	Isan imih a bar a merar boro hinakwahir naowarar.
40023039	A tur ao’owen ayu boro men kwana’itu maiye’emih. Ana maramaim kwanao, ‘Yait Regah wabinamaim enan boro baigegewasin nab.’”
40024001	Jesu Tafaror Bar gagamin ihamiy tit inan auman, ana bai’ufununayah hina hiu, “Tafaror bar kwi’itin gewasin maiyow.”
40024002	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sawar iti kwa’i’itan, a tur ao’owen, kabay etei boro natafofor nare naatu kabay ta boro men ana efanamaim na’inu’in kwana’itinimih.”
40024003	Jesu yen Olive Oyaw tafan mare, ana bai’ufununayah wa’iwa’iramaim hina biyan hitit hibatiy hio, “Kuo anowar mar i boro biy iti sawar hinamatar? Naatu o inanan ina’inanen boro abisa ana’itin anaso’ob. Naatu mar yomanin nakakabon boro mi’itube ana so’ob?”
40024004	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Matato niwa’an, men sabuw hinan hinifufuwimih.
40024005	Sabuw moumurih na’in boro ayu wabu’umaim hinan hinao, ‘Ayu i Keriso’ naatu sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinifufuwih.
40024006	Baiyow ana tur boro kwananowar, naatu baiyow isan ana tur boro kwananowar, baise men kwanabir. Sawar yumatah ta ta boro hinamatar, baise nati i men mar yomanin.
40024007	Tafaram ta boro tafaram ta hairi hiniyow, na’atube bar merar ta boro bar merar ta ana aiwob hairi hiniyow. Baimar kakafin, iriyoy boro tafaram awan nakaratan.
40024008	Sawar iti etei hinamatar i kek tufuwamih ebobotukwar na’atube.
40024009	“Sabuw boro hinafatumi hinabuw kwanan hini’a’akir, hina’asbuni kwanamorob, ayu wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan.
40024010	Nati ana veya’amaim baitumatumayah boro hai baitumatum hinihamiy, naatu turahinah babah hinao, taiyuwih turahinah hinifa’ifa’ih,
40024011	dinab baifufuwenayah moumurih na’in boro hinatit sabuw moumurih na’in hinifufuwih.
40024012	Tafa’asar boro nara’at natasasar sabuw momurih na’in hai yabow boro wan natutum.
40024013	Baise yait nabukikin nan yomanin natitit i boro yawas nab.
40024014	Tur Gewasin, mar ana aiwob isan, i boro tafaram wanawanan etei hinabinan sabuw etei hinanowar, imaibo mar yomanin boro nan natit.
40024015	“Biya’ohow Ana Sawar Kakafin boro efan kakafiyinamaim nabatabat kwana’itin, dinab orot Daniel eo na’atube. Baiyabayan orot iti tur nabiyab naniyan nab gewas.
40024016	Sabuw iyab Judea wanawananamaim tema’ama boro hinabihir hinan oyaw wan hinayen.
40024017	Orot yait ana bar faifiy wan ema’am boro men nare ana sawar bar wanawanan nabowamih, veya en.
40024018	Orot yait masaw ebowabow boro men namatabir ana biya baibiyon bar nabaimih.
40024019	Nati ana veya’amaim baibin iyab siasiar tema’ama naatu baibin iyab kek tibitotoman boro hini’akir yababan hinab.
40024020	God isan kwanayoyoban, saise men rarab kokou ana veya’amaim o Sabbath ana veya’amaim namataramih.
40024021	Nati ana veya’amaim boro yababan kakafin men marasika anamaim o boro namamatar na’atube namataramih.
40024022	God nati veya narurukabum na’at sabuw boro yawas men hinab. Baise ana sabuw rurubiniyih isah enotanot, imih veya boro narukabum.
40024023	“Nati ana veya sabuw afa hinan hina’uwi, ‘Keriso’oban iti!’ o ‘Iban ni’i!’ men kwanitumatum.
40024024	Anayabin Keriso na’atube naatu dinab baifufuwenayah boro hinan ina’inan fokarih hinasinaf God ana rourubinen sabuw moumurih na’in boro hinabow.
40024025	Imih abimatuwibo sawar hinamatar.
40024026	“Sabuw a tur hinaowen hinao, ‘Iban nati arar yan ema’am,’ men imaim kwanan kwananuwih. O hinao, ‘Nati nanawan bar wanawanan wa’ir ema’am,’ men kwanitumatum.
40024027	Veya yeninane namanamar ebowabow veya ra’iyinane uman emamarakaw, Orot Natun nanan ana marakaw boro nati na’atube.
40024028	Menamaim orot babin biyan murubin inu’in mamu ikou boro etei imaim hinaru’ay.
40024029	“Yababan iti hinamamatar ufunamaim ‘Veya boro matan nagugum, sumar boro men nakaw, daman boro hinihururuw hinare. mar wanawanan sawar ti’inu’in etei boro hai efan hinasairen.’*
40024030	“Imaibo Orot Natun maramaim boro natit, tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei orot Natun ana fair ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman natit sakuk wanawanan nanan hina’itin hinama hinarerey.
40024031	Ana tounamatar boro taur douduf auman hinatit tafaram tutufin wanawanan umasusun kwafe’en etei God ana sabuw rurubinih hinabow hinita’ay.
40024032	“Ai fofou raurihimaim ebi’obaiyih kwanaso’ob, ai raurih boubuh tititit kwa kwaso’ob, ai hai buwayan ana veya i natit.
40024033	Bai’obaiyen i ta’imon, sawar iti na’atube hinamamatar kwa boro kwanaso’ob, veya i nakabom etawan awanamaim ebatabat.
40024034	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, sabuw iti boun yawas kwama’am boro iti sawar namatar kwana’itinibo kwanamorob.
40024035	Mar tafaram i boro nasawar, baise ayu au tur boro men nasawar.
40024036	“Orot men yait ta Jesu ana na isan veya o sumar so’obamih. tounamatar maramaim men hiso’ob na’atube i Natun auman men so’ob, baise Tamah akisinamo so’ob.
40024037	Noah ana veya’amaim abisa mamatar na’atube Orot Natun nanan boro na’atube namatar.
40024038	Nati ana veya tuw yena’e ana veya orot babin hiyuw hibow, hiaa hitom, hitabin hibiyasisir ufut Noah ark wanawanan run;
40024039	naatu so’oba’e hima’am kwanekwan tuw yen etei e’aruwih hin himorob. Imih orot Natun nanan ana itinin i boro nati na’atube.
40024040	Orot rou’ab boro hai masaw hinama hinabob, Orot ta boro tounamatar hinabora’ah ta boro hinihamiy nama.
40024041	Baibin rou’ab boro hinama maiwok hinakakair, babin ta boro hinabora’ah, babin ta boro hinihamiy nama.
40024042	“Isan imih mata to niwa’an, anayabin men kwaso’ob mar biy boro a Regah nan.
40024043	Baise tur iti ao i naniyan kwanab. Orot bar matuwan bainowan hai veya nasoso’ob, boro matan nanuw nama’am nanunih hinabihir, ana bar boro men hinakwib hinabainuwimih.
40024044	Imih mar etei mata to niwa’an kwanabobuna kwanama, anayabin Orot Natun boro men o veya kunotanotamaim natitamih.
40024045	“Akir wairafin bosunusunubayan naatu not wairafin ana orot ukwarin boro nayara’ah akir wairafih afa nakaifih hai bay ana veya’amaim nitih.
40024046	Naatu ana orot ukwarin namatabir nanan bowabow gewasin nabowabow na’itin boro niyasisir.
40024047	A tur ao’owen nati akir wairafin boro nayara’ah sawar etei nakaifen.
40024048	Baise akir wairafin nitafasar nao, ‘Au orot ukwarin men saise matabir enanamih.’
40024049	Naatu natatabir akir wairafih afa narauw ni’a’afiyih bay naa, harew tomayah bairi hinaa hinatom hinabikoko’aw wanawanan
40024050	veya naatu sumar so’oba’e nama’am kwanekwan ana orot ukwarin namatabir nan natit.
40024051	Naatu orot ukwarin nati ana akir wairafin boro nab narab ufun narauwatait, sabuw afa wanawanah rerekabih bairi baimakiy kakafin hinab hinama hinarerey wah takitak niwa’an.
40025001	“Nati ana veya’amaim mar ana aiwob itinin i boro baibitar nah ten biyah numin tabin boubun itinamih hai ramef hibow hinan na’atube.
40025002	Baibitar five i not wairafih, naatu baibitar five i men not wairafih.
40025003	Baibitar men not wairafih hai ramef hibow, baise karisin men ta hirirabar hibaimih.
40025004	Baibitar five not wairafih hai ramef hibow naatu kibubumaim karisin hirirbaren hibow auman hin.
40025005	Tabin boubun ana orot men saise na, baibitar isan hima hikakaif matah fot hi’inurir hi’in.”
40025006	“Fainaiwan sabuw fanah sibisib hinowar, ‘Tabin boubun ana orot enan kwana kwa’itin.’”
40025007	“Imaibo baibitar ten hi’inu’in himisir, hai ramef matah hibobaituturen naatu hito’aben.
40025008	Baibitar men not wairafih turahinah not wairafih isah hio, ‘A karisin turin kwaibaisi, aki ai ramef temomorob.’”
40025009	“Baise baibitar five not wairafih hiyafutih hio, ‘Men karam boro kwa turin anit naatu aki turin anab. Gewasin boro kwanan sabuw biyahimaim kwabo isa kwanatobon.’”
40025010	“Basit baibitar karisin tobonamih hinan ufut, tabin boubun ana orot natit, baibitar five hibobuna hima’am bairi hin tabin ana yasisir wanawanan hirun etawan hitufabon.”
40025011	“Men manin baibitar five hina hitit hi’afririy ‘Regah, Regah, etawan kubotawiy arun!’”
40025012	“Baise orot efatait eo, ‘Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab.’”
40025013	“Isan imih mata to niwa’an kwanama, anayabin veya o sumar men kwa so’ob, mar biy boro iti sawar hinamatar.”
40025014	“Maramaim mar ana aiwob itinin ta i iti na’atube. Orot ef yok bainanawan isan bobobunabuna ana veya; ana akir wairafih e’afih hina ana sawar kaifen isan faramih.
40025015	Hai so’ob ana fofoninamaim orot ta ana kabay 5,000 itin, orot ta 2,000, orot ta 1,000. Imaibo i ana nanawan busuruf in.
40025016	Akir wairafin 5,000 baib in banikamaim yari’iy in bowabow, 5,000 tafan hiya’abar bai.
40025017	Akir wairafin bairou’abin i na’atube sinaf. Kabay 2,000 bai in imaim ma bikukumiyaw 2,000 tafan hiya’abar bai.
40025018	Baise akir wairafin ta ana kabay 1,000 baib i mutufor in hub bai regah ana kabay hub iwan taunafut in.
40025019	“Hima manin maiyow, imaibo akir wairafih hai orot ukwarin matabir na tit, naatu hai bowabow nuteteyan itah.
40025020	Naatu akir wairafin kabay 5,000 baib na run ana regah nanamaim eo, ‘Regah o 5,000 itu, baise ayu abowabow tafanamaim 5,000 abaib i iti kubai.’”
40025021	“Regah iya’afut eo, ‘A merar ayiy, o i bowayan orot gewas naatu bosunusunubayan, bowabow gidigidih ibosunusunub kukakaifen gewas, imih boro anayara’ahi inayen sawar gagamih inakaifen. Kuna kurun au yasisir turin kubai!’
40025022	“Naatu akir wairafin bairou’abin kabay 2,000 baib na run eo, ‘Regah o a kabay 2,000 ibitu i iti, naatu abowabow tafanamaim 2,000 abaib i iti kubai.’
40025023	“Regah eo, ‘A merar ayiyi, o i bowayan orot gewas naatu bosunusunubayan, sawar matan ta ibosunusunub kukakaifen gewas. Imih boro anayara’ahi inayen sawar moumurihika inakaifen. Kuna kurun au yasisir turin kubai.’
40025024	“Imaibo akir wairafin baitonin kabay 1,000 baib na run eo, ‘Regah ayu aso’ob, o i a tur fokarin, turanah hai masaw o aribe kufafaur naatu turanah nowah o kutatanumabe kutaratar.
40025025	Imih ayu o isa abir. A kabay abai an hub agais aibun inu’in, iti abai ana abit maiye kwitin.’
40025026	“Ana Regah iya’afut eo, ‘O i orot kakaf nokonokow anababatun! O iso’ob, ayu i tebob nonowatih afafour naatu tetatanum nonowatih ataratar.
40025027	Gewasin au kabay banikamaim itayi ta’in tabowabow, ayu atanan, saise tafan hitaya’abar auman hitutu atab.’
40025028	“Naatu orot ukwarin eo, ‘Kabay iti orot umanamaim kwabosair kwabai kwan akir wairafin kabay 10,000 baib i kwaitin.
40025029	Anayabin orot yait uman ebi’e’etaw boro sawar tafan hinaya’abar moumurihika nabow isan nakaram. Baise orot yait uman nutanub ema’am biyanamaim sawar etei’imak boro hinabosairen.
40025030	Imih iti akir wairafin nukunukuwin kwabai kwan kwarauw ufun gugumin wanawanan ere, nati imaim nama narerey wan nayob nitafofofor.’
40025031	“Orot Natun ni’aiwob nanan ana maramaim ana tounamatar kakafiyih boro bairi hinan ana urama’am bonamanamarin tafan namare.
40025032	Naatu tafaram wanawanan sabuw tutufin etei boro hinaru’ay Jesu nanamaim hinabat. Imaibo i boro sabuw nakusib rou’ab hinamatar, nabatanenayan sheep naatu goat bairi ekukusibih na’atube.
40025033	Sheep i boro uman ana asukwafune hinabat naatu goat boro uman ana beyawane hinabat.”
40025034	“Imaibo aiwob orot boro sabuw uman ana asukwafune isah nao, ‘Kwa i Tamai ebigegewasini, kwana mar ana aiwob nowamih kwabai. Anayabin tafaram matara’e ana veya God kwa isa yabuna.
40025035	Ayu bayumih amomorob bay kwaitu, sikau mamamah harew kwaitu atom, abinanawan au merar kwayi a baremaim ama ra’at ama.
40025036	Segar ama’am faifuw kwaitu aus, asawow ainu’in, kwakaifu naatu dibur bar ama’am kwana kwainanawanu.’”
40025037	“Sabuw gewasih boro hiniya’afut hinao, ‘Regah mar biyika bayumih imomorob ai’it bay ait, o sika mamamah harew ait itom?
40025038	Naatu biyika inanawan inan ai’it a merar ayiy abuwi ai sebomaim imara’at? O segar ima’am faifuw ait ius?
40025039	Naatu mar biyika isawow inu’in akaifi, o dibur bar ima’ama ainanawani?’”
40025040	“Aiwob orot boro niyafutih nao, ‘Anababatun au’uwi, nati ana veya’amaim ayu taitu gidigidih isah kwasisinaf, i ayu isau kwasinaf.’”
40025041	“Imaibo sabuw ana beyawane hinabatabat isah boro nao, ‘Biyau’umaim kwatit sa’ab kwan. Kwa i orarafen wanawanan kwarun, Demon Mowan ana tounamatar bairi isah wairaf wanatowan hibobogaigiwas kwan imaim kwarun bairi e’arahi.
40025042	Ayu aa amomorob, men abisa ta kwaitu aan, sikau mamamah harew men kwaitu atom.
40025043	Ai nanawan anan men au merar kwayi a sebomaim amara’at. Segar ama’am faifuw men kwaitu ausimih, a sawow ainu’in, o dibur baremaim ama’am men kwana kwainanawanu.’”
40025044	“Naatu i boro hiniya’afut hinao, ‘Regah, mar biyika o aa imomorob, o harewamih sika mamamah, o ibinanawan, o segar ima’am, o isawow inu’in, o dibur bar ima’am men aibaisimih?’”
40025045	“Imaibo i boro niyafutih nao, ‘Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu taitu gidigidih men kwabibaisih, nati i men kwakok ayu kwatibaisu.’”
40025046	“Naatu nati sabuw i boro hinan ma’ama wanatowan ana baimakiy hinab. Baise sabuw gewasih boro hinan yawas ma’ama wanatowan hinab hinama hiniyasisir.”
40026001	Jesu bi’obaibiyih ufunamaim, ana bai’ufununayah isah eo,
40026002	“Kwanaso’ob veya rou’ab ufunamaim Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw enan. Nati ana veya’amaim Orot Natun boro hinab rakit sabuw umahimaim hinayai hina’onaf.”
40026003	Imaibo Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in etei firis gagamin Kaiafas ana baremaim hiru’ay.
40026004	Naatu Jesu wa’iwa’iramaim fatumin bain asabunin isan hiyakitifuw.
40026005	Baise hio, “Men hiyuw tanabowabow wanawananamaim, anayabin rakit boro tanaku’ub was hinagiy.”
40026006	Jesu na Bethany orot Simon biyan kokom ani’anin ana baremaim tit,
40026007	mare ma bay eaa auman babin ta kibub kikimin kabay wabin alabaster imaim hikwak raiy ana baiyan gagamin hisuwai batabat bai na run Jesu aribun yan isuwai re.
40026008	Ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin yah so’ar hio, “Iti sawar i yabin en asir esisinaf.
40026009	Igewasin iti raiy ana baiyan tatayara’ah hitatubun kabay tatab, sabuw yababan wairafih tatitih.”
40026010	Baise Jesu so’ob abisa hio, imih iuwih eo, “Babin men yumatanamaim kwana’umih. Anayabin sawar gewasin maiyow ayu isau esisinaf.
40026011	Sabuw yababan wairafih boro mar etei bairi kwanama kwanibaisih, baise ayu i boro men mar etei bairi tanama’amih.
40026012	Iti babin ayu biyau raiy erabirab i ayu au morob isan eyayabuna.
40026013	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, tafaram wanawananamaim iti Tur Gewasin hinabibinan ana maramaim abisa gewasin iti babin sisinaf boro kik owe’owen na’atube auman hinabinan.”
40026014	Imaibo bai’ufununayah nah 12 wanawanahimaim orot wabin Judas Iscariot tit in firis ukwarih biyah tit,
40026015	naatu ibatiyih, “Ayu Jesu anab kwa anabit boro abisa ayu kwanitu?” Naatu matanamaim kabay hibotait hiyab in 30 na’atube hiya’asair.
40026016	Nati ana veya’amaim Judas ef ana gewasin nuwet Jesu batih isan.
40026017	Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw veya wantoro’ot bubusuruf, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina hio, “Menamaim kukokok Tar Nowaten ana bay anabogaigiwas?”
40026018	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanan Jerusalem bar merar kwanatit orot iti ana tur kwana’owen kwanao, ‘Bai’obaiyenayan eo, ayu au veya i natit, akokok au bai’ufununayah bairi boro o abaremaim Tar nowaten ana hiyuw anaa aniyasisir.’”
40026019	Bai’ufununayah Jesu eobaimanih na’atube hisinaf, Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw hibogaigiwas.
40026020	Naatu nati rabirab bai’ufununayah etei 12 Jesu bairi himare hibusuruf bay hiaa.
40026021	Bay hiaa wanawananamaim Jesu eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, kwa wanawanamaim orot ta boro babau inao anamorob.”
40026022	Ana bai’ufununayah hai yababan ra’at, naatu ta’ita’imon hibusuruf Jesu hibabatiy hio, “Regah, nati i men ayu’umih?”
40026023	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot menatan ayu airi tew wanawanan ai rafiy anabubutu’ub, nati orot i boro ayu babau nao.
40026024	Orot Natun i boro namorob Bukamaim hikirum hio na’atube. Baise orot yait ayu babau nao, nati orot i boro yababan gagamin na’in nab. Gewasin nati orot tafaramamaim men tatufuwamih!”
40026025	Judas yanuwayan Jesu ibatiy eo, “Regah, o kunotanot i men ayu’umih?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “O wai.”
40026026	Bay hia wanawanan Jesu rafiy bai, i gegewasin sawar, imasib, ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Iti i ayu biyau kwabai naatu kwa’aan.”
40026027	Imaibo wine kerowasamaim hisuwai batabat bai God ana merar yi sawar, itih eo, “Kwa etei’imak iti kwanatom.
40026028	Iti i ayu au rara, au Obaibasit Boubun abisuwai sabuw moumurih hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.
40026029	A tur ao’owen, ayu iti wine boro men anatom, anama’am nati ana veya’amaim wine boubun kwa bairit Tamai ana aiwobomaim tanatom.”
40026030	Naatu himisir ew ta hitabor hitit hin Olive Oyawamaim hitit.
40026031	Imaibo Jesu hai tur eowen eo, “Iti boun gugumin kwa etei boro kwanabihir ayu kwanihamiyu, Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, ‘Ayu nabatanenayan orot boro ana’asabun, naatu bobaituw etei boro na’abaragiy nanabin hinan.’
40026032	Baise ayu morobone anamimisir ufunamaim boro au na ani’iyon wan anan Galilee anatit.”
40026033	Peter iya’afut eo, “Turau’unah boro hinabihir, baise ayu boro men anabihir o anihamiyimih.”
40026034	Jesu Peter iu, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, boun gugumin o boro ayu inayaubu mar tounu, naatu i ufunamaim kokorere boro nao’o inanowar.”
40026035	Peter raro’on rab eo, “Ayu boro men kafa’imo tur nati ana’omih, morobomih na’at airit tanamorob.” Naatu bai’ufununayah etei tur ta’imon hio.
40026036	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hitit hin Gethsemane hitit naatu iuwih eo, “Iti imaim kwamare kwama, ayu anan auweyane anayoyoban.”
40026037	Peter naatu Zebedee natunatun rou’ab buwih bairi hin, ana not kwaris naatu dogoron wanawanan ana yababan ra’at
40026038	iuwih eo, “Dogorou wanawanan au yababan i ra’at kwanekwan dogorou emama’afut. Imih iti’imaim kwamare mata nanuw bairit tanama.”
40026039	Jesu akisinamo nabinamaim in yumatan au babe ra’iy yoyoban eo, “Tamai, karam iti biyababan ana kerowas ayu biyau’umaim itabosair, baise men ayu au kok, o a kok.”
40026040	Naatu matabir maiye na ana bai’ufununayah nah tounu hi’inu’in itih, Peter isan eo, “Anayabin aisim nataunu’uka mata hifot kwa’inu’in, karam one hour na’atube mata tanuw bairit tatama?
40026041	Mata to iwa’an kwayoyoban, saise men routobon kwanabaimih. Anun i ekokok yoyoban, baise biya i himorob.”
40026042	Mar bairou’abin Jesu in maiye yoyoban eo, “Tamai, iti biyababan ana kerowas bosairin isan ana ef men nama’am na’at, basit anatom, saise a kokok anasinaf namatar.”
40026043	Matabir maiye nan matah kou bit hi’in yugaranih inan itih.
40026044	Naatu ihamiyih hi’in i mar baitonin matabir in tur ta’imon eo yoyoban maiye.
40026045	Imaibo matabir na ana bai’ufununayah biyah tit eo, “Kwa boro’ika kwa’in kwabiyarir? Mata tinuw, kwamisir, Orot Natun ana veya i natit, sabuw kakafih umahimaim eyey.
40026046	Kwamisir tan! Orot yanuwayanaban iti enan kwa’i’itin.”
40026047	Jesu eo ana tur sawara’e, bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta, wabin Judas, sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in, firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in hibiyafarih nawiyih kaiy, kefat, mis hiteten auman bairi hina hitit.
40026048	Orot yanuwayan sabuw eobaimanih eo, “Orot menatan anamamamay orotoban nati kwanab kwanafatum.”
40026049	Judas mutufor in Jesu biyan tit eo, “Tufuw isa nama Bai’obaiyenayan!” * naatu mamay.
40026050	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Au begon, abisa isan inot inan saife kusinaf.” Imaibo sabuw hibatabat hitit Jesu uman hibai hibukikin.
40026051	Bai’ufununayan orot ta ana kaiy bora’ah, firis gagamin ana akir wairafin tainin roun eafuw.
40026052	Naatu Jesu iu, “A kaiy ana efanamaim kwiwan maiye, anayabin sabuw iyab umahimaim kaiy tema’am boro kaiyomaim hinamorob.
40026053	O men iso’obamih, ayu Tamai isan atabifefeyan boro mar ta’imon tounamatar sibisib na’atube tiyafarih ayu hitawasfafaru.
40026054	Baise nati na’atube anasinaf, Buk Atamaninamaim mataramih hi’o hikikirum boro men niturobe’emih.”
40026055	Naatu tatabir sabuw isah eo, “Ana itinin ayu bainowan mowan na’atube, imih kaiy kefat kwaiteten ayu yuwu rabu’umih kwanan. Mar etei Tafaror Bar wanawananamaim ama sabuw abi’obaiyih aisim men imaim kwatafatumu?
40026056	Baise abisa God ana dinab oro’orot Buk Atamaninamaim hio hikikirum emamatar saife nan niturobe.” Nati’imaim ana bai’ufununayah etei hihamiy hibihir.
40026057	Sabuw Jesu hibai hifatum hibai hin firis gagamin wabin Kaiafas ana baremaim hitit, nati’imaim Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in hiru’ay hima’am.
40026058	Baise Peter yokaika Jesu i’ufunun bairi hina, firis gagamin ana bar sebosebomaim hitit naatu run ma’utenayan oro’orot bairi himare abisa tamamatar ta’itin isan.
40026059	Firis gagamin naatu kaniser ana kau’ay etei hiru’ay nuhinot tur hitabow hitit hitifufuwen Jesu tamorob isan.
40026060	Baise nuhinot tur hinunuwet men ta hibai. Sabuw moumurih maiyow hitit Jesu morobomih hibifufuwen hai tur naniyan en. Yomaninamaim orot rou’ab hitit,
40026061	hiorereb hio “Iti orot eo, ‘Ayu i karam God ana Tafaror bar anagurus nare, naatu veya tounu wanawanan boro anawowab efanin namatar.’”
40026062	Imaibo Firis gagamin misir Jesu isan eo, “O boro men tur ta inao? Orot hairi o a tur isan hio’orereb inonowar boro tur ta inao ai en?”
40026063	Baise Jesu awanamaim men tur ta titamih. Naatu Firis gagamin eo maiye, “God wanatowan ma’anin wabinamaim aobaifaro, o God ana Roubinen orot na’at basit kuo anowar.”
40026064	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Tur i nati kuo, baise kwa etei a tur ao’owen. Mar boro nanan orot Natun boro God uman ana asukwafune nabat mar ana rofom wanawanan nanan kwana’itin.”
40026065	Firis gagamin iti tur nonowar ana veya ana faifuw bai sib eo, “Iti orot i tur kakafin maiyow eo God ebi’ib! Aisim boro tanama sif rubonayah afa’abo tananuwet? Kwa taiyuw bai’ib tur eo kwanowar,
40026066	kwa a not i mi’itube?” Etei hiya’afut hio, “I bowabow kakafin sinaf imih namorob!”
40026067	Imaibo yumatan hikwaitututur, hiborabirab naatu sabuw afa hiboborabirab,
40026068	hio, “Keriso, o God ana dinab orot na’at kuo anowar! Yait o rab?”
40026069	Peter ufun bar ana seboseb wanawanan mare ma’am, Firis Gagamin ana bowayan babitai tit iu, “O auman i Galilee orot Jesu ana of ta.”
40026070	Baise Peter sabuw etei nahimaim yaub eo, “Ayu o a tur kuo yabin men aso’ob.”
40026071	Naatu misir tit in bar ana etawan awanamaim tit, nati’imaim bowayan babitai ta itin naatu oro’orot nati’imaim hibatabat hai tur eowen eo, “Iti orot i Jesu Nazareth mowan ana of ta.”
40026072	Peter iban maiye yaub naatu ifaro eo, “Ayu nati orot men aso’ob.”
40026073	Hima kafa’imo orot afa nati’imaim hibatabat hina Peter biyan hitit hio, “O i anababatun ni’i orot ana of ta, anayabin a tur kuo ana nowarin naatu a sawar io’osen ana itinin i ta’imon.”
40026074	Imaibo Peter ifaro eo, “Ana bifufuwen na’at God ana orarafen anab, tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu iti orot men aso’ob.” Mar ta’imon kokorere eo.
40026075	Basit Peter nuhin taseb Jesu eo not, “O boro mar tounu ayu inayaubu, imaibo kokorere boro nao.” Naatu Peter tit in ufun rerey igagagamat.
40027001	Maraumanika Firis ukwarih etei naatu regaregah ai’in bairi Jesu morob isan hio hiyabunai sawar.
40027002	Basit uman hifatum hibai hitit Roman hai gawan Pilate umanamaim hiyai.
40027003	Judas, yanuwayan Jesu kakafinamaim hiya’iyai i’itin ana veya dogoron rusib, kabay 30 bai matabir na Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in nahimaim tit, eo
40027004	“Ayu asinaf kakaf orot gewasin baban ao emomorob.” Hiya’afut hio, “Nati o a yababan, o akisimo ina’itin inayabunai.”
40027005	Judas kabay nati Tafaror Bar kabay teya’aya’amaim itaiy re naatu ihamiyih tit in sikan warasa yai morob.
40027006	Firis ukwarih kabay hibai hio, “Iti i rara ana kabay, ata ofafar men ebibasit boro Tafaror Bar ana kabay ya’aya’amaim tanayai na’in.”
40027007	Etei’imak hio hibibasit ufunamaim, kabay hibai noukwat bu’urayan ana kamar hitubun, saise nah touman sabuw hai rah ana efan namatar.
40027008	Ana’an nati isan kamar wabin “Rara ana Kamar” hibiwab in na iti boun ana veya tit.
40027009	Naatu abistan dinab orot Jeremiah eo ina iturobe. “Israel sabuw orot ana baiyan baitinin isan kabay etei 30 hibibasit.
40027010	Noukwat bu’urayan ana kamar hitubun Regah ayu iu’uwu na’atube.” *
40027011	Jesu Roman gawan nanamaim bat, naatu gawan Jesu ibatiy, “O Jews sabuw hai aiwob?” Jesu iya’afut eo. “Nati kuo, ayu boro abi tur anao.”
40027012	Firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in Jesu ubar hitin tur kakafin isan hio men kafa’imo iyafutimih.
40027013	Basit Pilate Jesu iu, “Sabuw kakafih isan ubar hit teo’orereb kunonowar?”
40027014	Baise Jesu men kafa’imo awanamaim tur ta tit, naatu Gawan orot ana kasiy ra’at ifofofor men kafaita.
40027015	Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya, gawan hai binanakwar eo na’atube, mar etei dibur barane sabuw hai kok orot menatan tirurubin i ebobotait.
40027016	Nati ana veya orot wabin gagamin Jesu Barabas dibur ma’am.
40027017	Naatu sabuw hiru’ay sawar, basit Pilate ibatiyih, “Orot menatan kwakokok diburune anabotait, Jesu Barabas o Jesu Keriso?”
40027018	Anayabin sabuw bobowenamaim Jesu hibai Pilate umanamaim hiya’iyai i so’ob.
40027019	Pilate baibabatiyen ana efanamaim ma’am, aawan tur iyafar na eo, “Orot nati gewasin isan men abisa ta inasinaf, anayabin fai ayu mim fokarin maiyow isan amim au not ekakasiy”
40027020	Baise firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in sabuw tafah fair hiyai, Barabas botaitin naatu Jesu asabunin isan Pilate hiokikin.
40027021	Pilate sabuw ibatiyih, “Orot i rou’ab, imih orot menatan kwakokok ana botait?” Etei’imak hiya’afut hio, “Barabas!”
40027022	Pilate sabuw ibatiyih, “Bo Jesu wabin Keriso isan boro mi’itube anasinaf?” Etei’imak hiya’afut hio, “Ku’onaf!”
40027023	Pilate ibatiyih, “Abisa kakafin sinaf?” Baise sabuw hitar koukuw hio, “Ku’onaf!”
40027024	Pilate naniyan bai men karam boro ef ta tasinaf, naatu sabuw auman kougeyagey hibusuruf, imih harew bai sabuw etei nahimaim uman sauwen eo, “Ayu iti orot namomorob isan men ana ubar anabaimih. Nati i kwa akis a ubar.”
40027025	Sabuw etei hiya’afut hio, “I namomorob ana ubar i aki anab naatu natunatu auman ana ubar hinab.”
40027026	Imaibo Pilate Barabas botait, naatu Jesu wabir ana baiyowayah iuwih, onafin isan hibai hin.
40027027	Imaibo Pilate ana baiyowayah Jesu hibai hin gawan ana bar hitit, nati’imaim baiyowayah etei hiru’ay hibebera’uh.
40027028	Ana faifuw hi’oromen, faifuw namar hibai hi’us,
40027029	kokor hififin ukwarin ana raramamih hiyara’ah, uman ana asukwafune tu hitin, nanamaim suh hiyowen hi’i’iyab hio, “Jews hai aiwob tanabora’ara’ah.”
40027030	Yumatan hikwaitututur, uman tu hibosair ukwarinamaim hiborabirab.
40027031	Hibi’i’iyab ufunamaim, faifuw hi’us ma’am hibosair ana faifuw hibow hina hi’us, imaibo hibai hin onafin isan.
40027032	Hitit hinan efamaim Sairini orot wabin Simon bairi hitar naatu baiyowayah hi’ukikin Jesu ana onaf bai e’abar.
40027033	Hina efan wabin Golgotha imaim hitit, nati efan hibiwab yabin efan ana itinin i orot ukwarin ana gifow na’atube.
40027034	Nati’imaim wine harew tenakuyakuy * auman hisartabir Jesu tomanih hitin bai kakartubun ufunamaim kwahir.
40027035	Naatu hi’o’onaf ana veya arowamaim ana faifuw hikusib hifaram hibow.
40027036	Imaibo nati’imaim himarir Jesu hima’uh hima.
40027037	Naatu tafanamaim ubar hibitin ana tur hikirum hikubar, “ITI I JESU, JEW SABUW HAI AIWOB.”
40027038	Naatu bainowan orot rou’ab Jesu bairi hi’onafih, ta ana beyawane ta ana asukwafune.
40027039	Sabuw nanane hinan ukwarih hita’asi’asiy ubar hitin tur kakafih maiyow Jesu hi’i’iyab hio,
40027040	“Tafaror bar tarabounin veya tounu wanawananamaim wowabin sawaramih io! Bo o God Natun na’at kwiyawasi cross afe’enane kure’eban a’it?”
40027041	Ef ta’imon firis ukwarih, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in auman Jesu hi’i’iyab hio,
40027042	“Sabuw afa iyawasih, baise i taiyuwin men karam boro niyawas, Israel sabuw hai aiwob! Bo cross afe’enane boun nare tana itin boro tanitumitum.
40027043	God i bitumitum, bo God boun iyawasiban ta’itin, anayabin i taiyuwin i God Natun rouw eo.”
40027044	Ef ta’imon bainowah orot rou’ab Jesu bairi hi’onafih hi’inu’in ubar hitin tur kakafih hi’u.
40027045	Veya yen tafat yan tafaram etei gugum inu’in veya botabir re 3 korok bai.
40027046	Veya 3 korok na’atube, Jesu fanan aumetawat rerey eo, “ Eloi, Eloi Lema Sabachthani? ” Anayabin, “Au God, au God, aisim ihamiyu?”
40027047	Sabuw afa nati’imaim hibatabat hinowar hio, “Elijah isan eafa’af kwanowar.”
40027048	Naatu orot ta nunuw in sawar ta biyan sou’usau bai, wine tenakuyakuy butu’ub, eot ra’ah Jesu awanamaim yai tomamih.
40027049	Baise sabuw afa hio, “Kubat, Elijah nan nabiyawas tana’itin!”
40027050	Jesu iban maiye fanan aumetawat rerey, naatu ayubin tabaratait.
40027051	Faifuw Tafaror Bar wanawanan hita’iy re efan kakafiyin hirafut inu’in yate rusib re in uran tit rou’ab himatar, iriyoy tit kabay hitaseseb.
40027052	Rah awah hiha’e, sabuw kakafiyih moumurih na’in marasika himorob hi’inu’in etei hiyawas himisir.
40027053	Hai rah hitumaren hitit, Jesu morobone mimisir ufunamaim, murumurubih etei hitit hin Jerusalem hitit, sabuw moumurih na’in hi’itih.
40027054	Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarih naatu baiyowayah afa bairi nati’imaim Jesu hima’uh hima’am iriyoy hitatam, naatu abisa’awat himamatar hi’itah hai bir ra’at hio, “Turobe iti orot i anababatun God Natun!”
40027055	Nati’imaim baibin moumurih na’in hina ef yokaika hibat abisa’awat himamatar hi’itah. Iti baibin i Galilee’ine Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hina hibibais.
40027056	Baibin wanawanahimaim i Mary Magdalene, Mary, James, Joseph hairi hinah naatu Zebedee aawan.
40027057	Birabirab auman orot sawar wairafin, wabin Joseph ana tafaram Arimathea’ane na tit. Iti orot i Jesu ana bai’ufununayan ta, baise wa’iwa’iramaim bi’ufununun.
40027058	Joseph na Pilate nanamaim tit, Jesu biyan bai na ya’in isan fefeyan, naatu Pilate ana baiyowayah uwih Jesu biyan hibai hitin.
40027059	Joseph, Jesu biyan bai faifuw boubunamaim sum
40027060	bai in hub boubun i isan iti boro’omo to naiwanamaim bai inu’in, imaim Jesu yai naatu kabay ifururuw na sou hir naatu ana ubar in.
40027061	Mary Magdalene naatu Mary, James, Joseph hairi hinah i rah rewan rounane himare hima hi’itin.
40027062	Mar natot i boro Sabbath ana veya, imih Firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee hina Pilate nanamaim hitit
40027063	hio, “Regah ni’i orot baifufuwenayan yawasin ma’am eo, ‘Ayu boro veya tounu ufunamaim morobone anamisir.’ Iti na’atube eo i aki anotanot.
40027064	Isan imih akokok baiyowayah afa iniyafarih hinan rah hinama’uh hinama veya tounu, saise ana bai’ufununayah boro men hinan biyan hinabain hinabihir, naatu morobone misir maiye hinarouw hinao sabuw hinifuwihimih. Anayabin baifuwen iti boun natitit boro kakafin anababatun men wan anabifuwen na’atube’emih.”
40027065	Pilate iyafutih eo, “Ma’utenayah orot kwa aso’obamaim kwanabuwih naatu kwana’uwih matah toniwa’an rah hinama’uh gewas hinama.”
40027066	Basit hitit hin rah ana etawan kabay tafanamaim kwah hiyai, naatu ma’utenayah orot nati’imaim rah hima’uh hima.
40028001	Sabbath ufunamaim, Sunday yasi’uw Mary Magdalene naatu Mary ta hairi rah fahiwinamih hin.
40028002	Naniyan meyemeye iriyoy gagamin na’in hitatam, Regah ana tounamatar marane re na agim ifururuw tit naatu afe’en mara’at ma.
40028003	Ana itinin i namanamar ebowabow na’atube, ana faifuw hibikwes itinin i wakasakas na’atube.
40028004	Orot rah hima’uh hima’am hai bir ra’at, ah umah duduwar rab hire himamayay hi’in.
40028005	Baise tounamatar baibin hairi isah eo, “Men kwanabir, ayu aso’ob kwa i Jesu hio’onaf momorob kwanunuwih.
40028006	Baise i morobone misir maiye, eo kwanonowar na’atube, kwarun inu’in ana efan kwa’i’itin.
40028007	Saise kwanamatabir kwan ana bai’ufununayah hai tur kwana’owen, ‘Jesu i morobone misir maiye, naatu mat au Galilee enan, imaim boro kwana’itin.’ Abisa asoso’ob iti a tur ao’owen.”
40028008	Basit baibin rah hitumar, hai bir ra’at, baise erekawasa auman hinunuw hin ana bai’ufununayah hai tur owenamih.
40028009	Naniyan meyemeye Jesu nahine nan bairi hitar naatu iuwih eo, “Tufuw isa nama.” Hinunuw hina nanamaim suh hiyowen hire an hibutubun hikwafir.
40028010	Jesu iuwih eo, “Men kwanabir, kwan taitu hai tur kwana’owen hinan Galilee imaim boro ayu hina’itu.”
40028011	Baibin hairi himatabir efamaim hinan, baiyowayah orot afa rah hima’uh hima’ama himatabir hin Jerusalem hitit, naatu abisa’awat himamatar firis ukwarih hai tur hi’owen.
40028012	Naatu nati’imaim firis hai ukwarih orot gagamih bairi hiku’ay hai not hiyabuna sawar, imaibo agim gagamin na’in baiyowayah hitih
40028013	naatu hi’uwih, sabuw hai tur kwana’owen, “Aki ainu’in ufut Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hibai hibihir.
40028014	Saise gawan orot iti tur nanonowar aki boro kwa isa anakubuna gewas nanowar naatu boro men abisa ta isa nasinaf.”
40028015	Basit baiyowayah agim hibai hiobe’atih na’atube hisinaf. Imih iti boun ana veya’amaim iti tur i ra’at tasasar tit, Jews wanawanahimaim etei hiso’ob.
40028016	Imaibo bai’ufununayah nah 11 Jesu iu’uwih na’atube hina Galilee oyawamaim hitit,
40028017	nati’imaim hi’i’itin ana weya hikwafir, baise bai’ufununayah afa i erehikasiy auman.
40028018	Jesu na sisibihimaim bat eo, “Mar naatu tafaram ana roubabaruwen fair etei God ayu itu.
40028019	Isan imih kwanatit kwanan tafaram wanawananamaim sabuw kwanabow au bai’ufununayah hinamatar, naatu God Tamah, God Natun, God Anunin Kakafiyin wabihimaim babataito kwanitih.
40028020	Naatu au obaiyunen tur etei kwani’obaiyih hinabosiyasiyar. Naatu kwanaso’ob ayu i mar etei nati biyamaim boro bairi tanama tanan mar yomanin tanatit.”
41001001	Iti i Tur Gewasin ana busurufin i Jesu Keriso God Natun isan.
41001002	Ana tur i dinab orot Isaiah kikirum imaim busuruf eo. “‘Ayu boro au tur abarayan o namaim aniyun nan, i boro o a ef nayabuna.’
41001003	Orot ta fanan arar yanamaim eafa’af, ‘Regah ana ef kwanayabuna ana ef kwanimutufur imaim naremor!’”
41001004	John arar yanane tit na dogor baikitabir bapataito bain, saise God bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan binan.
41001005	Judea bar merar tutufin etei naatu Jerusalem sabuw tutufin etei hitit hin biyan hitit. Hai kakafih hi’e’en naatu Jordan harewamaim bapataito itih.
41001006	John ana faifuw i camel bunibunin sakir iyoun, naatu ana kikir i bobaituw ta kanabin e’afuw naiwan kik, ana bay i sisik naatu kutor tafu.
41001007	Ana tur i iti binan, “Orot ta ayu ufu’umaim enan ana fair i ra’at ayu natabiru, an ana sumasum ayu men karam boro ana kwafure anarufam.
41001008	Ayu i harewamaim bapataito abit, baise i boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito nit.”
41001009	Nati ana veya’amaim tafaram gagamin Galilee wanawanan bar merar Nazarethane Jesu na Jordan harewamaim John bapataito itin.
41001010	Jesu harewane yey ana maramaim, mar botawiy, Anun Kakafiyin mamu imak na’atube re na tafan yey itin.
41001011	Naatu maramaim orot fanan tit eo, “O i ayu Natu, ayu Natu au yabow, o isa ayu abiyasisir.”
41001012	Mar ta’imonamo Anun Kakafiyin iunawiy arar yan tit.
41001013	Veya 40 na’atube imaim ma, Satan routobon itin. Sigarafor yumatah ta ta wanawanahimaim, naatu tounamatar nati’imaim i hina hitatafafar.
41001014	John dibur hiyayari’iy ufunamaim Jesu na Galilee tit, naatu God ana tur gewasin binan eo,
41001015	“Veya anababatun i na tit, God ana aiwob i na iyubin, bowabow kakafin kwasisinaf i kwanihamiyen kwanamatabir tur gewasin kwanitumitum!”
41001016	Naatu Jesu harew Galilee kukuf dones yan remor inan, siy bowayah orot rou’ab itih, Simon Peter tain Andrew hairi buwatamaim siy hibowabow.
41001017	Jesu iuwih eo, “Kwai’ufnunu bairi tan ayu boro ani’obaiyi sabuw kwanabow.”
41001018	Mar ta’imonamo hai buwat hihamiyen naatu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
41001019	In kikiminamo orot rou’ab itih, James tain John hairi, orot Zebedee natunatun, hai wa wanawanan hima hai buwat hiyayabuna.
41001020	Jesu e’afa’af ana veya hairi matah kabiy himisir tamah Zebedee ana bowabow sabuw bairi wa afe’en hihamiyih hima, i Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
41001021	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hina tafaram Capernaum hitit, naatu Baiyarir ana veya na Kou’ay Bar run naatu busuruf i’obaiyih eo.
41001022	Sabuw hinonowar hifofofor men kafaita. Anayabin bai’obaiyen bitih ana itinin i roubabaruwen ana fairamaim bi’obaiyih, men Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah na’atube’emih.
41001023	Men yok afiy kakafin * orot iwanasum ma’am na Kou’ay Bar run ikirir eo,
41001024	“Jesu Nazareth mowan, aki biyai’imaim o abisa sinafumih kukokok? O kukokok aki inagurusi’imih? Ayu aso’ob o i yait, O i God ana Orot Kakafiyin!”
41001025	Jesu afiy kakafin kwarar iu, “Awa efot orot biyanamaim kutit!”
41001026	Afiy kakafin orot iyuwiyuw naatu fanan auman bihir tit.
41001027	Sabuw etei hifofofor men kafaita naatu taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti anayabin i abisa? Bai’obaiyen boubun roubabaruwen ana fair auman, anayabin afiy kakafih eo biyunih i fanan tebaib!”
41001028	Naatu Jesu ana tur saisewat tasasar tit tafaram Galilee ana uman men sanet hima’am eretei tur hinowar.
41001029	Kou’ay Bar hibihamiy ufunamaim James, John hairi mutufor hin Simon Andrew hairi hai bar hitit.
41001030	Simon rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab inu’in Jesu na titit ana veya ana tur hi’owen,
41001031	Naatu na biyan tit uman bai ibais misir, nati’imaim sawow ihamiy busuruf bow. *
41001032	Nati rabirab veya re’er auman sabuw sawusawuwih naatu afa demon hitarsumih hima’am hibuwih hina Jesu isan.
41001033	Sabuw nati bar merar hima’am etei hiru’ay nati bar nanamaim,
41001034	Jesu sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hinan etei iyawasih naatu demon moumurih nunih hitit, men ibasit boro demon tihamiyih tur hitao, anayabin i hiso’ob i yait.
41001035	Mar tomih ana gugumin iu’ufiy auman Jesu misir bar ihamiy tit remor in bar merar gagamin natabir na efan noutanubinamaim tit imaim ma yoyoban.
41001036	Baise Simon ana ofonah bairi hitit hinuwih hin.
41001037	Naatu hititita’urih ana veya hi’u, “Sabuw o tenunuwihi.”
41001038	Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “It tanan bar merar afa iti bar merar gagamin sisibinamaim auman isah anabinan, anayabin nati isan ayu ana.”
41001039	Imih Galilee wanawanan etei remor hai Kou’ay Baremaim binan naatu demon kakafih nunih hitit.
41001040	Orot biyan kokom ani’anin na Jesu nanamaim tit sun yowen baibaisin isan ifefeyan eo, “Inakokok na’at basit iniwa’an anigewasin.”
41001041	Jesu dogoron wanawanan yababan awan karatan uman ru’atayan naatu biyan butubun eo, “Ayu akokok. Kwigewasin!”
41001042	Mar ta’imonamo orot biyan kokom hihururuwih hire naatu igewasin.
41001043	Baise Jesu ana baimatnuwen tur fokarinaka orot iu naatu biyafar eo,
41001044	“Inanowar men yait ta ana tur ina’owen, baise mutufor inan firis biyan inatit o biya nanutitiy, naatu Moses eo na’atube sibor inayai, saise orot babin matahimaim hinaso’ob o igewasin.”
41001045	Baise orot tit in busuruf tur bosemor tafaram etei bai. I ana turamaim Jesu men karam boro bebeyan tan bar merar tarun, imih i efan noutanubinamaim ma, baise sabuw efan ta ta i boro’ika hina biyan hititit.
41002001	Veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Jesu matabir maiye na ana bar Capernaum titit ana veya, ana tur tasasar tit etei hinowar.
41002002	Naatu sabuw moumurih maiyow hiru’ay bar awan karatan tit in etawan awan auman bai daririr iwa’an. Naatu i busuruf binan hima hinowar.
41002003	Nati ana maramaim orot kwafe’en turan an uman murubin hi’abar Jesu isan hina.
41002004	Baise rou’ay gagamin orot bain run isan men karam, imih orot hibai hiyen Jesu batabat tafanamaim faifiy wan hitarayouw. Naatu orot ana emo’em auman murabamaim hiruru ra’iy.
41002005	Naatu Jesu hai baitumatum i’itin ana maramaim orot an uman murubin isan eo, “Natu a bowabow kakafih anotanotawiyen.”
41002006	Nati’imaim Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa hima’am hai notamaim hibabatiyih hio,
41002007	“Orot aisim iti na’atube eo’o? Iti i baigigimen tur, God akisinamo bowabow kakafih enotanotawiyen, men yait ta.”
41002008	Abisa isan hinotanot Jesu mar ta’imon so’ob, naatu eo, “Aisim nati na’atube kwanotanot?
41002009	Menatan i hamehamen? Orot an uman murubin ana abowabow kakafih notawiyen isan ana’o i hamehamen? Ai, anau ana ir nanu nab nanan i hamehamen?
41002010	Baise ani’obaiyi kwanaso’ob, Orot Natun iti tafaramamaim ana fair i ema’ama bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.” Naatu orot an uman murubin isan eo,
41002011	“Ayu au’uwi, kumisir a ir kunu kubai au bar kwen!”
41002012	Inu’in misir, ana ir tensamur bai nu nah yan foun hibat hi’itin remor tit in, nati’imaim sabuw etei hifofofor men kafaita naatu God hibora’ara’ah hio, “Aki sawar iti na’atube men a’itin!”
41002013	Jesu matabir na Galilee harew kukuf rewanamaim tit, rou’ay gagamin isan hina naatu i busuruf i’obaibiyih.
41002014	Nati’imaim remor inan kabay o’onayan Levi, Alpheus natun ana bowabow efanamaim ma’am itin isan eo, “Ayu kwi’ufnunu.” Levi misir Jesu i’ufunun hairi hin.
41002015	Nati ufunamaim Jesu Levi ana bar wanawanan kabay o’onayah naatu bowabow kakafih sinafuyah moumurih maiyow Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan ana bai’ufununayah bairi himare bay hi’aa, naatu sabuw kakafih afa moumurih maiyow auman hibi’ufunun.
41002016	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah iyab Pharisee ana kou’ayamaim hima’ama hi’itin hina ana bai’ufununayah hibatiyih, “Aisim sabuw nati na’atube bairi te’aa?”
41002017	Jesu nowar naatu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw aurih sawow en adanafur orot boro men hinakok, baise sabuw iyab sawusawuwih adanafur orot boro hinakok. Ayu men sabuw gewasih isah anamih, baise kakafih isah.”
41002018	Veya ta John Baptist ana bai’ufununayah naatu Pharisee bairi hiyoyohar isan, sabuw afa hina Jesu biyan hitit hibatiy, “Aisim John Baptist ana bai’ufununayah naatu Pharisee hai bai’ufununayah bairi teyoyohar baise o a bai’ufununayah i en?”
41002019	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanotanot sabuw tabin ana yasisir isan nanawan hinanan boro amurumurubih hinamatabir? Aiyab! Tabin boubun isan nanawan sabuw nati’imaim boro men hinayoharamih.
41002020	Baise veya enan tabin boubun boro biyahimaim hinabosair imaibo hinayohar.
41002021	Na’atube faifuw boubun reban men karam hinab faifuw atamanin hinafitimih, anayabin faifuw boubun nakaro’om faifuw atamanin boro natakweb mahar nara’at.
41002022	Na’atube men yait ta wine boubun bai, wine ana koukufet atamaninamaim ririmih, anayabin wine boubun nagadid nayen koukufet boro nataseb, naatu wine, koukufet hairi boro hai yabih en hinamatar. Imih wine boubun i boro koukufet boubunamaim hinarir saise hairi boro gewasih hinabat.”
41002023	Baiyarir ana veya Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi sanabey wanawanan hiremor hinan naatu hibusuruf sanabey hirut,
41002024	Pharisee Jesu hi’u, “Kwi’itin aisim it ata Baiyarir ana ofafar o abai’ufununayah te’a’astu’ub?”
41002025	Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana orot bairi aa himomorob ana veya abisa sisinaf kwaiyab kwa’itin? Ana orot bairi aa himomorob ana veya
41002026	in God ana bar wanawanan run naatu faraw kakafiyin bai eaan. Iti mamatar i Abiathar Firis Gagamin ma’am ana veya. It ata ofafar eo i firis akisihimo iti rafiy hinaa, baise David eaan naatu ana orot turin itih hi’aa.”
41002027	Naatu Jesu ana tur yomanin baisawarin isan iti na’atube eo, “Baiyarir i orot ana gewasin isan matar, baise orot i men Baiyarir isan ni’akiramih.
41002028	Imih Orot Natun i Baiyarir Tamah anababatun.”
41003001	Jesu iban matabir maiye na Kou’ay Bar wanawanan run, naatu orot uman murubin i nati’imaim ma’ama.
41003002	Sabuw afa Jesu baikubibiruwin isan i nati’imaim hima hi’i’itin, saise orot uman murubin Baiyarir Ana Veya tabiyawas hitikubibiruw isan.
41003003	Jesu orot uman murubin iu, “Kuyen kuna iti nou’umaim.”
41003004	Imaibo sabuw isah eo, “Baiyarir ana veya’amaim ata ofafar i gewasin sinaf isan ebibasit or kakafin sinaf isan ebibasit? Orot tanibais yawas nab or tanimurub?” Baise i men tur ta hi’omih.
41003005	Jesu nan ufun inuwanuw itih yumatah fofokar isan yan so’ar, baise ibanak maiye isah iyababan, anayabin matah kufaf hisisinaf kakaf. Imaibo orot isan eo, “Uma ku’otofair.” Orot uman otofair tit igewasin.
