42001007	Baise hairi natunatuh en hima hin hiregah hibabine, anayabin Elizabeth i a’arin.
42001008	Veya ta Jerusalem Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan firis ana bowabow isan matan fufur tebowabow na’atube, Zechariah ibo ana veya na tit Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana bowabow isan run.
42001009	Firis hai binanakwaramaim eo na’atube, gem kakafiyin tafanamaim fi’ufiu afunin isan hibi’arow Zechariah wabin tit, basit na Regah ana Tafaror Bar wanawanan run.
42001010	Naatu Tafaror Bar wanawanan fi’ufiu Zechariah ea’afun ana veya’amaim, sabuw etei i bar ufunane hibat hiyoyoyoban.
42001011	Regah ana tounamatar, gem kakafiyin tainin asukwafune fi’ufiu ea’afunimaim tit irerereb bat.
42001012	Zechariah tounamatar tit batabat itin yan hamu iwa’an ana bir ra’at,
42001013	baise tounamatar eo, “Zechariah men inabir! God a yoyoban nowar. O aaw Elizabeth boro yan namatar naatu nataub kek orot nayai o wabin John iniwab.
42001014	Nati kek orot natutufuw ana veya o ya wanawanan boro yasisir kawasa awan nakaratan, na’atube sabuw moumurih maiyow auman boro hiniyasisir,
42001015	anayabin Regah matanamaim i boro orot gagamin ta. Iti kek wine o harew fokarih men natom, naatu God Anunin Kakafiyin boro niwanasum auman * nama’ama natufuw.
42001016	I boro Israel sabuw maumurih na’in nabow hinamatabir maiye Regah hai God isan.
42001017	Naatu God ana dinab orot Elijah ana fair baib na’atube boro nab Regah aunan ni’iyon nan, kek tamahinah bairi dogoroh nikitabir hinan hinita’imon maiye; sabuw baifanasairayah dogoroh nikitabir hinan mutufor ma ana not gewasin hinab, naatu Regah ana sabuw nabobunabuna’ih.”
42001018	Zechariah tounamatar iu, “Iti i boro mi’itube anitumatum? Anayabin ayu i ai regah, naatu aawau auman ibabine sawar.”
42001019	Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Gabriel God nanamaim abatabat, imih ayu iyafaru o airit oisan tur gewasin abai ana o a tur ao’owen,
42001020	baise ayu au tur men itumitum, imih o boro mena nabit, inama nanan sawar mataramih ao ana veya’amaim namatar, abisa ao’omatan nan niturobe.”
42001021	Nati ana maramaim sabuw ufunane hima’am hai kasiy ra’at, Zechariah manin maiyow Tafaror Bar wanawanan ma’am isan.
42001022	Naatu Zechariah Tafaror Barene titit ana mar, tur oisan menan bit, sabuw nati’imaim hi’itin hiso’ob ina’inan ta isan matar, naatu tur o isan menan bit umanamaim imanuman bairi hio.
42001023	Zechariah ana bowabow Tafaror Bar wanawanan sasawar ufunamaim matabir maiye na ana bar tit.
42001024	Nati ufunamaim a wan Elizabeth yan matar, sumar etei umatroun na’atube baremaim nutanub ma.
42001025	Elizabeth eo, “Regah bounabo ibaisu au biya’ohow, orot babin matahimaim etei’imak bosair.”
42001026	Elizabeth ana sumar umatroun ta’imon ana maramaim God ana tounamatar Gabriel iyafar in Galilee wanawananamaim bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim tit.
42001027	Nati’imaim babitai ta biyan numin Joseph, aiwob orot David ana agir ta i ana rum hiomatan ma’ama biyan tit, babitai wabin Mary.
42001028	Tounamatar na babitai biyan tit eo, “Tufuw isa nama! Regah o isa i yan ebaib kwanekwan, naatu baigegewasin o ebit.”
42001029	Mary iti tur nonowar ana veya biyababan na’atube bai naatu ana kasiy ra’at iti merarayow ana’an isan.
42001030	Baise tounamatar eo “Mary, men inabirumih, anayabin God o isa ebiyasisir gagamin maiyow.
42001031	O boro ya namatar inatoub kek orot inayai, naatu wabin Jesu iniwab.
42001032	I boro orot gagamin naatu God auyomtoro’ot Natun narouw nao, naatu Regah God boro aiwob nitin, marasika ana’agir David bitin na’atube.
42001033	Naatu Jacob ana rara’ane i boro ni’aiwob wanatowan, naatu ana aiwob i boro nama wanatowan, wanatowan ana yomanin en.”
42001034	Mary tounamatar isan eo, “Ayu i biyau numin. Iti i boro mi’itube namatar?”
42001035	Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “Anun kakafiyin boro niwani, naatu God ana fair boro natarsumi, imih iti kek Kakafiyin natutufuw i boro God Natun hinarouw hinao. *
42001036	Naatu o tura Elizabeth sabuw a’arin hirouw hio baise boun babine tafan yan matar ana sumar umatroun ta’imon sawar.
42001037	Anayabin God isan sawar etei’imak i men ta fokarinamih.”
42001038	Mary eo, “Ayu i Regah ana akir wairafin, abis isou kuo na’atube namatar.” Naatu tounamatar Mary itumar tit.
42001039	Nati ana veya’amaim, Mary matan kabiy bobuna ra’iy yen in Judah * wanawananamaim oyaw na’atune bar merar gagamin ta imaim tit,
42001040	Zechariah ana bar wanawanan run Elizabeth ana merar yi.
42001041	Elizabeth Mary ana merarayow nonowar ana maramaim, yan wanawanan kek inu’in ia’ayob, nati’imaim Anun Kakafiyin Elizabeth iwan
42001042	fanan aumetawat eo, “God ana baigegewasin o ebit baibin etei tafahimaim, naatu ya wanawanan a ub auman God ebigegewasin!
42001043	Aisim sawar gagamin na’in iti na’atube isou matar, au Regah hinah na ebinanawanu?
42001044	O a merarayow anonowar ana mar, kek yau wanawanan inu’in yasisir auman ia’ayob.
42001045	O a baitumatumamaim baigegewasin ibai, God eo’omatani boro nan turobe namatar!”
42001046	Mary eo, “Ayu dogorou wanawanan God ebobora’ara’ah.
42001047	Naatu yau wanawanan yasisir awan karatan, God au baiyawasenayan isan abiyasisir.
42001048	Anayabin i ana akir wairafin wabin men gagamin baise nuh, * imih boun ebubusuruf sabuw etei boro ayu baigegewasinayan hinarouw hinao.
42001049	Anayabin sawar gagamih God Fairin ayu isou sinaf. I wabin i kakafiyin,
42001050	I ana kabeber i aunan etuwatuw, sabuw hitufuw tema’am, afa boro hina tutufuw isah, iyab God hibiruw tekakakafiy i boro nakabibirih.
42001051	God umanamaim sawar fairih sinaf, naatu uman fairinamaim sabuw bai o’orotoyah hai not wa’iwa’irih etei egugurusen.
42001052	Aiwob fairih hai ura ma’ama’amaim bow yara’iyih, naatu sabuw hiyara’iyih hima’am bow hiyen efan itih. *
42001053	Sabuw aa himomorob, sawar gewasihimaim ituwih, baise sabuw sawar wairafih umah en iyafarih hin.
42001054	Ana omatanen ata a’agir eo’omatanih i kaif, naatu na ana akirwairafin Israel baibais itin
42001055	Abraham nuh kakabibir na’atube, i wawawan etei boro nakabibirih wanatowan!”
42001056	Mary sumar etei tounu na’atube Elizabeth hairi hima, imaibo matabir maiye na ana bar tit.
42001057	Elizabeth ana toub isan veya na tit, naatu toub ana kek orot yai.
42001058	Tain tuwan naatu ana ofonah, God ana baigegewasin gagamin na’in Elizabeth bitin ana tur hinowar hina ana merar hiyi bairi hiyasisir.
42001059	Naatu fur ta’imon ufunamaim, kek ana’ar mo’on afuwin wabin baiwabin isan tain tuwan etei hina. Tain tuwan hikokok kek wabin i boro Zechariah, tamah wabinamaim hitiwabimih hio,
42001060	baise hinah eo, “En! Kek wabin i boro John taniwab.”
42001061	Sabuw hio, “O taituwa wabih men ta nati na’atube ema’ama boro kek wabin nati taniwab.”
42001062	Basit umahimaim kek tamah isan himan wabin menatan kokok baiwabin isan hibatiy.
42001063	Zechariah eo fef hibai hina hitin imaim kirum eo, “Kek wabin i John.” Sabuw etei hifofofor men kafaita.
42001064	Nati ana veya’amaim Zechariah menan bit ma’am menan kerer busuruf tur eo, God bora’ara’ah.
42001065	Taintuwan etei awah hae’e hai baifofofor ra’at, baise abisa himamatar ana tur tasasar tit tafaram Judea wanawanan sabuw etei hinowar.
42001066	Sabuw etei iti sawar matar ana tur hinonowar isan hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti kek narara’at ana itinin i boro mi’itube?” Anayabin Regah uman i iti kek biyanamaim ma’am.
42001067	John tamah Zechariah Anun Kakafiyin targabuw, God ana ewamaim tabor eo.
42001068	“Regah tanabora’ara’ah, Israel sabuw hai God, anayabin i ana sabuw baiyawasih isan natit,
42001069	Baiyawasenayan fairin anababatun David ana rara’ane enan,
42001070	marasika ana dinab wanawanahimaim eo’omatanih na’atube.
42001071	boun it boro ata kamabiy sabuw umahine, naatu sabuw fairih tibifa’ifa’it umahine niyawasit.
42001072	Ana obaibasit kakafiyin bimatar imaim nuh ata a’agir kabeber itih,
42001073	naatu iti obaibasit i marasika God ata agir Abraham eomatan,
42001074	imih boun it ata kamabiy sabuw umahine baiyawasit isan natit ebiyawasit, naatu fair ebitit God isan men erebir auman tanabow,
42001075	God matanamaim tanakakaf naatu tanayasairit ata ef mutufurinamaim tanakwafir wanatowan, wanatowan.
42001076	Naatu o ayu natu, o boro God auyomtoro’ot ana dinabumih inamatar, Regah aunan ini’iyon inan ana ef inayabuna,
42001077	ana sabuw yawas isan inakubuna hai tur ina’owen bowabow kakafih hinihamiyen God hai kakafih nanotawiyen yawas hinab.
42001078	Anayabin ata God, i ana manaw kabeber wairafin, i wanawananamaim marakaw marane boro nakusisiar nare,
42001079	sabuw iyab guguminamaim tema’am naatu murumurubih hai youninamaim tema’am tafatamaim namarakaw, at narumutufur nanawiyit tanatit tufuw ana efamaim tanaremor.”
42001080	Kek biyan naatu ayubin hairi ana fofonin ra’at yen orot matar, naatu run in arar yan imaim ma ana fair bai, imaibo tit ana bowabow Israel sabuw etei nahimaim busuruf bow.
42002001	Nati ana veya, sabuw iyab Roman gawan babanamaim hima’am wabih bukamaim kirum isan Caesar Augustus iuwih.
42002002	Sabuw baiyab isan marasika i men hiyab, baise Quirinius tafaram Syria isan bigawan ana veya imaibo hibusuruf sabuw hiyab wabih bukamaim hikirum.
42002003	Nati baiyab ana veya’amaim sabuw etei hin hai bar merar gagamihimaim hitit wabih bukamaim hikirum.
42002004	Joseph auman tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Nazareth imaim ma’am yen na Judea wanawanan bar merar ta wabin Bethlehem imaim tit, aiwob orot David ana tutufuw efan. Joseph na nati’imaim tit, anayabin i David uwan ta.
42002005	Naatu Joseph nati’imaim in titit ana’an ta i Mary hairi tabin isan hi’omatanih hima’am, imih hairi wabih bukamaim kirumin isan hiyen hin. Nati ana veya Mary i yan auman,
42002006	hiyen hina Bethlehem hima’am, Mary ana toub ana veya na tit.
42002007	Naatu toub ana kek orot ain yai, faifuw ta bai e’armetan for hai bay te’aau ana efanamaim i’inuw in, anayabin nanawan bar etei sabuw hirun hibai karam.
42002008	Nati gugumin bobaituw kaifenayah afa Bethlehem sisibinamaim hima hai bobaituw hikakaifen,
42002009	basit Regah ana tounamatar isah irerereb, naatu Regah ana marakaw tafahimaim kusisiar re biyah etei marakaw hi’itin hai bir ra’at.
42002010	Baise tounamatar iuwih eo, “Men kwanabir! Ayu tur gewasin abai a tur owenamih ana, iti tur gewasin sabuw hinanonowar boro etei hiniyasisir.
42002011	Anayabin iti boun gugumin David ana bar meraramaim, kwa a baiyawasenayan Regah Keriso i tufuw.
42002012	Naatu ana i’inan, i boro iti na’atube kwana’itin, kwananan kek boro faifuw boubunamaim hisum bobaituw hai bay te’aa ana efanamaim hi’inuw inu’in kwana’itin.”
42002013	Iti na’at eo marta’imon, maramaim tounamatar hai kou’ay gagamin na’in hitit, ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio,
42002014	“Marakaw bonamanamarin etei God auyomtoro’ot isan nama, naatu tafaramamaim sabuw iyab God isah ebiyasisir tufuw isah nama.”
42002015	Tounamatar himatabir maiye hin mar wanawanan hirur ufunamaim, bobaituw kaifenayah himisir hio, “It boro tanan Bethlehem tanatit, sawar abisa himatar Regah eo tanonowar i tana’itah.”
42002016	Basit matah kabiy himisir hin Mary Joseph hairi hinuwihih hinan hitita’urih, naatu kek bobaituw hai bay te’aa hai efanamaim hi’inuw inu’in hi’itin.
42002017	Bobaituw kaifenayah kek hi’i’itin ufunamaim, kek isan tounamatar mi’itube hio hinonowar hai tur hi’owen.
42002018	Sabuw iyabowat nati’imaim hima’am bobaituw kaifenayah iti kek isan hio hinonowar hifofofor men kafaita.
42002019	Baise Mary iti tur nonowar i dogoronamaim ya hima inotanot.
42002020	Bobaituw kaifenayah himatabir hinan efamaim, abisa tounamatar hio hinonowar na’atube hi’i’itin isan, God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah auman hin.
42002021	Fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim, Kek hibai hina ana ar kanabin hi’afuw, wabin Jesu hiwab. Wabin marasika Mary yan matara’e ma’am ana veya, tounamatar na eo na’atube.
42002022	Kousouwih isan Moses ana ofafaramaim bi’obaiyih na’atube, ana veya na tit hibisawar ufunamaim, Mary Joseph hairi Jesu hibai hina Jerusalem hitit, Tafaror Bar hirun Regah ana siwaramih hitin.
42002023	Anayabin Regah ana ofafaramaim eo na’atube, “Kek orot ain i kwanaya’asair Regah kwanitin.”
42002024	Naatu Regah ana ofafaramaim eo na’atube sibor ya’inamih auman hin, mamu imak rou’ab naatu ma’ufor rou’ab hibow auman hina hitit.
42002025	nati ana veya’amaim, regah ta wabin Simeon i Jerusalem ma’am, iti regah ana yawas i mutufurin naatu yoyoban wairafin. God Anunin tar gabuw ana ofafar eo na’atube ma bow God ana sabuw Israel baiyawasih isan eomatanih i ma kakaif.
42002026	Anun Kakafiyin God ana buriburih isan irerereb eo, “O boro yawas inama’am Regah God ana Roubininenayan natufuw ina’itin imaibo inamorob.”
42002027	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu hinah tamah hibai hina hirun, hai binanakwaramaim ofafar eo na’atube sinaf isan. Naatu God Anun Kakafiyin auman Simeon bonawiy na Tafaror Bar run.
42002028	Simeon kek bai irurubun hiyaf God ana merar yi eo,
42002029	“Regah i’o na’atube a’omatanen ikaif, imih boro’obo a’akir wairafin tufuwamaim inihamiy niyarir.
42002030	Taiyuwu matau’umaim a baiyawasenayan tafaramamaim ibiyafar aitin.
42002031	Iti baiyawasenayan i ibogaigiwas sabuw etei matahimaim kubitih boro hina’itin.
42002032	Naatu yawas ana marakaw boro nab natit Ufun Sabuw isah nirerereb hina’itin, naatu Israel sabuw nahimaim o ayawas ana marakaw boro nama.”
42002033	Kek hinah tamah Simeon kek isan abisa eo hinonowar i hifofofor men kafaita.
42002034	Simeon baigegewasin itih sawar, basit kek hinah Mary isan eo “Iti kek i God rubin sabuw moumurih na’in Israel wanawanan boro nagurusih naatu moumurih na’in boro niyawasih. Hai kirikirifot etei boro niwa’an hinirerereb, ina’i’inan nati isan sabuw boro ana tur hinakwahir.
42002035	Naatu yababan o dogor wanawanan boro ahay na’atube nay.”
42002036	Nati’imaim dinab babine ta Asher ana bigane ma’am, wabin Anna Fanuel natun, Anna tabin kwamur etei seven ma naatu aawan morob.
42002037	Kwamur etei 84 i kwafur ma naatu Tafaror Bar men kafa’imo ihamiy. Fai mar i yohar, ma yoyoban God bobora’ara’ah.
42002038	Nati ana veya’amaim babine na run God ana merar yi. Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw iyab baiyawasenayan isan hima hikakaif hai tur eowen eo, “Roubininenayan natit.”
42002039	Joseph, Mary hairi Regah ana ofafaramaim abisa eo na’atube hisisinaf ufunamaim, himatabir maiye hin hai bar merar wabin Nazareth imaim hitit, tafaram Galilee wanawananamaim.
42002040	Naatu God ana bosiyasiyar wanawananamaim Kek ra’at yen ana fair bai fudirin rerekab naatu ana not ra’at taseseb.
42002041	Kwamur ta ta wanawanahimaim Jesu hinah tamah mar etei Tar Nowaten Hiyuw isan au Jerusalem tenan.
42002042	Ana veya ta Jesu ana kwamur 12 na’atube basit hiyen hin hiyuw ta isan hai binanakwar eo na’atube.
42002043	Hiyuw ufunamaim hai ubar himatabir maiye, baise kek Jesu i Jerusalem ma. Hinah tamah men kafa’imo hiso’ob.
42002044	Hinotanot kek i nati sabuw wanawanamaim bairi hinan hirouw, imih nati veya ta’imon i nuhih fot hiremor hin, baise veya re birabirab, hibusuruf kek hinuwih, hai ofonah naatu taituwah hibabatiyih hinunuwet,
42002045	men hitita’ur, basit himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit hinuwih.
42002046	Veya baitounin Tafaror Bar wanawanan Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah wanawanah mare tur hi’o nowar ma bibabatiyih hitita’ur.
42002047	Sabuw etei Jesu tur buriburih eo, naatu iyafutih hinonowar isan, hifofofor men kafaita.
42002048	Hinah tamah kek hitita’ur ana veya hiororsa’irih Mary Natun iu, “Aro aisim iti na’atube isinaf? Tamat airi ai yababan ra’at, o anuwihi men kikimin ta.”
42002049	Iyafutih eo, “Aisim ayu kwanunuwuhu? Kwa men kwaso’ob ayu i Tamai ana baremaim ama’am?”
42002050	Baise Kek abisa eo hinah tamah ana tur naniyan men hibai.
42002051	Basit Jesu misir bairi himatabir maiye hire hin Nazareth hitit, imaim hinah tamah fanah bosiyasiyar bairi hima naatu hinah iti sawar etei ana notamaim ya ma inotanot.
42002052	Jesu ra’at yen orot matar ana not auman ra’at yen God itin yan sisir na’atube sabuw auman.
42003001	Roman sabuw hai orot gagamin wabin Caesar Taibirias bi’aiwob ana kwamur 15 baib wanawananamaim Pontius Pilate i Judea wanawanan igawan, Herod i Galilee isan igawan, naatu tain Philip i tafaram Iturea naatu Trakonaitis hairi isah igawan naatu; Lysanias i tafaram Abilene isan igawan.
42003002	Naatu Annas Kaiafas hairi i firis gagamih. Nati ana maramaim Zechariah natun John arar yan ma’am God ana tur na biyan tit.
42003003	Basit misir tit harew Jordan, sisibinamaim tafaram ta ta run tit binan eo, “Kakafih kwasisinaf kwanihamiyen kwanan bapataito anit saise God boro a kakafih nanotawiyen.”
42003004	God ana dinab orot Isaiah ana Bukamaim kikirum na’atube eo, “Orot ta arar yan bat eafa’af, ‘Regah isan ef kwanabo gaigiwas, ef kwanimutufur iwat naremor nan!
42003005	Awa’awah etei kwanatounen hinayen hinituturin, heher oyaw etei kwanatar hinare hinituturin. Ef bibirih kwanarumutufuren, naatu ef kakafih kwanayabuna gewas.
42003006	Sabuw tutufin etei God baiyawasenayan nabiyafar boro hina’itin!’”
42003007	Sabuw rau’ay gagamin John bapataito baitih isan hinan iuwih eo, “Kok natunatun! Yait imatnuwi God ana baimakiy nabiyafar boro wan kwanabibir? Men kwananot kwanao, ayu bapataito abai imih boro natafafaru en.
42003008	Baise wantoro’ot i a yawas nigewasin kwanama saise nati’imaim boro kwa isa niturobe bowabow kakafih kwasisinaf etei kwaihamiyen. Naatu men kwanao, Abraham i aki ai agir imih God boro men baimakiy niti! Baise a tur ao’owen God karam kabay iti nabow niwa’an Abraham wawawan hinamatar.
42003009	Ai tebiw ro’oro’oh men gewasih i boro hinatar wairaf wah hinayara’aten hina’arat, imih kariwak i ai tarinamih hiya’ataitik inu’in.”
42003010	Sabuw hibatiy, “Bo aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?”
42003011	Iyafutih eo, “O yait isa biya baibiyon rou’ab hinama’am ta inab menatan isan biya baibiyon en initin, naatu yait isan bay nakakaram nafaram.”
42003012	Kabay o’onayah bapataito bainamih hina hitit hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?”
42003013	“Kwa kabay o’onamih hio hibiyuni na’atube ana fofonin kwana’o’on men tafan kwanayara’ah auman kwana’o’onamih.”
42003014	Roman baiyowayah orot afa auman hio, “Bo aki i boro mi’itube?” Iuwih eo, “Sabuw men kwanao kikinih kabay hinitimih o men baifuwenamaim hai kabay kwanabowamih, baise a bowabow isan a baiyan hinabit i kwaniyasisir.”
42003015	Sabuw hai notamaim hinotanot John i baiyawasenayan.
42003016	Imih John iuwih eo, “Ayu i harewamaim bapataito abit, baise orot ta boro enan ana fair i ra’at. Ayu i men gewasu boro an ana baibiyon anaku’ub. I boro Anun Kakafiyin naatu wairafamaim bapataito nit.
42003017	I umanamaim i roububuna’en ana sawar auman bai enan, boro imaim wheat narububunai ani’anin korom nayai, naatu hain boro nabow nan wairaf wanatowanin in etoto’ab wan naya na’afusar.”
42003018	John ef maumurih maiyow sabuw isah binan naatu hai yawas auman botabirinamih iuwih.
42003019	Baise Herod tuwah aawan Herodias bi’aawan isan, naatu bowabow kakafih maumurih maiyow sisinaf isan John kwarar yayamutufur ana maramaim
42003020	Herod ibanaka sinaf kakafin tabow sinaf John bai dibur bar yari’iy.
42003021	Sabuw etei’imak bapataito hibaib ufunamaim, Jesu auman ibapataito. Naatu yoyoyoban ana maramaim mar botawiy,
42003022	Anun Kakafiyin marane mamu imakabe ra’iy targabuw. Naatu orot fanan marane tit. “O i ayu Natu ta’imonamo. O isa ayu abiyasisir.”
42003023	Jesu ana kwamur 30 imaim ana bowabow busuruf. Sabuw hisoso’ob Jesu i Joseph natun imih Joseph isan hinot, Joseph tamah i Heli,
42003024	Heli tamah i Mathat, Mathat tamah i Levi, Levi tamah i Melkai, Melkai tamah i Jannai, Jannai tamah i Joseph,
42003025	Joseph tamah i Matathias, Matathias tamah i Amos, Amos tamah i Nahum, Nahum tamah i Esli, Esli tamah i Naggai,
42003026	Naggai tamah i Maatah, Maatah tamah i Matathias, Matathias tamah i Semein, Semein tamah i Josech, Josech tamah i Joda,
42003027	Joda tamah i Joanan, Joanan tamah i Rhesa, Rhesa tamah i Zerubbabel, Zerubbabel tamah i Shealtiel, Shealtiel tamah i Neri,
42003028	Neri tamah i Melkai, Melkai tamah i Addi, Addi tamah i Cosam, Cosam tamah i Elmadam, Elmadam tamah i Er,
42003029	Er tamah i Joshua, Joshua tamah i Eliezer, Eliezer tamah i Jorim, Jorim tamah i Mathat, Mathat tamah i Levi
42003030	Levi tamah i Simeon, Simeon tamah i Judah, Judah tamah i Joseph, Joseph tamah i Jonam, Jonam tamah i Eliakim,
42003031	Eliakim tamah i Melea, Melea tamah i Menna, Menna tamah i Matatha, Matatha tamah i Nathan, Nathan tamah i David,
42003032	David tamah i Jesse, Jesse tamah i Obed, Obed tamah i Boaz, Boaz tamah i Salmon, Salmon tamah i Nashon,
42003033	Nashon tamah i Aminadab, Aminadab tamah i Admin, Admin tamah i Arni, Arni tamah i Hezron, Hezron tamah i Perez, Perez tamah i Judah,
42003034	Judah tamah i Jacob, Jacob tamah i Isaac, Isaac tamah i Abraham, Abraham tamah i Terah, Terah tamah i Nahor,
42003035	Nahor tamah i Serug, Serug tamah i Reu, Reu tamah i Peleg, Peleg tamah i Eber, Eber tamah i Shelah,
42003036	Shelah tamah i Cainan, Cainan tamah i Arafasad, Arafasad tamah i Shem, Shem tamah i Noah, Noah tamah i Lamech,
42003037	Lamech tamah i Methuselah, Methuselah tamah i Enoch, Enoch tamah i Jared, Jared tamah i Mahalalel, Mahalalel tamah i Cainan,
42003038	Cainan tamah i Enos, Enos tamah i Seth, Seth tamah i Adam, Adam tamah i God.
42004001	Jesu biyan tutufin etei God Anun Kakafiyin karatan Jordan harewane matabir yen naatu Anun Kakafiyin i’unawiy in Judea arar yan tit.
42004002	Nati’imaim veya etei 40 bay en ma’am ufunamaim bayumih morob. Naatu nati ana maramaim Demon Mowan na routobon itin,
42004003	eo, “O i God Natun na’at, kabay iti ku’uwih tebotabir rafiy tematar ku’aa.”
42004004	Baise Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘Orot men bayumaim akisin niyawasimih.’”
42004005	Naatu Demon Mowan Jesu i’unawiy maiye hiyen hin koun yan bat, imatanubamo tafaram tutufin etei itin.
42004006	Naatu Demon Mowan eo, “Ayu boro fair etei o anit naatu tafaram ana aiwob auman boro anit. Anayabin etei’imak ayu hitu, ayu orot yait arurubin boro i anitin nab.
42004007	Imih O ayu inakwakwafiru na’at, iti sawar etei boro o nowamih anit.”
42004008	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘A Regah a God akisinamo inakwafir isan inabow.’”
42004009	Naatu iban maiye Demon Mowan Jesu bai nawiy hin Jerusalem hitit, hiyen hin Tafaror Bar tafantoro’ot bat naatu iu, “O God Natun na’at, kukununuw kura’iy.
42004010	Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘God boro ana tounamatar na’uwih hinatafafari,
42004011	umah yanamaim inare hinabuwi, boro men kabay a narab natakakirimih.’”
42004012	Baise Jesu iya’afut iu, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, ‘A Regah a God men routobon initinimih.’”
42004013	Demon Mowan routobon ta ta Jesu bitin ufunamaim itumar tabaratait tit mar kafai ufunamaim bat.
42004014	Imaibo Jesu God Anun Kakafiyin ana fair bai auman matabir na Galilee tit. Ana tur ra’at tasasar tit tafaram nati sisibinamaim hima’am etei’imak hinowar.
42004015	Kou’ay Bar wanawanan run bi’obaibiyih sabuw etei’imak tur hinonowar, hifai hibora’ara’ah.
42004016	Jesu remor na Nazareth tit, bar merar i ma rara’atamaim, Baiyarir ana veya matanfufur isisinaf na’atube, in Kou’ay Bar run, Buk ta baiyab isan misir.
42004017	Naatu dinab orot Isaiah ana buk hibai Jesu hitin, bai rusasar tur iti na’atube hikirum inu’in ana efanamaim tit.
42004018	“Regah Anun Kakafiyin i ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am, anayabin ayu rubinu tur gewasin sabuw yababan wairafih isah anabinan. God iyafaru sabuw dibur tema’am hai tur ana’owen anabotaitih, matah fim anibaisih matah nigewasin hinanuw. Naatu sabuw iyab hirouw tibia’afiyih anibaisih hinama gewas.
42004019	Naatu anakurereb sabuw hinanowar Regah ana sabuw baiyawasih isan ana veya i natit.”
42004020	Jesu buk itakum orot kaifenayan itin i mara’iy. Sabuw Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hima’am etei’imak matah hito’ab Jesu hi’itin kikin.
42004021	Baise Jesu misir busuruf sabuw hai tur eowen eo, “Tur iti aiyab kwananowar i boun na iturobe.”
42004022	Sabuw etei’imak nati’imaim hima Jesu eo hinonowar hio, “Turobe iti orot ana tur i gewasin.” Naatu tur mumunin bitan eo hinonowar isan hifofofor, naatu taiyuwih hibatiyih hio, “Iti orot i Joseph natun?”
42004023	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Binan tur gewasin matan fufur sabuw teo’omaim boro kwana’uwu kwanao, ‘Adanafur ana orot, taiyuw kwiyawasi.’ Naatu iban boro kwana’uwu maiye, ‘Capernaum ma bow bigan tanonowar na’atube, iti ana bar ana meraramaim nabow tana’itin.’”
42004024	Jesu iban maiye iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab orot ana bar ana meraramaim boro men ana merar hinay hinabaimih.
42004025	Naatu tur anababatun a tur ana’owen, Elijah ma’am ana veya’amaim kwafukwafur maumurih na’in Israel wanawanan hima’am afow matar. Nati ana veya’amaim kwamur etei tounu naatu sumar six na’atube toun men yar, baimar kakafin na, nati tafaram wanawananamaim bar merar etei’imak bay i’en.
42004026	Nati ana veya’amaim God men Elijah iyafar Israel wanawanan kwafur babin ta ibaisimih, baise Sidon wanawanan Zarepat bar meraramaim kwafur babin ta’imon ma’am isan God iyafar in tit baibais itin.
42004027	Naatu dinab orot Elisha ma’am ana veya Israel sabuw moumurih maiyow kokom ani’anih hima’ama men yait ta na Elisha iyawasimih, baise tafaram Syria orot wabin Naaman akisinamo na Elisha iyawas.”
42004028	Sabuw Kou’ay Bar wanawanan hima iti tur hinonowar ana veya, yah wanawanan so’aso’ar yen higagamat,
42004029	himisir Jesu hibai hitain ufun hitit, bar merar hitumar, hiyen fan tafan hibat hitarouw fan tare’emih hiwa’an, anayabin bar merar i fan tafan hiwowab hima’am.
42004030	Baise Jesu sabuw rau’ay gagamin hibatabat umah aren sorabon hai foun remor tit in.
42004031	Jesu na Galilee wanawananamaim bar merar ta wabin Capernaum imaim tit, Baiyarir ana veya run sabuw i’obaibiyih hima hinonowar.
42004032	Sabuw etei’imak hifofofor men kafaita. Anayabin ana tur eo i tur anababatun naatu fairin.
42004033	Nati Kou’ay Baremaim orot ta wagabur iwan demon kakafin anababatun auman na run ma’am, fanan aumetawat na’in iwow eo,
42004034	“Hei! Aki isai abisa inasinafumih kunan? Aki gurusi’imih? Jesu Nazareth mowan. Ayu aso’ob. O i yait, O i God ana tur abarayan Orot Kakafiyin.”
42004035	Jesu wagabur mowan kwarartatab eo, “Yate inbainub orot biyanamaim kutit!” Wagabur mowan sabuw nahimaim orot itaiy re tabaratait tit, men isan abisa ta sinafumih.
42004036	Baise Sabuw etei’imak hai baifofofor ra’at, taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot ana tur i fair kwanekwan. Ana onowaten naatu ana fair auman iti tur eo demon kakafih biyunih i hitit!”
42004037	Naatu Jesu abisa sisinaf isan ana tur tasasar tit tafaram nati hima’am wanawanan etei hinowar.
42004038	Jesu misir Kou’ay Bar itumar tit na Simon ana bar tit, Simon rawan babin sawow biyan fora’ab anababatun inu’in, sabuw Jesu hifefeyan baiyawasinamih hio.
42004039	Basit Jesu na babin inu’in sisibin tit bat sawow i’ari’ar naatu sawow babin biyanane tit, babin yawas misir bay bow eafusar itab hi’aa.
42004040	Veya re’er ufunamaim, sabuw sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hi’inu’in, turahinah hibuwih hina Jesu biyan hitit, sabuw ta’ita’imon butubutubunih etei’imak hiyawas.
42004041	Sabuw moumurih na’in auman biyahine demon kakafih hitit hiwow hio, “O i God Natun!” Baise Jesu demon awah bofafaren men karam boro hitao’rereb. Anayabin demon hiso’ob Jesu i Roubininenayan.
42004042	Martot auman Jesu nati bar merar itumar tit in efan ta nautanubinamaim akisinamo ma. Baise sabuw hinuwih hinan hititita’ur ana veya, bairi nati’imaim ma isan hi’otan.
42004043	Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu boro anan God ana aiwob isan tur gewasin bar merar afa’amaim auman anabinan hinanowar. Anayabin ayu nati bowabow isan God iyunu ana.”
42004044	Naatu Jesu tafaram Judea wanawananamaim Kou’ay Bar etei run tit binan remor.
42005001	Veya ta Jesu Genesaret harew kukuf rewarewan batabat sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in God ana tur nowaramih hinahinah hina biyan hitit.
42005002	Naatu nati dones yanamaim siy bowayah hai wa rou’ab hitain hiyen hi’inu’in Jesu itah, baise siy bowayah hin hai buwat hisasouwen.
42005003	Jesu wa nati awar hibatabat wanawanahimaim Simon ana wa bai afe’en yen mare iu inatait tetenane rouw. Naatu Jesu mare sabuw rau’ay gagamin ma i’obaibiyih.
42005004	Bi’obaibiyih ufunamaim, Simon iu, “A’wa kukutait itit taiyomaim a sabuw bairi buwat kwaya kwaway.”
42005005	Simon eo, “Regah, fai manin buwat aya ama’am mar to men kafai siy ta eon, baise o kuo’o imih boro anasinaf.”
42005006	Basit, buwat hitaiy re, siy batabat wanawanan run buwat kafa’imo tatakweb.
42005007	Turahinah wa ta afe’en hima’am na baibaisih isan himan, naatu turahinah hina bairi siy hibow wa rou’ab hiwan yen awah karatan, wa hairi kafa’imo hita’unun.
42005008	Abisa matar Simon Peter i’itin ana maramaim Jesu nanamaim sun yowen re eo, “Regah, kwihamiyu sa’ab kwen, ayu i bowabow kakafin wairafu.”
42005009	Naatu Simon ana ofonah bairi siy moumurih na’in hibowabow isan hifofofor men kafaita.
42005010	Zebedee natunatun James naatu John hairi auman hifofofor men kafaita (Simon ana ofonah). Jesu Simon iu, “Men inabirumih, boun ana veya ebubusuruf o boro orot isah inaway.”
42005011	Naatu wa hibow hirun dones yan hitain hiyen, sawar etei’imak hihamiyen himisir Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin.
42005012	Ana veya ta Jesu tafaram ta in orot biyan kokom ani’anin ma bi’akiramaim tit. Orot Jesu i’itin ana maramaim tit nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan eo “Regah inakokok na’at basit iniyawasu!”
42005013	Jesu uman bora’ah orot butubun eo, “Ayu akokok o inayawas!” Iti na’at eo mar ta’imon orot biyanamaim kokom etei na’am in sawar.
42005014	Jesu orot eofafar eo “Men sabuw hai tur ina’owen, baise, inan a firis biyan inatit biya nanutitiy na’itin. Imaibo Moses iu’uwi na’atube Regah isan sibor inayai, saise sabuw hina’itin hinitumatum o biya i turobe igewasin.”
42005015	Baise Jesu ana tur ra’at tasasar tit etei’imak hinowar, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in hina ana tur hinowar naatu baiyawasih isan hifefeyan iyawasih.
42005016	Baise mar etei Jesu efan nautanubinamaim akisinamo ma yoyoban isan en ema eyoyoyoban.
42005017	Veya ta Jesu binan sabuw hima hinonowar wanawanahimaim i Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hina hima tur hinowar. Iti sabuw i tafaram Galilee naatu Judea wanawanan bar merar tata’ane hina, naatu Jerusalemane auman hina. Nati ana maramaim yawas ana fair Regah biyanane i na Jesu biyan tit sabuw sawusawuwih baiyawasih isan.
42005018	Sabuw afa orot an uman Kafikafirin hibai emo’em hiwan hi’abar hina, hikok kwanekwan bar wanawanan hitarun Jesu nanamaim hitayare.
42005019	Baise sabuw i ra’at kwanekwan men ana mahar ta ma boro orot hitab hitarun. Imih hibai hiyen bar faifiy afe’en hiyare, kabay hibosaisiren sou hikuyouw imaim orot emo’em auman hiruru sabuw hima’am hai founafoun ra’iy, Jesu ma’am nanamaim tit.
42005020	Jesu iti sabuw hai baitumatum itin basit orot isan eo, “Au begon o a bowabow kakafih i anotanotawiyen.”
42005021	Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah hima’ama taiyuwih hio, “Iti orot i menatan God ebi’ib? God akisinamo boro bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen.”
42005022	Abisa hinotanot Jesu so’ob basit iuwih, “Kwa dogor wanawanah not kakafih nati na’atube aisim kwanotanot?
42005023	Ef menatan i hamehamen, ana bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan anao, i hamehamen o misir bat remor, isan anao i hamehamen?
42005024	Baise ayu anasinaf kwana’itin saise kwanitumatum. Orot Natun i God eonowah tafaramamaim sabuw hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan.” Basit Jesu orot an auman kafikafirin isan eo, “Kumisir a emo’em kubai a ubar kwen!”
42005025	Orot mar ta’imonamo nahifunik inu’in misir ana emo’em bai e’abar tit God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah auman ana ubar in.
42005026	Sabuw etei’imak hima’am hifofofor men kafaita, yah birubir fafar auman, naatu God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio, “Ina’inan iti men na’atube ta’i’itin efa’efanin bounabo matar taitin.”
42005027	Iti ufunamaim Jesu tit in orot kabay o’onayan wabin Levi ana bowabow baremaim ma’am itin basit isan eo, “Kumisir ayu kwi’ufnunu.”
42005028	Levi ma’am misir sawar etei’imak ihamiyen Jesu i’ufunun.
42005029	Levi baitab gagamin ta ana baremaim Jesu isan itab, Levi ana ofonah bairi hai bowabow ta’imon naatu sabuw afa auman hiru’ay.
42005030	Pharisee naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah himisir higam Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hibatiyih, “Kwa aisim nati kabay o’onayah naatu bowabow kakafih sabuw bairi kwama kwa’aa kwatomatom?”
42005031	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw iyab gewasih adanafur orot men tekokok, baise sabuw sawow wairafih adanafur orot i tekokok.
42005032	Ayu i men sabuw gewasih bow dogoroh baikitabirin isan anamih, baise sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih.”
42005033	Sabuw afa Jesu hibatiy hio, “John ana bai’ufununayah i mar etei teyohar teyoyoyoban naatu Pharisee hai bai’ufununayah i na’atube tisisinaf, baise o abai’ufununayah i hi’aa tetomatom.”
42005034	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanotanot tabin boubun ana sabuw a baitab isan hinaruru’ay boro na’uwih aamoromorob hinamatabir maiye hinan? Men karam.
42005035	Baise veya ta tabin boubun orot boro hinabosair sa’ab nan ana sabuw nihamiyih, imaibo i boro hinayohar.”
42005036	Naatu Jesu oroubon ta iti na’atube eo, “Men yait ta faifuw boubun e’afuw faifuw atamanin fitimih, nati na’atube nasinaf faifuw boubun boro natakweb. Naatu faifuw boubun hinab atamanin hinafitifit ana itinin boro men gewasin.
42005037	Na’atube men yait ta wine boubun bai wine atamanin ana kibubumaim ririmih. Anayabin wine boubun ana kibub inab atamaninamaim inaririr wine boro nara’at kibub atamanin natafofor naatu wine nasuwa nare.
42005038	Imih wine boubun ibo kibub boubunamaim tiririr.
42005039	Baise men yait ta wine atamanin tomatom ufunamaim wine boubun tom isan kokomih, aiyab. Anayabin nati orot iti na’atube eo, “ Wine atamanin i gewasin anababatun.”
42006001	Baiyarir * ana veya ta Jesu sanabey wanawanah remor inan, ana bai’ufununayah sanabey hirut kanabih hikeb ro’oro’oh hibow hi’aa.
42006002	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa hi’itih basit hibatiyih. Kwa aisim Baiyarir ana veya ata ofafar kwa’astu’ub iti na’atube kwasisinaf?
42006003	Jesu iyafutih eo, “David ana sabuw bairi bayumih himorob, abisa sisinaf Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in kwaiyab kwaitin?
42006004	David God Ana Bar wanawanan run Regah isan rafiy hisibor inu’in bai eaan, naatu turin ana sabuw itih hi’aa. Nati i ata ofafar eastu’ub. Anayabin firis akisihimo nati rafiy sibor hinab hina’aan men yait ta.
42006005	Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim iti na’atube eo, “Orot Natun i Baiyarir ana ukwarin.”
42006006	Baiyarir ana veya ta Jesu na Kou’ay Bar wanawanan run sabuw bai’obaiyih isan. Naatu nati sabuw wanawanahimaim i orot ta uman asukwafune murubin auman na ma’am.
42006007	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee Jesu himtitiy Baiyarir ana veya orot ta tabiyawas na’at hita’itin, saise hai fair imaim hitab hitagam hita’umih.
42006008	Baise sabuw abisa hinotanot i Jesu so’ob, imih orot isan eo, “Kumisir kutit iti sabuw nahimaim kubat.” Basit orot ma’am misir bat.
42006009	Imaibo Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Ayu kwa abibatiy, ata ofafaramaim Baiyarir ana veya abistan i ebibasit boro tanasinaf? Orot babin tanibais gewasin tanasinaf o kakafin tanasinaf? Orot babin ana ma gewas isan taniyawas o ana yawas tanagurus?”
42006010	Jesu tatabir sabuw nutitiyih in sawar basit orot isan eo, “Uma kubora’ah.” Naatu orot uman bora’ah, marta’imon orot uman igewasin.
42006011	Etei hima’am yah so’ar higagamat taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot Jesu isan boro mi’itube tanasinaf?”
42006012	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu yoyobanamih yen in oyaw wanamaim tit, naatu imaim ma God isan yoyoban in marto.
42006013	Mar auman basit, ana bai’ufununayah etei eaf ayuwih hiru’ay, naatu wanawanahimaim orot etei 12 rubinih, wabih tur abarayan iwaben.
42006014	Naatu iti i tur abarayah wabih, Simon (wabin ta Peter, Jesu uf biwab) naatu Peter tain Andrew, James, John, Philip naatu Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthew, Thomas naatu Alpheus natun James naatu Simon (Zerot teo),
42006016	James natun Judas, naatu Judas Iscariot, (Jesu baban eo momorob).
42006017	Jesu ana tur abarayah bairi oyawane himatabir hire hina hititit ana maramaim, ana bai’ufununayah etei hiru’ay butun ana yabarinamaim bairi hibat, naatu sabuw maumurih na’in Judea wanawanan, Jerusalem wanawanan hiru’ay, naatu torane bar merar rou’ab, Taiya, Sidon auman sabuw etei hiru’ay.
42006018	Hiruru’ay anayabin i tur nowar isan naatu hai sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am baiyawasih isan hina. Naatu sabuw afa demon kakafih hibiwawa’anih auman hinan etei iyawasih.
42006019	Sabuw etei i hikokok Jesu hitabutubun, anayabin hibubutubun ana veya, ana fair titit i etei biyawasih.
42006020	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nutitiyih in sawar basit eo, “Yababan wairafi yasisir boro kwanab, anayabin God ana aiwob i kwa nowa!
42006021	Kwa iyab boun bayumih kwabi’akir boro kwaniyasisir bay kwanaa ya hinagadid! Kwa iyab boun kwarererey boro kwaniyasisir kwanamarib!
42006022	Sabuw hinifa’ifa’i, hinakwahiri, tur kakafih hina’uwi naatu kakafi hinarouw hinao ana maramaim kwaniyasisir, anayabin Orot Natun kwabi’ufunun!
42006023	Imih sawar iti na’atube hinamamatar ana veya kwanakawasa naatu kwaniyasisir kwanaben. Anayabin a baiyan gagamin na’in maramaim inu’in. Abisa tisisinaf anayabin hai a’agir dinab oro’orot isah sawar iti na’atube hisinaf.
42006024	Baise kwa iyab boun sawar wairafi kwama’am boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab! Anayabin kwa i yasisiramaim kwama’am!
42006025	Kwa iyab boun bay kwa’aa ya higadid kwama’am boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab bayumih kwanamorob! Kwa iyab boun kwaiyasisir kwamamarib boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab kwanarerey kwanitarkoukuw.
42006026	Kwa iyab sabuw wab tebobora’ara’ah boro yababan gagamin maiyow kwanab! Anayabin hai a’agir dinab baifufuwenayah isah na’atube hisinaf.
42006027	Kwa iyab iti tur kwanonowar a tur ao’owen a kamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih, sabuw iyab tibifa’ifa’i isah gewasin kwanasinaf.
42006028	Sabuw iyab hinao’orarafi, God kwanifefeyan baigegewasin nitih, naatu sabuw iyab isa kakafin hinasisinaf isah kwanayoyoban.
42006029	Orot yait rebareb nabifafar na’at, raunane’ebo inabotabir nifafar. Naatu orot ta a biyabaibiyon tafan nikiya’ub nabaib na’at, baban auman inau nikiya’ub nab.
42006030	Orot babin ta sawar isan nabifefeyani initih, naatu orot babin ta sawar o nowa ebaib, kwihamiy ebai, men bainamih inao maiye.
42006031	A kok mi’itube sabuw isa tisisinaf na’atube, ibo isah na’atube inasinaf.
42006032	Sabuw o tibiyabuw akisih isah inabiyabow na’at, aisim boro baigegewasin inab? Sabuw kakafih turahinah tibiyabuwih akisih boro hiniyabuwih!
42006033	Naatu sabuw o isa gewasin tesisinafuwat isah gewasin inasisinaf na’at, aisim boro baigegewasin inab? Sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih na’atube tisisinaf.
42006034	Sabuw iyab kubitih o iso’ob i boro wan hinay maiye hinabit na’at, aisim boro baigewasin inab? Sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih i hiso’ob turahinah tibitih ana fofonin boro wan hinab maiye!
42006035	En! Baise akamabiy sabuw kwaniyabuwih, a gewasin kwanitih. Kwanitin men wan isan kwananot. Saise a baiyan gagamin na’in boro kwanab, naatu God auyomtoro’ot natunatunamih boro kwanamatar. Anayabin sabuw iyab aurih merarayow en, sabuw kakafih God nati sabuw isah i ebigewasin.
42006036	Tamat ekakabeber na’atube kwanakabeber.
42006037	Taituwa inibatiyih, God boro obo nibatiyi, naatu taituwa ubar initih God boro obo ubar nit, taituwa hai kakafin inanotawiy, God boro a kakafin nanotawiy.
42006038	Uma natasasar taituw isah, God boro uman natasasar o isa. Tur anababatun o boro inab uma awan nakasuwai. Turobe baibais boro uma yan nasuwa nare inab nayen uma awan nakaratan. Sabuw inabitih ana fofonin God boro na’atube fofon ta’imon nit.”
42006039	Naatu Jesu oroubon ta iti na’atube eo, “Orot matan fim men karam boro fim turan nanawiy hairi hinan, anayabin nanawiy hairi hinanan na’at boro hairi’ika hinan hub hinare.
42006040	Kirum kek men yait ta boro ana bai’obaiyenayan nanatabirimih, baise na kirum nan yomanin na’a’asa’ub ana veya, i boro ana bai’obaiyenayan na’atube namatar.
42006041	Aisim tai matan momor i’itin ku’u? Baise o mata ai bahun yi ebatabat men kutatatam.
42006042	O mata ai bahun yi batabat men itatam, naatu tai isan i’o Aro, nekuna mata momor abosair, a naniyan mi’itube ibai kuo? Wanawanan rerekabih! Matoro’ot o mata ai bahun ina’uy, imaibo boro inanuw gewas tai matan momor ina’itin inabosair.
42006043	Ai gewasin nabiw ro’on boro men kakafin nayai, na’atube ai wanawanan kour nabiw ro’on boro men gewasin nayai.
42006044	Ai etei’imak boro ro’ohimaim ina’itah, fafou ro’on boro men agor afe’en inima’ub, na’atube waris boro men digumar afe’en inawasarir hinare.
42006045	Orot gewasin totobuyoy gewasin dogoronamaim tema’am boro nitaman nit. Orot kakafin totobuyoy kakafih dogoronamaim tema’am boro nitaman nit. Anayabin orot awanamaim abisa kakafin ititit, dogoron wanawanan i kakafin awan karatan inu’in.
42006046	Aisim ayu isau kwa’o, ‘Regah, Regah,’ baise abisa au’uwi i men na’atube kwasisinaf?
42006047	Orot yait na ayu au tur nowar ebobosiyasiyar, ana itinin i iti ani’obaiyi kwana’itin.
42006048	Orot ana bar wowabinamih hub kair re kabay afe’en tutut rouw, bar wowab. Harew tit yen bar bufut rab, baise bar men iyuwiyuw, anayabin bar wowab gewas.
42006049	Baise o yait ayu au tur inowar men kubobosiyasiyar, i orot ana bar wabat en wowowab na’atube, bar tutut en wowab batabat, harew tit yen bar rabirab ana veya mar ta’imonamo ufar re, naatu nati bar re’er i mutufor tarogowan.”
42007001	Jesu tur etei eo binan sabuw hinowar in sasawar ufunamaim na Capernaum tit.
42007002	Nati’imaim Roman baiyowayan orot ukwarin ana akirwairafin isan biyabow kwanekwan i sawow gagamin bai morobomih biwa’an.
42007003	Baise Jesu na nati’imaim titit ana tur nonowar ana maramaim, Jew hai orot gagamih iyunih hin Jesu biyan hitit ana akir wairafin baiyawasin isan Jesu hifefeyan.
42007004	Basit Jew hai orot gagamih hina Jesu biyan hitit turobe’emaim hifefeyan hio, “Iti orot ana yababan i ekokok kwanekwan o baibais initin ana akir wairafin iniyawas.
42007005	Anayabin ata sabuw isah i yabow, aki ai Kou’ay Bar wowab.”
42007006	Basit bairi hin, naatu hina bar hibiyubin auman, baiyowayan orot ana ofonah afa iyunih hin Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Regah aki ai of iti na’atube eo, Aisim inan a nababan, anayabin ayu men orot gagamu boro inan au bar inatit.
42007007	Na’atube ayu auman taiyuwu ai’itu ayu men orot gewasu boro anan nanamaim anatit, baise akokok turawat nao au akir wairafin boro nayawas.
42007008	Anayabin ayu auman baiyowayah orot isah, au fair ema’am, orot ta aniyun anao, ‘Ni’imaim kwen.’ I boro nan, naatu orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti’imaim kuna.’ I boro nan, naatu au akir wairafin orot ta isan anao, ‘Iti kusinaf.’ I boro nasinaf.”
42007009	Jesu iti orot ana tur nonowar ifofofor men kafaita, naatu tatabir sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen Israel wanawananamaim ama areremor, men kafa’imo orot ta ana baitumatum iti na’atube aitinimih.”
42007010	Imaibo orot kob nayah himatabir maiye hin bar hititit, akir wairafin yawas ma’am hi’itin.
42007011	Nati ufunamaim sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in, naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hin bar merar wabin Nain imaim hitit.
42007012	Jesu na bar merar ana fur awan titit auman, kwafur babin natun orot ta’imonamo morob, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in kwafur babin hibai hirerey auman natun hi’abar hititit bairi hitar.
42007013	Jesu nuw kwafur babin i’itin ana maramaim dogoron wanawanan yababan awankaratan naatu kwafur isan eo, “Babin men inarerey.”
42007014	Imaibo na sabuw biyah tit eof ir sum butubun, sabuw orot hi’abar hinan hinutanub hibat, Jesu orot murubin isan eo, “Orot boubun kumisirimih ayu ao!”
42007015	Orot murubin inu’in yawas misir mare ma tur eo. Jesu nawiy hairi hin hinah itin.
42007016	Sabuw etei orot murubin yawas mimisir hi’itin hai bir ra’at baise God ana merar hiyi wabin hibora’ara’ah hio, “Dinab orot fairin anababatun wanawanatamaim tit! God ana sabuw baiyawasih isan na!”
42007017	Jesu iti sisinaf ana tur ra’at tafaram Judea wanawanan hima’am etei hinowar na’atube tafaram nati sisibinamaim hima’am auman hinowar.
42007018	Sawar iti etei isah John ana bai’ufununayah hina ana tur hio’owen ufunamaim, ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab iuwih eo, “Kwanan Regah kwanibatiy, John o isa eo anonowar, o iti ina, ai aki boro orot ta isan anama anakaif?”
42007019	Sawar iti etei isah John ana bai’ufununayah hina ana tur hio’owen ufunamaim, ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab iuwih eo, “Kwanan Regah kwanibatiy, John o isa eo anonowar, o iti ina, ai aki boro orot ta isan anama anakaif?”
42007020	Iti na’atube eo imaibo hina Jesu biyan hitit ana tur hi’owen hio, “Aki John Baptist o baibatiyimih iyafari ana, imih akokok inao ananowar, John o isa eo anonowar o iti ina, o aki boro orot ta isan anama anakaif.”
42007021	Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu sabuw maumurih na’in hai sawow yumatah ta ta, naatu demon kauh hiyen hima hibiwawa’anih etei biyawasih. Naatu sabuw moumurih na’in matah fim iwa’an matah higewasin hinuwanuw.
42007022	Imih Jesu John ana bai’ufununayah iyafutih eo, “Kwamatabir kwan abisa kwa’i’itah John ana tur kwa’owen. Sabuw matah fim higewasin tinuwanuw, ah kafikafirih higewasin hibat tereremor, kokom ani’anih biyah igewasin, tainih gugurih higewasin tur tenonowar, naatu sabuw morobone abiyawasih, tur gewasin i yababan sabuw isah abibinan.
42007023	Sabuw iyab erekasiy auman ayu tibitutumu i boro men baigegewasin hinab!”
42007024	Kob nayah himatabir John isan hinan ufut, Jesu tatabir sabuw rau’ay gagamin hina hima’am ibatiyih eo, “Arar yan John abisa sisinaf itinamih kwatit kwan? Kotar wadar bi’inuwas itinamih kwan?
42007025	Abisa itinamih kwatit kwan? Orot sawar wairafin e’abur gewas ma’am itinamih kwan? En anayabin sabuw hai abur gewasin i bar gewasihimaim tema’am.
42007026	Imih kwao anowar. Abisa itinamih kwan? Dinab orot? Turobe, baise a tur ana’owen, iti orot i dinab oro’orot etei tafahimaim.
42007027	Anayabin John isan, God iti na’atube eo Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum, ‘Ayu au tur abarayan boro wan o namaim aniyafar nan o a ef nayabuna.’
42007028	Jesu iban eo maiye, “‘Tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, baibin hitatoub wanawanahimaim, orot men yait ta John natabirimih. Baise orot ta God ana aiwobomaim taiyuwin bikafai i John natabir.”
42007029	Sabuw etei, kabay o’onayah auman tur hinonowar ana maramaim, hiorereb God ana ef i turobe mutufurin, anayabin iti sabuw etei’imak i John bapataito itih.
42007030	Baise Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah God abisa sinafumih kokok i hikwahir men hisinaf naatu John ana bapataito hikwahir.
42007031	“Imih sabuw iti boun tema’am hai itin boro abisa’amaim anayai anao? Hai itinin i mi’itube?
42007032	Sabuw hai itinin i Kek gidigidih urababan tefafafow na’atube. Kek turih boro turahinah isah hio, ‘Aki tabin ana douduf arabirab baise kwa men kwabenabenamih. Naatu aki morob ana ew atatabor, baise kwa men kwarerereyamih.’
42007033	John Baptist nan ana veya’amaim yohar bay, harew fokarih men eaa tomatom, naatu kwa kwao, ‘Iti orot i demon kaun hiyen!’
42007034	Baise Orot Natun na bay harew eaa tomatom kwa kwao, ‘Iti orot i ana bay aa naatu ana harew tom kakafin, kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah hai begon!’
42007035	Baise God ana ukwar rerekab i sabuw iyab hikok tebaib isah ebiturobe.”
42007036	Pharisee orot ta wabin Simon Jesu ifefeyan na ana baremaim hairi bay aa isan, basit Jesu na orot ana bar run hairi hima bay hi’aa.
42007037	Babin ta bowabow kakafin wairafin nati bar meraramaim ma’am, Jesu Pharisee ana baremaim ma bay eaa ana tur nowar, basit re kibub wabin alabaster kabayamaim hikwak biya rarouw yamurin gewasin hisuwai batabat bai na
42007038	Jesu ufunane bat, anamaim rerey maturin re an hihuruf, naatu kwafure aribunamaim Jesu an sasam naatu an mamay. Imaibo raiy bai Jesu anamaim isuwai re.
42007039	Iti na’atube sisinaf Pharisee orot i’itin ana maramaim, nuhinamaim not eo, “Iti orot dinab mowan na’at iti babin ebubutubun boro taso’ob, naatu boro taso’ob iti babin i yait, anayabin iti babin i bowabow kakafin wairafin!”
42007040	Naatu Jesu eo, “Simon, ayu tur ta anao inanowar.” “Bo i aisim bai’obaiyenayan. Kuo anowar.”
42007041	Jesu eo, “Orot rou’ab hin orot ta kabay wairafin biyan kabay isan hifefeyan, basit orot 500 kina bai orot ta itin naatu 50 kina bai orot ta itin.
42007042	Baise ana maramaim orot hairi aurih men karam boro orot kabay wairafin ana kabay wan hitay, imih orot kabay matuwan turan hairi’ika wabih bosairen. Imih orot menatan isan i ana yabow ra’at?”
42007043	Simon Jesu iya’afut eo, “Anotanot orot nati kabay gagamin baibine.” Imaibo Jesu Simon iu, “Nati kuo i turobe.”
42007044	Imaibo Jesu tatabir babin isan Simon iu, “Iti babin i’itin? Ayu ana o a bar atit o men au sauwin isan harew iyai’imih, baise iti babin maturinamaim au sauw naatu aribunamaim au sasam.
42007045	O men au merar iyi imamayu’umih, baise iti babin a bar aruruka busuruf au mamay men ihamiyimih.
42007046	O men olive iroro’onamaim aribu isuwei’imih, baise iti babin raiy yamurin gewasin au’umaim isuwai re.
42007047	Imih anababatun a tur ao’owen, iti babin ana bowabow kakafin maumurih na’in etei’imak anotanot tawiyen, anayabin ana yabow gagamin na’in ayu itu. Baise orot yait ana bowabow kakafin kikimin anotanotawiyen i ana yabow kikimin.”
42007048	Imaibo Jesu babin isan eo, “A bowabow kakafih etei i anotanotawiyen.”
42007049	Sabuw afa bairi hima bay hi’aau, hibusuruf taiyuwih hibabatiyih, “Iti i abi’orot bowabow kakafih notawiyenayan.”
42007050	Baise Jesu babin isan eo, “O a baitumatumamaim iyawasi tufuwamaim inatit inan.”
42008001	Veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 bairi hin bar awan, awan hirun hitit God ana aiwob isan Tur Gewasin binan hiremor.
42008002	Hinan wanawanahimaim, i baibin afa sawow yumatah ta ta hibow hima’am, naatu demon kakafih hitar gubih hima’am Jesu biyawasih auman bairi hin. Mary wabin ta Magdalin biyanamaim demon seven Jesu nunih hititit auman bairi hin.
42008003	Naatu Herod ana bowayan orot ukwarin wabin Chuza i aawan Joanna, Susanna, naatu baibin afa auman bairi hin. Naatu iti baibin hai kabayamaim Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hibaisih hai bowabow wanawananamaim.
42008004	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow bar awan ta ta’ane hinan tafaram awan karatan, naatu Jesu oroubonamaim sabuw iuwih eo,
42008005	“Ana veya ta orot ana ub tanumamih bow in ana me bifufubiy yanamaim tit, naatu ana ub ta ta asi’asiy ana veya ub afa i ef yanamaim hire, sabuw hina tafan hibat hiwas tatanen hin, naatu mamu hire hibow hi’aa.
42008006	Ub afa i to yanamaim hire, baise hikuboubunih hiyey ana maramaim veya re rarih etei himorob, anayabin me owasasin.
42008007	Ub afa i kokor ro’oh wanawanahimaim hire, naatu hikuboubunih bairi hiyen, baise kokor hiyen sasa hai fafa’amaim ub gewasih hirouw.
42008008	Naatu ub afa i me gewasin yanamaim hire, hikuboubunih hiyen gewas hiw ai ta’ita’imon afe’eh ro’oro’oh etei 100 na’atube hiya.” Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “O yait tain nama’am na’at iti tur inanowar.”
42008009	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hikok oroubon anayabin so’ob isan hina hibatiy.
42008010	Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “So’ob wa’iwa’irin God ana aiwob isan i God kwa it, baise sabuw afa isah i oroubonamaim ao, saise abisa bukamaim hikikirum niturobe, ‘Matah hinakubar hinanuw, baise boro men hina’itin, tainih nawayay tur hinanowar, baise boro men naniyan hinab.’”
42008011	“Oroubon anayabin i iti. Ub i God ana tur gewasin.
42008012	Ub ef yanamaim hire’ere i sabuw God ana tur hinowar hibai, baise Demon Mowan na tur gewasin sabuw dogorohimaim bosair, anayabin Demon Mowan men ekokok sabuw tur gewasin hinanowar hinitumatum naatu yawas hinab.
42008013	Ub afa to yan hire’ere, i sabuw God ana tur tenonowar ana maramaim i tibiyasisir, baise aurin an wairoron en, anayabin tur tenonowar ana veya boro hinitumitum naatu routobon nan nabubuwih ana veya boro mar ta’imon hinara’iy.
42008014	Ub afa kokor ro’on wanawanah hire’ere, i sabuw God ana tur tenonowar, baise iti tafaram ana yasisir, tafaram ana yababan, naatu tafaram ana sawar isah tenotanot kwanekwan; imih ro’oh etei tekokokor naatu men ta ebiyamur.
42008015	Baise ub me gewasin yan hire’ere, i sabuw iyab God ana Tur Gewasin hinowar dogoroh tutufin etei hibai, naatu nati tur isan hiten nowanowar tebowabow boro niw.
42008016	“Orot men yait ta ramef ito’ab noukwat wanawanan tarafut in, o gem babanamaim yai in to’abamih. Baise ana efanamaim sikof, saise sabuw boro ana marakawin hina’itin naatu kawin hinan bar hinarun.”
42008017	“Anayabin abisa baibunuwenamaim inu’in, God boro nabotait nirerereb, naatu abisa hisakirafut inu’in, sum boro natakweb nan bebeyan marakawamaim natit.”
42008018	Imih tur iti kwanonowar i kwananowar gewas, anayabin orot yait isnubanub tur enonowar gewagewas, God boro dogoron nabotawiy tur moumurih na’in naniyah boro naso’ob. Baise orot yait tur isan men isnubanub enonowar, dogoron boro nahirafut naatu abisa kikimin ana notamaim ma enotanot auman God boro nabosair.”
42008019	Jesu hinah naatu taitin itinamih hina, baise men karam boro hita run biyan hitatit, anayabin sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in ef hifut.
42008020	Orot ta na Jesu biyan tit eo, “O hinat naatu taitit hina ufun tebatabat tekokok o hina’iti.”
42008021	Jesu sabuw etei nati hibatabat iuwih eo, “Sabuw iyab God ana tur hinowar tebobosiyasiyar, nati sabuw i ayu hinai naatu taitu.”
42008022	Ana veya ta Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi wa afe’en hiyen naatu iuwih, “Kwana boy tana rabon tanan harew kukuf rewan raunane tanayen.” Basit wa hinatait hitit,
42008023	rar hikutatar hirabon hin. Nati ana veya’amaim Jesu matan fot wa wanawanan inure inu’in naniyan meyemeye wowog batabat tafair tit kukuf yan re rabih, wa harew iwan hisiwisiw men karam.
42008024	Basit bai’ufununayah hina Jesu hibunibun hio, “Regah, Regah! Wa iu’unun tana morob!” Jesu misir wowog, yabat hairi kwararih iuwih, mar ta’imonamo nuwarob e’afuw.
42008025	Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Kwa a baitumatum i menamaim kwayai?” Baise bai’ufununayah hifofofor naatu hibir taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti orot i yait? Yabat naatu wowog iu’uwih i marta’imon fanan hibai.”
42008026	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hiboy hirabon hin tafaram Gerasa imaim hitit, Galilee harew kukuf rewan raunane.
42008027	Jesu wa afe’enane dones yan bisure auman, orot ta nati bar merarane demon koun hiyen hiforatoun kwamur manin maiyow ana bar itumar, segar rah yahimaim, watu’umaim in ma reremor tit nan hairi hitar.
42008028	Naatu nuw Jesu i’itin ana veya nanamaim ra’iy rerey fanan aumetawat na’in iwow eo, “Jesu God auyomtoro’ot Natun, ayu isau boro abisa inasinafumih kunan? Abifefeyani men baimakiy initu!”
42008029	Iti na’atube eo, anayabin demon mowan orot baihamiyin titamih Jesu kwarartatab iu. Mar maumurih maiyow demon kakafih iti orot ana yawas etei hibi’a’afiy, an uman seinimaim ti’utan dibur baremaim tekaif tema’am, baise itukwar chain tituru’uru’um, tebonawiy ten arar yan imaim ema ereremor.
42008030	Jesu ibatiy eo, “O wab i mi’itube?” Orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu wabu i ‘Burut.’” Anayabin demon maumurih na’in iti orot wanawanan hirun hiforatoun hima’am.
42008031	Demon Jesu hifefeyan men hikok boro tiyafarih hitan Sou Awan Wanu’umin hitama. *
42008032	Naatu nati oyaw sisibinamaim i for burut hima hi’u’ufar, imih demon na for wanawanah run isan Jesu hifefeyan, naatu Jesu ana baibasit itih, iuwih hibihir hitit.
42008033	Demon orot biyanane hitit i hinunuw hin for wanawanah hirun, naatu for burut hibatabat fan naiwan hinunuw hire hin harew kukuf yan hire etei hi’atomatom himorob.
42008034	Naatu orot nati for hima’uten hima’am, abisa matar hi’itin, himisir hinunuw hin bar merar hitit, sabuw etei hai tur hi’owen. Naatu tur tasasar in sabuw afa bar merar gidigidihimaim hima’am auman hinowar.
42008035	Sabuw abisa mamatar itinamih hitit hina Jesu biyan hititit, orot demon hiforatoun hima’am Jesu biyawas, i Jesu sisibinamaim mare, ukwarin ruboun ar bai us ma’am hi’itin hai bir ra’at.
42008036	Naatu sabuw afa orot demon hiforatoun hima’am Jesu mi’itube iyawas hi’i’itin sabuw afa hai tur hi’owen.
42008037	Naatu sabuw nati tafaram Gerasa wanawanan hima’ama, Jesu hiu tafaram itumar, anayabin hai bir ra’at, naatu Jesu re wa bai matabir maiye rabon.
42008038	Naatu Orot nati demon biyanamaim hititit Jesu ifefeyan hairi namih, baise Jesu eo, “O i abiyafari
42008039	ina’intabir maiye a bar, abisa God isa sisinaf, i sabuw hai tur ina’owen.” Basit orot in bar merar run remor Jesu isan mi’itube sisinaf sabuw etei hai tur eowen.
42008040	Jesu matabir rabon na harew kukuf rewan raunane yey ana maramaim, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit ana merar hiyi, anayabin isan hima hikakaif natit.
42008041	Naatu Jew hai Kou’ay Bar * kaifenayan orot wabin Jairus na Jesu nanamaim sun yowen ifefeyan, ana kok i mi’itube Jesu hairi hitan ana bar.
42008042	Anayabin i natun babitai ta’imonamo ana kwamur 12 na’atube i ana sawow ra’at momorob. Naatu Jesu busuruf inan, sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hitit nan ufun awan karatan.
42008043	Nati sabuw wanawanahimaim i babin ta ana faifuwamaim rara kakafin bota’ar ma’am kwamur etei 12 na’atube sawar, yawas isan kabay gagamin maiyow doket tubunih baiyawasin isan sinaf, baise men yait ta iyawasimih.
42008044	Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw rau’ay hinan wanawanan babin na Jesu ufunane tit eof ana faifuw tainin butubun, naatu mar ta’imonamo rara kakafin nununuw nutanub.
42008045	Jesu naniyan tatam eo, “Yait ayu butubunu?” Baise sabuw etei hiyaub, naatu Peter eo, “Regah, sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in na ufu awan karatan tenan ku’i’itih o kuo.”
42008046	Baise Jesu eo, “Sabuw afa ayu hibutubunu. Anayabin hibubutubunu ana veya’amaim au fair titit naniyan atatam.”
42008047	Babin naniyan baib i yawas naatu men karam boro tibun, imih Jesu nanamaim an uman hi’oror auman tit sun yowen, sabuw etei matahimaim ana tur eowen aisim butubun, naatu bubutubun ana veya’amaim marta’imon yayawas auman ana tur eowen.
42008048	Imaibo, Jesu babin isan eo, “Natu a baitumatumamaim iyawas. Tufuwamaim ina remor inan.”
42008049	Jesu iti na’at bat eo auman, Kou’ay Bar ana bonawiyen orot ana barene kob hina hitit hio, “Jairus o natu babitai i morob, imih men bai’obaiyenayan nawiyin airi na isan inanotamih.”
42008050	Iti na’at hibat hio Jesu nowar, naatu Jairus isan eo, “Men inabir, baise initumatum natu babitai boro nayawas.”
42008051	Naatu hina bar hititit ana veya’amaim, sabuw etei eotanih ufun hibat, i Peter, John, James, naatu kek hinah tamah akisihimo iuwih bairi bar wanawanan hirun.
42008052	Sabuw etei kek momorob isan hiyababan hima hirererey, Jesu iuwih eo, “Men kwanarerey, kek i matan fot inu’in, men morobomih.”
42008053	Sabuw etei Jesu eo i bai’iyab na’atube imih himarib. Anayabin i matah yan kek morob hi’itin hiso’ob.
42008054	Baise Jesu na kek uman bai, eaf eo, “Babitai, kumisir!”
42008055	Babitai ayubin matabir na wanawanan run, mar ta’imon yawas misir mare ma. Imaibo Jesu kek bay baitin aa isan hinah tamah iuwih.
42008056	Kek hinah tamah hifofofor men kafaita, baise Jesu eofafarih eo, “Abis matar kwa’i’itin men orot babin ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”
42009001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah etei I2 eaf ayuwih hina hitit, demon kakafih nunih isan, naatu sawow yumatah ta ta bosaisiren isan fair itih, naatu eonowahih.
42009002	Imaibo God ana aiwob binan isan naatu sawusawuwih baiyawasih isan iyafarih hitit hin.
42009003	Naatu iuwih, “A nanawan isan kwanatitit ana maramaim men sawar afa kwanabow auman kwananamih, men hafoy, tu, kabay, bay, o wanabir.
42009004	Kwananan sabuw iyab hina’iti a merar hinay hinabubuwi na’at, nati bar meraramaim kwanama a bowabow kwanisawar imaibo kwanatit.
42009005	Baise sabuw men a merar hinay hinabubuwi na’at, a fofob kwanarutatab nare naatu nati bar merar kwanihamiy kwanatit, baimatnuwen ana orereb na’atube.”
42009006	Imaibo bai’ufununayah hitit hin bar awan, awan hirun hitit God ana aiwob isan tur gewasin hibinan naatu sawusawuwih hiyayawasih.
42009007	Herod, Galilee sabuw hai aiwob orot, sawar iti himamatar hai tur nonowar ana veya ana kasiy ra’at, anayabin sabuw afa hio John Baptist morobone matabir maiye,
42009008	sabuw afa hio, Elijah marane ra’iy, sabuw afa hio, “Dinab orot ta marasika momorob i yawas maiye matabir na.”
42009009	Baise Herod eo, “Ayu taiyuwu aso’ob John i ayu sikan ao hi’afuw, naatu iti orot i yait iti bowabow sinaf ana tur anonowar?” Iti na’atube eo naatu kok i orot ana yumat itinamih nuwih.
42009010	Jesu ana tur abarayah himatabir hina hitit, sawar abisa’awat hisisinaf ana tur hi’owen. Naatu nawiyih hitit akisihimo hin tafaram wabin Bethsaida imaim hima.
42009011	Baise sabuw maumurih na’in Jesu au Bethsaida inan ana tur hinowar, naatu hi’ufunun hin biyan hitit. Hai merar yi God ana aiwob isan binan hinowar naatu sawusawuwih iyawasih.
42009012	Veya re birabirab auman bai’ufununayah 12 hin Jesu hiu, “Sabuw kwiyafarih ten bar iti yubinamaim naatu masawabar iti yubinamaim taituwah tema’am biyah bay hinanuwet hinabow hinaa, naatu efan auman hinanuwet fai hina’in, anayabin iti efan i owararin.”
42009013	Baise Jesu iuwih, “Bay i boro kwa kwanitih hinaa.” Bai’ufununayah hiya’afut, “Rafiy fafar umat roun naatu siy rou’abamo efanamaim ti’inu’in. Kukokok aki anan sabuw etei’imak isah bay anatobon?”
42009014	Sabuw nati’imaim hiru’ay hima tur hinonowar nah etei i 5,000 na’atube. Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih, “Sabuw kwa’uwih nah 50 na’atube kou’ay tata’amaim timarir.”
42009015	Bai’ufununayah Jesu eo na’atube sabuw hi’uwih himarir.
42009016	Imaibo Jesu rafiy fafar umat roun bow, naatu siy rou’ab bow, au mar nuw ra’at, God ana merar yi igegewasin sawar, im seseb ana bai’ufununayah itih hibow sabuw hifaramih hi’aa.
42009017	Sabuw etei hi’aa yah iw naatu bai’ufununayah kaifet etei 12 hibow sabuw bay hi’aau turih hibihamiyen hiwan awah hikufoten.
42009018	Ana veya ta Jesu akisinamo ma yoyoyoban ana bai’ufununayah hina biyan hitit ibatiyih eo, “Sabuw ayu isau mi’itube’ewat teo kwanonowar?”
42009019	Hiya’afut hio, “Sabuw afa teo o i John Baptist, afa teo o i Elijah, naatu afa teo o i God ana dinab oro’orot marasika himomorob i ta morobone yawas maiye na.”
42009020	Naatu ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Bo kwa ayu isou mi’itube kwanotanot?” Peter iya’afut eo, “O i God ana Roubininenayan.”
42009021	Imaibo Jesu eofafarih eo, “Men yait ta ana tur kwana’owenamih.”
42009022	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Jew hai orot gagamih, firis hai ukwarih na’atube Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah boro Orot Natun hinakwahir, biyababan gagamin na’in nab, hina’asabun namorob, baise veya baitounin ufunamaim boro morobone namisir maiye.”
42009023	Naatu etei’imak iuwih eo, “Orot yait ayu bai’ufnunu’umih nakokok na’at, taiyuwin ana yawas i nakwahir, mar etei ana onaf na’abar ayu ni’uf nunu.
42009024	Anayabin orot yait ana yawas i taiyuwin isan eo’oharihar boro nikasiy, baise orot yait ana yawas nakwahir ayu nabi’ufnunu, ma’ama wanatowan boro natita’ur.
42009025	Tafaram wanawanan orot ta sawar tutufin etei i bow karam, baise i taiyuwin ana yawas nabi’afiy, o hina bigegesair na’at, iti sawar bow ya ma tototo boro hinibais?
42009026	Orot yait ayu isou biyan eo’ohow, naatu au tur isan biyan nao’ohow na’at, Orot Natun ana bonamanamarinamaim na’atube Tamah God ana bonamanamarinamaim naatu ana tounamatar kakafiyih auman hai bonamanamarinamaim namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, boro ibo isan biyan na’ohow.
42009027	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, kwa iyab iti kwama’am boro yawas kwanama’am God ana aiwob kwana’itin.”
42009028	Tur iti eo hima fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim, Peter, John, naatu James buwih bairi hiyen hin oyaw wan yoyoban isan.
42009029	Naatu hiyen hin yoyoyoban ana maramaim yumatan botabir, ana faifuw hikwes anababatun namanamar ebowabow emamarakaw na’atube.
42009030	Nati ana maramaim naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab, Moses, Elijah hairi hirerereb,
42009031	mar ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman hira’iy Jesu ana bowabow iti tafaramamaim baisawarin matabir maiye isan, naatu God ana kok abisa Jesu Jerusalemamaim sinaf baiturobe isan bairi hio.
42009032	Peter ana ofonah bairi i nuhih bur hi’inu’in ufut iti sawar himatar, baise matah nuw himimisir auman Jesu biyanamaim bobonamanamar hi’itin naatu orot rou’ab bairi hibatabat hi’itih.
42009033	Naatu orot rou’ab Jesu hibihamiy auman, Peter Jesu isan eo, “Regah igewasin aki iti ama’amamaim sis tounu ana wowab, ta o isa ta Moses isan naatu Elijah isan!” Iti na’atube eo anayabin i men so’ob abisa eo.
42009034	Peter iti na’at bat eo auman sakusakuk ra’iy ana youninamaim tar sumih, naatu wanawanan hirur auman, bai’ufununayah yah birubir fafar.
42009035	Sakukuw wanawanan God eafatait eo, Iti Orot i Ayu Natu, ayu arubin imih nao’o kwananowar.”
42009036	Iti tur hinowar in sasawar ufunamaim Jesu akisinamo batabat hi’itin. Naatu bai’ufununayah sawar abisa nati ana veya’amaim hi’itin men yait ta ana tur hi’owen awah hibofot hima.
42009037	Marto Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hire hina oyaw an hitit, naatu nati’imaim sabuw hima’am hina biyah hitit.
42009038	Orot ta sabuw rau’ay wanawanahimaim batabat e’af eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, abifefeyani kunuw natu ku’itin, natu ta’imon maiyow!
42009039	Demon kakafih kaun teyey ana veya eororsair iwow ere erab awan fusifusin ekubar in erabirab biyan riririr ebiwa’an. Naatu iti na’atube i mar etei esisinaf men kafa’imo ebihamiyimih.
42009040	A bai’ufununayah ai fefeyanih, demon nuninamih auwih, baise men karam.”
42009041	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa sabuw iti boun ana veya aur baitumatum naatu ayawas etei i hibibir. Kwanotanot ayu boro bairit manin tanama abit ana’abar? A kek kubai kuna aitin.”
42009042	Kek nan auman demon kakafin kek bai rab rouw me yan re naatu ifiruruw in hub itaiy re. Baise Jesu demon kakafin kwarar tatab nun tit kek iyawas bai tamah itin.
42009043	Sabuw etei’imak God ana fair hi’itin hifofofor men kafaita. Sabuw Jesu abisa sisinaf isan, hibat hibifofofor wanawanan Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo,
42009044	“Tain kwanarub gewas tur iti anao kwananowar. Orot Natun i boro baban hinao naatu hinab sabuw umahimaim hinayai.”
42009045	Baise bai’ufununayah iti tur naniyan men hibai, tur anayabin hai notamaim ibun, naatu baibatiyin tur anayabin o nowar isan hibir.
42009046	Bai’ufununayah taiyuwih wanawanahimaim, yait orot gagamin isan hio hinan gamin matar.
42009047	Jesu abisa hinotanot itin, basit kek kafa’i ta bai na sisibinamaim iu bat.
42009048	Imaibo iuwih, “Orot yait kek kafai iti na’atube nab ayu wabu’umaim ana merar nayiy, i ayu au merar eyiy. Naatu orot yait ayu au merar eyiy i orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana merar eyiy. Anayabin orot yait kwa wanawanamaim wabin en kek kikimin na’atube ema’am, nati orot i gagamin.”
42009049	John misir eo, “Regah, orot ta o wabimaim demon kakafih nununih a’itin naatu a’otan. Anayabin nati orot i men it ata kou’ayomaim ema’ama.”
42009050	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Men ina’otanimih, anayabin orot yait kwa isa men ebirakit i kwa isa ebatabat.”
42009051	Jesu au mar yen isan ana veya na kakabom auman, ana not bogaigiwas yen in au Jerusalem.
42009052	Naatu kob wan iyafarih hin Samaria bar merar hitit ana efan hitayabuna tanan imaim ta’in isan.
42009053	Baise Samaria sabuw men ana merar hiyi hibai efan hitinimih, anayabin hiso’ob Jesu i au Jerusalem yey.
42009054	Naatu bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab James John hairi iti na’atube hi’i’itin yah so’ar hio, “Regah, kukokok wairaf marane anao nara’iy iti sabuw nagurusih?”
42009055	Baise Jesu tatabir hairi’ika kwararih.
42009056	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hin bar merar ta hitit.
42009057	Ef hiyen hinan naiwanamaim orot ta Jesu ana tur eowen eo, “Ayu boro ani’ufnuni o menamaim kwenan boro imaim tanan.”
42009058	Jesu orot iya’afut iu, “Haruharu hai sau tema’am, naatu mamu hai batar tema’am, baise Orot Natun mare ma biyan tubaiwa’an isan aurin efan i en.”
42009059	Naatu Jesu tatabir orot ta isan eo, “Kwi’ufnunu airit tan.” Baise orot eo, “Regah akokok wan i boro inihamiyu anan tamai morob inu’in anab anan ana yai imaibo ani’ufnuni?”
42009060	Baise Jesu orot iya’afut eo, “Murubih kwaihamiyih boro murubih taiyuwih hinaya’ih. Baise o i kwen, God ana aiwob isan kubinan.”
42009061	Naatu orot ta na maiye eo, “Regah ayu i boro o ani’ufnuni, baise wan i boro anan hinai tamai naatu taitu tuwai’inah anao tuturih.”
42009062	Jesu iya’afut iu, “Orot yait busuruf ana me bifufubiy, naatu misir maiye bat au’uf enunutabitabir, God ana aiwobomaim boro men karam nabow.”
42010001	Iti ufunamaim Jesu orot afa’abo rubinih, nah etei 72. Naatu efan i na bainanawanamih notanot imaim rouru’ab wan iyafarih hin. Bar awan, awan hirun hitit hibinan hiremor.
42010002	Jesu iuwih eo, “Masaw i gagamin na’in iyamur, baise fourayah i matan ta’amo. Isan imih Regah fourayan matuwan isan kwanayoyoban saise bowayah moumurihika niyafarih hinan masaw hinafour.
42010003	Kwatit kwan! Sheep na’atube abiyafari haru kakafih wanawanahimaim kwananamih.
42010004	Kwanatitit umamaim men Kaukut ta kwanab, hafoy, a baibiyow ta kwanab; naatu efamaim men kwanabat sabuw kwanibabatiyihimih.
42010005	Bar menatan kwanarur wantoro’ot kwanao, “Tufuw kwa etei isa nama.’
42010006	Naatu nati bar wanawanan tufuw ana orot nama’am na’at, kwa tufuw kwabitin boro nab, baise en na’at, a tufuw kwabitin boro namatabir maiye kwanab.
42010007	Naatu bar nati kwarun kwabaib imaim kwanama, siwar abisa’awat tibit i kwanabow kwanaa kwanatom bairi kwanama, anayabin bowabow sabuw tebowabow i hai baiyan tebaib. Naatu men bar bar afe kwana yara’ara’ah kwanaremor.
42010008	Bar merar menatan kwanatitit a merar hinay hinabuwi, abisa hinabit kwanab kwana’aan,
42010009	nati bar meraramaim sawusawuwih kwaniyawasih, naatu hai tur kwana’owen ‘God ana aiwob i natit sawar.’
42010010	Baise bar merar menatan kwanarur sabuw men a merar hinayiy, kwanatit ef yan kwanabat kwanao,
42010011	‘Aki ai fofob iti a bar a meraramaim arutatab bebeyan abimatnuwi kwa a baimakiy isan. Baise men nuhi nabur God ana Aiwob i na iyubin sawar.’
42010012	Anababatun a tur ao’owen baibatebat ana veya nati bar merar sabuw i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in hinab, men Sodom sabuw hibaib na’atube’emih.
42010013	Chorazin sabuw naatu Bethsaida sabuw, kwa i boro sawar kakafin maiyow isa namatar! Anayabin ina’inan iti kwa biyamaim asisinaf marasika Taiya, Sidon sabuw biyahimaim ata sinaf, mar ta’imon boro hai bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan yuhwah gao hitarab hai kakafih hitae’en!
42010014	Baise baibatebat ana veya Taiya naatu Sidon sabuw God boro kaifai nakabibirih, naatu kwa i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in kwanab.
42010015	Kwa Capernaum sabuw! Wab kwabora’ah a fair kwabibigan, God boro nagurusi morob ana efanamaim nitaiy kwanare!”
42010016	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Orot yait a tur enonowar, nati i ayu au tur enonowar, na’atube orot yait ekwakwahiri nati i ayu ekwakwahiru. Naatu orot yait ayu ekwakwahiru, nati i yait ayu iyafaru anan i ekwakwahir.”
42010017	Orot nah etei 72 yasisiramaim hina Jesu biyan hitit hio, “Regah, o wabimaim demon au’uwih i mar ta’imon fanai hibai hititit.”
42010018	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Satan marane namanamar na’atube bokiyakiyat hea’obow re’er a’itin.
42010019	Kwananowar fair etei kwa ait aonowahi sawar, imih kwa boro kok naatu sana’ar tafah kwanabat kwanaremor, na’atube rakit hai ahay hai waf etei boro kwanawasatan, boro men abis ta niyababanimih.
42010020	Naatu demon kakafih kwa’uwih fana hibai hibibihir isan men kwaniyasisir. baise maramaim God wab kikirum isan i kwaniyasisir.”
42010021	Nati ana veya’amaim God Anunin Kakafiyin Jesu iwa’an yan wanawanan yasisir awan karatan eo, “Tamai o i mar tafaram ana aiwob! A merar ayiy anayabin sawar iti etei o sabuw so’obayah naatu sabuw notanotayah men i’obaiyih, baise ibun na’atube ma’am boro’obo natunat bereberefiy i i’obaiyih tesoso’ob isan, Tamai a merar ayiy, iti sawar etei i o a kokomaim isinaf temamatar.”
42010022	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Sawar tutufin etei Tamai ayu itu, men yait ta so’ob ayu i God Natun, baise Tamai akisinamo so’ob, na’atube men yait ta Tamai so’ob, baise ayu i Natun akisu’umo aso’ob. Naatu sabuw iyabowat i Natun rurubinihiwat boro God isah nirerereb hinaso’ob.”
42010023	Imaibo Jesu tatabir ana bai’ufununayah akisihimo iuwih eo, “Kwa i kwabiyasisir anayabin God ana bowabow anababatun mata yan kwa’i’itin.
42010024	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, dinab oro’orot naatu aiwob sabuw hikok kwanekwan kwa abisa kwa’i’itin i hita’itin naatu abisa kwanonowar, i hitanowar, baise men hi’itin naatu men hinowar.”
42010025	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayan orot so’obayan ta, Jesu baikubibiruwinamih misir ibatiy eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, ayu i boro abisa anasinaf ma’ama wanatowan anab?”
42010026	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in ibiyab hai yabih abisa’awat i’itan?”
42010027	Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah, a God isan, dogor tutufin etei, ayub tutufin etei, a fair tutufin etei, naatu a not tutufin etei a Regah isan iniyabow, naatu taituwa isah iniyabow, o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube.”
42010028	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Abisa i’o i tur anababatun i’o, isan imih kwen abisa i’o na’atube kusinaf saise ma’ama wanatowan boro inab.”
42010029	Baise ofafar bai’obaiyenayan taiyuwin bora’ah na’atube, imih Jesu ibatiy maiye, “Ayu taituwau i iyab?”
42010030	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ana veya ta Jerusalemane orot ta au Jericho re inan basit, sabuw kakafih wanawanah run, hitit ana faifuw hi’oromen hibai hirab hitaiy re imamayay in, ana sawar hibow hibihir hin.
42010031	Nati veya ta’imon firis ibo Jerusalemane au Jericho re inan basit, orot ef awan inu’in itin, baise ef sisibin raunane yagebageb bihir in.
42010032	Levi * orot ibo auman nati ef ta’imon re nan orot inu’in itin, naatu ef au waraunane yagebageb in.
42010033	Baise Samaria orot nati ef ta’imon remor re nan orot inu’in koun yen, naatu nuware i’itin ana veya’amaim ana yababan ra’at.
42010034	Basit na orot inu’inumaim tit, biyan feher matahimaim raiy isusuwa’en naatu biyan fiyow sawar, basit bai ana donkey * abe. afe’en yara’ah naatu bai hin nanawan bar ta imaim yai ma’uh ma.
42010035	Hi’in marto ana kaukut eofere kabay rou’ab * bai orot bar kaifenayan itin eo, ‘Iti orot inakaif airi kwanama, naatu abisa’awat isan inasisinaf ana matabir anan au tur ina’owen boro anibaiyani.’”
42010036	Iti na’at eo sawar basit, Jesu orot ibatiy, “Orot tounu wanawanahimaim orot menatan i taituwan kakafih hirab inu’in isan ana yabow i’inuw?”
42010037	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayan Jesu iya’afut eo, “Orot taituwan itin yan baban bibais.” Imaibo Jesu orot iu, “Kwenan nati na’atube kusinaf.”
42010038	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi efamaim hiremor hinan basit hina babin wabin Martha ana bar ana meraramaim hitit; hai merar yi buwih ana baremaim hirun.
42010039	Naatu i tain Mary na Jesu nanamaim mare ma, Jesu abisa eo i ma nonowar,
42010040	baise Martha bowabow etei akisin bowabow isan yan so’ar na eo, “Regah Mary sawar etei ihamiyen akisu abowabow ku’i’itin i mi’itube kunotanot? Karam boro itau tan tibaisu airi ata bow ai en?”
42010041	Regah iya’afut eo, “Martha, Martha, o i sawar moumurih na’in isah inot a yababan ra’at ya esoso’ar,
42010042	baise sawar ta’imon i takokok gagamin. Mary i sawar gewasih rubin, naatu boro men yait biyanamaim nabosairimih.”
42011001	Veya ta Jesu efan ta’amaim ma yoyoban inan, ana yoyoban sasawar ufunamaim ana bai’ufununayah orot ta natit eo, “Regah, kwi’obaiyi ana yoyoban, John ana bai’ufununayah bi’obaiyih na’atube.”
42011002	Jesu iuwih eo, “Yoyobanamih iti na’atube kwanayoyoban. Tamai, ‘A merar ayiy wab kakafiyin abobora’ara’ah, a aiwob nan wanawana’imaim narun.
42011003	Mar etei ana fofonin ai bay initi.
42011004	Ai bowabow kakafih kunotawiyen, sabuw afa aki isai hisisinaf kakaf anotanotawiyih na’atube. Naatu men routobonamaim inanawiyi.’”
42011005	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “O yait a of auman boro fainaiwan itan itafefeyan itao, “Au of akokok rafiy fafar tounu inibaisu,
42011006	anayabin ayu au of ta bai’esegamih inan na au bar tit naatu ayu auru bay en, imih o isa abifefeyan inibaisu.’
42011007	Naatu a of bar wanawanan boro na’afatit nao, ‘Men akokok au in ini’afiy, etawan i atufatan, naatu ayu natunatu bairi i a’inu’in, imih men karam boro ana misir bay anit.’
42011008	Naatu kwanotanot nati orot boro namisir ana of bay nitin? Ai, boro namisir ana of bay nitin, baise a tur ao’owen orot namisir ana of bay nabitin i men i ana of imih bay ebitin, baise anayabin, nati orot i ana fefeyanamaim ana of ihahar imih misir bay itin.
42011009	Imih a tur ao’owen. Inafefeyan boro inab, inanuwet boro inatitau’ur, inarukikitar etawan boro nabotawiy.
42011010	Anayabin Orot yait efefeyan boro nab, orot yait enunuwet boro natita’ur; naatu orot yait erurukikitar etawan boro nabotawiy.
42011011	Kwa kek tamahinah natunat siyamih hitarererey na’at boro siy efanin kok kwatitih hita’an?
42011012	O mamu foufunamih hitarererey na’at boro kafukafus kwatitih hita’an?
42011013	Kwa kek tamahinah, kwa i sawar kakafih moumurih maiyow kwasisinaf, baise natunat isah boro men nuhi naburumih, abisa isan hikokok tibiyababan boro kwanab kwanan kwanitih. Imih kwanaso’ob, Tamat maramaim baitinin isan i igewasin kwanekwan, imih sabuw iyab Anun Kakafiyin isan tefefefeyan boro nitih!”
42011014	Jesu demon awan bey nun tit; naatu demon bihir tit orot bihamiy ana veya’amaim orot busuruf tur eo, sabuw hai tur sawar hifofofor men kafaita.
42011015	Baise sabuw afa hio, “Nati i demon hai ukwarin wabin Beelzebul ana fair itin imih enununih.”
42011016	Naatu sabuw afa hikok i marane ina’inan ta tiwa’an hita’itin, imih hikubibiruw.
42011017	Baise abisa hinotanot Jesu so’ob naatu iuwih, “Tafaram ta’imon hinakusib rou’ab namatar hinabiyow, hai fair boro hina gurus, na’atube orot aawan natunatun aawat bairi hinakusib hinabiyow boro hinama kakaf.
42011018	Imih Satan an aiwob wanawananamaim hina kusisib hinabiyow, ana aiwob boro mi’itube fair nab nabat? Ayu iti tur ao anayabin i kwa a turamaim, ayu Beelzebul hai ukwarin fair baitu demon nunih kwarouw kwa’o.
42011019	Baise ayu Beelzebul ana fairamaim demon ana nununih na’at, bo kwa a bai’ufununayah fair yait itih demon tinununih? Imih kwa taiyuw a bai’ufununayah iti kwa’o isan hinabi’obaiyi kwa a tur i men turobe!
42011020	Baise ayu God ana fairamaim demon ana nunih hinatitit na’at, nati ebi’obaiyi God ana aiwob i natitaka.
42011021	Orot fairin aurin ahay waf karam ma ana bar ekakaif, ana sawar etei boro natafafar hina’in.
42011022	Baise orot fairin anababatun nati orot boro nawasfufur narun ana ahay ana waf tafahimaim ema’am boro niteten nan ana ofonah nafaramih bairi hinabow.
42011023	Orot yait ayu ananamaim men enan, i ayu isou ebiwosai, naatu orot yait men ibaisu airi sabuw abita’ay, i was geyayan.
42011024	Demon kakafin orot biyanamaim titit ana veya i efan gewasin ta imaim ma baiyarir isan nuwet in, baise nuwet inan efan men ta tita’ur, naatu eo, “Ayu i boro ana matabir maiye au bar abihamiy ana’itin.”
42011025	Basit matabir maiye na ana bar titit, hirereb hina yabuna inu’in itin.
42011026	Naatu tit in demon kakafih anababatun etei seven nawiyih bairi hina nati’imaim hisusuw hima. Yomaninamaim orot ana itinin botabir kakafin anababatun matar men marasika ma’am na’atube.”
42011027	Jesu iti na’atube bat binan sabuw hai tur eo’owen auman, babin ta sabuw wanawanahimaim ma’am, Jesu isan eo, “Babin yait taub o ya’i bitoman i ebiyasisir.”
42011028	Baise Jesu eo, “Sabuw iyab God ana tur hinowar tibi’ufunun i turobe anababatun tibiyasisir.”
42011029	Sabuw moumurih maiyow hiru’ay Jesu hi’ar bebera’uh, naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Boun ana veya’amaim sabuw hai yawas etei i eaf, ina’inan matar itah isan tefefefeyan, baise ina’inan ta boro men anitih, ina’inan ta’imon i Jonah isan mamatar i hiso’obaka.
42011030	Anayabin Jonah biyanamaim ina’inan mamatar i Nineveh sabuw isah. Imih Orot Natun i sabuw iti boun tema’am hai i’inanen.
42011031	Baibatebat ana veya tafaram Sheba hai aiwob babin boro namisir. Sabuw iti boun tema’ama boro tur fokarin maiyow na’uwih, anayabin ef yok na’in tafaram yomaninaka aiwob orot Solomon ana binan gewasin nowaramih natit, baise a tur ao’owen, sawar ta iti boun kwa’i’itin i Solomon natabir.
42011032	Naatu a tur ao’owen maiye, Baibatebat ana veya Nineveh sabuw boro hinamisir kwa iti kwama’am boro tur fokarin maiyow hina’uwi, anayabin Jonah binan hinonowar ufunamaim hai bowabow kakafih etei hihamiyen dogor baikitabir hibai, naatu boun i a tur ao’owen, orot ta Jonah tafanamaim i natit iti wanawanamaim ema’am.
42011033	Orot men ta ramef ito’ab naatu bai run ibunimih, o noukwat wanawanan tarafutimih. Baise ana sisikofamaim sikof, saise sabuw hinanan ana marakawin hina’itin boro hinarun.
42011034	Mata i biya ana hinow, mata gewasin biya etei boro marakawin. Baise mata kakafin biya etei boro nagugum.
42011035	Isan imih kwanakaifi gewas a marakaw biyamaim men kwaniwa’an nagugum.
