42011036	Biya tutufin etei namamarakaw na’at, biya turin boro men nagugum. Baise na biya wanawanan tutufin etei namarakaw, ramef ana marakaw tafamaim in ekukusisiyar na’atube.”
42011037	Jesu iti tur eo in sasawar ufunamaim, Pharisee orot ta kok i boro Jesu hairi hitan ana baremaim bay hitaa. Imih Jesu ifefeyan hairi hina ana bar hitit naatu bay aa ana efanamaim mare.
42011038	Baise Pharisee orot Jesu i’itin i men ofafar i’ufunun an souwibo na bay aa ana efanamaim mare, imih Pharisee orot ana kasiy ra’at.
42011039	Naatu Jesu iu, “Kwa Pharisee i a kerowas naatu a tew ufuhine kwa sasouwen, baise kwa dogor wanawanan i baribar kakafin naatu rougoy rabirabin.
42011040	Kwabikoko’aw! God biya ufunane wowowab na’atube biya wanawanan auman wowowab men kwaso’ob?
42011041	Imih a kerowas naatu a tew wanawanah abisa’awat tema’am yababan wairafih kwanitih hinaa, saise kwa a sawar etei boro hinigewasin.
42011042	Yababan boro gagamin maiyow kwanab, kwa Pharisee sabuw! Anayabin kwa iti mint, rue, naatu adanafur afa God baitinin isan i men nuhi eburubur, mar etei ana mumusin God kwabitin, baise ma gewas naatu God ana yabow isan i nuhi eburubur, gewasin nati sawar i kwati’a’ait sawar afa auman kwatasinaf.
42011043	Yababan boro kwanab, kwa Pharisee sabuw! Anayabin kwa a kok gagamin i Kou’ay Bar wanawanah efan gewasih kwanabow kwanamare kwanama, naatu ahar hai efanamaim a kok gagamin i sabuw a merar hinay naatu hinakakaf.
42011044	Yababan boro kwanab! Anayabin kwa i rah atamanih hai i’inanen en sabuw so’oba’e tafah hibat tereremor na’atube.”
42011045	Ofafar so’obayan orot ta Jesu ibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan iti tur i’o i aki auman irabi.”
42011046	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Kwa Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah so’ob wairafi auman boro yababan kwanab. Anayabin bit gagamin na’in sabuw tuwabuh kwayara’ah hi’abar tun erarabih, naatu kwa i men kafa’imo uma ta baibais isan kwabitihimih.
42011047	Yababan boro kwanab! Anayabin dinab oro’orot kwa a’agir hirouw himomorob i hai rah kwama kwawowowab gaigiwas.
42011048	Imih kwa i taiyuw kwakukubuna, abisa a’agir hisisinaf a baibasit kwabitin, dinab oro’orot a’agir hirouw himorob naatu kwa i hai rah kwawowowab.
42011049	Anayabin iti isan, God ana so’obamaim eo ‘Ayu boro dinab oro’orot naatu kob abarayah aniyafarih, afa boro hina rouw hina morob, afa boro bai’akir kakafin hinab.’
42011050	Isan imih kwa sabuw iti boun kwama’am, God ana dinab oro’orot tafaram aneika hirouw himomorob ana baimakiy i boro kwa kwanab.
42011051	Abel ana rara’ika busuruf na Zechariah ana rara’amaim tit. Zechariah i Tafaror Baremaim iti sibor ana gem naatu Regah ana Bar Kakafiyin hairi hai founamaim hi’asabun morob. Imih anababatun a tur ao’owen kwa iti boun kwama’am iti sabuw hai baimakiy boro kwa kwanab.
42011052	Kwa Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah so’ob wairafi. Yababan boro kwanab. Anayabin etawan botawiyin run so’ob bain ana tufatan i kwa kwabobotan, naatu kwa iti bar i men kwakokok boro kwarun so’ob kwanab, baise sabuw afa run so’ob bainamih tisisinaftobon kwa i hai ef kwahirihir.”
42011053	Jesu efan nati bihamiy ana veya’amaim Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee yah so’ar hiu kwanikwaniy naatu baibatebat moumurih na’in hibow hitit hibabatiy,
42011054	naatu hikubibiruw na’atube abisa tao kakaf na’at saise ubar hititin hitafatum isan.
42012001	Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw hiruru’ay ana itinin i sibisib na’atube, naatu sabuw himour kwanekwan efan etei hibai karam hi’a’abinamo hibat. Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Pharisee hai yeast isan mata toniwa’an, nati sabuw ufuhine ana itinin i gewasin baise wanawanah i rerekabin, imih a tur ao’owen.
42012002	Abisa hisabuw inu’in boro sabusabuw hinabosair, naatu abisa wa’iwa’irin inu’in boro nirerereb.
42012003	Abisa guguminamaim kuo boro natit marakawamaim hinanowar, naatu abisa akisimo bar etawan ihir taituwa taininamaim kubitarasib boro bar faifiy wan hinabat hinao rereb.
42012004	“Au ofonah a tur ao’owen sabuw iyab biya hina’a’asabun isan men kwanabir, anayabin nati ufunamaim boro men abisa ta hinasinaf.
42012005	Orot yait kwana bibiruw i anao kwananowar. God i kwanabiruw, anayabin biya na’a’asabun ufunamaim ana fair ema’am boro baimakiy ana efanamaim nitaiy kwanare. Imih a tur ao’owen God i kwanabiruw.
42012006	Mamu kwikwik etei five hai biyan i two toea tetotobon, baise God boro men kafa’imo nati mamu kikimin ta isan nuhin eburuburumih.
42012007	Na’atube ukwarimaim arib eretei bai’ab tebatabat God i so’ob, imih men kwanabir. Kwa a baiyan i ra’at men mamu kwikwik na’atube.
42012008	A tur ao’owen, orot yait ayu isou sabuw etei nahimaim eo’orereb, Orot Natun auman boro God ana tounamatar etei nahimaim nati orot isan naorereb.
42012009	Baise orot yait sabuw etei nahimaim ayu eyayaubu. Orot Natun auman boro na’atube God ana tounamatar etei nahimaim ibo nayaub.
42012010	Yait Orot Natun isan tur nao kakaf na’at boro nanotawiy, baise orot yait Anun Kakafiyin isan tur kakafin nao nabi’ib boro men nanotawiy.
42012011	Baibabatiyi isan hinabuwi kwanan Kou’ay Baremaim, o gawan sabuw nahimaim, o aiwob sabuw nahimaim, men taiyuw wasfafari isan, o tur mi’itube eo isan kwaniyababanamih.
42012012	Anayabin God Anun Kakafiyin nati ana veya’amaim boro tur ni’obaiyi kwanao.”
42012013	Rou’ay wanawanahimaim orot ta Jesu iu, “Bai’obaiyenayan, ayu akokok tuwai ana tur ina’owen, tamai momorob ana kwahan nafaram airi ana bow.”
42012014	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Aro, ayu au ef men ema’am boro anibasit tuwat airi a sawar kwahan ana faram?”
42012015	Naatu Jesu tatabir sabuw etei iuwih eo, “Mata toniwa’an sawar moumurih na’in bow isan men mata nananan niwa’an. Anayabin yawas wanatowan boro men orot ana sawar moumurih imaim hinafufun hinitinimih.”
42012016	Naatu Jesu oroubon ta eo, “Ana veya ta orot sawar wairafin ana masaw bo ana ub hiyen gewas hiw ro’oh moumurih na’in hiya itah,
42012017	basit mare ma not. ‘Ayu boro mi’itube ana sinaf? Anayabin iti bay hinafafour efan i boro en.’
42012018	Naatu ana notamaim eo, ‘Ayu boro iti na’atube ana sinaf, bay hai bar atamanih ana ku’uben hinare naatu gagamih ana wowab. Saise au bay ana ya naatu au sawar afa auman imaim ana ya.’
42012019	Imaibo anao, ‘Darik orot, anababatun abow, kwamur manin na’in ana fofonin sawar etei abogaigiwas sawar, imih bounabo hamen ana mare anama gewas, anaa anatom taiyuwu aniyasisir!’
42012020	Baise God iu, ‘Kwikwekwe’aw gewas! Boun gugumin boro inamorob naatu a sawar iti ibobogaigiwas boro yait nabow?’”
42012021	Naatu Jesu ana tur yomaninamaim eo, “Imih itinin i ta’imon, sabuw iyab aurih sawar karam hiya tetototo God matanamaim i men sawar wairafih.”
42012022	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “A yawas isan a tur ao’owen men kwaniyababan kwanao, ‘bay boro menamaim anab ana’aan,’ o biya isan kwanao, faifuw boro menamaim anab ana’us.
42012023	Anayabin it etei taso’ob yawas i sawar gagamin men bay na’atube naatu biyat i sawar gagamin men ar faifuw na’atube.
42012024	Baise kwanuw mamu awaw kwana’itih, i men me hikwair hitar, masaw hibo, naatu hifour hitab te’aa’umih en, na’atube men bay hai bar hiwowab imaim bay teya’aya’amih en, baise God akisin ebituwih! Imih kwa i God ana sawar gagamin men mamu na’atube!
42012025	Isan imih iti sawar isah kwana biyababan ana gewasin i boro abisa namatar? Kwanotanot nati kwana biyababanamaim boro kwamur tabo ayawas tafan hina yara’ah namanin kwanama? Men karam.
42012026	A yababan iti sawar gidigidih isah kwabiyababan men emamatar, aisim sawar gagamih isah kwabiyababan?
42012027	“Kwanuw rarab bogay ebatabat kwa’itin, men masaw hitar tebob, o ar faifuw tesasakir en, baise a tur ao’owen aiwob orot Solomon ana bar bonamanamarinamaim ma’am ana veya ana faifuw eo’osen hai gewasih i men iti beran ana gewasin na’atube’emih en.
42012028	Imih kwana’itin, God ar faifuw kutor fotan ius ana itinin gewasin maiyow boun ina’itin baise maras boro nakimow naha’obow nare hinab hinan wairaf wan hina yara’ah na’arah ni’en. Baise kwa i God ana sawar gagamin fai mar etei boro nakaifi ar faifuw nit kwana’osen, aisim a not ebikikimin!
42012029	Imih men mar etei aa tom isan kwananot kwaniyababanamih.
42012030	Anayabin Eteni Sabuw iti tafaram wanawanan tutufin etei iti sawar isah hinuwet tibiyababan, naatu kwa Tamat iti sawar etei isah kwakok kwabiyababan i so’ob.
42012031	Baise wan i God ana aiwob kwananuwih kwanab dogoromaim nama, imaibo iti sawar isah kwanot kwabiyababan boro etei nit.
42012032	Kwa i ayu au bobaituw na’atube imih men kwanabir, anayabin Tamat aiwob bait isan i ebiyasisir boro nit.
42012033	Imih a sawar eretei sabuw kabay wairafih ku’uwih tetobon naatu o kabay kubai yababan wairafih kufaramih, saise a kaukut no maramaim inabaib boro men natakweb; a sawar etei maramaim inaya’ay boro men ta nakasiy, o boro men ta bainowan hinabain naatu boro men ta ganidor hina’aanimih en anababatun.
42012034	Anayabin o sawar menamaim kuya’aya a not tutufin etei boro imaim na’in.
42012035	“Mar etei inabobuna a ar uwakamukamut inarab, a ramef inito’ab namarakaw o mata nuwinuwin inama, anayabin o men iso’ob boro abisa namatar.
42012036	Ana’itin akir wairafih hai orot ukwarin tabin ana hiyuwane matabir maiye nan isan hima hikakaif, hai orot ukwarin matabir na etawan rurukikitar ana veya mar ta’imon hinowar naatu etawan hibotawiy rur na’atube.
42012037	Anababatun a tur ao’owen, akir wairafih iyab matah nuwinuwin hinama’am hai orot ukwarin namatabir nan na’i’itih ana veya, yasisir boro gagamin maiyow hinab! Anayabin i boro ana akir wairafih na’uwih hinamare naatu orot ukwarin boro bay semosemor ana faifuw na’us bay nasemor nitih hinama hinaa.
42012038	Akirwairafih hina bobuna matah nuwinuwin hina ma’am hai orot ukwarin nan natit, o mar natot auman nan natit na’i’itih na’at, boro yasisir gagamin maiyow hinab!
42012039	Imih iti tur ao i naniyan kwanab naatu kwananot, orot bar matuwan bainowan mowan bainuwinamih enan ana veya nasoso’ob na’at, ana bar boro men nihamiy bainowan mowan nakwib narun nabainuwimih en.
42012040	Imih itinin ta’imon i nati, kwa auman kwana bogewas mata nuwinuwin kwanama, anayabin Orot Natun boro men veya kwa kwanotanotamaim natitamih.”
42012041	Peter eo, “Regah, iti oroubon kuo i aki isai, o sabuw eretei isah kuo?”
42012042	Regah iya’afut eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen Akir wairafin orot gewasin naatu ana not rerekabin, orot ukwarin nati akir wairafin boro nab akir wairafih afa isah ni’ukwarin naatu hai bay baitih isan boro ana veya’amaim nitih hinaa.
42012043	Anayabin orot ukwarin matabir nan nati akir wairafin bowabow gewasin maiyow bowabow itin, imih iyasisir ana akir wairafin bai yara’ah bowabow gagamin na’in itin!
42012044	Ana bar wanawanan sawar tutufin etei i akisin i’ukwarin kaif.
42012045	Baise akir wairafin na’at nao, ‘Orot ukwarin bisaise enan, no’om boro ma hamen hamen erurubirabir, imih ayu boro au kokomaim anasinaf.’ Naatu namisir bowabow sabuw, oro’orot baibin nabow narouw kwanekwan ni’a’afiyih, naatu ana kokomaim naa natom kwanekwan nikoko’aw nanan ana veya.
42012046	Imaibo Orot ukwarin boro nan natit, veya men nati akir wairafin so’ob ma ekakaifimaim boro nanamih, naatu na isan ana veya boro baimatnuwina’e nama’am nan natit. Naatu orot ukwarin nan natitit ana veya nati akir wairafin boro nab nabeyah natarsisib nisaroun baifanasairayah hai efanamaim bairi hinama.”
42012047	“Akir wairafin ana orot ukwarin abisa sinafumih kokok i so’ob baise men saife taiyuwin yabuna ana orot ukwarin abisa kok eo’omaim sisinaf, nati orot boro hinawabir biyababan gagamin na’in nab.
42012048	Baise akir wairafin ana orot ukwarin abisa sinafumih kokok i men so’ob, naatu isisinaf kwanekwan biyababan enunuwih boro au hamenamo hinawabir biyan nababan. Sabuw iyab sawar gagamin na’in tebaib, i na’atube sawar gagamin na’in boro wan hinay maiye. Orot yait gagamin anababatun tibitin i auman boro gagamin anababatun isan hinafefeyan nitih maiye.
42012049	“Ayu i wairaf abai iti tafaram afuninamih ana atit, au kok gagamin na’in i mi’itube iti tafaram marasika tabusuruf ta’arah.
42012050	Ayu i bapataito fokarin maiyow nou’umaim ema’am boro wanawanan ana run anab, imih boun dogorou wanawanan i yababan awan karatan ama anotanot anan yomanin anisawar imaibo nuhunafot!
42012051	Kwa kwanotanot ayu i tufuw abai tafaramamaim ana? En, a tur ao’owen, ayu i men tufuw abai anamih, baise kauseb abai ana.
42012052	Mar iti boun orot aawan natunatunawat nah etei five boro hinakusib tounu rounane hinabat rou’ab rounane hinabat taiyuwih hinakusib hinigamigam.
42012053	Kek tamah hairi boro taiyuwih hinakusib hinagam. Babitai hinah hairi boro hinakusib hinagam na’atube babine rawan babin hairi boro hinakusib hinagam.”
42012054	Jesu sabuw isah iban eo maiye, “Veya ra’iyinane sakuk nayen nabi’afar badowan kwana’i’itin ana maramaim, kwa boro mar ta’imon kwanao, ‘boun boro toun nayar’, naatu toun eyarayar.
42012055	Naatu gurufune gagub nayen narab kwananowar kwa boro kwanao, Veya boro nararan, naatu veya erararan.
42012056	Wanawanan rerekabih! Me kamar hai sawar naatu gagub wanawanan hai sawar abisa temamatar i kwa’itah kwa’inanen kwaso’ob kwa’o. Baise aisim sawar abisa iti boun temamatar hai yabih men kwaso’ob?
42012057	Aisim sawar abisa gewasin sinaf isan men taiyuw kwabibabatiyi?
42012058	Sabuw baibatiyih isan hinabuwi kwanan inasinaftobon airi kwanayabuna kwanitounuw, imaibo kwananan baibatiyenamaim kwanatit. Baise o men inasisinaf na’at, i boro nabuw narab natain kwekwetar kwanan baibabatiyenayan orot nanamaim kwanatit naatu i boro nabuw furisiman nitih hinabuwi dibur hina yariyi.
42012059	A tur ao’owen, o boro dibur bar imaim inama agim hio na’atube inibaiyan imaibo boro dibur barene hinabotaiti inatit.”
42013001	Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw afa hina hitit, Galilee sabuw sibor hiya’aya wanawanan Pilate rouw himomorob isan Jesu ana tur hi’owen.
42013002	Naatu Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanotanot Galilee wanawanan nati sabuw hai bowabow kakafih ra’at sabuw afa hinatabirih imih biyababan nati na’atube hibai himorob?
42013003	Baise en! A tur ao’owen bowabow kakafihine dogor baikitabir kwanab, baise boro kwanamorob i himomorob na’atube.
42013004	Naatu sabuw 18 Siloam bar gagamin tafan katub re rabih himomorob, kwanotanot Jerusalem wanawanan i akisih hai tafasar ra’at sabuw afa hinatabirih, imih nati na’atube himorob?
42013005	Baise en! A tur ao’owen, bowabow kakafihine dogor baikitabir kwanab, baise boro kwanamorob i himomorob na’atube.”
42013006	Imaibo Jesu oroubon ta iti na’atube eo, “Veya ta orot ana masaw wanawanan ai fafou tanum yen ra’at. Naatu veya ta ro’oh isan tit na nura’at baise men ro’on ta itin.
42013007	Basit nati masaw ana kaifinayan isan eo, ‘Aro, kwamur tounu wanawanan ai iti afe’enamaim ro’on men kafa’imo ta aitin. Akokok inatar nare asir bat ata me ebi’afiy.’
42013008	Baise orot ai ana kaifinayan eo, ‘Regah inihamiy kwamur ta’imon nabat tana’itin, ayu boro anamaim hub anab hain ana yai tana’itin.
42013009	Maras kwamur ai nabiw na’at basit gewasin, boro tanihamiy nabat, baise men nabiw na’at, imaibo boro inatar nare ina’afun.’”
42013010	Baiyarir ana veya ta Jesu na Kou’ay Baremaim ma sabuw bi’obaiyih.
42013011	Nati’imaim babin ta afiy kakafih hirab kwatut ma kwamur etei 18 sasawar i na run. Nati babin koun ana rarik i kwabibin, baimutufurin isan biwa’an men karam.
42013012	Jesu nuw babin i’itin ana veya, babin eaf na nanamaim bat. Imaibo eo, “Babin, a sawowone abiyawasi.”
42013013	Naatu uman babin tafan yara’ah isan yoyoyoban ana veya, naniyan meyemeye babin koun ana rarik kwabeb inu’in mutufor misir bat God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah.
42013014	Kou’ay bar ana kaifenayan yan so’ar, anayabin Jesu Baiyarir ana veya’amaim babin iyawas, naatu sabuw iuwih, “Veya etei six wanawananamaim i tanabow naatu yawas kwana kokok nati veya’amaim kwanan yawas kwanab, baise men Baiyarir ana veya’amaim.”
42013015	Regah orot iya’afut eo, “Wanawanan rerekabih! Baiyarir ana veya kwa taita’imon a donkey o a ox men kwarufamen kwabow kwan harew kwaitih tetomatom?
42013016	Iti babin i Abraham uwan ta, Satan bai fatum wainab kwamur etei 18 sawar, naatu boun ana bai’akirane Baiyarir ana veya abobotait yawas baib isan asinaf kakaf?”
42013017	Iti na’atube eo ana veya ana rakit sabuw biyah eohow, baise sabuw moumurih na’in sawar gewasih sinaf hi’i’itan isan hiyasisir.
42013018	Imaibo Jesu ibatiyih, “God ana aiwob itinin i mi’itube? Abisa biyanamaim boro anayai kwana’itin?
42013019	Itinin ta i orot ana ai momor ro’on bai in ana masawamaim tanum, naatu kuboun yen ra’at ai mamatar ana veya’amaim, mamu hina famefamenamaim hibatar hima’am na’atube.”
42013020	Jesu iban maiye ibatiyih, “God ana aiwob i boro abisa’amaim ana yai kwana’itin?
42013021	Ana itinin ta i babin ana faraw afuninamih bai tew gagamin wanawanan isuwai re yeast auman wanawanan nayai kamat ra’at yen tew awan kakaratan na’atube.”
42013022	Imaibo Jesu au Jerusalem yen inan ana maramaim, bar merar gagamih naatu bar merar gidigidih imaim run tit, sabuw i’obaibiyih auman yen in.
42013023	Orot babin ta na Jesu ibatiy, “Regah o kunotanot boro sabuw matan ta’amo God yawas nitih?” Jesu iyafutih eo,
42013024	“Kwanabow gewas etawan awan kukurinamaim kwanarun, anayabin sabuw moumurih na’in boro nati etawanamaim run isan hinasinaftobon, baise a tur ao’owen boro men nakaram.
42013025	Regah bar matuwan namisir etawan nahirihir kwa boro ufun kwanabat etawan kwanarukikitar kwanao, ‘Regah etawan kubotawiy arun,’ naatu i boro nao, ‘Ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab, naatu menane kwana.’
42013026	Imaibo kwa boro kwaniya’afut kwanao, ‘Aki o bairi taa tatom, naatu ai bar ai meraramaim ibi’obaibiyi iso’ob, aisim kukakasiy.’
42013027	Baise i boro nao maiye, ‘Ayu men aso’ob kwa iyab naatu menane kwana. Biyau’umaim kwatit sa’ab kwan, bowabow kakafin sinafuyah.’
42013028	Naatu boro narukouwi ufun kwanatit kwanama kwanarerey, wa kwanayob kakikak hiniwa’an, naatu kwananuwanuw boro Abraham, Isaac, Jacob naatu dinab oro’orot God ana aiwobomaim hinabat hinabiyasisir kwana’itih!
42013029	Sabuw boro veya yeninane, veya ra’iyinane, naatu torene, oyawane etei hinaru’ay God ana aiwobomaim hai efan hinabow hinamare hinama hiyuw hinaa hinabiyasisir boro kwana’itih.
42013030	Sabuw iyab boun wan tibi’iyon boro hini’uf, naatu sabuw iyab boun tibi’uf boro wan hini’iyon efan hinab.
42013031	Nati veya ta’imon, Pharisee afa hina Jesu ana tur hi’owen hio, “O boro efan iti inihamiy inan efan ta, anayabin Herod ekokok o na’asbuni inamorobomih ef enunuwet.”
42013032	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwan nati haruharu ana tur kwa’owen, ayu boun naatu maras hairi i boro sabuw iyab hisawow tema’am biyahimaim demon boro ana nunih naatu sawusawuwih aniyawasih, naatu veya baitounin i ayu au bowabow abisa bowamih anot anan i yomanin anisawar.
42013033	Baise boun, maras, naatu mar natot ayu boro au ef anab maiye anayen anan, anayabin ef men ema’am dinab orot boro Jerusalem ufunane namorob.
42013034	O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, dinab oro’orot irouw himorob, naatu kob abarayah God biyafarih kabayamaim irouw himorob. Mar bai’ab a kok a sabuw ataba’afuwih, kokorere natunatun bebenamaim ebaba’afuwih na’atube, baise o men i kok.
42013035	Imih a bar boro hinihamiy barikokow natuw. A tur ao’owen, ayu boro men kwana’itu, ana veya’amaim boro inao, ‘Yait Regah wabinamaim enan boro baigegewasin nab!’”
42014001	Baiyarir ana veya ta, Pharisee hai ukwarin ana baremaim Jesu bay aamih na, baise sabuw nati’imaim hima’ama i Jesu hibimtitiy.
42014002	Naatu nati’imaim orot ta an uman hikurut ma’am yawas isan na Jesu nanamaim tit.
42014003	Baise Jesu Pharisee naatu ofafar so’ob wairafih ibatiyih, “Baiyarir ana veya’amaim ata ofafar ebibasit boro orot babin taniyawas ai en?”
42014004	Baise men tur ta hio. Basit Jesu orot bai iyawas naatu iu ana ubar in.
42014005	Imaibo ibatiyih, “O orot ta natu o a bobaituw * Baiyarir ana veya hub tare’er na’at boro itihamiy ta’in tamorob, o boro mata takabiy itarowen ra’ah tayen?”
42014006	Sabuw baiyafutinamih hikasiy hima kwanekwan.
42014007	Nanawan sabuw afa bay aa ana efanamaim efan gewasih hirurubinen Jesu itih, basit oroubonamaim sabuw iuwih eo,
42014008	“Orot ta, tabin ana hiyuw isan a kob nan na’uwi inanan men inayen efan gewasinamaim inamare’emih, anayabin orot gagamin ta auman ana kob hinan boro enan.
42014009	Imih orot hiyuw matuwan airi a kob na uwi kwanan boro nayen na’uwi, ‘Aro o kumisir haw kure, tura eyen iti’imaim emare,’ o boro biya’ohow auman inamisir haw inare.
42014010	Imih a kob hinan hina’uwi inanan, haw inamare, saise orot hiyuw matuwan a kob nan boro na’uwi, ‘Au begon kuyen seb ir yan kumare,’ o boro yasisir auman ina misir seb inayen efan gewasin inab nanawan afa bairi ir yan kwanama.
42014011	Anayabin orot yait taiyuwin i’itin ra’ah, God boro nab haw nayare, baise orot yait taiyuwin i’itin furuw God boro nayara’ah orot gagamin namatar.”
42014012	Imaibo Jesu bar matuwan hairi bay aamih iu nan isan eo, “Auyit o rabirab ana bay inabitab, men o a of, tait bairi a rara ta’imon, taituwa o isusu’ubih, naatu a’ofonah guguw wairafih ina’uwih hinan bairi kwana’aamih. Anayabin o nati na’atube inasinaf, i boro a bay wan hitab hinit inaa.
42014013	Baise hiyuw inabowabow ana veya, yababan wairafih, ah umah kurut, ah umah duboh, matah fim, ina’uwih hinan bairi bay kwanaa,
42014014	saise God boro baigegewasin nit. Anayabin sabuw nati boro men a hiyuw wan hinay hinit, baise sabuw gewasih morobone hinamimisir ana veya’amaim, abisa isisinaf isan God boro imaim a wayow nit.”
42014015	Orot ta nati bay ana gemamaim hairi hima’am iti tur nowar, basit Jesu isan eo, “Orot yait God ana aiwobomaim hiyuw isan namamare boro yasisir gagamin maiyow nab.”
42014016	Baise Jesu oroubonamaim orot iu, “Veya ta orot ana hiyuw bogaigiwas, naatu sabuw maumurih na’in hai kob in.
42014017	Naatu hiyuw aanin isan ana veya natit, tur iyafar ana ofonah isah eo, ‘Kwanan hiyuw tanaa, sawar etei ai moyab sawar.’
42014018	Baise etei hikwahir tur ta ta hibow hitit, orot ta eo, ‘Ayu au me boubun atubun ananutitiyimih anan, a tur ao’owen men karam boro anan.’
42014019	Orot ta eo, ‘Ayu au cow baubuh etei ten atobon, imih baimanamen isan anan, a tur ao’owen men karam boro anan.’
42014020	Naatu orot ta eo, ‘Ayu i boubun atabin, imih men karam boro aawau anihamiy nama airit tanan.’
42014021	Akir wairafin matabir maiye na orot gagamin ana tur eowen. Bar matuwan yan so’ar ana akir wairafin iu, ‘Saife kutit kwen ef gagamih yahimaim naatu bar merar hai ef yahimaim sabuw kakafih, yababan wairafih, ah umah kurut, ah umah murubih, matan fim initeten inan hiyuw tanaa.’
42014022	Naatu akir wairafin eo, Regah, io na’atube i asinaf, baise bar awan i men karatan.’
42014023	Imaibo orot ana akir wairafin iu, ‘Kutit kwen bar merar hai ef gagamih yahimaim, naatu ef gidigidih rewahimaim, sabuw iyab nati’imaim ina’i’itih inabuwih kwanan, saise au bar awan nakaratan.’
42014024	A tur ao’owen sabuw iyab wan hai kob anan i men hikok imih boro men yait ta au hiyuw nakatubunimih!”
42014025	Ana veya ta sabuw rau’ay gagamin na’in Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan tatabir iuwih eo,
42014026	“Orot yait ayu ebi’ufnunu, baise hinah, tamah, aawan natunatun, taitin, ruburubun isah ebiyabow naatu i taiyuwin auman ana yawas isan ebiyabow, nati orot i men karam boro ayu ni’ufnunu.
42014027	Orot yait ana onaf na’abar ayu ananamaim ni’ufnunu airi ananan i ayu au bai’ufununayan.
42014028	Orot ta ana bar wowabinamih boro men asir nawowab kwaniyimih, baise wan i boro namare ana bar ayubin nayakitifuw, ana baiyan boro bai’ab naatu ana kabay karam boro iti bar nawowab nisawar ai en.
42014029	Anayabin ana kabay men nakakaram na’at boro tafah nararauwen ufunamaim wowabina’e nabat, naatu sabuw afa tafawat hinabatabat hina’itin boro hini’iyab hinamarib,
42014030	hinao, ‘Iti orot bar wowabinamihibe busuruf tafawat rauwen naatu ihamiy ebatabat.’
42014031	Itinin tabo iti, aiwob orot ta ana baiyowayah etei 10,000 tabow, aiwob orot ta hairi baiyowamih tan, baise aiwob orot ta ana baiyowayah etei i 20,000 imih nati aiwob ta i boro tamare tama tanot, ‘Ayu karam boro nati aiwob orot airi aniyow?’
42014032	Naatu tanotanot men takakaram na’at, i boro ef yok tama tur tiyafar aiwob turan hairi hitao tufuw hita’afuw.
42014033	Ef i nati ta’imon, orot yait nakok ayu bai’ufnunu’umih mat i ana sawar etei nakwahir nayaraiyen.
42014034	Riy i gewasin, baise naniyan nabi’en boro hinisaroun, anayabin men karam boro hiniwa’an riy namatar maiye.
42014035	Naatu me yan ub yen gewas isan hinayayare boro men ana gewasin ta namatar, imih boro hinisaroun. Imih o yait tain ema’am inarub tur iti inanowar gewas!”
42015001	Ana veya ta kabay o’onayah naatu sabuw kakafih Jesu ana tur nowaramih hiru’ay.
42015002	Baise Pharisee naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah yah so’ar higam hio, “Iti orot sabuw kakafih hai merar yi buwih bairi hima hi’aa tetomatom kwa’itih.”
42015003	Basit Jesu oroubonamaim iuwih eo,
42015004	“O ta a bobaituw sheep etei 100 hitama’am, naatu ta’imon takakasiy boro mi’itube itasinaf? A bobaituw 99 boro raiyarayar yan dihamiyih hitama, naatu a sheep kakasiy boro itanunuwih itatita’uribo nuhi tafot.
42015005	Naatu itabaib ana veya boro itiyasisir gagamin maiyow, ita’abar itan.
42015006	A bar taituwa, a ofonah etei ita’af ayuwih hai tur ita’owen, ‘Kwana bairit taniyasisir, anayabin ayu au sheep kakasiy i abaika.’
42015007	A tur ao’owen, ef i nati na’atube, orot ta’imon bowabow kakafinane dogor baikitabir ebaib isan maramaim i tibiyasisir gagamin maiyow, men sabuw 99 gewas hirouw kakafih auman tema’am na’atube’emih.
42015008	Itinin tabo iti na’atube, babin ana kabay ten kina ana fofonin yai inu’in one kina kasiy, naatu babin notanot men karam misir ramef ito’ab bar wanawanan yahib, huhun etei nuwet inan ana kabay tita’ur.
42015009	Naatu ana kabay baib ana veya ana ofonah naatu tain tuwan etei e’af ayuwih eo, ‘Kwanan bairit taniyasisir, anayabin au kabay kakasiy i abaika.’
42015010	Imih a tur ao’owen, ef i nati na’atube, God ana tounamatar maramaim orot ta’imon bowabow kakafin wairafin ana kakafihine dogor baikitabir baib isan boro yasisir gagamin na’in hinab.”
42015011	Jesu iban maiye oroubon ta eo, “Ana veya ta orot natunatun rou’ab bairi hima’am.
42015012	Natun uf misir tamah isan eo, ‘Tamai ayu akokok au nowau sawar inakusib initu.’ Tamah misir sawar etei bai natunatun hairi isah ana fofonin kusib faramih.
42015013	Naatu veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim kek uf ana sawar bobuna misir tafaram ta ef yok na’in imaim remor in. Naatu nati’imaim ma ana kabay etei asir isaroun kwanikwaniy sawar.
42015014	Ana kabay isaroun kwanikwaniy in sasawar ufunamaim, baimar kakafin nati tafaramamaim tit, kek busuruf aa morob.
42015015	Naatu misir in nati’imaim tafaram matuwan orot ta biyan tit, naatu nati orot bai iyafar in for baibituw ana efanamaim tit ma for ituw.
42015016	Aa morob kok kwanekwan for hai bay hi’aa turih taa, baise men yait ta abisa itin eaanimih.
42015017	“Veya ta ma binotanot ana notamaim nuhin taseb eo, ‘Tamai ana bowayah moumurih na’in i aurih bay karam hi’aa hitom yah iw tema’am, baise ayu iti’imaim aa amomorob.
42015018	Gewasin ayu boro ana misir anan tamai biyan anatit ana tur ana’owen anao. Tamai ayu i bowabow kakafin maiyow asinaf God matanamaim, naatu o auman matamaim.
42015019	Isan imih ayu i men karam boro o natumih inabuwu maiye, baise a bowayah sabuw ibaiyanih isa tebowabow na’atube ayu isou inasinaf.’
42015020	Iti na’atube eo, basit misir tamah isan matabir maiye remor na bar ariyan titit auman, tamah bat nuwanuw natun nan itin, dogoron wanawanan yababan awan karatan, nunuw in natun bai rouh mamay.
42015021	Baise kek eo, ‘Tamai ayu i bowabow kakafin maiyow God isan asinaf kakaf na’atube o isa asinaf kakaf, isan imih ayu i men karam o natumih inabuwu.’
42015022	Baise regah ana bowayah iuwih eo, ‘Saise kwan faifuw boubun gewasin kwabai natu kwai’us, uman ring kwaiyoun naatu a baibiyon boubun kwabai kwana an kwaiyoun.
42015023	Naatu for biyan kabinitut kwarab kwaitab tana’aan taniyasisir.
42015024	Anayabin ayu natu i morob na’atube ma’am, boun i yawas maiye, naatu kasiy na’atube ma’am boun i tatita’ur maiye.’ Naatu douduf hitaiy re.
42015025	Baise nati ana veya’amaim regah natun ain ma sheep kakaifen matabir na bar biyubin auman hiyasisir hibenaben douduf nidun nowar.
42015026	Naatu bowayah orot ta eaf na ibatiy, ‘Abisa emamatar?’
42015027	Orot eo, ‘O tai matabir maiye na bar tit, imih tamat for biyan kabinitut rab abiyasisir, anayabin gewasinamaim matabir maiye na bar tamat biyan tit.’
42015028	Basit orot ain yan so’ar kwanekwan, men kok boro bar wanawanan tarun. Naatu tamah tit natun ain eobaibinub runamih iu.
42015029	Baise orot ain eo, ‘Tamai kwamur manin maiyow akirwairafih na’atube isa abow men kafa’imo fana asair. Naatu au yasisir isan abisa itu? En anababatun! Men kafa’imo goat ta itu au ofonah bairi ai yasisiramih. Aiyab!
42015030	Baise o natu kabay etei baibin baiwa’an kwanekwaneyah biyahimaim isaroun kwanikwaniy sawar, naatu matabir na bar titit, o isan for biyan kabinitut irab kwabiyasisir.’
42015031	Regah natun ain iya’afut eo, ‘Natu o i airit mar etei iti’imaim tama’am, naatu ayu au sawar tutufin etei iti baremaim tema’am i o nowa, men yait ta nowanamih.
42015032	Baise tanaben taniyasisir, anayabin tai morobobe yumatan taboyauw tama’am boun yawas maiye, naatu kasiyobe ma’am boun tatita’ur maiye.’”
42016001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Ana veya ta orot guguw wairafin ana bowayan orot ukwarin sawar kakaifen kakaf isan ana tur nowar.
42016002	Basit orot ukwarin eaf na ibatiy, ‘O a bowabow isan tur anonowar i men gewasin. Ayu akokok a bowabow isan inao gewas ananowar? O a bowabowamaim i esasawar.’
42016003	Ana bowayan orot ukwarin ma binotanot eo, ‘Ayu au regah i au bowabowamaim ebobotaitu, ayu men fairu boro me anakwair anatar, naatu fefeyan isan boro biyau na’ohow.
42016004	Baise aso’ob boro sawar ta anasinaf, saise au bowabow nasawar anatitit au ofonah afa boro au merar hinay hinabuwu bairi anama.’
42016005	Basit akirwairafih iyabowat orot guguw wairafin ana sawar hibow imaim hima hibowabow eaf hina, orot ta wan run ibatiy, ‘O au regah ana sawar bai’ab kubobotan boro inibaiyan?’
42016006	Akirwairafin iya’afut eo, ‘ Olive iroro’on ana momon etei 3,000 litres ana fofonin kibub wanawanan ebatabat.’ Orot ukwarin fef itin eo, ‘Kumare kibub wanawanan iroro’on 1,500 litres ana fofonin kukirum.’
42016007	Orot bairou’abin ibatiy, ‘O au regah ana sawar bai’ab kubobotan boro inibaiyan?’ Akirwairafin iya’afut eo, ‘35,000 litres ana fofonin rafiy abobotan.’ Fef itin eo, ‘Kumare 17,500 kukirum.’
42016008	Naatu orot guguw wairafin orot ana sawar kaifenayan kirum bisawar ufunamaim ana bowabow i’itin ana maramaim ana merar yi bora’ara’ah. Anayabin sabuw iyab iti tafaram nowan i hai not rerekabin nati na’atube hikirum hifufuwen o tur maiyow kurarouw, baise marakaw ana sabuw men nati na’atube tesisinaf.
42016009	Naatu a tur ao’owen, tafaram ana sawaramaim sabuw kwanibaisih bairi kwani’of, saise nati sawar o biyamaim nabi’en ana veya maramaim boro a merar hinay hinabuwi bairi kwanama.
42016010	“Orot yait sawar gidigidih hitumitum hibitin ekakaifen gewas, sawar gagamih auman boro hinitin nakaifen gewas, naatu orot yait sawar gidigidih hibitin men ekakaifen gewas, sawar gagamih auman boro men nakaifen gewas.
42016011	Imih o iti tafaram ana sawar hitutumi hibit men kukakaifen gewas, mar ana sawar gewasih hinabit boro men inakaifen gewasomih.
42016012	Sabuw afa hai sawar o hitutumi hibit men kukakaifen gewas, o a sawar hinabit boro mi’itube inakaif gewas?
42016013	Bowayan orot ta’imon men karam boro orot gagamih rou’ab isah nabow, baise nakok bowamih orot ta nab naatu ta nihamiy, o orot ta isan nisnubanub naatu ta isan niskwarakwarab. O men karam boro God naatu Kabay hairi isah inabow.”
42016014	Pharisee Jesu eo hima hinonowar himisir Jesu hi’i’iyab himarib, anayabin i kabay hai momorob.
42016015	Jesu misir iuwih eo, “Kwa sabuw matahimaim kwasisinaf gewas saise sabuw iti orot gewas rauwamih, baise God kwa dogor wanawanan etei i nuwatet sawar. Anayabin sawar nati na’atube sabuw hi’itah gagamih hirouw teora’ara’at, God matanamaim nati sawar i hai yabih en.
42016016	Moses ana ofafar naatu dinab oro’orot hai tur imaim hibinan hinan John Baptist ana veya’amaim tit. Baise boun i Tur Gewasin God ana aiwob isan hibusuruf tibibinan, naatu sabuw moumurih na’in hisinaftobon hibusuruf tirur.
42016017	Mar tafaram hairi i hamehamen maiyow boro sahiniwa’an, baise ofafar Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum ana kouk yowanen kikimin ta boro men hinakusa’ir.
42016018	Orot yait aawan nakwahir, babin ta nabi’aawan i ana moser takweb, naatu orot yait nati babin hikwahir ma’am bai ebi’aawan i auman ana moser takweb.
42016019	“Marasika orot ta sawar wairafin ma’am ana veya, ana sawar etei gewasih, ana bar tot samir wanawanan ma mar etei hiyuw bow nan douduf in re’er.
42016020	Naatu ana bar ufunane fur awanamaim i orot wabin Lazarus, yababan wairafin biyan fehefeheriy, mar etei nati’imaim teyare ema efefeyan.
42016021	Ana kok i mi’itube orot ana bay taa momor gem babanamaim hitare’er i tabow taa, bi’akir naatu haru auman tena ana feher teremarem.
42016022	Basit veya ta orot yababan wairafin morob tounamatar hire hinawiy hin maramaim Abraham biyasisir biyan hitit sisibinamaim mare. Naatu orot sawar wairafin morob hibai hire hiyai.
42016023	Ayubin in wairaf wanatowanin wan yen biyababan gagamin maiyow bai, nuwra’at no yate ef yok na’in Abraham itin, sisibinamaim Lazarus batabat.
42016024	Basit eaf ra’at, ‘Tamai Abraham! Ayu wairaf e’arahu biyababan gagamin na’in abaib, kukabibiru Lazarus kwiyafar uman harew yan eotore menau inub, menau tobeya!’
42016025	Baise Abraham eo, ‘Natu inanot o tafaramamaim ima’am ana veya, sawar gewasih etei o isa karam. Lazarus ana sawar i kakafih. Baise boun i Lazarus ana veya tit ebiyasisir naatu o ayababan ana veya tit kubiyababan.
42016026	Naatu ata founamaim i ku’itin, fan gagamin na’in inu’in, imih sabuw iyab aki biyai’ine boro men karam o isa hinarabon, na’atube o biyane aki isai men karam boro hinarabon.’
42016027	Basit orot sawar wairafin eo, ‘Tamai Abraham abifefeyani, Lazarus iniyafar nan tamai ana bar natit.
42016028	Anayabin nati’imaim ayu taitu nah etei five tema’am nimatnuwih, saise i auman men hinan iti biyababan ana efanamaim hinatit biyah nababanamih.’
42016029	Baise Abraham iya’afut eo, ‘Tait i Moses ema’am naatu dinab oro’orot tema’am, boro i hinimatnuwih naatu abisa hinao’o, nowar hina kok tur hinanowar.’
42016030	Orot sawar wairafin iya’afut eo, ‘Tamai Abraham, nati i men karam, baise ana gewasin orot ta morobone namatabir maiye nan hai tur na’owen boro hai bowabow kakafih tisisinaf hinihamiyen hina’in tabir yawas gewasin hinab.’
42016031	Baise Abraham iya’afut maiye eo. ‘Moses naatu dinab oro’orot hinao men hinanowar hai yawas hinabobotabir na’at, orot morobone nan nao boro men hai yawas hinabotabir.’”
42017001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Bowabow kakafin ana routobon i turobe boro hinamatar, baise orot yait iti sawar niwa’an hinamamatar boro yababan gagamin na’in nab.
42017002	Naatu orot yait nati na’atube nasisinaf, ana gewasin nati orot boro sikan aumor hina’utan taiy yan hinitaiy nare, men basit nama au kek gidigidih niwawa’anih bowabow kakafih hinasinaf.
42017003	Imih abisa kwasisinaf mata toniwa’an, taituwa baitumatumayan bowabow kakafin nasisinaf na’at, inakwarar tatab nihamiy, naatu bowabow kakafin nihamiyen dogoron nabikitabir na’at ana bowabow kakafih inanot tawiyen.
42017004	Naatu veya ta’imon wanawanan mar etei seven na’atube o isa nasisinaf kakaf isan, mar etei seven namatabir maiye nan biya natit nao. Ayu o isa bowabow kakafin asinaf, ana bowabow kakafih inanot tawiyen.
42017005	Tur Abarayah Jesu isan hio, “Regah ai baitumatum kwira’at.”
42017006	Regah iyafutih eo, “Kwa a baitumatum ai momor ro’on na’atube, kwa boro iti ai uwa isan kwanao, ‘A wairoron etei ku’uy ra’ah kwen tor yan kure kubat,’ boro fana nab kwao na’atube nasinaf.
42017007	“Naatu itinin ta i iti na’atube, o ta a bowayan orot masaw tabowabow o sheep takakaifen rabirab au bar tanan, boro men ana merar itay naatu itau, ‘Kurun kumare bay ta ku’aan.’
42017008	Ai’abin, o boro mat a bay tabogaigiwas itaa, imaibo i tamare taa tatom.
42017009	Naatu a bowayan orot iyun sisinaf isan i boro men o ana merar yin isan tama takaifimih en.
42017010	Imih kwa auman ef i nati ta’imon, abisa bowamih hinao hiyuni kwa bowabow ufunamaim, kwa na’atumo kwanao, ‘It i akirwairafit wabit men gagamin aisim merarayow isan tananot, abisa hi’u’uwit na’atube tasinafuka.’”
42017011	Jesu au Jerusalem yey ana veya i tafaram Samaria naatu Galilee hairi hai yoyow ana founamaim yen in.
42017012	Naatu na bar merar ta titit auman, orot nah etei 10 biyah kokom ani’anih bairi hitar. Ef yok na’in hibat
42017013	naatu hi’af hio, “Regah Jesu kwiwanbabani!”
42017014	Jesu nuw itih, basit iuwih eo, “Kwan firis biyan kwatit naatu biya enuteteyan itah.” Baise hitit efamaim hinan, biyah etei higewasin.
42017015	Naatu wanawanahimaim orot ta’imon biyan bigewasin itin, basit matabir maiye fanan sib God bora’ara’ah auman na.
42017016	Jesu nanamaim me yan ra’iy ana merar yi. Naatu iti orot i Samaria matuwan.
42017017	Naatu Jesu eo, “Orot nah etei i ten biyah higewasin, naatu orot nah nine i menamaim tema’am?
42017018	Aisim iti orot menan ta akisinamo na God ana merar eyiy?” Naatu Israel sabuw aisim boro men iti na’atube hitasinaf?
42017019	Imaibo Jesu orot iu eo, “Kumisir au bar kwen, a baitumatumamaim iyawas.”
42017020	Pharisee afa Jesu hibatiy hio, “God ana aiwob i boro mar biy nan?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “God ana aiwob i men bebeyanamaim enan,
42017021	boro sabuw hina’itin hinao, ‘Kwa’itin iban iti, o iban ni’i.’ Anayabin God ana aiwob i kwa wanawanamaim ema’am.”
42017022	Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Mar enan kwa boro kwanakaibaban kwanao, ‘Orot Natun ana veya mi’itube tanan tata’itin,’ baise nati ana veya boro men kwana’itinimih.
42017023	Sabuw boro hina’uwi hinao, ‘I ban ni’i enan kwa’itin, o iti enan kwa’itin.’ Sabuw hinao men ufuh kwananunuwamih.
42017024	Anayabin Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, tafaram wanawanan ana’itin i boro namanamar ebow tafaram etei emamarakaw na’atube boro namarakaw.
42017025	Baise wantoro’ot i boro sabuw iyab iti boun tema’am ana veya’amaim boro hinab hini’a’akir, hinakwahir biyababan ta ta hinitin.
42017026	Ana itinin i boro Noah ana veya’amaim mamatar na’atube, Orot Natun ana veya’amaim boro na’atube namatar.
42017027	Noah ana veya’amaim sabuw hi’aa hitomatom, orot babin hitatabin, wanawanan Noah wa wanawanan run harew gagamin tit sabuw etei himorob.
42017028	Naatu ana itinin ta i Lot ana veya’amaim mamatar na’atube. Orot babin hi’aa hitom, masaw hitar hibow, bar hiwowab, hitobon hi’aa hinan wanawanan
42017029	Lot tafaram Sodom bihamiy ana veya wairaf marane God iyafar re sabuw etei e’arahih himorob.”
42017030	Ana itinin i ta’imon, Orot Natun nanan ana veya boro nati na’atube namatar.
42017031	Nati ana veya’amaim orot yait ana or ema’am boro men nayen bar ana sawar nabow, na’atube orot ana masaw ebow boro men namatabir bar sawar nabowamih.
42017032	Orot Lot aawan isan abisa namatar i kwananot!
42017033	Orot yait i taiyuwin ana yawas enunuwih boro men nabaimih, baise orot yait ana yawas ayu isou kwakwahir ana yawas boro natita’ur nab.
42017034	A tur ao’owen, nati ana guguminamaim, orot rou’ab boro gem ta’imon tafan hina inu’in, orot ta boro hina bora’ah, ta boro gem tafan hinihamiy na’in.
42017035	Baibin rou’ab boro hinama maiwok hinakakair, babin ta boro hina bora’ah ta boro hinihamiy nama.
42017036	Orot rou’ab boro hinama masaw hinabob, orot ta boro hina bora’ah, ta boro masaw yan hinihamiy nama.”
42017037	Ana bai’ufununayah hibatiy hio, “Regah iti boro menamaim namatar?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Efan menamaim murumurubih biyah ti’inu’in mamu ikou boro imaim hinaru’ay.”
42018001	Jesu bai’obaiyen ta oroubonamaim ana bai’ufununayah i’obaiyih eo, “Mar etei kwanayoyoyoban, men guban nahurir yoyoban kwanihamiyimih.”
42018002	“Veya ta bar merar gagamin ta’amaim tur nowarayan orot ta nati’imaim ma’am, i men kafa’imo God isan birubir naatu orot babin isah birubirumih.
42018003	Nati bar meraramaim i kwafur babin auman ma’am. Nati babin mar etei tur nowarayan orot ifefeyan eo, ‘Ayu akokok inibaisu au kamabiy wairafin airi kwanao ayu ana ma gewas.’
42018004	Veya moumurih maiyow orot iti babin ana fefeyan nonowar men kafa’imo abisa ta sinafumih. Baise yomaninamaim taiyuwin ma binotanot eo, ‘Ayu i men God abibiruw naatu orot babin men akakafiyih.
42018005	Baise iti babin i mar etei isau enan, gewasin babin i boro anibais nama gewas, saise men mar etei nan ayu nihaharu’umih.’”
42018006	Naatu Regah Jesu eo, “Tur nowarayan orot kakafin ana tur kwanowar.
42018007	Naatu kwanotanot God ana roubinen sabuw fai mar isan hinarererey boro men na’itin nibaisih hinama gewas? Naatu baibaisih isan boro nama narubirabir?
42018008	Baise a tur ao’owen, God i boro hai yababan na’itin naatu boro matan nakabiy nasinaf. Baise Orot Natun namatabir maiye nanan ana veya, tafaramamaim boro sabuw baitumatumayah natita’urih.”
42018009	Sabuw afa taiyuwih tebora’ahih gewasih terouw, taih tuwah tinunufuruwih isan, Jesu oroubonamaim eo.
42018010	“Ana veya ta orot rou’ab hitit hin Tafaror Baremaim yoyoban isan, orot ta i Pharisee, naatu orot ta i kabay o’onayan.
42018011	Pharisee orot akisin nabin bat yoyoban eo, ‘God a merar ayiy gagamin maiyow, anayabin ayu i men sabuw afa na’atube’emih, ayu men kabat mowan, men baifufuwenayan, men bainowan mowan, men taituwau a’aawah ufuh a nan, naatu ayu i men iti kabay o’onayan na’atube.
42018012	Fur ta’imon wanawanan mar rou’ab ayoyohar naatu au kabay abaib roumukur etei o a siwar abit ofafaramaim eo na’atube.’
42018013	Baise kabay o’onayan akisin babanane bat, uwan yi dogoron rab yoyoban eo, ‘God kwiwanbabanu, ayu bowabow kakafin wairafu.’
42018014	A tur ao’owen, orot rou’ab yoyoban ufunamaim au bar hinan kabay o’onayan God matanamaim i roumutufuren bai yasisiramaim ana ubar in, men Pharisee. Anayabin orot yait taiyuwin ebobora’ah God boro nab nayare, baise orot babin yait taiyuwin eyayare God boro nayara’ah orot gagamin namatar.”
42018015	Sabuw afa natunatuh Jesu baigegewasinih isan hibow hina biyan hititit, ana bai’ufununayah hi’itih, sabuw higam hi’uwih.
42018016	Baise Jesu kek eafih hina biyan hitit naatu eo, “Kek kwaihamiyih tena biyou titit, men kwanao tanihimih, anayabin sabuw iyab dogoroh iti kek gidigidih na’atube God ana aiwobomaim boro hinarun.
42018017	A tur ao’owen, orot yait nayare iti kek na’atube God ana aiwobomaim boro narun.”
42018018	Jew sabuw hai bonawiyenayan orot ta Jesu ibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan Gewas, kuo anowar, abisa anasinaf boro yawas ma’ama wanatowan anab.”
42018019	Jesu iya’afut eo, “O aisim ayu orot gewasu irouw kuo’o? Men yait ta gewasinamih, baise God akisinamo i gewasin.
42018020	Ofafar etei Moses ana Bukamaim kikirum iso’ob? ’Taituwa a’aawah ufuh men inan, men sabuw ina’asbunuw, men inabain, men inifufuwen, men inayanuw, naatu hinat tamat fanah inabosiyasiyar.’”
42018021	Orot iya’afut eo, “Ayu kek ana veya’ika abusuruf iti ofafar etei ai’ufnunen, men ta astu’ubimih.”
42018022	Jesu nonowar ufunamaim eo, “Sawar ta’imonamo men isinafumih. Inan sawar etei inabow sabuw hinatobon naatu kabay yababan wairafih inafaramih. Imaibo inan ayu ni’ufnunu, saise maramaim o boro totobuyoy wairaf inamatar.”
42018023	Baise orot iti tur nonowar ana maramaim ana yababan ra’at, anayabin i totobuyoy wairafin.
42018024	Jesu iti orot biyababan itin basit eo, “Sabuw iyab totobuyoy wairafih maramaim run isan boro isah nafokar.
42018025	Sinak ana sou awan kikimin camel imaim boro karam nasorabon, baise orot totobuyoy wairafin God ana aiwobomaim run isan boro men karam narun.”
42018026	Sabuw iti tur hinonowar hio, “Orot yait i boro yawas natita’ur?”
42018027	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Sabuw isah i fokar, baise God isan i hamehamen maiyow.”
42018028	Imaibo Peter, Regah isan eo, “Aki ai bar ai tumar o abi’ufnuni ku’itin.”
42018029	Jesu iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, orot yait ana bar, aawan, natunatun, taintuwan, hinah tamah, ihamiyen God ana aiwob isan i’akir ebowabow
42018030	boro sawar moumurih na’in iti tafaramamaim tafan hinaya’abar nabow naatu yawas mar boro enan ma’ama wanatowan boro nab.”
42018031	Jesu ana tur abarayah nah 12 buwih nabinamaim iuwih eo, “Kwananowar! It i au Jerusalem tayey, naatu nati’imaim dinab oro’orot Orot Natun isan abisa mataramih hio hikikirum boro imaim yabin namatar.
42018032	Nati’imaim i boro hinab Eteni Sabuw umahimaim hinayai, hinab hini’i’iyab, hinigigim, hinakwaitututur, hinawabir naatu hina’asabun namorob.
42018033	Baise veya tounu ufunamaim boro nayawas maiye namisir.”
42018034	Naatu bai’ufununayah Jesu abisa eo men kafa’imo tur naniyan hibai hinotaboun. Anayabin kawen turamaim eo naniyan bain isan fokar.
42018035	Jesu yena Jericho biyubin auman orot ta matan fim nati ef yanamaim ma fefefeyan.
42018036	Sabuw hinan fanah nowar, basit ibatiyih, “Abisa matar kwa’i’itin?”
42018037	Sabuw hiya’afut hio, “Jesu Nazareth matuwan enan.”
42018038	Basit orot matan fim erererey auman eaf eo, “Jesu David ana’agir kwiwanbabanu.”
42018039	Sabuw wan hi’iyon hinan hitatabir orot hikwarar tatab awan fotamih hio. Baise orot matan fim fan sib aumetawat na’in eaf eo, “David ana agir kwiwanbabanu!”
42018040	Basit Jesu nutanub bat naatu eo, “Orot kwabai kwana aitin.” Orot hibai hina Jesu biyan hitit, Jesu orot ibatiy.
42018041	“Abisa kukokok isa anasinaf?” Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu akokok matau nigewasin ana nuw maiye.”
42018042	Basit Jesu orot iu, “Mata igewasin kunuw, abaitumatumamaim ebiyawasi.”
42018043	Mar ta’imonamo orot matan igewasin nuw naatu God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah auman Jesu i’ufunun hairi hin. Naatu abisa matar sabuw hi’itin ana maramaim God ana merar hiyi wabin hibora’ara’ah.
42019001	Jesu na Jericho tit naatu nati bar merar wanawanan remor inan,
42019002	basit nati’imaim orot totobuyoy wairafin wabin Zakias, kabay o’onayah hai orot ukwarin ma’am tit.
42019003	Kok kwanekwan Jesu ana yumat ta’itin, baise i orot kabumin sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in nan hisumisum i men karam boro Jesu ta’itin.
42019004	Naatu sabuw aunah i’iyon nunuw in ai sycamore afe’en yen mare ma Jesu nan ta’itinimih, anayabin Jesu ef nati’iwat inan.
42019005	Baise Jesu na nati ai anamaim titit ana veya an kutan bat, naatu ai afe’en nuw ra’at eo, “Zakias saise kura’iy, anayabin ayu akokok boun o abaremaim airit tanama.”
42019006	Zakias matan kabiy kayam rena haw tit, kawasa auman Jesu ana merar yi
42019007	Sabuw etei’imak hi’i’itin men hiyasisir naatu higam hio, “Iti orot i bowabow kakafin wairafin ana nanawan orotomih matar hairi tenan ana bar.”
42019008	Zakias misir eo, “Regah ayu i boro au sawar founafoun ana kuru’um turin yababan wairafih anitih, naatu sabuw iyab aifufuwih hai sawar abowabow boro hai sawar tafanamaim matah kwakwafe’en auman anaya’abar anitih.”
42019009	Jesu misir Zakias iu, “Boun iti baremaim God ana yawas natit orot ebiyawasi, anayabin iti orot auman i Abraham uwan ta.
42019010	Orot Natun i sabuw iyab hikasiy tema’am nuwihih bow naatu baiyawasih isan na.”
42019011	Jesu na Jerusalem tit biyubin auman, sabuw abisa Jesu eo hinowar hinan hinotanot i God ana aiwob iti boro’omo tatit ana naniyanabe, baise Jesu i kofan maiye oroubonamaim iuwih eo,
42019012	“Ana veya ta orot gagamin tafaram ta’amaim roubinin aiwob baitin, imaibo matabir maiye isan in tafaram ta ef yok na’in imaim tit.
42019013	Baise na isan bobobunabuna ana veya, ana akirwairafih etei 10 e’af hina gold taita’imon faramih naatu iuwih. ‘Kabay iti abit kwanab, imaim kwanama kwanabowabow ayu ana matabir.’
42019014	Baise i taiyuwin ana tafaram sabuw hifa’ifai naatu men hikok nati orot ti’aiwob, imih sabuw hiyafarih hin hitit hio, ‘Aki men akokok iti orot aki isai ni’aiwob.’
42019015	Baise nati orot aiwob hitin naatu matabir na ana bar tit. Imaibo ana akirwairafih iyab kabay bitih hina hitit ibatiyih, kok taso’ob, kabay itih hibowabow baibi’ab tafan hiya’abar hibow.
42019016	Orot ta wan run eo, “Regah ayu au kabay itu ama abowabow tafan i ten hiya’abar abai.’
42019017	Ana regah eo, ‘O i bowayan orot gewas, au bowabow kikimin abit ikaif gewas, imih bar merar etei ten abit inakaifen.’
42019018	Orot bairou’abin run eo, ‘Regah ayu kabay itu ama abowabow tafan etei five aya’abar abai.’
42019019	Naatu ana orot ukwarin iyasisir eo, ‘O i bar merar etei five abit inakaifen.’
42019020	Naatu orot baitounin run eo, ‘Regah a kabay ibitu i abai an koukufet wanawanan asum ai boun inu’in iti abai ana abit maiye.
42019021	Ayu o isa abir, anayabin o a tur fokarin, turanah arih o aribe asir kubowabow kwanekwan, naatu turanah hai masaw o kubobobe asir kufafour kwanekwan.’
42019022	Regah misir iu, ‘O i bowayan orot kakaf nokonokow! Nati a tur i’o’omaim boro natatabir nafatumi! O iso’ob ayu i au tur fokarin, sabuw hai sawar abowabow kwanekwan, naatu hai masaw ayu abobobe afafour.
42019023	Gewasin au kabay banikamaim itayai tabowabow amatabir anan saise tafan hitaya’abar atab.’
42019024	Naatu tatabir sabuw nati’imaim hibatabat iuwih, ‘Iti orot uman kabay gold kwabosair kwabai kwan akir wairafin kabay etei ten bowabow i kwaitin.
42019025	Baise hitatabir hio, ‘Regah nati orot i ana kabay etei ten bowaka.’
42019026	Iyafutih eo, ‘A tur ao’owen, sabuw iyab umah i’e’etaw sawar moumurih tebowabow boro tafan hinaya’abar nab, baise sabuw iyab umah nutanub tema’am aurin boro sawar en, naatu abisa kikimin nati biyahimaim tema’am boro hinabosairen.
42019027	Naatu boun i akokok sabuw iyab ayu bai’aiwob isan men hikokok kwabow kwana iti nou’umaim kwarouw temorob.”
42019028	Iti na’at eo ufunamaim sabuw au nah i’iyon, wan au Jerusalem yen in.
42019029	Yen na tafaram Bethage naatu Bethany hairi sisibihimaim tit, Olive Oyaw an, basit ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab eobaimanih naatu wan iyafarih
42019030	eo, “Kwanan bar merar ta nati namaim kwanatit naatu kwanarur auman donkey boubun hi’utan ebatabat boro kwana’itih, nati donkey i men yait ta bai afe’en yen remoramih. Kwana rufam kwanab kwan iti kwanatit.
42019031	Naatu orot ta nati’imaim na’iti nibatiy nao, ‘Aisim kwarurufam?’ ana tur kwana’owen, ‘Ai Regah ekokok.’”
42019032	Orot hairi hiremor hin, sawar abisa Jesu eo na’atube etei isah himatar.
42019033	Hina hitit donkey boubun hirurufam, ana matuwan itih naatu ibatiyih, “Aisim au donkey kwarurufam?”
42019034	Hiya’afut hio, “Ai Regah ekokok.”
42019035	Basit ihamiyih hirufam hibai hin Jesu biyan hitit, naatu hai biya baibiyon tafah hibosaisiren donkey tafan hiyabar uman hibai yen tafan mare.
42019036	Sabuw hai faifuw tafah hibosaisiren ef yan hiyabar tafanamaim remor in.
42019037	Na Jerusalem tit biyubin auman, ef ta Olive Oyaw na’at re inan i awanamaim hitit naatu ana bai’ufununayah sabuw moumurih na’in Jesu ina’inan iwa’an hi’itah isan fanah sib God ana merar hiyi hibora’ara’ah hio.
42019038	“God ata aiwob nigegewasin, Regah wabinamaim nan, tufuw maramaim nama naatu God auyomtoro’ot isan fair nama!”
42019039	Pharisee afa nati rou’ay wanawanamaim Jesu hiu, “Bai’obaiyenayah, a bai’ufununayah kukwararih awah tefot.”
42019040	Baise Jesu iyafutih eo, “I ana’uwih awah nafot, kabay iti ti’inu’in boro fanah nasib God hinabora’ara’ah.”
42019041	Jesu na Jerusalem tit iyubin nuw bar hiwowab batabat i’itin ana veya ana yababan ra’at rerey eo,
42019042	“Tufuwamaim ma isan ana ef iti boun enan akisin itaso’ob. Baise boro men ina’itin, anayabin mata hibofafar.
42019043	Mar boro enan a rakit sabuw boro roun roun hina’ar bebera’uh a ef hinarufut, run tit isan boro nafokar,
42019044	hinabat hinayuw hinarab, hinagurus, natunatun wanawanamaim tema’am etei boro hinarouw hinamorob. kabay iti etei boro hinarab hinagurus nasawar, boro men ta hinihamiy ana efanamaim na’inumih, anayabin God ana sabuw baiyawasihimih nan o men i’inanimih!”
42019045	Jesu na Tafaror Bar wanawanan run, ana was efanamaim sabuw sawar hiya hima hitotobon itih naatu nunih ufun hitit.
42019046	Iuwih eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim God iti na’atube eo hikirum, ‘Ayu au Bar i yoyoban ana bar, baise kwa kwabai kwabotabir na bainowan hai wawa’ir watu matar!’”
42019047	Nati’imaim Jesu mar etei Tafaror Baremaim ma sabuw i’obaibiyih. Baise firis ukwarih, Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah, naatu sabuw hai ukwarih hikok kwanekwan i mi’itube hitarab temorob.
42019048	Baise ef hinunuwet men ta hitita’urimih, anayabin sabuw etei’imak i Jesu ana tur akisin hinonowar naatu men hikok boro tur ta hitasa’ir.
42020001	Veya ta Jesu in Tafaror Bar run ma sabuw i’obaiyih Tur Gewasin binan hima hinonowar, basit firis ukwarih, ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in bairi hina
42020002	Jesu hibatiy. “Kuo anowar, a fair menane ibai iti bowabow kusisinaf? Naatu iti fair i yait it?”
42020003	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bo ayu’ubo kwa abibatiyi.
42020004	John fair i menane bai sabuw bapataito itih, God biyanane ai sabuw biyahine? Kwao anowar.”
42020005	Baise sabuw hikasiy taiyuwih hitatabir hima hibabatiyih hio, “Mi’itube tanao? God biyanane tanao, boro nao, ‘Bo aisim John bibinan men kwaitumitum.’
42020006	Naatu sabuw biyahine fair bain tana rouw tanao, iti sabuw rau’ay gagamin tema’am boro kabayamaim hinarabit, anayabin etei tibitumatum John i God ana dinab orot ta.”
42020007	Iti na’at hio sawar, basit hiya’afut hio, “Aki men aso’ob John ana fair menane bai.”
42020008	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu auman au fair menane abai abowabow boro men anao kwananowar.”
42020009	Naatu Jesu sabuw oroubonamaim iti na’atube eo, “Ana veya ta orot masaw bow, ana ai grape tanum naatu sabuw masaw bowayah afa tubunih hima hikaif, i ef yok bai nanawanamih in.
42020010	Naatu grape hiw hi’inu’in hiyamur, basit bairut ana veya natit, orot ana akir wairafin ta iyafar eo, ‘Inan ai ro’oh hibirut ayu au nowau ta inab inan initu ana’aan, baise nan masaw bowayah himisir akirwairafin hibai hirab uman en hiyafar matabir.
42020011	Naatu akir wairafin tabo iyafar maiye na tit, baise masaw bowayah hibai hirab hiu kwanikwaniy naatu hi’i’iyab uman en matabir maiye in.
42020012	Iban maiye ana aki wairafin baitounin iyafar na tit, baise masaw bowayah hibai hirab feher hitin hibai hitit ufun hisaroun re.
42020013	Imaibo orot masaw matuwan eo, ‘Abisa boro anasinaf? Anotanot ayu natu ta’imon isan abiyabow aniyafar nan, saise i boro hina’itin hinakakafiy.’
42020014	Baise orot natun iyafar na titit ana veya sabuw masaw bowayah hi’itin taiyuwih himare hiyabuna sawar hio, ‘Iti i masaw matuwan natun enan, gewasin i boro tanarab namorob, saise iti sawar boro it ninowat.’
42020015	Basit orot natun hibai hirab masaw ana fur ufunane hitaiy re hi’asabun morob.’” Naatu Jesu sabuw ibatiyih eo, “Iti orot masaw matuwan nanan sabuw masaw bowayah isah boro mi’itube nasinaf?
42020016	I boro sabuw nabow narouw hinamorob, naatu masaw i boro nab sabuw afa nitih hinakaif hinama.” Iti na’at eo sabuw hinonowar hio, “Iti na’at i men namatar!”
42020017	Baise Jesu nuw sabuw itih sawar, basit eo, “Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum anayabin i kwaso’ob. ‘Kabay gagamin bar wowabayah hi’itin kakafin hirouw hikwakwahir, baise botabir na bar ana bubu’umih matar.”
42020018	Imih sabuw iyab iti kabay afe’en hinare nararabih boro hina taweyaweyar, baise iti kabay i tafah nare nararabih boro hinimusumus.
42020019	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu firis ukwarih hikok Jesu nati ana veya’amaim hitab hitafatum, anayabin ana oroubon eo naniyan hibaib i iuwih, baise sabuw isah hibir.
42020020	Imih hin sabuw afa hitobon, hiyafarih ana itinin sabuw gewasih na’atube hina Jesu hibabatiy abitur tao na’at, saise Jew sabuw hitab Roman gawan hititin baimakiy titin isan ana ef hinuwet.
42020021	Basit iti oro’orot hina Jesu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan aki aso’ob abisa o sabuw kubi’obaiyih i tur anababatun naatu ana efamaim kuo, naatu o i men sabuw ufuhine ku’i’itinimih, baise o i anababatun God ana efamaim sabuw kubi’obaiyih.
42020022	Imih kuo anowar, Rome Ana Aiwob isan kabay tabibaiyan i ata ofafar ta’a’astu’ub ai en?”
42020023	Baise Jesu hai baifuwen itin, naatu iuwih eo,
42020024	“Kabay kwabai kwana kwai’obaiyu aitin.” Naatu kabay hibai hitin basit ibatiyih, “Iti kabay wanawanan i yait ana yumat naatu wabin tema’am?” Hiya’afut hio, “Caesar.”
42020025	Jesu iuwih eo, “Caesar nowan Caesar kwanitin naatu God nowan God kwanitin.”
42020026	Fatumin isan hai tur hibogaigiwas hina hibikubibiruw sabuw nahimaim iyafutih gewas hai kasiy ra’at, naatu men abisa hisinaf.
42020027	Nati’imaim Sadducee orot afa morob ufunamaim yawas maiye isan men tibitumatum i hina Jesu hibatiy,
42020028	“Bai’obaiyenayan, Moses ofafar ta aki isai iti na’atube kirum, orot natabin nama’am aurin kek en namorob, kwafur i boro nati tain ni’awan, saise kek hinatufuw orot murubin efanin.
42020029	Imih, marasika orot ain uf nah etei seven hima’am, basit orot ain tabin naatu aurin kek en morob.
42020030	Naatu orot ufunamaim tuwah ana kwafur i’awan, i auman kek en morob.
42020031	Naatu orot baitounin kwafur i’awan, kek en morob naatu orot ufi’uf kwafur hibi’awan kek en etei himorob in sawar.
42020032	Basit uftoro’ot kwafur babin morob.
42020033	Imih morobone hinayawas maiye hinamimisir ana veya, iti babin boro yait ni’awan, anayabin orot ain uf nah seven etei iti babin ta’imon hi’awan?”
42020034	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot babin iti tafaramamaim tema’am ana veya i tetatabin.
42020035	Baise sabuw iyab gewasih nati efan gewasinamaim ma isan hirurubih naatu morobone misir maiye isan hirurubinih i morobone hinamimisir maiye boro men hinatabin.
42020036	I boro tounamatar na’atube hinama naatu men hinamorob. Nati sabuw i God natunatun na’atube hinama, anayabin morobone himisir maiye.
42020037	Moses bebeyan ebi’obaiyit i turobe, morobone boro hinamisir maiye anayabin buk wanawanan wairaf toto’ab isan kirum. Nati’imaim Moses Regah isan eo, ‘O i Abraham ana God, Isaac ana God, naatu Jacob ana God.’
42020038	Imih iti God i ma’ama wanatowan ana God, men murubih hai Godamih. Sabuw iyab i wanawananamaim tema’am i yawasih.”
42020039	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah afa nati’imaim hima hinonowar himisir hio, “Anababatun turamaim iyafutih bai’obaiyenayan!”
42020040	Nati ufunamaim men yait ta baibat afa bow na Jesu ibatiyimih.
42020041	Imaibo Jesu ibatiyih eo, “Aisim sabuw teo Roubinenayan orot i boro aiwob orot David ana rara’ane natufuw?
42020042	Anayabin David akisin iti na’atube eorereb Buk Atamanin wabin Psalm imaim kirum, ‘Regah God ayu au Regah isan eo. Sisibu au asukwafune kumare.
42020043	Ina ma’am ayu boro a rakit sabuw anabow amaim ana ya inasasam.’
42020044	David Roubinenayan orot isan i ana Regah rouw eo, naatu mi’itube’emih Roubinenayan i boro David ana rara’ane nan natufuw?”
42020045	Jesu eo sabuw hima hinonowar auman, ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo,
42020046	“Mata to niwa’an Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hinanan kwanahaiwih, anayabin i hai kok faifuw manih hina’osen hinabat hinaremor, ahar hai efanamaim sabuw hina’itih hai merar hinay hinakakafiyih, naatu Kou’ay Bar wanawanan efan gewasih hinabow hinamare hinama, na’atube hiyuw ana veya efan gewasih hinabow saise sabuw hai merar hinay.
42020047	Kwafur baibin hai sawar boro asir hinabow kwanekwan, yoyoban manimanih hinayoyoban, nati sabuw hai baimakiy i boro kakafin anababatun hinab.”
42021001	Jesu Tafaror Bar wanawanan siwar ya’aya ana efamaim mare ma sabuw kabay wairafih hina hai siwar tew wanawanan hibiwanen itih.
42021002	Naatu kwafur babin yababan wairafin auman na ana kabay gidigidih rou’ab tew wanawanan biwan itin.
42021003	Naatu sabuw iuwih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, iti kwafur babin, yababan wairafin ana siwar God bitin i sabuw etei natabirih.
42021004	Anayabin sabuw afa i totobuyoy wairafih, imih hai siwar gagamin na’in hiyai, baise iti kwafur babin ana efanamaim abisa i isan yai inu’in i etei bai na ana siwar yai.”
42021005	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah afa Tafaror Bar hiwowowab ana gewasin hi’itin, naatu kabay hitar hikikirum isan, na’atube siwar ta ta God isan hiyasairen bar hibi’abur hi’itah isan hio hibifofofor. Baise Jesu eo,
42021006	“Sawar iti etei kwa’itih kwa’o, mar boro kabay iti etei boro nihururuw nare narubar na’in, boro men ta iti hai efanamaim hina’inumih.”
42021007	Sabuw Jesu hibatiy hio, “Bai’obaiyenayan, mar i boro biy iti sawar hinamatar, naatu ina’inan i boro abisa namatar saise aki ana’itin ana so’ob veya i na tit?”
42021008	Jesu iuwih eo, “Mata toniwa’an, men koko’aw na’atube hinifufuwimih. Anayabin orot moumurih na’in boro ayu wabu’umaim hinao, ‘Ayu i Keriso, naatu Veya i na kabom.’ Men kwani’ufnunih.
42021009	Hinabiyow tur kwananonowar men kwanabir, naatu yababan nara’at ef hinafofokar auman men kwanabir, anayabin sawar nati na’atube boro wan hinamatar, baise men kwananot mar yomanin i na kabom.”
42021010	Naatu iban iuwih maiye eo, “Tafaram ta ta boro taiyuwih hinagam hiniyow na’atube bar merar ta ta boro taiyuwih hinagam hiniyow.
42021011	Iriyoy gagamih boro hinamatar, baimar kakafin, sawow yumatah ta ta tafaram wanawanan boro awan nakaratan, maramaim sawar itah birubir boro hinamatar.
42021012	Wabu’umaim kwabowabow isan, hinarab hini’a’akir, hinabuw hinafatumi kwanan Kou’ay Bar hai ukwarih umahimaim hinayai, naatu i boro hinabuw kwanan dibur hinayariyi, tafaram ana aiwob na’atube orot gagamih nahimaim kwanatit hinibabatiy.
42021013	Imih nati’imaim kwanatitit, veya keboroban i nati, ayu mi’itube kwaitutumu kwabowabow i hai tur kwana’owen.
42021014	Naatu baibatiyimih hinabuw kwananan men bogaigiwas taiyuw was fafari isan kwananot kwaniyababanamih.
42021015	Anayabin ayu boro tur anit a not hinarerekab tur kwanao a kamabiy sabuw hinanonowar boro men karam a tur hinarukouw naatu bairi kwanibasamih.
42021016	Hinat, tamat, taituwa, a ofonah boro baba hinao, hinabuw orot gagamih umahimaim hinaya’i, baimakiy hinit naatu kwa afa boro hina’asbuni kwanamorob.
42021017	Sabuw etei boro hinifa’ifai, anayabin ayu kwabi’ufnunu isan.
42021018	Baise ukwarimaim arib ta boro men nakasiyomih.
42021019	Naatu kwa a batkikinamaim yawas boro kwanatita’ur kwanab kwanama gewas.
42021020	Baiyowayah sabuw Jerusalem hina’ar bebera’uh kwana’i’itin kwa i kwanaso’ob, Jerusalem rabin baitaiyin isan ana veya i kabom.
42021021	Sabuw iyab Judea wanawanan tema’am boro hinabihir hinan oyaw wan hinayen, sabuw iyab Jerusalem tema’am boro tafaram hinihamiy, sabuw iyab bar meraramaim tema’am boro men hinan Jerusalem hinatit.
42021022	Anayabin nati i baimakiy ana veya, saise abisa bukamaim hikirum inu’in nan niturobe.
42021023	Nati ana veya’amaim baibin iyab yah auman naatu hai kek sosof auman bihir isan boro nafokar, yababan gagamin na’in boro iti tafaramamaim namatar naatu sabuw boro baimakiy hinab.
42021024	Sabuw afa boro ahay wan hinayen hina morob, afa boro hinabow hinan tafaram ta ta’amaim dibur hinaya. Naatu Eteni Sabuw Jerusalem boro hinarab nare tafan hinatet, naatu hinama hinakaif hai veya God bitih na’atube nan niturobe.
42021025	“Maramaim veya, sumar, daman boro ina’inan yumatah ta ta hinamatar. Tafaram tutufin wanawan etei boro ayay hinabosair abisa namamatar isan, yabat boro namisir, gis nayen ana’itin boro birubir kakafin.
42021026	Sabuw boro hai bir nara’at hinimamayay hinao, ‘Abisa tafaram wanawan emamatar.’ Anayabin maramaim sawar etei ti’inu’in hai efan boro hinasa’iren nanabin hinan.
42021027	Imaibo Orot Natun sakukuw wanawanan ana fair ana marakaw bonamanamarin auman natit nanan hina’itin.
42021028	Sawar iti hinabusuruf hinamamatar ana veya’amaim, kwanamisir kwananuw ra’at, anayabin God ana sabuw baiyawasih isan ana veya i na rukabom.”
42021029	Imaibo Jesu oroubon ta eo, “Ai fafou kwana’itin naatu ai afa auman kwana’itah.
42021030	Hiw ana veya natitit kwa boro kwanao, ai abeb ana veya na, ai rourih hina’abebemih.
42021031	Imih ef i boro nati ta’imon, ana veya’amaim sawar iti na’atube hinamatar kwana’i’itah, kwa boro kwanaso’ob, God ana aiwob namih ana veya i na kabom.
42021032	Anababatun a tur ao’owen sabuw iti tema’am boro moroboe hinama’am sawar iti hinamatar.
42021033	Mar tafaram boro nasawar, baise ayu au tur i boro men nasawaramih.
42021034	Mata toniwa’an, men aa tom namomon, naatu iti tafaram ana yawas isan a yababan nara’at, anayabin veya i boro naniyan meyemeye
42021035	warasa na’atube nabuw kwana’oror. Sabuw iti tafaram wanawanan boro etei isah namatar.
42021036	Imih mata toniwa’an mar etei kwanayoyoban, saise fair kwanab sawar iti hinamamatar wanawanahimaim kwanahaiw kwan Orot Natun nanamaim kwanabat.”
42021037	Jesu veya etei Tafaror Baremaim na sabuw bi’obaibiyih, baise rabirab en Olive Oyawemaim inu’in.
42021038	Baise mar etei mar auman sabuw i tena Tafaror Baremaim eo tema tenonowar.
42022001	Faraw Wanawanan Yeast en ana hiyuw wabin Tar Nowaten aa isan ana veya i na kabom.
42022002	Naatu nati ana veya’amaim firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah wa’iwa’iramaim ef hinunuwet mi’itube Jesu hitab hitarab tamorob isan, anayabin bebeyanamaim sinafumih sabuw hibiruwih.
42022003	Nati ana veya’amaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot Judas wabin ta Iscariot Satan dogoron wanawanan run.
42022004	Basit na firis ukwarih naatu Tafaror Bar ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih biyah tit, Jesu mi’itube nab nabitih isan bairi hiyakitifuw.
42022005	Naatu orot ukwarih hiyasisir Judas kabay baitinin isan hio’matan.
42022006	Judas ibasit naatu ef ana gewasin wa’iwa’iramaim nuwet, mi’itube Jesu tab tabitih, sabuw men hitaso’ob.
42022007	Faraw Wanawanan Yeast en hiyuw ana veya natit, nati ana veya’amaim i Tar Nowaten isan sheep natunatuh lamb terouw sibor teya’aya.
42022008	Imih Peter, John hairi Jesu eobaimanih iyafarih eo, “Kwanan Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw kwanabogaigiwas tanaa.”
42022009	Hibatiy hio, “Menamaim kukokok boro ana bogaigiwas?”
42022010	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwanan Jerusalem kwanatitit auman orot ta boro noukwatamaim harew nahun na’abar nanan bairi kwanitar, naatu kwani’ufunun bairi kwanan bar erurumaim kwanarun.
42022011	Naatu bar matuwan orot kwanibatiy, ‘Bai’obaiyenayan,’ o isa iti na’atube eo. ‘Ayu au bai’ufununayah bairi nanawan bar awan menatan boro imaim Tar Nowaten ana bay anaa?’
42022012	Naatu i boro bar awan gagamin yate tafan ni’obaiyi kwana’itin, nati’imaim sawar etei hirereb hiyabuna inu’in, imaim kwanabogaigiwas.”
42022013	Orot rou’ab hitit hinan sawar etei Jesu eo na’atube hi’itah, basit Tar Nowaten hiyuw hibogaigiwas.
42022014	Bay aa isan ana veya tit, naatu Jesu ana tur abarayah bairi bay aa ana efanamaim himare.
42022015	Baise iuwih eo, “Ayu akokok kwanekwan iti Tar Nowaten ana bay kwa bairit tanaa, imaibo ani’akir biyau nababan.
42022016	Anayabin a tur ao’owen, ayu i boro men kafa’imo iti bay anaa maiye, ana veya’amaim iti sawar yabin anababatun niturobe God ana aiwob wanawananamaim.”
42022017	Imaibo Jesu kerowas bai, God ana merar yi, naatu ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Kerowas iti kwabai etei’imak kwafaram kwatom.
42022018	A tur ao’owen, veya iti boun ebubusuruf ayu iti wine boro men anatom, ayu boro iti na’atube ana ma nan God ana aiwob nan natit.”
42022019	Naatu rafiy bai God ana merar yi sawar, imasib ana bai’ufununayah itih eo, “Iti i ayu biyou, kwa abit, iti na’atube kwanasinaf saise imaim ayu kwananuhu.”
42022020	Naatu kerowas isan i na’atube sinaf, bay hi’aa ufunamaim bai itih eo. “Iti kerowas i God ana Obaibasit Boubun ayu au rara’amaim ibour kwa etei isa ebisuwai.
42022021	Baise kwanaso’ob orot yait ayu morobomih babau eo, i iti gemamaim airi ama’am.
42022022	Orot Natun i boro namorob God isan yayakitifuw na’atube, baise orot yait baban eo emomorob i boro baimakiy gagamin na’in nab.”
42022023	Basit bai’ufununayah taiyuwi hibabatiyih hio, “Iti kou’ay wanawanamaim o yait iti na’atube sinafumih iyakitifuw ima kunotanot?”
42022024	Bai’ufununayah taiyuwih wanawanahimaim gamin matar hai kokok hitaso’ob yait i orot gagamin.
42022025	Jesu iuwih eo, “Tafaram wanawanan Eteni Sabuw hai aiwob ana sabuw kaifih isan i hai fair ema’am imih sabuw tekakaifih, naatu sabuw iyab onowaten hibai sabuw tebobonawiyih, i tekokok wabih nara’at Bonawiyenayah hinarouw.
42022026	Baise kwa wanawanamaim i men na’atube nama, o yait orot gagamin mataramih taiyuw inayare inikek, naatu o yait bonawiyenayan mataramih taituwa isah ini’akir inabow.
42022027	Yait i orot gagamin, orot bay aayan o orot bay semorayan? Orot mare ma bay eaau i turobe orot gagamin. Baise ayu kwa wanawanamaim i akir wairafin na’atube ama kwa isa abowabow.
42022028	Au routobon fokarih wanawananamaim men kwaihamiyu, baise sisibu’umaim mar etei bairi tama’am.
42022029	Tamai aiwob ana fair itu abi’aiwob * na’atube nati fair ta’imon kwa abit kwani’aiwob *
42022030	Kwa boro au aiwob wanawananamaim kwanaa, kwanatom yasisir kwanab, aiwob hai ura ma’ama’amaim kwanamare Israel sabuw hai big etei 12 kwanakaifih.”
42022031	Jesu eo, “Simon, Simon! Satan i baibasit God biyanane bai, kwa routobon nit nakubaituturimih. Orot masaw bowayan ana rice erab erububunai ani’aanin nabin eyai, naatu kanabin nabin eya’iyai na’atube.
42022032	Baise Simon, ayu o isa ayoyoyoban, saise a baitumatum men nara’iy, naatu ayu isou inamamatabir ana veya, taituwa koufair initih hinabatkikin.”
42022033	Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Regah ayu airit na dibur run naatu na morob isan abobuna ama’am.”
42022034	Jesu eo, “Peter, boun gugumin o boro mar tounu inayoub inao, ‘Ayu orot nati men aso’ob,’ i ufunamaim kokorere boro nao inanowar.”
42022035	Imaibo Jesu ana bai’ufununayah ibatiyih eo, “Kwanotanot ayu ai yuni aur kaukut, hafoy naatu a baibiyon en kwatit kwanan ana veya’amaim, sawar afa isah kwaiyababan.” Hiya’afut hio, “Men abistan ta isan ai yababanamih.”
42022036	Jesu iuwih eo, “Baise a tur ao’owen, o yait aur kaukut, o hafoy ema’am inab, naatu o yait aur kaiy en, a biya baibiyon inab inan hinatubun naatu kabay inab kaiy inatubun uma inisinfafar.
42022037	Anayabin a tur ao’owen, Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hio hikirum, ‘Hi’i’itin i bainowan mowanabe,’ naatu nati tur i ayu isou hikirum, naatu boro anasinaf nan yabin namatar’’”
42022038	Bai’ufununayah hio, “Regah kaiy rou’ab iti abobotanen kui’itan.” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Nati ana fofonin.”
42022039	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi matan fufur tisisinaf na’atube Jerusalem hihamiy hiyen hin Olive Oyawemaim hitit.
42022040	Jesu na nati efanamaim titit ana veya, basit ana bai’ufununayan iuwih eo, “Kwanayoyoban saise routobon nanan boro kwanarukouw.”
42022041	Imaibo in fotafot wan ana fofonin na’atube, sun yowen yoyoban
42022042	eo, “Tamai inakokok na’at, basit iti biyababan ana kerowas biyau’umaim kubosair, men ayu au kok, baise abisa o kukokok na’atube namatar.”
42022043	Jesu dogoron wanawan yababan yan awan karatan, dogoron tutufin etei yoyoban ana foyab rara na’atube hituhorohoror me yan hire, naatu God ana tounamatar marane hire hina fair hitin. *
42022044	Jesu dogoron wanawan yababan yan awan karatan, dogoron tutufin etei yoyoban ana foyab rara na’atube hituhorohoror me yan hire, naatu God ana tounamatar marane hire hina fair hitin. *
42022045	Yoyoban sawar misir inan, ana bai’ufununayah matah fot hi’inu’in itih, hai yababan ra’at kwanekwan easbunih hi’inu’in.
42022046	Iuwih eo, “Aisim kwa’inu’in? Kwamisir kwayoyoban saise men routobon kwanab.”
42022047	Jesu iti na’atube bat eo auman, bai’ufununayah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta wabin Judas sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in nawiyih hina hitit. Naatu Judas mutufor in Jesu biyan tit bai mamay.
42022048	Baise Jesu iu, “Judas o iti mamayenamaim Orot Natun ibai rakit sabuw kubitih?”
42022049	Bai’ufununayah bairi hibatabat Jesu isan abisa mamatar hi’itin, basit hibatiy, “Regah karam boro kaiyomaim bairi aniyow?”
42022050	Naatu ana bai’ufununayah orot ta ana kaiy bora’ah, Firis Gagamin ana akir wairafin ta tainin asukwafune buru’um.
42022051	Baise Jesu eo, “Men inasinaf maiye kunutanub!” Naatu Jesu orot tainin butubun efanin matar maiye.
42022052	Imaibo Jesu firis ukwarih, Tafaror Bar ana firis ukwarin, furisiman, naatu regaregah ai’in Jesu bain fatuminamih hinan iuwih eo, “Kwa iti kaiy, kefat yuwu rabu’umih kwabow kwanan ana itinin i ayu orot kakafu bainowan na’atube?
42022053	Ayu mar etei Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan bairit tama’am, men kwakok boro imaim ayu kwatafatumu? Baise iti boun i kwa a veya, imih abisa kwakokok na’atube kwasinaf. Anayabin gugumin ana orot ebobonawiyi.”
42022054	Jesu hibai hifatum hibai hin Firis Gagamin ana bar hitit, naatu Peter nabineika bat i’uf nunih bairi hin hitit.
42022055	Wairaf merar yan foun hi’asir himare hima rararih, Peter na wanawanah mare bairi hima rararih,
42022056	basit akir wairafin babitai ta nuw Peter ma wairaf rarar itin, naatu matan kubar itinbunai sawar imaibo eo, “Iti orot auman i Jesu hairi hima hireremor.”
42022057	Baise Peter yaub eo, “Babitai, ayu nati orot i men kafa’i aso’ob.”
42022058	Hima kafa’imo, orot ta itin maiye eo, “O i ni’i orot ana bai’ufununayan ta.” Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Aro, ayu men nati orot ana bai’ufununayan ta’amih.”
42022059	Hima one hour na’atube sawar, basit orot tabo iban eo maiye “Tur anababatun iti orot i Galilee matuwan Jesu hairi hima hireremor men kasikasiy ta’amih.”
42022060	Baise Peter orot iya’afut eo, “Aro ayu men kafa’i aso’ob o abisa kuo.” Iti na’at eo auman kokorere eo.
42022061	Regah tatabir mutufor nuw Peter itin, naatu Regah abisa eo i not, “Boun gugumin o boro mar tounu ayu inayayoubu ufunamaim kokorere boro nao.”
42022062	Basit Peter misir tit in ufun re rerey i gagagamat.
42022063	Orot afa Jesu hima’uh hima’am himisir faifuw ta hibai matan hisum,
42022064	imaibo hi’i’iyab naatu hiborabirab hio, “Kuo anowar, yait o rabi?”
42022065	Naatu tur kakafih moumurih maiyow hiu kwanikwaniy hi’i’iyab.
42022066	Mar sibisib auman sabuw hai regaregah ai’in, firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah etei hiru’ay hita’imon, imaibo Jesu hinawiy hina Kaniser nahimaim bat
42022067	naatu hibatiy, “Kuo anowar o i Keriso?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “A tur ana’owen boro men kwanitutumu’umih,
42022068	naatu ana bibatiyi auman boro men kwaniyafutu’umih.
42022069	Baise mar enan Orot Natun boro God fairin uman asukwafune namare nama’am kwana’itin.”
42022070	Naatu etei’imak hibatiy hio, “Bo o God Natun?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu God Natun kwarouw kwao i tur anababatun kwao.”
42022071	Imaibo sabuw hio, “Men takokok koubuna’ayah sabuw afa tanabow, anayabin tur awanamaim titit i tainitamaim tanowar!”
42023001	Kou’ay tutufin etei himisir Jesu hibai hina Pilate nanamaim hitit.
42023002	Nati’imaim ubar hitin hio, “Iti orot i ma kakaf bai na ai sabuw nawiyih tafaram hiti’afiyimih aki atita’ur, naatu sabuw eo’otanih Caesar isan kabay men hinibaiyan, naatu i taiyuwin isan eo, ‘Ayu i Keriso aiwob orot.’”
42023003	Imaibo Pilate Jesu ibatiy, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “Nati kuo.”
42023004	Pilate firis ukwarih naatu sabuw hiru’ay hibatabat iuwih eo, “Iti orot baimakiyin isan anunuwet men ana kakafin ta atita’urimih.”
42023005	Baise abisa hio i hiukikin. “Iti orot i kougeyageyayan, ana bai’obaiyenamaim Galilee wanawanan busuruf sabuw etei hai ma bi’a’afiy boun na Judea wanawanan sabuw etei kugiyigiyih hai ma eafe’af.”
42023006	Pilate iti na’atube hio nonowar ufunamaim, ibatiyih eo, “Iti orot i Galilee matuwan?”
42023007	Pilate nati ana veya’amaim so’ob Jesu i Herod ana aiwob babanamaim ma’am, imih Herod isan iyafar hibai hin. Anayabin nati ana veya Herod auman i na Jerusalem ma’am.
42023008	Herod Jesu i’itin ana maramaim yansisir gagamin maiyow, anayabin ana tur marasika nowar naatu kok kwanekwan Jesu taitin, ina’inan auman ta tiwa’an ta’itin.
42023009	Imih Herod tur moumurih maiyow Jesu ibabatiy, baise Jesu men iya’afut tur ta eomih.
42023010	Firis ukwarih naatu Ofafar Bai’obaiyenayah hitit tur fokarin maiyow hio ubar hitin hiu kwanikwaniy.
42023011	Imaibo Herod ana baiyowayah bairi Jesu hi’iyab hiu kwanikwaniy. Naatu faifuw gewasin hibai hi’us hiyafar maiye matabir in Pilate biyan tit.
42023012	Nati ana veya’amaim Herod Pilate hairi hitounuw, baise marasika i hairi rakit na’atube nanabih hima’am.
42023013	Firis ukwarih naatu bonawiyenayah, sabuw ukwarih etei’imak Pilate e’af ayuwih hina
42023014	iuwih eo, “Iti orot kwabai kwana biyou kwatit sabuw nawiyih kakaf kwarouw kwa’o, naatu ayu kwa etei namaim ai babatiy kwa’itin, baise ana kakafin kwao anonowar na’atube men ta atita’urimih.
42023015	Na’atube Herod nunuwet ana kakafin men tatita’ur, imih iyafar maiye matabir na. Anayabin men abisa kakafin ta sinaf boro namorob.
42023016	Isan imih ayu boro anarab naatu anabotait natit nan.”
42023017	Matan fufur Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya, Pilate mar etei dibur orot ta’imon sabuw isah ebobotait. *
42023018	Baise sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hibatabat hiwow hio, “Nati orot i na morob! Aki akokok Barabas inabotait natit!”
42023019	(Barabas i Jerusalemamaim kukugeyagey, naatu orot babin ta easabun momorob isan dibur hiyai ma’am.)
42023020	Pilate kok kwanekwan i Jesu tabotait tatit, imih fanan aumetawat na’in eafare maiye sabuw ifefeyanih.
42023021	Baise sabuw fah sib hinow hi’af ra’at hio, “Ku’onaf! Ku’onaf!”
42023022	Pilate iban mar baitounin ibatiyih maiye, “Abisa kakafin sinaf? Ayu ana kakafin men ta a’itin boro namorob, imih ayu boro anarab naatu anabotait.”
42023023	Baise sabuw fanah sib Jesu morobomih hiwow hio hinan yomaninamaim hai kok na yabin matar.
42023024	Basit sabuw hio na’atube hai kokomaim Pilate sinaf, Jesu morob isan ibasit.
42023025	Naatu orot kougeyageyayan naatu asbunuwayan dibur ma’am isan hibifefeyan i botait, naatu Jesu isan abisa sinafumih hikokok na’atube bai itih.
42023026	Roman baiyowayah Jesu onafinamih hibai hitit hinan efamaim, Sairini orot wabin Simon ana barene na au Jerusalem rur bairi hitar. Naatu hikwarar tatab, onaf hibai hitin e’abar Jesu ufun bairi hin.
42023027	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan wanawanahimaim baibin afa Jesu hi’itin yah baban hirerey.
42023028	Jesu tatabir itih eo, “Jerusalem baibin ayu isau men kwanarerey, baise kwa taiyuw isa naatu natunat isah kwaniyababan kwanarerey.
42023029	Anayabin mar boro enan sabuw boro hinao, ‘Baibin iyab a’arih, taubu’e tema’am naatu kek men tibitotomanen boro hiniyasisir.’
42023030	Nati ana veya’amaim sabuw boro oyaw isah hinao, ‘Oyaw kure kutouni, naatu hihib kubu’ub kure kutouni!’
42023031	Anayabin sawar iti na’atube ai biyan ahiy ana veya’amaim tisisinaf, baise ai nakekerer ana veya’amaim hinasisinaf boro mi’itube?”
42023032	Nati ana veya’amaim orot kakafih rou’ab auman Jesu bairi morobomih hinawiyih hitit hin.
42023033	Hitit hina efan wabin Gifow imaim hitit naatu Jesu hi’onaf orot kakafih rou’ab auman, orot ta ana asukwafune, orot ta ana beyawane.
42023034	Imaibo Jesu eo, “Tamai hai bowabow kakafih kunotawiyen men hiso’ob abisa tisisinaf.” Naatu ana faifuw hibosairen arowamaim hifaram hibow.
42023035	Sabuw nati’imaim hibat hi’i’itin ana maramaim, bonawiyenayah orot ukwarih Jesu hi’iyab hio, “Sabuw afa iyawasih bo i Keriso God narurubin na’at taiyuwin niyawasiban tana’itin.”
42023036	Roman baiyowayah auman hi’iyab, naatu wine tenakuyakuy tomamih hitin
42023037	hio, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob na’at taiyuw kwiyawasi!”
42023038	Naatu ukwarinamaim hikirum hio, “Iti I Jew Sabuw Hai Aiwob.”
42023039	Orot kakafin ta hi’onaf inu’in Jesu isan eafabon tur kakafih eo. “O Keriso na’at kwiyawas kure naatu aki auman kwiyawasi.”
42023040	Baise orot ta rounane inu’in turan kwarar iu, “O God isan kubirubir ai en? It etei i baimakiy ta’imon tabaib.
42023041	It airit biyababan tabaib i ana efamaim tabaib, anayabin atasisinaf kwanekwanemaim wan tama ra’at biyat ebababan. Baise iti orot i men kafa’imo kakafin ta sinaf, asir biyababan ebaib.”
42023042	Naatu Jesu isan eafabon eo, “Jesu a aiwobomaim inarur ayu inanuhu.”
42023043	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ao’omatani, boun ayu Paradise imaim ana rur o boro airit tanarun.”
42023044	Veya yen na i’ouyit, veya rararan matan gugum tafaram etei fobe inu’in veya re three korok na’atube bai.
42023045	Basit faifuw gagamin Tafaror Bar wanawan hitaiy re efan kakafiyin, kakafiyin hirafut inu’in taseb rou’ab himatar.
42023046	Imaibo Jesu fanan aumetawat rerey eo, “Tamai umamaim ayubu abit inab.” Iti na’atube eo basit morob.
42023047	Baiyowayah hai ukwarin nati’imaim bat abisa mamatar itin, God wabin bora’ara’ah eo, “Turobe iti orot i gewasin.”
42023048	Sabuw nati’imaim hiru’ay hibat abisa mamatar hi’itin, dogoroh hirab yababan auman hai ubar himatabitabir hin.
42023049	Sabuw afa Jesu hisusu’ub, naatu baibin afa Galilee ine hi’ufunun bairi hina hibibais, nabinamaim hibat Jesu momorob hi’itin.
42023050	Nati’imaim Arimathea orot wabin Joseph ma’am, Arimathea i Judea wanawananamaim bar merar ta. Iti orot Joseph i orot gewasin naatu ana ef mutufurin, God ana aiwob nan isan ma kakaif, naatu i auman Kaniser hai kou’ay orot ta, baise abisa hio hiyayanuw i ana baibasit men ta nati’imaim ma’amih.
