42023051	Nati’imaim Arimathea orot wabin Joseph ma’am, Arimathea i Judea wanawananamaim bar merar ta. Iti orot Joseph i orot gewasin naatu ana ef mutufurin, God ana aiwob nan isan ma kakaif, naatu i auman Kaniser hai kou’ay orot ta, baise abisa hio hiyayanuw i ana baibasit men ta nati’imaim ma’amih.
42023052	Na Pilate nanamaim tit Jesu biyan bai na ya’in isan ifefeyan naatu aiwob orot ibasit.
42023053	Joseph na Jesu biyan onaf afe’en inu’in bosair bai re faifuw boubunamaim sum bai in hub boubun to naiwanamaim tar numin inu’in imaim yai.
42023054	Naatu nati veya i Friday, Baiyarir busurufin isan ana veya nakabom.
42023055	Baibin Galilee ine Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hinan i Joseph bairi hin hubemaim hitit, Jesu biyan mi’itube ya’iyai i hi’itin.
42023056	Naatu himatabir hin bar hitit Jesu biyan yabuna’in isan ana raiy * hibogaigiwas naatu mar to Baiyarir Ana Veya i hima hiyarir hai ofafar eo na’atube.
42024001	Sunday maraumanika baibin raiy hibogaigiwas hi’inu’in hibow hin rah yan hitit.
42024002	Naatu hin rah yan hitit ana veya kabay gagamin Jesu ana hub awan hiya’afut inu’in hifururuw tit hub awan asir inu’in hi’itin.
42024003	Basit wanawanan hirun hin, baise Regah Jesu biyan men hitita’urimih.
42024004	Nati’imaim hai kasiy ra’at hibat hibinubunibun naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab hai bonamanamarin auman sisibihimaim himatar hibat.
42024005	Baibin hai bir ra’at nahimaim yumatah au babe me yan hire, baise orot rou’ab hi’uwih hio, “Kwa aisim orot yawasin isan sabuw murubin hai efanamaim kwanunuwih?
42024006	Iti’imaim boro men kwana’itin, i morobone misir maiye! Galilee imaim bairi kwama’am ana veya tur abisa eo i kwanotanot.
42024007	‘Orot Natun i boro hinab sabuw kakafih umahimaim hinayai, hina’onaf, naatu veya tounu ufunamaim morobone nayawas maiye.’”
42024008	Imaibo baibin ana tur eo nuhih taseb hinot.
42024009	Naatu rahane himatabir maiye hina bar hitit. Sawar abisa’awat hi’i’itah ana bai’ufununayah nah 11 naatu bai’ufununayah afa nati baremaim hima’am auman hai tur hi’owen.
42024010	Baibin iyabowat sawar hi’itah hina Jesu ana tur abarayah hai tur hio’owen wabih i Mary Magdalin, Joanna naatu Mary, James hinah naatu baibin afa auman.
42024011	Baise Jesu ana tur abarayah baibin hio men hitumatum, anayabin hai tur hinonowar naniyan i tamim tao kwanekwan na’atube.
42024012	Baise Peter misir nunuw in rah yan tit, hub wanawanan kwaf nuwariy faifuwawat hi’inu’in itah, basit abisa mamatar isan erebainotanot auman matabir in.
42024013	Nati veya ta’imon Jesu ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab Jerusalemane hin bar merar ta wabin Emmaus imaim hitit. Jerusalem in Emmaus titit ana fofonin i 11 kilometres na’atube.
42024014	Baise iti orot rou’ab efamaim sawar abisa’awat himamatar isah hairi hio hidudur hinan ana veya,
42024015	Jesu ufuhine natit botanih bairi hita’imon hiremor hin.
42024016	Naatu bairi hinan i hi’itin baise men kafa’imo hi’inan.
42024017	Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa abisa isan tura airi kwaidudur auman kwanan?” Naatu orot rou’ab hinutanub yah rererey yen hibat.
42024018	Orot ta wabin Cleopas ibatiy eo, “Jerusalem wanawanan o akisimo nanawan orot, imih sawar abisa fai fur wanawanan mamatar o men iso’obamih?”
42024019	Jesu ibatiyih, “Sawar abistan?” Hiya’afut hio, “God ana dinab orot wabin Jesu Nazareth matuwan, God matanamaim na’atube sabuw matahimaim ana tur eo naatu ana bowabow sisinaf etei i fairih naatu turobe.
42024020	Baise aki ai firis ukwarih naatu bonawiyenayah orot ukwarih hibai Roman gawan hitin, morobomih eo ibasit naatu hibai hin hi’onaf morob.
42024021	Aki anotanot iti orot boro Israel sabuw baiyawasih arouw nuhifot ama’am, baise iti orot hirab momorob i veya boun tounu sawar.
42024022	Naatu baibin afa aki ai kou’ayomaim boun maraumanika hin rah yan hititit biyan hiboyouw
42024023	naatu himatabir hina hio, ‘Aki tounamatar ai’itih, naatu tounamatar ai tur hi’owen Jesu i morobone misir maiye.’ Iti na’at hio aki aoror sa’iri ai kasiy ra’at.
42024024	Basit ai kou’ayomaim sabuw afa hin rah yan hit abisa baibin hio hinowar na’atube hi’itah, baise Jesu men hi’itinimih.”
42024025	Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Kwa i kwabikoko’aw, aisim dinab oro’orot abisa hio hikikirum men fudir rerekab kwabitumatumamih!
42024026	Keriso iti sawar etei isah ni’akir biyan nababan saise ana aiwob maramaim narun nabi’aiwob isan men kwaso’ob?”
42024027	Imaibo Jesu taiyuwin isan aneika Moses ana Buk kikirum imaim busuruf idudur rena God ana dinab oro’orot hai Buk hikikirum imaim tit.
42024028	Naatu bar merar hinuh hinanamaim hititit auman, Jesu bar merar ta namihibe iwa’an hi’itin.
42024029	Baise hi’otan hio, “Veya sawar naatu mar efof imih tarun bairit ta’in.” Iti na’at hio itin, basit bairi inumih hirun.
42024030	Bay aa isan Jesu bairi himare, eof rafiy bai God ana merar yi sawar imasib itih.
42024031	Imaibo hairi matah to iwa’an hi’inan, baise marta’imon na’am sa’iwa’an.
42024032	Hairi himisir hio, “Efamaim tanan Buk Atamaninamaim bidudur dogorot ahayabe yiy naniyan itatam?”
42024033	Basit himisir himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit, nati’imaim bai’ufununayah nah 11 naatu afa auman hiru’ay hima’am hi’itih,
42024034	hai tur hi’owen hio, “Tur anababatun Regah i morobone misir maiye Simon isan irerereb.
42024035	Orot rou’ab efamaim abisa mamatar naatu mi’itube rafiy imasib bitih ana veya’amaim matah to iwa’an hi’i’inan etei hidudur turahinah hinowar.
42024036	Orot rou’ab iti na’atube hima hio hinonowar auman naniyan meyemeye Regah nah yan foun matar bat iuwih eo, “Tufuw isa nama.”
42024037	Etei hi’oror, hai bir ra’at, hinotanot i yoyom mowan itinin hirouw.
42024038	Baise Jesu iuwih eo, “Aisim kwabirubir naatu aisim a not boro’ika tekakasiy?
42024039	Au umau kwa’itah, naatu biyau kwabutubun finimu au rakit naniyan kwatatam, saise kwanaso’ob iti i anababatun ayu, anayabin yoyom i aurih finimih en.”
42024040	Iti ra’at eo sawar basit an uman i’obaiyih hi’itan.
42024041	Baise men kafa’imo hitumatumamih, hai kawasa ra’at hikasiy auman, basit Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa bay urey ta kwayai inu’in?”
42024042	Siy baibitab finimin reban hibai hitin
42024043	naatu nahimaim bat eaan hi’itin.
42024044	Imaibo hai tur eowen eo, “Ayu i sawar iti isah bairit tama’ama ana veya a tur aowen. Sawar abisa ayu isau mataramih Moses ana Bukamaim, dinab hai Bukamaim na’atube Psalms imaim hio hikikirum hina hiturobe.”
42024045	Imaibo hai not botawiy Buk Atamaninamaim abisa isan hio hikikirum naniyan hibai.
42024046	Naatu iuwih eo, “Abisa hio hikikirum anayabin i iti, Keriso i ni’akir biyan nababan namorob, naatu veya tounu ufunamaim boro nayawas maiye namisir.
42024047	Saise i wabinamaim ya baikitabir naatu notawiyen ana tur Jerusalemamaim an hinayai hinabinan hinatit hinan tafaram tutufin etei hinanowar.
42024048	Imih kwa abisa matamaim kwa’i’itin i kwanakubuna sabuw etei hai tur kwana’owen hinanowar.
42024049	Jerusalemamaim kwanama ayu Tamai abisa baitimih eo’omatani marane aniyafar nare a fair kwanab.”
42024050	Imaibo nawiyih bairi Jerusalem hihamiy hitit hin Bethany hitit, nati’imaim uman bora’ah isah yoyoban igegewasinih.
42024051	Bigegewasinih auman ihamiyih earura’ah yen in mar wanawanan run.
42024052	Hibora’ara’ah yasisir yah awan karatan auman himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit.
42024053	Nati’imaim mar etei hin Tafaror Baremaim God ana merar hiyiy naatu hibobora’ara’ah.
43001001	Tafaram matara’e ana veya Tur i wan ma, naatu Tur i God hairi hima, naatu Tur i God taiyuwin.
43001002	Tur i God hairi wan hima’abo tafaram matar.
43001003	Tur wanawananamaim God sawar etei’imak sinafen himatar; iti sawar himamatar i etei tur wanawananamaim himatar men ta asir matar kwaneyanamih.
43001004	Tur i yawas an anababatun, naatu iti yawas i sabuw isah marakaw bai na.
43001005	Iti marakaw guguminamaim kusisiar, naatu gugumin men karam boro marakaw na’asabun.
43001006	God ana kob abarayan wabin John iyafar na tit;
43001007	marakaw isan sif ruboun eorereb sabuw hinowar, naatu sabuw iyab tur hinonowar hitumatum.
43001008	I taiyuwin i men marakaw; i marakaw akisin ana sif narubonamih na.
43001009	Iti marakaw i turobe, marakaw anababatun, tafaramaim na sabuw tafahimaim ekukusisiar.
43001010	Tur i na tafaram eo mamatar wanawananamaim ma, baise tafaram i men inanimih.
43001011	I na ana tafaram tit, baise taiyuwin ana sabuw i men hibaimih.
43001012	Baise sabuw afa hibai naatu wabinamaim hitumitum, naatu baibasit itih i hina God natunatun himatar.
43001013	God natunatun himamatar i men orot anarara, o men orot babin aawan hairi hi'in kek tetutufu na'atube'emih, baise i God akisin anakokok sinaf i natunatun himatar.
43001014	Tur i na orot matar, naatu wanawanatamaim ma, ana marakaw bonamanamarin i taitin, iti marakaw bonamanamarin i God Natun ta’imonamo ebitin. Iti tur wanawanan i turobe naatu manaw kabeber awan karatan.
43001015	John iti orot isan fanan sib binan eo,” Iti orot ayu isan ao’oban iti enan, anamaramaim ayu iti na’at ao, ‘I ayu ufu enan i ana fair ra’at ayu natabiru, anayabin i wan ma’abo ayu atufuw.’”
43001016	I wanawanan manaw kabeber karsuwei it etei ebigegewasinit, ana baigegewasin tafan baban ebitit.
43001017	Anayabin God ana ofafar i Moses itin, baise manaw kabeber naatu turobe i Jesu Keriso’one na.
43001018	Men yait ta God itin. baise God Natun ta’imon Tamah wanawananamaim ema’am akisinamo God bai na bebeyanamaim tasusu’ub.
43001019	Jew hai ukwarih Jerusalem hima’am firis afa naatu hai baibaisayah * afa hiyafarih hin John hibatiy? “O i yait?”
43001020	I men baifuwenamaim iyafutih, baise i mutufor bebeyanamaim eorereb, “Ayu i men Keriso.”
43001021	Naatu hibatiy, “Bo o i yait? Om Elizah?” John eo, “Ayu men Elizah.” Ai o dinab orot?” John iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men dinab orot.”
43001022	Ibanak hibatiy maiye hio, “O i yait? Ku’o anowar saise anamatabir anan iyab hiyafari anan hai tur ana’owen. O taiyuw isa boro inakubuna ananowar.”
43001023	John iya’afutih dinab orot Isaiah Buk Atamaninamaim kirum inu'in imaim eo, “Ayu i orot ta fanan araramaim eafa’af. Ef kwanarumutufur Regah ana remor isan!”
43001024	Kob nayah Pharisee hiyafarih hina,
43001025	John hibatiy, “Bo o men Keriso, o Elizah o dinab orot na’at, aisim sabuw bapataito kubitih?”
43001026	John hai tur eowen eo, “Ayu harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih, Baise kwa wanawanamaim orot ta ebatabat kwa men kwaso’ob.
43001027	I Ayu ufu’umaim enan, an ana baibaiyon murab men gewasu boro anarufamen.”
43001028	Iti sawar etei i Bethany himatar harew Jordan sisibin veya yeninane, John sabuw bapataito bitihimaim.
43001029	Mar to John nuw Jesu nan itin eo, “Kwanuw God Ana Lamb tafaram ana kakafin bosairenayan enan kwa’itin!”
43001030	Iti orot isan ao’orereb anamaramaim iti na’atube ao, ‘Orot ayu ufu’umaim enan i ana fair ra’at kwanekwan, anayabin i wan ma’abo ayu a tufuw.’
43001031	Ayu taiyuwu auman iti orot men asu’ub, baise anayabin nati isan ayu harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih imaim Israel sabuw isah tirerereb hitaso’ob’.
43001032	Naatu John iti tur eorereb. “Ayu Anunin mamu imag na’atube marane ra’iy naatu i tafanamaim mamara’at aitin.
43001033	Ayu iti orot i boro men ataso’ob, baise God iyunu ana harewamaim sabuw bapataito abitih i au tur eowen, ‘Orot yait Anunin nara’iy tafanamaim namara’at ina’i’itin, i boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito nitih.’”
43001034	John eo, “Ayu aitinika naatu ao’orereb iti i God Natun.”
43001035	Ana martot John iban maiye ana bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab bairi hina efan ta’imonamaim hibatabat.
43001036	Naatu Jesu na natabirih inan i’itin anamaramaim, John eo, “God ana Lamb enan kwa’itin!”
43001037	Anamaramaim bai’ufununayah orot rou’ab iti hinonowar, i hairi Jesu hi’ufunun.
43001038	Jesu nunutabir, orot rou’ab hibi’ufunun itih naatu ibatiyih, “Kwa abistan kwakokok?” Hiya’afutih hi’o, “ Rabbi ” (anayabin Bai’obaiyenayan), “O menamaim kuma’am?”
43001039	I iya’afutih eo, “Kwanatan, kwa taiyuw efan kwa’itin.” Naatu hin efan menamaim ma’am hi’itin, naatu veya tutufin bairi imaim hima. Nati i tanao 4 korok na’atube.
43001040	John abistan eo’o orot rou’ab hinowar Jesu hibi’ufunun orot ta i Andrew, Simon Peter tain
43001041	Andrew Jesu bihamiy ufunamaim wantoro’ot i tuwah Simon nuwih, naatu tita’ur ana tur eowen, “Ayu i Roubininenayan atita’ur, nati i Keriso.”
43001042	Naatu Andrew tuwah Simon nawiy in Jesu biyan tit. Jesu nura’at itin naatu eo, “O i Simon, John natun. O boro wab hina’af Cephas.” Cephas, Peter hairi hai yabin i kabay.
43001043	Ana marto, Jesu au Galilee namih bobogaigiwas, Philip tita’ur naatu iu, “Kuna kwi’ufnunu tan.”
43001044	Philip ana tafaram i Betsaida, Andrew tuwah Peter bairi hai bar merar ta’imon.
43001045	Philip na Nathanael tita’ur naatu iu, “Iti orot isan Moses Buka Atamaninamaim eo kikirum naatu dinab oro’orot auman hikikirum i boun atita’ur, iti orot tamah i Joseph ana bar ana merar i Nazareth.”
43001046	“Nazareth! Sawar gewasin ta boro imaim namatar?” Nathanael ibat. Philip eo, “Kuna tan, kwi’itin.”
43001047	Anamaramaim Jesu nuw Nathanael nan itin, isan eo, “I turobe Israel mowan, i orot ana yawas gewasin men baifufuwenayan.”
43001048	Nathanael ibatiy, “O mi’itube ayu isu’ubu?” Jesu iya’afut eo, “O i ai fig an anayouninamaim ima’am ayu ait, naatu ufibo Philip o isa eaf.”
43001049	Imaibo Nathanael eorereb eo, “Rabbi, Bai’obaiyenayan o i God Natun! o i Israel hai Aiwob.”
43001050	Jesu eo, “O i tumatum anayabin ayu a tur aowen o i ai fig an ima’am ait. O boro sawar gagamihika ina’itan men iti i’i’itin na’atube.”
43001051	Tur tafan ya’abar maiye eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, kwa boro mar ana etawan nabotawiy, naatu God ana tounamatar Orot Natun biyanamaim hinayen hinarara’iy kwana’itih.”
43002001	Veya baitonin ufunamaim tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar Canna imaim tabin ana hiyuw hibogaigiwas. Jesu hinah i nati’imaim.
43002002	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufunanayah auman bairi hibuwih tabin ana hiyuw aa wanawanan hirun.
43002003	Sabuw wine hitom sasawar anamaramaim Mary natun Jesu isan eo, “ Wine hitom sawar.”
43002004	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Babine, ayu men inabobaru iti hiyuw aa wanawanan. Ayu au veya i men baimih.”
43002005	Hinah sabuw bowayah isah eo, “Abistanawat na’u’uwi imaim kwanasinaf.”
43002006	Sisibihimaim noukwat buhuw etei umat roun ta’imon kabayamaim hikwakwen hibatabat, iti noukwat i Jew hai koksouwen binanakwar noukwat. Nati noukwat wanawananan i karam harew boro 70 o 100 litres hinisuwei nayen awan nakaratan.
43002007	Jesu bowayah uwih, “Buhuw harew kwariren teyen.” Imih harew hiriren hiyen awah hikartanen,
43002008	naatu uwih, “Bounabo turin kwahun kwabai kwan tabin ana orot ukwarin kwaitin.” Eo na’atube hisinaf.
43002009	Naatu tabin ana orot ukwarin harew bai kakartubun harew botabir in wine naniyan matar. I men so’ob wine i menane na, baise bowayah iyab harew hihuh i hiso’ob. Naatu tabin boubun eaf na bai tit nabinamaim ibatiy naatu,
43002010	eo, “Mar etei hiyuw ana veya wine hai baiyan gagamin i wan tetomatom, naatu ufunamaim nanawan sabuw tetom terarouwabon i wine ana baiyan kikimin tetomatom. Baise o bounabo wine gewasin iya’asair inu’in ibotait.”
43002011	Iti i Jesu ana ina’inan fairin wantoro’ot tafaram Galilee wanawanan bar merar Canna imaim sinaf matar. Nati’imaim i ana fair botait, naatu i ana bai’ufununayah hi’itin hitumatum.
43002012	Iti ufunamaim Jesu hinah naatu taitin ana bai’ufununayah bairi hire hin Capernaum hitit. Nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube hima.
43002013	Naatu Jew hai Tar Nowaten Hiyuw i na kakabom auman, Jesu yen in Jerusalem tit.
43002014	Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana seboseb rur sabuw hima, sheep, mamu hitotobon, naatu sabuw afa i gem afe’en hima kabay hibiyabonen tita’urih.
43002015	Imih i murab bai eam wabir matar imaim wabirih nunih seboseb hihamiy ufun hitit, naatu for hiyataiten hima hitotobon auman naatu kabay hibiyabonebonen hai kabay tar baisrouwen hai gemogem eabar tabitabiren hisuwa hire.
43002016	Sabuw iyab mamu hiyateiten hitotobon isan i eo, “Iti kwabosairen kwatit ufun. Aisim Tamai ana bar kwiwa’an in ahar bar matar!”
43002017	Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah nuhih taseb Buk Atamaninamaim mi’itube hikirum inu’in hinot, “Ayu dogorou O a Bar isan aniyababan wairafabe na’arahu anamorob.”
43002018	Imaibo Jew sabuw tur fokarinamaim Jesu hibatiy, “Ina’inanen baifofofor afa kusinafen a’itah saife imaim ni’obaiyi o sawar etei sinaf isan ana fair ibai?”
43002019	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Iti Tafaror Bar anagurus nare, naatu veya tounu wanawananamaim ana bora’ah maiye.”
43002020	Jew sabuw hiya’afut hi’u, “Iti Tafaror Bar hiwowowab i kwamur etei 46 sawar, naatu o ku’o i veya tounu wanawananamaim inawowab maiye?”
43002021	Baise Jesu Tafaror Bar isan eo nati i taiyuwin biyan isan eo.
43002022	Jesu morobone mimisir ufunamaim, ana bai’ufnunenayah nuhih taseb abistanawat eo hinot. Naatu imaibo Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum hitumatum naatu Jesu tur eo auman hitumatum.
43002023	Jesu Jerusalem ma’am ana veya Tar Nowaten ana hiyuwamaim ina’inan baifofofor sisinafen i sabuw moumurih maiyow hi’itah naatu i wabinamaim hitumatum.
43002024	Baise Jesu taiyuwin so’ob nati sabuw i men ebitutumih, anayabin orot babin etei i su’ubih,
43002025	imih men karam orot babin hai not i ana tur hita’owen anayabin abisa orot dogoron wanawanan i so’ob.
43003001	Jew hai ukwarin orot wabin Nicodemus i Pharisee ana kou’ayamaim orot ta.
43003002	Guguminamaim na Jesu biyan tit, naatu eo, “Bai’obaiyenayan, aki aso’ob o i bai’obaiyenayan God biyanane ina. Men yait ta karam boro ina’inanen fairih o kusisinafube nasinaf, God men hairi hinama’am na’at.”
43003003	Mar ta’imonamo Jesu iya’afut, “Ayu tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, men yait ta boro God ana ma’ama wanatowan na’itin, baise i boro natufuw maiye’ebo.”
43003004	“Orot ra’at gagamin na’in ema’am, boro mi’itube natufuw maiye?” Nicodemus ibat. “Men karam hinah yan wanawanan narun mar bairou’abin natufuw maiye!”
43003005	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, men yait ta boro God ana ma’ama wanatowan narun, baise i harew naatu Anuninamaim natufuw.
43003006	Biyat etatoub, i biyat eya’iy, baise Anun Kakafiyin etatoub Anun Kakafiyin iya’iy.
43003007	O boro men ita’ororsa’ir ayu tur iti tufuw maiye ao isan.
43003008	Waruw ana kokomaim ebababin. O i nidun kunonowar, baise o men karam boro inao, i menane na enan, o au mena’at babin enan. Imih orot babin anunihine i nati na’atube tetutufuw.”
43003009	Nicodemus i bat, “Iti i mi’itube?”
43003010	Jesu eo, “O i Israel hai bai’obaiyenayan naatu o iti sawar men imanamamih?”
43003011	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, aki abisa asoso’ob i a’o, naatu abisa aki a’i’itin i isan a’o, baise kwa i boro’ika aki ai tur naniyan men kwabaibimih.
43003012	Ayu tafaram ana sawar isah ao kwanowar baise kwa men kwabitumatum. Kwa boro mi’itube kwanitumatum ayu mar ana sawar isah ana’o na’at?”
43003013	Men yait ta in mar run, baise orot Natun marane nan akisinamo.
43003014	Moses mi’itube arar yan kok bora’ah na’atube, orot natun hinabora’ah nayen,
43003015	saise iyabowat i tebitumatum boro ma’ama wanatowan hinab.
43003016	God tafaram iyabuw kwanekwan imih i Natun ta’imonamo iyafar na, saise yait i ebitumitum boro men namorob, baise boro yawas wanatowan nab.
43003017	God i men tafaram bai’afiyin isan Natun iyafar na tafaramaim titamih, baise tafaram baiyawasin isan na tit.
43003018	O yait I kubitumitum boro men ina’afemih, baise o yait men ebitumitum i eaf sawar, anayabin i men God Natun Ta’imon, i akisinamo wabin itumitumamih.
43003019	Iti i baib’afiyen. Marakaw na tafaramamaim tit, baise orot marakaw efanin gugumin iyabuw anayabin hai sinaf kakafih.
43003020	Orot babin etei sinaf kakafih tesisinaf i marakaw hikwahir naatu boro men hinan marakaw wanawanan hinarun, tebirubir hai sinaf boro hinirerereb.
43003021	Baise yait ta turobe’emaim ema’am marakaw wanatowan erur, saise i ana bowabow God wanawananamaim bowabow boro nirerereb.
43003022	Iti ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi hitit hin Judea tafaram ufunane hirun, nati’imaim mar kikimin hima naatu bapataito itih.
43003023	Nati’imaim John auman tafaram Aenonamaim sabuw bapataito bitih, Salim i men ef yok i sisibinamaim, anayabin nati’imaim i harew moumurih, naatu sabuw i nan ufun hinan bapataito bain isan.
43003024	(Iti John dibur hiyaru’uy ma’am nanamaim.)
43003025	John ana bai’ufununayah afa naatu Jew sabuw afa wanawanahimaim gamin matar, bapataito ana ofafaren isan.
43003026	I hina John biyan hitit naatu hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, orot nati o airi no Jordan harew rounane menatan isan o i’o’orerereb, i boun bapataito sabuw ebitih, naatu sabuw etei i isan tenan.”
43003027	Nati isan John iya’afut eo, “Orot abistanawat marane tebitin iwat nab.
43003028	Kwa taiyuw i karam ayu ao i kwanao’rereb, Ayu i men Keriso, baise ayu i nanamaim hiyafaru ana.
43003029	Babin orot ana rum hi’o ema’am, orot ana of menatan i bai’awaninamih i orot isan ma tainin rub ma ekakaif, naatu i ana rum fanan enonowar ana veya i anababatun ekakawasa. Iti kawasa i ayu nowau, naatu kawasa i boun ana yomanin a’asa’ub.
43003030	I ana fair ra’at natabiru, ayu fair i men ra’at.”
43003031	Yeit auyomane nan i ra’at etei natabirih, menatan iti tafaramane nan i tafaram nowan, naatu tafaram ana sawar isah i ebidudur. Menatan marane nan i sawar etei tafahimaim.
43003032	I abis nonowar, i’itanen i isah eo’orerereb, baise men yait ta ana tur ebaibimih.
43003033	Orot yait ta i ana tur nabitumitum na’at, i ebi’obaiyit i ebitumatum God abistan eo’o i turobe.
43003034	Menatan God biyafar i God ana tur eo’orerereb; anayabin God i Anun i nowanamih itin anababatun
43003035	Tamah Natun iyabuw kwanekwan naatu sawar etei i ana fair babanamaim ya.
43003036	Yait ana baitumatum Natunamaim naya’iy boro yawas wanatowan nab, baise yait ta God Natun nabifutuw boro men yawas nitinimih, God ana yaso’ar tafahimaim nama.
43004001	Pharisee hinowar Jesu i bigegesairih naatu John natabir ana bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in bapataito ebitih,
43004002	turobe iti i men Jesu bapataito ebitih, baise i ana bai’ufununayah.
43004003	Anamaramaim Jesu, i Judea ihamiy naatu matabir maiye in Galilee.
43004004	Boun ana remoramaim i boro Samaria wanawanan narun nan.
43004005	Imih i Samaria bar merar wabin Sychar tit, Jacob ana me kamar i natun Joseph bitin i sisibinamaim.
43004006	Jacob ana harew karakar i nati’imaim, naatu Jesu ef nan hahar, karakar sisibin mara’at ma. Nati i ouyit.
43004007	Samaria babin harew huninamih nan anamaramaim, Jesu babin isan eo, “Karam harew ititu atatom?
43004008	I ana bai’ufununayah hin bar merar bay tobonamih.
43004009	Samaria babin Jesu isan eo, “O i Jew naatu ayu i Samaria babin. Mi’itube ayu isou harewamih kufefefeyan?” (Jew hai naukwat, o hai kerowas boro men Samaria bairi hinafaram hinaa hinatom.)
43004010	Jesu, babin isan iya’afut eo, “O God ana siwar itasoso’ob na’at yait o isa harew tomamih efefeyan, o boro itibatiy i boro yawas ana harew tit itatom”.
43004011	Babin eo, “Aro, o taratarfuruwen men ibai ina naatu karakar ana sou i manin na’in ra’iy in. Karakar menatanamaim boro iti yawas ana harew inab?
43004012	Iti karakar i aki agir Jacob kair imaim ma tomatom, naatu ana haru ana for ouman. Iti karakar aki iti. O taiyuw ku’o’o, o Jacob inatabir?
43004013	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Orot babin etei iti harew natomatom boro sikan namamah maiye,
43004014	baise yait ayu harew anitin natomatom boro men sikan namamah. Naatu harew nati ayu anabitin boro wanawananamaim harew buruburur namatar. Naatu yawas’anaharew imaim na’in nitin, naatu yawas wanatowan nab.
43004015	Babin Jesu isan eo,” Aro, harew nati ayu kwiti saise ayu men sikou namamaa nan naatu men mar etei iti’imaim harew huninamih anan.”
43004016	Jesu babin iu, “Kwen ku’af aaw isan naatu kumatabir kuna.”
43004017	Babin iya’afut eo, “Ayu aawu en.” Jesu eo,” O aaw en ku’o’o i turobe.”
43004018	Anababatun, o oro’orot etei five , i aa’awanen naatu orot iti boun airi kwama’am i men o aawamih. Abistan iti boun i’o’o i turobe.”
43004019	Babin eo, “Aro, ayu ai'iti, o i dinab orot.”
43004020	“Aki ai a’agir iti oyawemaim hikwakwafir, baise kwa Jew kwa’o’o kwafiren efan i Jerusalemamaim tanakwafir.”
43004021	Jesu eorereb eo, “Babin ayu initutumu, veya i enan anamaramaim kwa boro men Tamat no oyawemaim o Jerusalemamaim kwanakwafir.
43004022	Kwa Samaria men kwaso’ob abistan kwakwakwafir, aki aso’ob abistan a kwakwafir, anayabin yawas i Jew sabuw biyahine na.
43004023	Veya i enan naatu natitaka anamaramaim anababatun kwafirenayah boro Regah turobe naatu Anuninamaim hinakwafir, naatu kwafirinayah iti na’atube i boun Regah enunuwet.
43004024	God i Anunin, naatu i ana kwafirenayah i turobe naatu Anuninamaim hinakwafir.”
43004025	Babin eo, “Ayu nati Roubininenayan i aso’ob (Keriso terarouw) i enan. I nanan ana veya i boro sawar etei it isat nakubuna.”
43004026	Imaibo Jesu eorereb eo, “Ayu i yait? Ayu yait airit ta’o’o.”
43004027	Jesu eo oumatan, ana bai’ufununayah himatabir hina hitit naatu Jesu babin hairi hibidudur hi’itih hi’ororsa’ir. Baise men yait ta kok babin tibatiy, o Jesu hitibatiy, “Anayabin aisimamih babin airi kwabidudur?”
43004028	Naatu babin ana harew hunihun ihamiy, i matabir in bar merar tit naatu sabuw nati’imaim hima’am hai tur eo’wen,
43004029	Kwana tan orot kwa’itin, sawar abistanawat asisinaf etei’imak au tur eowen. Ta’itin i Roubinineyan wariten?”
43004030	Naatu bar merar hihamiy naatu sabuw etei ef hinuwet hin Jesu biyan hitit.
43004031	Nati ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan bay ta ku’aan ya kurutan!”
43004032	Baise i isah eo, “Ayu au bay menamaim ana’ani’aan kwa men kafa’imo kwaso’ob.”
43004033	Imih bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hima hi’o, “Ta’itin sabuw afa bay hibow hina hitin eaa wariten?”
43004034	Jesu eo, “Ayu au bay, i yait ayu biyafaru i anakok anabosiyasiyar anasinaf naatu bowabow ayu bitu i anabow anisawar.
43004035	Kwa iti na’atube kwa’o’o, ’Sumar kwafe’en o tafanamaim aki boro anafour’. Baise a tur ao’owen, Kwa matatoniwa’an me kwana’itin gewas naatu bay iyamur sawar fourin isan ana veya tit.
43004036	Boun auman fourayan boro hibaiyan ana kabay nab, naatu bay four eya’ay ma’ama wanatowan isan, imih ta’itin tanumayan naatu fourayan i hairi auta’imon hiniyasisir.
43004037	Abistan hi’o’o i turobe, “Orot ta’imon etatanum naatu orot ta’imon efafour”.
43004038	“Efan men imaim ima ibowabow, ayu aiyafari kwenan inafouramih naatu i hai fairamaim hibowabow o nonowatin inafour inaa’amih”.
43004039	Samaria moumurih maiyow nati bar merar Jesu hitumitum anayabin babin ana turamaim, “I ayu au sinaf etei eo anowar”.
43004040	Imih anamaramaim Samaria sabuw hina Jesu biyan hititit, hifefeyan bairi ma isan, imih veya rou’ab bairi hima.
43004041	Sabuw moumurin maiyow hitumatum anayabin i ana turamaim,
43004042	naatu babin isan hi’o, “Aki bounabo abitumatum, men babin i’o isan, baise abistan tur eo’o aki taiyuwika taini anowar”.
43004043	Veya rou’ab sasawar ufunamaim Jesu efan nati ihamiy, naatu au Galilee na’at misir in.
43004044	Anayabin i taiyuwin isan eorereb eo, “Dinab orot taiyuwin ana tafaram sabuw isan men tekakakaf”.
43004045	Imih anamaramaim na Galilee titit, sabuw ana merar hiyi hibai. Anayabin hin Jerusalem Tar Nowaten Hiyuw aa isan hiruru’ay, nati’imaim sawar abistanawat sinaf hi’i’itin isan.
43004046	Naatu matabir maiye in Canna tit, nati Canna i Galilee wanawanan, imaim harew botabir wine mamatar. Naatu nati’imaim gawan ana orot ukwarin natun sawow Capernaumamaim inu’in.
43004047	Jesu Judea’ane na Galilee tit ma’am ana tur na nowar. Misir in biyan tit ana tur eowen naatu ifefeyan i tare tan natun sawow inu’in tiyawas i kafa’imo namorob.
43004048	Jesu sabuw iuwih, “Kwa sabuw ina’inan naatu baifofofor kwana’itah, baise boro men kwanitumatum.”
43004049	Gawan ana orot ukwarin Jesu isan eo, “Aro, inare tananabo au kek namorob.”
43004050	Jesu orot isan eo, “Kwen! O a kek yawas ema’am!” Orot itumatum abistan Jesu tur isan eo naatu ana ef rura’ah in.
43004051	I ra’iy inan efamaim ana akir orot bairi hitar naatu ana tur hi’owen, “O a kek i yawas ema’am
43004052	Naatu ibatiyih, Veya abistanamaim au kek yawas?” Naatu i hiya’afut hi’o, “Fai ouyit one korok na’atube imaim sawow ihamiy”.
43004053	Naatu imaibo tamah not nati ana veya Jesu eo, “O a kek i boro nayawas.” Imih nati ana baremaim hima’am etei hitumatum.
43004054	Iti ina’inan bairu’abin men tesinaf emamatar Jesu sinaf matar, no Judea’ane na au Galilee inan ufunamaim.
43005001	Veya bai’ab sawar ufunamaim, Jew hai hiyuw aa isan Jesu yen in Jerusalem.
43005002	Jerusalem wanawanan efan wabin For Hirahir * sisibinamaim i harew kukuf, naatu ana seboseb etei umatroun hiwowaben Aramek fanahimaim tisusu’ub Betsaida,
43005003	nati sebosebomaim sabuw sawusawuwih moumurin maiyow hiya hi’inu’in, matah fim, ah umah kafikafirih, naatu ah umah ririmih hima hikakaif harew tabi’etaw isan.
43005004	Anayabin veya ta ta Regah ana tounamatar boro nara’iy harew kukuf nabenei niyabat rarouw nayen. Naatu sabuw sawow ana yumat ta ta hibow hina ti’inu’in, yait wan nara’iy nakifukif i boro nayawas.
43005005	Orot ta sawow bai ma kwamur etei 38 i nati wanawanahimaim.
43005006	Jesu nuw orot nati’imaim inu’in itin, naatu so’ob orot sawow nati bai virurumin maiyow, imih orot ibatiy, “O kukokok inayawas?”
43005007	Orot iya’afut eo, “Regah, anamaramaim harew iyabat rarouw eyey, men yait ta boro nibaisu nabuwu anara’iy harew kukuf yan. Ayu misir ra’iyemih abiwa’an, sabuw afa i wan hira’iyeka.”
43005008	Naatu Jesu orot isan eo, “Kumisir! A ir kunu naatu kuremor kwen.”
43005009	Mar ta’imon orot yawas; misir ana ir nu bat remor. Iti sawar mamatar i Baiyarir Ana Veya.
43005010	Naatu Jew sabuw orot yayawas isan hi’o, “Iti boun i Baiyarir ana veya, ata ofafar men ebibasit o a ir ina’abar.”
43005011	Baise iya’afutih eo, “Orot yait ayu biyawasu iuwu, ‘Kumisir a ir kunu naatu kubat kuremor.’”
43005012	Imih hibatiy, “Nati orot i yait uwi a ir inu i’abar ibat kureremor?”
43005013	Orot nati yayawas i men kafa’imo so’ob orot i yait, anayabin sabuw moumurin maiyow nati’imaim hibatabat Jesu sorabon in kasiy.
43005014	Nati ufunamaim Jesu Tafaror Bar wanawanan tita’ur naatu iu, “Kwi’itin, o iyawas. Bowabow kakafih inihamiyen o sawar kakafin anababatun boro biyamaim namatar.”
43005015	Orot nati’imaim tit in, Jew sabuw hai tur eowen i Jesu iyawas.
43005016	Imih hibusuruf Jesu isan turamaim hi’u hi’a’a’afiy, anayabin i Baiyarir ana veya sawar iti na’atube sinaf isan.
43005017	Jesu isah eo, “Ayu Tamai i mar etei ebowabow, imih ayu auman boro anabow.”
43005018	Ana’an iti isan Jew hisinaftobon ef hinuwet Jesu asabunin isan; men Baiyarir ana ofafar ea’eastu’ub akisin, baise God isan Tamah rouw eo’omaim, iwa’an taiyuwin bai yen in God hairi anafofonin matar.
43005019	Jesu iyafutih eo. “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Orot Natun akisin ana kok men karam nasinaf; baise Tamah abistan sinaf i i’itinimaim boro nasinaf, anayabin Tamah abistan isisinaf na’atube Natun isisinaf.
43005020	Anayabin Tamah i Natun iyabuw sawar etei esisinaf na’atube Natun i’obaiy imaim esisinaf. Turobe, kwa a baifofofor isan, i boro sawar gagamihika ni’obaiy nasinaf men boun iti na’atube.
43005021	Tamah murumurubih imisiruwih yawas ebitih na’atube, nati ef ta’imon Natun ekok yait yawas baitinamih boro nitin.
43005022	I na’atube Tamah men yait ta ebibatiy, baise baibabatiyen ana fair tutufin etei Natun itin.
43005023	Saise sabuw etei Tamah tirurusagiy na’atube, Natun boro hinarusagiy. Imih o yait Natun men kururusagiy, Tamah, i ana baiyonenayan auman men kururusagiy.
43005024	“Turobe a tur ao’owen, o yait ayu au tur inowar naatu menatan ayu iyafaru anan kubitumitum, o i yawas ma’ama wanatowan ibaika, naatu o boro men baibatebat inab, anayabin morobone irabon yawas wanawanan irun.
43005025	Turobe a tur ao’owen, veya i enan naatu i na titaka, nati ana veya murumurubih boro God Natun fanan hinanowar naatu iyab fanan hinanonowar boro yawas hinab hinama.
43005026	Anayabin Tamah taiyuwin i yawas an, imih nati yawas ta’imon Natun itin yawas an matar.
43005027	Naatu i baibabatiyen ana fair Natun itin, anayabin i, i Orot Natun.
43005028	“Tur iti ao isan men kwana’ororsa’ir; veya i nati namamataramaim enan, murumurubih etei boro fanan hinanowar,
43005029	hai rahane hinatit, naatu iyab gewasin hisisinaf boro hinamisir yawas hinab, iyab kakafih hinasisinaf boro hinakusairih.”
43005030	“Ayu men karam akisu au kok ana sinaf, baise abisa God iu’uwu’umaim sabuw abibabatiyih, imih ayu au baibatiyen i mutufor, anayabin men ayu au kokomaim asisinaf, baise orot yait ayu iyunu anan i anakok asisinaf.
43005031	Ayu taiyuwu au sinaf isan ana’o’orereb na’at, au tur i men turobe’emih.
43005032	Baise orot ta ayu isou eo’orereb, i a tur ao’owen i ana orereb ayu isou i turobe.
43005033	Kwaso’ob gewasomih kob abarayah John isan kwaiyafarih hinan John i turobe kwa a tur eowen.
43005034	Iti i men kwa orot maiyow isou kwataorereb, baise iti ao saise mi’itube kwa yawas kwatab isan.
43005035	John i hinow na’atube to’ab marakaw kwa it, naatu mar kikimin kwa ana marakaw isan kwaiyasisir.
43005036	Baise ayu au orererebayan orot i gagamin, men iti John eo’orereb na’atube. Ayu au orererebayan i abisa Tamai iyunu ana asisinaf i eo’orereb, naatu nati ebi’obaiyi ayu i Tamai iyafaru anasinaf isan, orot ta eo’orereb i John eo’orereb natabir, anayabin iti bowabow ayu Tamai bitu i anisawar, naatu iti bowabowamaim eo’orereb Ayu Tamai iyunu ana i ana bowabow anabow.
43005037	Naatu Tamai iyunu anan i taiyuwin ayu isou eo’orereb. Kwa men kafa’imo fanan kwanowar naatu yumatan kwa’itin.
43005038	Kwa ana tur men dogor wanawanan run, anayabin menatan ayu iyunu anan i men kwabitumitum.
43005039	Kwa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum kwaiyab kwabinotanot anayabin boro imaim yawas wanatowan kwanab. Nati tur i ayu isou eo,
43005040	baise men kwakokok kwanan ayu biyau yawas kwanab.
43005041	“Ayu men orot babin bora’ara’ahu isan ao’omih.
43005042	baise kwa orot babin a yawas ayu aso’ob, kwa a yabow God isan dogoromaim i men ema’am.
43005043	Ayu Tamai wabinamaim anan kwa men kwabuwu au merar kwayi, baise orot babin ta i taiyuwin wabinamaim nanan boro kwanab ana merar kwanay.
43005044	Kwa taiyuw baifa’i isan a kok gagamin, baise God ta’imonamo ana baifa’en i men kwakokok, imih ayu abisa ao boro kwanitutumu?
43005045	Men kwananot ayu boro Tamai nanamaim ubar kwa bait kwanarouw en, baise Moses kwa a not tutufin imaim kwayai kwama’am boro ubar nabit kwana’itin.
43005046	Moses kwatabitumitum na’at, ayu boro kwatitutumu, anayabin i ayu isou kirum.
43005047	Baise Moses abistan kikirum kwa men kwanabitumatum na’at, boro mi’itube ayu ao kwanitumatum?”
43006001	Nati ufunamaim ana veya ta, Jesu Galilee harew isobon rabon rewan rounane (wabin ta Taibirias kukuf.)
43006002	Naatu sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hi’ufunun hin anayabin sabuw sawusawuwih biyahimaim ina’inan sinaf biyawasih hi’itan isan.
43006003	Naatu Jesu yen in oyaw sisibinamaim tit naatu ana bai’ufununayah hina biyanamaim himarir hima.
43006004	Jew sabuw hai Tar Nowaten hiyuw ana veya i na biyubin.
43006005	Jesu nuw ra’at sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow isan hinan itih, naatu Philip ibatiy, “Rafiy menamaim boro tanatobon iti sabuw tanituwih?”
43006006	Iti i Philip fufunin isan ibibatiy, anayabin i ana notamaim so’obaka i boro abistan nasinaf.
43006007	Philip iya’afut eo, “Orot ana baiyan sumar eight ana fofonin * tatab rafiy tatutubun sabuw ta’ita’imon tatabituwih i kikimin kwanekwan.”
43006008	Imaibo ana bai’ufununayah orot ta, Andrew, Simon Peter tain awan tara’ah eo,
43006009	“Kek ta iti’imaim rafiy afu’afusar umat roun naatu siy rou’ab umanamaim hima’am aitin. Baise anotanot boro men nakaram, sabuw i ra’at kwanekwan.”
43006010	Nati’imaim samar gewasin tuw inu’in, imih Jesu eo, “Sabuw kwa’uwih samar yan timarir. naatu sabuw samar yan himarir hima, naatu oro’orotowat hibiyab etei 5,000.
43006011	Jesu faraw bai, God ana merar yi, naatu sabuw himarir hima’am faramih, siy bai ef ta’imon sinaf, etei hi’aa yah gadid hai fofonin bai.
43006012	Naatu hai fofonin baib ufunamaim, Jesu ana bai’ufununayah iuwih eo, “Hi’aa tuturih etei kwaita’ay, men ta kwanihamiy.”
43006013	Basit hi’aa tuturih hi’o’on naatu kaifet hibiwanen etei 12, iti i rafiy fafar umat roun naatu siy rou’abamaim sabuw bituwih.
43006014	Iti ina’inan Jesu sinaf sabuw hi’i’itin ufunamaim hibusuruf hi’o, “Turobe iti orot i dinabamon, i namih hi’o’oban na tafaramamaim tit.”
43006015	Jesu itih so’ob boro kafa’imo hinan hinab naatu hinau’kikin ni’aiwob, imih i hamenamo nati efan ihamiy naatu akisinamo yen in oyaw wan.
43006016	Veya re birabirab ana bai’ufununayah hire hin harew kukuf hitit,
43006017	Jesu isan hima hikakaif mar bu’u’um, men na biyah tit, imih wa hibai hiboy hirabon au Capernaum.
43006018	Nati ana veya kotar bitufuwan wanawanan hin naatu yabat busuruf ra’at.
43006019	Hiboy hitit hire hikuyowen five o six kilometres na’atube hinuwanuw Jesu nahine riy yan bat remor wa isan nan hi’itin yah birubir fafar.
43006020	Baise isah eaf eo, “Ayu o! men kwanabirumih!”
43006021	Imaibo ereyasisir hiu na wa afe’en yen, naatu men yok efan hinot hinanamaim awar hiyut.
43006022	Marto, sabuw rou’ay nati harew kukuf rounane hima hinunuwabon wa ta’imon nati’imaim batabat hi’inan, naatu hiso’ob Jesu i men nati wa’amaim isra’at bairi hinamih, baise ana bai’ufununayah akisihimo hinan hi’itih.
43006023	Imaibo wa afa Taibiriasine hina efan nati Regah faraw bai igegewasin sabuw bituwih sisibinamaim hirun.
43006024	Naatu sabuw wa afe’en hinunuwatet Jesu ana bai’ufununayah bairi men hi’it fa’arih, matah kabiy wa hibow au Capernaum na’at Jesu hinuwih hin.
43006025	Jesu harew kukuf rewan rounane ma’am hitita’ur, naatu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan, biyika ina itit kuma’am?”
43006026	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu kwanunuwuhu i men ina’inan asisinaf kwa’i’itin isan, baise kwa rafiy kwa’aan ya gagadid isan ayu kwanuwuhu kwanan.
43006027	Bay nati eafe’af isan men kwanabowamih, baise ma’ama wanatowan ana bay isan i raro nanababan, nati bay i Orot Natun boro kwa nit. Anayabin God ayu Tamai ana baibasit nati bay roufaramin isan ana fair ayu itu.”
43006028	Imaibo Jesu hibatiy, “Bo aki boro mi’itube anasinaf saise God abistan eo imaim anasinaf?”
43006029	Jesu iyafutih eo, “God ana bowabow bow isan i iti. Orot yait God biyafar i kwanitumitum.
43006030	Imih i hibatiy, “Ina’inan fairin menatan boro inasinaf aki ana’itin naatu o anitutumi? O boro abistan inasinaf?
43006031	It ata a’agir arar yanamaim i rafiy wabin manna hi’aa; Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hi’o’o na’atube, I mar ana rafiy itih hi’aa.”
43006032	Naatu Jesu hai tur eowen eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, “Iti mar ana rafiy kwa kwa’ani’aan i men Moses kwa itimih, baise ayu Tamai rafiy anababatun marane kwa it.
43006033	Anayabin God ana rafiy i orot yait marane rara’iy sabuw etei tafaram wanawanan yawas ebitih.”
43006034	Sabuw hi’o, “Regah iti rafiy i mar etei initi ana’aan.”
43006035	Imaibo Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu i yawas ana rafiy. Orot Yait ayu isou enan i boro men kafa’imo bayumih namorob, naatu orot yait ayu isou ebitumatum boro men kafa’imo sikan namamahimih.”
43006036	Naatu iti tur i ao kwanowaraka naatu mata yan kwa’i’itin baise men kafa’imo kwabitutumu.
43006037	Sabuw iyabowat ayu Tamai bitu boro ayu isou hinan, naatu orot babin yait ayu isou enan boro men ananun ufun natitamih.
43006038	Anayabin ayu marane arara’iy, i men ayu au kok sinaf isanamih, baise orot yait ayu iyunu anan i ana kok anasinaf.
43006039	Naatu orot yait ayu iyunu anan ana kok i iti, sabuw iyabowat ayu bitu etei men ta anikasiy, baise mar yomaninamaim etei’imak anabuwih hinamisir.
43006040	Anayabin ayu Tamai ana kok i sabuw iyab matah etei Natun akisin ti’i’itin naatu tibitumitum boro ma’ama wanatowan ana yawas hinab; naatu mar yomaninamaim ayu boro anabuwih hinamisir.
43006041	Imaibo Jew sabuw hibusuruf Jesu isan higam, anayabin i eo, “Ayu i mar ana rafiy.
43006042	Basit sabuw hi’o, “Iti orot i Jesu, Joseph natun, hinah tamah i taso’ob. Naatu baise boun i eo’o, Ayu i marane ara’iy.”
43006043	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Taiyuw men kwanagam.
43006044	Sabuw boro men ayu isou hinan kwaneyan, baise Tamai ayu iyunu anan boro nabonawiyih hinan ayu biyau hinatit; naatu mar yomaninamaim ayu boro ana bora’ahih hinamisir.
43006045	Dinab oro’orot hikirum hi’o na’atube, ‘Sabuw etei boro God ni’obaiyih. Orot yait Tamai fanan nowar naatu biyanane so’ob ebaib boro ayu isou nan.
43006046	Men yait ta Tamai itin; baise orot yait Godane nan i akisinamo Tamai itin.
43006047	Turobe a tur ao’owen, orot yait ebitumatum, yawas wanatowan i baika.
43006048	Ayu i yawas ana rafiy.
43006049	Kwa a’a’agir hai veya, rafiy wabin manna arar yanamaim hibow hi’aa, baise etei himorob.
43006050	Baise rafiy iti i marane ra’iy, sabuw iyab hinab hina’ani’aan boro men hina morob.
43006051	Ayu i yawas ana rafiy, marane hiyafaru are. Orot babin yait iti rafiy na’ani’aan na’at boro nama wanatowan. Iti rafiy i ayu finimu boro anit, saise sabuw boro tafaramamaim yawas hinab hinama.”
43006052	Naatu Jew sabuw iti tur hinonowar isan yah so’ar hibusuruf taiyuwih wanawanahimaim higam hikwaris hio, “Iti orot biyan finimin boro mi’itube nitit tana’animih eo?”
43006053	Jesu iuwih eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Orot Natun biyan finimin men kwana’aan naatu ana rara men kwanatomatom, kwa wanawanamaim yawas men ema’am.
43006054	Orot yait ayu biyou finimin na’aan naatu au rara natomatom yawas wanatowan i bai, naatu yomaninamaim ayu boro ana bora’ah namisir.
43006055	Anayabin ayu biyou finimin i bay anababatun naatu au rara i harew anababatun,
43006056	orot babin yait ayu biyou finimin na’aan naatu au rara natomatom boro wanawana’umaim nama naatu ayu i wanawananamaim anama.
43006057	Tamat yawas ana’an i ayu iyunu ana, anayabin i ema’am isan imih, ayu auman ama’am, ef ta’imonaban orot yait ayu biyau’umaim bai eani’aan boro yawasin nama anayabin ayu ama’am isan imih.
43006058	Iti rafiy marane rara’iy i men kwa a a’agir manna hi’aa hibimumurub na’atube’emih, baise o yait iti rafiy boun marane rara’iy inab ina’ani’aan boro inama wanatowan.”
43006059	Tur iti etei i Capernaum Kou’ay Bar * wanawananamaim ma sabuw hai tur eowen i’obaibiyih.
43006060	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah moumurin na’in tur iti hinonowar hi’o, “Iti bai’obaiyen i fokarin. Yait boro iti tur nanowar nab?”
43006061	Baise Jesu ana bai’ufununayah abisa isan hio higamigam so’ob naatu iuwih eo, “Tur iti kwanonowar imaim kwa a naniyan ebi’afiy?
43006062	Bo Orot Natun nayen ana efan marasika ma’am imaim nama kwana’itin boro mi’itube kwanao!
43006063	Anun Kakafiyin i yawas ebit biyat i aurin fair en. Iti tur kwa isa a’o i ayub ana tur naatu wanawananamaim i yawas ema’am.
43006064	Baise kwa afa iti kwama’am i men kwabitumatum. Anayabin iyab men hinabitumatum naatu orot yait baban na’o Jesu so’obaka.”
43006065	Ibanak eo maiye, “Anayabin iti isan kwa au’uwi, orot babin boro men asir ayu isou nan kwaneyanamih, baise Tamai ana baibasitamaim boro niwa’an isah naham hinan ayu isou.”
43006066	Nati ana veya’amaim ana bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in hihamiy naatu himatabitabir hina’ufut hin.
43006067	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah nah 12 ibatiyih. “Kwa auman kwakokok kwanan?”
43006068	Simon Peter iya’afut eo, “Regah yait isan boro anan? Yawas wanatowan ana tur o akisimo biya ema’am.
43006069	Aki abitumatum naatu aso’ob o i Kakafiyin Ta’imon Godane ina.”
43006070	Imaibo Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa na 12, i ayu arubini, baise kwa wanawanamaim orot ta i demon mowan.”
43006071	(Jesu iti tur eo’o i Judas Simon Iscariot natun isan, Judas i bai’ufununayan nah 12 wanawanahimaim orot ta, yomaninamaim i boro Jesu nayanuw namorob.)
43007001	Nati ufunamaim Jesu Galilee wanawanan run titit remor in, men kok au Judea tan anayabin Jew hai ukwarih hima hikakaif hitarab tamorob isan.
43007002	Baise Jew sabuw Yagama Sis ana hiyuw aa ana veya i nabiyubin,
43007003	Imih Jesu taitin hi’o, “O boro efan iti inihamiy naatu inan Judea inatit, saise a bai’ufununayah bowabow gewasih abistan kusisinaf hina’itin.
43007004	Anayabin orot yait sabuw etei su’ubin isan boro men wa’iwa’iramaim nabowamih. Baise bebeyanamaim nabow hina’itin. Imih a bowabow bebeyanamaim inabow tafaram tutufin etei ini’obaiyih hina’itin.”
43007005	I taiyuwin taitin men hitumitum, imih iti tur hi’o.
43007006	Naatu Jesu iuwih eo, “Ayu au veya i men na tit, baise kwa a veya i mar etei bobotawiyen inu’in.
43007007	Sabuw kwa boro men hinifutuwi, baise ayu boro hinifutuwu, anayabin ayu mar etei sabuw hai kakafih ao’orerereb.
43007008	Hiyuw isan kwa akis kwanan ayu men bairit tanan, anayabin ayu au veya anababatun i men na tit.”
43007009	Iti na’atube eo, i Galilee wanawananamaim ma.
43007010	Taitin hiyuw isan hiyen hinan, i auman ufuh yen in, men bebeyanamaim in baise i wa’iwa’iramaim in.
43007011	Nati hiyuw wanawanan Jew hai ukwarih Jesu isan hinuwet sabuw hibabatiyih, “Iti orot menamaim ema’am?”
43007012	Sabuw wanawanahimaim baitarsibesib busuruf ra’at. Sabuw afa hi’o, “I orot gewasin,” afa hi’o, “Aiyabin i sabuw ebifufuwih?”
43007013	Baise men yait ta boro fanan aumetawat isan hitao, anayabin Jew ukwarih isah hibir.
43007014	Hiyuw hi’aa na biyanfoun, Jesu na Tafaror Bar run naatu bai’obaiyen busuruf.
43007015	Jew hai ukwarih hifofofor men kafai ta naatu hi’o, “Iti orot menamaim kirum iti so’ob bai?”
43007016	Imaibo Jesu iyafutih eo, “Bai’obaiyen ayu abi’obaiyi i men ayu nowau, baise God ayu biyafaru i nowan.
43007017	O Yait ta God anakok kusisinaf boro inaso’ob ayu au bai’obaiyen i Godane enan, ai ayu taiyuwu au fairamaim ao’o.
43007018	Yait taiyuwin ana fairamaim eo’o, i taiyuwin ana gewasin bain isan enunuwih, baise orot yait God ayu iyafaru anan ana gewasin enunuwih nati orot i turobe, i wanawananamaim men baifuwen ema’am.
43007019	Moses ofafar kwa it ai en? Aisim ofafafar men kwabi’ufunun naatu ayu rabu morobomih kwabiwa’an?”
43007020	Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “O wanawan i demon tema’am. Yait o asabunimih ebiwa’an?”
43007021	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu ina’inan ta’imon asinaf kwa’itin naatu kwaifofor men kafaita.
43007022	Moses uwi natunat oro’orot Baiyariri hai veya’amaim hai ar, mo’oh kwa’afuw, nati i men Mosesine na, nati i kwa a’agir wabih gagamihine na. Imih kwa kek oro’orot hai ar mo’oh kwa’a’afuw.
43007023	Kwa Baiyarir ana veya’amaim kek orot ana ar mo’on kwana’a’afuw nati Moses ana ofafar i men kwa’a’astu’ub, aisimamih ayu Baiyarir Ana Veya orot biyan tutufin abiyawas isan kwa ya esoso’ar?
43007024	Men ufun ana’itininamaim sabuw kwanibabatiyih, baise a baibabatiyen i turobe’emaim kwanibatiyih.”
43007025	Nati isan Jerusalem sabuw afa hibusuruf hibatebat hi’o, “Orotoban iti i boun rabin morobomih ana ef tenunuwet?
43007026	Kwa’itin iban iti bebeyanamaim eo’o, naatu i men tur ta isan te’eo’omih. Kwa kwanotanot sabuw ukwarihiban hiso’ob gewas iti orot i turobe Rourubinen?
43007027	Baise iti orot menane nan i aki aso’ob; Rourubinen nanan anamaramaim boro men yait ta naso’ob i menane na.”
43007028	Imaibo Jesu Tafaror bar wanawanan ma bi’obaibiyih fanan aumetawat na’in eo, “Turobe ayu kwa kwaso’ob, naatu menane anan kwa kwaso’ob? Ayu iti anan i men taiyuwu au kok ana, baise turobe ana God ayu iyunu ana. Nati orot kwa men kwaso’ob
43007029	ayu asu’ub, anayabin ayu ine ana naatu i iyunu ana.”
43007030	Nati’imaim sabuw bain fatuminamih hiwa’an, baise men yait ta biyan butubun, anayabin ana veya i men natit.
43007031	Baise rou’ay gagamin wanawanan sabuw moumurin maiyow hitumitum naatu hi’o, “Rourubinen nanan ina’inan fairih moumurihika nasinaf iti orot boro nanatabir.”
43007032	Rou’ay wanawanan Jesu sawar sisinaf isan hibitarsibesib Pharisee hinowar. Basit firis gagagamih naatu Pharisee Tafaror Bar ma’utayah hiyafarih hin Jesu bain fatuminamih.
43007033	Imih Jesu eo, “Ayu boro men manin bairit tanama, naatu anamatabir maiye anan yait iyunu anan biyan anatit.
43007034	Kwa boro ayu kwananuwuhu, baise boro men kwanatita’uru, naatu ayu menamaim anama’am, kwa boro men kwanan.”
43007035	Jew sabuw taiyuwih hima hi’o, “Iti orot boro menamaim nan nama naatu it men karam tanatita’ur? Ai i boro nan Greek wanawanah ata sabuw hitagey nanabin tema’am imaim nama ni’obaibiyih?
43007036	Kwa boro ayu isou kwananuwet baise boro men kwanatita’uru naatu ayu menamaim anama’am kwa boro men kwanan? Iti tur eo’o anayabin i abisa?”
43007037	Hiyuw gagamin hi’aa sasawar ana yomanin, Jesu misir naatu fanan aumetawat na’in eo, “Yait ta sikan namamamah, kwanihamiy nan ayu biyau harew natom!
43007038	Yait ayu inabitutumu na’at kuna biyau harew kutom. Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube ‘Harew yawasin boro o wanawananamaim nanunuw.’”
43007039	Iti tur i sabuw iyab Jesu hinibitumitum Anun Kakafiyin hinabaib i isah eo. Iti boun ana veya Anun Kakafiyin i men yait itin bai, anayabin Jesu i men Tamah ana aiwob itinimih.
43007040	Rou’ay wanawanan hima tur hinonowar sabuw afa hi’o, “Anababatun iti orot i God ana dinab orot.”
43007041	Afa hi’o, “Iti orot i Rourubinen.” Naatu sabuw afa ibanak hi’o, “Rourubinen ana orot i boro men Galilee’ine nan?
43007042	Buk Atamaninamaim eo Rourubinen i boro aiwob orot David ana rara’ane naatu boro Bethlehem David ana bar meraramaim.”
43007043	Imih nati kou’ay wanawanan kouseb matar anayabin Jesu isan.
43007044	Sabuw afa hikok hitab hitafatum, baise men yait ta biyan butubun.
43007045	Imaibo Tafaror bar ma’utenayah himatabir hin firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee biyah hitit naatu firis ukwarih himisir ma’utenayah hibatiyih, “Aisimamih men kwa bai kwana kwatit?”
43007046	Ma’utenayah hiya’afutih hi’o, “Iti orot tur eo’o, i men orot afa te’eo na’atube eomih!”
43007047	Pharisee hibatiyih, “Kwa kwa’o anananiyan kwa auman ifuwi ebobonawiyi kakaf i?”
43007048	“Kwata’itin ukwarih afa o Pharisee orot afa tur hinonowaraban Jesu hitumitum?
43007049	Aiyabin! Iti rou’ay Moses ana ofafar i men ta hiso’ob, imih i God ana orarafen baban tema’am!”
43007050	I taiyuwih hai orot ta wabin Nicodemus i wan in Jesu biyan tit,
43007051	Imih i ana kou’ay ibatiyih, “It ata ofafar eo orot anasinaf kakaf i wan tananuwet imaibo tanab tanan ata ofafaramaim tanibabatiy.”
43007052	Hiya’afut hi’o, “Nicodemus o auman i Galilee orot? Baise Buk Atamaninamaim inanunuwet boro men inatita’ur, dinab orot i men Galilee’ine na.”
43007053	(Naatu rou’ay hima’am hitarboubun himisir hai bar hai bar hin.)
43008001	Imaibo Jesu Olive Oyaw na’at tit yen in.
43008002	Maraumanika Jesu matabir maiye Tafaror Bar ana meraramaim bat, sabuw moumurin maiyow hiru’ay hi’arbebera’uh naatu i busuruf ma sabuw i’ubaibiyih.
43008003	Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah naatu Pharisee babin turan aawan hairi hi’inu’in hibai hina hirun. Naatu hi’u kou’ay nahimaim bat.
43008004	Naatu Jesu isan hi’o, “Bai’obaiyenayan, iti babin i turan aawan hairi hi’inu’in atita’ur.
43008005	Ofafaramaim Moses aki iti na’atube eobaiyuni, babin yait ta iti na’atube nasisinaf boro kabayamaim anarab namorob. O a not ta ema’am boro inao.”
43008006	Iti baibat hibai hititit i mi’itube Jesu hitikubibiruw, saise abitur ta’o na’at imaim hitabat ubar hititin isan. Baise Jesu kwafure fofob yan uman kimamaim ma kubebebeyan.
43008007	Hi’u hibibabatiy anamaramaim, Jesu nakwetan tara’ah naatu isah eo, “O yait aur bowabow kakafin men nama’am na’at, o wan kabay kubai babin isan kurouw.”
43008008	Naatu i kwafure maiye me yan ma kubebebeyan.
43008009	Iti tur hinonowar anamaramaim ta’ita’imon hitabartaitit hin, oro’orot atamanih wan hi’iyon hibusuruf hitit. Babin akisinamo hihamiy Jesu nanamaim bat
43008010	Jesu totofar misir babin itin basit isan eo, “Babin iti sabuw menika hin? Naatu yait ta o isa rouw’ouri ai en?”
43008011	Babin eo, “Regah men yait ta ema’am.” Naatu Jesu eo, “Basit gewasin! Ayu auman men karam boro anibatiyi. Kwen, iti boun inabubusuruf bowabow kakafih men inasinaf maiye.”
43008012	Jesu sabuw isah eo maiye, “Ayu i tafaram ana marakaw. Yait ayu ebi’ufnunu i boro men guguminamaim naremor, baise i boro yawas ana marakaw nab.”
43008013	Pharisee Jesu isan hi’o, “Iti tur ku’o’o i o taiyuw isa ku’o’orerereb naatu abistan o ku’o’orerereb i men turobe.”
43008014	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu taiyuwu isou ana’orerereb na’at, ayu ao’orereb i turobe, anayabin ayu aso’ob menane ana naatu menamaim ananan. Baise ayu menane ana naatu menamaim ananan kwa i men kwa so’ob.
43008015	Kwa sabuw hai itininamaim kwa’itih kwabibabatiyih. Ayu men yait ta ana itininamaim aitin abibabatiyimih.
43008016	Baise ayu anabibatiyi na’at, ayu au baibatiyen i turobe. Anayabin ayu i men akisu. Ayu Tamai iyunu anan i airi ama’am.
43008017	Kwa taiyuw a’ofafaramaim iti na’atube hikirum, anamaramaim sifroubonayan orot rou’ab te’orereb tebibasit nati i turobe.
43008018	Ayu i orot ta taiyuwu isou ao’orereb; Tamai ayu iyunu anan ayu au sifroubounayan ta.”
43008019	Naatu sabuw hibatiy, “O Tamat i menamaim ema’am?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa ayu men kwaso’ob na’atube Tamai auman men kwaso’ob. Kwa ayu kwatasusu’ubu na’at Tamai auman boro kwatasu’ub.”
43008020	Iti tur i tafaroror bar wanawanan kabay teya’ay ana efan sisibinamaim Jesu ma i’obaibiyih. Men yait ta bai fatumimih, anayabin i ana veya men baimih.
43008021	Jesu ibanak isah eo maiye, “Ayu boro kwa anihamiyi anan, naatu kwa boro ayu isou kwananuwet naatu kwa a kakafih wanawanahimaim boro kwanamorob. Ayu menamaim ananan kwa boro men imaim kwanan.”
43008022	Naatu Jew hai ukwarih hi’o, “I eo, ayu menamaim anan kwa men karam kwanan. Iti eo anayabin i boro taiyuwin na’asabun?”
43008023	Baise Jesu eo maiye in, “Kwa i babe ma’ani, Ayu i yate ma’anu. Kwa i tafaram nowan, baise ayu i men tafaram nowan.
43008024	Ayu ao kwanowaraka, ayu men kwanasu’ubu kwanabitutumu na’at, kwa boro anababatun a kakafih wanawanahimaim kwanamorob. Ayu’uban tur iti ao’o.”
43008025	Hibatiy hio, “O i yait?” Jesu iyafutih eo, “Tabubusurufika kwa a tur aowen taremor tana.
43008026	Kwa isa ayu boro tur moumurika anao anibabatiyi. Baise yait ayu iyunu anan i turobe? Naatu abistan i eo anonowar ayu sabuw hai tur ao’owen.”
43008027	Jesu Tamah isan sabuw hai tur eo’eowen naniyan men hibai.
43008028	Imih Jesu eo, “Orot Natun kwanabobora’ah anamaramaim, kwa boro kwanaso’ob; Ayu i Yait; naatu ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim asisinafumih, baise Tamai abistan tur mutufor bi’obaiyu’umaim ao’o.
43008029	Naatu yait ayu iyunu anan airi ama’am i men ihamiyu, anayabin mar etei i ana kokomaim asisinaf isan ebiyasisir.”
43008030	Nati eo’omaim sabuw moumurih maiyow hitumitum.
43008031	Imih Jesu Jew sabuw iyab i hibitumatum isah eo, “Ayu au bai’obaiyen kwanabubukikin na’at, kwa i anababatun ayu au bai’ufununayah,
43008032	naatu kwa boro turobe kwanaso’ob naatu turobe boro imaim narufami kwanatit.”
43008033	Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki Abraham ana a’agir. Naatu aki men yait ta ana akir wairafin. Mi’itube inarufami anatit isan kuo’o?”
43008034	Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, o yait ta bowabow kakafin kukusisinaf i bowabow kakafin ana akir wairafin imatar.
43008035	Akir wairafin taitin tuwahinah wanawanahimaim i boro namarorore, baise Natun i ana efan wanatowan.
43008036	Imih Natun kwa narurufami, kwa i anababatun narufami,
43008037	Ayu aso’ob kwa i Abraham ana a’agir, baise kwa i ef kwanunuwet ayu kwana’asbunu. Anayabin kwa dogor wanawanan, ayu au tur ana efan i men ema’am.
43008038	Ayu Tamai ana taragub wanawanan abistan i’obaiyu ai’itin i a tur ao’owen, naatu kwabo tamat demon hi’o kwanonowar na’at kwasisinaf.”
43008039	Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Abraham i aki tamai.” Jesu eo maiye, “Kwa Abraham natunatun na’at kwa boro i sisinafube kwatasinaf.
43008040	Itinin i iti. God anababatun au tur eowen ao kwanonowar isan kwa a not kwabobaifufun ayu asabunu’umih. Abraham iti na’atube men sinaf.
43008041	Kwa tamatanah mi’itube hisisinaf na’atube kwasisinaf.” Sabuw hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki Tamai i ta’imon God akisinamo, aki i men ometakek aki i natunatun anababatun.”
43008042	Jesu sabuw isah eo, “God kwa Tamat na’at ayu boro kwatiyabuwu, anayabin ayu Godane ana naatu boun iti bairit tama’am. Ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim anamih, baise i ayu iyunu ana.
43008043	Aisimamih ayu tur ao’o naniyan men kwabaib? Abistan ayu ao men kwananonowar anayabin kwa tain i gugurih.
43008044	Kwa i tamat demon mowan natunatun, naatu kwa a kok i tamat esisinafube kwani’ufunun. Aneika i asbunubunuwenayan, i men turobe’emaim batamih, anayabin i wanawanan turobe en. Baifufuwen nati i ana tur, anayabin i baifufuwenayan naatu baifufuwenayah etei tamah.
43008045	Baise ayu tur anababatun ao’o, kwa i men kwabitutumu.
43008046	O yait ta karam ayu au kakafin inaorerereb? Ayu turobe ana’o na’at, aisim men kwabitutumu?
43008047	Yait Godamaim ema’am naatu ana tur enonowar i i God nowan. Kwa tur men kwanonowar anayabin Kwa i men God nowan.”
43008048	Jew sabuw Jesu hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki’ima turobe ao’o, oma Samaria mowan naatu demon hitounbuburi kuma’am.”
43008049	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men demon hitounbuburu ama’am. Ayu Tamai akisinamo akakakafiy, baise kwa ayu men kwakakafiyu.
43008050	Ayu men taiyuwu wabu bora’ara’ahin isan anunuwet, baise orot ta i ayu isou akisinamo nanuwet naatu i boro ayu nibabatiyu.
43008051	Tur anababatun au’uwi, yait ayu au tur ebobosiyasiyar boro men namorob.”
43008052	Jew sabuw Jesu isan hi’o, “Aki bounabo aso’ob o i demon hitoububuni kuma’am! Abraham morob naatu dinab oro’orot himorob, baise o ku’o’o yait ta ayu au tur nabobosiyasiyar boro men namorob.
43008053	Aki tamai Abraham i morob o men taiyuw inabora’ahi Abraham inanatabir? Naatu God ana dinab auman himorob. O kunotanot o i yait?”
43008054	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu taiyuwu anabobora’ahu na’at ayu au bora’ara’aten anayabin en. Ayu Tamai kwa a God kwarouw kwa’o’o i akisinamo ayu ebobora’ara’ahu.
43008055	Kwa i men kafa’imo kwasu’ub, baise ayu asu’ub. Ayu men su’ubin anarouw ana’o na’at, ayu boro baifuwenayan kwa ana karam, baise ayu i asu’ub naatu i ana tur abobosiyasiyar.
43008056	Kwa tamat Abraham ayu au na ana veya nuw i’itin i iyasisir naatu veya na titit isan i kawasa.”
43008057	Jew sabuw Jesu isan hi’o, “O a kwamur i men 50 baimih naatu mi’itube Abraham i’itin.”
43008058	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Anababatun a tur ao’owen, ayu wan ama’abo Abraham tufuw.”
43008059	Nati isan sabuw kabay hi’o’on Tafaror Bar wanawanan hitarabimih baise Jesu sabuw umah aren sorabon ufun tit.
43009001	Orot matan fim auman tufuw ma’am Jesu remor inan itin.
43009002	Ana bai’ufununayah Jesu hibatiy, “Bai’obaiyenayan, yait ana kakafinamaim iwa’an iti orot matan fim auman tufuw? I taiyuwin ana kakafin o i hinah tamat hai kakafinamaim?”
43009003	Jesu eo, “Orot matan fim i men anabowabow kakafinamaim iwa’an matan ifimemih o i hinah tamah hai kakafinamaim, baise i ana fimemaim God ana fair iti orot biyanamaim nirerereb hina’itin.
43009004	Iti ana veya’amaim yait ayu iyunu anan i ana bowabow tanabow, gugumin i enan men karam yait ta nabow.
43009005	Ayu boun iti tafaramamaim ama’am, ayu i tafaram ana marakaw.”
43009006	Iti tur eo ufunamaim, Jesu kwei me yan re naatu iyuriyur bai bora’ah orot matan idadawir.
43009007	Naatu iu, “Kwen harew Siloam kukuf (nati wab anayabin iyafar) imaim kururub.” Imih orot in rurub naatu matan nuw sawar itah auman matabir au bar in.
43009008	Orot tain tuwan naatu sabuw afa marasika hi’i’itin ma fefefeyan, hibatiy, “Iti orot ta’imon mar etei ema efefefeyanaban i iti?”
43009009	Sabuw afa hi’o, “Orot i nati.” Afa hi’o, “En nati i ana yumatabe.” Baise orot taiyuwin eo, “Nati orot i ayu.”
43009010	Sabuw hibatiy, “Mi’itube o mat igewasin kunuwanuw?”
43009011	Orot iyafutih eo, “Orot wabin te’o Jesu i yur bai matou idadawir naatu na Siloam harew kukufamaim rurubamih iuwu. Imih ayu an arurub, naatu matou to iwa’an anuwanuw.”
43009012	Sabuw hibatiy, “Bo iti orot i menamaim ema’am?” Orot iya’afutih eo, “Ayu men aso’ob.”
43009013	Nati orot Jesu biyawas hibai hina Pharisee biyah hitit.
43009014	Baiyarir ana veya’amaim Jesu nati orot matan fim yuramaim idawir matan igewasin nuw.
43009015	Isan imih Pharisee ibanak maiye orot hibatiy mi’itube matan igewasin. Orot hai tur eowen eo, “I yuramaim matou idadawir uwu harewamaim arurub naatu boun i anuwanuw.”
43009016	Pharisee afa hi’o, “Iti orot i men Godane na, anayabin Baiyarir ana ofafar i men ekakaif.” Baise afa hi’o, “Bowabow kakafin orot boro mi’itube iti ina’inan tasinaf?” Naatu nati’imaim kouseb matar.
43009017	Imih Pharisee hitatabir orot ibanak hibatiy maiye, “Iti orot o mata iwa’an bigewasin isan o boro mi’itube inao?” Orot iya’afutih eo, “I i dinab orot.”
43009018	Jew hai ukwarih men kafa’imo hititumatum iti orot matan fim ma’am naatu bounabo matan nuw, naatu orot hinah tamah isah hi’af hina, imaibo hibatiyih.
43009019	“Iti orot i kwa natu? Kwa kwa’o’o i matan fim auman tutufuw kekeban iti? Naatu boun i mi’itube enuwanuw?”
43009020	Hinah tamah hiyafutih hi’o, “Aki aso’ob iti kek i aki natu, naatu matan fim auman tufuw.
43009021	Baise aki men aso’ob, boun i mi’itube enuwanuw, o yait matan iwa’an igewasin, kwaibatiy i sanaman, karam taiyuwin isan boro nao.”
43009022	Hinah tamah iti tur hi’o, i Jew sabuw isah hibir, anayabin iti tur i marasika Jew ukwa’ukwarih hi’o hibasit, yait Jesu isan naorereb Keriso nararauw boro kou’ay barene hinabotait ufun nama.
43009023	Iti isan imih i hinah tamah hi’o, “Kwa taiyuw kwaibatiy kwa’itin, i sanaman.”
43009024	Mar bairu’abin orot matan fim nuwanuw isan hi’af na, naatu hibatiy maiye, “Turobe God nanamaim ai tur ina’owen! Aki aso’ob orot yait o biyawasi i bowabow kakafin wairafin.”
43009025	Orot iyafutih eo “Ayu men aso’ob i bowabow kakafin wairafin o en? Ayu sawar ta’imonamo asoso’ob i ayu matou fim ama’am naatu boun i anuw a’i’itah.”
43009026	Naatu orot hibatiy, “Abistanawat o isa sinaf? Mi’itube sinaf o mata botawiy?”
43009027	Orot iyafutih eo, “Ayu marasika kwa isa aoka naatu kwa men kwanowar. Aisim kwakokok anao maiye kwananowar? Ta’itin kwa auman kwakokok i ana bai’ufununayah kwanamatar?”
43009028	Hi’obaibiyab naatu hi’o, “O i nati orot ana bai’ufununayan, baise aki i Moses ana bai’ufununayah.
43009029	Aki aso’ob God mutufor Moses hairi hi’o, baise orot nati Jesu tibiwab, aki men kafa’imo aso’ob i menane na?”
43009030	Orot matan fim bigewasin iyafutih eo, “Abifofofor men kafaita! I menane nan kwa men kwaso’ob, baise i ayu matu fim iwa’an anuwanuw.
43009031	It Taso’ob bowabow kakafih wairafih God hai tur men enonowar. God ana sabuw i ana kok tesisinaf naatu isan tekakakaf i hai tur enonowar.
43009032	Men yait ta tafaram wanawanan orot matan fim auman tufuw ma’am matan botawiy nuwanuw ana tur nowaramih.
43009033	Iti orot men Godane tanan na’at, i boro men karam iti bowabow tasinaf.”
43009034	Iti isan hi’o, “O bowabow kakafin wanawanan itufuw ira’at iyey, i boun aki ini’obaiyi!” Naatu kou’ay barene hibotait tit ufun ma.
43009035	Jesu orot hinun tit ufun ma’am ana tur nowar, naatu titita’ur anamaramaim ibatiy, “O Orot Natun kubitumitum?”
43009036	Orot Jesu ibatiy, “Regah, iti orot i menatan ku’o anowar saise i anitumitum!”
43009037	Jesu orot isan eo, “Orot i iti kwi’i’itin, boun iti airi kwa’o’o.”
43009038	Naatu orot eo, “Regah, Ayu abitumatum.” Naatu Jesu nanamaim sun yowen kwafir.
43009039	Jesu eo, “Ayu ana iti tafaramaim atitit anayabin i sabuw ana kusibih, saise iyab mata fim boro hinanuw, naatu iyab tenuwanuw boro matah fimabe hinamatar.”
43009040	Pharisee afa nati’imaim bairi hima’am iti tur eo’o hinowar, naatu hibatiy, “Nati tur ku’o’o, aki auman matai fim?”
43009041	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa mata fim na’at, kwa boro men kakafimih. Baise boun kwa kwa’o’o aki matai anuwanuw, kwa a kakafih i tema’am.”
43010001	“Turobe a tur ao’owen, bobaituw hai fur ana etawanamaim orot men imaim narun, baise nakayam ef ta’ane narun, nati orot i bainowan mowan.
43010002	Orot yait etawanamaim erur, i bobaituw kaifenayan.
43010003	Orot fur kaifenayan boro etawan isan nabotawiy naatu bobaituw boro orot fanan hina’inan naatu ana bobaituw ta’ita’imon wabih naso’oben na’afih hinanowar naatu nabotaitih ufun hinatit.
43010004	I ebotaitih ufun tetitit anamaramaim, i wan ebi’iyon, naatu ana bobaituw ti’ufunun bairi tenan anayabin i fanan hiso’ob.
43010005	Baise fanan ta boro men hini’ufunun, anayabin i fanan men hi’inan imih boro hinabihir.”
43010006	Jesu iti kawen turamaim eo, baise tur ana naniyan i men hibaimih abistan isan eo’o.
43010007	Imih Jesu tur ibanak eo maiye, “Turobe a tur ao’owen, Ayu i etawan bobaituw isah.
43010008	Sabuw afa wan hinan i bainowah naatu bokwanekwaneyah, baise bobaituw men tainih isah hirub fanah hinowaramih.
43010009	Ayu i etawan, yait ayu wanawana’umaim run enan boro yawas nab, boro hinarun hinatit fotan gewasin hinagatur.
43010010	Bainowan tenan i bain, asbunin naatu gurusin akisin hinot tenan; Ayu anan i boro yawas gewasin hinab hinama boro men abistan ta isan hiniyababan.”
43010011	“Ayu i bobaituw gewasu. Bobaituw Kaifenayan gewasin ana bobaituw isah ana yawas ebi’inuw.
43010012	Bobaituw kaifenayan orot ta men karam bobaituw nakaifen naatu i men nowan. Imih anamaramaim haru tuwetuwenih nan na’i’itin, i boro bobaituw nihamiyih nabihir. Naatu haru tuwenituwenih boro bobaituw bairi hiniyow naatu hina’abargiyih nanabin hinabihir.
43010013	Orot boro nabihir anayabin i orot ta hibai na ma ekakaifen, imih bobaituw isah i men enotanot gagamin.
43010014	Ayu i bobaituw kaifenayan gewasu. Au bobaituw asu’ubih naatu i ayu hisu’ubu.
43010015	Tamai ayu susu’ubu na’atube, ayu Tamai asu’ub naatu au yawas bobaituw isah ai’inuw.
43010016	Bobaituw afa ayu nowau i men iti fur wanawanan tema’am. I auman anabuwih hinan hinarun. I auman ayu fanau hinanowar, nati’imaim i boro bobaituw ta’imon naatu kaifenayan ta’imon.
43010017	Tamai ebiyabuwu anayabin ayu au yawas ani’inuw, saise yawasu anama maiye.
43010018	Men yait ta ayu au yawas nabosair, baise ayu taiyuwu au kokomaim au yawas anayara’iy. Ayu au fair ema’am anayara’iy naatu au fair ema’am anabora’ah maiye. Iti obaiyunen i Tamai biyanane abai.”
43010019	Iti tur hinonowar anamaramaim Jew sabuw tarsibih maiye.
43010020	Sabuw moumurih maiyow hi’o, “I demon hitounbubur ema’am naatu ebikoko’aw. Aisim ana tur kwanonowar.”
43010021	Baise sabuw afa hi’o, “Tur iti na’atube men karam orot demon hinatounbubur ema’am nao’omih. Mi’itube demon orot matan fim nabotawiy?
43010022	Nati rarabkokou wanawanan Tafaror Bar ana hiyuw wabin Koksouwen * teo i Jerusalemamaim hibogaigiwas.
43010023	Naatu Jesu Solomon ana efan awan ta Tafaror Bar wanawanan imaim bat reremor.
43010024	Jew hai ukwarih hiru’ay hi’arbebera’uh hi’u, “Mar bai’ab boro inabotani anama anakaifi? O Keriso na’at, bebeyanamaim ku’o anowar.”
43010025	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu kwa a tur aowen, baise kwa men kwaitumatum. Ina’inanen ayu Tamai wabinamaim asisinaf i ayu isou eo’orereb.
43010026	Baise kwa men kwabitumatum anayabin kwa men ayu au bobaituw.
43010027	Ayu au bobaituw asu’ubih imih fanau hinowar tebi’ufnunu.
43010028	Ayu yawas wanatowan abitih; naatu boro men ta nakasiy; men ta ayu umou’umaim nabosair.
43010029	Tamai ayu bow bitu i ra’at etei natabirih, imih ayu Tamai umanamaim men yait ta nabosairen.
43010030	Tamai naatu Ayu airi i ta’imon.
43010031	Ibanak maiye Jew sabuw kabay hibow hitarabimih,
43010032	baise Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Ayu Tamai biyanane ina’inan gagamih moumurih maiyow ai’obaiyi. Anayabin iti isan ayu kabayamaim kwanarabu.”
43010033	Jew hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki men nati isan kabayamaim anarabi, baise o God kubi’i’iyab, anayabin o i orot maiyow, naatu taiyuw God kurarouw.”
43010034	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa a Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum ema’am, ayu ao’o kwa etei i god?
43010035	I etei god narouw na’a’afih na’at, tur God i menane na naatu Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum men hina’astu’ub.
43010036	Ayu Tamai yasairu i nowanamih amatar naatu irubinu naatu iyafaru ana iti tafaramaim atitit i boro mi’itube? Mi’itube ayu God bai’i’iyabin kwarouw kwa’o’o, anayabin ayu God Natun arouw ao’omih?
43010037	Ayu Tamai sisinafube men ana sisinaf bibaitutumu.
43010038	Baise ayu ata sinaf kwa men kwatabitutumu na’at, karam nati ina’inanen kwata’itah kwataso’ob imaim kwatitumatum, ayu i Tamai wanawanan, naatu Tamai i ayu wanawanau.”
43010039	Ibanak maiye bain rabinamih hiwa’an, baise i umahine soratait tit.
43010040	Naatu Jesu ibanak matabir maiye Jordan rabon rounane, marasika John sabuw imaim bapataito bitih efan imaim tit naatu Jesu imaim ma.
43010041	Naatu sabuw moumurin maiyow hina biyan hitit, naatu hi’o, “John ina’inan men ta sinaf a’itin, baise John iti orot isan eo’o i turobe.”
43010042	Efan nati’imaim sabuw moumurin maiyow Jesu hitumitum.
43011001	Orot wabin Lasarus i Bethany orot imaim ma’am sawow, nati i Mary tain Martha hairi hai bar hai merar.
43011002	Iti Mary raiy yamurin mamarin Regah aribun yan isuwei rara’iy naatu aribunamaim an sasafam, i boun rubun orot Lazarus sawow.
43011003	Imih i ruburubun tur hiyafar Jesu isan, “Regah orot o ibiyabuw i sawow.”
43011004	Jesu iti tur nonowar anamaramaim eo, “Nati Lazarus ana sawow boro men nan morobomaim natitamih. En, iti i God ana fair bairerereb isan, saise i wanawananamaim God Natun hinifai hinabora’ara’ah.”
43011005	Martha tuwah babitai hairi naatu rubun orot Lazarus, Jesu iyabuwih kwanekwan.
43011006	Baise Lazarus sawow inu’in ana tur Jesu nonowar i men saise in, i nati’imaim ma veya rou’ab sawar.
43011007	Naatu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo, “It tanamatabir maiye tanan Judea.”
43011008	Baise bai’obaiyenayan, ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Iti boro’omo Jew sabuw kafa’imo kabayamaim hitarabi, naatu o baise imatabir maiye imaim kwenan.”
43011009	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Veya ta’imon erararan ana manin men tarsisib in 12. Anayabin veya kusisiar tafaram marakaw itin, imih orot mar nuw enan boro men an narusukun nara’iy.
43011010	Baise guguminamaim naremor nanan boro an narusukun nara’iy, anayabin i aurin marakaw en.”
43011011	Iti tur eo ufunamaim, ibanak ikofan hai tur eowen eo, “It ata of Lazarus i matanfot inu’in; baise ayu imaim anan anibunibun namisir.’
43011012	Ana bai’ufununayah hiya’afut hi’o, Regah, i matan nafot na’inu’in na’at, i boro matannanuw namisir.”
43011013	Jesu Lazarus ana morob isan eo’o, baise ana bai’ufununayah hinotanot i boun matat efot ta’inu’in na’atube hirouw.
43011014	Naatu imaibo mutuforomo hai tur eowen, “Lazarus i morob.
43011015	Naatu ayu men nati’imaim ama’am isan abiyasisir anayabin, kwa taiyuw kwana’itin kwanaso’ob naatu kwanitumatum. Boro’obo tan ta’itin.”
43011016	Thomas wabin ta Kikifukek bai’ufnunenayah etei’imak isah eo, “It auman tan, bairit tamorob youn.”
43011017	Jesu natitit ana veya imaibo so’ob Lazarus i rahemaim hiyai in veya kwafe’en sawar.
43011018	Jerusalem ef i men yok inan Bethany inatit,
43011019	naatu Martha, Mary hairi rubuh bihamiyih isan. Jew sabuw moumurih na’in hina koubainunub baitihimih.
43011020	Jesu nan Martha ana tur nonowar anamaramaim, hairi baitaramih tit in, baise Mary i bar ma.
43011021	Martha Jesu isan eo, “Regah, o iti’imaim itama’am na’at, ayu tuwai i boro men tamorob.
43011022	Baise ayu aso’ob veya iti boun auman karam abistan isan inafefefeyan God boro nit.”
43011023	Jesu Martha isan eo, “O tuwat boro nayawas namisir maiye.”
43011024	Martha iya’afut eo, “Ayu aso’ob nati i mar yomaninabo nayawas namisir.”
43011025	Jesu Martha isan eo, “Ayu i misir maiye naatu yawas. Yait ayu ebitutumu boro yawasin nama naatu namomorob auman yawasin nama.
43011026	Naatu yait ta ayu’umaim ema’am naatu ebitutumu boro men kafa’imo namorob. Iti tur ao’o kwabitumatum?”
43011027	Martha iya’afut eo, “Ai Regah anowar, Ayu abitumatum. O i Keriso, God Natun. O na tafaramamaim titamih hi’o’oban oban iti. ina itit.”
43011028	Tur iti eo’o ufunamaim, Martha intabir in Mary eaf na hamenamo ana tur eowen. “Bai’obaiyenayan i na tit, naatu o isa ebibatebat?”
43011029	Mary iti tur nonowar anamaramaim, duku iwa’an misir naatu in biyan tit.
43011030	Jesu men na bar merar tit, baise efan menamaim Martha hairi hima’am boro’ika imaim ma’am.
43011031	Mary duku iwa’an mimisir Jew sabuw ana baremaim hima koubainunub hibitin hi’itin, naatu himisir hi’ufunun ufun hitit, hinotanot i enan rahemaim nama narerey.
43011032	Mary remor in Jesu menamaim ma’am biyan tit naatu eo, “Regah, O iti’imaim itama’am na’at ayu tuwai boro men tamorob.”
43011033	Mary rererey, naatu Jew sabuw hi’ufunun bairi hinan auman hirererey Jesu i’itih anamaramaim, dogoron yababan awankaratan naatu naniyan kwaris.
43011034	Ibatiyih “Menamaim kwayai inu’in?” I hi’o “Regah Kuna kwi’itin.”
43011035	Jesu maturin ra’iy rerey.
43011036	Jew sabuw hi’o, “Kwa’itin i ana yabow Lazarus isan i ra’at kwanekwan!”
43011037	Baise sabuw afa hi’o, “I orot matan fim botawiy. Karam iti orot auman tabotan men tamorobomih.”
43011038	Jesu ibanak dogoron wanawanan yababan kuyuyuw, na rahamaim tit. Rah i watu, awan i kabayamaim hihir.
43011039	Jesu eo, “Kabay kwabosair.” Murubin rubun Martha eo, “Baise Regah, Lazarus nati’imaim hiyai in boun veya kwafe’en sawar, mas yamurin mataraka.”
43011040	Naatu Jesu eo, “Ayu au’uwi men kwanowar? Kwa kwanabitumatum na’at God ana fair boro nirerereb kwana’itin.”
43011041	Naatu rah awan kabay hibosair. Jesu nakwetan tara’ah au mar na’at nura’at eo, “Tamai, O a merar ayiy, ayu abistan ao’o inowar.”
43011042	Ayu aso’ob mar etei fanau kunonowar, baise iti ao’o i sabuw iti tebatabat isah, saise hina’itin hinitumatum, O ayu iyunu ana.”
43011043	Iti eo ufunamaim, Jesu fanan aumetawat na’in eaf, “Lazarus kumisir kutit!”
43011044	Orot murubin, an uman, yumatan faifuw metametan auman misir tit na. Jesu sabuw isah eo, “Rah ana faifuw kwabosairen naatu kwaihamiy au bar en.”
43011045	Isan imih Jew sabuw moumurin maiyow hina Mary hibinanawan ana mar, Jesu abistan sinaf hi’i’itin, i hitumitum.
43011046	Baise afa hin Pharisee hai tur hi’owen abistan Jesu sisinaf.
43011047	Firis hai ukwarih naatu Pharisee bairi hi’af’ayuwih kou’ay hibai. Taiyuwih hibatiyih, “Abistan tao tasisinaf men emamatar? Kwanaso’ob iti orot ina’inan moumurin maiyow esisinaf!
43011048	It tanihamiy na’at nama nasisinaf sabuw etei boro hinitumitum. Naatu Roman sabuw boro hinan ata me ata tafaram hinab.”
43011049	I hai orot ta wabin Kaiafas, nati kwamur i Firis ukwarin ma’am awan tara’ah eo, “Kwa men ta kwaso’ob!
43011050	Kwa men matato iwa’an kwa’i’itin, anagewasin orot ta’imon tamorob sabuw isah, men karam tafaram tutufin etei hitarab hitagurus.”
43011051	I men taiyuwin ana notamaim iti tur yai eomih, baise nati kwamur wanawanan i firis ukwarin ma’am Jesu Jew sabuw isah namomorob isan eorereb.
43011052	Naatu men i akisih isah, baise God ana sabuw efan nanabin tema’am nabuwih hinan nita’imonih biyah ta’imon namatar.
43011053	Naatu hibusuruf Jesu baban hi’o rabin morob isan.
43011054	Imih Jesu Judea wanawanan i men bebeyanamaim ma remoramih, baise efan nati ihamiy naatu in efan arar sisibinamaim ma, bar merar wabin Efaram, imaim ana bai’ufununayah bairi hima.
43011055	Jew hai Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw, i na biyubin ana veya, naatu tafaram wanawanan efan ta ta hima’am hiyen hin Jerusalem, kouksouwen ana kou’ay bainabo, Tatar nowaten ana veya nan natit.
43011056	Jesu isan hinunuwet, naatu Tafaror Bar ana efanamaim hibat ta’ita’imon nane hibibabatiyih, “Kwa mi’itube kwanotanot? Forag isan kafai enan?”
43011057	Baise firis ukwarih naatu Pharisee sabuw obaiyunen hitih, menamaim Jesu nama’am hina’i’itin na’at, hinan hinao hinanowar saise i hinan hinab hinafatum.
43012001	Veya six nasasawar ufunamaim i Tar Nowaten ana veya, Jesu na Bethany tit, Lazarus morobone biyawas i ana bar merar.
43012002	Nati’imaim rabirab ana bay hibogaigiwas Jesu bairi aa isan, Martha ibaisih bairi bay hisemor. Lazarus orot afa auman Jesu bairi himarir gem sisibinamaim hima’am.
43012003	Raiy yamurin mamarin wabin nard i ai rourin hibun iroro’on hibai. Nati raiy iroro’on ana baiyan i gagamin na’in, Mary bai na isuwei ra’iy Jesu an rororon ihurufen, naatu aribunamaim safam. Naatu yamurin ana mamarin bar wanawanan etei itakwar.
43012004	Baise ana bai’ufununayan orot ta, Judas Iscariot boro ufibo baban nao, i eo,
43012005	“Ana gewasin iti raiy yamurin mamarin ana baiyan 300 silver coins * tatayai sabuw hitatubun naatu kabay tatab bai’akirayah tatibaisih.”
43012006	Iti tur eo’o, asir sabuw hinanot i akir sabuw baibaisih isah not eo hinarouw, baise i bainowan orot ta, anayabin hai kabay koukufet kakaif, abistan ekokok i ebai ana kokomaim esisinaf.
43012007	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Babin kwaihamiy! Abistan biyanamaim ema’am i ayu anamorob hinayaya’u isan eyayabuna.
43012008	Kwa boro mar etei akir sabuw wanawanahimaim kwanama, baise ayu boro men mar etei kwa bairit tanama’amih.”
43012009	Sabuw moumurin maiyow tur hinowar Jesu i na Bethany ma’am, imih sabuw Jesu itinamih hin, men i akisin itinamih hin baise Lazarus morobone Jesu biyawas auman itinamih hin.
43012010	Imih firis gagamih ef hinuwet hiyakitifuw Lazarus auman hitarab tamorob isan.
43012011	Anayabin Lazarus biyanamaim abistan matar hi’itin Jew sabuw moumurin maiyow himisir firis gagamih hikwahirih naatu Jesu isan higeger hitumitum.
43012012	Marto sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiru’ay Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw isan, tur hinowar Jesu i enan au Jerusalem.
43012013	Sabuw ai rourih hikakir naatu hitit hin Jesu nan bairi baitaramih, hitarkoukuw hi’o, “God tanifai! Regah wabinamaim enan, God nigegewasin! Israel hai aiwob inigegewasin!” Hitit hin bairi hitar.
43012014	Bobaituw boubun wabin donkey hitita’ur naatu afe’enamaim mara’at ma remor yen in. Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hi’o na’atube.
43012015	“O Zion Natun Babitai, Men inabir; Kwa a aiwob enan, kwa’itin, donkey boubun afe’en mare ema’am.”
43012016	Abistan nati ana veya himamatar ana bai’ufununayah men hiso’ob. Baise Jesu ana fair nabaib ufunamaim, imaibo hina’itin hinaso’ob. Buk Atamaninamaim i isan hi’o hikirum, naatu hisinafen himatar.
43012017	Sabuw iyab Jesu bairi hin rahemaim hitit Lazarus morobone yawas misir hi’i’itin hi’o tur ra’at tasasar.
43012018	Sabuw moumurin maiyow hitit hin Jesu biyan hitit, anayabin tur hinowar i ina’inan iti na’atube men tisinaf emamatar i sinaf matar.
43012019	Imih Pharisee taiyuwih himare hi’o, “It abistan tayayakitifuw men kafa’imo emamatar. Sabuw etei i’etaw tebi’ufunun kwa’i’itin!”
43012020	Greek sabuw afa wanawanahimaim bairi hiyen hin Jerusalem hiyuw ana veya imaim kwafirin isan.
43012021	Hina Philip biyan hitit, i Betsaida orot Galilee wanawanan, isan hifefeyan hi’o, “Aro, aki akokok Jesu ana’itin.”
43012022	Philip in Andrew ana tur eowen, naatu Andrew Philip hairi hin Jesu ana tur hi’owen.
43012023	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Orot Natun baifa’in naatu bora’ara’ahin isan ana veya na kabom.
43012024	Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, sanabey tutufin ta’imon hinama’ub me yan hinataun na’inu’in, naatu nabikubobun boro moumurih na’in hinayen naatu ani’anin boro moumurih na’in naya.
43012025	Orot yait taiyuwin ana yawas ebiyabuw i boro yawas narusa’ir, naatu yait iti tafaramamaim taiyuwin ana yawas ekwakwahir boro nabotan yawas wanatowan isan.”
43012026	Yait ayu isou nabowabow, i ayu ni’ufnunu, naatu ayu menamaim ama’am au akir orot boro airi imaim anama. Yait ayu isou ebowabow Tamai boro nifai nabora’ara’ah.
43012027	“Ayu dogorou i yababan awan karatan, Tamai ayu boro mi’itube anao? Iti bai’akir ana veya iniyawasu? ‘Aiyabin, Tamai iti bai’akir ana veya nan anabaib isan ana atit.
43012028	Tamai o wab anabora’ah.” Naatu marane fanan tit eo, “Ayu wab abora’ahika naatu boro anabora’ah maiye.’”
43012029	Sabuw rou’ay nati’imaim hibatabat hinowar, afa hi’o, gunum rab naatu afa hi’o, “Tounamatar isan eo.”
43012030	Jesu eo, “Iti fanan i kwa isa eo, men ayu isou.
43012031	Veya boun iti tafaram baibabatiyin isan naatu iti tafaram ana aiwob boun boro hinabosair.
43012032	Baise Ayu iti tafaramamaim hinabobora’ahu anamaramaim, sabuw etei boro anabonawiyih hinan ayu akisu biyou hinatit.”
43012033	Iti tur eo, i mi’itube ti’obaiyih i ana morob ana itinin boro mi’itube namorob.
43012034	Sabuw hi’o, “Aki ofafaramaim anonowar Keriso boro nama wanatowan, naatu o mi’itube ku’o’o, Orot Natun boro hinabora’ah. Iti Orot Natunam yait?”
43012035	Naatu Jesu uwih eo, “Kwa mar kafai boro marakaw kwanab, marakaw kwabaibimaim kwanaremor, imaibo gugumin nan natarsumi. Orot yait guguminamaim ereremor i men so’ob menamaim enan.
43012036	Marakaw nati kwabai kwama’am a baitumatum i kwanitin. Saise kwa boro kwanan marakaw natunatun kwanamatar.” Iti eo’o ufunamaim, Jesu sabuw ihamiyih naatu i taiyuwin ibunwa’ir.
43012037	Mensanet Jesu wanawanahimaim sawar faifirih imamataren, baise i boro’ika men tibitumitum.
43012038	Iti i mi’itube dinab orot Isaiah ana tur eo’o i titurobe isan. “Regah, yait aki tur a’o ebitumitum? Yait biyanamaim Regah ana fair ebirerereb?”
43012039	Anayabin iti isan, men karam hititumatum, imih Isaiah eo maiye;
43012040	“God iwa’an matah hifim naatu dogoroh rufoten, saise men hina’itin, naatu hai not nakwaris anayabin boro men hinaso’ob. naatu Regah eo, ayu isou boro men hinatatabir. Naatu tena ayu aniyawasih.”
43012041	Isaiah iti eo’o, anayabin Jesu ana marakaw itin naatu isan eo i nowar.
