43012042	Naatu nati veya ta’imon wanawanan Jew ukwa’ukwarih wanawanahimaim Jesu hitumitum. Baise anayabin Pharisee isah hibir, men karam hai baitumatum hitao rereb, i boro kou’ay barene hitabotaitih.
43012043	Anayabin i orot babin isah tibiyabow men boun God isan tebiyabow na’atube.
43012044	Basit Jesu fanan aumetawat eo, “Orot ayu ebitutumu, i men ayu akisu ebitutumu, baise yait ayu iyafaru anan auman ebitumitum.
43012045	Yait ayu i’itu anamaramaim, ayu iyafaru anan auman i’itin.
43012046	Ayu i marakaw na’atube ana tafaramamaim atit, saise yait ayu ebitutumu i boro men guguminamaim nama.
43012047	Orot yait ayu au tur enonowar baise men ebaib, ayu boro men anibatiy. Ayu men tafaram fufuninamih ana atit, baise baiyawasinamih ana.
43012048	Yait ayu ebifutuwu naatu au tur men ebaib i ana baibatiyenayan ema’am. Tur iti ayu a’o i boro mar yomaninamaim nibabatiyi.
43012049	Anayabin ayu men taiyuwu au kokomaim ao’omih, baise Tamai ayu iyafaru anan tarbaiyunu tur abistanawat anao naatu boro mi’itube ana’o.
43012050	Naatu ayu aso’ob i ana tarbaiyunen tur boro nabonawiy inan ma’ama wanatowan. Imih ayu abistan ao’o i mutufor, Tamai uwu imih ao’o.”
43013001	Tar Nowaten ana Hiyuw nanamaim. Jesu so’ob i isan veya na kabom iti tafaram nihamiy naatu nan Tamah isan. Sabuw i nowan iti tafaramamaim tema’am isah i yabow men kafaita, naatu bounabo ana yabow yomanin ni’obaiyih nan na’asa’ub.
43013002	Rabirab ana bay hibusuruf hi’aa’u, naatu demon ana not kakafin Judas Iscariot, Simon natun marasika ana notamaim yaru’uy Jesu baban eo rabin isan.
43013003	Jesu so’ob Tamah sawar etei i ana fair babanamaim ya, naatu i Godane na naatu God boun isan emamatabir maiye.
43013004	Imih bay hi’aa wanawanan misir, ana faifuw tafan iyoun ma’am bosair, naatu biya rarouw bai naiwan fifin.
43013005	I ufunamaim harew bai tew yan isuwei naatu busuruf ana bai’ufununayah ah souwen, naatu biya rarouw naiwanamaim fifin ma’am bai ah safamen.
43013006	Jesu na Simon Peter biyan titit ana veya, Simon Jesu isan eo, “Regah ayu au inasouwimih?”
43013007	Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu abisa boun asisinaf o boro men inaso’ob, baise boro ufibo inaso’ob.”
43013008	Peter eo, “Aiyabin, ayu men abibasit au inasouwen.” Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu a men ana sasouw na’at, o i men ayu au bai’ufununayan.”
43013009	Naatu Simon Peter iyafut eo, “Regah, Men au akisih, baise umou naatu ukwaru auman kwikifuwu.”
43013010	Jesu iyafut eo, “Orot yait biyan tutufin ekifukif? I an akisinamo tanasouw, i biyan tutufin etei i gewasin. Naatu kwa etei i gewas, baise men etei gewasamih.”
43013011	Jesu so’ob yait boro nayanuw, naatu anayabin iti isan i eo kwa etei i men gewas.
43013012	Ah souwen sasawar ufunamaim, ana faifuw bosair yai inu’in bai iyoun naatu matabir maiye ana efan mara’iy. Jesu ibatiyih, “Kwa isa ayu abistan asisinafuban kwaso’ob?”
43013013	Kwa ayu isou “Bai’obaiyenayan naatu Regah kwarouw kwa’o’o, nati i gewasin maiyow. Anayabin i nati, Ayu i nati na’atube ama’am.
43013014	Boun ayu kwa a Regah, a bai’obaiyenayan a souwen, kwa auman turanah ah kwanasouwen.
43013015	Ayu bai’obaiyen kwa isa asinaf, kwa isa iti boun asisinaf i na’atube kwanasinaf.
43013016	Ayu turobe a tur ao’owen, akir orot i men ebi’ukwarin ana orot ukwarin isan, o tur abarayan i men orot baiyuninenayan na’atube.
43013017	Bounabo kwa sawar etei kwaso’ob, kwa iti kwanasisinaf na’at, kwa boro baigegewasin kwanab.
43013018	“Ayu men kwa etei isa ao’omih; ayu iyab arurubiniyih i aso’ob. Baise iti i mi’itube Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum i tan titurobe. ‘Yait ayu airi rafiy afafaram, i koun ayu itu.’
43013019	“Ayu bounaika a tur a’o’owenabo namatar, saise anamaramaim abistan namamatar kwa boro kwanitumatum Ayu i Yait?
43013020	Turobe a tur ao’owen, yait ayu aiyun en ebaib, nati i Ayu ebubuwu; naatu yait Ayu ebubuwu, nati i yait Ayu iyunu anan i ebaib.”
43013021	Jesu iti tur eo’o ufunamaim, dogoron yababan awan karatan naatu eorereb, Turobe kwa a tur ao’owen, kwa wanawanamaim orot ta ayu boro babu nao.
43013022	Ana bai’ufununayah taiyuwih hima hinubunibun, hai kasiy ra’at yait isan eo’o.
43013023	Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayan orot ta i biyabuw, sisibinamaim ma’am.
43013024	Simon Peter isan itarasib eo, “Kwaibatiy, ait isan eo’o.”
43013025	Naatu Bai’ufununayan na fufufur Jesu sisibinika tit naatu ibatiy, “Regah yaita?”
43013026	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Ayu rafiy anab tew yan anabutu’ub anabitin i orotoban nati.” Anamaramaim rafiy butu’ub, Judas Iscariot, Simon natun itin.
43013027	Judas rafiy baib ana mar Satan marta’imon dogoron wanawanan run. Jesu iu eo, “Abistan o kunotanot sinafumih, saise’ewat kusinaf.”
43013028	Baise bay hi’aa wanawanan Jesu tur abistan i isan eo’o men yait ta naniyan bai.
43013029	Nati ana veya Judas i kabay kakaif, imih Jesu iti tur eo’o i hinot na bay tobon bow na hiyuw isan, o sabuw aurih sawar meyemeye bow na baitih hirouw.
43013030	Nati gugumin wanawanan. Judas faraw bai eani’aan ana veya, i misir ufun tit.
43013031	Judas ufun titit anamaramaim, Jesu eo, “Sabuw bounabo Orot Natun ana aiwob nab nibirerereb hina’itin. Naatu Jesu wanawananamaim God ana fair natit sabuw hina’itin.
43013032	Naatu God ana fair i wanawananamaim nabirerereb na’at, naatu God taiyuwin Orot Natun biyanamaim boro ana fair saise’ewat niwa’an nirerereb. God Natun akisinamo wanawananamaim boro nifai nabora’ara’ah naatu boro mar ta’imonamo.
43013033	“Natunatu, Ayu boro men manin bairit tanama. Mi’itube Jew sabuw hai tur ao’owen na’atube kwa boun a tur ao’owen. Kwa boro ayu kwananuwuhu. Ayu efan menamaim anan, kwa men karam kwanan.”
43013034	“Obaiyunen tur boubun kwa abit. Turanah kwaniyabuwih. Ayu kwa abiyabuw na’atube, turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen.
43013035	Kwa turanah bairi kwanabiyabowbonen na’at, sabuw etei boro hinaso’ob kwa i ayu au bai’ufununayah.”
43013036	Simon Peter Jesu ibatiy, “Regah, o menika kwenan?” Jesu iyafut eo, “Ayu menamaim anan, o men karam boun boro ayu ini’ufnunu, baise o boro ufibo ini’ufnunu.”
43013037	Peter ibat “Regah, aisimamih boun men ani’ufnuni? Ayu au yawas boro o isa anaya’ra’iy.”
43013038	Naatu Jesu iya’afut eo, “O anababatun ibogaigiwas ayu isou a yawas inayara’iy? Turobe a tur ao’owen, kokorere o’e nanamaim, o boro mar tounu inao inayoubu, ayu orot nati men aso’ob.”
43014001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isa eo, “Men kwaniyababan, God kwanitumatum naatu ayu auman kwanitutumu.
43014002	Ayu Tamai ana baremaim bar awah moumurih na’in ti’inu’in naatu ayu anan kwa isa a bar awah anayabuna naatu bar awah men hitama’am na’at, aisim boro a tur ata’owen.
43014003	Ayu anan kwa a efan anayayabuna ufunamaim boro taiyuwu anamatabir anan ananawiyi bairi tanan ayu menamaim ama’am kwa boro imaim kwanama.
43014004	Ayu efan menamaim anan kwa i kwaso’ob.”
43014005	Thomas Jesu isan eo, “Regah, aki men aso’ob o menamaim kwenan, ef boro mi’itube anaso’ob?”
43014006	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu i ef, turobe, naatu yawas. Men yait ta nan Tamai biyan baise ayu’une nan Tamai biyan natit.
43014007	Kwa anababatun ayu kwanasusu’ubu gewas na’at, Tamai boro auman kwanasu’ub. Bounabo kwasoso’ob naatu kwa’i’itin.”
43014008	Philip eo, “Regah Tamat kwi’obaiyi a’itin saise aki boro nuhinafot.”
43014009	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Philip manin maiyow airit tama baise men isu’ubu? Yait ta ayu i’itu Tamai i’itin? Aisimamih ayu isou i’o, ‘Tamat kwi’obaiyi a’itin?’
43014010	Ayu i Tamai wanawananamaim ama’am naatu Tamai ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am. Philip o men kubitumatum? Iti tur i kwa isa ao’o, i men ayu au kokomaim ao’omih baise Tamai ayu wanawana’umaim ema’am bowabow i esisinaf.
43014011	Kwanitumatum ana maramaim iti tur anao’o, ayu i Tamai wanawanan ama’am naatu Tamai i ayu wanawanau ema’am, o men kwanabitumatum na’at ina’inan asisinaf imaim boro ni’obaiyi kwana’itin.
43014012	Ayu anababatun a tur ao’owen yait ayu ebitutumu ayu abistan asisinaf boro nasinaf hinamatar, naatu sawar boro au gagamihika nasinaf. Anayabin ayu Tamai isan anan.
43014013	Naatu abistanawat ayu wabu’umaim kwafefefeyan boro ana sinaf saise Natun Tamah wabin nabora’ara’ah.
43014014	Kwa sawar abistanawat ayu wabu’umaim kwanafefeyan boro anasinaf namatar.
43014015	“Ayu kwanabiyabuwu na’at, au obaiyunen tur boro kwanabosiyasiyar.
43014016	Naatu ayu boro Tamai anifefeyan i boro kwa a Baibaisayan ta wabin Turobe Ana Anun Kakafiyin nit bairi kwanama wanatowan.
43014017	Iti tafaram men nab, anayabin i boro men na’itin o boro men nasu’ub. Baise kwa i kwasu’ub, anayabin kwa bairi kwama’am naatu boro wanawanamaim nama.
43014018	Ayu boro men anihamiyi kwanigaganamih, Ayu boro kwa isa anamatabir maiye anan.
43014019	Mar kafai iti tafaram boro men na’itu, baise kwa boro kwana’itu. Anayabin ayu ama’am isan kwa auman kwama’am.
43014020	Nati anamaramaim kwa boro kwanaso’ob ayu i Tamai wanawanan ama’am naatu kwa i ayu wanawanau kwama’am naatu ayu i kwa wanawan ama’am.
43014021	“Yait obaiyunen tur bai, ebobosiyasiyar, i ayu ebiyabuwu. Yait ayu ebiyabuwu i Tamai ebiyabuw naatu ayu auman boro aniyabuw naatu ayu taiyuwu anirerereb i isan.”
43014022	Judas (men Judas Iscariot) Jesu isan eo, “Regah aisimamih tafaram ana sabuw men isah inirerereb baise aki akisi isai inirerereb?”
43014023	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Yait ta ayu isou ebiyabow boro au bai’obaiyen nabosiyasiyar? Ayu Tamai boro isan niyabow, naatu ayu Tamai airi biyanamaim ai bar anawowab bairi anama.
43014024	Yait ayu isou men ebiyabow au bai’obaiyen boro men nabosiyasiyar naatu iti tur ao kwanonowar i men ayu au turamih baise iti tur ayu Tamai iyafaru anan i biyanane enan.
43014025	“Boun bairit tama’amamaim sawar etei’imak ao kwanowaraka.
43014026	Baise Baibaisayan, Anun Kakafiyin, boro Tamai niyun ayu wabu’umaim nan, i boro sawar etei ni’obaibiyi naatu sawar etei’imak au’uwi boro a not nakusisib.
43014027	“Tufuw kwa biyamaim abihamiy, ayu tufuw kwa abit. Iti tufuw i men tafaram kwa bit na’atube abitimih. Yare kouh kwanayey a not men narukasiy naatu men kwanabir.
43014028	Iti tur i ao kwanowaraka. ‘Ayu i anan kwa isa boro anamatabir anan.’ Ayu kwanabiyabuwu na’at, kwaniyasisir ayu i Tamai isan anan anayabin Tamai i ra’at ayu natabiru.
43014029	Bounaika a tur ao’owenabo sawar hinamatar, imih abistan hinamamatar kwa i kwanitumatum.
43014030	Ayu boro men tur manin bairit tanao, anayabin tafaram ana kaifenayan kakafin i enan. I aurin fair men ema’am ayu nisnowahu.
43014031	Baise sabuw iti tafaramamaim i hinaso’ob ayu Tamai abiyabow isan imih Tamai abistan eo etatarbaiyunu imaim asisinaf. “Efan iti kwihamiy, kwanatan.”
43015001	“Ayu i ai an anababatun, naatu Tamai i masaw Matuwan.
43015002	Ayu famufamu ro’oro’on men ebiw gewas boro na’afuw nisaroun, naatu ro’oro’on ebiw gewas boro famufamu natobubunei saise ro’o’ro’on moumurihika niw naya.
43015003	Kwa i marasika kwaigewasin sawar, anayabin ayu turamaim ao kwanowar sawar.
43015004	Wanawana’umaim kwanitubonen kwanama, naatu ayu kwa wanawanamaim anitubonen anama. Famen akisin men karam taiyuwin niw ro’on nayai, baise i boro ai naiwan nituw. Ef ta’imon kwa ayu wanawanau kwanitubonen boro ro’oro’o moumurihika kwanaya.
43015005	“Ayu i ai, naatu kwa i ai famefamen, o yait ayu wanawana’umaim inabituwabon naatu ayu o wanawananamaim anabituwabon, i boro ro’oro’o moumurihika naya; anayabin, o akis men karam boro inasinaf namatar.
43015006	O yait ta ayu airit men tanibitubonen na’at, i boun ai famefamen hituw batabat kekerer na’atube, nati boro hina’o’on wairaf wan hinaroura’aten hinikubaren hina’arat.
43015007	O yait ayu wanawana’umaim inabitubonen naatu ayu au tur o wanawanamaim nabitubonen na’at, o a kok abistan isan kufefefeyan o boro anit.
43015008	Kwa ro’oro’o moumurihika kwanaya’ay kwa boro taiyuw kwana’inani, kwa i ayu au bai’ufununayah naatu Tamai ana gewasin boro sabuw kwani’obaiyih.
43015009	Tamai ebiyabuwu na’atube; kwa abiyabuwi. Au yabowamaim kwanitubonen kwanama.
43015010	Kwa ayu ou’obaiyunen tur kwanabobosiyasiyar na’at, boro ayu au yabowamaim kwanitubonen kwanama, boun ayu Tamai ana’obaiyunen tur abosiyasiyar naatu i ana yabowamaim aitubonen ama’am na’atube.
43015011	“Ayu a tur aowen kwanowar sawar saise au yasisir kwa wanawanamaim nama, naatu kwa mar etei yasisiramaim kwanama.
43015012	Ayu au obaiyunen tur i iti. Turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen, ayu kwa abiyabuwi na’atube.
43015013	Yait ta ana ofonah isah namomorob na’at, nati ebi’obaiy i ana yabow ra’at kwanekwan.
43015014	Ayu obaiyunen tur abistan sinaf isan ou’uwi, i kwanasisinaf na’at, kwa i ayu au ofonah.
43015015	Ayu boro men kafa’imo kwa isa akir anarouw ana’af, anayabin akir orot i men so’ob ana orot ukwarin abistan esisinaf. Nati efanin ayu kwa isa au ofonah arouw ao’o, anayabin ayu Tamai biyanane tur abistanawat anonowar etei’imak a tur aowen kwanowar sawar.
43015016	Kwa men ayu kwarubinu, ayu kwa arubini naatu atarbaiyuni kwanatit kwanan kwaniw ro’oro moumurihika kwanaya–nati ro’o’ro’on boro men hinamun. Naatu abistan isan ayu wabu’umaim kwafefefeyan Tamai boro nit.
43015017	Iti i ayu ou’obaiyunen tur. Turanah bairi kwaniyabowbonen.
43015018	“Kwa sabuw hinabifutuwi na’at, kwa kwanaso’ob nati ayu wan ifutuwu’ubo kwa uf ifutuw.
43015019	Kwa tafaram nowan kwanama’am na’at, tafaram boro niyabuwi nowan na’atube kwanamatar kwanama, kwa i men iti tafaram nowan, baise kwa tafaramane arubini abotaiti kwatit. Nati isan tafaram kwa ebifutuwi.
43015020	Iti tur kwa isa ao’o i a notamaim nama. ‘Orot ana bowayan i men ra’at ana orot ukwarin natabirimih.’ Kwa hinarabi hinabi’a’afiyi na’at, ayu auman hirabu tibi’afiyu. Ayu au bai’obaiyen hinabobosiyasiyar na’at, kwa auman boro hinabosiyasiyari.
43015021	Ayu wabu isan, kwa isa boro iti na’atube hinamatar. anayabin i men hiso’ob yait ayu iyunu ana.
43015022	Ayu men atan biyah atatit naatu tur gewasin men atao hitanonowar na’at, kakafin isan boro men ubar hitabaimih; baise boun boro men hai kakafin isan hinifufuwenamih.
43015023	Yait ayu ebifutuwu Tamai auman i ebifutuw.
43015024	Ayu wanawanahimaim asisinaf men yait ta sisinaf na’atube asinafumih, imih i boro men kakafin hitasinaf. Baise boun ina’inan hi’itah, naatu ayu Tamai airi’ika hikwahiri.
43015025	Baise iti mamatar, i abistanawat hai ofafaramaim hi’o hikikirum i na iturobe, Anayabin en ayu hifutuwu.
43015026	“Ayu boro Baibaisayan aniyafar nan, nati i turobe ana Anun Kakafiyin, i boro Tamai biyanane niyafar nan kwa biya natit, naatu ayu isou boro nao rerereb.
43015027	naatu kwa auman boro ayu isou kwana’orerereb, anayabin no aneika kwa ayu bairit tama.
43016001	“Sawar etei’imak i ao kwanowar sawar, saise kwa boro men ef kwanarukasiy.
43016002	Jew hai Kou’ay Bar wanawanan boro hinanuni ufun kwanatit, veya nanan anamaramaim o yait ta na’a’asbuni, i boro asir nanot God ana sibor eya’iy narouw.
43016003	Sabuw boro kakafin isa hinasinaf, anayabin Tamat men hisu’ub naatu ayu auman men hisu’ubu.
43016004	Ayu kwa a tur ao’owen, saise ana veya nanan kwa boro kwananot ayu i ai’matnuwi sawar, anayabin ayu kwa bairit tama’am isan, men saise a tur aowenamih.
43016005	“Boun ayu amatabir maiye anan, yait ayu iyunu anan i biyan anatit, naatu men yait ta ayu ibatiyu’umih, ‘O menika kwenan’
43016006	Anayabin ayu tur iti ao isan, kwa yababan yen bufuti.
43016007	Baise turobe a tur ao’owen. Iti i kwa a gewasin isan ayu amamatabir maiye. Ayu men ananan na’at, Baibaisayan boro men nan, baise ayu ananan i boro aniyun nan kwa isa.
43016008	I nanan ana maramaim sabuw iti tafaram ana kakafinamaim hima tesisinaf nabotabirih hinan yawas roumutuforen hinab naatu God ana baibabatiyen saise hinaso’ob gewas.
43016009	sabuw ayu men tebitutumu anayabin i kakafin wanawanan tema’am;
43016010	naatu tenotanot roumutufuren i kakafin terarouw, anayabin ayu anan Tamai biyan, naatu boro men kwana’itu maiye;
43016011	naatu baibabatiyen i boro nan, anayabin God marasika iti tafaram ana kaifenayan i ibabatiy sawar.
43016012	“Ayu auru tur moumurin maiyow boro atao kwatanowar, baise boun kwa isa ana’o boro men naniyan kwanab.
43016013	Baise anamaramaim turobe ana Anun Kakafiyin nanan, i Boro turobe ana ef etei nabonawiyi. I boro men taiyuwin ana notamaim na’omih, abistanawat enonowar i akisinamo nao, naatu sawar uf hinamamatar isan boro a tur na’owen.
43016014	Ayu boro nabora’ara’ahu, anayabin ayu au tur biyau’une bai na kwa a tur eo’owen isan.
43016015	Sawar etei ayu Tamai biyan tema’am i ayu nowau naatu abistan ayu biyau ema’am boro Anun Kakafiyin nab nan niwa’an kwa isa nirerereb, anayabin iti isan kwa a tur ao’owen.
43016016	“Mar kikimin kwa boro men ayu kwana’itu naatu mar kafai kikimin kwa boro ayu kwana’itu.
43016017	Ana bai’ufununayah afa taiyuwih hima hibabatiyih? “Anayabin abistan isan i tur iti na’atube eo, ‘Mar kikimin kwa boro men kwana’itu, naatu mar kafai ufunamaim ayu boro kwana’itu’ naatu ‘Anayabin ayu anan Tamai biyan?’
43016018	Naatu i hima hi’o hibabatiyih, Iti anayabin nam abisa isan eo’o, ‘Iti mar kikimin?’ Aki men aso’ob i abistan eo’o.”
43016019	Jesu itih so’ob iti isan boro hinibatiy, imih i isah eo, “Ayu iti tur ao isan kwa tayuwiwat kwama kwabibabatiyi anayabin isan, anamaramaim ayu iti na’at ao, ‘Mar kikimin ayu boro men kwana’itu, naatu mar kafai ufunamaim ayu boro kwana’itu.’
43016020	Ayu anababatun a tur ao’owen, Kwa boro kwanarererey naatu kwanigagamat baise tafaram naben nakawasa. Kwa boro kwaniyababan, baise kwa a yababan boro nabotabir yasisir namatar.
43016021	Babin anatoub ana veya nakabom ebiyababan na’atube anayabin biyababan ana veya i na kabom; baise anamaramaim kek tufuw, i ana biyababan inatbuhuruw anayabin kek tafaramamaim tufuw i ebiyasisir.
43016022	Imih kwa auman. Boun i kwa a veya kwaniyababan, baise ayu boro kwa ana’iti maiye naatu kwaniyasisir naatu men karam yait ta kwa a yasisir biyane nabosair.
43016023	Nati anamaramaim o men yait ta ayu isou sawaramih inafefeyan. Tur anababatun a tur ao’owen, sawar abistan isan ayu wabu’umaim inabifefeyan, ayu Tamai boro nit.
43016024	Marasika na iti boun kwa men yait ta iti na’atube ayu wabu’umaim fefeyanamih. Boun kwanafefeyan, naatu kwa boro kwanab, naatu kwa boro mar etei yasisiramaim kwanama.
43016025	“Ayu mar etei kawen turamaim ao kwanowar sawar, mar i enan ayu boro men kafa’imo kawen turamaim anao, baise ayu Tamai isan i boro mutufor bebeyanamaim anao kwananowar,
43016026	Nati ana veya’amaim kwa boro ayu wabu’umaim kwanafefeyan. Ayu ao i men kwa au kou anabat Tamai anifefeyanimih.
43016027	Aiyabin, Tamai i taiyuwin kwa isa ebiyabow, anayabin kwa ayu isou kwabiyabow naatu kwabitumatum ayu i God iyafaru ana.
43016028	Ayu Tamai iyafaru ana, tafaram wanawanan arun abow aremor, boun ayu tafaram abihamiy naatu anan Tamai biyan.
43016029	Naatu Jesu ana bai’ufununayah hi’o, “Bounabo tur bebeyanamaim ku’o’o naatu men kawenamaim ku’o’omih.
43016030	Bounabo aki mataito’iwa’an a’i’itin o sawar etei i so’ob, naatu o men yait ta kukokok boro o isa baibat nabow natit. Aki iti’imaim i’obaiyi abitumatum o i Godane ina.”
43016031	Jesu iyafutih eo, “Kwa bounabo kwabitumatum?”
43016032	“Baise veya i enan, naatu na titaka, anamaramaim kwa boro na’abargiyi taiyuw a bar a merar na’at kwanabihir. Ayu boro kwanihamiyu nakutatabu ana bat. Baise ayu men akisu anayabin Tamai ayu airi ama’am.
43016033	“Ayu sawar etei ao kwanowaraka, saise ayu wanawana’umaim kwanama’am kwa karam boro tufuwamaim kwanama. Iti tafaramamaim kwa boro yare wanawanan kwanarun kwani’akir. Baise kwanafair kwanabat! Ayu Tafaram aigegesair.”
43017001	Jesu ana bai’ufununayah isah eo sasawar ufunamaim, au mar nuwra’at naatu yoyoban eo, “Tamai, veya i na tit sawar. Natu wabin kwifai kubora’ara’ah na’atube o Natun Tamah ifai ebora’ara’ah.
43017002	Anayabin sabuw etei kaifih isan fair itin, saise sabuw iyab o ibitin etei boro yawas wanatowanin nitih.
43017003	Iti yawas wanatowan anayabin o su’ubi isan, o akisimo i turobe ana God, naatu Jesu Keriso ibiyafar i auman su’ubin isan.
43017004	Iti tafaramamaim a fair ibitu sabuw ai’obaiyih hi’itin, naatu bowabow sinafumih ibitu etei abow aisawar.
43017005	Tamai nati fair mar tafaram matara’e ana veya ayu itu airit tama’am boun i ayu kwitu maiye.”
43017006	“Iyabowat tafaramamaim hima hibowabow ibow ayu ibitu ai obaiyih o hisu’ubi sawar. Nati sabuw i o nowa ibow ayu itu, naatu o a tur hibosiyasiyar hibow.
43017007	Naatu bounabo sabuw hiso’ob, sawar ibow ayu ibitu etei o biyane hina.
43017008	Tur ayu ibitu etei au bai’ufnunayah ao hinowar sawar naatu hibai hibukikin, hiso’ob i men baifuwenamih. Naatu hiso’ob hitumatum ayu o biyane iyafaru ana.
43017009	Ayu ibitu isah ayoyoyoban, men tafaram wanawanan sabuw tema’am isah ayoyoyobanamih baise iyabowat ayu ibitu i isah ayoyoyoban, anayabin nati sabuw i o nowa.
43017010	Naatu abistanawat ayu biyau tema’am etei i o nowa naatu abistanawat o biya tema’am i ayu nowau, naatu ayu au fair bonamanamarin i bai’ufununayah biyahimaim irerereb sabuw hi’itin.
43017011	Naatu boun i ayu o isa anan, ayu boro men tafaramamaim anama maiye’emih, baise i boro tafaramamaim hinama. Tamai o i Kakafiyin o wab ana fairamaim inatarfafarih nati wab o ibitu’umaim saise hinan ta’imon hinamatar, boun o ayu airit ta’imon tama’am na’atube.
43017012	Ayu i bairi ama’am anamaramaim, o wab ayu ibitu imaim atafafarih akaifih gewas bairi ama. Men ta kasiyomih, baise orot ta’imonamo i bai’akir kakafin bai, saise abisa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum na iturobe.
43017013	Naatu ayu boun i o isa anan, iti tafaram wanawanan ama’am anamaramaim iti sawar etei isah aobo, saise ayu au yasisir tutufin i wanawanahimaim nakarsuwei.
43017014	Ayu a tur aitih, naatu tafaram kwahirih, anayabin i men tafaram nowanamih, boun ayu na’atube men iti tafaram nowanamih.
43017015	Ayu au yoyoban i men au bai’ufununayah bosairih isan, baise ayu abifefeyani o wagabur kakafihine inatarfafarih.
43017016	Ayu i men iti tafaram nowan, imih i auman men iti tafaram nowanamih.
43017017	O a turobe’emaim kweiwa’an uhew tematar, O a tur i turobe anababatun.
43017018	Ayu tafaram wanawanan aiyafarih hin boun ayu tafaram wanawanan i yafaru anan na’atube.
43017019	I isah ayu taiyuwu aiwa’an uhew amatar, saise ibo auman o isa anababatun uhew hitamatar.
43017020	“Ayu men i akisih isah ayoyoyobanamih, baise iyab i hai turamaim ayu isou tebitutumu i isah auman ayoyoyoban,
43017021	saise i etei hinan ta’imon hinamatar. Tamai boun ayu wanawana’umaim kuma’am na’atube ayu o wanawanamaim anama. Karam i auman hitan wanawanatamaim hitama, saise tafaram hititumatum o i ayu iyafaru ana.
43017022	O a gewasin ayu ibitu, i aitih, saise i hinan ta’imon hinamatar, boun o ayu airit ta’imon tama’amabe.
43017023	Ayu i wanawanahimaim naatu o ayu wanawana’umaim, saise i hinan anababatun ta’imon hinamatar. Saise tafaram boro naso’ob ayu i o iyafaru, naatu o i kubiyabuwih boun ayu kubiyabuwu na’atube.
43017024	“Tamai iyab ayu ibitu i akokok menamaim ama’am bairi imaim anama, saise ayu au marakaw bonamanamarin hina’itin, nati marakaw bonamanamarin o ayu itu, anayabin o iyabuwu ufibo tafaram matar.
43017025	“Tamai mokob maiyow; sabuw iti tafaramamaim o men hisu’ubi, baise ayu wan asu’ubi, naatu etei hiso’ob ayu i o iyafaru ana.
43017026	O isa ayu aorereb hinowar sawar, naatu ayu boro’ika boro o isa anao’rerereb saise yabow nati ayu ibitu i wanawanahimaim nama naatu ayu taiyuwu i wanawanahimaim anama.”
43018001	Jesu yoyoban sasawar ufunamaim ana bai’ufnunenayah bairi efan nati hihamiy hin Kidron Kwaf hirabon. Nati’imaim i masaw ta, imaim Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah bairi ten tema’am.
43018002	Judas yanuwayan menamaim hima’am i so’ob, anayabin Jesu anabai’ufununayah bairi mar etei imaim teruru’ay.
43018003	Imih Judas Romans hai baiyowayah hai kou’ay bonawiyih naatu afa i orot ukwa’ukwarih firis ukwarih biyahine hiyafarih hin naatu afa i Pharisee biyahine hin. I umah, ahay waf hibow naatu hinow hitoto’aben kawih hin masaw yan hitit.
43018004	Jesu abistanawat boro isan hinamamatar i so’ob, imih au nah isutait tit naatu ibatiyih, “Kwa yait kwanunuwih?”
43018005	Hiya’afut hi’o, “Jesu Nazareth mowan. Jesu eo, “Ayu iti wei.” Judas yanuwayan i bairi nati’imaim hibatabat.
43018006	Anamaramaim Jesu eo, “Ayu i iti. I ou’uf hibat naatu me yan hira’iy rabih.
43018007	Ibanak i batiyih maiye, “Kwa i yait kwanunuwih.” Naatu i hiya’afut. “Jesu Nazareth mowan.”
43018008	“Ayu kwa ouwi wei, ayu i iti.” Jesu iya’afut. “Ayu kwananunuwuhu na’at, basit au bai’ufununayah kwanihamiyih hinan.”
43018009	Iti namamatar saise tur abistan hi’o’o i nan niturobe. “Tamaim abistan ibitu, men ta kasiy.”
43018010	Naatu Simon Peter, i ana kaiy auman batabat, rowenra’ah firis ukwarin ana akir orot tainin asukwafune eafuru’um. Akir orot wabin Malchus.
43018011	Jesu Peter isan eo, “A kaiy kwiwan maiye! O kunotanot, Ayu Tamai kerowas bitu boro men anatom”
43018012	Imaibo Rom rakit wairafih hai ukwarih bairi naatu Jew hai ma’utenayah bairi Jesu hibai hifatum,
43018013	naatu wantoro’ot hibai hin Annas biyan hitit, nati kwamur wanawanan i Firis ana ukwarin ma’am ana veya, nati orot i Kaiafas rawan.
43018014	Iti orot Kaiafas i Jew uwih eo, gewasin orot ta’imon sabuw etei isah tamorob.
43018015	Simon Peter naatu bai’ufununayan turan ta hairi Jesu hi’ufunun bairi hin. Nati bai’ufununayan ta i firis ukwarin i su’ub, imih i ufunun bairi hin firis ukwarin ana bar merar wanawanan hirun,
43018016	baise Peter etawan awan bat. Bai’ufnunenayan ta iban matabir maiye tit etawan awan akir babitai ifefeyan naatu babitai Peter iu basit, Peter na fur wanawanan run.
43018017	Babitai etawan awanamaim Peter isan eo, o i ni’i orot ana bai’ufnunenayan orot ta? Peter iya’afut eo, “En ayu men asu’ubimih.”
43018018	Nati ana gugumin i siba’u kwanekwan imih akir wairafih naatu ma’utenayah bairi wairaf hi’asir hi’ar bebera’uh hibat rararih. Imih Peter rabon in bairi hibat rararih.
43018019	Firis ukwarin Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayan naatu ana bai’obaibiyen isan ibatiy.
43018020	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu i bebeyan sabuw etei matahimaim a’o a binan hinonowar, naatu au bai’obaiyen mar etei i sibor ya’aya efanamaim naatu Tafaror Bar wanawanan sabuw etei teruru’ay matahimaim. Ayu men abistan ta awa’ir aomih.
43018021	Aisim ayu kubibabatiyu, sabuw ayu abistanawat a’o hinonowar i kwibatiyih ayu abisa ao i hiso’ob.”
43018022	Jesu iti na’at eo ana mar ma’utenayan orot ta nati’imaim batabat Jesu rebareban ifar eo, “Men iti na’atube firis ukwarin isan ina’omih.”
43018023	Jesu iya’afutih eo, “Ayu abisa ana’o kakaf na’at sabuw etei hai tur ku’owen, tur menatan i a’o kakaf. Baise ayu tur etei ana’o’o gewas na’at i aisim irabu”.
43018024	Imaibo Annas Jesu uman fatufatum auman iyafar in Kaiafas firis ukwarin isan.
43018025	Peter boro’ika ma fora’ab rarar, sabuw afa nati’imaim bairi hima’am hibatiy hio, “O nati orot ana bai’ufnunenayan ta” Baise Peter youb eo, “En, orot nati men ayu’umih.”
43018026	Firis ukwarin ana akir orot ta i Peter tainin ea’afuw ana rara orot ta nati’imaim batabat, eawafoten eo, “O airi ayu masawamaim ait”
43018027	Ibanak mar baitounin Peter eo, “En!” naatu mar ta’imon kokorerek eo.
43018028	Maraumanaika Jesu Kaiafas ana barene hibai hin gawan orot ana baremaim hirun. Jew hai ukwarih bar wanawanan i men hirun hinamih, anayabin i men hikok wanawanah kato tamatar naatu hai Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw men hita’aamih.
43018029	Imih Pilate ufun tit sabuw ibatiyih, “Iti orot abisa isan kwa ubar kwabitin?”
43018030	Hiya’afut hi’o, “I men kakafin tasisinaf na’at, i boro men atab atan o biya atanamih.”
43018031	Pilate isah eo, “Kwabai kwan, kwa taiyuw a’ofafar eo na’atube kwasinaf.” Ibo hai tur hirutabir hio, “Aki auri men baibasit ta ema’am boro yait ta ana asabunimih.”
43018032	Iti na’atube mamatar i Jesu ana tur mi’itube ana morob isan yai eo’o i tan titurobe isan.
43018033	Pilate matabir maiye ana bar wanawanan run naatu Jesu eaf na ibatiy, “O Jew sabuw hai aiwob?”
43018034	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Iti baibat i o taiyuw a not ayu kubibatiyu o sabuw afa ayu isou a tur hi’owen?”
43018035	Pilate iya’afut, “O kunotanot ayu i Jew orot? O taiyuw a sabuw naatu firis ukwa’ukwarih o hibuw hinawiy ina ayu isou. Abisa isinaf?”
43018036	Jesu eo, “Ayu au aiwob i men iti tafaram nowanamih, baise ayu au aiwob iti tafaram nowan na’at, ayu au bai’ufununayah boro isou hitiyow, naatu Jew hai ukwarih umah wahine boro hitawasfafaru. En, ayu au aiwob i men iti faram nowanamih.”
43018037	Imih Pilate ibatiy, “Bo o i aiwob orot? Jesu iya’afut eo, “Nati tur i gewasin ku’o’o, ayu i aiwob. Ana an ta’imon i nati isan. Ayu atufuw ana iti tafaram wanawanan arun, turobe ata’orereb. Yait turobe oukoun ebatabat fanau ebobosiyasiyar.”
43018038	Pilate Jesu ibatiy, “Turobe i abistan” Iti tur nonowar ibanak matabir maiye ufun tit Jew sabuw isah eo, “I biyanamaim men kakafin ta atita’ur boro imaim anibabatiy.
43018039	Baise kwa a binanakwar eo na’atube. Tar Nowaten hiyuw aa ana veya diburane orot ta kwa isa anabotait. Kwa kwakokok Jew hai aiwob anabotait na tit.”
43018040	Isan hitarakouw hiwow hi’o, “En, men nati orotomih! Aki akokok i Barabas.”
43019001	Naatu Pilate ma’utenayah uwih, Jesu hibai hibowabiwabir sawar.
43019002	imaibo ma’utenayah kokor hi’afuw hififin ana kowasimih ukwarin hiyoun, naatu faifuw wair hibai hi’osenawein,
43019003	naatu hiyen hin biyan hitit naatu hi’o, “Jew hai aiwob ma’ama’anin!” Naatu yumatanamaim hifafar.
43019004	Pilate ibanak tit maiye sabuw rou’ay isah eo, “Ayu iti orot kwa namaim abai atitit i anao kwanaso’ob, i biyanamaim ayu men kakafin ta atita’ur.”
43019005	Jesu ana kowas kokor ukwarin hiyow naatu ana waifuw wair hi’osenawein imaibo hibai hititit. Pilate sabuw isah eo, “Orotoban iti.”
43019006	Firis ukwarih naatu i ana sabuw ukwa’ukwarih bairi hinuw hi’i’itin anamaramaim hitarakouw hi’o, “ku’onaf, ku’onaf!” Pilate eo “I Kwabai kwan kwa’onaf, ayu isou’une i ana kakafin men ta atita’ur.”
43019007	Sabuw hiya’afut maiye hi’o, “Aki ai ofafar eo i boro namorob, anayabin i taiyuwin eorerereb God natun rauw eo.”
43019008	Pilate iti nonowar i ana bir ra’at,
43019009	matabir maiye bar wanawanan run naatu Jesu ibatiy, “O menane ina?” Baise Jesu men tur ta eomih.
43019010	Pilate Jesu isan eo, “O men kukokok tur ta ayu isou inao?” “Inaso’ob, ayu isou i fair ema’am boro o ana botaiti inatit o boro ana onafi.”
43019011	Jesu iya’afut, “Iti fair ayu tafau’umaim ibai kuma’am, anayabin iti fair i God it. Imih orot yait ayu o isa yayabunu i bowabow kakafin gagamin maiyow bai.
43019012	Ana maramaim Pilate iti tur nonowar ef nuwet mi’itube Jesu tabotait isan. Baise rou’ay hitarakouw i matabir maiye run, “o nati orot inabobotait ana itinin o i men Caesar ana ofamih. O yait ta aiwob inararouw, o i Ceaser ana wosai orot”.
43019013	Pilate iti tur nonowar ana maramaim Jesu bai tit ufun efan wabin teo kabay ana’ubun imaim baibabatiyen ana ura ma’ama tafan mare (Hebrew tur i te’o Gabbatha).
43019014	Veya na bi’ouyit nati i Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw ana veya nanamaim Pilate sabuw isah eo. “Kwa a aiwob orot i iti”.
43019015	Hitarkoukuw hi’o, “kwa’asabun! kwa’asabun!” kwa’onaf! Pilate ibatiyih, “Kwakokok ayu a aiwob ana onaf?” Firis ukwa’ukwarih hiya’afut hi’o, “Aki ai aiwob i ta’imon maiyow, Caesar akisinamo”.
43019016	Imaibo Pilate Jesu ya’abun i isah onafinamih hibai hin. Naatu Jesu hibonawiy onafinamih hin.
43019017	Jesu tit ana onaf abar remor in ukwarih rarik ana efanamaim tit. (Hebrew fanahimaim Golgotha).
43019018	Nati’imaim hi’onafen, naatu orot rou’ab auman, Jesu foun in, orot rou’ab roun roun hi’in.
43019019	Pilate fef kirum naatu onafamaim hidudun, Kikirum i JESU NASARETH OROT, JEWS HAI AIWOB .
43019020	Sabuw moumurih maiyow iti kikirum hi’itin hiyab, anayabin efan iti Jesu hio’onaf i men yokomih bar merar gagamin sisibin. Iti tur i Hebrew, Latin naatu Greekamaim kirum.
43019021	Firis ukwarih, Pilate isan hio, “Jew hai aiwob bikirumin, i eo i Jew hai aiwob.”
43019022	Pilate iya’afut, “Abistan ayu akikirum, i kirum.”
43019023	Rakit wairafih Jesu hio’onaf ufunamaim ana waifuw hibow hiyarouseben matah kwafe’en himatar, matah taita’imon hiya, rakit wairafih taita’imon isah. Naatu faifuw tafan ebiyoun aurin sakisakir en auman hibai.
43019024	Rakit sabuw taiyuwih isah hio, “Men tanasib baise tani’arow tana’itin yait boro nab.” Iti mamatar i tur marasika hio hikirum inu’in i titurobe isan. “Au faifuw hibow taiyuwih hai fonamaim hiyarouseb hibow naatu au tafan baibiyon hibai hi’arouw.” Naatu baiyowayah i iti na’atube hisinaf.
43019025	Jesu ana onaf anamaim i hinah batabat, naatu i hinah rubun, Mary Clopas aawan naatu Mary Magdalin.
43019026	Jesu hinah naatu ana bai’ufununayan orot i ana yabow hairi hibatabat itih, imih hinah isan eo, “Natu ina’itin.”
43019027	Naatu bai’ufununayan orot isan eo, “Hinat ina’itin”. Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayan orot hinah bai hairi hin ana baremaim hima.
43019028	Jesu so’ob bounabo sawar etei’imak na ana yomanin tit, marasika Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in na iturobe. Jesu eo “Ayu sikou mamah.”
43019029	Tew ta nati’imaim harew tenakuyakuy awan karatan batabat, wanabir hibai harew hibu’utu’ub isikar wan himetan hi’otra’ah Jesu ufurinamaim hiyei.
43019030	Jesu harew kartoman naatu eo, “Iti’imaim sawar.” Imaibo sikan sir naatu ayubin tabaratait.
43019031	Jew ukwa’ukwarih Pilate hifefeyan baibasit baitih orot hio’onafih ah tarkakakiren isan, naatu biyah onaf afe’enane bow yara’iyen isan. Hifefeyan anayabin ana mar natot i Baiyarir Ana Veya. I men hikok biyah boro auyom hita’in.
43019032	Imih baiyowayah hin orot ta wan an hitarkakiren naatu hin orot bairu’abin an hitar kakiren, iti orot hairi i Jesu bairi hio’onafih.
43019033	Baise hina Jesu biyan hititit i moroboka inu’in hi’itin, isan imih an men hitarkakiren.
43019034	An hitatakakiren efanin sorodiy kiram robra’at Jesu naiwan yi naatu mar ta’imon rara naatu harew auman suwa re.
43019035	Orot iti matar i’itin i eo’orereb, naatu anaorerereb i turobe. I so’ob abistan eo i turobe, isan imih kwa auman kwana’itin kwanitumatum.
43019036	Iti na’atube matar saise abisa Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum na iturobe. “Boro men ana rarik ta natato’ob.”
43019037	Tur tabo Buk Atamaninamaim eo, “Sabuw boro hinanuw nati hiyiy hina’itin.”
43019038	Iti ufunamaim Joseph Arimathea orot, Jesu ana bai’ufununayan ta wa’iwa’iramaim na Pilate ifefeyan Jesu biyan tab isan. Anayabin Jew hai ukwarih isah bir. Pilate ana baibasitamaim, Joseph na Jesu biyan bai yare.
43019039	Nicodemus gugumin ta i wan in Jesu i’itin, i boun raiy ta wabin myrrh naatu raiy ta wabin aloes auman higagamuw ana bit i 30 kilos bai na Joseph hairi hin.
43019040	Orot hairi Jesu biyan hibu’ub hiyare naatu Jew hai bairahiya ana efamaim biyan raiyamaim hibobunei naatu rah ana faifuwamaim hisum.
43019041	Efan menamaim Jesu momorob i sisibinamaim i masaw ta, naatu nati masaw wanawanan hub boubun men yait ta imaim hiyai.
43019042	Iti ufunamaim i Baiyarir Ana Veya, anayabin hub i yubin, isan imih Jesu biyan hibai hin imaim hiyai.
43020001	Fur an bubusuruf, maraumanika Mary Magdalin eregugumin auman in hubemaim tit, nuwanuw hub awan kabay hifururuw tit inu’in itin.
43020002	Imih i matabir erenunuw in Simon Peter biyan naatu bai’ufununayan orot ta Jesu biyabuw i hairi biyah tit naatu eo, “Sabuw hina Regah biyan hubemaim hibosair naatu i menamaim hiya’iy, it men taso’ob.”
43020003	Imih Peter naatu bai’ufununayan orot ta hairi hub itinamih hin.
43020004	Naatu hairi erenununuw hin, baise bai’ufununayan orot ta Peter i gegesair i wan in hubemaim tit.
43020005	Naatu i kwafure nuwariy waifuw Jesu hisumisum inu’in itin baise men runamih.
43020006	Naatu Simon Peter, uf nunuw na tit naatu in hub wanawanan run, waifuw Jesu hisum inu’in itin.
43020007	naatu murubih tesumasum ana faifuw Jesu nukwarin himetan auman inu’in itin. Nati waifuw i taiyuwinawat nu nabin in, men Jesu biyan hisumisum aumanamih.
43020008	Naatu bai’ufunenayan orot ta wan na hubamaim titit, i auman run. Itin itumatum.
43020009	Naatu Buk Atamaninamaim eo i men hiso’ob, Jesu i boro morobone namisir.
43020010	Naatu bai’ufnunenayah himatabir hai ubar hin.
43020011	baise Mary hub ufunane bat rererey. Rerey auman kwafure hub wanawanan nuwariy
43020012	naatu tounamatar rou’ab hai waifuw kwes Jesu inu’in ana efanamaim hima’am, ta nukwarinane ta anane.
43020013	I babin hibatiy, “O aisim kurererey?” Babin eo, “Au Regah hibosair hibai hin menamaim hiyai, naatu ayu men aso’ob.”
43020014	Iti na’atube eo ana veya tatatabir Jesu nati’imaim batabat itin, baise i men so’ob nati i Jesu.
43020015	Jesu eo, “Babin, o aisim kurererey? O i yait kununuwih” Babin notanot i masaw bowayan ta, imih i eo, “O inab inanan na’at, kuo anowar menamaim iyai saise ayu anan anab.”
43020016	Jesu babin isan eo, “Mary” Naatu Mary tatabir Jesu isan rerey Aramaic turamaim eo, “ Rabboni. ” Anayabin i Bai’obaiyenayan.
43020017	Jesu eo, “Biyau men inabutubun, anayabin ayu men amatabir an Tamai biyan atitamih. baise kwen taitu hai tur ku’owen. Ayu amamatabir Tamai isan na’atube kwa Tamat, ayu au God kwa auman a God.”
43020018	Mary Magdalin tur bai matabir in bai’ufnunenayah biyah tit, eo, “Ayu Regah aitin.” Naatu Jesu abistanawat eo nonowar i hai tur eowen.
43020019	Fur antoro’ot bubusuruf ana rabirab, bai’ufununayah etei’imak hiru’ay bar wanawanan etawan hitufabon hima’am, anayabin Jew hai ukwarih isah hibir. Jesu na hai founamaim bat naatu eo, “Tufuw isa nama.”
43020020	Iti na’atube eo’o ufunamaim, i uman naatu sisibin i’obaiyih. Anamaramaim Regah hi’i’itin, bai’ufununayah yasisir dogoroh awan karatan.
43020021	Jesu ibanak eo maiye, “Tufuw isa nama! Tamat ayu iyunu ana, na’atube ayu kwa abiyuni.”
43020022	Naatu earatit tafahimaim yen naatu eo, “Anun Kakafiyin kwabai.
43020023	O yait ta tura ana kakafin inanonotawiy na’at, i i notawiy, o men hai kakafih inanonotawiyen na’at, God men nanotawiyihimih.”
43020024	Thomas, wabin ta Kikifukek, * teo. bai’ufununayah nah 12 i orot ta, i men bairi hima’am Jesu natitamih.
43020025	Bai’ufnunenayah afa ana tur hi’owen, “Aki Regah a’itin.” Baise i’uwih eo, “Ayu matou yan tout ana fit ana itin naatu menamaim tout ana fit umu kim anakutuwariy naatu sisibin ana fit anabutubun, ayu boro men anitumatum.”
43020026	Fur nati ufunamaim ana baitumatumayah ibanak hiru’ay maiye bar wanawanan hima’am, naatu Thomas i nati’imaim bairi etawan hitufabon hima’am, Jesu na hai founamaim bat naatu eo, “Tufuw isa nama!”
43020027	Naatu Thomas isan eo, “Uma kim iti’imaim kuyai, umu kwi’itah. Uma ku’ut ena au fit kubutubun. Kasiy kwihamiy naatu kwitumatum.”
43020028	Thomas Jesu isan eo, “Ayu au Regah, au God.”
43020029	Naatu Jesu Thomas iu, “Anayabin o ayu i’itu imih kubitumatum; iyab men ayu ti’i’itu baise tebitumatum i baigegewasin tebaib.”
43020030	Jesu ina’inanen afa gewagewasih moumurih maiyow sinafen ana bai’ufununayah matahimaim, nati afa men bukamaim hikirumen ti’inu’in.
43020031	Baise iti afa i hikirumen ti’inu’in saise imaim kwana’itin kwanitumatum Jesu Keriso, i God Natun, naatu i wabinamaim kwanabitumitum kwa boro yawas kwanab.
43021001	Iti ufunamaim Jesu ibanak maiye ana bai’ufnunenayah isah irerereb, Taibirias Harew Kukufamaim. Anamatar i iti na’atube matar.
43021002	Simon Peter, Thomas wabin ta Kikifukek, * Nathanael Canna orot, Galilee wanawanan, Zebedee natunatun, naatu bai’ufnunenayah rou’ab auman nati’imaim bairi hima’am.
43021003	Simon Peter turahinah iuwih, “Ayu anan buwat anaya’amih.” Turahinah hio, “Aki boro bairit tanan.” Imih hitit hin wa hibai buwat ya’amih hin. Baise nati gugumin men siy ta eonamih.
43021004	Maraumanika Jesu dones yan tit bat, baise bai’ufnunenayah Jesu men hi’inan.
43021005	Jesu isah eafatait eo, “Au ofonah, kwa siy ta kwabai?” Hiya’afut hio, “Eno.”
43021006	Jesu iuwih eo, “A buwat wa sisibin asukwafune kwaya boro siy afa hina’on.” Imih i eo na’atube hisinaf, naatu men karam boro buwat hitabora’ah tayen, anayabin siy buwat etei bai sonan.
43021007	Naatu bai’ufnunenayan menatan Jesu biyabuw i Peter isan eo, “No’om Regah wei.” Simon Peter tur Regah nonowar mar ta’imon ana biya baibiyon tafan bosair i kununuw riy yan re.
43021008	Bai’ufnunenayah afa hi’ufunun, buwat siy sonan auman hitain hirun. Naatu dones tit in i biyah titit men yok, 100 metres anafofonin.
43021009	Hirun wa hiyut hinunura’at wairaf ana waru’umawat dones yan inu’in hi’itin siy naatu rafiy afa auman wairaf wan hi’in hi’a’arat.
43021010	Jesu iuwih eo, “Siy iti boun kwabowabow afa kwabow kwana kwaitu.”
43021011	Simon Peter yen wa afe’en bat buwat bai tain na dones rewan yen. Siy gagagamih buwat awan karatan, etei 153, siy moumurih maiyow hi’on baise buwat men takweb.
43021012	Jesu isah eo, “Kwana marauman ana bay taa.” Bai’ufnunenayah men ta not baibatiyin isan, “O i yait?” I hiso’ob nati i Regah.
43021013	Jesu na faraw bai naatu itih, siy auman na’atube sinaf.
43021014	Iti i mar baitaunin Jesu ana bai’ufnunenayah isah irerereb morobone mimisir ufunamaim.
43021015	Bay hi’aa sasawar ufunamaim, Jesu Simon Peter isan eo, “Simon John natun, o turobe ayu kubiyabuwu men iti afa tebiyabuwu na’atube?” Simon eo, “Au Regah, o iso’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.” Jesu eo, “Au bowbaituw inituw”
43021016	Jesu ibanak eo maiye, “Simon, John natun o turobe ayu kubiyabuwu?” Simon iya’afut eo, “Au Regah, o i so’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.” Jesu eo, “Au bobaituw inakaifen.”
43021017	Jesu mar baitonin Simon isan eo, “Simon John natun, o ayu kubiyabuwu?” Peter iyababan anayabin Jesu mar baitonin ibatiy, “O ayu kubiyabuwu?” Peter eo, “Regah, sawar etei o iso’ob, o iso’ob ayu o abiyabuwi.” Jesu eo, “Au bobaituw inituw.”
43021018	Turobe a tur ao’owen. “Orot boub ima’am ana veya o taiyuw i’osenweini, naatu menamaim a kok imaim iremor, baise inabiregah anamaramaim o boro uma ina’oftobotobon, sabuw afa boro hini’osweini naatu efan men akok boro imaim hinabonawiyi kwanaremor.”
43021019	Jesu tur iti na’atube eo anayabin, i Peter ana morob ef mi’itube boro namorob imaim God wabin nifai nabora’ara’ah. Naatu Peter isan eo, “Kuna kwi’ufnunu.”
43021020	Peter tatabir nuw, naatu bai’ufununayan Jesu biyabuw i bi’ufnunih itin. Iti bai’ufnunenayan i aa fufun ana bay hi’aa Jesu sisibinamaim tugeger eo, “Regah yait boro o nayanuwi?”
43021021	Peter nuw ayu John i’itu ana maramaim, Jesu ibatiy, “Regah iti orot isan i mi’itube?”
43021022	Jesu iya’afut eo, “Ayu anakok i yawasin ma ayu matabir maiye anararauw na’at, o isa mi’itube kunotanot? Kwi’ufnunu.”
43021023	Anayabin iti isan tur tasasar tit bowturah etei hinowar, iti bai’ufnunenayan i boro men namorob. Baise Jesu eo’o i men morob rouw eomih. I tur iti akisinamo eo, “Ayu anakok i yawasin ma ayu matabir isan, nati o i mi’itube kunotanot?”
43021024	Bai’ufnunenayan iti i boun sawar etei isah eorereb naatu kirumen. It taso’ob i ana eorereb i turobe.
43021025	Jesu sawar moumurih maiyow afa auman sinafen. Sawar etei’imak fefemaim hitakikirum na’at, ayu anotanot iti tafaram tutufin wanawanan boro fef awan takaratan.
44001001	Theophilus au buk wantoro’ot i Jesu ana bowabow etei mi’itube busuruf bow sabuw i’obaibiyih inan
44001002	God bora’ah au mar yey isan i ao akirum. Baise au mar yena’e ana veya orot iyab kob abarin isan rurubinih i Anun Kakafiyinane roube’aten tur itih.
44001003	Ana bai’akir ufunamaim, isah irerereb hai not hikwaris hima hibinotanot ana sinaf ef tata’amaim botabirih hi’itin hiturobe i, i yawasin ma’ama, veya 40 wanawanan ana bairererebamaim God ana aiwob isan i’obaibiyih hima hinowar.
44001004	Veya ta bairi hima bay hi’aa ana maramaim, iuwih eo, “Jerusalem men kwanihamiy, baise kwanama Tamai a siwar baitimih eomatani, ao kwanonowar isan kwanakaif.
44001005	Anayabin John i harewamaim bapataito it, baise veya bai’ab na’atube ufunamaim kwa boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito kwanab.”
44001006	Basit Tur Abarayah etei hina hibita’imon ana veya hibatiy, “Regah, karam iti boun aiwob itab Israel sabuw ititih maiye?”
44001007	Iyafutih eo, “Veya naatu sumar abisa’amaim iti sawar hinamamatar isan i God akisin ana fair tafanamaim veya yakitifuw, i boro men kwa kwanaso’obamih.
44001008	Baise kwa i Anun Kakafiyin nanan ana veya’amaim fair boro kwanab, naatu ayu isau Jerusalemamaim boro kwanabusuruf kwanakubuna, kwanatit Judea wanawanan, Samaria, naatu kwanatit kwanan tafaram yomanin.”
44001009	Iti na’atube eo ufunamaim, God bora’ah yen himtitiy auman in sakuk wanawanan run himat kasiy.
44001010	Matah etei hikubar nati mar wanawanan rurumaim hibat hi’i’itin, naniyan meyemeye orot rou’ab hai faifuw kwes sisibihimaim himatar.
44001011	Naatu hi’uwih. “Galilee oro’orot, kwa aisim kwabat au mar kwanuwanuw? Iti Jesu ta’imon God kwa biyamaim bora’ah au mar yey, i boro ef ta’imon kwa’itin yeyebe boro namatabir maiye nanan kwana’itin.”
44001012	Imaibo Olive Oyaw hihamiy himatabir maiye hin Jerusalem hitit, ef ana manin i one kilometre na’atube.
44001013	Hina bar hitit, naatu hiyen bar awan ta no tafan i hima’ama’amaim hitit. Iyabowat nati’imaim hima’ama wabih i iti, Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, naatu James, Alpheus natun, naatu Simon Kafafarayan, naatu Judas, James natun.
44001014	Iti orot i mar etei hina hita’imon hiyoyoyoban, baibin bairi, naatu i wanawanahimaim i Mary Jesu hinah naatu taitin auman.
44001015	Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayah etei 120 na’atube wanawanahimaim Peter misir eo,
44001016	“Taitu, marasika Anun Kakafiyin David iwan Bukamaim eo kikirum i Judas ana sinafumaim nati tur na yabin matar. I rafot rouwayan na’atube sabuw bonawiyih Jesu hifatum.
44001017	Judas i ata kou’ay orot ta naatu iti bowabow wanawananamaim bairi tabow.
44001018	Bowabow kakafin sisinaf isan ana baiyan hibitin imaim me tubun ukwarin aubabe re yi yan fudir kabutin ihouw.
44001019	Sabuw Jerusalem hima’ama etei ana tur hinowar, imih hai turamaim nati efan wabin Akeldama hiwab. Wab anayabin ‘Rara ana Efan.’
44001020	Anayabin Psalm wanawananamaim iti na’atube eo, ‘Ana bar kwaihamiy eowarar, naatu men yait ta nati’imaim narun nama’amih.’ Naatu iban maiye eo. ‘Ana efan orot ta kwanitin.”
44001021	Isan imih, igewasin orot yait ata Regah Jesu wanawanatamaim ma reremor ana veya i bairi tama tabowabow boro i tanarubin.
44001022	Naatu nati orot i John Baptist ana veya’amaim bairi taibuya tana Jesu hibora’ah au mar yey i boro tanarubin. Anayabin ata orot ta nati na’atube tanarurubin i boro Jesu morobone mimisir isan bairi sif tanarubon.”
44001023	Basit orot rou’ab hikutaitih, Joseph wabin ta Barsabas, wabin baitounin Justus naatu Mathias hairi hirubinih.
44001024	Imaibo hiyoyoban. “Regah o sabuw etei dogoroh iso’ob. Imih abifefeyani orot iti rou’ab kwi’obaiyi menatan i o irubin.
44001025	Judas ana efan nab tur abarayan namatar, anayabin Judas iti efan ihamiy ana ma’ama efan rurubinimaim in.”
44001026	Imaibo hi’arow, naatu Mathias wabin hisusu’ub ana veya arow ben, basit Mathias hibai tur abarayah nah 11 hima’ama wanawanah run.
44002001	Pentecost ana veya na tit, etei’imak hiru’ay efan ta’imonamaim hima.
44002002	Naniyan meyemeye yaurabad nidun wowogabe marane rena bar hima’am imaim run awan karatan.
44002003	Naatu abisa hi’i’itin i wairaf orot menan na’atube tamunimun na ta’ita’imon tafahimaim mara’ara’at.
44002004	Etei’imak Anun Kakafiyin iwanih menah botabir tur tata’amaim hio, Anun Kakafiyin fair bitih na’atube.
44002005	Nati ana veya, Jew sabuw God ana bowayah orot gagamih etei tafaram tata’ane hiru’ay Jerusalemamaim hima’am.
44002006	Iti nidun hinonowar ana maramaim sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hiru’ay hima’am, hai kasiy ra’at naatu hifofofor men kafaita, anayabin etei hai turamaim hio hinowar.
44002007	Kasiy gagamin maiyow isah matar naatu taiyuwih hibabatiyih. “Iti sabuw tur teo etei i Galilee oro’orot?
44002008	Naatu mi’itube’emih it ata turamaim hio tanonowar?
44002009	It i tafaram ta ta’ika tana, Partia, Media, Ilam naatu afa i Mesopotamia’ane hina, Judea, Kapadosia, Pontus naatu Asia,
44002010	Firigia, Pamfilia, Egypt naatu Libia wanawanan turin Sairini na’atune auman hina tema’ama. Naatu Romene nanawan auman hina Jerusalem tema’am. Nati i Jew sabuw naatu sabuw afa hai baitumatum hibotabir hina Jew sabuw himamatar auman.
44002011	It afa i Kurit naatu Arab sabuw. Baise God sawar gewasih maiyow sisinaf isan ata turamaim hio tanonowar!”
44002012	Sabuw hifofofor naatu hai kasiy ra’at taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Iti sawar anayabin i abisa?”
44002013	Baise sabuw afa hi’iyab hio, “Nati sabuw i harew fokarin, hitom imih teo kwanekwan!”
44002014	Tur Abarayah etei 11 hai founamaim Peter misir fanan aumetawat sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in isah eo, “Taitu tuwai’inah Jew sabuw naatu kwa iyab Jerusalem wanawanan kwama’am, akokok tain kwanarub gewas sawar iti mamatar anayabin anakubuna kwananowar.
44002015	Kwa kwanotanot iti orot i harew fokarin hitom tibikoko’aw, baise, boun i nine korok mar auman.
44002016	Imih i men harew hitomamih, baise dinab orot Joel ana Bukamaim Atamaninamaim kirum eo,
44002017	‘Mar ana yomaninamaim God eo, Ayubu boro sabuw etei tafahimaim anisuwai nare. Kwa natunat oro’orot naatu baibitar boro dinabatur hinao, a orot baubuh boro matah hinabora’ah sawar hina’itah, naatu a orot gagamih boro hinamim.
44002018	Isa’amih, nati ana veya ayu au akir wairafih, oro’orot naatu baibin etei, tafahimaim Anunu anisuwai nare dinabatur hinao.
44002019	Ayu boro maramaim baifofofor ana sinaf naatu ina’inan tafaramaim ana sinaf, Nati’imaim boro rara, wairaf, naatu sow agor kutikutin kwana’itin.
44002020	Veya matan boro nagugum naatu sumar matan boro rara namatar, imaibo Regah ana veya gagamin bodiridirin nanan natit.
44002021	Orot yait Regah wabin su’ub e’afa’af boro yawas nab.’”
44002022	“Israel sabuw tur iti kwananowar! Jesu Nazareth mowan i God rubin naatu i wanawanamaim ina’inan yumatah ta ta, baifofofor ta ta God kwa biyamaim sinaf kwa’itin kwaso’ob.
44002023	Iti orot hibai kwa umamaim hiyai kwa’a’asabun i God ana kok naatu marasika yakitifuw inu’inumaim matar, naatu kwa sabuw kakafih hai baibaisamaim Jesu kwabai onaf afe’en kwa’onaf morob.
44002024	Baise God morobone iyawas maiye misir, naatu morob ana biyababanane rufam tit, anayabin morob ana fair men karam boro diburamaim tabotan tama.
44002025	David nati orot isan eo, ‘Ayu Regah mar etei nau’umaim ai’itin, anayabin i ayu umau asukwafune, imih ayu boro men hininanawiyu.
44002026	Isan imih ayu dogorou ebiyasisir naatu awau’umaim i kawasa tur etitit, ayu i orot afa na’atube, baise God ana’omatanen isan ayu i nuhufot ama’am.
44002027	Anayabin o boro men ininatbuhuruwu rahemaim ana’in, na’atube a Orot Kakafiyin boro men ina’itin namasamih.
44002028	O yawas ana ef i’obaiyu, naatu o ataragub wanawananamaim aiyasisir boro iniwansumu.’”
44002029	“Taituwau Jew, bebeyan a tur ao’owen aiwob orot David ata agir wabin gagamin, morob hiyai naatu ana rah i iti biyatamaim inu’in.
44002030	Naatu David i dinab orot God omatanen ana obaifaro auman yayare i so’ob, veya ta David ana rara’ane i uwan ta boro ni’aiwob.
44002031	God mar boro nanan abisa nasisinaf David i so’ob, Keriso morobone misir maiye isan ana tur i nowar. ‘Biyan boro men ninatbuhuruw moroboyah hai efanamaim na’in na’atube biyan boro men na’itin namasamih.’”
44002032	“God iti Jesu i boun morobone iyawas maiye misir, naatu aki i iti sawar himamatar ana sif robonayah.
44002033	God iti Jesu bora’ah yen uman asukwafune mare, naatu Tamah biyanane Anun Kakafiyin eo’omatan bai aki tafai yan isuwai re’er boun iti kwa’i’itin naatu kwanonowar.
44002034	Naatu David i men au mar yenamih, baise iti tur i eo, ‘Regah au Regah isan eo Umau asukwafune kumare.
44002035	Inama’am a kamabiy sabuw ana bow a babanamaim anaya.’
44002036	Isan imih kwa Israel sabuw iti tur ao i kwanaso’ob gewas. God iti Jesu kwabai kwao’onaf i bai yen ata Regah naatu ata Roubininenayan matar!”
44002037	Sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana veya dogoroh rusib Peter naatu Tur Abarayah hibatiyih, “Taitu tuwai’inah aki boro mi’itube ana sinaf?”
44002038	Peter iyafutih eo, “Kwa etei dogor hinikitabir naatu Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito kwanab, saise a bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen, naatu God ana usar Anun Kakafiyin boro kwanab.
44002039	Iti omatanen i kwa isa naatu kwa natunat isah, na’atube sabuw tutufin etei iyab ef yok tema’am ata Regah God boro na’a’afih isah.”
44002040	Peter tur maumurih na’in imaim imatnuwih naatu ifefeyanih eo, “Sabuw tafa’asarih wanawanah kwama’am saisewat kwanatit kwaniyawasi!”
44002041	Sabuw maumurih na’in iti tur hinonowar hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai, nati ana veya’amaim sabuw etei 3000 na’atube nati kou’ayamaim hirun.
44002042	Naatu hai veya hiya’asair Tur Abarayah biyahine tur hinowar bairi hibita’ay, rafiy himseseb hifaram hi’aa naatu hiyoyoyoban.
44002043	Tur Abarayah wanawanahimaim ina’inan naatu baifofofor maumurih maiyow hisisinaf sabuw awah ha’e.
44002044	Bai’ufununayah mar etei hina hita’imon sawar i nowah etei nena hifafarambonen.
44002045	Naatu hai sawar was arin, roumukur arin etei hibow hin hitobon kabay hibai hina wanawanahimaim sabuw iyab hai kok abisa isan hibiyababan etei ana fofonin hifafarambonen.
44002046	Veya matan hiyi Tafaror Bar gagaminamaim hiruru’ay. Naatu hai baremaim bay himseseb dogoroh ere yasisir auman hi’aa,
44002047	God hibobora’ara’ah naatu sabuw etei tur abarayah isah i hibiyasisir. Naatu veya ta’ita’imon ana fofonin sabuw iyab God biyawasih Regah bow ana kou’ay wanawanan yababar rara’at.
44003001	Veya ta rabirab three korok na’atube Peter, John hairi Tafaror Bar gagaminamaim yoyobanamih hiyen hin.
44003002	Nati Tafaror Bar gagamin ana seboseb Etawan Gewagewasin awanamaim orot an kafikafirin auman tutufuw, i mar etei te’abar tena nati’imaim teyare sabuw tirun titit isah ema efefeyan.
44003003	Peter, John hairi hina hirur itih, isah kabayamih fefeyan.
44003004	Peter John hairi mutufor isan hinuw naatu Peter eo, “Aki kui’iti!”
44003005	Basit orot isah nuw, notanot boro hairi biyahimaim abisa ta tab.
44003006	Baise Peter isan eo, “Ayu auru kabay en, baise abistan abai anan i boro anit. Jesu Keriso Nazareth mowan i wabinamaim, abiyuni kumisir kubat kuremor!”
44003007	Naatu ofere uman ana asukwafune bai ibais misir an yan bat. Mar ta’imon orot an fuk sun higewasih,
44003008	fasi iwa’an misir an yan bat remor. Imaibo bairi etawan awan hirun kunununuw God ana merar yi wabin bora’ara’ah.
44003009	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin hima’am kawasa kununuw God bobora’ah hi’itin,
44003010	Naatu hi’i’inan i fefeyanayan Etawan Gewagewasin awanamaim ma’ama, naatu biyanamaim abisa matar hi’i’itin isan hi’oror sa’irih naatu hai kasiy ra’at.
44003011	Orot na Peter, John hairi biyahimaim bukikinih batabat sabuw hi’i’itin ana veya hifofofor erekasiy auman hinunuw hin biyah hitit, efan wabin Solomon ana seboseb efanamaim.
44003012	Peter bat sabuw itih in sawar naatu iuwih eo, “Israel sabuw, aisim iti sawar mamatar isan kwabifofofor? Naatu aisim aki kwa’i’iti kikini? Kwanotanot iti i aki ai fairamaim, ai aki ai kakafiyinamaim iti orot ai yawas bat ereremor?
44003013	Iti i Abraham, Isaac naatu Jacob hai God, naatu it ata’a’agir auman hai God, ana omatanen i iti ana’akir orot Jesu kakafiyin isan eo, baise kwa kwabai a orot ukwarih umahimaim kwayai hi’asabun, naatu Pilate botaitinamih eo ana veya Pilate nanamaim kwakwahir.
44003014	Kwa Orot Kakafiyin naatu ana Yawas Mutufurin kwakwahir, efanin Pilate kwaifefeyan sabuw asbunuwenayan i botait.
44003015	Kwa ayawas ana bonawiyenayan orot kwa’asabun. Baise God morobone bora’ah misir maiye naatu aki i iti yawas ana kourerebayah.
44003016	Aki abitumatum Jesu wabinamaim iti orot iyawas fair bai. Iti i Jesu wabinamaim naatu baitumatum i wanawananamaim na, iti orot biyan tutufin etei iyawas boun iti kwa’i’itin naatu kwaso’so’ob.
44003017	Taitu tuwai’inah Jew, ayu bounabo aso’ob kwa a ukwarih bairi a kasiyomaim Jesu isan iti na’atube kwasinaf.
44003018	Baise God marasika ana dinab orot biyahimaim itenaya, ana Roubininenayan orot boro ni’akir naatu ana tur nati i boun na iturobe.
44003019	Imih dogor kwanikitabir naatu God isan kwanatatabir maiye, saise i boro a kakafih nakusouwen.
44003020	Nati namamatar ana veya, imaibo ayub ana fair bain baiboubun isan boro Regah wanawananamaim nan biya natit. Jesu, i ana Roubinineyan orot marasika kwa isa rurubin boro niyafar.
44003021	I boro maramaim nama nanan God ana veya ya’iyai nan natit, sawar etei nasinaf hinan hiniboubuh maiye, marasika ana dinab orot kakafiyih biyahimaim kukurereb na’atube.
44003022	Moses eo, ‘Regah a God boro kwa wanawanamaim a orot ta narubin dinab orot namatar ayu rurubinu na’atube, imih tain kwanarub sawar etei sinafumih nao kwananowar.
44003023	Orot yait nati dinab orot fanan men nabobosiyasiyar i boro God ana sabuw biyahine hina’afuru’um natit anababatun.’
44003024	Dinab oro’orot etei tur hibai, Samuel ma’am ana veya’amaim dinab orot afa i ufununamaim auman iti veya boun boro abistan namamatar isan i hi’orerebaka.
44003025	God ana’omatanen dinab biyahine nan i kwa isa, naatu obaibasit iti boun kwafafaram God bai uwatanah bairi hibasit ana veya, Abraham isan iti na’atube eo, ‘O wawaw wanawanahimaim sabuw tafaram wanawanan tutufin etei boro baigegewasin hinab.’
44003026	Imih God ana bai’akirayan orot rubin iyafar kwa isa wan na, anayabin God ana kok i kwa baigegewasin tit naatu kwa ta’ita’imon a ef kakafihine kwama’am kwatamatabir maiye isan.”
44004001	Firis afa naatu Tafaror Bar gagamin kaifenayah hai ukwarih, Sadducee bairi hiyen hina Peter, John hairi hibat sabuw hai tur hi’owen biyah hitit.
44004002	Ya so’ar yen bufutih, anayabin Peter John hairi sabuw hi’obaiyih hio, “Sabuw karam boro morobone hinamisir maiye, Jesu morobone mimisir maiye na’atube.”
44004003	Peter, John hairi hibuwih hifatumih hin dibur bar hiyariyih imaim hi’in, anayabin veya re mar fo.
44004004	Baise sabuw iyab nati rou’ay gagamin wanawanan hima binan hinonowar, hitumatum naatu orot nati kou’ay wanawanan hibiyab yena 5,000 bai.
44004005	Marto marauman sabuw hai bonawiyenayah, ai’in naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah etei Jerusalemamaim kou’ay hibai.
44004006	Annas Firis Gagamin na nati’imaim, Kaiafas hairi, John, Alexander naatu orot afa iyab Firis Gagamin ana nibur wanawananamaim hima’am auman hina.
44004007	Peter John hairi hibuwih hina nahimaim hibat naatu hibusuruf hibabatiyih hio, “Kwa mi’itube kwasinaf orot igewasin? Naatu fair menane kwabai iti kwasinaf? O yait wabinamaim kwasinaf?”
44004008	Imaibo Peter Anun Kakafiyin iwanasum batabat iyafutih eo, “Sabuw bonawiyenayah naatu regaregah ai’in.
44004009	Aki kwa’afi orot an kafikafirin biyanamaim sawar gewasin iti matar kwa’i’itin isan naatu mi’itube bigewasin isan kwabibatiyi,
44004010	i boro iti na’atube atao, kwa naatu sabuw tutufin etei Israel wanawanan kwama’am kwataso’ob, orot boun iti namaim biyan tutufin etei igewasin ebatabat, i Jesu Keriso Nazareth mowan kwabai onaf afe’en kwa’asabun naatu morobone God bora’ah maiye mimisir i wabinamaim iti orot yawas.
44004011	Iti orot isan Bukamaim hikirum hio, ‘Iti kabay kwa wowabayah kakafin kwarouw kwarurutawiy i boun na bar ana bubu matar.’
44004012	Yawas boro men yait ta biyanamaim tanatita’ur, anayabin tafaram tutufin wanawanan men yait ta wabin nati na’atube ema’ama boro imaim niyawasitamih.”
44004013	Naatu Peter John hairi hibitafofor hi’itin ana veya hi’inanih iti orot i kirumatih, orot maiyow bar ma’anih, naatu hifofofor men kafaita, imaibo hi’inanih hiso’ob iti orot i Jesu bairi hima hireremor.
44004014	Naatu iban maiye orot hibiyawas i bairi hibatabat hi’i’itin hai tur etei sawar.
44004015	Imih hi’uwih Kaniser hai efan hihamiy ufun hitit naatu i taiyuwih hibabatiyih ef hinuwet hio.
44004016	“Abisa boro tanasinaf iti orot isah? Sabuw etei Jerusalem wanawananamaim tama’am hiso’ob iti sawar gagamin ta hisinaf, naatu it boro men karam tanibun wa’irimih.
44004017	Baise iti sawar tasasar tit sabuw wanawanah run isan, it boro tana’otanih naatu tanimatnuwih iti orot wabinamaim men sabuw hini’obaiyihimih.”
44004018	Imaibo hi’af maiye hirun naatu hiofafarih Jesu wabinamaim men hinabinan naatu men yait ta hini’obaiy maiye’emih.
44004019	Baise Peter, John hairi hi’awar foten hio, “Kwa taiyuw kwafufun kwa’itin, God nanamaim kwa fana anabaib i gewasin o God fanan anabaib i gewasin?
44004020	Aki taiyuwi abistan a’itin naatu anonowar iti tur boro men anihamiy.”
44004021	Obiruwen tur afa hio ufunamaim hibotaitih hin, baikwatutunen ana ef men ta ma’am boro hititih, anayabin sabuw etei’imak abisa mamatar isan God hibobora’ara’ah.
44004022	Naatu orot nati yayawas ana kwamur i 40 tafanamaim.
44004023	Hibobotaitih ufunamaim Peter, John hairi hin hai sabuw biyah firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in mi’itube hi’u’uwih etei hai tur hi’owen.
44004024	Iti hinonowar etei’imak auta’imon yoyobanamaim fanah hibora’ah God isan hio, “Regah fair matuwanin, mar, tafaram naatu riy baimatarenayan, naatu wanawanahimaim sawar etei auman ana baimatarenayan.
44004025	Anun kakafiyinamaim a’akir orot, aki uwai David awanamaim eore eo, ‘Eteni Sabuw aisim hitara’at naatu sabuw aisim hai yakitifuwen yabin men temamatar?
44004026	Tafaram ana aiwob baiyow isan teyayabuna, naatu bonawiyenayah etei hiku’ay Regah tibigigim naatu ana Roubininayan tibigigim.’
44004027	Turobe Herod, Pontius Pilate hairi Ufun Sabuw naatu Israel sabuw bairi iti bar merar gagaminamaim hibobaita’ay o a Roubininenayan orot wabin Jesu, o a’akir wairafin kakafiyin isan hiyakitifuw.
44004028	Iti sabuw i marasika o a kok abisa mataramih a fairamaim iyayakitifuw i nonowatin hisinaf emamatar.
44004029	Naatu boun Regah, aki teo’obiruwi kunowar, aki o a’akir wairafi kwibaisi fair kwiti, saise ana batkikin a tur anabinan.
44004030	Uma kuru’atayan o a’akir kakafiyin Jesu wabinamaim yawas kwiyafar etit naatu ina’inanen fokarih, baifofofor, kusinaf.”
44004031	Yoyoban hibisawar ufunamaim, efan nati hima’ama’amaim busuruf ibiguw, naatu Anun Kakafiyin iwanih hitafofor hitit hibusuruf God ana tur hibinan.
44004032	Baitumatumayah hai not naatu dogoroh etei na ta’imon matar. Men yait ta ana sawar akisin nowan rouwamih, baise hai sawar etei hifafarambonen.
44004033	Tur Abarayah fair gagamin maiyow iwanih hibat Regah Jesu ana misir maiye hiorerereb, naatu manaw kabeber Godane gagamin maiyow tafahimaim isuwai ra’iy.
44004034	Naatu nati kou’ay wanawananamaim men yait ta sawar isan biyababanamih, anayabin sabuw iyab isah me hima’am naatu bar hima’am i hiyateten hitobon kabay hibow hina,
44004035	tur abarayah nahimaim hiyaraiyen naatu i hibow sabuw hai yababan ana fofoninamaim hifafaramih.
44004036	Iti na’atube mamatar ana veya baitumatumayan orot ta wabin Joseph Levite ana bowabow orot ta, Cyprus imaim tufuw, naatu tur abarayah wabin ta Barnabas hiwab (anayabin Koufair Ana Orot).
44004037	Ana me ya’atait hitubun naatu kabay bai na tur abarayah itih.
44005001	Orot wabin Ananias aawan Sapphira hairi auman hai sawar turin hiya’aitit sabuw hitubun.
44005002	Naatu kabay turin i botan, aawan i so’ob, naatu i ana baibasit auman iwa’an, turinawat bai in tur abarayah nahimaim ihouw ra’iy.
44005003	Peter Ananias isan eo, “Aisim Satan not kakafin dogor wanawanan yaru’uy Anun Kakafiyin matanamaim ifuwen, a me hitutubun kabay turin o isa ibotan?
44005004	Inaso’ob iti me i o nowa, baise o a baibasitamaim sabuw hitubun, naatu sabuw hitutubun ufunamaim iti kabay i o nowa. Aisim iti na’atube isinaf? O men orot ifuw, baise God ifuw.”
44005005	Ananias tur iti nonowar ana maramaim an uy re morob, sabuw etei’imak tur iti hinonowar hai hibir ra’at.
44005006	Oro’orot boubuh hina hirun biyan hibai hisum hibai hin rahemaim hiyai.
44005007	Three hours na’atube sasawar ufunamaim aawan babin na tit, i men so’ob Ananias isan abisa mamatar.
44005008	Peter babin ibatiy, “Ku’o gewas anowar, aaw airi a me hitutubun baiyanaban ana fofonin iti kwabai?” Babin iya’afut eo, “Me hitutubun ana baiyan etei i nati.”
44005009	Peter babin isan eo, “Aisim aaw airi kwaibasit, Regah Anunin kwarutubun? Oro’orot iyab o aaw hibai hin hiya’iy i nati etawanamaim tebatabat o hina’abar kwananamih.”
44005010	Mar ta’imon babin Peter anamaim ra’iy rab morob, oro’orot boubuh hina hirur babin morob inu’in hi’itin hi’abar hin aawan sisibinamaim hiyai.
44005011	Sawar iti mamatar ekaleisia sabuw naatu sabuw afa auman iti tur hinonowar hi’oror sa’irih naatu hai hibir ra’at.
44005012	Tur Abarayah ina’inan naatu baifofofor moumurih maiyow sabuw wanawanahimaim hisisinaf. Naatu baitumatumayah hai rou’ay mar etei i Solomon ana sebosebomaim hiruru’ay.
44005013	Orot babin ufunane men karam boro hitakofanih, basit baitumatumayah hai gewasih isan sabuw wabih hibobora’ara’ah.
44005014	Naatu orot babin iyab Regah hibitumatum hina hirun kou’ay yayababar yen ra’at.
44005015	Rou’obow nati’imaim sabuw sawusawuwih hi’abaren hitit ef gagamih yah emo’em afe’eh naatu ir yah hi’i’inuwih, saise Peter tanan ana youn afa tafahimaim tarabon isan.
44005016	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin maiyow hiru’ay, naatu bar merar afa Jerusalem sisibinamaim hima’am hai sabuw sawusawuwih naatu afa afiy kakafih hitoun buriburih hima’am hibuwih hinan etei’imak hiyayawasih.
44005017	Firis Gagamin ana ofonah etei naatu Sadducee hai kou’ay bairi hibusuruf tur abarayah isah yah so’ar hibobowen, naatu sinafumaim hiyai.
44005018	Tur Abarayah hibow hifatumih naatu hibuwih hin dibur bar gagaminamaim hiyariyih.
44005019	Baise gugumin wanawanan Regah ana tounamatar na etawan etei botawiyen tur abarayah iunawiyih hitit, iuwih eo,
44005020	“Kwanan Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan kwanabat iti yawas boubun ana tur tutufin sabuw etei hai tur kwana’owen.”
44005021	Mar sibisib auman tur abarayah Tafaror Bar wanawanan was efanamaim hibusuruf sabuw hi’obaibiyih. Firis Gagamin ana ofonah bairi hina hirun naatu Kaniser ana kou’ay tutufin etei hi’af ayuwih, Jew hai regaregah ai’in etei auman hina kou’ay wanawanan hirun, imaibo diburane tur abarayah buwih na isan tur hiyafar.
44005022	Baise hina dibur baremaim hititit hibouyuwih naatu ma’utenayah hai ukwarih himatabir maiye hina hai tur hio’wen hio,
44005023	“Aki an dibur bar atitit etawan etei i tufatufbonen naatu etawan ma’utenayah auman hibatabat ai’itih, baise etawan abobotawiyen i men yait ta nati bar wanawananamaim atita’urimih.”
44005024	Firis ukwarih naatu Tafaror Bar kaifenayan hai ukwarin iti tur hinonowar etei hai kasiy ra’at hio, “Iti orot isah abisa matar?”
44005025	Rubira’e orot ta na run eo, “Kwananowar oro’orot kwabow dibur kwaya’aya i Tafaror Bar wanawanan sabuw tibi’obaibiyih.”
44005026	Naatu kaifenayan ukwarin ana orot afa bairi hin tur abarayah hibuwih bairi himatabir maiye, men hifair o hikwararihimih, anayabin sabuw agimamaim borabirabih hirouw hibir.
44005027	Tur Abarayah hibuwih hina hirun Kaniser (Sanhedrin) nahimaim hibat naatu Firis Gagamin ibatiyih eo,
44005028	“Aki tur fokarin maiyow ao fafari iti orot wabinamaim sabuw men kwani’obaiyih, naatu baise kwa abai’obaiyen i tit Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw etei tenonowar, naatu kwakok iti orot momorob ana ubar aki bain isan kwayayamatat.”
44005029	Peter naatu tur abarayah afa bairi hiyafutih hio, “Aki i God fanan anab men orot fanahimih.
44005030	It ata a’agir hai God Jesu kwa onaf tafanamaim kwa’onaf kwa’asabun momorob i morobone God bora’ah maiye,
44005031	God bora’ah yen uman ana asukwafune ima’an, bonawiyenayan naatu baiyawasayan matar, saise Israel sabuw hai ef nabotawiy dogor baikitabiren naatu notawiyen hinab.
44005032	Aki i iti sawar hai sifrubonayah, naatu sabuw iyab hibifanabow isan God Anun Kakafiyin bitih auman siftirurubon.”
44005033	Kaniser sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana veya, gagamat yen bufutih hikokok kwanekwan i boro tur abarayah hita’asbunih.
44005034	Baise Pharisee orot wabin Gamaliel, ofafar bai’obaiyenayan, sabuw etei iti orot hikakakafiy, kou’ay wanawanan misir iuwih tur abarayah hibuwih hitit ufunamaim mar kafai hibat.
44005035	Naatu imaibo Kaniser iuwih eo, “Taituwau Israel, abisa iti orot isah kwayayakitifuw mata toniwa’an gewas kwananotabo kwanasinaf.
44005036	Kwananot iti boro’omo Theudas tit orot gagamin ta rouw eorereb naatu oro’orot etei 400 na’atube hikofan, Baise hi’a’asabun ana veya ana bai’ufununayah etei hitaragiy nanabin hin, naatu ana kou’ay re rumoromorob sawar.
44005037	Nati ufunamaim Judas Galilee orot sabuw hibiyab ana veya tit, sabuw bow kou’ay busuruf, baise i auman hi’asabun naatu ana bai’ufununayah hitaragiy nanabin hin.
44005038	Isan imih abisa iti boun emamatar isan au’uwi, iti orot kwaihamiyih, naatu kwa’uwih ten, anayabin orot ana notane hinayakitifuw hinasisinaf na’at boro nasawar.
44005039	Baise Godane nanan na’at, kwa men karam boro kwana’otanih, kwa boro taiyuw God bairi kwanabiyow kwana’itin.” Iti na’atube eo dogoroh ikitabir.
44005040	Tur Abarayah hi’afih hirun naatu hirouw. Imaibo tur fokarin maiyow hi’uwih naatu hiofafarih Jesu wabin men hinao rerereb, naatu hi’uwih hai au ubar hin.
44005041	Tur Abarayah Kaniser hihamiyih hitit naatu ereyasisir auman hin, anayabin Jesu wabinamaim hibi’akir i igewasin kwanekwan.
44005042	Mar etei Tafaror Baremaim naatu hai baremaim sabuw hibi’obaiyih naatu tur gewasin Jesu Keriso isan sabuw hai tur hi’o’owen.
44006001	Nati ana veya’amaim bai’ufununayah hai kou’ay busuruf ra’at. Naatu Jew sabuw iyab Greek tur hio yah so’ar himisir Jew sabuw iyab Hebrew tur hio higam hi’uwih. Anayabin veya ta’ita’imon hai faramamaim kwafukwafur baibin i hikukusairih.
44006002	Imih tur abarayah nah 12 hi’af bai’ufununayah sabuw etei’imak hiru’ay naatu hi’uwih hio, “Aki God ana tur anihamiy sabuw ana bituw ana itinin aki isai men igewasin.
44006003	Isan imih taitu, wanawanamaim orot nah seven iyab kwa’i’itih i God Anunin iwansumih tema’am naatu not wairafih i kwanarubinih, saise aki iti bowabow i anitih sabuw hinakaifih.
44006004	Naatu aki baise ai veya tutufin etei yoyoban anitin naatu tur ana binan.”
44006005	Tur Abarayah iti not hibai hititit isan kou’ay tutufin etei hiyasisir naatu Stephen hirubin, orot baitumatumayan naatu Anun Kakafiyin ana way, Philip, Prokorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas auman hirubinih, naatu Nicolaus Antioch orot marasika dogoron hikitabir Jew hai kwafirenamaim run ma’am auman hirubin.
44006006	Orot nah seven hibow hina tur abarayah nahimaim hitit isah hiyoyoban sawar naatu umah ta’ita’imon tafahimaim hiyara’aten.
44006007	Naatu God ana tur tuw ra’at. Jerusalem wanawanan sabuw moumurih na’in hitumatum naatu bai’ufununayah hai kou’ay wanawanan hirun kou’ay ra’at, naatu firis oro’orot auman baitumatum hibai.
44006008	Stephen God ana baigegewasin naatu ana fair gagamin maiyow itin, ina’inanen gagamih fokarih sabuw wanawanahimaim ma sinaf.
44006009	Baise orot iyab Roufamen ana Kou’ay barane himisir Stephen bairi higam. (Roufamen Kou’ay bar i wabih). Nati i Jew sabuw Sairini’ine naatu Alexandria’ane hinan, na’atube Jew afa Silisia naatu Asia wanawanahine hina.
44006010	Baise God Anunin Stephen baibais itin ukwarin rerekab tur eo i men karam boro fanan hitiya’afut.
44006011	Sabuw afa wa’iwa’iramaim hitubunih naatu awah hiore hitit hio, “Stephen, Moses isan naatu God isan baigigimen tur eo aki anonowar!”
44006012	Iti na’atube hio, sabuw, regaregah ai’in, naatu Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah yah hiora’ah, Stephen hibai hifatum hibai hina Kaniser nahimaim hitit.
44006013	Sabuw afa baifufuwenayah hibow hina Stephen isan hifufuwen hio, “Iti orot i mar etei ata Bar Kakafiyin isan naatu Moses ana ofafar isan eo ibigigim.”
44006014	Naatu iban maiye iti na’atube eo aki anowar, “Jesu Nazareth mowan i boro iti bar kakafiyin nagurus nare naatu ata binanakwar Moses ya’abun rena tabaib boro nab nabotabir!”
44006015	Iyabowat nati Kaniser ana kou’ay wanawanan hima Stephen hi’itin kweyakweyar, yumatan botabir tounamatar ana yumatabe matar hi’itin.
44007001	Imaibo Firis Gagamin Stephen ibatiy, “Tur iti i anababatun o isa teo?”
44007002	Stephen iya’afut eo, “Taitu tuwai’inah naatu tamai’inah anao kwananowar! Ata agir Abraham ufibo na Haram imaim ma, baise wan Mesopotamia ma’am ana veya’amaim Marakaw ana God isan irerereb eo.
44007003	‘A tafaram naatu taituwa inihamiyih inan tafaram ayu ana bi’obaiyi imaim inama.’
44007004	Imih Kaldia tafaram ihamiy naatu na Haram imaim ma. Tamah momorob ufunamaim God nawiy na me tafaram iti bitin boun kwa iti kwama’am.
44007005	God men abisa ta Abraham nowanamih itin naatu men kafa’imo me kikimin eafuw nowanamih itin. Baise God eomatan tafaram tutufin etei boro nowanamih nab naatu wawawan uf hinatutufuw boro hinab. Nati ana veya’amaim Abraham i aurin kek en ma’am God eomatan.
44007006	Naatu God iti na’atube eo, ‘O wawaw i boro nah toumanih hai tafaramamaim hinama, nati’imaim boro nah toumanih hai fair babanamaim hinama bowabow fokarin maiyow hinabow, hinarouw hini’a’afiyih kwamur etei 400 na’atube nasawar.’
44007007	Baise God iuwih eo, ‘Ayu nati tafaram hinabuwi babahimaim kwanama kwanabowabow boro baimakiy anitih. Nati ufunamaim boro tafaram kwanihamiy kwanatit efan iti’imaim ayu kwanakwafiru.
44007008	Imaibo God ar afu’afuw ana obaibasit Abraham itin ina’inanen na’atube kaif. Imih Abraham natun Isaac tufuw fur ta’imon sasawar ufunamaim ana ar kanabin e’afuw. Nati ufunamaim Isaac natun Jacob ana ar kanabin e’afuw naatu Jacob natunatun 12 it uwatanah wabih gagamin auman hai ar kanabih e’afuw.
44007009	Baise uwatanah wabih gagamin Joseph isan hibobowen akir wairafin na’atube hitih hitubun hibai hin Egypt imaim ma. Baise God i mar etei biyanamaim ma’am.
44007010	Naatu ana yababan ta ta wanawanamaim bibais. Veya ta Joseph Egypt hai aiwob nanamaim titit ana veya aiwob orot Joseph i’itin yan bai naatu ana kakaf isan ma, anayabin God ukwar rerekab Joseph itin. Imih aiwob orot Joseph bai ana gawanamih yai, naatu aiwob ana bar gagamin wanawanan auman kaifin isan ana fair itin.”
44007011	“Nati ana veya’amaim baimar kakafin na, Egypt naatu Canaan tafaram wanawanan yababan gagamin na’in matar, naatu it uwatanah bayumih hi’akir.
44007012	Egyptamaim bay ma’am ana tur Jacob nonowar ana veya uwatanah hai nanawan wantoro’ot imaim hin.
44007013	Hai nanawan bairou’abin ana veya Joseph taiyuwin botait irerereb tuwahinah hai tur eowen, naatu Pharaoh nati’imaim Joseph ana nibur isah so’ob.
44007014	Nati ufunamaim Joseph tamah Jacob isan, naatu tamah ana nibur isah tur iyafar, nah etei 75 na’atube.
44007015	Imaibo Jacob rena Egypt tit, nati’imaim i natunatun bairi himorob, it uwatanah.
44007016	Naatu biyah i hibow himatabir maiye tafaram wabin Shekem rahamaim hiya, nati me i Abraham orot Hamor natunatun biyahine tubun.
44007017	“God ana omatanen Abraham eo’omatan na baiturobe isan ana veya na kabom, naatu ata sabuw Egypt hima’am busuruf ra’at tafaram awan karatan.
44007018	Imaibo aiwob orot ta Joseph men susu’ub i busuruf Egypt isan i’aiwob.
44007019	Ata a’agir ifufuwih, biyababan kakafin anababatun itih, eokikinih hai kek sosof hisrouwen hi’in himorob.
44007020	“Nati ana veya’amaim Moses tufuw, kek ana itinin gewasin maiyow. Baremaim hinah tamah hibunwa’ir ma sumar etei tounu na’atube sawar.
44007021	Imaibo barene hibotait titit ana veya, Pharaoh natun babitai natunamih bai ituw ra’at yen orot matar.
44007022	Egypt ana ukwar rerekab etei Moses hi’obaiy so’ob, naatu ana tur ana sinafumaim eo sisinaf etei i fairih.
44007023	“Moses ana kwamur etei 40 na’atube baib ana maramaim ana not bogaigiwas tit ana sabuw Israel inananawanih.
44007024	Tit inan Egypt orot ta Israel orot boborabirab itin, basit na ibais wasfafar naatu anasa bow Egypt orot rab morob.
44007025	Moses not eo, ‘God ana baibais ayu wanawana’umaim esisinaf au sabuw boro hina’itin hinaso’ob, baise men hi’itinimih.’
44007026	Marto Israel orot rou’ab hairi hibiyow itih, basit na fafar naatu iuwih, ‘Kwa airi i ain uf, aisim taiyuw kwabiyow?’
44007027	Baise orot ta biwa’an kakafene Moses rukouw eo, ‘O aki bainabatani naatu baibabatiyi isan yait rubini?’
44007028	‘O kukokok ayu ina’asbunu fai Egypt orot ia’asabun na’atube?’
44007029	Moses iti tur nonowar ana veya Egypt ihamiy bihir in tafaram wabin Midian imaim ma, nati’imaim touman orot na’atube ma’am natunatun orot rou’ab hitufuw.
44007030	Kwamur 40 sasawar ufunamaim oyaw Sinai sisibinamaim arar yan tounamatar Moses isan irerereb wairaf na’atube wa’ab wanawanan to’ab.
44007031	Moses iti wairaf to’ab i’itin ana veya ana kasiy ra’at, naatu itinbunai isan na biyubin auman Regah fanan nowar;
44007032	‘Ayu i o uwatanah hai God, Abraham ana God, Isaac, naatu Jacob.’ Moses yan wanawanan birubir fafar an uman hioror naatu men karam boro tanuw ta’itin.
44007033	Imaibo Regah eo, ‘A ana sumasum kubosair anayabin iti kamar i kakafiyin yan kubatabat.
44007034	Ayu au sabuw Egypt imaim bai’akir kakafin maiyow hibaib aitih, naatu hitef hirererey anowar, imih rufamih botaitih isan are ana. O kuna aiyafari kumatabir maiye au Egypt.’
44007035	“Moses i orot ta’imon Israel sabuw hikwahir hiu, ‘O yait rubini aki bainabatani naatu baibatiyi isan?’ Nati orot ta’imon sabuw bainabatanih naatu rufamih botaitih isan God taiyuwin ana tounamatar iyafar na wa’ab toto’abamaim irerereb Moses fair itin.
44007036	Sabuw nawiyih Egypt hihamiy hitit, naatu ina’inan men hi’i’itah efa’efanin Egyptamaim, Red Sea imaim, naatu kwamur 40 arar yanamaim iwa’an hi’itah.
44007037	“Iti orot Moses i boun Israel sabuw hai tur eowen, ‘God boro dinab orot kwa wanawananamaim a orot ta niyafar nan, ayu biyafaru na’atube.’
44007038	Iti orot Moses Israel sabuw bairi kou’ay hibai arar yanamaim hibat naatu ata a’agir bairi Sinai oyawemaim tounamatar tur yawasin bai re itin naatu ya’abun it isat rena.
44007039	Baise it ata a’agir fanan men hibosiyasiyar, naatu fanan hikwahir hikokok i mi’itube hitamatabir maiye hitan Egypt hitatit.
44007040	Imih Aaron hiu, ‘Aki akokok god ta kusinaf au nai i’iyon ebonawiyi. Moses Egyptane nawiyi atitit men aso’ob abisa isan matar.’
44007041	Nati ana veya’amaim aibat ta cow natun ana yumatabe hibu’ur. Naatu sibor hibow hina sawar i umahimaim hisinaf mamatar ana sibor hiyai naatu ana hiyuw hibow hiyasisir.
44007042	Baise God mafutih, naatu mar ana sawar kwafirih isan ibasit. Dinab orot hai Bukamaim hikikirum na iturobe, ‘Kwa iti bobaituw kwarouw sibor kwaya’ayaban ayu isou? kwamur 40 arar yan kwama’am ana veya Israel sabuw,
44007043	Kwa i god Moloch ana sis kwa’abar kwareremor, naatu daman Rephan ayubin ana god umamaim aibat kwatar kwakwakwafir. Isan imih ayu boro aniyafari kwanan Babilon ufunane kwanama.’
44007044	“Ata a’agir God ana sis arar yanamaim hiyai hima’am i God ana itinin nati’imaim bairi hima’am. Nati sis i God mi’itube Moses iu bi’obaiy na’atube naatu God yayakitifuw na’atube hiwowab.
44007045	Nati ufunamaim, ata a’agir sis tamahinah biyahine nan hibai hi’abar Joshua babanamaim bonawiyih bairi hirun sabuw afa hai tafaram God nunih hititit i hai tafaram hibai. Naatu nati sis i ma’am David ana veya’amaim tit.
44007046	David ana baibais gagamin na’in God biyanane bai, imih ifefeyan bar tawowab. Jacob ana God isan
44007047	baise iti bar i Solomon wowab.
44007048	“Baise Auyomtoro’ot ana God i men orot bar tewowowabimaim ema’ama’amih, dinab orot eo kikirum na’atube.
44007049	‘Mar i ayu au urama’ama, naatu kamar i ayu au ana baibiyarir. Regah eo, Abi bar boro ayu isou kwanawowab? Efan i boro menamaim aniyarir?
44007050	Sawar iti kwanotanot men ayu asinaf himatar?’
44007051	“Kwa i dogor fokarih naatu dogor wanawanan gugumin naatu tain gugurih God ana tur men kwanonowar! Kwa i a’a’agir ah kwabat, mar etei Anun Kakafiyin kwarurukouw!
44007052	Kwa a’agir dinab orot marasika hima’am etei hirouw hi’a’akirih, nati dinab oro’orot i marasika iti orot gewasin nan isan hikurereb. Baise kwa uwatanah hirouw himorob, naatu boun kwa iti orot gewasin nan baban kwao kwarab morob.
44007053	Kwa i God ana ofafar tounamatar hiyafar re’er kwabai, baise men kwabobosiyasiyar!”
44007054	Kaniser hima Stephen eo hinonowar yah so’ar gagamat bufutih hikarmusiyan himisir
44007055	Baise Stephen God Anun Kakafiyin biyan etei karatan batabat au mar nuwra’at God ana marakaw itin naatu Jesu sisibin asukwafune batabat itin.
44007056	Basit eo, “Kwanuw ra’at! Ayu mar ana etawan botawiy Orot Natun God ana asukwafune bat ai’itin!”
44007057	Fanah aumetawat hiwow tainih higibud, imaibo etei au ta’imon hinunuw hibai
44007058	hitain hitit bar merar gagamin ufunane hitaiy re kabayamaim hirab, orot iyab baifuwenamaim sif hirurubon, hai faifuw nati orot boubun wabin Saul anamaim hiya.
44007059	Kabayamaim hibat hirabirab auman Stephen Regah isan ifefeyan eo “Regah Jesu ayubu kubai!”
44007060	Sun yowen fanan aumetawat erererey auman i wow eo, “Regah abisa ayu isou tisisinaf hai
44008001	Stephen hi’asabun momorob isan Saul auman isaito. Nati ana veya’amaim ekaleisia Jerusalem wanawananamaim isah bai’akir kakafin matar, naatu bai’ufununayah etei nanabin hibihir. Afa au Judea na’at hibihir naatu afa au Samaria na’at hibihir. Baise tur abarayah akisihimo Jerusalem hima.
44008002	Kwafirenayah sabuw afa Stephen hiyai naatu isan hiyababan rerey gagamin maiyow hima hirererey.
44008003	Naatu Saul ekaleisia gurusin busuruf bar awan awan run tit orot babin bow rouw fatum iteten in dibur baremaim yaririyen.
44008004	Iyab hitagey nanabin hititit i God ana tur hibinan auman hinan.
