44008005	Philip re in Samaria bar merar gagaminamaim Keriso ana tur binan in.
44008006	Philip eo sabuw hinonowar naatu ina’inanen sinaf hi’i’itan etei hina hiyubin ana tur nowar isan.
44008007	Sabuw moumurih maiyow wanawanahimaim afiy kakafih tarsumih hima’am erefanah auman hititit, naatu ah umah kafikafirih naatu ah umah murumurubih moumurih maiyow auman iyayawasih
44008008	Imih nati bar meraramaim yasisir gagamin maiyow tafair tit.
44008009	Baise nati bar meraramaim i orot ta wabin Simon ma farum eafusar farum Samaria orot babin bibibiruwih, naatu taiyuwin wabin bora’ara’ah orot gagamin rouw eo.
44008010	Naatu sabuw etei nati bar merar hima’am, orot kikimin yen in orot gagamin etei fanan akisin hinonowar hio, “Iti orot i God ana fair bai, wabin ‘Fair Gagamih.’”
44008011	Sabuw etei hibi’ufunun anayabin manin maiyow ana farumamaim bibibiruwih.
44008012	Baise ana maramaim Philip na tur gewasin God ana aiwob isan naatu Jesu Keriso ana fair isan binan hinonowar, orot babin etei hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai.
44008013	Simon taiyuwin auman itumatum naatu bapataito bai misir Philip mi’itube inan na’atube i’ufunun hairi hin naatu ina’inan gagamih maiyow himamatar i’itah isan ifofofor morob.
44008014	Tur Abarayah Jerusalem hima’am Samaria sabuw God ana tur hibasit hibaib tur hinowar, Peter John hairi hiyafarih isah hin.
44008015	Hin hititit ana veya isah hiyoyoban, saise Anun Kakafiyin hitab.
44008016	Anayabin Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito hibaib ana veya, Anun Kakafiyin men yait ta tafanamaim yenamih.
44008017	Imaibo Peter John hairi umah tafah hiyara’aten isah hiyoyoban naatu Anun Kakafiyinane hibai.
44008018	Sabuw tafah umah hiyara’aten Anun Kakafiyin re hibaib Simon i’itin ana veya, kabay baih tur abarayah itih naatu
44008019	eo, “Ayu auman akokok nati fair ayu kwanitu, saise sabuw iyabowat tafah ayayara’aten i auman Anun Kakafiyin hinab.”
44008020	Baise Peter iya’afut eo “O akabay airi mi’itube kwatamorob, anayabin o kunotanot God ana siwar i boro kabayamaim inatubun.
44008021	O a bowabow ta men aki biyai’imaim ema’am, anayabin o dogor God nanamaim i men mutufurinamih.
44008022	Iti not kakafihine dogor kwikitabir naatu Regah isan kuyoyoban ta’itin a not kakafin nati dogoromaim ema’am boro nanotawiy.
44008023	Anayabin ayu ai’iti o dogor wanawanan i bahiy iwansumi mata ebifefek naatu bowabow kakafin ana dibur irun kuma’am.”
44008024	Imaibo Simon iyafutih eo, “Regah isan kwayoyoban wainu, saise sawar iti na’atube men ta isou namataramih.”
44008025	Regah ana yawas hio’orereb naatu ana tur hibibinan ufunamaim, Peter John hairi himatabir maiye au Jerusalem hiyey ana veya, Samaria bar merar ta ta wanawanahimaim tur gewasin hibinan auman hin.
44008026	Imaibo God ana tounamatar Philip iu, “A ef asukwafune inab, arar yan ana ef Jerusalemane re in Gaza titit iwat inab inare inan.”
44008027	Imih Philip misir ef nati butitiy inan founamaim Ethiopia orot gagamin hairi hitar. Iti orot i Ethiopia hai queen ana kabay etei ana nutitiyenayan gagamin, aiwob babin ana aiwob wabin i Kandis. Iti orot gagamin yena Jerusalem God kwafir sawar,
44008028	me yan ana wa bai ana ubar matabir maiye re’er, ef yanamaim dinab orot Isaiah ana buk rusasar ma iyab auman inan.
44008029	Naatu Anun Kakafiyin Philip iu, “Kwen ni’i wa sisibinamaim kwiyubin.”
44008030	Philip imaibo nunuw yen na iyubin, tainin i’abar dinab orot Isaiah ana tur biyab nowar, naatu Philip orot ibatiy, “Nati buk kubiyab anayabin iso’ob?”
44008031	Orot iya’afut eo, “Mi’itube boro anaso’ob? Orot ta isou nakubuna boro anaso’ob?” Naatu Philip ifefeyan yen sisibin mare.
44008032	Orot gagamin i buk firorow wanawanan ana hanef iti rusasar ma biyab. ‘Bobaituw sheep na’atube beyahinamih hibai hin, sheep natun lamb na’atube bunibunin hi’a’afuw men fanan sib itkwarakwar.
44008033	Taiyuwin yare, ma gewas ana baitafen tutur isan men hinuwet gewas, aurin kek en morob. Anayabin i ana yawas tafaramamaim i na yomanin tit.’
44008034	Naatu Ethiopia orot Philip ibatiy, “Ku’o anowar, yait isan iti dinab orot eo? I taiyuwin isan, ai orot babin ta isan?”
44008035	Imaibo Philip Buk ana hanef menamaim busuruf biyab imaim tur gewasin Jesu isan ana tur eowen.
44008036	Ef yan hire hinan auman hina harew soson ta’amaim hitit naatu orot gagamin eo, “Harew iti, tare bapataito kwitu.”
44008037	Philip iya’afut eo, “O karam boro bapataito inab, dogor tutufin etei inabitumatum na’at.” Iya’afut eo, “Ayu abitumatum Jesu Keriso i God Natun. *
44008038	Orot gagamin ana wa rowenatan naatu Philip hairi hire hin harew yan hire nati’imaim Philip orot bapataito itin.
44008039	Harewane hiyeye ana maramaim, Regah Anunin Philip bora’ah. Orot gagamin men itin maiye, baise ereyasisir auman ana ef rura’ah maiye remor in.
44008040	Nati ana veya’amaim Philip i Azotus imaim rouwatait, naatu in Caesarea tit, efamaim inan bar awan, awan run tit tur gewasin binan auman remor in.”
44009001	Baise Saul i Regah ana bai’ufununayah rouw morob isan menan bi’arakok. Imih na firis ukwarih biyah tit, fef tab auman tan Damaskas wanawanan Kou’ay Bar ta ta hai ukwarih hitaso’ob isan
44009002	ifefeyan, saise sabuw iyab Regah ana efamaim hima’ama orot o babin etei tafatumih tabow tan Jerusalem dibur taya.
44009003	Nati isan au Damaskas yen inan, na bar merar biyubin auman naniyan meyemeye marakaw marane namanamarabe bow sisibin roun roun etei e’arasib re,
44009004	naatu me yan re rab, orot fanan nowar wabin su’ub eo “Saul, Saul aisim ayu irabu kubia’akiru?”
44009005	Saul ibatiy, “Regah o yait?” Orot fanan tit maiye iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Jesu o irabu kubia’akiru.
44009006	Baise kumisir kwen bar merar gagamin kutit, nati’imaim boro hinao inanowar abisa boro inasinaf.”
44009007	Orot afa Saul bairi hinan hai tur sawar hinutanub hibat orot fanan hinowar, baise men yait ta ana yumat hi’itin.
44009008	Saul me yan inu’in misir matan nuw, baise matan isukway men abisa ta itin, basit uman hibai hi’unawiy hin Damaskas hitit.
44009009	Veya tounu na’atube matan ifim ma. Nati ana maramaim men kafa’imo bay ta eaan naatu harew tom.
44009010	Baitumatumayan orot ta wabin Ananias Damaskas ma’am matan hibora’ah tainin tayowan Regah isan eafa’af fanan nowar, “Ananias!” Ananias iya’afut eo “Regah ayu iti.”
44009011	Regah eo, “Inabogaigiwas inan ef gagamin wabin mutufor imaim inatit naatu Judas ana baremaim Tarsus orot wabin Saul isan inibatiyih, i ma eyoyoyoban.
44009012	Naatu Saul matan hibora’ah orot ta wabin Ananias itin narun umanamaim matan butubun nuwanuw maiyen itin.”
44009013	Ananias iya’afut eo, “Regah sabuw moumurih na’in nati orot isan hio anowar, sawar kakafih maiyow o a sabuw Jerusalem hima’am isah sinaf.
44009014	Naatu boun i firis ukwarih biyahine fair bai na iti Damaskas tit sabuw iyab o tekwakwafiri bow fatumen isan.”
44009015	Baise Regah iu, “O i boro inan anayabin ayu nati orot arubin isou nabowamih, wabu nab natit Ufun Sabuw, aiwob sabuw, naatu Israel sabuw wanawanahimaim nabosemor.
44009016	Naatu ayu taiyuwu boro ani’obaiy bai’akir gagamin na’in ayu wabu isan ni’akir.”
44009017	Basit Ananias misir in bar efan Regah eo’omaim tit naatu bar wanawanan run, uman Saul tafanamaim yara’ah eo, “Saul ayu taiu Regah Keriso efamaim o isa birerereb i ayu iyunu anan o mata nigewasin inanuw maiye, naatu Anun Kakafiyin niwani.
44009018	Naniyan meyemeye matan siy kanabinin na’atube ma’am hea’obow re, matan kubunai nuw maiye, naatu misir re bapataito bai.
44009019	Bay eaa ufunamaim ana fair matabir maiye bai. Veya bai’ab na’atube Saul bai’ufununayah bairi Damaskas hima.
44009020	Saul misir mutufor in Kou’ay Bar run busuruf Jesu isan binan eo, “Jesu i turobe God Natun.”
44009021	Sabuw etei hinowar hifofofor naatu hibabatiyih hio, “Orotoban iti Jerusalemamaim sabuw iyab Jesu wabinamaim hikwakwafir rouw himorob? Naatu iti’imaim nan ana’an i nati sawar ta’imon isan na, sabuw fatum bow na firis gagamin baitihimih?”
44009022	Baise Saul binan inan ana fair ra’at, Jew sabuw iyab Damaskas hima’am hai not botabir naatu i’obiyih Jesu i anababatun Keriso, * iti na’at eo sabuw tur omih hikasiy.
44009023	Fur bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Jew sabuw hiru’ay Saul morob isan hiyakitifuw.
44009024	Baise abisa sinafumih hiyayakitifuw i hio nowar, fai mar i etawan awan hima’afut hima’am tatitit hita’asabunimih.
44009025	Baise gugumin ta ana bai’ufununayah Saul kaifet wanawananamaim hiwan fur ana sou ta’amaim hiruru re.
44009026	Saul na Jerusalem tit sinaftobon bai’ufununayah bairi baita’imonin isan. Baise bai’ufununayah i Saul isan hai bir ra’at, anayabin men hibitumatum Saul i turobe baitumatumayan ta matar ai en.
44009027	Imaibo Barnabas na ibais bai in Tur Abarayah biyah tit, kubuna mi’itube efamaim Regah itin naatu Regah eo nowar. Ana binan fairin Jesu wabinamaim auman eo hinowar.
44009028	Naatu hibai bairi hima Jerusalem ana uman men sanet etei remor Regah wabinamaim binan.
44009029	Jew sabuw iyab Greek tur hio bairi hi’o hibas naatu rabin morob isan hiyakitifuw.
44009030	Baise baitumatumayah afa tur hinowar basit, Saul hibai hire Caesarea hitit naatu au Tarsus hiyafar in.
44009031	Imaibo ekaleisia sabuw Judea, Galilee naatu Samaria wanawanahimaim etei tufuwamaim hima hiyasisir. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin ana baibaisamaim fair hibai naatu hai kou’ay busuruf wowab ra’at yen, Regah nanamaim kakaf auman hima.
44009032	Peter efan ta ta etei run tit ana sabuw itih remor inan, veya ta God ana sabuw iyab Lydda bar merar gagamin hima’ama bainanawanihimih in.
44009033	Nati’imaim orot ta wabin Aeneas, an uman murubin bai’etaw en gem yan inu’in kwamur etei eight sawar.
44009034	Basit Peter isan eo, “Aeneas Jesu Keriso o ebiyawasi kumisir, a ir kunu ku’abar.” Orot mar ta’imonamo misir.
44009035	Sabuw etei Lydda naatu Sharon wanawanan hima’am abisa matar hi’i’itin etei hitumatum naatu Regah isan hitatabir.
44009036	Joppa bar meraramaim babin ta wabin Tabitha, Greek fanahimaim i Dorcas. Iti babin i baitumatumayan ta mar etei gewasin esisinaf naatu yababan wairafih ebibaisih.
44009037	Nati ana veya’amaim sawow bai naatu morob biyan hisouw hibai hiyen bar tafantoro’ot hi’inuw.
44009038	Joppa na Lydda titit i men ef yok, imih bai’ufununayah Joppa hima’am Peter na Lydda’amaim titit ana tur hinowar. Basit orot rou’ab hiyafarih hin hifefeyan hio, “Are Peter akokok saise inan biyai inatit, men inarubir.”
44009039	Basit Peter bobuna misir bairi hin, hina hitit hiyen bar awan yate tafan imaim hirun. Naatu kwafukwafur baibin etei hai faifuw Dorcas yawasin ma’am ana veya sakir bitih auman hibow hina hi’obaibiy hirerey auman hirun.
44009040	Peter sabuw etei iuwih ufun hitit, i sun yowen yoyoban imaibo eo, “Tabitha kumisir!” Babin matan nuw naatu nura’at Peter i’itin ana maramaim misir mare ma.
44009041	Peter eof babin bai ibais misir bat, imaibo baitumatumayah naatu kwafukwafur isah eaf hina yawasin batabat i’obaiyih hi’itin.
44009042	Tur tasasar tit Joppa sabuw etei hinowar naatu moumurih na’in Regah hitumitum.
44009043	Peter veya moumurih na’in Joppa’amaim orot wabin Simon ana baremaim hairi hima.
44010001	Caesarea imaim orot wabin Cornelius Rome baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin baiyow ana kou’ay wabin Italian Regiment.
44010002	Cornelius i God ana orot ta, i ana nibur tutufin etei God hikwakwafir, baibais gagamin maiyow yababan wairafih bitih, naatu mar etei God isan yoyoyoban.
44010003	Veya ta rabirab three korok na’atube matan hibora’ah God ana tounamatar na run wabin su’ub eo, “Cornelius!”
44010004	Cornelius matan takiyat itinkikin erebirubir auman eo, “Regah abisa kukokok?” Tounamatar iya’afut eo, “God ayoyoban naatu a siwar yababan sabuw ibitih Regah nanamaim hitit itin nuhin kusib.
44010005	Imih boun orot afa iniyafarih hinan Joppa orot Simon, wabin ta Peter, i hinanawiy bairi hinan.
44010006	Simon bobaituw kanabihimaim sawar yumatah ta ta sakirayan i ana baremaim bairi tema’am, ana bar tor rewan ebatabat.”
44010007	Basit tounamatar hairi hio inan ufut, Cornelius ana bowayah orot rou’ab naatu baiyowayah orot ta’imon e’af ayuwih. Iti baiyowayan orot auman i God ana orot, Cornelius biyan ana tafafarayan orot.
44010008	Sawar etei himamatar na’atube hai tur eowen, basit iyafarih hin Joppa hitit.
44010009	Mar to orot efamaim hina Joppa hibiyubin auman, Peter auyit yen in bar tafan yoyoban isan.
44010010	Basit bayumih morob ana kok i bay taa, bay hibogaigiwas bifotamih i matan taratan.
44010011	Mar botawiy naatu sawar ta rar gagamin na’atube umasusun kwafe’en hikuhamihamiy re me yan titit itin.
44010012	Nati wanawanan for yumatah ta ta, kok uma’ar, gabunam, naatu kutor mamu.
44010013	Orot fanan nowar eo, “Peter kumisir iti sawar kurouw ku’aa.”
44010014	Baise Peter iya’afut eo, “Men karam Regah, ayu men kafai sawar iti na’atube karitanih eregubagub auman aa’umih.”
44010015	Orot fanan iban bairou’abin e’af maiye, “Sawar abisa God eorereb gewasin rarouw men o a notamaim kakafin inarouw inao.”
44010016	Sawar iti na’atube mar tounu matar, imaibo naniyan meyemeye sawar matabir maiye yen mar run.
44010017	Peter matan hibora’ah sawar iti i’itin anayabin so’ob isan kasiy ma binotanot, orot Cornelius iyafarih hinan bar hitita’ur hina fur awan hibat.
44010018	Hi’afariy hibatiyih hio, “Orot wabin Simon Peter iti a baremaim ema’am?”
44010019	Peter matan hibobora’ah isan boro’ika ma binotanot, Anun Kakafiyin iu eo, “Simon, orot nah tounu o tenunuwihi.
44010020	Imih kumisir kura’iy bar baban, men a inakutan baise bairi kwanan, anayabin ayu aiyafarih hina.”
44010021	Peter misir ra’iy naatu iuwih eo, “Ayu orotoban iti kwa ayu kwanunuwuhu, kwa a’an aisim kwana?”
44010022	Hiya’afut hio, “Aki i baiyowayan orot ukwarin wabin Cornelius iyafari ana. Iti orot ana yawas i gewasin, naatu God ebibiruw, Jew sabuw etei iti orot i tekakakafiy. Tounamatar kakafiyin iu, o tifefeyani itan ana bar, saise o abisa itao’o i tanowar isan.”
44010023	Basit Peter nah tounu buwih bar hirun bairi fai ta’imon hi’in. Mar to Peter ana orot bairi himisir naatu baitumatumayah afa Joppa’ane auman hiturih bairi hin.
44010024	Veya baitonin hina Caesarea hitit. Cornelius i ma matan ef i’itin, taintuwan afa e’af ayuwih hina ana baremaim bairi hima Peter hikakaif.
44010025	Peter na bar rur ana maramaim, Cornelius nanamaim sun yowen kwafir re.
44010026	Baise Peter imisiruw eo, “Kumisir ayu i orot o na’atube.”
44010027	Peter tur busuruf auman Cornelius hairi hirun hin bar wanawanan hitit naatu sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in hima’am kouh yen.
44010028	Iuwih eo, “Kwa etei kwaso’ob Jew hai ofafar men ebibasit boro Ufun Sabuw atinanawani bairi tatitayo’ay. Baise God i’obaiyu aitin ayu men orot ta biyan karitanin o gubagub anarouw anao.
44010029	Imih ayu isou tur kwabiyafar, ayu men erekwahir auman anamih. Ayu kwa abibatiy, aisim ayu isou tur kwaiyafar ana?”
44010030	Cornelius iya’afut eo, “Veya kwafe’en na’atube sawaraka, veya three korok na’atube rabirab au baremaim ayoyoyoban, naniyan meyemeye orot ana faifuw kwes nau’umaim bat eo,
44010031	‘Cornelius, ayoyoban God nowar naatu a siwar sabuw yababan wairafih ibitih imaim ana not kusib.
44010032	‘Orot ta kwiyafar en Joppa imaim orot wabin Simon wabin ta Peter i Simon bobaituw kanabihimaim sawar ta ta sakirayan ana bar tor rewanamaim ema’am biyan etit.’
44010033	Imih o isa tur saisewat aiyafar, naatu gewasin maiyow o ina itit, naatu aki etei God nanamaim Regah sawar etei eo biyuni nowaramih ama akakaif.”
44010034	Imaibo Peter busuruf binan eo, “Ayu bounabo aso’ob, God men orot babin ta’imon itin yan ebaibimih.
44010035	Baise orot menan ta ta iyab i tibibiruw naatu abisa gewasin tisisinaf.
44010036	Tur God iyafar na Israel biyah titit i etei kwaso’ob, iti tur gewasin i tufuw Jesu Keriso wanawanamaim ema’am. It etei ata Regah.
44010037	Naatu kwaso’ob sawar abisa Judea wanawanan mamatar, John bapataito isan bibinan ufunamaim iti sawar i Galilee imaim busuruf.
44010038	Mi’itube Anun Kakafiyinamaim God Jesu Nazareth matuwan tafan eof nowah naatu fair tafan bisuwai i kwaso’ob. Naatu ana bowabow mi’itube run tit bow yawas gewasin sinaf, sabuw iyab afiy hai fairamaim hima’am etei biyawasih auman i kwaso’ob, anayabin God i hairi hima’am.
44010039	Sawar abisa Jew hai me yan naatu Jerusalemamaim sisinaf etei i aki a’itah sif arurubon. Naatu onaf afe’enamaim hikubar momorob auman i aki aso’ob.
44010040	Baise veya tounu ufunamaim God morobone bora’ah maiye naatu iwa’an tit irerereb sabuw hi’itin.
44010041	Men sabuw etei hi’itin, baise sabuw iyab God rurubinihiwat, nati i aki iyab morobone mimisir maiye ufunamaim bairi a’aa atomatomawat.
44010042	Naatu eobaiyuni tur gewasin sabuw etei isah ana binan hai tur ana’owen Jesu i God Rubin sabuw yawayawasih naatu murumurubih baibabatiyih isan.
44010043	Dinab orot etei isan hibinan hio sabuw iyab i wabinamaim hinabitumatum boro hai bowabow kakafih nanotawiyen.”
44010044	Peter iti na’atube bat eo inan wanawanan Anun Kakafiyin ra’iy sabuw iyab hima tur hinonowar tar gabuwih.
44010045	Jew baitumatumayah afa Peter bairi Joppa’ane hinan hifofofor men kafaita. God ana usar Anun Kakafiyin Ufun Sabuw auman tafahimaim isuwai re’ere isan.
44010046	Naatu sabuw menah botabir tur ta ta hio God hibora’ara’ah. Imaibo Peter eo,
44010047	“Iti sabuw boro yait harewamaim bapataito bain isan na’otanih? Anayabin Anun Kakafiyin it tabaib na’atube i auman hibaika.
44010048	Basit iuwih Jesu Keriso wabinamaim bapataito hibai, naatu Peter veya bai’ab na’atube bairi ma isan hifefeyan nati’imaim bairi hima.
44011001	Tur Abarayah naatu baitumatumayah Judea wanawanan Ufun Sabuw God ana tur hibaib isan tur hinowar.
44011002	Imih Peter yena Jerusalem titit ana veya baitumatumayah hai ar afu’afuw himisir higam hio,
44011003	“O in Ufun Sabuw hai ar mo’oh tutufih bairi kwama kwa’aa kwatomatom iti ina.”
44011004	Naatu Peter busuruf aneika abisa mamatar i kubuna hai tur eowen eo.
44011005	“Veya ta Joppa ama ayoyoyoban ana maramaim matau hibora’ah sawar ta rar gagamin na’atube tainin kwafe’en marane hikuhamihamiy rena sisibu’umaim nutanub.
44011006	Ayu anunuwariy for yumatah ta ta a’itan, uma’ar, kok, uway naatu mamu aitah,
44011007	basit orot ta fanan anowar iuwu eo, ‘Peter kumisir sawar iti kurouw ku’aa.’
44011008	Baise ayu ao, ‘Regah men karam, anayabin bay kakafih naatu gubagub auman men kafa’imo awau’umaim narunamih.’
44011009	Baise orot fanan iban maiye marane eafare eo, ‘Sawar abisa God kurereb gewasin eo, o men kakafin inarouw inao’omih.’
44011010	Sawar iti i mar tounu matar, basit yomaninamaim sawar tutufin etei matabir maiye in mar wanawanan run.
44011011	Nati ana veya’amaim orot tounu Caesarea’ane ayu isou hiyafarih hina bar ama’ama imaim hitit.
44011012	Anun Kakafiyin iuwu bairi kwanan men inakwahir, naatu Joppa’ane taitu nah six hituru bairi an Caesarea atit naatu orot wabin Cornelius ana bar arun.
44011013	Cornelius ana bar wanawanan Tounamatar mi’itube irerereb i’itin i ai tur eowen naatu tounamatar iu, ‘Orot afa iniyunih hinan Joppa orot wabin Simon Peter biyan hinatit.
44011014	Naatu i boro ayawas ana tur nab nan nao kwananowar, naatu nati turamaim o a nibur bairi naatu taituwa afa bairi kwama’am boro yawas kwanab.’
44011015	“Naatu ayu abusuruf ao anan ana maramaim Anun Kakafiyin re targabuwih, anamaim it tatar gabuwit na’atube.
44011016	Imaibo ayu Regah abisa eo i anot, ‘John i harewamaim bapataito it, baise kwa boro Anun Kakafiyinamaim bapataito kwanitih.’
44011017	Imih iti i bebeyan, God siwar ta’imon Ufun Sabuw itih, it Regah Jesu Keriso tabitumitum ana maramaim bitit na’atube. Imih ayu yait God abisa sisinaf boro ata’otan?”
44011018	Iti tur hinonowar ana veya hai gamin sawar, God hibora’ara’ah hio, “Turobe. God Ufun Sabuw auman kakafih baihamiyen yawas bain isan hai ef botawiy itih.”
44011019	Biyababan bai’akir kakafin Stephen hirab momorob ana maramaim matar, baitumatumayah tarbounih hitit nanabin hin. Afa hin Fonisia, Cyprus, naatu Antioch imaim hitit Jew akisihimo isah tur gewasin hifaram.
44011020	Baise baitumatumayah afa Cyprus naatu Sairini hima’am hin Antioch hitit Ufun Sabuw auman isah hibinan tur gewasin Jesu Keriso isan hai tur hi’owen.
44011021	Regah ana fair tafah mara’at hibinan sabuw moumurih na’in hitumatum Regah isan hitatabir.
44011022	Abisa hisisinaf ana tur in Jerusalem ekaleisia hinowar, basit Barnabas hiyafar na Antioch tit.
44011023	Natitit ana maramaim God sabuw mi’itube bigegewasinih itih, basit yan sisir naatu koufair itih eo, dogor tutufin etei kwaniturobe Regah sisibinika kwanama.
44011024	Barnabas i orot gewasin, Anun Kakafiyin biyan karatan naatu ana baitumatum fairin, imih sabuw moumurih na’in bow hina Regah biyan hitit.
44011025	Imaibo Barnabas Saul nuwihinamih in Tarsus tit.
44011026	Nuwih inanan baib ana maramaim nawiy hairi hina Antioch hitit, imaim kwamur ta’imon tutufin ekaleisia nati’imaim bairi hima. Naatu sabuw bai’ufununayah boubuh kou’ay gagamin na’in hi’obaibiyih. Imih bai’ufununayah tafaram Antioch imaim wab iti Kirisiyan teo imaim matar.
44011027	Nati ana veya’amaim dinab orot afa Jerusalemane hina Antioch hitit.
44011028	Naatu dinab orot ta wabin Agabus Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim misir eo, “Baimar kakafin boro’omo tafaram wanawanan namatar.” Iti baimar i Claudius i’aiwob ma’ama ana veya’amaim matar.
44011029	Bai’ufununayah hai not hibogaigiwas i hai mour ana fofonin na’atube tuwahinah Judea hima’am baibaisih isan hio,
44011030	naatu hisinaf. Imaibo Barnabas, Saul hairi umahimaim hiyafar hibai hin ai’in Jerusalem hima’am hitih.
44012001	Nati ana veya’amaim Herod busuruf sabuw afa hina ekalesia ana kou’ayamaim hima’am bow fatum bai’akir kakafin maiyow itih.
44012002	Naatu John tuwah James uwih hibai kaiyomaim hiyi morob.
44012003	Iti na’atube sinaf Jew sabuw hibiyasisir itih, basit, Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw hi’aa ana mar eo Peter hibai hifatum.
44012004	Peter hibai hifafatum ufunamaim hibai hin dibur hiyari’iy, baiyowayah etei 16 hima’uh hima. Pilate kokok i Tar Nowaten hiyuw ufunamaim sabuw etei matahimaim tibatiy isan.
44012005	Imih Peter diburamaim hibotan hima, baise ekaleisia dogoroh tutufin etei God isan hiyoyoban.
44012006	Nati gugumin ta’imon Pilate yayakitifuw mar tatot tibatiyimih, Peter baise ma’utenayah orot rou’ab hai founamaim uman rororon chain hi’utan. Naatu au waraunane i ma’utenayah umah hi’utan naatu i matan fot in. Dibur etawan auman ma’utenayah hibat hikakaif.
44012007	Naniyan meyemeye Regah ana tounamatar run bat naatu marakaw bar wanawanan kusisiar re, tounamatar Peter tuwabun bai ibunibun eo, “Mata enuw kumisir saife.” Mar ta’imonamo Peter uman chain hiha’obow hire.
44012008	Imaibo tounamatar Peter iu, “A faifuw kwiyoun naatu a baibiyon kwiyoun.” Peter na’atube sinaf naatu tounamatar eo, “A faifuw tafan baibiyon naiw kufifin naatu kwi’ufnunu.”
44012009	Peter i’ufunun hairi hitit dibur bar ufunane hire, baise Peter men kafa’imo so’ob tounamatar abisa sisinaf, i notanot i mimim rouw.
44012010	Hitit ma’utenayah etawan wan hibatabat naatu etawan bairou’abin hibatabat hinatabirih. Naatu hina etawan gagamin in bar merar titit awanamaim hitit, etawan akisin botawiy hitit ef yan hire. Ef nati hibutitiy hin yomaninamaim hitit, basit tounamatar sa’iwa’an.
44012011	Peter imaibo matan to iwa’an eo, “Turobe, iti sawar i anababatun ayu isou matar. Regah ana tounamatar iyafar Herod ana fairane naatu Jew sabuw sawar abisa hinotanot mataramih i umahine ayu iyawasu.
44012012	Peter ana not kukubunai ufunamaim na John Mark hinah Mary ana bar tit. Nati’imaim sabuw moumurih na’in hiru’ay hima hiyoyoyoban.
44012013	Peter na etawan ufunane bat rukikitar, naatu bowabow babitai wabin Rhoda etawan botawiyinamih na.
44012014	Baise Peter fanan i’inan ana maramaim yan wanawanan yasisir awan karatan etawan botawiyina’e i matabir nunuw run e’af eo, “Peter na ufun ebatabat.”
44012015	Sabuw hi’u, “O anot i kwaris.” Baise i ana yanibebemaim, imih hio, “Nati i Peter ayubin.”
44012016	Baise Peter bat rurukikitar etawan hibotawiy, naatu hi’i’itin ana veya hifofofor men kafaita.
44012017	Peter umanamaim iman awah bofot naatu Regah mi’itube diburane bobotait hai tur eowen, “Iti i James ana tur kwana’owen naatu taitu auman hai tur kwana’owen.” Imaibo ihamiyih tit efan ta’amaim in.
44012018	Mar auman baiyowayah wanawanahimaim kasiy gagamin na’in matar, taiyuwih hibabatiyih hio, “Peter isan mi’itube’emih iti na’atube matar?”
44012019	Herod kwararih hin hinuwih, baise men hitita’ur. Basit ma’utenayah orot nah 16 buwih ibabatiyih sawar eo hibow hin hirouw himorob. Iti ufunamaim imaibo Pilate Judea ihamiy re in Caesarea imaim mar kafai ma.
44012020	Herod ana yaso’ar gagamin na’in Taiya naatu Sidon sabuw isah biyaso’aso’ar. Imih sabuw kou’ay hibai Herod itinamih hina. Wantoro’ot aiwob ana orot gagamin wabin Blastus yan hiyi rabon isahine bat imaibo hina Herod biyan hitit tufuw isan hifefeyan. Anayabin hai tafaram ana bay i Herod ana tafaramane nan.
44012021	Veya hirurubin na’atube aiwob hai gub ana faifuw bai iyoun ana urama’ama’amaim mare ma sabuw isah binan.
44012022	Sabuw tur hinonowar hio, “Iti men orot ebibinanumih, baise god.”
44012023	Mar ta’imon Regah ana tounamatar Herod rab re morob biyan motamot hi’an morob, anayabin sabuw bora’aten hibitin men bai God itinimih. *
44012024	Naatu God ana tur ra’at tasasar tit sabuw etei hinowar.
44012025	Barnabas, Saul hairi hai bowabow hibisawar ufunamaim Jerusalemane himatabir maiye John Mark hibai bairi hin.
44013001	Ekaleisia Antioch wanawananamaim orot afa i dinab oro’orot naatu afa i bai’obaiyenayah, naatu orot wabih i iti: Barnabas, Simeon, wabin ta i Niger, Lucius Sairini matuwan, Manaen, Herod hairi bay ta’imon hi’aan hirara’at naatu Saul.
44013002	Veya ta hiyohar Regah hikwakwafir wanawanan, Anun Kakafiyin iuwih eo, “Barnabas, Saul hairi kwayasairih ayu isou, anayabin bowabow ta isan a’afih hinabowamih.”
44013003	Naatu hiyohar hiyoyoyoban ufunamaim, umah tafah hiyara’aten fair hitih imaibo hiyafarih hitit hin.
44013004	Barnabas Saul hairi Anun Kakafiyin ana bonawiyenamaim hina Seleucia hitit naatu wa hibai hirabon hin Cyprus imaim hitit
44013005	Naatu hina Salamis hititit ana maramain Jew hai Kou’ay baremaim God ana tur hibinan, John Mark i iti bowabow wanawananamaim baibaisih isan hibai bairi hin.
44013006	Nuw ana fofonin na’atube hiremor hin au waraunane bar merar wabin Pafos hitit, nati’imaim Jew orot kwerayan ma’am koun hiyen, wabin Bar-Jesus, iti i orot taiyuwin isan dinab orot erouw eo’o.
44013007	Naatu iti orot i gawan orot wabin Sergius Paulus ana of ta. Sergius i orot not wairafin, nati nuw ana gawan orot. Barnabas, Saul hairi e’af hina nanamaim hitit God ana tur nowar isan ifefeyanih.
44013008	Baise kwerayan wabin Elimas (wabin Greekamain) eotanih men kok gawan orot tur tanowar baitumatum tab.
44013009	Imaibo Saul wabin ta Paul, Anun Kakafiyin iwanasum ma’am mutufor nuw kwerayan orot itinkikin
44013010	naatu eo, “O i Demon natun! Sawar gewasih etei hai rakit wairafin i o. O i baifuwen kakafih yumatah ta ta biya awan karatan, o i mar etei Regah ana turobe kubotabiren baifuwen temamatar!
44013011	Imih Regah uman boun boro tafamaim nare mata nifim naatu marakaw boro mar kafai men ina’itin.” Mar ta’imonamo Elimas matan matakis bai matan gugum naatu misir eof tobotobon sabuw uman bai nawiyin na isan ifefeyanih.
44013012	Gawan orot abisa matar i’itin i itumatum, anayabin Regah ana bai’obaiyen tur nonowar i ifofofor men kafaita.
44013013	Paul ana ofonah bairi Pafos imaim wa hibai hirabon hina Perga hitit tafaram Pamfilia wanawanan. John Mark nati’imaim ihamiyih, naatu matabir maiye in Jerusalem tit.
44013014	Baise Barnabas Paul hairi hikofan maiye hin Pisidia Antioch hitit tafaram Pisidia wanawanan. Naatu Baiyarir Ana Veya Kou’ay Bar hirun himare.
44013015	Buk Atamaninamaim Moses ana ofafar kikirum naatu dinab hai buk hibiyab ufunamaim. Kou’ay Bar ana ukwarih isah tur hiyafar hio, “Taitu kwa aur koufair tur ta nama’am na’at aki akokok iti sabuw kwanao hinanowar.”
44013016	Paul misir umanamaim rutanih naatu busuruf eo, “Israel orot baibin naatu kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab iti’imaim kwama God kwakwafir, anao kwananowar!
44013017	Israel Sabuw ata God uwatanah rubinih naatu nah toumanih na’atube Egypt hima’am ana veya iwa’an wabih ra’at, naatu ana fairamaim nawiyih hitit.
44013018	Naatu arar yanamaim kwamur etei 40 na’atube ba’afuwih bairi hima.
44013019	Tafaram seven Canaan wanawanan gurusih naatu me bai ana sabuw nowahimih itih.
44013020	Sawar iti himamatar i kwamur etei 450 na’atube wanawananamaim himatar. Iti ufunamaim imaibo yamutufurenayan oro’orot gagamih ya hima hikaifih hina dinab orot Samuel ana veya’amaim hitit.
44013021	Naatu sabuw aiwob isan hifefeyan, God Saul bai itih orot Kish natun, Benjamin wawawan, Saul i’aiwob ma kwamur etei 40 na’atube.
44013022	Naatu God Saul bobosair ufunamaim David bai Saul efanin yai. God iti na’atube eo, ‘David o Jesse natun, orot o na’atube isa i ayu au yasisir gagamin na’in, ayu abisa sinafumih akokok etei boro i nasinaf.’
44013023	Ana’omatanen eo na’atube, orot David ana rara’ane Israel Sabuw hai baiyawasinayan God bai na.
44013024	Jesu nanamaim John mat na bowabow kakafih baihamiyen dogor baikitabiren bapataito bain isan busuruf eorerereb Israel sabuw tutufin etei isah.
44013025	Naatu John ana bowabow bisawar auman sabuw iuwih eo, ‘Kwa anot ayu isou mi’itube kwanotanot? Kwanotanot ayu’uban i nati orot? En, baise orot ta ayu ufu’umaim enan, ayu men karam boro ana kwafure an ana sumasum anarufam.’
44013026	Taitu, Abraham ana niburune kwana warar kwatatain, naatu kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab God kwabiruw kwakakafiy, it isat yawas ana tur i hiyafar na tit.
44013027	Anayabin Jerusalem bar merar sabuw hai ukwarih bairi Jesu ana bowabow men hi’inan, naatu dinab oro’orot hai tur mar etei Baiyarir Ana Veya hibiyab men naniyan hibaib, imih abisa hisisinaf i tur hio inu’in na iturobe.
44013028	Basit morob isan ana ef men hitita’ur, Pilate asabunin morob isan hifefeyan naatu easabun morob.
44013029	Bukamaim abisa i isan eo na’atube hikirum inu’in hisisinaf ufunamaim, onaf afe’enane hibai hire hub wanawanan hiyai.
44013030	Baise morobone God bora’ah misir maiye.
44013031	Naatu veya moumurih na’in sabuw iyab Galilee’ine hi’ufunun bairi hina Jerusalem hititit isah irerereb, naatu nati sabuw i boun hitit sabuw afa isah sif tirurubon.
44013032	Naatu iti tur gewasin i abisa God ata’a’agir eo’omatanih abai kwa isa anan.
44013033	Iti tur i bai it isat ebiturobe, it i ata’a’agir natunatuh, Jesu morobone mimisiramaim. Psalm bairu’abin eo na’atube, ‘O i ayu natu, boun ayu ana o Tamat.’
44013034	Naatu ana’an aisim God morobone bora’ah maiye mimisir, naatu boro men nihamiy maiye na’in namasamih. Nati isan ana tur iti na’atube eo, ‘Ayu yawas kakafiyin naatu baigegewasin David ao’omatan boro baigegewasin anit.’
44013035	Buk efan ta’ane eo maiye, ‘God boro men ana orot kakafiyin nihamiy na’in namas ni’akiramih.’
44013036	Anayabin David ana veya’amaim God ana kok bow bisawar ufunamaim morob uwahinah sisibihimaim hiyai mas i’akir
44013037	Baise orot yait God morobone iyawas mimisir i men mas i’akir.
44013038	Isan imih taitu kwananowar, iti orot Jesu wabinamaim bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan ana tur i ao’orerereb,
44013039	iti Jesu wabinamaim sabuw iyab tibitumatum hai bowabow kakafihine i rufamih titit anayabin Moses ana ofafaramaim boro men karam narufami.
44013040	Imih kwanakaifi gewas, saise abisa dinab hio men isa hinamatar.
44013041	* ‘Okwanekwaneyah Kwana’itin! Boro kwana’oror naatu kwanamorob! Anayabin kwa a veya’amaim ayu boro bowabow ta ana sisinaf, kwa boro men kwanitumatum, basit sabuw afa hina hikurereb hio kwanonowar auman boro men kwanitumatum!’
44013042	Paul, Banabas hairi Kou’ay Bar hibihamiy auman sabuw hifefeyanih fur ta Baiyarir ana veya’amaim iban hitan maiye iti sawar isah hitidudur hitanowar.
44013043	Kou’ay Bar ana rou’ay hibihamiy ufunamaim, Jew sabuw maumurih na’in naatu sabuw iyab Jew hai kwafiren ana kakafemaim hima’am, Paul Barnabas hibi’ufununih koufair hitih God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim ma’amih hifefeyanih.
44013044	Baiyarir Ana Veya bairou’abin sabuw nati bar merar tutufin etei Regah ana tur nowaramih hina.
44013045	Baise Jew sabuw rou’ay gagamin hi’i’itin ana veya hibobowen naatu baigigimen tur hibow hitit, Paul abisa eo isan hibas.
44013046	Imaibo Paul, Barnabas hairi hiofok hio, “God ana tur i wantoro’ot kwa ao kwanowar, baise kwa tur i kwakwahir, taiyuw kwanunutitiy ma’ama wanatowan kwa isa men karam, isan imih abihamiy aki anan Ufun Sabuw isah.
44013047	Anayabin Regah ana obaiyunen tur biti iti na’atube eo, ‘Ayu kwa ayasairi Ufun Sabuw hai marakaw isan, saise kwa i boro yawas kwanab kwanatit kwanan tafaram yomanin kwanatit.’
44013048	Ufun Sabuw iti tur hinonowar ana maramaim hiyasisir Regah ana tur hibora’ara’ah. Naatu sabuw moumurih na’in ma’ama wanatowan isan hirubinih hima’am hina baitumatumayah himatar.
44013049	Naatu Regah ana tur ra’at tasasar tit nati bar merar ana fofonin etei hinowar.
44013050	Baise Jew hai ukwarih himisir bar merar orot gagamih naatu God ana bowayah baibin gagamih yah hi’ora’ah Paul, Barnabas hairi isah hiwosai, naatu hinunih hitit nati bar merar ufunane hire.
44013051	Basit Paul Barnabas hairi ah fofob hiru’uh re i hin Ikonium hitit.
44013052	Naatu bai’ufununayah Antioch hima’am yasisir yah awan karatan naatu Anun Kakafiyin iwansumih.
44014001	Matanfufur tisisinaf na’atube Ikonium bar meraramaim Paul, Barnabas hairi hin Kou’ay bar hirun hai tur hio’omaim Jew sabuw naatu Greek sabuw moumurih maiyow hibotabirih hina baitumatumayah himatar.
44014002	Baise Jew sabuw iyab baitumatum hikwakwahir, himisir Ufun Sabuw yah hiyi hikura’ara’ahih inan himisir baitumatumayah sabuw isah yah so’ar.
44014003	Tur Abarayah nati’imaim manin maiyow hima, Regah ana tur men kafai birumaim hi’omih, baise tur fokarin maiyow hio hibinan. Hai tur baiturobe isan Regah fair itih ina’inan gagamih himamataren, saise sabuw hitaso’ob nati tur i Regah biyanane nan.
44014004	Sabuw nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan hima’am hikusib rou’ab matar, sabuw turin Jew isah hin, turin Tur Abarayah isah hin.
44014005	Imaibo Ufun Sabuw naatu Jew sabuw hai ukwarih bairi awah ta’imon hibasit Tur Abarayah kabayamaim rouw bai’a’afiyih isan hio.
44014006	Tur Abarayah tur hinonowar ana veya hibihir hin tafaram Laikonia wanawanan bar merar gagamih rou’ab, Lystra naatu Derbe imaim hitit hima. Naatu bar merar afa
44014007	nati’imaim hirun hibusuruf Tur Gewasin hibinan hiremor.
44014008	Lystra wanawananamaim i orot ta an murubin ma’am. Iti orot i tutufuwaka an kakafin auman tufuw naatu men kafai reremoramih.
44014009	Paul eo orot nati’imaim ma nonowar, basit Paul orot ana baitumatum itin karam boro nayawas, imih Paul mutufor nuw orot itin
44014010	naatu fanan aumetawat eaf eo, “Kumisir mutufor a yan kubat!” Orot ma’am fasi’iwa’an misir an yan bat busuruf remor.
44014011	Sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hima’am abisa Paul sinaf hi’i’itin basit Laikonia turamaim fanah sib hio, “Anababatun god orotobe himatar isat hina hitit!”
44014012	Naatu Barnabas wabin Zeus hiwab naatu Paul wabin Hermes hiwab anayabin Paul tur bi’ukwarin.
44014013	Zeus ana firis, i ana Tafaror Bar gagamin i bar merar ufunane batabat, firis naatu sabuw bairi hikokok i Tur Abarayah hai sibor hitayai. Imih firis cow naatu beran bow na bar merar ana fur awanamaim tit.
44014014	Baise Barnabas, Paul hairi sabuw abisa hibiwa’an hi’itih hairi hai faifuw hiseb naatu hinunuw sabuw hai founamaim hirun hio,
44014015	“Kwa aisim iti kwasisinaf? aki i orot maiyow orot babin kwa na’atube. Aki iti’imaim anan aiyabin i Tur Gewasin ana binan, sawar iti hai yabin en kwanihamiyen, naatu God ma’ama wanatowan yait iti mar tafaram riy naatu sawar wanawanahimaim tema’am bimataren isan kwanamatabir.
44014016	Marasika tafaram ta ta sabuw hai kok abisa hisisinaf i men rufutih,
44014017	baise mar etei sawar gewasih esisinaf imaim ekukubuna i turobe. Anayabin gagub marane iwa’an ere bay ana veya’amaim ematar bay ebit naatu dogor wanawanan yasisir awan ekakaratan.”
44014018	Paul, Barnabas hairi iti turamaim hisinaftobon sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hai siwar siboromih hibow hinan hio’otanih towa rufufurih.
44014019	Imaibo Jew sabuw hai ukwarih afa Antioch naatu Ikoniumane hinan sabuw hiora’ahih himisir Paul higam hiu, naatu kabayamaim hirab hitain hitit hin bar merar ufunane hihamiy, hinotanot i morob hirouw.
44014020	Baise bai’ufununayah hiru’ay hi’ar bebera’uh hibatabat inu’in misir matabir in bar merar tit, mar to i Barnabas hairi hin Derbe hitit.
44014021	Paul, Barnabas hairi Tur Gewasin Derbe wanawanan hibinan naatu bai’ufununayah moumurih na’in hibow. Imaibo himatabir maiye hin Lystra, Ikonium naatu Antioch hitit Syria wanawanan.
44014022	Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah hibaisih naatu koufair hitih hi’uwih hio. “A baitumatum kwabaib imaim kwaniturobe kwanama, yababan moumurih maiyow boro tanabow, imaibo tanan God ana aiwobomaim tanarun.”
44014023	Ekaleisia hai kou’ay tata wanawanahimaim Paul Barnabas hairi orot ukwarih hirubinih, hibow naatu hiyohar isah hiyoyoban sawar, imaibo Regah i hai baitumatum ana’an umanamaim hiya.
44014024	Tafaram Pisidia wanawanan hi’afuw hirabon rounane hire’er ufunamaim hina Pamfilia hitit.
44014025	Naatu Perga imaim hibibinan ufunamaim hire hina Atalia hitit.
44014026	Wa imaim hibai himatabir maiye hin Antioch hitit, efan nati’imaim God ana tafafar naatu ana manaw ana kabeber hibai bowabow hibusuruf hibowabow yomanin himatabir hina nati’imaim hi’asa’ub.
44014027	Imih hina Antioch hititit ana maramaim ekaleisia sabuw etei hi’af ayuwih hai tur hiowen mi’itube God i wanawanahimaim sinaf baitumatum ana etawan botawiy Ufun Sabuw auman isah.
44014028	Naatu bai’ufununayah bairi nati Antioch imaim bairi manin maiyow hima.
44015001	Orot afa Judea’ane hire hina Antioch hitit baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am hi’obaibiyih hio, “Kwa i Moses ana ofafar eo na’atube a’ar mo’oh hina’afuw kwa boro yawas kwanab.”
44015002	Paul, Barnabas hairi iti bai’obaiyen isan nati orot bairi higam tur manin maiyow hio, basit Paul Barnabas hairi naatu Antioch orot afa na Jerusalem tur abarayah naatu regaregah ai’in bairi iti tur yamutufurin isan hirubinih.
44015003	Ekaleisia ana kou’ay wanawananamaim iti sabuw hiyafarih hin. Naatu hiremor hina Fonisia naatu Samaria’amaim hi’afuwabon hirabon. Ufun Sabuw mi’itube God hibai hibitumatum isan hai tur hi’owen, naatu baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am iti tur hinowar yasisir dogoroh awan karatan.
44015004	Hina Jerusalem hititit ana veya’amaim, God ana ekaleisia, Tur Abarayah, naatu regaregah ai’in etei nati’imaim hima’am hai merar hiyi. Naatu Paul Barnabas hairi hibinanawan ana veya God isah mi’itube sisinaf hai tur hio’owen.
44015005	Baise baitumatumayah afa Pharisee hai kou’ayane himisir hio, “Nati sabuw i boro hai ar kanabih hina’afuw naatu tana’uwih Moses ana ofafar hini’ufunun.”
44015006	Tur Abarayah regaregah bairi hina hiku’ay iti baibat nutitiyin isan
44015007	Manin maiyow hibas inan ufunamaim Peter misir eo, “Taitu baitumatumayah kwa kwaso’ob marasika God ayu kwa wanawanamaim rubinu iti Tur Gewasin Ufun Sabuw isah binan isan, saise i auman iti tur hitanowar naatu hititumatum.”
44015008	God orot etei dogoroh i so’ob, imih Anun Kakafiyin it bitit na’atube Ufun Sabuw auman itih, nati’imaim ebi’obaiyit God nati sabuw auman ibasit ebowabow.
44015009	God it isat esisinaf na’atube i auman isah ef ta’imon esisinaf, anayabin i hai baitumatumamaim dogoroh eyayafur.
44015010	Naatu boun aisim bit gagamin it uwatanah naatu it men karam tata’abar i kwabai bai’ufununayah tuwabuh kwayara’ah God routobon kwabitin.
44015011	En! Baise, manaw kabeber ata Regah Jesu’umaim nan it ta’ita’imon taitumatum tabai biyawasit na’atube ibo hitumatum hibai yawas itih.”
44015012	Kou’ay nati etei awah fot hima Paul Barnabas hairi God ina’inan fokarih naatu baifofofor mi’itube i wanawanahimaim Ufun Sabuw isah sisinaf i hai tur hiowen hima hinowar.
44015013	Hio in sasawar ufunamaim, James misir eo, “Taitu naatu tuwai’inah anao kwananowar!
44015014	Simon iti boun mi’itube God ana naniyan wantoro’ot Ufun Sabuw wanawanahimaim bow i ana sabuw nowan himatar kakaifih isan iti kubuna tanowar.
44015015	Dinab oro’orot hai tur etei iti tur isan i tibasit. Bukamaim iti na’atube eo.
44015016	‘Iti ufunamaim ayu boro ana matabir, Regah eo, naatu David ana bar ufar re’er ana wowab maiye. Ana bar huhurir ana bobunai, naatu ana itinin anan bobaun maiye.
44015017	Saise sabuw afa boro ayu hinanuwuhu hinan, Ufun Sabuw iyab ayu nowau arouw a’afih.
44015018	Imih Regah eo, iti i marasika eo hinowaraka.’
44015019	“Iti i ayu au not,” James ikofan eo maiye, “Ufun Sabuw God isan temamatabir men tana’otanih.
44015020	Baise nati efanin fef tanakirum hai tur tana’owen, bay sibor hiya’ay biyah eregubagub auman men hinaa, men hina’in tabitabir hiniwa’an kwanekwan, masanuw sikah birabir naatu wanawanah rara auman men hinaa.
44015021	Anayabin Moses ana ofafar i kwamur moumurin maiyow Kou’ay Baremaim Baiyarir Ana Veya mar etei hibiyab hibinan hinonowar.”
44015022	Imaibo tur abarayah, Regaregah ai’in naatu kirisiyan sabuw bairi hita’imon hai not hibogaigiwas orot afa kou’ayomaim roubinih Paul Barnabas bairi au Antioch baiyafarih isan hio. Basit Judas wabin ta Barsabas, Silas hairi hirubinih, iti orot rou’ab i baitumatumayah hai bonawiyenayah orot gagamih.
44015023	Naatu fef i iti na’atube hikirum hitih hibai hin. “Aki kwa tuwatanah Tur Abarayah, regaregah ai’in. Kwa Ufun Sabuw iyab baitumatumayah nati Antioch, Syria naatu Silisia wanawanahimaim kwama’am etei a merar ayiy.”
44015024	“Aki tur anowar orot afa aki ai kou’ayane hitit hina hai turamaim abisa hio i kwa anot hikwaris. Naatu nati orot i men kafai aki biyai’ine fair aitih nati tur hibai hinamih.
44015025	Isan imih aki aru’ay ao aibasit tur abarayah afa arubinih kwa isa abiyafarih. Iti orot i boro ata ofonah Barnabas Paul bairi hinan.
44015026	Iti orot rou’ab ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabin isan hai yawas etei hikwahir tebowabow.
44015027	Imih Judas Silas hairi kwa isa abiyafarih, i boro hinao kwanowar sawar ta’imon iti fefemaim akikirum na’atube.
44015028	Aki Anun Kakafiyin bairi aibasit men bit gagamin atit kwatab, ofafar iti bai’ufnunin isan aibasit abit sisibinamaim.
44015029	Bay wagaburisah hisisibor men kwanaa, for rara auman men kwanaaf for sikah hibir himomorob men kwanaa, naatu in baisesebar kwanekwan i kwanahaiw. Sawar iti ao na’atube kwanasisinaf kwa a ef etei boro namutufor. Gewasinamaim aotuturi, kwanama.”
44015030	Orot hiyafarih tur hibai hin Antioch hitit, nati’imaim ekaleisia tutufin etei hi’af ayuwih rou’ay gagamin hibai naatu fef hitih.
44015031	Fef hibai hibiyab ana maramaim dogor wanawanan yasisir awan karatan koufair tur hinonowar isan.
44015032	Judas Silas hairi i God ana dinab oro’orot, imih i tur manih maiyow hima hidudur, baitumatumayah koufair hitih naatu tafah fair hiyai.
44015033	Fur bai’ab na’atube hima’am ufunamaim himisir taih tuwah tufuwamaim hio tuturih naatu sabuw iyab hibiyafarih isah himatabir maiye hin.
44015034	Baise Silas nati’imaim ana not bogaigiwas iban ma maiye. *
44015035	Naatu Paul Barnabas hairi Antioch imaim mar kafai hima, naatu baitumatumayah afa nati’imaim bairi sabuw afa hi’obaibiyih naatu Regah ana tur gewasin hibinan hiremor.
44015036	Veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Paul ana not bogaigiwas Barnabas isan eo, “It boro tanamatabir maiye bar merar etei taituwat tema’ama’amaim tanarun tanatit taninanawanih, Regah ana tur nati’imaim tabibinan tana’itin sabuw basit tema’am.
44015037	Nati ana veya Barnabas i kok John Mark tab bairi hitan.
44015038	Baise Paul i men kok boro John Mark hitab bairi hitan, anayabin i men bairi hima hai bowabow hibow in yomanin hisawarimih, baise i Pamfilia imaim ihamiyih matabir maiye.
44015039	Nati’imaim Barnabas Paul hairi higam tur fokarih hio, naatu hairi hikusib Barnabas Mark bai hairi wa hibai au Cyprus hin.
44015040	Paul Silas rubin bai naatu tafaram bihamiy ana veya, baitumatumayah orot rou’ab hibuwih higegewasinih Regah ana manaw ana kabeber wanawanan hiyari’iyih takaifih isan.
44015041	Basit Paul misir Syria naatu Silisia wanawanahimaim run remor ekaleisia koufair itih.
44016001	Paul remor na Derbe tit imaibo ikofan maiye na Lystra tit, nati’imaim baitumatumayan wabin Timothy ma’am biyan tit, Timothy hinah i Jew babin, baitumatumayan ta, baise tamah i Greek orot.
44016002	Lystra naatu Ikonium wanawanan baitumatumayah etei Timothy i hibifai.
44016003	Paul kok i Timothy tab bairi hitan, imih ana’ar kanabin e’afuw, iti na’atube sinaf anayabin Jew etei nati’imaim hima’am hiso’ob Timothy tamah i Greek orot.
44016004	Bar merar tata hirun hitit roube’aten tur abisa tur abarayah naatu regaregah ai’in Jerusalemamaim bai’ufnunin isan hio hibibasit, baitumatumayah hai tur hi’owen auman hin.
44016005	Ekaleisia sabuw fair hitih hai baitumatum ra’at naatu sabuw boubuh hirun hai kou’ay ra’at.
44016006	Paul ana ofonah bairi Firigia naatu Galasia wanawanahimaim hiremor naatu Anun Kakafiyin Asia wanawanan hireremor men ibasit boro imaim hitabinan.
44016007	Hiremor hina Maisia ana yoyowamaim hitit, hisinaftobon hitan Bitiniya wanawanan hitarun isan baise Jesu Anunin men ibasit boro hitan.
44016008	Imih hina Maisia hihamiy hirabon hire hina Troas hitit.
44016009	Nati gugumin Paul mim, Masedonia orot bat fefeyan eo, “Kwanarabon Masedonia imaim aki kwaibaisi!”
44016010	Paul iti mim i’itin ufunamaim aki abobuna au Masedonia arabon, anayabin aki ai not abogaigiwas God ea’afi nati’imaim God ana tur binan isan.
44016011	Aki Troas imaim wa abai mutufor arabon an Samoteres atit naatu mar to aikofan maiye an Neapolis atit.
44016012	Nati’imaim wa ai’hamiy ai’iwat arun an Philipi atit, Masedonia wanawanan ana bar merar gagamin ta, naatu iti bar merar i Rome gawan wowab. Aki nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ama.
44016013	Baiyarir Ana Veya atit bar merar ana fur aihamiy ana harew sisibinamaim atit, nati’imaim anotanot boro yoyoban ana efan atatita’ur. Nati’imaim amare baibin iyab hinan i ai obaibiyih.
44016014	Naatu babin ta iti tur ao nonowar i wabin Lydia ana tafaram Taiyatira, iti babin i sawar biyah namar iwa’an sabuw tetotobon naatu i God kwafirinayan babin ta, nati ana veya’amaim God dogoron botawiy. Paul tur abisa eo etei nowar.
44016015	Naatu nati babin taintuwan bairi nati baremaim hima’am etei bapataito hibai, imaibo ifefeyani eo, “Kwananotanot ayu Regah ana bitumitum na’at, basit kwana tan au baremaim bairit tama.” Iti na’at aki eokikini bairi an.
44016016	Veya ta aki yoyoban ana efan isan anan akir babitai ta bairi aitar. Iti babitai i afiy kakafin hitarasum ma sawar abisa temamatar isah i eo, naatu sawar iti na’atube sisinaf ana sabuw kabay gagamin maiyow hibaib.
44016017	Iti babitai Paul aki bairi i’ufnuni iwow eo, “Iti orot i God auyomtoro’ot ana’akir wairafih, kwa mi’itube na yawas bain isan teo’orereb.”
44016018	Babitei iti na’atube mar moumurih maiyow sinaf inan yomaninamaim, Paul yan so’ar naatu tatabir afiy nati babitai tar gabuw ma’am isan eo, “Jesu Keriso wabinamaim o abi’a’ari babitai kwaihamiy kutit!” Naatu mar ta’imon afiy babitai ihamiy tit.
44016019	Babitei ana matuwan sabuw hai kabay imaim hima hibaib ana ef sasawar hi’i’itin ana maramaim, Paul Silas hairi hirout hibow hitainih hitit ahar ana efanamaim hiya baibatiyenayah baibatiyih isan.
44016020	Hibuwih hina Rome tur nowarayah nahimaim hitit hio, “Iti Orot rou’ab i Jew sabuw, hairi iti ata bar meraramaim ma kakaf hibai hitit.
44016021	It Rome sabuw ata ofafar men ebibasit i sinafumih teo, naatu aki men karam boro nati bai’obaiyen anibasit anab ani’a’it.”
44016022	Sabuw moumurih na’in hina hirun kou’ay ra’at orot rou’ab bow rouw isan. Tur nowarayan orot iuwih Paul Silas hairi hai faifuw hiseb hibosaisiren naatu hiwabirih.
44016023	Hiwawabirih ufunamaim hibow hin dibur hiyariyih, naatu dibur kaifenayan orot matan tobaiwa’an ma kaifih isan hiu.
44016024	Iti obaiyunen tur nonowar ufunamaim, dibur kaifenayan bow hirun dibur wanawanantoro’ot imaim ah ai gagamih rou’ab areh ya kiktanen hima.
44016025	Fainaiwan Paul Silas hairi God isan hiyoyoban hima ew hitatabor dibur sabuw afa hima hinonowar,
44016026	naniyan meyemeye iriyoy gagamin na dibur bar iyuwiyuw re an ana wabat etei bora’ah. Naatu mar ta’imon etawan botawiy chain dibur sabuw ah umah hifatum hima’am etei hihururuw hire.
44016027	Dibur kaifenayan matan nuw misir naatu Dibur etawan bobotawiyen itin, basit taiyuwin sikan afuwinamih ana kaiy bora’ah, anayabin not dibur sabuw etei hibihir rouw.
44016028	Baise Paul fanan aumetawat na’in e’af eo, “Taiyuw bi’asabuni! Aki etei iti ama’am!”
44016029	Dibur kaifayan hinow isan e’af naatu nunuw run, an uman hi’oror auman Paul Silas hairi nahimaim ra’iy.
44016030	Imaibo nawiyih bairi hitit naatu ibatiyih eo, “Regaregah abisa ana sinaf boro yawas anab?”
44016031	Hiya’afut hio, “Regah Jesu initumitum boro yawas inab, o a nibur bairi.”
44016032	Imaibo Regah ana tur nati bar wanawanan hibinan dibur kaifenayan ana sabuw bairi hinowar.
44016033	Nati veya ta’imon gugumin wanawanan dibur kaifenayan buwih hai feher souwen naatu i ana nibur bairi bapataito hibai.
44016034	Naatu Paul Silas buwih ana bar wanawanan hirun bay itih hi’aa. Nati orot ana nibur bairi dogoroh yasisir awan karatan, anayabin i hina God ana baitumatumayah himatar.
44016035	Mar to tur nowarayah hai orot gagamih naatu ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih hiyafarih hio, “Kwan dibur kaifenayan kwau! Nati orot ebotaitih ten.”
44016036	Basit dibur kaifenayan Paul ana tur eowen eo, “Tur nowarayah orot gagamih tur hiyafar hio, O Silas airi i abobotaiti, airi kwatit tufuwamaim kwan!”
44016037	Baise Paul ma’utenayah hai oro’orot isah eo, “Aki men abisa kakafin ta asinaf naatu men hibatiyi, baise bebeyanamaim hirabi hi’afiyi naatu dibur hiyariyi, kwanaso’ob aki i Rome ana fef abai ama’am! Naatu boun tekokok i wa’iwa’iramaim hiniyafari’imih. Men karam, aki akokok kwana’uwih i taiyuwih hinan hinabotaiti.”
44016038	Ma’utenayah hai orot ukwarih himatabir baibatiyih orot gagamih hai tur hi’owen, naatu Paul Silas hairi Rome ana fef hibai hima’am isan, ana tur hinonowar ana maramaim hibir.
44016039	Basit hina abis kakafin isah hisisinaf isan hairi matahimaim hi’e’en naatu diburane hibotaitih, naatu bar merar baihamiyin isan hi’uwih.
44016040	Paul, Silas hairi dibur bar hihamiy hina Lydia ana bar hitit, nati’imaim baitumatumayah hi’itih kaufair ana tur hitih naatu hihamiyih.
44017001	Hiremor hina Amfipolos naatu Apolonia bar merar hihamiy naatu hina Thessalonica hitit, nati’imaim i Jew hai kou’ay bar ta batabat.
44017002	Paul ana yawas mar etei esisinaf na’atube in kou’ay bar run, Baiyarir veya tounu wanawanahimaim buk rusasar tur hai yabih sabuw bairi hima hidudur.
44017003	Buk wanawanan dinab hikikirum kubuna hai tur eowen eo, “Keriso i biyan nababan namorob naatu morobone namisir maiye.” Naatu Jesu isan iti aorereb kwanonowar, God ana Roubinen Orot. Keriso’oban i nati.
44017004	Sabuw afa Paul yah ikitabir naatu Paul Silas hairi hikofanih. Na’atube Greek sabuw rou’ay gagamin God hikwakwafir auman hirun, naatu bar merar baibin ukwarih auman hirun.
44017005	Baise Jew sabuw hibobowen sabuw ef yan rimurih hibow kou’ay gagamin himatar. Naatu nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan hibuyuw hinunuw hin Jason ana bar hiyi hirab. Hikokok Paul Silas tibunuwih hitama’am na’at tabotaitih sabuw titih.
44017006	Baise hirun hinunuwet ana veya’amaim men hititourih. Basit Jason hibai hifatum baitumatumayah bairi hitainih hina bar merar hai orot gagamih biyah hitit hiwow hio, “Iti orot tafaram wanawanan sabuw hai ma hi’a’afiy hinan boun hina iti ata bar ata merar hitit.
44017007	Jason hai merar yi buwih ana baremaim hima aiwob orot Caesar ana ofafar hi’astu’ub teo, Aiwob orot ta i ema’am wabin Jesu.”
44017008	Tur iti na’atube hio hinonowar sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in naatu bar merar hai orot gagamih hai not hikwaris.
44017009	Basit bar merar orot gagamih Jason naatu orot afa bairi kabay hi’uwih hibaiyan, imaibo hibotaitih hin.
44017010	Hima in mar fo, basit baitumatumayah Paul Silas hairi hiyafarih au Berea hin, naatu hina nati’imaim hititit ana veya mutufor hin Jew hai Kou’ay Bar hirun.
44017011	Nati sabuw i dogoroh hibotawiy men Thessalonica sabuw na’atube’emih. Tur hinonowar i yah bai kwanekwan hima hinowar veya matan hiyi hai buk hiyab hikok hitaso’ob Paul abisa eo i turobe Buk eo’omaim eo ai en?
44017012	Naatu sabuw moumurih maiyow hitumatum, Greek baibin gagamih afa naatu orot moumurih na’in auman hitumatum.
44017013	Baise Jew Thessalonica hima’am Paul Berea bibinan ana tur hinonowar ana maramaim hirabon hina yare baimatarin isan hikukeraker.
44017014	Naatu baitumatumayah marta’imon Paul hibai hiyafar autor re. Baise Silas Timothy hairi Berea hima.
44017015	Orot afa Paul hinawiy bairi hina Athens ana fofoninamaim hihamiy, imaibo i himatabir. Paul iuwih eo, “Kwanan Silas Timothy hairi kwana’uwih saisewat hinan bairi anita’imon.”
44017016	Paul Athens imaim Silas Timothy hairi ma kakaifih wanawanan, nati bar merar hai totob awan karatan hima’am i’itih isan men iyasisir.
44017017	Basit in Kou’ay Bar run Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw iyab God hibitumitum bairi hio, naatu mar etei ahar efanamaim sabuw iyab nati’imaim hinan iti sawar isah i hai tur eo’owen.
44017018	Naatu orot afa Epikuria * . Sabuw orot wabin Epicurus ana bai’obaiyen hibi’ufunun anayabin i ana bai’obaiyenamaim eo tafaram ana yawas i yawas gewasin. kirum efanane hititit naatu orot afa Sitoik * . Iti sabuw i orot wabin Zeno tur hikokok anayabin i ana bai’obaiyenamaim eo i, yawas roumutufuren naatu not gewas sinaf i yawas gewasin. kirumane hititit Paul bairi hibas, so’obayah afa hio, “Iti orot rarik kartatanenayan abisa eo’oweh?” Afa hio, “I ana itinin nanawan hai god isah eo.” Iti na’atube hio anayabin Paul i Jesu morobone mimisir maiye isan bibinan.
44017019	Basit Paul hibai hinawiy hina kaniser Areopagus kou’ay nahimaim hitit naatu hio, “Aki akokok iti bai’obaiyen boubun sabuw kubi’obaibiyih inao ana nowar gewas.”
44017020	Sawar afa i’o aki anonowar i tur afa boubun aki isai, imih akokok o inakubunabuna gewas inao ananowar.”
44017021	Athens tafaram matuwan naatu nahtoumanih iyab makwaniyih hai bowabow mar etei tur boubun menamaim tenonowar i boro hinab nati ef yanamaim hinao hinareremor aurih bowabow en.
44017022	Paul kaniser hai kou’ay Areopagus nahimaim misir eo, “Athens orot! Ayu kwa ai’iti kwa etei i a yawas yayasairenamaim kwama’am.
44017023	Anayabin iti bar merar abat areremor akwafiren efan etei aitah, na’atube sibor ana gem ta aitin tafanamaim iti na’atube kwakirum. ‘God wa’iwa’irin takwakwafir.’ God nati wa’iwa’irin kwakwakwafir, baise men kwaso’ob nati God i yait, imih boun akokok nati isan anaorereb kwananowar.
44017024	God iti tafaram sinaf naatu tafaram wanawanan sawar etei auman sinaf himatar. I mar tafaram ana Regah baise i men orot umahimaim Tafaror Bar hiwowowab imaim ema’amamih.
44017025	Naatu orot umahimaim abisa mamatar i men ekokok nab, anayabin yawas naatu yourabad naatu sawar tutufin etei i akisin biyanane na sabuw yawas tebaib.
44017026	Orot ta’imon biyanane sabuw menan ta ta tafaram tutufin etei karatan, nowanowah hibai tema’am. Naatu marasika yakitifuw hai veya anababatun yai, sabuw iyab tafaram menatan hinab nowanowah namatar hinama’am i so’ob hai veya yai.
44017027	God iti na’atube sinaf, saise sabuw hitatit hitanuwih naatu umah hitaruteteyan hitanan boro hitatita’ur. Baise i men ef yok na’in ema’am, it ta’ita’imon sisibitamaim ema’am.
44017028	Anayabin ’i ana fairamaim it yawasit tama taremor biyat ebi’e’etaw. Kirumamaim tur kabumih kwakikirum * na’atube, ‘It i natunatun.’
44017029	Isan imih it i God natunatun ai’in, men tananot God ana itinin i gold o silver o kabay ta sabuw tar so’obayah i hai yumatabe hitar hirouwen ebatabatamih.
44017030	Marasika God it ata kasiy ata tengogor i’itah etei was tanen, baise boun sabuw tutufin etei dogorot baikitabir isan ebiyunit tanasinaf.
44017031	Anayabin veya ta yayakitifuw i ema’ama, nati’imaim orot ta tafaram tutufin etei ef gewasinamaim baibatiyin isan i rubinika, naatu nati orot it itinin baiturobe isan i morobone bora’ah maiye.”
44017032	Morobone misir maiye isan Paul eo hinonowar ana maramaim hi’iyab himarib. Baise afa hikok veya ta na maiye baidudur nowar isan hifefeyan.
44017033	Nati’imaim Paul kaniser hai kou’ay ihamiyih misir in.
44017034	Orot afa hitumatum Paul hi’ufunun, naatu Areopagus ana kou’ay wanawananamaim orot wabin Dionysius auman itumatum naatu babin wabin Damaris naatu baibin afa auman hitumatum.
44018001	Iti ufunamaim Paul Athens ihamiy naatu na Corinth tit.
44018002	Nati’imaim Jew orot wabin Aquila hairi hitar, Aquila i Pontus imaim tufuw baise aawan Priscilla hairi Italy hihamiy hitit, anayabin Caesar Claudius Jew sabuw etei Rome hima’am ia’arih iuwih hitit. Imih Paul na Corinth titit i na Aquila Priscilla hairi inanawanih.
44018003	Naatu anayabin i auman i kanawas sakirayan ta, imih ma bairi kanawas hisasakir.
44018004	Baiyarir Ana Veya mar etei Kou’ay Baremaim tur binan gewasin Jew naatu Greek sabuw yah baikitabirih isan tur yayare.
44018005	Silas Timothy hairi Masedonia’ane hina hititit ana veya’amaim, Paul ana veya tutufin etei binanumaim eorereb, Jew hai tur eowen, Jesu i God ana Roubinenayan orot. *
44018006	Baise Jew sabuw Paul ana tur hikwahir tur kakafih isan hio ana veya, Paul ana faifuw tafan baibiyon bai fofob rutatab i’uwih eo, “Umamaim rara nama’ama na’at, ana ubar i kwa akis kwanab, ayu au bit i aikisisir. Veya boun ayu i boro Ufun Sabuw isah aninanawanih.”
44018007	Naatu ihamiyih in Ufun orot ta wabin Titius Justus ana baremaim ma. Iti orot ibo kwafirenayan orot ta, i ana bar i Kou’ay Bar sisibin ma’am.
44018008	Orot wabin Krisipas Kou’ay Bar ana orot ukwarin aawan natunatun ana nibur bairi Regah ana tur hinowar hitumatum, na’atube Corinth sabuw moumurih auman hitumatum naatu bapataito hibai.
44018009	Fai ta Paul ana mimumaim Regah eo, “Paul men inabir baise inabinan, men awa nafot binan inihamiy inama’amih.
44018010	Anayabin ayu airit tama’am, naatu orot babin ta boro men karam o narab ni’afiy, yabin sabuw maumurih iti bar meraramaim tema’am i ayu au sabuw.”
44018011	Basit Paul kwamur ta’imon sumar six nati’imaim ma God ana tur sabuw i’obaibiyih.
44018012	Baise Galio tafaram Akaiya isan bigawan ana veya, Jew etei hita’imon Paul hifatum hibai hin baibatiyenamaim hiyai hio.
44018013	“Iti orot i esisinaftobon sabuw yah nikitabir aki ai ef naatu ai ofafar hina’astu’ub i hai kokomaim God hinakwafirimih.”
44018014	Paul tur omih biwa’an ana veya Galio Jew sabuw isah eo, “Kwa iti orot sawar kakafin tasinaf kwata’itin isan kwatagamigam na’at, ayu boro ata ma a tur atanowar.
44018015	Baise kwa a gamin ai’itin i tur, wab naatu kwa a ofafar isah kwagamigam, imih nati sawar i kwabai kwan kwa akis kwayabunai, ayu iti sawar i boro men ana butubun.”
44018016	Naatu baibatiyen bar wanawanan nunih ufun hitit.
44018017	Basit Sosthenes Kou’ay Bar ana ukwarin hirouh hibai hirab baibatiyen bar merar yan. Baise nati hisisinaf Galio men kafa’imo i yababanamih.
44018018	Paul Corinthimaim veya moumurihika baitumatumayah bairi hima, imaibo eo tuturih Priscilla, Aquila hairi buwih bairi wa hibai hina Syria hitit. Namih ana veya Sensera imaim aribun mafur anayabin i omatanen ta biwa’an isan.
44018019	Naatu hina Ephesus hitit imaim Priscilla Aquila hairi ihamiyih. Paul na Kou’ay Bar run Jew bairi baidudur isan.
44018020	Naatu hifefeyan hikokok i nati’imaim veya maninaka bairi hitama, baise i aurin veya en imih kwahir.
44018021	Naatu bihamiyih auman iuwih eo, “God nakokok na’at boro ana matabir isa anan.” Naatu wa bai Ephesus ihamiy in.
44018022	Na Caesarea titit ana veya na Jerusalem tit, ekaleisia sabuw nati hima’am hai merar yi, imaibo in Antioch tit.
44018023	Nati’imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ma’am ufunamaim ihamiyih, i na Galasia, Firigia imaim run tit bai’ufununayah * kaufair itih.
44018024	Jew orot ta wabin Apollos, ana tafaram Alexandria imaim tufuw, basit nati ana veya’amaim i na Ephesus tit. Iti orot binan isan i ana siwar bai, naatu Buk wanawanan etei i so’ob kwanekwan.
44018025	Regah ana ef isan i hio’baiy gewas naatu sabuw afa Jesu isan bi’obaiyih, ana itinin i orot so’obayan sawar etei so’ob eo na’atube. Naatu tur abisa eo i men ta sa’ir, baise i ana so’ob i John ana bapataito akisin so’ob.
44018026	Kou’ay Bar wanawanan itafofor binan. Baise Priscilla Aquila hairi nati’imaim hima’am tur hinonowar ufunamaim hibai bairi hin hai bar God ana ef anababatun hikubunabuna gewas nowar.
44018027	Apollos ana not bogaigiwas Akaiya namih binotanot ana veya, tuwahinah koufair hitin naatu fef hikirum auman hitin bai na Akaiya tit, saise bai’ufununayah nati’imaim hima’am ana merar hitay. Na titit ana veya sabuw iyab God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim hina bai’ufununayah himamatar baibais gagamin maiyow itih.
44018028	Anayabin Jew sabuw hibifufuwen isan bebeyanamaim tur fokarin gam iuwih naatu God ana turamaim kubunabuna hai tur eowen eo, “Turobe Jesu i Roubininenayan.”
44019001	Apollos Corinth ma’am ana veya Paul tafaram ta ta oyaw wanane run tit remor na Ephesus tit. Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah sabuw afa titaurih.
44019002	Naatu bai’ufununayah ibatiyih, “Kwabitumatum ana maramaim Anun kakafiyin re iwani?” Hiya’afut hio, “Aki nati Anun Kakafiyin ana tur men kafa’imo hio anowar.”
44019003	Basit Paul ibatiyih, “Bo kwa bapataito i menatan kwabai?” Hiya’afut hio, “John Baptist nowan.”
44019004	Paul iuwih eo, “John ana bapataito i dogor baikitabiren kakafih hibihamiyen isan. Naatu orot ta wabin Jesu i ufunamaim nan baitutumin isan iuwih.
44019005	Tur iti na’atube eo hinonowar ufunamaim etei Regah Jesu wabinamaim bapataito hibai.
44019006	Naatu Paul uman tafah yara’aten yoyoban ana veya Anun Kakafiyin re iwanih menah botabir tur ta ta hio naatu tur Godane nan hi’orerereb.
44019007	Orot nah etei i 12 iti kou’ay wanawanan.
44019008	Paul Kou’ay Bar run itafofor sumar tounu wanawanan sabuw bairi hio, God ana aiwob isan sabuw iuwih dogoroh rouw tafofofor.
44019009	Baise sabuw afa dogoroh fokar, men kafa’imo hikok boro hititumatum naatu bebeyanamaim Regah ana ef gewasin isan tur kakafih maiyow hi’o. Basit Paul ihamiyih naatu bai’ufununayah buwih bairi hin. Veya matan yimo Tyrannus ana bai’obaiyen efanamaim ma bi’obaibiyih.
44019010	Iti na’atube ma sinaf kwamur rou’ab sawar, naatu sabuw etei nati Asia wanawanan Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw etei Regah ana tur hinowar.
44019011	Paul wanawananamaim God ina’inan fokarih maiyow sisinaf.
44019012	Paul ana agesaf naatu ana faifuw i biyan gubamin hibai hin sawusawuwih biyah hiyayanowahih i hiyayawas naatu afiy kakafih auman i hibibihir.
44019013	Jew sabuw afa bar merar ta ta hirun hitit sabuw iyab biyahimaim afiy kakafih hitar sumih hima’am Regah Jesu wabinamaim hinununih. Naatu hai tur i iti na’atube hio, “Demon kakafih hinununih seven Paul ana orot wabin Jesu isan ebibinan i wabinamaim kwa abi’a’ari kwatit!”
44019014	Naatu Jew hai Firis Gagamin wabin Skeva natunatun etei seven i iti na’atube auman hisisinaf.
44019015	Baise afiy kakafin iuwih eo, “Jesu i ayu aso’ob naatu Paul auman i ayu aso’ob, bo kwa iyab?” *
44019016	Naatu orot nati afiy kakafih hiwan ma’am misir bow yow tar, hai faifuw seb nunih ufun hitit segar biyah ererara ana bar hihamiy hibihir.
44019017	Jew sabuw etei naatu Ufun Sabuw etei iyab nati Ephesus wanawanan hima’am iti tur hinonowar ana veya, etei yah birubir fafar, naatu Regah Jesu Keriso wabin bora’ara’aten gagamin maiyow hitin.
44019018	Sabuw moumurih na’in iyab hina bai’ufununayah himamatar bebeyanamaim hitit abisa kakafin hisisinaf isan etei hi’e’en.
44019019	Sabuw moumurih na’in iyab hikwerakwer hai buk hibow hina hibutuw naatu sabuw etei matahimaim hi’afusar. Naatu buk ta’ita’imon hai baiyan hibiyab i 50,000 drachma ana fofonin. * ta’imon i orot veya ta’imon nabowabow i ana baiyan.
44019020	Sinaf fairih iti himamataramaim Regah ana tur tasasar tit naatu busuruf ra’at ana fair bai yen.
44019021	Sawar iti himamatar ufunamaim Paul ana not bogaigiwas Akaiya naatu Masedonia tafaram hairi wanawanahiwat remor na. Naatu na Jerusalem titamih ana not bogaigiwas eo, “Iti tafaram anabinanawan ufunamaim ayu boro anan Rome ana’itin.”
44019022	Basit ana baibais orot rou’ab Timothy, Erastus hairi iyafarih hin Masedonia wanawanan hima, i baise veya au gagaminaka Asia wanawanan imaim ma.
44019023	Nati ana veya’amaim yare kakafin anababatun Ephesus wanawanan matar, anayabin Regah ana Ef isan.
44019024	Orot wabin Demetrius silver imaim sawar ebu’ur temamatar i nati’imaim ma’am. Iti orot i god babin wabin Artemis ana kwafiren gagamin ana yumatabe, silver amaim bu’ur sabuw hitotobon. Naatu nati bowabowamaim kabay gagamin maiyow bai ana sabuw isah rur.
44019025	Basit ana bowayah etei e’af ayuwih naatu sabuw afa i bairi hai bowabow ta’imon auman e’af hiru’ay iuwih eo “Au sabuw kwanaso’ob, ata bowabow iti’imaim kabay gagamin tatain erur.
44019026	Naatu boun iti orot Paul abisa esisinaf i kwa taiyuw matamaim kwa’itin naatu tainimaim kwanonowar, god orot umahimaim tibiwa’an i men kafa’imo godamih.” Tur iti na’atube eo i orot babin moumurih maiyow yah ikitabir. Iti sawar i men Ephesus wanawanan akisin emamatar, baise Asia wanawanan etei kafa’imo nisawar.
44019027	Iti ata bowabow i kakafin wanawanan run naatu ata bowabow wabin boro na’af, men wabit akisin na’af, baise god babin Artemis ana kwafiren bar gagamin auman boro yabin en namatar. Naatu sabuw nati Asia wanawanan, naatu tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei iti god babin hikakafiy hikwakwafir boro nuhih nabur.”
44019028	Sabuw hiru’ay hima iti tur hinonowar higagamat himisir hiwow hio, “Ephesus ana god Artemis akisinamo i turobe gagamin.”
44019029	Basit nati bar merar gagamin wanawanan uruw ra’at, na hibuyuw ne hibuyuw hinunuw. Masedonia orot rou’ab Gaius Aristakus hairi Paul bairi hinanawan hinan hibuwih hinunuw hin sabuw hai rou’ay efan gagaminamaim hitit.
44019030	Paul akisin i kok sabuw nahimaim tatit, baise bai’ufununayah hi’otan.
44019031	Nati tafaram wanawanan hai orot gagamih, iyab Paul ana ofonah auman tur hiyafar hifefeyan men hikok boro tan kou’ay ana efan gagaminamaim yumatan ta’ototait.
44019032	Nati ana veya’amaim kou’ay ana efanamaim uruw i na’at, sabuw afa nati’imaim i tur ta hiwow hio, sabuw afa ni’imaim ibo tur ta hiwow hio. Naatu sabuw au moumurihika i men kafai hiso’ob aisim hina iti kou’ayamaim hitit.
44019033	Naatu Jew sabuw afa Alexander hibonawiy hitit nahine bat, naatu sabuw afa roube’aten tur hitin, imaibo Alexander umanamaim sabuw rutanih awah fot naatu i taiyuwin wasfafarin isan ana tur eo.
44019034	Baise nati veya’amaim i hi’inan Alexander i Jew orot, imih sabuw etei au ta’imon hiwow sawar ta’imon isan hio inan hours rou’ab sawar. “Ephesus ana god Artemis akisinamo i turobe Gagamin!”
44019035	Inan yomaninamaim bar merar ana kirumayan sabuw rou’ay gagamin eotatanih inan nuwarob e’afuw basit eo, “Ephesus ana orot ana babin! Sabuw etei hiso’ob Ephesus bar merar i god gagamin Artemis ma’uh ema’am. Iti kabay kakafiyin marane hea’obow re’er boun iti inu’in auman ma’uh ema’am.
44019036	Iti sawar i boro men yait ta nayaubamih, isan imih kwa yate enub kwamare naatu men abisa ta nota’e mata nakabiy kwanasinafumih.
44019037	Kwa iti orot kwabow kwana ai’itih i men Tafaror Bar ana sawar ta hi’afiy o ata god babin isan tur kakafih hi’omih.
44019038	Baise Demetrius ana bowayah orot bairi orot babin isan hai gamin tur afa hinama’am na’at, ata orot gagamih tur nowarayah i tema’am. Naatu tur nowar yababan yabaituturin isan ana efan i bobotawiyin inu’in boro hinan imaim hiyabaitutur.
44019039	Baise yababan tur gagaminaka omih na’at i kwanan Kou’ay Bar gagaminamaim orot tur nowarayah matahimaim a yababan kwanaorereb tur nowarayah boro hinayabunei.
44019040	Naatu boun hibubuyuw isan hina’af tanarun hinabibatiy boro tanao kwanekwan, anayabin tur ana’an it men taso’ob naatu it men karam boro asir tanao tanifufuwen.”
44019041	Iti eo ufunamaim, sabuw iuwih hai ubar hin.
44020001	Sabuw hibuyuw in sawar nuwarob ea’afuw ufunamaim, Paul bai’ufununayah * etei e’af ayuwih koufair tur itih naatu eo tuturih. Imaibo ihamiyih au Masedonia na’at in.
44020002	Naatu Masedonia ana uman men sanet imaim bar merar ta ta run tit baitumatumayah isah binan koufair itih remor na Greek tit.
44020003	Nati’imaim sumar tounu ma, naatu au Syria na’at na isan bobobuna Jew sabuw rabinamih hiyayakitufuw tur nowar. Imih i ana not bogaigiwas matabir maiye Masedonia awat na.
44020004	Orot iti na’atube i hitur bairi hin, Berea bar merarane i orot Fairahus natun Sopater, Thessalonica’ane i Aristakus, Secundus hairi, Derbe’ine i Gaius, naatu Asia’ane i Tychicus, Trofimus hairi, naatu Timothy.
44020005	Iti oro’orot i wa ta hibai wan hirabon Troas imaim hima aki hikaifi.
44020006	Faraw Wanawanan Yeast En ana hiyuw sasawar ufunamaim Philipi imaim wa abai, veya umat roun ufunamaim Troas imaim ai ta’imon, nati’imaim fur ta’imon ama.
44020007	Fur antoro’ot ebubusurufimaim, bai’ufununayah etei rafiy kakafiyin baimasibin isan abita’ay ana veya, Paul binan sabuw iuwih naatu mar natot boro nan, imih kutuw binan in fainaiwan tit.
44020008	Naatu bar tafan aki ama’amamaim i ramef moumurih na’in hitoto’ab.
44020009	Bar ana sou awanamaim i orot boubun wabin Eutikas ma Paul ana binan nonowar. Baise Paul kutuw binan ma nowar inan busuruf matan fot taf koukuw. Naatu naniyan meyemeye matan anababatun fot ikitabir bar noyate tafan ana tet tounu imaim hima’am raiy rab easabun, hire murubin hibai hibora’ah.
44020010	Baise Paul raiy orot isnowah kwafure rouh eo, “Men kwaniyababan, yawasin inu’in.”
44020011	Imaibo matabir maiye yen bar tafan rafiy bai imasib eaan. Naatu fai manin ma binan in mar tot basit ihamiyih.
44020012	Orot yawasin hibai hin au bar dogoroh ereyasisir auman.
44020013	Wa abai arabon an Asos atit naatu Paul iu’uwi na’atube baiwaninamih arun, anayabin i ababawat boro ufui rarabon.
44020014	Tafaram Asos imaim bairi abitar ana veya na wa afe’en yen bairi ana Mitilin atit.
44020015	Mar to wa ainatit ana Kios nuw aihamiy, veya bairou’abin ufunamaim Samos nuw a’afuwabon, naatu veya baitounin ana Miletus atit.
44020016	Paul Ephesus baihamiyin mutufor yan rabon isan ana not bogaigiwas, men kok boro veya gagamin Asia wanawananamaim tama, anayabin bimatkabiy ana kok i Jerusalem natitabo Pentecost ana veya nab.
44020017	Miletus imaim Paul Ephesus ekaleisia orot ukwarih na bairi o isan isah tur iyafar.
44020018	Naatu hina hititit ana veya iuwih eo “Ayu boubuntoro’ot ana Asia wanawanan atit bairi mi’itube tama’am i kwa kwaso’ob.
44020019	Taiyuwu ayara’iyu Regah ana akir wairafin na’atube yawas fokarin wanawanan wainabu abow eremamaturu auman, Jew sabuw asabunu isan hiyakitifuw men anot.
44020020	Kwa kwaso’ob ayu kwa isa abibinan ana veya men kafa’imo abir, a baibais ana tur ta abotanimih, en baise etei bebeyanamaim bar arun atit a binan kwanowar.
44020021	Jew sabuw naatu Ufun Sabuw isah i bebeyan hai kakafih baihamiyen God isan tatabir naatu Regah Jesu baitutumin isan auwih.
44020022	Naatu boun Anun kakafiyin fatumu, i ana kokomaim au Jerusalem anan, men aso’ob nati’imaim boro abisa isou namatar.
44020023	Ta’imonamo Anun Kakafiyin bimatnuwu i aso’ob, bar merar ta ta anarun anatitit dibur naatu biyababan i nati’imaim hima tekakaifu.
44020024	Baise ayu taiyuw au yawas ai’itin i men sawar gagamin ta. Ayu au kok i bowabow Regah Jesu bitu i ana bow yomanin ana’asa’ub, naatu nati bowabow i tur gewasin God ana manaw ana kabeber isan anao rerereb.
44020025	Naatu boun kwa iyab wanawanamaim ama aremor God ana aiwob isan a binan kwanonowar aso’ob boro men kwana’itu maiye.
44020026	Isan imih boun kwa etei matamaim akukurereb, o yait ef inasa’ir inan inamomorob * ana bit men ayu anab.
44020027	Anayabin God abisa not yayakitifuw etei akurereb kwanowar sawar men ta abotan au’uf abatamih.
44020028	Taiyuw mata toniwa’an kwanakaifi, naatu bobaituw Anun Kakafiyin kwa babamaim ya’aya kwanakaifih. God ana ekaleisia kwaninabatan gewas, anayabin i taiyuwin Natun momorobomaim sinaf nati sabuw hina nowan himatar.
44020029	Ayu aso’ob kwa ana bihamiy ufunamaim haru kakafih boro hinan wanawan hinarun bobaituw hinatar giyigiyih.
44020030	Kwa taiyuw a kou’ay wanawananamaim auman orot afa boro hinamisir turobe hinabotabir hinifufuwen, saise bai’ufununayah boro i hini’ufnunih.
44020031	Imih mata toniwa’an! Kwamur tounu bairi tama fai mar erematuru abimatnuwih i kwananot.
44020032	Naatu boun kwa i God ana tafafarenamaim ayayariyi naatu i ana manaw ana kabeber turamaim nawowabi kwanayen abisa ana sabuw baitihimih eo kwa auman nowamih nit.
44020033	Ayu men kafai orot babin ta ana gold o ana silver isan abahiy o ana ar ana faifuw isan abahiyamih.
44020034	Kwa etei kwaso’ob, ayu taiyuwu umau’umaim sawar abisa isah abiyababan asinaf himatar abow, naatu bow turou’unah hibiyababan afaram hibow karam.
44020035	Ayu ef etei ai’obaiyi, kwanabow raro nababan, saise nati’imaim boro sabuw aurih fair en kwanibaisih. Ata Regah Jesu taiyuwin awanamaim iti tur eo i kwananot ’Baitinin ana baigegewasin i ra’at men tabaib na’atube.”
44020036	Paul eo sasawar ufunamaim sun yowen bairi hiyoyoban.
44020037	Sabuw etei erererey auman hirouh himamay naatu hio tutur.
44020038	Etei hai yababan ra’at anayabin tur iti na’atube eo isan, ayu boro men ana’iti maiye naatu hinawiy bairi hin wa biyan hitit.
44021001	Nati’imaim aotuturih naatu aihamiyih hima aki wa abai mutufor arabon ana tafaram Kos atit; mar to ana Rodes atit, nati’imaim aikofan ana Patara atit.
44021002	Wa ta au Fonisia inan atita’ur aitafabon abai atit are arabon.
44021003	Yan ararabon anuwariy Cyprus a’itin naatu ai beyaw na’atune bat aki au Syria arabon ana Taiya imaim arun wa aiyut sawar hitarsuwai.
44021004	Nati’imaim bai’ufununayah afa atita’ourih fur ta’imon bairi ama. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin sabuw hai tur eowen Paul hitimatanuw, saise au Jerusalem men tayen.
44021005	Baise bairi ama na fur yomanin tit, ai veya baib ufunamaim, ai hamiyih aki ai ef arura’ah maiye. Bai’ufununayah a’aawah natunatuh etei bairi hinawiy bar merar ai tumar ana tor dones yan are imaim sui ayowen ayoyoban.
44021006	Imaibo bairi abi’otututuren ufunamaim, wa afe’en ayen, naatu i hai ubar himatabir maiye hin.
44021007	Taiya’ane wa abai anan i Polemais imaim wa aiyut, nati’imaim taiti baitumatumayah hai merar ayi bairi veya ta’imon ama.
44021008	Marto ai hamiyih hima aki ana Seseria atit, binanuyan orot Philip ana baremaim bairi ama. Philip i Jerusalemamaim orot 7 hirurubinih i orot ta.
44021009	I natunatun baibitar etei kwafe’en biyah numih God ana tur orerereb isan ana usar hibai hima’am.
44021010	Seseria imaim veya bai’ab na’atube ama’am ufunamaim dinab orot wabin Agabus Judea’ane natit.
44021011	Na aki biyai tit basit Paul ana kikir bai i taiyuwin an uman iutatanen naatu eo, “God Anun Kakafiyin iti na’atube eo, Orot iti kikir matuwan Jerusalemamaim Jew sabuw boro iti na’atube isan hinasinaf hinab Eteni Sabuw hinitih.”
44021012	Aki iti tur anonowar ana maramaim sabuw * nati’imaim hima’am bairi ai fefeyan ayai Paul au Jerusalem na isan a’otan.
44021013	Baise Paul iyafuti eo, “Kwa aisim iti na’atube kwao kwarerey ayu dogorou ana babanin kwabitin? Ayu i men buwu fatumu akisin isan abogaigiwasomih, baise Jerusalemamaim Regah Jesu wabinamaim morob isan auman abogaigiwas.”
44021014	Yan baikitabirin isan asinaf, baise men karam. Imih aibagun naatu ao, “Regah ana kok na’atube namatar.”
44021015	Veya bai’ab na’atube nati’imaim ama’am ufunamaim ai sawar abobuna au Jerusalem amisir.
44021016	Seseria’amaim bai’ufununayah afa hinawiyi bairi ana orot Mason ana baremaim atit, iti orot ana tafaram i Cyprus, naatu i auman marasika baitumatumayan matar ma’am.
44021017	Ayen ana Jerusalem atitit ana veya baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am hiyasisir ai merar hiyi.
44021018	Marto Paul bairi ana James a’itin naatu nati ana veya’amaim regaregah ai’in etei nati’imaim hiru’ay.
44021019	Paul hai merar yi naatu i ana bowabow etei Ufun Sabuw wanawanahimaim God mi’itube ibais bowabow ana tur etei aneika busuruf idudur in yomanin easa’ub.
44021020	Eo hinonowar ufunamaim etei’imak God ana merar hiy hibora’ara’ah. Imaibo Paul isan hio, “Taiu inaso’ob Jew moumurih na’in thousand ana fofonin hina baitumatumayah himatar. Baise etei’imak tekokok i ofafar hinabukikin hinabosiyasiyar.
44021021	Baise iti’imaim tur i iti na’atube hinowar, O i Jew sabuw iyab nati Ufun Sabuw hai tafaramamaim tema’am kubi’obaiyih Moses ana ofafar i hinihamiy, naatu hai kek hai ar men hina’afuw naatu Jew hai binanakwar men hini’ufunun.
44021022	Aki boro abisa ana sinaf, anayabin o ina ititit a tur i sabuw hinowaraka.
44021023	Imih abisa anao na’atube inasinaf? Orot etei kwafe’en i hai omatanen ta God isan hio baifaro.
44021024	Imih o i boro inikofanih bairi kwanan kouksouwen ana yohar wanawanan kwanarun naatu aribuh mafur o inibaiyanih aribuh hinamafur, saise o isa iti’imaim hibifufuwen sabuw boro hinaso’ob nati tur i baifuwen, anayabin i hiso’ob o i ofafar kubi’ufunun.
44021025	Baise Ufunane sabuw baitumatumayah isah, aki fef ta ai yafar in hai tur a’owen bay uma matamatar isah hisisibor men hinaa, masanuw rara auman men hinaa, o for sikah birabir men hinaa naatu men hina’in hinisesebar kwanekwan.”
44021026	Marto Paul orot buwih bairi hai binanakwar eo na’atube kousouwih isan hirun, orot kwafe’en hikukusouwih i auman kusouw. Imaibo i na Tafaror Bar hai tur eowen veya biy boro kouksouwen ana yomanin nasawar naatu siwar orot ta’ita’imon isah hinasibor.
44021027	Kousouwen in fur ta’imon yomanin tit baisawarinamih auman Jew sabuw afa Asia wanawanane hina hima’am Paul Tafaror Baremaim hi’itin. Sabuw kou’ay gagamin na’in hikura’ara’ahih himisir Paul bain bai’a’afiyin isan hinunuw,
44021028	hitar koukuw hi’af hio, “Israel Oro’orot kwana kwaibaisi! Iti orot efan etei remor ana bai’obaiyenamaim it ata sabuw isah tur kakafin maiyow eo, naatu ata ofafar baihamiyin isan eo’o, naatu iti Tafaror Bar wabin ebi’afiy. Naatu kakafin gagamin anababatun sisinaf i kwana’itin, Ufunane Sabuw buwih hina hirun ata Bar Gagamin gubagub tibitin.
44021029	(Iti na’atube hio anayabin Trofimus, Ephesusine nan hairi nati bar merar gagaminamaim Paul bairi hima hireremor hi’itih, naatu hinot i hibuwih bairi Tafaror Bar ana efanamaim hirun.)
44021030	Nati bar merar gagamin ana sabuw etei kura’ara’ahih nan ufun hinunuw hitit Paul hibai hitain kwekwekwetar hitit Tafaror Bar gagamin ufunane hire. Naatu marta’imon etawan hihir.
44021031	Paul hita’asabunimih hibiwa’an, baise tur marta’imon nunuw Rome baiyowayah hai ukwarin nowar Jerusalem wanawanan i uruw giririf mamatar.
44021032	Matan kabiy baiyowayah orot afa hai ukwarih bairi buwih hinunuw hire kou’ay wanawanah hirun, sabuw kakafih baiyowayah hai orot ukwarih bairi hinan hi’itih Paul hirabirab hihamiy.
44021033	Baiyowayah hai ukwarin na Paul biyan tit bai ana orot uwih chain rou’ab hibow hifatum, imaibo ibatiyih, “Iti orot i yait naatu abisa sinaf?”
44021034	Sabuw kou’ay wanawanan hibatabat asir hi’af hi’o kwanekwan, baiyowayan ukwarin sawar yabin abisa isan mamatar nowar gewasomih biwa’an men karam, anayabin uruwane ra’at imih baiyowayah iuwih Paul hibai hirun baiyowayah hai bar hiyari’y.
44021035	Paul hibai hirun wawanamaim hitit rakit sabuw hiturafef hi’itin, basit baiyowayah Paul hibora’ah hi’abar.
44021036	Sabuw ufuh hitarkoukuw hina hio, “Kwa’asabun emorob!”
44021037	Paul hibai baiyowayah hai bar hirur auman baiyowayah hai ukwarin isan eo, “Karam boro tur ta atao itanowar?” Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin Paul ibatiy, “O Greek tur iso’ob?
44021038	O men Egypt orot iti boro’omo sabuw 4,000 baiyow kwanekwaneyah ibow arar yan itit gawan isan ibirakit wari’en?”
44021039	Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Jew orot, Tarsus imaim atufuw Silisia wanawanan, bar merar gagamin ayu i ana matuwan ama’am imih akokok o baibasit ititu sabuw isah atao.”
44021040	Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin baibasit Paul itin yen wawan afe’en bat umanamaim sabuw etei rutanih etei awah fot, imaibo Paul Hebrew turamaim eo hinowar.
44022001	“Tamai’inah, naatu taitu tuwai’inah au wasfafaren ana tur anao kwananowar.”
44022002	Hebrew turamaim eo hinonowar ana veya etei surur binon tar. Imaibo Paul eo,
44022003	“Ayu i Jew orot Tarsus imaim atufuw tafaram Silisia wanawanan, baise Jerusalemamaim ama ara’at. Gamaliel ana bai’obaiyen babanamaim ama, uwatanah hai ofafar etei ayu i’obaiyu, naatu ayu i baibobowenayan orot ta God ana ofafar tur isan, kwa boun iti kwama’am na’atube.
44022004	Sabuw iyab ef iti hibi’ufun abow ai’a’akirih arouw asbunubunuwen naatu afa abow ana dibur aya.
44022005	Firis Gagamin naatu Kaniser tutufin etei abisa ao i hiso’ob turobe. Anayabin i fef hikirum hitu abai an Damaskas wanawanan, sabuw baitumatumayah nati’imaim hima’am fatumih bow na Jerusalem tit isan ayen an.”
