44022006	“Ana Damaskas abiyubin auman i’ouyit, naniyan meyemeye marakaw namanamarabe bow marane ra’iy sisibu etei marakaw.
44022007	Ayu me yan ara’iy rabu naatu orot ta fanan anowar eo, ‘Saul! Saul! O aisim ayu kubi’a’akiru?’
44022008	Ayu aibatiy ao ‘Regah o yait? Iyafutu eo, ‘Ayu i Jesu Nazareth mowan, o irabu kubi’a’akiru!’
44022009	Sabuw bairi anan marakaw hi’itin, baise orot ayu isou eo fanan men hinowar.
44022010	Ayu aibatiy, ‘Regah ayu boro abisa anasinaf?’ Naatu Regah iuwu eo, ‘Kumisir kwen Damaskas kutit naatu nati’imaim God ana bowabow abisa o bowamih bit boro hinao inanowar.’
44022011	Naatu au sabuw bairi anan umou hibai hinawiyu an Damaskas atit, anayabin marakaw ana bonamanamarin re ayu matou yi ifim.
44022012	Nati bar meraramaim i orot wabin Ananias God, ana orot ta ma’am, ofafar etei i bobosiyasiyar naatu Jew sabuw nati’imaim hima’am etei i hikakakafiy.
44022013	Na biyou tit sisibu’umaim bat naatu eo, ‘Taiu Saul, mata ekubunai kunuw maiye!’ Mar ta’imon matau kubunai anuw Ananaias a’itin.
44022014	Imaibo iuwu eo, ‘Uwatanah hai God o rubini i ana kok o so’ob isan, saise Orot ana Yawas Mutufurin * boro ina’itin naatu abisa nao’o o taiyuw tainika fanan inanowar.
44022015	Anayabin o boro i isan inakubuna, abisa i’itin naatu inonowar sabuw etei hai tur ina’owen.
44022016	Imih boun abisa ao inonowar aisim boro inama inakaif? Kumisir bapataito kubai, naatu kuyoyoban a bowabow kakafih ekusouwen.’
44022017	“Ayu amatabir maiye ana Jerusalem atit naatu ayoyoyoban ana maramaim matou bora’ah ina’inanen ta aitin.
44022018	Nati matou bobora’ah ana maramaim Regah aitin naatu isou eo, ‘Mata nakabiy Jerusalem saisewat inihamiy, anayabin iti’imaim ayu isou inaorereb sabuw boro men hinitumatum.’
44022019	Ayu ai ya’afut ao, ‘Regah sabuw etei hiso’ob ayu Kou’ay Bar * ta ta arun atit sabuw iyab o hibitutumi abow arow afatum dibur aya’ay.
44022020	Naatu Stephen orot wantoro’ot iti ef isan hirab ana rara re’er ana veya ayu i nati’imaim.’ Ayu auman aisaito hirab morob naatu sabuw iyab hi’a’asabun hai faifuw i ayu abotanen abat.
44022021	Imaibo Regah ayu iuwu eo, ‘O abiyafari inan ef yok Ufun Sabuw isah.’”
44022022	Sabuw hibat Paul eo hinowar in ana tur sawar. Baise iban maiye sabuw hibusuruf hitar koukuw hio? Sa’ab kwabai kwan! Kwa’asabun! Men karam boro nama!”
44022023	Hitar koukuw fah sib hai faifuw hibow hirudab, naatu fofob hibow asir hirouw kwanekwan.
44022024	Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin iuwih Paul hibai baiyowayah hai bar wanawanan hirun naatu wabirin isan iuwih, saise biyan tababan tao hitanowar ana’an aisim Jew sabuw iti na’atube isan fanah sibisib.
44022025	Baise wabirinamih hibai hifafatum ana veya Paul baiyowayan hai bonawiyenayan orot ukwarin ta i nati sisibinamaim batabat itin naatu ibatiy, “Orot Rome tafaram bai matuwan isan ana fef bai ema’am, baibatiyinae asir kwanarabirab boro ofafar kwana’astu’ub ai en?”
44022026	Baiyowayah hai bonawiyenayan orot ukwarin iti tur nonowar ana veya in baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin ibatiy, “O abisa inasinafumih? Iti orot i Rome ana fef bai ema’am.”
44022027	Naatu baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin na Paul ibatiy eo, “Kuo anowar, o i Rome ana fef ibai kuma’am?” Paul rufut eo “Ayu i Rome orot anababatun ana fef abai ama’am.”
44022028	Imaibo baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin eo, “Ayu iti tafaram bai matuwan isan kabay gagamin na’in au fef atubun.” Baise Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Rome wanawanan atufuw.”
44022029	Sabuw iyab baibatiyinamih hinan marta’imon au’uf hibat. Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin ana bir ra’at, anayabin Paul Rome ana fef bai ma’am so’oba’e bai fatum.
44022030	Marto mar auman baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin kok taso’ob gewas, aisim Jew sabuw Paul hibubuw hi’u’u kwanikwaniy, Paul hifatum ma’am hirufamen, naatu firis ukwarih Kaniser tutufin etei iuwih hiru’ay. Imaibo Paul bai na nahimaim bat.
44023001	Paul nuw Kaniser itihkikin naatu eo, “Taituwau ayu au yawas tutufin etei God matanamaim men kafa’imo erekasiy auman ama na iti boun titamih.”
44023002	Iti na’at eo basit Firis Gagamin wabin Ananias orot iyab Paul sisibinamaim hibatabat awan roufoforamih iuwih.
44023003	Baise Paul iu, “God o awa boro narufofoforen, yumat rah ana sis! O baibabatiyenayan orot wai, aisim o taiyuw ofafar ibai awau roufoforenamih sabuw kubiyunih!”
44023004	Orot Paul sisibin hibatabat hio, “O God ana Firis Gagamin isan men tur kakafih inao’omih!”
44023005	Paul iyafutih eo, “Teutuwau ayu men aso’ob i Firis Gagamin. Buk Atamaninamaim eo, ‘O men tur kakafin a sabuw hai bonawiyenayan isan inao’omih.’”
44023006	Imaibo nati ana maramain Kaniser sabuw Paul inanih, sabuw nati’imaim hiruru’ay afa i Sadducee afa i Pharisee, naatu Paul Kaniser sabuw isah fanan aumetawat eaf eo, “Teituwou! Ayu i Pharisee, naatu Pharisee orot natun. Ayu iti baibatiyen efanamaim abatabat anayabin abitumatum morobone misir maiye ana nuhufot abai ama’am isan!”
44023007	Iti na’atube eo ana maramaim, Pharisee naatu Sadducee bairi hitarayouw higam naatu kou’ay hikusib.
44023008	Anayabin Sadducee tibitumatum sabuw moroboyah boro men hinamisir maiye, naatu tounamatar men tema’am naatu afiy auman en. Baise Pharisee it sawar tounu etei isah tibitumatum.
44023009	Naatu gamin gagamin na’in matar, Ofafar bai’obaiyenayah iyab Pharisee ana kou’ay himisir fanah sib higam hio, “Paul i men abisa ta kakafin sinafumih, men taso’ob afiy o tounamatar ta na hairi hio.”
44023010	Gamin ra’at sasa, naatu baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin bir eo, Paul boro hinarab hinatensisib, naatu baiyowayah iuwih hire hin kou’ay wanawanan hirun Paul umahine hiba’aruwih hibai hina hai bar hiyari’ay.
44023011	Nati gugumin Regah na Paul sisibinamaim bat eo “Koufair inab! Jerusalemamaim ayu isou i’orereb na’atube inan Rome imaim ef ta’imon inasinaf inaorerereb.”
44023012	Marto, marauman Jew sabuw afa hina hita’imon hiyakitifuw naatu omatanen hiwa’an harew o bay men hinaa hinatom hinama’am Paul hinarab namorobabo.
44023013	Sabuw iyab Paul asabunin isan hiyayakitifuw nah etei i 40 na’atube tafanamaim auman.
44023014	Imaibo hin firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in biyah hitit hio, “Aki etei omatanen fokarin a’obaifaro bay boro men anaa anama nan Paul ana’asabun imaibo boro bay anaa.
44023015	Isan imih boun aki akokok kwa naatu Kaniser bairi tur kwaniyafar Rome Baiyowayan isan Paul nab kwa isa nare nan. Kwanifuw taiyuwin biyanamaim nuwet gewas kwanarouw kwanao nare nan. Baise aki boro efamaim anawa’ir anama’am nanan ana’asabun.”
44023016	Baise Paul rubin babin natun hiyayanuw nowar basit na barik bar tit run Paul ana tur eowen.
44023017	Naatu Paul sorodiy orot ta isan eaf na iu, “Iti monokai kwabai kwan baiyowayan ukwarin biyan, i tur ta boro ana tur na’owen.”
44023018	Baiyowayah hai orot gagamin monokai bai in baiyowayan ukwarin biyan tit eo, “Dibur orot Paul eaf arun orot iti abai o isa anan anayabin i boro tur ta nao inanowar.”
44023019	Baiyow hai ukwarin orot uman bai nawiy nabin akisihimo hin naatu ibatiy, “O abisa kukokok boro inao ananowar?”
44023020	Orot iya’afut eo, “Jew orot gagagamih etei hibasit maras boro o hinifefeyani Paul inab inare Kaniser hai kou’ayomaim ana yare hinanuwetamih, baise nati i hai baifuwen.
44023021	Imih hai tur men inanowar, anayabin orot etei 40 tafanamaim auman boro efamaim hinawa’ir hinama hinakaif. Iti oro’orot i omatanen fokarin hio baifaro bay harew hairi boro men hinaa, hinama’am Paul hina’asabunibo bay hinaa harew hinatom. Etei i sinafumih hiyabuna sawar o anot abisa inao’o i hima tekakaif.”
44023022	Baiyowayan ukwarin eo, “Men yait ta ana tur ina’owen abisa io anonowar.” Naatu orot iyafar tit in.
44023023	Baiyowayah hai orot gagamih rou’ab eafih hina iuwih eo, “Baiyowayah 200 kwanabow, horse ana orot etei 70, naatu 200 ahay bowayah, kwanabobuna boun gugumin nine korok iti tafaram kwanihamiy kwanan Caesarea kwanatit.
44023024	Horse ta Paul kwanitin afe’en namare naatu kwanatafafar gewas kwanab kwanan Gawan Felix biyan kwanatit kwanitubar.”
44023025	Imaibo baiyowayah hai ukwarin mare fef kirum eo.
44023026	“Ayu Claudius Lysias, O Felix gawan orot gewas a merar ayiy.
44023027	Iti orot i Jew sabuw hibai kafa’imo hitarab tamorob, baise ayu au baiyowayah bairi ana aiyawas. Anayabin ayu hio anowar iti orot i Rome ana fef bai ema’am.
44023028	Ayu akok i ataso’ob yabin abisa isan hiu hibiwa’wa’an, imih abai an hai Kaniser biyah atit.
44023029	Anunuwet men abisa kakafin iwa’an boro hitarab tamorob o dibur tarun, iti i Jew sabuw hai baitumatum naatu hai ofafar isan.
44023030	Naatu asabuninamih hiyayanuw hiofa’ar anowar, imih saisewat au not abogaigiwas o isa iti abiyafar, sabuw iyabowat i isan higam teo i auwih boro hinan o namaim bairi ana tur kwananowar kwanayabunei.”
44023031	Baiyowayah hai bowabow hibitih na’atube hisinaf, Paul hibai gugumin wanawanan hinawiy hin kakafih hai wawa’ir ana sou Antipatris imaim hitubar.
44023032	Naatu marto baiyowayah ahiwat himatabir maiye hina yarir bar hitit, baise horse hai orot i Paul hinawiy bairi hin.
44023033	Hinawiy hina Caesarea hitit fef gawan hitin naatu Paul auman hibai hirun umanamaim hiyai.
44023034	Gawan fef iyab naatu Paul ibatiy ana tafaram menane na, naatu Paul ana tafaram Silisia’ane rouw eo nonowar ana maramaim
44023035	eo, “Ayu boro a kamabiy sabuw hinanabo inao anowar.” Imaibo iuwih hibai hin gawan ana bar gagaminamaim dibur bar hiyari’y.
44024001	Veya etei umat roun sasawar ufunamaim firis gagamin Ananias regaregah ai’in afa naatu ofafar so’obayan orot wabin Tertulus bairi hire hin Caesarea hitit. Naatu Paul ana kakafih hibow hitit gawan Felix nanamaim ubar hitin.
44024002	Imaibo Paul hibai hina hirun naatu Tertulus busuruf ubar itin eo, “Felix o i gawan orot gewas so’ob wairaf, o a aiwob i gewasin bonawiyi manin maiyow tufuwamaim tama. Naatu sawar hi’afe’af iwowab maiye ata tafaram ana gewasin isan.
44024003	Efan tata’amaim naatu ef tata’ane, o a merar ayiy asinaf gewasin iti isan, abiyasisir gagamin maiyow o isa.
44024004	Ayu men akokok boro a veya gagamin anab, baise abifefeyani mar kafai tain inarub au tur ukwarihiwat anao inanowar.
44024005	Iti orot i kou’obo’obowanayan, naatu wow atubob i iti orot ebimamataren, Jew sabuw hai tafaram wanawanan iti orot i ku’obo’obow kakafih temamatar, naatu kou’ay wabin Nazareth Kou’ay i’ukwarin sabuw etei ebobonawiyih.
44024006	Naatu Tafaror Bar gagamin bisnowanowah atita’ur, imih afatum ai ofafar eo na’atube boro atibatiy.
44024007	Baise Baiyowayan hai orot ukwarin wabin Lisias fokarin maiyow narun e’abar giyi orot umai’imaim bosair, naatu sabuw iyab ubar hibitin iyunih baina o namaim baibatiyin isan iuwih.
44024008	Imih o taiyuw iti orot inabibatiy boro inaso’ob sawar abisa isan aki ubar abitin boro inatita’ur.”
44024009	Jew sabuw hirun hikofan ubar hitin hio, “Abisa iti orot eo i turobe.”
44024010	Gawan orot Paul isan umanamaim iman tur tao isan, naatu Paul eo, “Ayu aso’ob kwamur moumurih maiyow o Jew sabuw hai tur ikaif. Isan imih ayu abiyasisir o namaim ayu taiyuwu ana wasfafaru’umih.
44024011	O taiyuw itita’ur kusoso’ob veya 12 na’atube i sawaraka, ayu ayen an Jerusalem atitit i God kwafirin isan.
44024012	Naatu men kafa’imo Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan Jew sabuw bairi agamigam hi’itu’imih, na’atube men kafa’imo Kou’ay Baremaim naatu nati bar merar gagamin wanawanamaim kakafin baimatarin isan aku’obo’obowamih.
44024013	Naatu abisa ayu kakafin sinaf hirouw ubar hitu teo boro men anayabin gewasin ta hinao inanowaramih.
44024014	Ayu iti bebeyan aorereb inanowar. Ayu i God uwai’inah hikwakwafir i boun akwakwafir naatu Ef nati i abi’ufunun isan ayu yawas boubun baimatarin hirouw teo. Naatu ayu i sawar tutufin etei Moses ana ofafaramaim naatu dinab hai Bukamaim hikikirum etei abitumatum.
44024015	Naatu iti sabuw God isan nuhih fot hima tekakaif na’atube ayu auman nati not ta’imon abai ama akakaif, sabuw kakafih naatu gewasih etei boro morobone hinamisir maiye.
44024016	Imih ayu mar etei asisinaftobon God matanamaim naatu sabuw matahimaim au not etei roumutufurinamaim nama anabow.
44024017	Kwamur moumurih maiyow ayu Jerusalem ai hamiy ufunamaim abow aremor, imih amatabir maiye anan i kabay abai sabuw yababan wairafih baibaisih isan naatu sibor auman ya’inamih ana.
44024018	Ayu iti asisinaf ana maramaim Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana sebosebomaim hitita’uru, ofafar eo na’atube kouksouwen abai yomanin a’asa’ub ufunamaim, nati’imaim sabuw rou’ay en naatu uruw auman en.
44024019	Baise Jew sabuw afa Asia’ane hinan i nati’imaim, igewasin nati sabuw i mi’itube hitan o namaim, saise au kakafih afa hitasoso’ob na’at ubar hititu hitao.
44024020	O sabuw iti tebatabat kwibatiyih ayu abisa kakafin hai kaniser ( Sanhedrin ) hinunuwet biyau’umaim hititita’ur boro hinao inanowar.
44024021	Baise sawar ta’imon nahimaim asinaf i kakafin hirouw teo i iti. Morobone misir maiye isan abibinan hibuwu ana o namaim abat kubibabatiyu.
44024022	Imaibo Felix iti Ef isan nonowar gewas ufunamaim, tur rufut au’uf nawiy. Naatu Paul iu, “Baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin Lisias nan natitabo a tur anonowar boro ana fufufun anao inanowar.”
44024023	Naatu Felix baiyowayan orot gagamin babanamaim iu, “Paul inakif, baise baibasit initin nama naremor naatu tain tuwan baibasit initih abis nakokok na’at hinibais nama.”
44024024	Veya bai’ab na’atube ufunamaim Felix aawan Drusila hairi hina. Drusila i Jew babin, Paul isan tur iyafar na tit naatu baitumatum Jesu Keriso wanawananamaim ema’ama isan idudur hima hinowar.
44024025	Naatu Paul ma gewasin, yawas kaifin ma gewas, yawas mutufurin ma naatu baibabatiyen gagamin God boro sabuw nabibatiyih isan bidudur Felix bir naatu eo, “O i boro inihamiyu, veya gewasin ta anab maiye boro isa tur aniyafar.”
44024026	Felix ana notamaim Paul boro kabay ta titin imaim ana tur tatubun isan mar etei eaf ena hairi tema tibidudur.
44024027	Kwamur rou’ab sasawar ufunamaim Posias Festus yen Felix ana efan bai igawan. Naatu Felix Jew sabuw baiyasisir i wabin bora’ahin isan Paul diburamaim ihamiy ma.
44025001	Festus na Judea wanawanan gawan ana efan bai ma veya tounu ufunamaim Caesarea ihamiy yen na Jerusalem tit.
44025002	Nati’imaim firis ukwarih naatu Jew hai orot ukwarih hina Paul ana kakafih isan ubar hitin Festus hifefeyan.
44025003	Hikokok i mi’itube hai kokomaim tasinaf Paul tiyafar au Jerusalem tayen. Iti na’atube hisisinaf anayabin i Paul tayen tanan efamaim hita’asabun isan hiyakitifuw.
44025004	Baise Festus iyafutih eo, “Paul i Caesarea imaim dibur ema’am, naatu ayu taiyuwu iti boro’omo nati’imaim anan.
44025005	Imih a orot ukwarih i boro ayu bairi anan Caesarea anatit abis kakafin sisinaf na’at boro imaim ana kakafih isan ubar hinitin.”
44025006	Festus veya etei eight o ten na’atube nati’imaim bairi hima, imaibo au Seseria matabir maiye re. Naatu in marto basit Festus baibatiyen ana efanamaim mare naatu iuwih Paul hibai hina hirun.
44025007	Paul hibai hina hirur ana maramaim Jew sabuw iyab Jerusalemane hire hinan etei hina sisibin roun roun hi’a’ar bebera’uh baifuwen tur kakafih moumurih maiyow hibow hitit ubar hitin hio, baise hai tur hio i men kafaita biturobe’emih.
44025008	Imaibo Paul taiyuwin wasfafar eo, “Ayu i men kafai abisa ta kakafin asinaf. Jew hai ofafar ai gigim, na’atube Tafaror Bar ai gigim, o Rome ana Aiwob * ai gigimimih.
44025009	Baise Festus i kok mi’itube Jew sabuw tiyasisirih, imih ibatiy eo, “O kukokok inayen Jerusalem imaim iti ubar tibit isan a baibatiyen imaim ananowar?”
44025010	Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i Rome Aiwob ana baibatiyen efan nanamaim abatabat, imih ayu i boro iti imaim ana baibatiyen anab. O iso’ob ayu i men kafai abisa kakafin asinaf Jew sabuw isah.
44025011	Ayu ofafar ana’astu’ub imaim nabonawiyu morob ana baibasit anabaib i boro men morob ana haiw. Baise baifuwenamaim ubar hinabitu na’at, orot babin men ta ana fair ema’am boro ayu nabuw umahimaim nitihimih, ayu i boro kwaniyafaru anan Caesar nanaimaim au tur nanowar.”
44025012	Imaibo Festus ana kou’ay orot gagamih not wairafih bairi hio ufunamaim tatabir Paul iya’afut eo, “O Caesar a tur nowar isan io, imih o boro Caesar isan inan.”
44025013	Veya afa ufunamaim aiwob orot Agripa, Bernis hairi hina Caesarea hitit, Festus ana bowabow baib isan ana merar yinamih.
44025014	Hina nati’imaim hima veya bai’ab na’atube sasawar ufunamaim Paul ana tur eowen eo, “Paul mi’itube wawasfafar isan Festus aiwob orot ihamiy ema’am.
44025015	Naatu ayu au Jerusalem anan ana veya’amaim Jew hai firis ukwarih naatu regaregah ai’in, orot ukwarih ubar hitin ayu asabunin morob isan hi’uwu.
44025016	Baise ayu auwih, aki Rome ai ofafaramaim orot asir bai na baibatiyen isan ana ef men ema’am, baise wantoro’ot i boro sabuw iyab ubar tibin bairi roun roun hinabat hina’o, saise i ana ef nama’am na’at taiyuwin boro nahimaim nabat nawasfafar.
44025017	Naatu nati sabuw ayu bairi ana atitit ana veya, ayu veya men au’uf atain, faiwat a’in marto baibatiyen ana efanamaim amare, orot auwih hibai hina hirun.
44025018	Sabuw ubar hibitin ana kakafih hibow hititit i men kafa’imo sawar kakafih ayu anotanotamaim hibow hitit ubar hitinimih.
44025019	En baise, gamin afa ibo taiyuwih hai kwafiren isan. Naatu orot wabin Jesu momorob Paul yawasin ma rouw eo isan hibow hitit.
44025020	Au kasiy ra’at, iti tur boro mi’itube ata bow gewas, imih ayu Paul au i takokok na’at tayen tan Jerusalem imaim iti ubar isan hitibatiy.
44025021	Baise Paul ifefeyanu kok i Caesar baibatiyen titin, imih ayu auwih dibur baremaim hihirafut hima’uh hima, ayu ef atanuwet imaibo atiyafar tan Aiwob Caesar biyan.”
44025022	Basit Agripa Festus iu, “Ayu akokok iti orot nao ayu taiyuwu ananowar.” Festus iya’afut eo, “Marasibo nao inanowar.”
44025023	Hi’in marto Agripa, Bernis hairi hirutaburih auman hinawiyih rou’ay bar gagamin wanawanan hirun, baiyowayah hai orot gagamih naatu bar merar hai orot gagamih bairi. Naatu Festus iyunih Paul hibai hina hirun.
44025024	Festus eo, “Aiwob Agripa naatu kwa iyab boun iti’imaim bairi tabita’imon, orot iti kwa’itin! Jew sabuw iyab iti’imaim tema’am naatu Jerusalemamaim iti orot isan ubar gagamin maiyow hitin ayu matou’umaim, fanah aumatawat na’in hiwow men hikokok iti orot boro yawasin tama.
44025025	Naatu ayu anunuwet men kakafin ta sinaf boro imaim tabonawiy tan tamorob. Baise anayabin ayu ifefeyanu ana kok i boro Rome ana Aiwob nahimaim tabat ana tur hitanowar. Ayu au ef men ta ema’am boro atarufut, imih ayu au Rome baiyafarin isan abogaigiwas.
44025026	Baise fef kiruminamih ayu akasiy, tur abisa boro Aiwob Caesar isan anakirum. Anayabin ubar hibitin men ta yabin auman. Imih ayu abai atit kwa etei namaim, o Aiwob Agripa inibabatiy inanuwet gewas tur yabin anababatun inab naatu fef ana kirum.
44025027	Anayabin ayu ai’itin ayu isou men gewasin iti dibur orot ana ubar en asir taniyafar nanan ana itinin i men basit.”
44026001	Agripa iu, “O i baibasit abit taiyuw isa inao.” Paul uman bora’ah naatu taiyuwin wasfafar eo,
44026002	“Aiwob Agripa, ayu i abiyasisir anayabin boun o namaim Jew sabuw abisa isan ayu ubar hibitu i boro ana wasfafaru anao inanowar.
44026003	Iti ao i turobe, anayabin o i Jew sabuw hai binanakwar naatu hai ofafar iso’ob kwanekwan, imih o abifefeyani yatenanub inama ana’o inanowar.
44026004	Jew sabuw etei ayu kek ana veya mi’itube ama’am i hiso’ob, ayu au yawas no aneika au tafaramamaim mi’itube ama’am ana Jerusalem atit ama’ama etei i hiso’ob.
44026005	Ayu i manin maiyow bairi ama, imih ayu i hisu’ubu kwanekwan. Hinakokok na’at hina’orereb. Anaika ayu i Pharisee orot, kwafiren ana ofafar fokarin wanawanan i ayu ama, naatu men kafa’imo ofafar ta astu’ub.
44026006	Naatu boun ayu iti ubar tibitu anayabin God ana’omatanen ai a’agir bitih imaim ayu nuhufot ama’am isan, ubar hitu bairi tao.
44026007	Iti omatanen i aki ai big etei 12 hibitumitum mi’itube hita’itin titurobe, imih fai mar dogoroh tutufin etei God hikwakwafir, naatu anayabin iti baitumatum isan. Aiwobomon, Jew sabuw ayu ubar hitu iti tao.
44026008	Kwa Jew sabuw iyab iti kwabatabat aisim God sabuw murumurubih ibiyawasih baitutumin isan kwa isa efofokar?
44026009	Ayu auman mat i na’atube anot, sawar moumurih na’in ata sinaf Jesu Nazareth mowan wabin ati’ib isan.
44026010	Naatu nati na’atube Jerusalemamaim asinaf. Firis ukwarih biyahine fair abai God ana sabuw moumurih maiyow abow dibur aya. Naatu rouw morobomih teo ana veya ayu auman aibasit terouw temomorob.
44026011	Mar moumurih maiyow Kou’ay Bar efan tata’amaim abow biyababan aitih, naatu hai baitumatum baihamiyin isan a’okikimih. Na’atube hai baitumatum baigigimin isan a’okimih, naatu atit an menah tatabirih hai bar hai meraramaim bai akir kakafin maiyow aitih.
44026012	Ana’an iti isan ayu firis ukwarih biyahine fair hitu hiyunu an Damaskas atit.
44026013	Baise efamaim anan bi’auyit auman, Aiwobomon, marakaw no marane, mamarakaw men veya na’atube, marakaw kwanekwan re ayu au sabuw bairi anan tarbebera’uhi.
44026014	Aki etei’imak me yan are, naatu ayu orot fanan anowar Hebrew turamaim iuwu eo, ‘Saul! Saul! aisim ayu irabu kubia’akiru? Ayu kubi’a’akiru i o taiyuw biya irab kubi’a’afiy.’
44026015	Ayu aibatiy ao, ‘O yait Regah?’ Naatu Regah eo, ‘Ayu i Jesu, o irabu kubia’akiru.
44026016	Baise kumisir kubat, ayu o isa abirerereb ana rubini isou inabow naatu boun abisa isa mamatar sabuw afa hai tur ina’owen. Naatu abisa isa namamatar boro ani’obaiyi.
44026017	Ayu o a sabuw Jew umahine naatu Ufun Sabuw umahine boro anatafafari. Ayu abiyafari nati sabuw wanawanahimaim inan,
44026018	matah inabotawiy naatu guguminane inanawiyih hinatit marakawamaim hinarun. Naatu Satan umane inabow God initin, saise bowabow kakafihine notawiyen hinab, naatu God ana rourubin sabuw wanawanahimaim hai efan hinab hinamare.’
44026019	Nati isan Aiwobomon Agripa, ayu abisa marane re ai’itin men ai fanasair.
44026020	Bowabow wantoro’ot i Damaskas imaim abusuruf naatu ana sabuw iyab Jerusalem hima’am isah atit, Judea wanawanan etei abinan naatu Eteni Sabuw wanawanahimaim auman a binan. Abibinan anayabin sabuw bowabow kakafihine God isan hitatatabir naatu hai bowabowamaim titurobe i dogor baikitabir hibai.
44026021	Ana’an nati isan Jew sabuw ayu Tafaror Bar wanawanan ana sebosebomaim hibuwu hifatumu rabu morobomih hiwa’an.
44026022	Baise God tafafaru yawasu ama ana it boun atit, imih o namaim abat orot babin kikimin yen in orot babin gagamin etei matahimaim abisa isou mamatar i ao’orerereb. Ayu au tur ao i dinab oro’orot naatu Moses sawar abisa mataramih hi’o inu’in mamatar imaim ao.
44026023	Roubininenayan boro biyan nababan ni’akir naatu morobone, moroboyah wanawanahimaim i boro wan namisir marakaw ana yawas Jew sabuw naatu Ufun Sabuw isah nakurereb.”
44026024	Paul iti na’atube taiyuwin wasfafar eo inan auman Festus Paul isan iwow eo, “O i kubikoko’aw so’obamaim nawiyi in kubikoko’aw!”
44026025	Paul iya’afut eo, “Ayu i men abikoko’aw, au Aiwobomon! Tur abisa ao i turobe hai yabih auman.
44026026	Aiwob Agripa, ayu o namaim men erebir auman ao’omih, anayabin iti sawar etei o iso’ob, naatu sawar iti himamatar boro men karam nuhinaburumih. Anayabin iti sawar men ta umasusunamaim mataramih.
44026027	Aiwob Agripa o dinab orot kubitutumih? Ayu aso’ob o kubitumatum!”
44026028	Aiwob Agripa Paul iya’afut eo, “O kunotanot iti veya ta’imon o boro ayu dogorou inikitabir anan Kirisiyan anamatar?”
44026029	Paul iya’afut eo, “Veya kabumin o veya manin ayu au yoyoban God isan i men o akis baise kwa iyab iti boun ao kwanonowar i mi’itube kwatan ayu ama’am na’atube kwatamatar. Baise men akokok hinafatum dibur hinayariyi kwanama.”
44026030	Naatu Aiwob orot, gawan orot Bernis, naatu sabuw afa hima’am etei himisir.
44026031	Efan hima tur hinonowar hihamiy hitit, naatu taiyuwih turahinah bairi hibidudur hio, “Iti orot i men abisa ta kakafin sinaf boro namorob o dibur narun.”
44026032	Naatu Aiwob Agripa Festus isan eo, “Iti orot Caesar isan baifefeyanina’e tama’am, iti boun boro ata botait.”
44027001	Aki au Italy na’at na isan hinot hiyayabuna ufunamaim Paul naatu dibur sabuw afa bairi hibuwih Rome baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin babanamaim wabin Julius umanamaim hiya’i. Caesar baiyowayah orot hai kou’ay wabin Aiwob ana Baiyowayah.
44027002	Aki wa tafaram Adaramitiamane na batabat abai, iti wa i Asia wanawanan awar etei run titamih nununuw abai. Masedonia orot wabin Aristakus ana tafaram Thessalonica i auman is ra’at bairi an.
44027003	Anan marto Sidon arun, Julius, Paul isan i igewasin, baibasit itin ana ofonah bainanawanihimih itih ana kokok abisa baibaisin isan iu.
44027004	Nati’imaim atit maiye ana, baise yabat kufuti, imih aki wa abai ai kewakew Cyprus nuw sisibinamaim isinfafari anunuw an.
44027005	Anunuw anan i atit are Silisia naatu Pamfilia hai riy yan foun autubun arabon ana Maira arun Laisia wanawanan.
44027006	Nati’imaim Julius orot ukwarin Alexandria hai wa ta au Italy nununuw tita’ur, basit aki imaim yara’ahi.
44027007	Veya moumurih maiyow efamaim aremor, yabat rabi auman awani ayey ana bar merar Sinidus anatabir. Baise yabat i ra’at men karam boro mutufor atanunuw, imih aki Kurit nuw isinfafari anunuw Samone sisibin rounane.
44027008	Kufuti auman awani tor rewarewan anunuw ana efan wabin Umabibin imaim atit, bar merar Lasea sisibinamaim Umabibin imaim arun.
44027009	Nati’imaim veya manin maiyow ama naatu busurufin maiye na isan yabat i ra’at re sakirafut. Anayabin gagar ana veya i mar etei notawiyen ana hiyuw ufunamaim ebubusuruf. Imih Paul imatnuwih eo,
44027010	“Oro’orot ayu ai’itin it tanatit tananan i boro kakafin wan tanamara’at, wa boro nataseb, sawar etei boro tanisaroun naatu it auman boro tanamorob.”
44027011	Baise baiyowayan hai orot gagamih Julius, Paul ana tur men nowar, baise wa ana kaifenayan, naatu wa matuwan abisa hio hai tur i’ufunun.
44027012	Naatu nati awar wa rouwin rarab siba’u imaim ma isan men igewasin, imih orot etei hai kok i boro wa hitimtawiy takakaram na’at atarabon Phoenix imaim rarab siba’u atama. Phoenix awar i tafaram Kurit wanawanan naatu nati awar i gewasin anayabin umabibin oyaw na’atune veya ere’er boro ina’itin nare.
44027013	Waruw kikimin gurufune tarsisin, orot hinotanot abisa hio i mamatar, imih aumor hitain hiyen naatu rarar hibora’aten Kurit dones sisibin akutitiy.
44027014	Baise men yok yabat gagamin wabin wowog oyawane babin re.
44027015	Wa rab, aki bai kewakew run maiye isan abiwa’an men karam basit yabat wan amara’at atit are.
44027016	Baise anunuw ana nuw kikimin wabin Kauda guruf na’atune bat aki sisibin umabibin isinfafari, naatu hifafair wa kikimin uranane atain yen,
44027017	murab hibow hikiktatan gaigiwas, wa afe’en baginayah yabat buwih run Libia dones yen yara’ahih hirouw hibir, basit rar hitaiyen hire wa bat earuw.
44027018	Yabat i wan fus kubar rouw in marto, naatu wa afe’en sabuw sawar hibow hisrouruwen riy yan hire.
44027019	Naatu veya baitaunin i wa ana sawar afa: rar, murab, koutataren, naatu boy i hibow taiyan hitaiyen hire.
44027020	Tafaram etei gugum aki sumar, daman men a’itah veya manin maiyow yabat kutuw rouw inan aki etei akasiy yawas isan anotanot ai not etei sawar.
44027021	Orot nati wa afe’en veya bai’ab ama yabat rarabi bay men yait ta eaan, Paul misir nah yan foun bat eo, “Oro’orot kwa gewasin ayu fanau kwatanowar Kurit tatama’am iti sawar boro men hita’af naatu boro men ta yababan tab.
44027022	Baise boun i kwa abifefeyani koufair kwanab, anayabin kwa orot etei boro men ta inamorobomih. Wa akisinamo boro natafofor na’unun.
44027023	Fai gugumin God ayu aru, naatu God ayu akwakwafir i ana tounamatar iyafar ayu sisibu’umaim bat,
44027024	naatu iuwu, ‘Paul men inabir, o i boro Caesar nanamaim ubar hibit hinibabatiyi. God i ana kabeberamaim sabuw iti bairi wa afe’en kwanan hai yawas etei o umamaim ya, imih boro men yait ta namorob.’
44027025	Imih oro’orot koufair kwanab! Anayabin ayu God abitumitum abisa eo anonowar na’atube boro nasinaf.
44027026	Baise it i boro narabit tanan nuw ta ana donesamaim boro nayara’ahit.”
44027027	Yabat rabi Mediterenean tor yan areremor fur rou’ab sawar veya 14 baib ana veya nati ana gugumin imaim wa afe’en baginayah naniyah hibaib aki i ana tafaram abiyubin.
44027028	Basit murab hibai aumor hi’utan hitaiy re taiy hifufufum ana fofonin i 40 metres naatu hima kafai naatu hifufun maiye hi’tin i 30 metres .
44027029	Naatu hai bir i ra’at yabin yabat boro wa nab anan ar afe’en nayara’ah, imih aumor etei kwafe’en wa uranane hitaiyen hire naatu mar saise to isan hima hiyoyoban.
44027030	Imaibo wa afe’en bowayah wa baihamiyin bihiramih hima hiyakitifuw. Naatu wa kafai hirufam harew yan hitaiy re, hitifuwen wa nanane aumor baitaiyin hitarouw hitanan i aunah hitanamih.
44027031	Baise Paul baiyowayah hai orot ukwarin bobonawiyih naatu baiyowayah iuwih eo, “Iti wa afe’en bowayah wa afe’en men hinama’am na’at, kwa etei i men karam boro yawas kwanab.”
44027032	Basit baiyowayah kaiy hibow wa kafai ana murab hi’afuw naatu hitumar e’aruw in.
44027033	Mar sibisib auman, Paul orot etei iuwih eo, “Kwa i bay kwanaa, anayabin bay en kwama’am boun fur rou’ab sawar naatu ya wanawanan i men abisa ta ema’am.
44027034	Imih abifefeyani bay kwanaa fair kwanab, arib boro men ta nata’uy nare nakasiyomih.”
44027035	Paul iti eo ufunamaim rafiy bai orot etei nahimaim God ana merar yi, imasib naatu busuruf eaan.
44027036	Etei hi’itin koufair hibai naatu etei’imak bay afa hibow yah hirutan.
44027037	Naatu aki nati wa afe’en anan nai etei i 276.
44027038	Orot etei bay hi’aa yah biw ufunamaim, wheat nati wa afe’en hi’iuin hibow harew yan hitaiyen hire wa kerer.
44027039	Mar totoririb ana veya wa afe’en baginayah dones men hi’inan, baise umabibin ana dones hi’itin naatu wa hibai hisinaftobon nati dones yen baitet ra’ahin isan hinunuw.
44027040	Wa ana aumor hi’afuw tai yan hi’in naatu gunig ana murab au ta’imon hirufam, imaibo rar hibora’ah wa bai aki au dones anunuw arun.
44027041	Baise wa nunuw rur yabat rab mamay yan yen naatu yara’ah nanane re tatab bai’etaw isan men karam, naatu uranane yabat rab tagurugurus.
44027042	Baiyowayah dibur etei rouw morob isan hiyakitifuw, men hikok boro hitataiy dones hitayen hitabihir.
44027043	Baise baiyowayah hai orot gagamin i Paul tiyawas imih baiyowayah abisa hinot hio i eotanih, naatu iuwih eo, “O yait itaiy isoso’ob wan kukununuw kure kutaiy kwen dones kuyen.
44027044	Naatu afa i boro uf hinare wa rab tatagurugurus rebarebah afe’eh hinayen hinataiy hinarun.” Aki iti na’atube asinaf etei yawasi ataiy an dones yan ayen men yait ta morob.
44028001	Ataiy ana dones ayey men yait ta aboyouw, naatu nuw imaibo ai’inan, aki i ana Malta nuw ayen.
44028002	Nuw sabuw merarayow gewasin maiyow hiti, ai merar hiyi wairaf hi’asir rari, anayabin toun i yarayar naatu tutuban ea’ani.
44028003	Paul ai heaf na wairaf wan yayara’aten, naatu kok wairaf wabuburin bai kayam tit, Paul uman yub fifin.
44028004	Nuw sabuw Paul umanamaim kok fifin inu’in hi’itin basit taiyuwih hio, iti orot i uman rara. Riy yan yawasin taiy na yen, baise koubaitotorayan ana god men ekokok boro yawasin nama.
44028005	Baise Paul uman ta’asiy kok wairaf wan yen earah naatu men abisa ta isan matar.
44028006	Sabuw hima hi’itin hinotanot i boro uman tadaw o an ta’uy tare tamorob. Baise manin maiyow hima hikakaif men abisa ta isan matar, imih hai not hibotabir hio, “Iti orot i god wari’en!”
44028007	Nati dones inan sisibin turin i orot wabin Publius ana bar merar. Publius i nati nuw hai orot gagamin. Ai merar yi, veya tounu ana nanawan na’atube bairi ama ituwi.
44028008	Publius tamah sawow biyan ana fora’abin ra’at, naatu yan yub ana gem yan inu’in. Paul na ana bar run isan yoyoban, biyan butubun naatu yawas.
44028009	Sawar iti mamatar ana tur hinowar, sabuw iyab nati nuwamaim hisawow hi’inu’in hinan etei hiyawas.
44028010	Naatu hai kakaf gagamin na’in aki hiti, wa afe’en ayey ana veya ai remor isan abisa akokok etei hibaisi.
44028011	Sumar tounu ama’ama ufunamaim wa ta Alexandria’ane nan abai. Iti wa wabin, “God Kikifu” anayabin iti wa nanamaim i Kastor naatu Folux hairi hai yumat hikirum hi’inu’in. Rarab siba’u aki nati nuwamaim wa tafan ama in rarab siba’u sawar.
44028012	Wa abai atit an tafaram wabin Sarakus imaim arun veya tounu imaim ama.
44028013	Naatu nati’imaim atit anunuw ana Rhegium bar merar gagamin arun imaim a’in. Mar to waruw gurufune * busuruf babin, naatu aki atit anunuw veya bairu’abin Puteoli arun.
44028014	Nati’imaim baitumatumayah afa hima’am atitourih naatu hifefeyani bairi fur ta’imon ama. Imaibo aremor ana Rome atit.
44028015	Baitumatumayah Rome hima’am aki anan bigai hinowar basit hina Apius ahar ana efan hitit, naatu afa hina Nanawan Bar Tounu hibatabat imaim hi’iti ai merar hiyi, Paul iti sabuw i’itih ana veya God ana merar yi naatu i koufair gagamin maiyow bai.
44028016	Ana Rome atitit ana veya, Paul akisin ma isan ana baibasit hitin, naatu baiyowayah orot ta hiyai kaif hairi hima.
44028017	Veya tounu ufunamaim Jew orot ukwarih etei Paul eaf hiru’ay. Eaf hiruru’ay ana veya’amaim iuwih eo, “Taitu ayu i men kafa’imo ata sabuw isah asinaf kakaf, naatu uwatanah hai binanakwar abisa hibitit aigigimimih, baise Jerusalem imaim ayu hifatumu naatu hibuwu Rome gawan umanamaim hiya’u.
44028018	Ayu ubar hitu bairi ao hinunutitiy au kakafin men ta hitita’ur boro ata morob, imih hikok boro hitabotaitu.
44028019	Baise Jew sabuw men hikok ayu hitabotaitu, imih ayu Caesar isan ai fefeyan. Iti asisinaf i men ata sabuw ubar baitih na’atube abiwa’an.
44028020	Ana’an iti isan ayu kwa aifefeyan kwatan kwata’itu bairit tatao isan. Ayu hifatumu dibur ama’am anayabin i Israel sabuw orot nati biyanamaim nuhih fot tema’am isan.”
44028021	Hiya’afut hio, “Aki Judea’ane men fef ta o isa abaimih, na’atube taituwat nati’ine men o asinaf isan naatu abisa isisinaf kakaf ana tur men ta na eo anowar.
44028022	Baise aki akokok o anot i ku’o anowar, anayabin efan ta ta etei sabuw iti o a kou’ay boubun isan hio tegamigam anonowar.”
44028023	Basit Paul bairi veya hiyai naatu nati veya’amaim sabuw rou’ay gagamin na’in hiru’ay. Paul ma’am ana efanamaim. Mar auman Paul busuruf God ana aiwob isan kubuna naatu eorerereb etei hinowar. Sinaftobon Moses ana ofafaramaim naatu dinab oro’orot hai turamaim sabuw botabirih Jesu dogoroh baitinin isan ma iuwih in veya re.
44028024	Sabuw afa abisa eo i hitumatum, baise sabuw afa i men hitumatum.
44028025	Taiyuwih wanawanahimaim Paul ana tur yomanin eo isan hibusuruf hibibas ufunamaim himisir hitit hin. Paul eo, “Anun Kakafiyin i turobe uwatanah isah dinab orot Isaiah iwan eo,
44028026	‘Kwen sabuw iti isah kuo, Kwa i boro tain kwanarub tur kwananowar, baise boro men naniyan kwanab. Mata boro natakiyat kwananuw baise yabin boro men kwana’itin.
44028027	Anayabin nati sabuw fudirih i fokar. Tainih higibud tur men karam hinanowar, naatu matah hibofafaren. Asire matahimaim boro hita’itin tainihimaim tur boro hitanowar, fudirih boro tarerekab hitaso’ob, naatu isou boro hitamatabir, ayu atiyawasih.’
44028028	Isan imih ayu akokok kwa kwanaso’ob, God ana yawas i Ufun Sabuw isah ebiyafar naatu i boro tur hinanowar!”
44028029	Tur iti eo ufunamaim Jew hihamiy taiyuwih higam auman hin.
44028030	Kwamur rou’ab tutufin Paul bar ta tutubun imaim ma naatu sabuw iyab itinamih hinan i mar etei hai merar yiy.
44028031	Nati’imaim ma’am men kafa’imo bir naatu men abisa ta ana ef ya’afutimih, baise God ana aiwob isan ma binan, naatu Jesu Keriso isan sabuw i’obaibiyih.
45001001	Ayu Paul, Jesu Keriso ana akir wairafin, tur abarin isan rubinu, naatu Tur Gewasin binan isan God eafu atit.
45001002	Iti Tur Gewasin i marasika God ana dinab hai veya’amaim eomatanih, dinab oro’orot Buk Kakafiyinamaim hikirum.
45001003	Iti tur ana an gagamin i Natun it ata Regah Jesu Keriso isan. Biyanane ana tufuw i David ana rara’ane tufuw.
45001004	Baise i Ayubin ana kakafiyinamaim morobone mimisir ana veya, bebeyan ebi’obaiyit turobe i, i God Natun fairin.
45001005	I wanawananamaim naatu i wabin isan ayu manaw kabeber itu ana tur abarayan amatar, * saise tafaram wanawanan Ufun Sabuw anabuwih hinan tur hinitumatum naatu hinabosiyasiyar.
45001006	Naatu kwa auman i nati sabuw wanawanahimaim Jesu Keriso nowan matar isan God eafi.
45001007	Naatu Rome wanawanan kwa iyab God iyabuwi naatu rubini i ana sabuwamih kwamatar kwama’am etei, isa ayoyoyoban manaw kabeber, tufuw Tamat Godane naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso’one mar etei kwa isa nama.
45001008	Wantoro’ot Jesu Keriso wabinamaim ayu au God ana merar ayiy kwa etei isa, anayabin kwa a baitumatum i tuw ra’at tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei tenonowar.
45001009	God isan dogorou tutufin etei abow i Natun ana tur gewasin abibinan, i so’ob, ayu mar etei kwa anunuhi.
45001010	Matanfufur isa ayoyoyoban, naatu au yoyobanamaim God abifefeyan nakokok na’at boun ana veya ef nabotawiy isou naham anan kwa aninanawani.
45001011	Au kok gagamin i mi’itube kwa ayumat ata itin, saise ayubit ana usar kwa atit imaim a fair kwatab.
45001012	Iti tur i men ayu akisu kwa fair bait isan ao’omih, baise kwa auman ayu koufair kwanitu bairi tanibaibaisbonen ata baitumatum nakwat isan ao’o.
45001013	Taitu tuwa’inah ayu akokok tain anayai kwanaso’ob, mar moumurih na’in abogaigiwas atan kwa ata’iti, saise kwa wanawanamaim Ufun Sabuw afa atabow hitan baitumatum wanawanan hitarun, nati’imaim abow hina baitumatum wanawanan hirur na’atube. Baise sawar moumurih maiyow ayu au ef hirufutifut tama tanan iti boun tatit.
45001014	Ayu i sabuw etei’imak isah bai’akiramih atit, Greek sabuw naatu sabuw iyab men Greek, na’atube sabuw so’ob wairafih naatu men so’ob wairafih etei’imak isah anabow anibaisih.
45001015	Ana’an nati isan ayu akokok kwanekwan tur gewasin kwa iyab nati Rome kwama’ama auman isa anabinan.
45001016	Ayu Tur Gewasin ao’orereb isan men biyou eo’ohow, anayabin God ana fair i ef iti’imaim tit sabuw iyab tibitumatum ebiyawasih. Iti yawas i wantoro’ot Jew sabuw isah, baise Ufun Sabuw auman.
45001017	Anayabin yawas mutufurin Godane i tur gewasinamaim orot babin eyayamutufurih, baitumatumamaim ebubusuruf naatu boro baitumatumamaim nasawar. Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum iti na’atube eo, “Orot ana yawas mutufurin boro baitumatumamaim nama.”
45001018	Sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah naatu sabuw tafa’asarih, i hai kakafinamaim turobe ana gewasin esumisum, imih maramaim God ana ya so’ar tit ibirerereb nati sabuw isah.
45001019	Sawar tutufin etei i rereb yah hi’itah tesoso’ob, anayabin God etei bebeyanamaim sinaf tibirerereb.
45001020	Anamaim God tafaram sinaf mamatar ana veya, God ana yawas wa’iwa’irin, ana fair wanatowanin naatu i ana itinin etei i sawar sinaf himamataramaim bebeyah hi’itan hiso’ob, imih boro men yait ta God su’ubina’e nao nifufuwenamih.
45001021	Nati sabuw i God hisu’ub, baise men kafa’imo God hirouw tebora’ara’ah, o merarayow tibitinimih. Nati efanin i hai not bonawiyih kwarikwarisen wanawanan hirun dogoroh eowarar naatu gugumafut.
45001022	Basit i not wairafih hirouw teo, baise hai not botabir hina koko’aw na’atube himatar,
45001023	God morob atin bonamanamarin kwafirina’e i hitatabir orot hai yumatabe o mamu, o harufor, uma’ar, kok, i hai yumatabe hitar hima tekwakwafirih.
45001024	Isan imih God nati sabuw ihamiyih hitit bowabow kakafih ta ta wanawanan hirun. Dogoroh ana kok na’atube tisisinaf, orot baibin hai faifuw hikwahir naatu baibin ibo orot hai ar hikwahir taiyuwih hi’in hisesebar biyah tebobokarikarit.
45001025	Turobe God nowan i hibotabir efanin baifuwen hiyari’iy, naatu God Sawar Sinafuyan kwafirina’e, hitatabir sawar i sinaf himamatar hai fair babahimaim hirun hikwafirih isah tebowabow. Baise ana gewasin sabuw i God akisinamo hitakwafir hitabora’ara’ah wanatowan, wanatowan, Amen .
45001026	Ana an iti isan God ihamiyih insesebar naniyan kakafin * anababatun hibai tisisinaf. Baibin oro’orot hai ar hikwahir, i taiyuwih hi’in tibisesebar kwanekwan.
45001027	Ef nati ta’imon oro’orot auman baibin hai faifuw hikwahir i taiyuwih baisesebar isan tibifi’afi. Naatu oro’orot taiyuwih hi’in tibisesebar kwanekwan. Ana an nati isan i taiyuwih hai kakafinamaim baimakiy tebaib.
45001028	Anayabin sabuw God ana so’ob anababatun bain isan hai not kowarar naatu hirutawiy, imih God ihamiyih hitit not kwarikwarisen hibai hima kakafih men hitasisinaf i hima tisisinaf.
45001029	Dogoroh wanawanan bowabow kakafih ta ta etei awan karatan: not kakafih, kabat, tafa’asar, bobowen, sabuw rouw morob; baiyow, baifufuwen, nuw okwanekwan, yanuw,
45001030	koutabitabir, God baifa’ifa’in, kakaf en, nuw furuwen, ora’ara’at, naatu bowabow kakafih sinaf isan hai ef boubuh tibimamataren. Naatu hinah tamah fanah tibifanasair.
45001031	Nati sabuw i hai naniyan en, aurih bosunusunub en, yabow, baiwan babanen en.
45001032	Naatu God ana ofafaramaim sabuw iti na’atube hinasisinaf isan hinamomorob i hiso’ob, baise i hima kakafin tisisinaf. Naatu sabuw afa bowabow iti na’atube tisisinaf auman isah i baibasit hitih hima tisisinaf.
45002001	Isan imih kwa isa men ef ta ema’am boro imaim kwanabat sabuw afa hai kakafih kwanasebmatar ubar kwanitih, anayabin nati kakafin ta’imon kwa auman kwasisinaf.
45002002	Baise God turobe tafanamaim bat sabuw iyab kakafih tisisinaf isan baibatiyen ebitih i taso’ob.
45002003	Imih o orot maiyow, sawar kakafin o kusisinaf na’atube sabuw tisisinaf isan o kubibatiyih * o kunotanot God ana baibatiyen boro inahaiw?
45002004	Ai o God ana baiwanbabanen, ana yawanan, ana yatenub i ku’i’itin furuw. Naatu o iwanbabani dogor baikitabirin isan enanawiyi kwa’i’itin ai en?
45002005	Baise anayabin kwa i kwafokar naatu dogor kwahir, a baimakiy kwama kwatutu ra’at eyey ana Veya’amaim God ana yaso’ar bebeyan nab natit turobe’emaim tafaram boro nabibatiy kwana’itin.
45002006	God boro ta’ita’imon abowabow * ana fofonin a baiyan nit.
45002007	Sabuw iyab yatehnub hima gewasin tisisinaf, naatu marakaw, baifa’en, ma wanatowan tinunuwih boro ma’ama wanatowanin nitih.
45002008	Baise sabuw iyab i taiyuwih hai yawas tinunuwih, naatu turobe hikwahir kakafih tibi’ufunun, God ana gagamat naatu ana yaso’ar boro tafah yan nisuwai nare.
45002009	Sabuw iyab bowabow kakafih tisisinaf i boro bai’akir naatu biyababan gagamin maiyow hinab. Jew sabuw biyahimaim boro nabusuruf nan Ufun Sabuw biyahimaim nisawar.
45002010	Baise sabuw iyab bowabow gewasih tisisinaf, God boro fair, baifa’en, borara’aten naatu tufuw nitih, Jew sabuw biyahimaim boro nabusuruf nan Ufun Sabuw biyahimaim nisawar.
45002011	Anayabin God i ana fofoninamaim sabuw bai’ubaren ebitih, men ta aukoun ebatabatamih.
45002012	Sabuw iyab ofafar ufunane hima kakafin hisisinaf auman boro baimakiy hinab. Naatu sabuw iyab ofafar babanamaim hima kakafin hisisinaf boro ofafar nibatiyih.
45002013	Anayabin sabuw i boro men ofafar tenonowaramaim nayamutufurih God matanamaim hinatitamih, en baise ofafar hinowar tibi’ufunun boro nayamutufurih.
45002014	Eteni Sabuw aurih ofafar i en, baise abisa i hai yawasamaim eo na’atube tisisinaf i hai ofafar turaban nati, basit i aurih ofafar anababatun i en.
45002015	Anayabin kakafin gewasin kousibin ana not i ofafar na’atube dogoromaim ema’am boro a tur na’owen, a kakafin isan boro ubar nit nakusairi, naatu a gewasin isan boro natafafari.
45002016	Tur Gewasin iti ao’orereb na’atube boro namatar. Nati baibatebat ana veya God boro Jesu Keriso narubin sabuw hai not wa’iwa’irih etei boro nabow hinatit rerereb yah naya.
45002017	Baise kwa Jew sabuw kwarouw kwao, naatu ofafar tafanamaim kwabat God isan kwanao ra’at.
45002018	God ana kokok sinaf isan i kwaso’ob, naatu kakafin gewasin hairi kusibin isan i ofafaramaim ebi’obaiyi.
45002019	Taiyuw kwaso’ob, kwa i matah fim hai nabatanayah, gugumin ma’ayah hai marakaw
45002020	koko’aw sabuw hai roube’atenayah, bereberefiy hai bai’obaiyenayan, naatu ofafar wanawanan ana kinitur tutufin etei naatu turobe etei auman i kwaso’ob.
45002021	Sabuw kwabi’obaibiyih, baise kwa taiyuwiban kwabi’obaiyi ai en? A binanumaim kwao, “Men kwanabain” Baise o kubabain ai en?
45002022	Sabuw turahinah aawah ufun na isan i kuo’otanih, baise o turanah aawah ufuh kwenan ai en? Umataratar baifa’ifa’ih irouw kuo, baise hai kwafiren bar wanawanan o kubabain ai en?
45002023	God ana ofafar isan i kuo’ora’ara’at, baise ofafar i’astu’ub God biya’ohow kubitiniban kui’itin ai en?
45002024	Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum, “Eteni Sabuw God wabin tibigigim anayabin kwa Jew sabuw asinafumaim.” *
45002025	O ofafar inabobosiyasiyar na’at, a’ar hi’a’afuw i boro nan ana’an gagamin namatar, baise ofafar ina’a’astu’ub, o a’ar kanabin hi’a’afuw ana’itin i afuwina’e. *
45002026	Sabuw iyab hai ar kanabih men hi’afuw, baise ofafar eo biyunih na’atube tebobosiyasiyar, nati sabuw i sabuw iyab hai ar kanabih hi’a’afuw hinasairih.
45002027	Orot yait biyanane ana ar kanabin men hi’afuw, baise ofafar i ebobosiyasiyar, o boro nasiksairi, anayabin o i ofafar iso’ob naatu a’ar kanabin hi’afuw, baise ofafar men kubobosiyasiyar.
45002028	O yait Jew orot kumamatar i men biya ufunane hi’a’afuw imaim o ina Jew orot kumamataramih.
45002029	En baise, Jew orot anababatun i dogor wanawanan. Naatu afu’afuw anababatun i dogor wanawananamaim Anun Kakafiyin esisinaf, men biya. Naatu bora’ara’aten etei i Godane nan inab men orot biyahine.
45003001	Jew orot inamamatar boro Ufun Sabuw inanatabirih? Naatu a’ar kanabin hina’a’afuw ana gewasin i boro men tomar inab?
45003002	Ef tata’ane etei i gewasih, wantoro’ot God ana tur i Jew sabuw hitutumih hitih.
45003003	Baise sabuw afa men hibitumitum isan, kwanotanot God ana omatanen isan boro men nabosunusunub? *
45003004	En anababatun! God ana tur i mar etei turobe, baise sabuw i baifuwenayah. Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum, “Tur awamaim etitit i mar etei asinafumaim initurobe, naatu baibatiyen ana veya hai tur boro inisnowah.”
45003005	Baise it ata sinaf kakafihimaim God ana sinaf gewasin bebeyan natit sabuw hina’i’itin ana veya, it boro mi’itube tanao? God baifuwenamaim yan so’ar baimakiy ebitit? it i anababatun taikoko’aw tao kwanekwan.
45003006	Nati tur i men turobe tao’omih, anayabin sinaf nati na’atube nama’am, God boro mi’itube tafaram ana sabuw nibatiyih?
45003007	Orot babin ta boro nagam nao, “Ayu i men bosunusunubayan, baise au bowabowamaim turobe God nowan tit irerereb sabuw hi’itin God hifai tebobora’ara’ah, aisim God ayu kakafu rouw eo ekukusairu?”
45003008	Naatu iban boro kwanao maiye, kakafin tanasinaf, saise sinaf gewasin boro ine natit. Sabuw afa ayu iti na’atube o hirouw higam tiu’uwu, God nati sabuw boro baimakiy nitih.
45003009	Iti sawar ana an i abisa? It Jew ata gewasin i ra’at Eteni Sabuw tanatabirih? En anababatun! Jew sabuw naatu Eteni Sabuw etei i bowabow kakafin ana fair babanamaim tama’am.
45003010	Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum, “Orot babin men yait ta ana ef mutufurin, men kafa’imo orot ta’imon;
45003011	Men yait ta ana not rerekabin, men yait ta God enunuwih.
45003012	Etei hitatabir kouh God hitin, etei hisinaf kakaf hikowarar, men kafa’imo yait ta gewasin esisinaf, men kafa’imo orot ta’imon. *
45003013	Sikah dub i tahahab sabuw tetotonan, menah kautabitabir ana efan matar, ufurihimaim kok tuwamorob awakirurin awan karatan.”
45003014	“Awah i orarafen awan karatan naatu tenakuyakuy.”
45003015	“Iti sabuw umah i rara awan karatan.
45003016	Menamaim tenan ma kakaf naatu gurugurusen mar etei imaim emamatar,
45003017	Naatu tufuwamaim ma ana ef i men hiso’ob.
45003018	Naatu God matanamaim men kafa’imo tibibiruw.”
45003019	Imih it ata so’obamaim ofafar hikikirum i sabuw iyab ofafar babanamaim tema’am isah, saise awah etei nabofafaren, naatu tafaram wanawanan sabuw etei nabow nan God ana baibatiyenamaim hinatit.
45003020	Isan imih God boro men sabuw ofafar tebobosiyasiyar imaim hai ef mutufurin narouw nabowamih, ofafar i orot babin ana bowabow kakafin botait ebirerereb.
45003021	Baise boun God sabuw yamutufurih isan ana ef i boubun botawiy. Moses naatu dinab oro’orot nati isan i ofafaramaim hio’orereb tanowar, men ofafar tanabi’ufununimaim nabuwitamih.
45003022	It yamutufuren boubun Godane enan i sabuw iyab Jesu Keriso tibitumitum imaim enan, naatu God matanamaim it etei ata’itinin i men tata’amih.
45003023	Anayabin sabuw etei bowabow kakafin hisinaf naatu God ana gewasin bain isan umah kabom.
45003024	Baise manaw kabeber God ana siwar na’atube Jesu Keriso wanawananamaim na it ata kakafihine tubunit * botaitit tatit.
45003025	Bowabow kakafin notawiyen isan God Keriso biyan siboromih yai, ana rara suwa re saise baitumatumamaim tanan biyan tanatit. Sawar iti na’atube sinaf saise bebeyan ti’obaiyit i ana ef i mutufurin. Anayabin I ana yatenub kakafiyin imaim bowabow kakafih marasika tasisinaf isubun rabon.
45003026	Naatu iti boun it ata veya’amaim i turobe ebi’obaiyit i ana ef mutufurin. Imih i karam sabuw iyab Jesu tibitumitum boro nafufunih gewas nayamutufurih.
45003027	Isan imih it boro abisa isan tanaora’ara’at? Ofafar tabobosiyasiyar isan tarara’at? En anababatun! Baise baitumatum isan i tarara’at.
45003028	Anayabin sabuw iyab tibitumatum i hai ef mutufurin rouw ebowabow men ofafaramih.
45003029	Imih kwanotanot God i Jew sabuw akisih hai God? Ai kwanotanot Ufun Sabuw auman hai God? Baise anao kwananowar, iti God i Ufun Sabuw auman hai God.
45003030	Kwanaso’ob God i ta’imon men rou’ab, imih sabuw iyab hai ar kanabih hi’afuw o men hi’afuw etei i baitumatum ta’imonamaim hiyawas.
45003031	Kwanotanot iti baitumatumamaim aki ofafar abobosa’ir? En anababatun, aki i ofafar aiwa’an tit ana efan bai ebirerereb.
45004001	Abraham it uwat regah biyanamaim sawar abisa himatar, imaim itah soso’ob isah boro mi’itube tanao?
45004002	Anayabin Abraham ana bowabowamaim yamutufuren nabaib na’at, i karam ana ef ema’am boro nao ra’ara’at, baise men God nanamaim.
45004003	En baise, Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo? “Abraham God itumitum naatu i ana baitumatumamaim God yamutufuren ana i’inanen itin.”
45004004	Orot ebowabow isan tibibaiyan, nati i men ana siwar tibitin baise ana bowabow isan baiyan tibitin.
45004005	Orot yait ana bowabow men i’itin, baise ibitumitum God i sabuw kakafih eyayamutufurih. Nati orot boro yamutufuren ana’i’inanen Godane nab, anayabin ebitumatum, men ana bowabowamaim.
45004006	Buk Atamaninamaim David i tur ta’imon eo, orot yait yamutufuren ana’i’inanen God bitin boro baigegewasin nab, men ana bowabowamaim. Imih David iti na’atube eorereb eo,
45004007	“Orot yait ana sinaf kakafih nonotawiyen boro nigegewasin, naatu orot yait ana bowabow kakafih sasamen boro nigegewasin.
45004008	Nati orot i boro baigegewasin nab, i ana bowabow kakafin Regah isan sisinaf boro men imaim ubar nitin na’umih!”
45004009	Iti baigegewasin i sabuw iyab hai ar kanabih hi’a’afuw akisih isah, ai hai ar afuwa’e tema’ama auman isah? Baise boun tanowar, “Abraham i ana baitumatumamaim God dogoron botabir ana ef mutufurin rouw eo.”
45004010	Iti sawar i mi’itube matar? Abraham ana ar afuwina’e ma’am ana veya matar o ana ar hi’a’afuw ufunamaim matar? Baise anao kwananowar, Abraham i wan God ana baibasit wanawanan run, imaibo ana ar i uf hi’afuw.
45004011	Naatu nati ar afu’afuw i Abraham ana baitumatumamaim yamutufuren baib ana i’inanen. Iti sawar i Abraham ana ar kanabin auman ma’am ana veya matar. Isan imih sabuw iyab hai ar kanabih auman baise hina baitumatumayah himamatar tamah i Abraham, anayabin i hai baitumatumamaim God hai ef mutufurin rouw eorereb.
45004012	Naatu Abraham auman i tamah, men ar afu’afuw akisin, baise Abraham ana baitumatumamaim ana’ar kanabin auman ma reremor tibi’ufunun auman.
45004013	Abraham wawawan bairi God tafaram nowahimih baitih isan eo’omatanih ana veya i men ofafar bobosiyasiyar isan. Baise ana baitumatumamaim ana ef mumutufor isan.
45004014	Anayabin sabuw iyab ofafar tebobosiyasiyar isan God ana omatanen nabitih na’at, baitumatum i boro nan ana’an en namatar naatu God ana omatanen i owararin.
45004015	Ofafaramaim ya so’ar emamatar, baise efan menamaim ofafar men ema’am, asto’oben men ema’ama.
45004016	Isan imih omatanen etei i baitumatumamaim emamatar, saise manaw kabeber Godane nan Abraham wawawan etei isah, men sabuw iyab ofafar tebobosiyasiyar akisih isah. Baise baitumatumayah auman Abraham bitumatum na’atube. Anayabin it etei ayubit isanane tamat i Abraham.
45004017	Bukamaim iti na’atube eo, “Ayu o asinafi tafaram tutufin etei tamah imatar. Imih iti omatanen isan Abraham God ana tur itumitum,” anayabin God i murumurubih ebiyayawasih, naatu sawar yanonowat eo hitit tibirerereb.
45004018	Abraham sawar God eo’omatan men itah, baise baitumatumamaim nuhin fot ma kakaif yomaninamaim tafaram maumurih na’in tamah matar. Bukamaim isan eo na’atube matar, “O natunat boro daman na’atube.”
45004019	Abraham ana kwamur i ra’at, biyan i morob, naatu aawan Sarah yan wanawanan kek ana bar auman i morob, baise Abraham ana baitumatum i men ririm.
45004020	Naatu men kafa’imo God ana omatanen isan erekasiy auman ma’amih, baise ana baitumatum eabar totofar bat God ana merar yi bora’ara’ah.
45004021	Abraham ana naniyan tutufin etei bai so’ob God i fairin, abisa isan eo’omatan i karam boro nasinaf.
45004022	Ana’an iti isan, Abraham ana baitumatumamaim ana yawas mumutufor isan God bai.
45004023	Iti tur, “Ana ef mutufurinamaim God baib” i men Abraham akisin isan hikirum.
45004024	Baise it auman isat hikirum, it iyabowat ata ef emumutufor naatu iyabowat tabitumatum God Jesu ata Regah morobone biyawas maiye isan.
45004025	Jesu it ata kakafin isan God ibasit hi’asabun, baise morobone iyawas maiye, saise it tanawiyit tanan God nanamaim tayamutufurit.
45005001	Isan imih ata baitumatumamaim yamutufurit bonawiyit tana Jesu Keriso ana sinafumaim God bairi taitafentutur * tama’am.
45005002	Baitumatumamaim buwit tana manaw kabeber God nowan i’obaiyit taso’ob boun imaim tama’am. Naatu * ana marakaw bonamanamarin bairi faram isan nuhit fot tama tabiyasisir.
45005003	Men nati akisin, baise biyababan ta ta tabaib auman isan tabiyasisir, anayabin biyababanane baitafofor ebimatar,
45005004	naatu baitafoforane ata yawas ewowowab, naatu nati yawasamaim it nuhifot ebitit.
45005005	Naatu iti nuhifot tabaib boro men yababan nititamih, anayabin God ana yabow dogorot wanawanan Anun Kakafiyinane isuwai ra’iy, nati i God ana usar it ebitit.
45005006	Anayabin it ata fair naatu ata baibais en tama’am God ana veya yai inu’in imaim Keriso na tit ata kakafih isan morob.
45005007	Men yait ta boro orot ana yawas mutufurin isan morobomih nakok, basit orot babin ta boro orot gewasin isan nakok.
45005008	Baise God ana yabow it bi’obaiyit i ra’at kwanekwan, it bowabow kakafin wanawanan tama’ama ana veya Keriso isat morob.
45005009	Naatu boun it i Keriso ana rara’amaim yamutufurit, baise men nati akisin, God ana yaso’arane auman iyawasit.
45005010	Marasika it i God ana kamabiy sabuw, baise I Natun ana morobomaim it tana God ana tounuw tamatar, naatu men baitounuw akisin, baise God ana tufuw auman itit, i Natun ana yawasamaim it boro niyawasit.
45005011	Naatu men nati akisin, baise God isan taniyasisir anayabin ata Regah Jesu Keriso iyafar na God bairi taitounuw.
45005012	Tafaramamaim bowabow kakafin i orot ta’imon biyanamaim matar, naatu i ana kakafinamaim morob matar, naatu sabuw etei hibusuruf himorob, anayabin sabuw etei kakafin hisinaf.
45005013	Bowabow kakafin tafaramamaim i wan matar, God ana ofafar i ufibo na. Imih bowabow kakafin ana tur Bukamaim en, anayabin ofafar en.
45005014	Baise tanaso’ob, Adam ana veya’ika busuruf na Moses ana veya’amaim titit, orot babin etei morob nawiyih. Sabuw afa himomorob i men God ana obaiyunen Adam ea’astu’ub na’atube hi’a’astu’ub isan himorobomih, baise rara kakafinane etei himomorob. Adam i ina’inan na’atube orot ta boro uf nan isan.
45005015	Baise iti siwar ana baiyan en God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim bitit i ra’at kwanekwan. Men Adam ana bowabow kakafin na’atube’emih. Anayabin orot ta’imon ana kakafinamaim sabuw etei himorob, baise orot ta’imon Jesu Keriso ana manaw ana kabeberane God ana siwar gewasin bai na sabuw moumurih na’in tubunih yawas itih.
45005016	Iban ao maiye, God ana siwar naatu Adam ana kakafin hairi hai itinin i men ta’imon. Anayabin orot ta’imon ana kakafinamaim baibatiyen na sabuw baimakiy hibai. Baise God ana siwar gewasin baiyan en nan ana maramaim sabuw moumurih na’in ata kakafihimaim tama’ama botaitit naatu yamutufurih tana God biyan tatit.
45005017	Orot ta’imon ana kakafinamaim sabuw etei morob nawiyih, baise turobe orot ta’imon Jesu Keriso ana sinafumaim. God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim ef baimutufurin ana siwar gewasin bisuwai boro hini’aiwob Keriso wanawananamaim.
45005018	Isan imih orot ta’imon ana kakafinamaim sabuw etei bonawiyih baimakiy bainamih hinan. Baise iban maiye Keriso bowabow gewasin sisinafumaim sabuw yamutufurih yawas bain ma isan ana siwar itih.
45005019	Anayabin orot ta’imon ana fanasairamaim sabuw tutufin etei hi’af, imih orot ta’imon ana fanabowamaim sabuw etei hina hai ef mutufor.
45005020	Ofafar natit, saise bowabow kakafin nataub nara’at, baise efan menamaim bowabow kakafin toub erara’at God ana manaw ana kabeber nati’imaim auman i tafan ya’abar erara’at.
45005021	Isan imih bowabow kakafinamaim nawiyit tan morob wan tayen, baise God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim ata Regah Jesu Keriso biyanamaim ata ef yamutufur ma’ama wanatowan itit.
45006001	Abistan boro tanao? It na’atuka tanama bowabow kakafih tanasinaf, saise God ana manaw ana kabeber tafan nayababar nara’at?
45006002	Men karam! It i bowabow kakafinane tamorob, aisim biyat boro namatabir bowabow kakafinamaim nama maiye?
45006003	Na’atube Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim kwarun bapataito kwabaib ana veya, morob auman ana bapataito kwabaib men kwaso’ob?
45006004	Isan imih it ata bapataito’omaim Keriso bairi hubemaim tare, ana morob bairi tafaram, saise Keriso hubene Tamah ana fairamaim iyawas maiye mimisir na’atube, it auman tanamisir yawas boubunamaim tanama.
45006005	I ana morobomaim it bairit iti na’atube tanikofan tanamomorob na’at, i ana misiramaim turobe boro bairit tanamisir maiye.
45006006	Anayabin it biyat atamanin onaf afe’en Keriso hairi hi’onafih himomorob i taso’ob, saise biyat men tama bowabow kakafin isan ti’akiramih,
45006007	Anayabin orot babin yait emomorob ana veya bowabow kakafin ana fairane ikitawiy tit.
45006008	Naatu Keriso bairi tanamomorob na’at, tabitumatum i ema’amamaim it auman boro bairit tanama.
45006009	Anayabin it etei taso’ob Keriso i morobone misir maiye, naatu boro men karam namorob maiye, morob ana fair i wasatan.
45006010	Imih nati morob i momorob i sabuw etei hai bowabow kakafin isan mar ta’imon morob, mar moumurih na’in isan, baise yawas iti boun ema’am i God ana yawasamaim ema’ama.
45006011	Ef nati ta’imon, kwa taiyuw kwanasu’ubi, bowabow kakafinamaim kwa easbuni kwamorob, baise Jesu Keriso’one God ana yawasamaim boun kwama’am.
45006012	Isan imih men kafa’imo kwanibasit bowabow kakafin kanab nabonawiy ana kok kakafih kwani’ufunun.
45006013	Men biya turin kwanibasit bowabow kakafin nab ana not kakafih nasinafumih, baise nati efanin taiyuw biya God kwanitin, sabuw yawasihibe kwanasinaf men murubihibe. Naatu biya tutufin etei God ana kokok gewasih sinaf isan kwanitin.
45006014	Bowabow kakafin men kafa’imo kwa isa ni’ukwarin, anayabin kwa i men ofafar babanamaim kwama’amamih, baise God ana manaw ana kabeber babanamaim kwama’am.
45006015	Imih abisa boro tanao? Bowabow kakafin tanasinaf? Anayabin it men ofafar babanamaim tama’am baise God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim tama’am? Men karam!
45006016	Kwaso’ob ai en, o yait taiyuw orot ta initin isan ini’akir inabobosiyasiyar, o i nati orot ana’akir wairafin babanamaim kuma’am. Imih o yait bowabow kakafin isan inabi’akir yomanin i morob, naatu God inabobosiyasiyar yomanin i yawas mutufurin.
45006017	Baise God ana merar ayiy, anayabin marasika kwa i bowabow kakafin ana aiwobomaim kwama isan kwabi’akir. Baise boun dogor tutufin etei bai’obaiyen abit i kwabai kwabi’ufunun.
45006018	Kwa i bowabow kakafinane hirufami kwatit, naatu kwana yawas gewasin isan kwabi’akir.
45006019	Mar etei tao’omaim ao, anayabin kwa a not i boro’ika ririmin. Marasika kwa biya turin i bowabow kakafin sinaf isan kwaibasit kwaitin sisinaf. Imih boun i ef ta’imon nati na’atube kwanasinaf biya tutufin etei kwanab God ana bowabow isan kwanaya’asair, saise yawas gewasin isan ni’akir.
45006020	Bowabow kakafin isan kwabi’akir ana maramaim, yawas gewasin sinaf i ana ufunane kwama.
45006021	Nati ana veya sawar iti boun kwasisinaf isan biya eo’ohow hai gewasin i abisa kwabai? Nati sawar hai yomanin i morob.
45006022	Baise boun kwa i bowabow kakafinane hirufami kwatit kwana God ana’akir wairafin kwamatar. Ana gewasin kwabaib i kwa ayawas tutufin etei nawiy kakafiyin matar, naatu nati sawar yomanin i ma’ama wanatowan.
45006023	Anayabin bowabow kakafin ana baiyan i morob, baise God ana siwar i ma’ama wanatowan Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim ema’am.
45007001	Taitu, abisa isan anao i kwa kwaso’ob, anayabin kwa etei’imak ofafar i kwaso’ob. Ofafar i orot babin yawasin ema’am ana veya i ebobonawiy.
45007002	Itinin ta i boro iti na’atube kwana’itin, tautabin babin aawan yawasin ema’ama ana veya ofafaramaim eo’o, nati babin i boro orot biyanamaim nafatum nama. Baise orot namomorob ufunamaim babin i tabin ana ofafarane hirufam.
45007003	Isan imih babin aawan yawasin ema’am ana veya i orot ta nabi’awan, nati babin i moser kwebayan. Baise orot emomorob ana veya, nati babin i ofafarane tit. Naatu orot ta nabi’awan na’at i men moser kwebayan.
45007004	Imih taitu tuwai’inah, ef ta’imon nati na’atube Keriso ana morobomaim baitumatumayah ofafar ana fairane rufamih hitit. Imih i ana misir maiye’emaim baita’ay boubun ana ef imatar, naatu boun morobone God biyawas maiye i nowan kwamatar, saise it bowayah gewasih na’atube God isan tanabow.
45007005	Anayabin it taiyuwit biyat ana kok isan tanotanot ana veya, ofafar run biyat ana kok kakafin kura’ara’ah naatu biyat tutufin etei bonawiy in morobomaim yai.
45007006	Baise boun, it nati ofafar fatumit tamorob ta’inu’in, God nati fatufatumane rufamit tatit. Anun Kakafiyin ana ef boubunamaim tabowabow, men ef atamanin ana ofafar hikirum inu’in tai’ufunun tabowabowamih.
45007007	Imih ofafar i bowabow kakafin sinafuyan tanarouw tanao? En anababatun! Baise ofafar en na’at ayu au kakafih boro mi’itube ataso’ob. Anayabin ofafar men tama’am na’at ayu boro mi’itube bahiy isan hiofafar ataso’ob.
45007008	Baise bowabow kakafin nati ofafaramaim ana ef tita’ur run ayu wanawana’umaim kura’ara’ah sawar kakafih asisinaf. Ofafar men tama’am na’at, bowabow kakafin i boro ana fair men tama.
45007009	Marasika ayu ofafar men asoso’ob ana veya ayu i yawasu ama, baise obaiyunen tur tit anonowar ana veya bowabow kakafin yawas naatu ayu amorob.
45007010	Obaiyunen tur nati yawas bai na hirouw hio atitita’ur i morob bai na.
45007011	Anayabin bowabow kakafin, iti obaiyunen turamaim ana ef bai ayu ifuwu naatu easbunu.
45007012	Isan imih ofafar i kakafiyin, naatu obaiyunen tur i kakafiyin, mutufurin naatu gewasin.
45007013	Imih iti sawar gewasin imaim sinaf ayu au morob bai na? En anababatun! Baise bowabow kakafin i ayu easbunu, isan imih bowabow kakafin taiyuwin ana yawas botait irerereb, sawar gewasin wanawanan wa’ir na ayu imurubu. Naatu nati obaiyunenamaim bowabow kakafin na kakafin, kakafin anababatun matar.
45007014	It taso’ob ofafar i ayubit isan; baise ayu i orot maiyow, bowabow kakafin ana akir wairafinamih tubunu.
45007015	Abisa asisinaf hai yabih men asoso’ob, anayabin abisa sinafumih akokok i men asisinaf, baise abisa abifutuw i asisinaf.
45007016	Naatu baise, abisa asisinaf i abisa men akokok i asisinaf nati i ayu abibasit ofafar i gewasin.
45007017	Imih nati i men ayu asisinafumih, baise bowabow kakafin iti wanawana’umaim ema’am i esisinaf.
45007018	Ayu so’ob wanawana’umaim i men gewasin ta ema’am, nati i ayu biyau naniyan kakafin. Anayabin ayu au kok gagamin i mi’itube gewasin ata sinaf, baise sinaf isan men karam boro anasinaf.
45007019	Anayabin abisa gewasin sinafumih anotanot i men asisinafumih. Baise kakafih men akokok sinaf nati i ama asisinaf.
45007020	Naatu ayu sawar abisa men akokok i asisinaf, nati i men ayu asisinaf, baise bowabow kakafin wanawana’umaim ema’am i esisinaf.
45007021	Isan imih iti ofafar ana ef mi’itube ebowabow i atita’ur. Ayu bowabow gewasin sinafumih anotanot ana veya, bowabow kakafin i mar etei etitit.
45007022	Ayu wanawanau i ebiyasisir gagamin maiyow God ana ofafar isan.
45007023	Baise ayu biyau wanawanan efan tata’ane ofafar ta ayu au not ana ofafar hairi hibiyow atatam. Nati baiyowamaim iwa’an ayu buwu bowabow kakafin ana ofafar wanawan dibur yariyu.
45007024	Ayu i yababan orot! Yait boro iti biyau murubinane niyawas nabotait.
45007025	God ana merar ayiy Jesu Keriso’one ayu boro niyawasu. Imih ayu au not i boro God ana ofafar isan ni’akir nabow, baise ayu biyau i bowabow kakafin ana ofafar isan ni’akir nabow.
45008001	Isanimih boun sabuw iyabowat Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim hikofan tema’am boro men hinakusairihimih.
45008002	Anayabin God Anunin ana fairamaim Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim yawas ebitit, i ayu bowabow kakafin ana fairane naatu morob ana fairane rufamu atit.
45008003	Ofafar men karam tasinaf, anayabin it biyat ana kakafinamaim iwa’an ofafar ririm. Baise God sinaf, taiyuwin Natun Ta’imon iyun ra’iy orot biyan kakafin bai iyaun, naatu bowabow kakafin ana siboromih matar. Naatu bowabow kakafih orot babin wanawanahimaim etei kusaisiren.
45008004	God iti bowabow sinaf, saise ofafar ana tur eo’o i hinan wanawanatamaim hinamatar, men biyat ana kokomaim tanama, baise Ayubin ana kokomaim tanama.
45008005	Sabuw iyab biyah ana naniyanamaim tema’am hai naniyan tutufin etei i nati’imaim ebobonawiyih. Baise sabuw iyab Anun Kakafiyin ana kokomaim tema’am, hai not tutufin etei Anun ana kokomaim tesisinaf.
45008006	Turobe orot babin ana notamaim nabobonawiyi boro morob wan inayen. Baise Anun Kakafiyin ana notamaim nabobonawiy boro yawas naatu tufuw inab.
45008007	Anayabin sabuw iyab biyah ana kokomaim kakafih ebobonawiyih i God ana kamabiy temamatar, naatu men karam boro God ana ofafar babanamaim hinama.
45008008	Sabuw iyab biyah ana kokomaim ebobonawiyih men karam hiwa’an God niyasisir.
45008009	Baise kwa i men biya ana kokomaim ebobonawiyi, baise Anun Kakafiyin. Anayabin God Anunin i kwa wanawanamaim ema’am. Orot yait Keriso Anunin men wanawananamaim ema’ama, i men Keriso nowan.
45008010	Baise Keriso kwa wanawanamaim ema’am, imih God buwi yawas kwama’am. Basit biya i boro namorob anayabin bowabow kakafin awan karatan, baise ayub i yawasin anayabin ayub ana yawas i mutufurin.
45008011	Naatu God Anunin Jesu morobone biyawas kwa wanawanamaim ema’ama. Keriso morobone biyawas na’atube kwa auman boro i Anunin kwa wanawan ema’am imaim biya yawas nitin.
45008012	Isanimih, taituwou, it i bowabow hitit, baise men biyat ana kokomaim tanasinafumih.
45008013	Anayabin kwa biya ana kokomaim kwanama’am na’at boro kwanamorob. Baise Anun Kakafiyin ana kokomaim kwanama’am na’at, biya ana kokok kakafih etei boro nimuruben. Naatu kwa boro yawas kwanama,
45008014	anayabin sabuw iyab God Ayubin ebobonawiyih i God natunatun.
45008015	Anayabin God Ayubin kwabaib i men kwa niwa’ani bir ana fairamaim nabonawiy isan kwani’akiramih. Baise Ayubin kwabaib i natunatun anababatun matar isan kwabai, saise imaim fair tanab isan tanarerey tanao, “Abba! Tamaiya!”
45008016	I Ayubin it ayubit bairi hita’imon teo’orereb it i God natunatun.
45008017	It i natunatun imih sawar abisa i ana sabuw isah ebobotan boro bairi tanab yaun. Naatu abisa God Keriso isan ebobotan boro bairi tanab yaun. Keriso ana biyababan bairi tanafafaram na’at ana marakaw boro bairi tanafaram.
45008018	Anababatun au’uwi, biyababan iti boun tabai tabi’akir, mar boro ana marakaw nabirerereb hairi tanafufufun, nati marakaw i ra’at kwanekwan men biyababan hairi ta’imon.
45008019	Anayabin baimataren sawar tutufin etei God natunatun bow tit bairerereb isan, yah kusikus iwa’an hima hi’uroron tinuwanuw.
45008020	Orot ta’imon ana kakafinamaim baimataren sawar tutufin etei higabiyoy, men i akisih hai kokomaim baise God ana kokomaim sinaf.
45008021	Iti baimataren sawar etei veya ta hai bai’akirane hibat timunumun boro hinabotaitih hinatit God natunatun bairi marakaw gewasin hinafaram.
45008022	It taso’ob baimataren sawar tutufin kek tufuwamih ebotukwar ana biyababan tebaib na’atube, aneika hima hitef hirererey tana boun tatit.
45008023	Men baimataren sawar akisin hima hitef tererereyamih, baise it auman wanawanatamaim hamenamo erererey auman tama takakaif, God nan ni’obaiyit it i natunatun.
45008024	Anayabin it nuhifotamaim iyawasit. Abisa isan nuhit fot tama’am i tabaika, aisim boro ibanak sawar tabo isan nuhit nafot tanama tanakaif.
45008025	Baise sawar abisa men tai’itin nuhit nafot tanama tanakakaif na’at, it boro yatet nanub tanama tanakaif.
45008026	Ef nati ta’imon it ata ririm ana veya i Ayubin ena it baibais ebitit. Anayabin it mi’itube o yoyoban isan ana ef men taso’ob. Baise i Ayubin it isat tef rerey eyoyoyoban wainit, turamaim men karam boro tanao.
45008027	Naatu God dogorot nutitiy i’itin, Ayubin ananot i so’ob, anayabin Ayubin God ana sabuw isah eyoyoyoban i God ana kokomaim esisinaf.
45008028	Naatu taso’ob, sawar etei God esisinaf i gewasih sabuw iyab tibiyabuw isah, sabuw iyab i ana kokomaim ea’afih isah.
45008029	Sabuw iyab God erurubinih i so’obabo erurubinih. I akisin yasairih hina i Natun ana’itinabe himatar, saise i Natun i baitumatumayah etei tuwah hai ain na’atube.
45008030	Naatu iyab yayasairih i eafih, naatu iyab ea’afih i yamutufurih, naatu iyab yayamutufurih i ana marakaw bairi faram isan buwih.
45008031	Sawar iti sisinaf isan boro mi’itube tanao? God it isat nabatabat na’at yait boro nagam na’uwit? En anababatun.
45008032	God taiyuwin Natun men eoharihar, baise it etei siwarit, Natun ta’imonam ata siwar yai. Imih kwanotanot sawar afa’am boro asire baitita’e nama? *
45008033	God taiyuwin ana roubinen sabuw gewasih rouw bowabow yait boro baifuwenamaim nagam na’uwih? En anababatun!
45008034	Yait boro God ana sabuw ubar nitih nagam na’uwih? En anababatun! Jesu Keriso akisinamo morob, naatu morobone misir maiye Tamah ana asukwafune mare isat ma eyoyoyoban.
45008035	Imih yait boro Keriso ana yabowane nakusibit, yare men karam nakusibit, o yawas fokarih, roukoukuwen, baimar kakafin, sawar en, obiruwen, o morob?
45008036	Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, “O wabimaim aki i mar etei morob wanawana’imaim ema’am, ai’itinin i sheep bunibunin afuwinamih tebai tenan na’atube.”
45008037	En baise, Keriso aki biyabuwi i wanawananamaim sawar etei hai fair aki aisnowaten.
45008038	Imih ayu aso’ob anababatun men karam boro sawar ta imaim Keriso ana yabowane nakusibitamih, men morob, men yawas, men tounamatar, men Demon, men mar iti boun, men mar boro enan, men fair
45008039	men yate mar, men me baban, men sawar ta himamatar wanawanahimaim boro God ana yabow ata Regah Jesu Keriso wanawananamaim ema’am nakusibit tanatitamih, en anababatun.
45009001	Ayu i Keriso wabinamaim tur anababatun ao, men abifufuwenamih. Anayabin dogorou naniyan atatatam Anun Kakafiyin ebibasit ayu abisa ao.
45009002	Ayu dogorou wanawanan yababan awan karatan, naatu baiyufarir isan abiwa’an men ekakaram.
45009003	Anayabin ayu au sabuw, biyau finimu turin naatu au rara anababatun, i wabihimaim mi’itube God tao rarafu. Naatu Keriso’one hita’afuru’umu atatit nabin,
45009004	saise Israel sabuw yawas hitab, God natunatunamih hitamatar: ana marakaw, ana obaibasit, ana obaiyunen tur hitab, kwafiren anababatun, naatu ana omatanen isah tirerereb.
45009005	Nati sabuw hai a’agir kwafe’en i Hebrew big ana kik owe’owen, imaim gin tanay boro tanan Keriso ana tufuw ana’an tanatit. God akisinamo sawar etei ana bonawiyenayan tanabora’ara’ah wanatowan wanatowan. Amen .
45009006	Baise God ana omatanen i men ta baifuwenamih, mar etei i yabih temamatar. Iti ao anayabin Israel sabuw etei hai tufuw ana’an i Israelane hitufuw, baise etei’imak boro men hinan Israel sabuw hinamataramih.
45009007	Na’atube Abraham ana rara’ane hitutufuw men etei Abraham natunatunamih. Bukamaim God iti na’atube eo hikirum inu’in kwaso’ob. “O natu Isaac ana rara’ane iti omatanen abit boro i hinab.”
45009008	Tur iti na’atube ana kubuna kwananowar, God natunatun i men Abraham ana rara’amaim hitutufuw akisih ebowabowamih. Baise sabuw iyab omatanenane hitutufuw God natunatun i nati sabuw.
45009009	Anayabin God Abraham iti na’atube eomatan, Veya ayai’iya’imaim boro ana matabir naatu Sarah boro nataub kek orot nayai.
45009010	Men nati akisin baise kwana’itin, Rebecca auman toub kek kikif ya, tamah ta’imon ata’agir Isaac.
45009011	Anakubuna gewas kwananowar, kek kikif wanawanahimaim kek ta bai ana kok abisa yayakitifuw isan, naatu Rebecca iu, “Kek ain boro tain isan nabow.” Kek i men hitufuw,
45009012	naatu men sawar ta gewasin o kakafin hisinafumih, baise i ana yayakitifuwen tafanamaim bat ta rubin. Men i hai bowabowamaim ta rubinimih, en.
45009013	Bukamaim hikirum inu’in kwaso’ob, “Jacob i ayu abiyabuw, baise Esau i ayu abifa’ifai.”
45009014	God isan boro mi’itube tanao? I bowabow kakafin orot? Aiyabin anababatun!
45009015	Anayabin Moses isan eo, “Ayu orot babin yait ta anarurubin i boro anakabibir.”
45009016	Isan imih sawar etei i men it sabuw takokok o tabowabowamaim emamatar, baise sabuw iyab God ana kokomaim ekakabibirih.
45009017	Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum inu’in, Moses Egypt hai aiwob orot isan eo, “Anayabin iti isan ayu abora’ahi efan yatetoro’ot ayara’ahi. Saise ayu au fair wanawanamaim anayai nabow naatu ayu wabu nara’at tafaram tutufin etei hinanowar.”
45009018	Isan imih, God ebiyasisir sabuw iyab baibais tekokok boro nibaisih, baise sabuw iyab dogoroh efofokar boro niwa’an hinafokar.
45009019	Kwa orot ta ayu isau boro iti na’atube inao, “Aisimamih God aki ebi’ubari? Yait boro ana kok nakwahir?”
45009020	O i yait, orot maiyow aisim God awan kuyayafutifut? Noukwat men karam boro ana bu’urayan isan nao, ‘Aisim iti na’atube ibu’uru?’
45009021	Orot noukwat bu’irayan i akisin ana kokomaim me ta’imonamaim noukwat boro rou’ab nabu’ir, ta hiyuw ana noukwat, ta veya maiyow baitab isan ana noukwat.
45009022	God ana yaso’ar i kok kwanekwan boro sabuw ti’obaiyih. Iyab hisisinaf kakaf isan tagurusih, saise ana fair imaim hita’itin, baise nati efanin i yatenub wainab bairi hima.
45009023	Iti na’atube sinaf, saise i ana marakaw bonamanamarin ti’obaiyit tata’itin naatu ana sabuw iyab kabibirih bairi ana marakaw faram isan rurubinih auman tataso’ob.
45009024	Anayabin it sabuw i God ea’afit, men Jew sabuw akisih, baise Ufun Sabuw auman ea’afih.
45009025	God ana tur iti na’atube eo Hosea ana Bukamaim kirum. “Sabuw iyab men ayu au sabuw, boro isah ana’af anao, ‘Ayu au sabuw,’ naatu ayu boro anao, Ayu au sabuw abiyabow, nati sabuw men abiyabow.”
45009026	* Nati efamaim God eo, “Kwa i men ayu au sabuw.” Baise i boro nao, “Kwa i God ma’ama wanatowanin natunatun.”
45009027	Isaiah Israel sabuw isah tur rererebamaim eo, “Kwa Israel sabuw i tor ana dones na’atube, God boro matan ta’amo niyawasih.
45009028	Anayabin, Regah i saise’ewat esisinaf sabuw tafaramamaim tema’am etei boro marta’imon baimakiy nitih nasawar.”
45009029	Marasika iti tur Isaiah eo, “Regah Fairin men agir hai durun ta ebihamiy i, it boro tatan bar merar Sodom naatu Gomorah hairi bi’afiyih na’atube ti’afiyit.”
45009030	Tur yomanin boro iti na’atube tanao, Ufun Sabuw i men ofafar hinuwih hibai imaim God hai ef mutufurin rouw eorerebamih, baise abisa Keriso isah sisinaf hitumatum imih God hai ef mutufurin rouw eorereb.”
45009031	Baise Israel sabuw ofafar hinuwih hinotanot hai ef i mutufor hirouw hio, baise en, anayabin i ofafar eo’omaim hisisinaf.
45009032	Ana’an aisim? Ana’an i men baitumatumamaim hibat, baise abisa i hisisinafumaim hibat. Imih a rousukusukunen ana kabayamaim ah rusukun hire.
45009033	Bukamaim hikikirum na’atube, “Kwa’itin ayu i Zion ana kabay sabuw ah erurusukusukun tafanamaim abatabat, to nati sabuw ah erusukun tere’er. Yait i nabitumitum boro men aurin biya’ohow nama.”
45010001	Taituwau ayu dogorou wanawanan au kok gagamin naatu au yoyoban i mi’itube ayu au sabuw Israel yawas hitab!
45010002	Anababatun a tur ao’owen Israel sabuw etei i God isan tibibobowen, baise i hai bobowen i men so’ob anababatun tafanamaim tebatabat.
45010003	Anayabin ef mutufurin Godane enan i men hiso’ob, imih i taiyuwih hai ef tibimataren, naatu God ana ef mutufurin i bitih babanamaim men tema’am.
45010004	Anayabin ofafar ana tur etei Keriso sinaf in yomanin isawar, saise sabuw iyab tibitumatum etei hinan hai ef namutufor.
45010005	Moses ofafaramaim baimutufurit isan iti na’atube kubuna eo, “Orot yait Regah ana tur ebi’ufunun i boro nama.”
45010006	Baise ef mutufurin, baitumatum tafanamaim bat enan i iti na’atube eo, “Men dogoromaim kwanao, ‘Yait boro au mar nayen, Keriso nab nare?’
45010007	O yait boro inare me baban Keriso morobone inab inayen?”
45010008	Baise tur abisa ao i iti, God ana tur i wanawanamaim, awamaim, dogoromaim, baitumatum turaban nati i boun aki ao’orereb.
45010009	Naatu awamaim ina’e’en Jesu i Regah naatu dogoromaim initumitum i morobone God iyawas maiye, o boro niyawasi.
45010010	Anayabin o dogoromaim kubitumatum isan a ef boro namutufor, naatu awamaim kue’e’en isan boro yawas inab.
45010011	Bukamaim itit na’atube eo, “Orot yait i ebitumitum boro men biyan na’ohow.”
45010012	God matanamaim Jew naatu Ufun Sabuw i ta’imon men tata’amih, nati Regah ta’imon etei hai Regah. Iyab isan te’afa’af boro ana toto ana buyoy tutufin etei nigegewasinih.
45010013	Anayabin, “Sabuw iyab Regah isan te’afa’af boro niyawasih.”
45010014	Bo i men hinabitumitum boro mi’itube isan hina’af? Naatu tur men nan hinanonowar boro mi’itube hinitumatum? Naatu binanuyah men hinan hinabibinan boro mi’itube tur hinanowar?
45010015	Naatu tur binanuyah men hiniyafarih hinatitit, tur boro yait nabinan? Bukamaim hikikirum na’atube, “Binanuyah God ana tur gewasin hibai hitit me hiwawastubun ana itinin i gewasin maiyow!”
45010016	Baise Israel sabuw turihiwat tur gewasin hinowar naatu hitumatum. Anayabin Isaiah iti na’atube eo, “Regah yait boro aki abibinan nanowar?”
45010017	Isan imih, baitumatum i tur tanonowar imaim emamatar, naatu tur abisa tanonowar i Keriso ana turane enan.
45010018	Baise ayu abibat, nati sabuw tur men hinowar? En sabuw i tur hinowar” Fanah tit kamar tutufin etei bai, naatu hai tur i tit tafaram ana yomanin etei hinowar.
45010019	Iban abibat maiye, Israel sabuw tur men naniyan hibai? Tur hinowar naatu Moses wantoro’ot eo, “Ayu boro sabuw afa anibaisih, au sabuw hinibobowen, Naatu Ufun Sabuw afa anigegewasinih, au sabuw yah naso’ar.
45010020	Naatu Isaiah itafofor eo, “Sabuw iyab ayu men tenunuwuhu, i ayu hitita’uru; sabuw iyab ayu isou men hifefeyan i isah airerereb.”
45010021	Baise Israel sabuw isah iti na’atube eo, “Mar manin maiyow ayu sabuw baifanasairayah naatu dogoroh fokarin isah umou abora’ah abat ao kwana kwai’ufnunu.”
45011001	Ayu kwa abibatiyi: Kwanotanot Israel sabuw God kwahirih? Aiyabin! Ayu i Israel orot, Abraham ana rara’ane atufuw naatu au durun i Benjamin.
45011002	God ana sabuw marasika nowanamih rurubinih men kwahirihimih. Buk wanawanan efan ta’amaim Elijah Israel sabuw isah gam God iu kwanotanot?
45011003	“Regah ifefeyan eo, “Regah a dinab orot etei hirouw himorob sawar, naatu a sibor hai gemogem i etei hikwayam hihururuw hire, ayu akisu’umo kutatabuw ama’am. Naatu boun i tesisinaftobon ayu hinarabu ana morobomih.”
45011004	Baise God Elijah iya’afut eo, “Ayu au bai’ufununayah sabuw etei seven thousand iyab Baal men hikwakwafir i tema’am.”
45011005	Ef i nati ta’imon boun emamatar. Sabuw matanta’amo iyab God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim rurubinih i tema’am.
45011006	I ana roubinen i manaw kabeber tafanamaim bat esisinaf. Men sabuw hai bowabowamaim. Anayabin God ana roubinen sabuw hai bowabowamaim na’itin narurubiniyih na’at, nati manaw kabeber i yabin en.
45011007	Ana itinin nati isan, Israel sabuw abisa isan hinot hinunuwet men hitita’urimih, baise sabuw matan ta God rurubinihiwat hinunuwih hitita’ur. Sabuw turin God ea’afih tainih gogor naatu dogoroh fokar.
45011008	Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, “God nuhih ibur dogoroh iwa’an fokar, imih boun ana veya hinanuw men hina’itin, hinanowar men naniyan hinab.
45011009	Naatu David eo na’atube, “Kwihamiyih hai hiyuw banimih ematar, naatu warasa na’atube ebuwih tere saise baimakiy hinab
45011010	Matah kubofafar, saise men hinanuw, mar etei bit kwitih tun erabih teso’ob.”
45011011	Abibatiy maiye. Israel sabuw ah rusukun hire’er boro na’atuka hina’in? En anababatun! Baise boro hinamisir maiye. Anayabin i hai ra’iyemaim ef botawiy yawas gewasin na Ufun Sabuw hibai, isan imih Israel sabuw isah tibibobowen.
