45011012	Jew sabuw hai kakafihimaim baigegewasin gagamin tit tafaram etei ebaib. Naatu i ayubih ana kasiyomaim Ufun Sabuw baigegewasin gagamin na’in suware tebaib. Imih Israel sabuw moumurih na’in hinarur ana veya baigegewasin i boro gagamin na’in hinab.
45011013	Boun i kwa Ufun Sabuw isa ao. Ayu iti na’atube kwa Ufun Sabuw a tur abarayan ana ma’am, ayu iti bowabow wanawananamaim boro anasinaftobon anabow gewas.
45011014	Saise imaim anotanot au sabuw Jew hita’it ra’ahu hinanugigir ibo hinan yawas hinab.
45011015	Anayabin Jew sabuw kouh God hibitinimaim, tafaram wanawanan sabuw God ana rakit hima’am botabirih hina bairi hitounuw. Imih God sabuw bairi tibitounuw ana veya, ana itinin i sabuw murumurubih bow na yawas ebitih maiye na’atube.
45011016	Rafiy kafuf imasib reban sibor kuyayara’ah, kafuf tutufin etei i kakafiyin matar, naatu ai wairoron turin God ana sibor inabitin na’at, famefamen auman i nowan himatar.
45011017	Kwa Ufun Sabuw a’itinin i kutor olive famefamen na’atube. Baise hi’afuw umatanum olive famenamaim hituwituw hikuboubunih hiyen, imih boun kwa i Jew sabuw hai yasisir turin kwabai kwabiyasisir.
45011018	Isan imih sabuw nati ai famehibe hi’afuw hire’ere men kwananuw furuwih kwani’o’orotomih. Anayabin kwa i ai famefamen, naatu ai famen ana fair i ai anane ana fair ebaib.
45011019	Kwa boro iti na’atube kwanao, “Ai famen hi’afuw hisaroun, imih ayu boro i ana efanin anab hinitutuwu.”
45011020	Nati i turobe. Nati sabuw ai famehibe hi’afuw hibisaroun, anayabin men hitumatum, kwa i kwaitumatum imih kwana hai efan kwabai. Baise nati isan men kwanio’oro’ot.
45011021	Anayabin Jew sabuw i ai famen anababatun men yawananih, baise e’afuw isaroun, imih kwa auman boro men nayawanan nihamiy kwanama’amih.
45011022	Imih God ana kabeber naatu ana yaso’ar hairi kwana’itin. Sabuw iyab kakafin sinafuyah God nati sabuw isah i yan esoso’ar, baise kwa isa i ekakabeber. Naatu i ana kabeberamaim kwanama’am na’at i mar etei ana gewasin kwanama. Baise men imaim kwanama’am kwa i boro na’afuw nabosairi kwanatit.
45011023	Sabuw nati hinamatabir maiye hinabusuruf God hinabitumitum, boro nabow hai efanamaim naya. Anayabin God ana fair ema’am karam boro nasinaf.
45011024	Kwa Ufun Sabuw, kwa i kaiyar olive famen na’atube kwama’am hi’afuw kwana umatanum olive famenamih hitutuwi. Naatu Jew sabuw i umatanum olive na’atube. Isan imih God karam ai famefamen anababatun hitagagagir ti’inu’in boro nabow nitutuwen maiye.
45011025	Ayu akokok iti tur ana kirikirifot i kwanaso’ob gewas, saise men kwa akis not wairafih kwanarouw kwana’omih. Israel sabuw afa dogoroh i fokar, imih boro nati na’atube hinama nanan Ufun Sabuw runamih hio ana fofonin hinan hinarun.
45011026	Ef iti na’atube namatar saise Israel sabuw etei boro niyawasih, Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo. “Baiyawasenayan boro Zion ine nan, Jacob wawawan bowabow kakafih tisisinaf nabosairen.”
45011027	“Naatu hai bowabow kakafih ana bobosairen ufunamaim au obaibasit boro anitih.”
45011028	Israel sabuw hina God ana rakit na’atube himatar, saise Tur Gewasin kwa Ufun Sabuw isa tan. Baise Israel i God ana rourubinen sabuw, imih God ebiyabuwih anayabin uwahinah oro’orot wabih gagamin.
45011029	God men kafa’imo siwar bitih umahimaim bosair naatu ana sabuw rurubinih isah nuhin burumih.
45011030	Baise kwa Ufun Sabuw marasika God fanan kwasair, baise boun ana kabeber i’obaiyi kwa’i’itin, anayabin Israel sabuw fanan hisair.
45011031	Naatu ef i ta’imon, kabeber nati kwakwabaib i boun Jews sabuw auman God i’obaiyih ti’i’itin.
45011032	Anayabin sabuw etei hibifanasair isan God ibasit hifanasair, saise hai fanasairane etei’imak takabibirih.
45011033	Yowe! abifofofor men kafaita, yait boro God ana toto ana buyoy, ana not naatu ana so’ob isan nafufun nibabatiy, yait boro i abisa esisinaf isan nanuwih nibabatiy?
45011034	O yait Regah ana not iso’ob? O yait boro Regah ana binan inao ini’obaiy?
45011035	O yait God a sawar itin, saise God boro wan nay obo nit?
45011036	Anayabin sawar tutufin etei hai an i God, etei i wanawananamaim, naatu etei i nowan. Imih kwafiren, bora’ara’aten etei i tanitin wanatowan, wanatowan. Amen .
45012001	Isan imih taituwau, God ana kabeber ai’itin i ra’at kwanekwan, imih abifefeyani, kwa biya yawasin i kwanaya’asair God ana siboromih kwanitin. Nati sibor i kakafiyin naatu God ana yasisir, anayabin nati i ayubit ana kwafiren ef anababatun.
45012002	Men tafaram ana yawasamaim nabonawiyi, baise God kwanifefeyan a not tutufin etei nabotabir niboubun. Imaibo kwa i karam God ana kok abisa boro kwanafufun gewas, i ana gewasin, ana yasisir naatu ana kok uhewbitan boro kwanaso’ob.
45012003	Manaw kabeber God ayu bitu imaim kwa au’uwi. Men taiyuw a notamaim nabora’ahi me’at, baise a not narumutufur gewas kwa a baitumatum God bit anafofonin imaim kwanabatkikin.
45012004	Biyat i sawar maumurih na’in baina ikokofan wowab biyat matar. Naatu biyat wanawanan ana wowab ta ta i bowabow ta ta tebowabow.
45012005	It i moumurit na’in, baise Keriso’one it etei tana biyat ta’imon matar. Naatu ta’ita’imon ikokofanit tana biyat ta’imon tutufin matar.
45012006	Isan imih manaw kabeberamaim ata siwar ta ta tabow. O ta a siwar God ana tur orereb isan na’at, a baitumatum ana fofoninamaim inabat inaorerereb.
45012007	God ana bowabow isan nabit na’at inabow, bai’obaiyen isan na’at ini’obaibiyen.
45012008	Koufair na’at, sabuw koufair nitih, bosemorayan na’at, ereyasisir nabosemor, bonawiyenayan na’at, na’abar totofar sabuw nabonawiyih, kabeberayan na’at, erekawasa isah nasinaf.
45012009	Yabow i turobe’emaim iniyabow, abistan kakafih inarukouw, naatu abisa gewasih inabukikin.
45012010	Kirisiyan ana yabowamaim taituwa isah iniyabow, naatu taituwa bairi nena kwanikakafbonen.
45012011	Sunanub kwanabow men kwananokow, Regah isan dogor tutufin etei yoyobanamaim kwanabow.
45012012	Ereyasisir nuhi nafot kwanama, bai’akir ana veya yatenanub naatu mar etei kwanisnubanub kwanayoyoban.
45012013	Kirisiyan sabuw iyab tibi’akir kwanibaisih, naatu a etawan kwanabotawiy nanawan sabuw isah.
45012014	Sabuw iyab hirab tibia’akiri, God kwanifefeyan nigegewasinih, men nararafihimih
45012015	Sabuw iyab tibiyasisir bairi kwaniyasisir, naatu sabuw iyab tibiyababan bairi kwaniyababan.
45012016	Kou’ayomaim a not etei ta’imon taituwa kwananuhih bairi kwanibit abar kwanama. Men kwa akis notanotayah kwanarouw kwanaora’ara’at taituwa kwanitaiyih. Baise taiyuw kwanayariyi bairi anafofonin kwanaremor, men o akis not wairafi inarouw inao.
45012017	Sabuw o isa kakafin hinasisinaf, men wan inay kakafin isah inasinafumih. Baise yate nanub abisa gewasin sabuw etei matahimaim inasinaf.
45012018	Asinafumaim sawar etei gewasih inasinaf, saise sabuw bairi tufuwamaim kwanama.
45012019	Men kafa’imo isa kakafin hinasisinaf isan sa bowamih inanot, baise nati efan inihamiy God ana yaso’ar boro i sa nabow. Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim iti hikirum, “Ayu boro wan anay, Regah iti na’atube eorereb.”
45012020	Naatu Bukamaim iban eo maiye, “A rakit orot bayumih namomorob na’at inituw, harewamih sikan namamamah na’at, harew initin natom, iti na’atube inasisinaf a rakit orot dogoron wanawanan boro biya’ohow na’arah auman naremor.
45012021	Kakafin men nawasbunimih, baise gewasin inasinaf imaim kakafin inawasabun.”
45013001	Kwa etei a aiwob * kwanakakafiyih, anayabin roubabaruwen ana fair etei i Godane na orot bai. Naatu iti aiwob ana fair etei i God taiyuwin imatar.
45013002	Isan imih o yait aiwob orot kukwakwahir, o i God abisa bimatar kukwakwahir. Naatu sabuw iyab nati na’atube tisisinaf i taiyuwih babah teo’o.
45013003	Anayabin sabuw iyab gewasin tisisinaf bonawiyenayah isah boro men hinabir, baise kakafih sinafuyah boro hinabir.
45013004	Anayabin orot ukwarih i God ana’akir wairafih, kwa ama gewas isan tebowabow. Baise kakafin kwanasisinaf na’at i kwanabir, anayabin orot ukwarin sabuw baimakiyih isan ana fair God bitin i ema’am boro baimakiy nitih.
45013005	Isan imih, a orot ukwarih i kwanakakafiyih, anayabin nati kwasisinaf ebi’obaiyi i sawar gewasin, men baimakiy akisin isan kwanabir kwanakakafamih.
45013006	Ana’an nati isan kwa kabay kwaya’aya, anayabin God ana bai’akirayah i faimar iti sawar isah tebowabow.
45013007	Orot babin hai bit abisa biya ema’am kwanitih abit kwanikisisir, kabay ana bit kabay kwanayai, tura ana sawar biyamaim ana bit kua’abar wan inay maiye, isa tekakaf ibo isah inakakaf, tirurusagiyi ibo inarusagiyih.
45013008	A bit sabuw biyahimaim tema’am etei kwanibaiyan nasawar, men kwanihamiyen hinama’amih. Bit ta’imon biyamaim nama’am i yabow akisin, taituwa bairi kwaniyabowbonen kwanama, anayabin orot yait taituwan ebiyabow i ofafar eo na’atube sinaf yabin emamatar.
45013009	Ofafar i iti, “Turanah a’aawah men ufuh inan, sabuw men ina’asbunubuw, men inabain, men inabahiy, naatu ofafar afa iti na’atube etei i iti ofafar suma’ay, taituwa iniyabuwih o taiyuw kubiyabuw na’atube.
45013010	Yabow taintuwan men ebiyababan. Isan imih yabow i abisa ofafar eo na’atube i sinaf yabih temamatar.
45013011	Naatu sinaf iti kwanasinaf, abisa iti boun ana veya temamatar i kwanaso’ob. In ana veya i sawar, anayabin it yawas bain isan ana veya i na kabom, men marasika tabitumatum na’atube.
45013012	Gugumin i kafa’imo nasawar, mar i boro’omo natoririb. Isan imih gugumin ana bowabow i tanihamiyen, naatu tanamisir marakawamaim ma isan taniyow.
45013013	Bowabow gewasin mar ana efamaim tanasinaf, men aatom, gamin, harew tom baikoko’aw, baiwa’an kwanekwan, baiyow, naatu baibobowen.
45013014	Baise Jesu Keriso kwanab a faifuwamih kwaniyoun, saise boro men biya ana kok susuwin isan ana ef kwananuwetamih.
45014001	Yait ana baitumatum erara’iy ana merar kwanay kwanab a kou’ayamaim narun, baise men i ana kakafin isan bairi kwanagam kwanibabatiy.
45014002	Sabuw afa tebitumatum bay etei karam boro hinaa, baise afa hai baitumatum kikimin, imih i bay akisinamo te’aau.
45014003	O yait bay etei ku’aa, taituwa bay afa men eaa isan inanufuruw ina’omih, na’atube o yait bay afa ihamiyen afa’awat ku’aa, men taituwa bay etei eaa isan inanufuruw ina’omih. Anayabin God nati orot auman ibasit ebaib.
45014004	Kwa men karam orot ta ana akirwairafin kwanibabatiyimih? Orot Ukwarin akisinamo boro ana akir wairafih ta ere’ere naatu ta ebatabat boro hairi nibatiyih. Naatu Regah akisin boro nafufunih yait i bowabow gewas ebowabow.
45014005	Orot ta enotanot veya ta’imon i veya gagamin, men veya afa na’atube. Naatu orot ta enotanot veya etei hai itinin i ta’imon. Orot ta’ita’imon i taiyuwih hinanot gewas hinabow.
45014006	Orot yait not veya ta’imon ya’asair imaim God ekwakwafir, i narusagiy. Naatu o yait a kok bay ta ta ku’aa i auman Regah kururusagiy, anayabin nati bay isan Regah ifefeyan igegewasinika. Naatu o yait sawar afa itafuta afa’awat ku’aau auman Regah kururusagiy, naatu merarayow kubitin.
45014007	Yawasit tama’am o tamomorob i men it taiyuwit isat.
45014008	Imih yawasit tama’am i Regah isan tama’am, naatu tamomorob, i Regah isan tamomorob. Yawasit tama’am o tamomorob it i Regah nowan.
45014009	Ana’an iti isan Keriso morob naatu yawasin misir maiye, naatu sabuw yawayawasih, murumurubih etei isah ebi’aiwob.
45014010	Aisim taituwa bayuwat eani’aan kwabibabatiyih? Naatu aisim taituwa kwanunufuruwih? Anayabin it etei boro God ana baibatiyen urama’ama nanamaim tanabat nibabatiyit.
45014011	Bukamaim hikikirum, Regah iti na’atube eo, “Ayu yawasu ama’am, sabuw etei boro nou’umaim suh hinayowen hinakwafiru; naatu sabuw tutufin etei boro hinaorereb ayu i God.”
45014012	Isan imih it ta’ita’imon ata yawas abisa tasisinaf etei boro God ana tur tana’owen.
45014013	Isan imih taituwat bairi men taiyuwit ata baitumatum nena tanafufunen tanigamigamimih. Naatu ata not tanarumutufur taituwat men tanikubibiruwih hai baitumatum nare’emih.
45014014	Regah Jesu wanawananamaim God isou sinaf irerereb asoso’ob i iti, sawar etei i gewasih bay isan. Baise orot yait nanot bay afa nabitafutaf na’at, nati bay i orot ana tafutaf matar imih men naa.
45014015	Baise o a bay ku’aa’umaim taituwa iu yababan kubitin, o i men yabow ana efamaim kusisinaf. Imih men a bay ku’aa’umaim taituwa ana not inikwaris, anayabin Keriso nati orot auman isan morob.
45014016	Naatu men iniwa’an abisa o gewasin irouw kunotanot nabotabir kakafin namatar isan hinao’omih.
45014017	Anayabin God ana aiwob wanawanan atomamaim i men an gagamin, baise an gagamin i a ef namutufor, tufuw, yasisir Anun kakafiyinane kwanab kwanama.
45014018	Anayabin orot yait Keriso isan iti na’atube ebowabow God i ebiyasisir naatu sabuw nati orot ana bowabow isan boro hinakakafiy.
45014019	Nati isan it ta’ita’imon tanibaibaisbonen koufair tanab not ta’imon tanabow tufuw namatar, ayubit tanawowab nayen nara’at.
45014020	Men aatomamaim naatu bayumaim God ana bowabow tanagurusimih, bay etei i gewasih men tafutafumih. Baise ana kakafin i men abisa o ku’ani’aan imaim inasinaf orot babin ta ana not inikwarisimih.
45014021	Ana gewasin finimih men kwanaa naatu wine men kwanatom, o sawar afa kwanasinaf taituwa hai not kwanikwarisimih.
45014022	Imih sawar abisa’awat isah o kubitumatum nati i o God airi a founamaim nama. Naatu iso’ob abisa kusisinaf i men erekasiy auman kusisinaf o i boro baigegewasin inab.
45014023	Baise orot yait erekasiy auman naa natomatom na’at baibatiyen boro nab anayabin i taiyuwin ana baitumatum ebigigim. Naatu abisa men baitumatumamaim kusisinaf i bowabow kakafin.
45015001	It iyab ata baitumatum fairih karam ata ofonah hai baitumatum ririmin tanibaisih hai bit turin tanab. Men akisit isat tananot taniyasisiramih.
45015002	Naatu tanabow ata ofonah hiniyasisir, naatu tanibaisih hai baitumatum nawowab nayen.
45015003	Keriso i men taiyuwin ana yasisir isan bowamih. Baise nati efanin, Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo na’atube sinaf. “Sabuw iyab tur kakafih hi’u hibi’a’akir ana bit etei ayu tafau yan re.”
45015004	Anayabin tur abisa marasika hikikirum i bai’obaiyit isan, saise nawawainabit ana veya, nati Buk Atamanin ana turamaim koufair tanab nuhit nafot tanama.
45015005	God koufair naatu yatenub ana matuwan, isan ayoyoyoban i boro a kou’ay nita’imon, Jesu Keriso kwani’ufunun.
45015006	Naatu dogor ta’imon namatar auta’imon fana kwanabora’ah God, ata Regah Jesu Keriso Tamah ana merar kwanay kwanabora’ara’ah.
45015007	Taituwa hai merar kwanay kwanabuwih, Keriso a merar yi bubuwi na’atube. Saise bora’a’araten God kwanitin niyasisir.
45015008	A tur ao’owen, Keriso i na Jew sabuw hai bai’akirayan orot matar, God ana tur gewasin isan bow, ana omatanen uwatanah wabih gagamin itih hikirum inu’in sinaf na yabin matar.
45015009	Saise Eteni Sabuw God hitabora’ara’ah i ana kabeber isan. Buk Atamaninamaim hikikirum na’atube “Isan imih Eteni Sabuw wanawanahimaim ayu boro anabora’ara’ahi; O wabimaim bora’ara’aten ew anatabor.”
45015010	Ibanak eo maiye; “Kwaniyasisir, Eteni Sabuw, God ana sabuw bairi.”
45015011	Naatu iban maiye eo, “Regah kwanabora’ara’ah, kwa Eteni Sabuw etei, Kwanabora’ara’ah, sabuw tutufin etei’imak!”
45015012	Naatu iban Isaiah eo maiye, “Jesse an wairoron boro nakuboun nayen, sabuw etei nakaifih naatu Eteni Sabuw etei boro i wanawananamaim nuhih nafot hinama.”
45015013	Ayoyoyoban abaitumatumamaim God nuhifot bit i yasisir naatu tufuw nit, saise Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim yasisir ebit dogor wanawanan awan nakaratan nakarsuwai nare.
45015014	Taitu ayu aso’ob, kwa a gewasin i ra’at, naatu so’ob tutufin etei kwabai karam, imih karam taituwa boro kwani’obaiyih.
45015015	Baise iti fef wanawanan i sawar gagamih afa bebeyan a tur ao’owen saise nuhi anakusib. Anayabin God ana gewasin ayu wanawana’umaim yari’iy
45015016	Keriso ana akir orot amatar Ufun Sabuw isah anabowamih. Naatu firis na’atube anabow God ana Tur Gewasin anao’orerereb. Saise Ufun Sabuw hinan siwar na’atube hinamatar God hai merar nay nabuwih, naatu Anun Kakafiyin nakusouwih kakafiyih hinamatar.
45015017	Isan imih au bowabow God isan, Jesu Keriso wanawananamaim abowabow i abiyasisir gagamin maiyow.
45015018	Anayabin iti isan ayu boro men kafa’imo sawar afa isah anao’omih. Baise abisa Keriso iyunu ao naatu abow Ufun Sabuw abonawiyih hina God tebobosiyasiyar akisinamo boro anao.
45015019	Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim, ina’inan naatu baifofofor fokarih himatar. Jerusalem imaim au nanawan abusuruf God ana tur abinan aremor ana tafaram wabin Ikonium atit.
45015020	Akokok kwanekwan efan menamaim Keriso ana tur men hinonowar imaim anabinan hinanowar. Anayabin ayu men bar wowabayan orot boro orot ta ana bar bubu rarouw nonowatin tafanamaim anawowab.
45015021	Bukamaim hikikirum na’atube, “Sabuw iyab ana tur men hi’orereb hinonowar, boro hina’itin, naatu sabuw iyab ana tur men hinonowar boro hinaso’ob naniyan hinab.”
45015022	Ana’an nati isan ayu kwa isa namih mar etei ayu hirorowenbibiru.
45015023	Baise boun efan iti wanawanan ayu au bowabow i sawar naatu kwamur manin maiyow akok kwanekwan atan ata’iti isan ama akakaibababan.
45015024	Imih bounabo anotanot boro anan ana’iti. Spain bainanawan isan ananan founamaim boro anarun ana’iti.
45015025	Boun i ayu au Jerusalem anan God ana sabuw hai bowabow ta ta isan.
45015026	Ekalesia sabuw nati Masedonia naatu Akaiya wanawanan Jerusalem sabuw yababan wairafih hai tur hinonowar i yasisir auman baibaisih isan hai siwar kaifai hiyai.
45015027	Iti sinaf isan i hiyasisir, naatu kabay hiyai hibiyafar ana itinin i wayow na’atube hisinaf. Anayabin Jew sabuw ayubih ana baigegewasin i wan Ufun Sabuw hifaramih bairi hibai.
45015028	Imih ayu bowabow anisawar hai siwar kafai abai anan anitih. Imaibo au Spain ananan ef aumatan boro anarun ana’itibo anan.
45015029	Ayu kwa isa ananan, i aso’ob Keriso ana baigegewasin tutufin etei boro auman anan.
45015030	Taitu, abifefeyani ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabinamaim naatu Anun Kakafiyin ana yabowamaim au biyababanamaim kwanikofan naatu isou kwanayoyoban God nibaisu.
45015031	Kwanayoyoban saise Eteni Sabuw Judea wanawanan tema’am umahine God natafafaru naatu God ana sabuw Jerusalemamaim tema’am au bowabow isan hiniyasisir au merar hinay.
45015032	Saise God nakokok na’at ayu boro ereyasisir ana matabir maiye not boubun auman anan kwa aninanawani.
45015033	Tufuw ana God kwa etei isa nama wanatowan. Amen.
45016001	Ayu akokok rubut Fibi Sensera ekaleisia isah bow ebibaisih isan anao kwananowar.
45016002	God ana sabuw merarayow gewasin taituwa kwabitih na’atube, Regah wabinamaim rubut ana merar kwanay kwanab. Naatu biyamaim baibais nakokok na’at kwanitin, anayabin i sabuw moumurih na’in ebibaisih, ayu auman.
45016003	Au merarayow abiyafar Priscilla naatu Aquila hairi isah, ayu bow turou’unah Keriso Jesu isan bairi abowabow.
45016004	Naatu morob hirib hai yawas hikwahir ayu tibibaisu. Men ayu akisu, baise Ufunane Ekaleisia etei auman i hai bowabow isan tibiyasisir.
45016005	Ekaleisia iyabowat nati hai baremaim bairi tibita’ay hai merar ayiy, naatu au of Epanetus auman ana merar ayiy. Anayabin Asia wanawanan i mat dogor baikitabir bai Keriso itumitum.
45016006	Mary auman ana merar ayiy, kwa isa bowabow gagamin maiyow ebowabow.
45016007	Merarayow ta enan au ofonah Jew orot rou’ab isah, Andronicus naatu Junia hairi bairi dibur ama’am isah. Iti orot rou’ab i tur abarayah etei wanawanahimaim hairi i hisu’ubih kwanekwan naatu i mat Kirisiyan himatarabo ayu.
45016008	Au merarayow enan au begon Ampliatus, Regah wabinamaim abiyabow.
45016009	Merarayow ta enan Regah ana bowabowayan orot wabin Urbanus isan, bow turat naatu au of Stachy isan.
45016010	Merarayow ta enan Apeles isan, iti orot i fokarih wanawanah run washamiyen hire Keriso isan ebiturobe. Merarayow ta enan iyabowat Aristobulus ana nibur wanawananamaim bairi tema’am isah.
45016011	Merarayow ta enan Herodion, Jew orot naatu enan Narsisas taintuwan bairi isah.
45016012	Au merarayow ta enan Traifena naatu Tryphosa hairi Regah ana bowabowamaim tebowabow isah. Au merarayow ta au begon Persis isan, Regah isan bowabow gagamin ebowabow.
45016013	Au merarayow ta abiyafar Rufus isan, Regah nowanamih rubin bai, hinah hairi, Rufus hinah, baise ayu auman hinai.
45016014	Au merarayow ta enan Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas naatu Kirisiyan afa etei bairi isah.
45016015	Au merarayow ta enan Philologus, Julia, rubun Nereus hairi naatu Olympas, naatu God ana sabuw biyanamaim tema’am etei hai merar ayiy.
45016016	Wanawanamaim ta’ita’imon tufuw ana karamamayenamaim kwanimerarayowbonen kwanama, Keriso ana ekaleisia sabuw iti’imaim etei kwa a merar tiyiy.
45016017	Taitu abifefeyani, mata toniwa’an sabuw kousebayah naatu sabuw baitumatum gurusenayah naatu bai’obaiyen kwabaib isan tibibas isah. Nati sabuw i kwanahaiwih.
45016018	Anayabin sabuw iyab iti na’atube tisisinaf i men ata Regah Keriso isan tebowabowamih, baise i taiyuwih hai gewasin isan tebowabow. Hai tur mumunin naatu baifuwen turamaim sabuw bar ma’anih * hai not tibikwakwaris.
45016019	Kwa a baiten nowanowar isan sabuw etei hinowar, imih kwa etei isa ayu abiyasisir; baise akokok kwa etei gewasin isan ukwar hinarerekab, naatu kakafin kwanahaiw men ana ubar kwanab.
45016020	Tufuw ana God boro’omo Satan an babanamaim nayai sikan nawasafut. Manaw kabeber ata Regah Jesu’une kwa etei isa nama.
45016021	Timothy bow turou ana merarayow kwa isa ebiyafar, na’atube ayu taitu Lucius, Jason naatu Sosipater auman a merar tiyiy.
45016022	Ayu Tertius fef iti kirumayan kwa etei Regah wabinamaim a merar ayiy.
45016023	Gaius ana baremaim ayu ama’am, i kwa a merar eyiy, naatu ekaleisia iti ana baremaim tiruru’ay auman kwa a merar tiyiy. Naatu Erastus bar merar ana kabay kaifenayan auman a merar eyiy, tai Quartus auman a merar eyiy.
45016024	“Manaw kabeber ata Regah Jesu Keriso’one kwa etei isa nama. Amen. *
45016025	God ana merar tanay, anayabin i karam boro Jesu Keriso ana tur gewasin kwanonowaramaim nasinafi a baitumatum tafanamaim kwanabatkikin. Marasika anamaim iti tur wa’iwa’iramaim hibun wa’ir in.
45016026	Baise boun dinab orot hikirum naatu God wanatowanin ana obaiyunen tur etei i hina tibirerereb. Saise sabuw hinitumatum naatu Regah fanan hinabosiyasiyar.
45016027	God akisinamo isan i ukwarerekab ema’am, i akisinamo bora’ara’aten tanitin wanatowan Jesu Keriso wabinamaim! Amen.
46001001	Ayu Paul God ana kokomaim eafu atit Keriso Jesu ana Tur abarayan amatar taituwa Sosthenes airi.
46001002	God ana Ekaleisia nati Corinth wanawanamaim kwama’am, iyabowat afa’af kwabai kwatit Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim kusouwi God ana sabuw kakafiyih kwamatar kwama’am, naatu sabuw efan tata’amaim iyabowat it bairit taikofan ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabinamaim tao takwakwafir auman.
46001003	Manaw kabeber, tufuw, Tamat Godane naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso’one kwa etei isa nama.
46001004	Ayu mar etei kwa isa God merarayow abitin, anayabin Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim God manaw kabeber bit isan.
46001005	Naatu i wanawananamaim kwa i kwana ef tata’ane totobuyoy wairaf kwamatar, a turamaim naatu not rerekabamaim * sawar etei kwaso’ob.
46001006	Anayabin ayu Keriso isan ao’orereb i kwa wanawanamaim matar ebiturobe.
46001007	Isan imih kwa ata Regah Jesu Keriso na bairerereb isan kwama kwakakaif wanawanan, men kafa’imo ayub ana baigegewasin ta kwasasa’irimih.
46001008	Naatu God boro nabototofari kwanan ana yomanin, saise ata Regah Jesu Keriso nanan ana Veya’amaim kwa boro aur ubar en na’iti.
46001009	God Natun ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana baita’ayomaim bairi run isan ea’afi i kwanitumitum.
46001010	Ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana roubabaruwen fair tafanamaim ayu abifefeyani taitu, abisa isan kwao’o etei kwanibasit, saise kwa wanawanamaim kouseb boro men nama, a not tutufin etei ta’imon namatar kwanama.
46001011	Taitu, ayu i Chloe tain tuwan afa hina, kwa wanawananamaim kwama kwabigamigam isan hio anowar.
46001012	Ayu boro iti na’atube anao, kwa ta’ita’imon a tur ta ta kwao, o ta kuo, “Ayu i Paul abi’ufunun,” ta kuo, “Ayu Apollos abi’ufunun,” ta kuo, “Ayu Peter abi’ufunun,” naatu ta kuo, “Ayu i Keriso abi’ufunun.”
46001013	Keriso i kwatarsisib in kau’ay nanabin matar. Iban Paul onaf afe’en kwa isa morob? Ai Paul bai’ufnuninamih bapataito kwabai?
46001014	Ayu God ana merar ayiy kwa men ta bapataito aitimih, Krisipas naatu Gaius hairi’imo,
46001015	imih men yait ta boro inao, ayu i Paul wabinamaim bapataito abai abi’ufunun.
46001016	(Boro’obo anot Stephanas aawan ana nibur bairi bapataito aitih, baise anotanot men yait ta bapataito aitinimih.)
46001017	Anayabin Keriso i men bapataito isan iyafaru’umih, baise tur gewasin binan isan iyafaru, naatu men orot babin maiyow hai tur naatu hai notamaim ana’omih, nati na’atube ana’orerereb Keriso onaf afe’en momorob tur gewasin ana fair boro yabin en namatar.
46001018	Anayabin onaf ana tur sabuw kasikasiyih isah i yabin en, baise iyabowat tayayawas isat i God ana fair
46001019	Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube: “Sabuw notayah hai ukwar rerekab boro anagurus, naatu sabuw so’obayah, so’ob wairafih hirouw teo’o boro hai not anikwaris.”
46001020	Bo orot ukwarin rerekabin menamaim ema’am? Orot kirum so’obayan menamaim ema’am? Naatu orot baibasayan ana not gagamin iti tafaram nowan menamaim ema’am? God iti tafaram ana ukwar rerekab botabir na koko’aw mamatar men kwaso’ob?
46001021	Anayabin God ana ukwar rerekabamaim iwa’an sabuw tafaram ana ukwar rerekabamaim hima’am men karam boro hitaso’ob, naatu sabuw iyab iti tafaram ana ukwar rerekab hibaib, iti tur isan yabin en hirouw hio, baise aki onaf isan abibinanumaim God iti tur bai sinaf sabuw hitumatum yawas hibai.
46001022	Jew hikok ina’inan hita’itin hititurobe naatu Greek sabuw i ukwarerekab hinuwih.
46001023	Baise it i Keriso onaf afe’en hi’onaf momorob isan tabibinan, iti tur Jew sabuw tenonowar i tainih ekuyikuy, naatu Ufun Sabuw tenonowar isah i yabin en.
46001024	Baise Jew sabuw naatu Ufun Sabuw wanawanahimaim iyab God eafih hina yawas hibaib, nati sabuw isah Keriso i God ana fair naatu ana ukwar rerekab.
46001025	Anayabin God ana ukwar rerekab hi’itin koko’aw hirouw hio’o, i orot ana ukwar rerekab natabir, naatu God ana ririmin hi’itin hio’o, i orot ana fair natabir.
46001026	Taitu, kwa marasika mi’itube kwama’am ana maramaim God ea’afi i kwananot, sabuw hai itininamaim kwa moumur na’in i men not wairafi, men orot faifir, na’atube atufuwamaim men orot gagamih hai rara’ane kwatufuwamih.
46001027	Baise God tafaram ana sawar koko’aw hirarouw, rubinen sabuw not wairafih ibiya’uhuwih. Naatu tafaram ana sawar ririmih hirarouw rubinen, sabuw fairih ibiya’uhuwih.
46001028	Abisa tafaram itin yabin en rarouw i rubin bai, naatu abisa tafaram itin gagamin rarouw i gurus.
46001029	Saise men yait ta God nanamaim naora’ara’atamih.
46001030	Baise God buwit tana Keriso Jesu wanawananamaim ikofanit naatu sinaf Keriso ata ukwar rerekab matar. Naatu kakafhine rufamit tatit, yamutufurit God ana sabuw kakafiyih tamatar.
46001031	Isan imih Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, “Yait nakokok ora’ara’atamih Regah abisa sisinaf tafanamaim nao ra’ara’at.”
46002001	Taitu, ayu ana kwa abinanawani ana veya’amaim, men au manam abotait, tur fokarih imaim ao, God ana kirikirifot tur anababatun a binan kwanowaramih.
46002002	En baise, ayu abinanawani ana veya’amaim, au so’ob etei au’uf ayai, Jesu Keriso akisinamo onaf afe’en momorob i nuhu’umaim ma a binan kwanowar.
46002003	Kwa biyamaim atitit i aririm naatu au bir ra’at, au umau hi’oror auman ana.
46002004	Naatu ayu au tur au binan i men orot not wairafih hai tur teo ibitenmumuni na’atube ao ai obaiyimih, baise abisa abi’obaiyi i turobe kwa’itin, God Anunin ana fairamaim.
46002005	Saise kwa a baitumatum men orot hai so’ob tafanamaim kwanabatamih, baise God ana fair tafanamaim kwanabat.
46002006	Baise iti ukwar rerekab ana tur i sabuw iyab hai baitumatum hikwatukwat wanawanahimaim ao’orerereb. Baise men iti tafaram ana ukwar rerekab, o iti tafaram kaifenayah hai ukwarerekabamih, * anayabin iti tafaram ana ukwar rerekab i boro nasawar.
46002007	En baise, it i God ana ukwar rerekabamaim tur wa’iwa’irin tao’orereb, iti ukwar rerekab tur tafaram matara’e ana veya God yakitifuw ibun it ata gewasin isan. *
46002008	Tafaram ana kaifenayah, iti ukwar rerekab i men yait ta so’ob, hitasoso’ob na’at, boro men Regah yawas matuwan onaf afe’en hita’onaf tamorobomih.
46002009	Baise Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio na’atube, “Abisa God sisinaf men yait ta itin o nowar men yait ta notanot boro iti na’atube tamatar, iti sawar i God yabuna sabuw iyab i tibiyabuw isah.”
46002010	Baise God Ayubinamaim iti sawar baina irerereb. Anayabin God taiyuwin Ayubin sawar etei so’ob; naatu God ana kirikirifot auman etei so’ob.
46002011	O akisimo abisa kunotanot boro karam inaso’ob, ef ta’imon nati na’atube God Ayubin akisinamo God ana not so’ob.
46002012	It men iti tafaram ayubin tabaimih, baise God Anunin Kakafiyin biyafar i tabai, imih God ana baigegewasin abisa iyafar tabaib i boro karam tana’inan tanaso’ob.
46002013	Tur abisa ao i men orot ana ukwarerekabamaim ao, baise God Anunin Kakafiyin bi’obaiyi’imaim ao, saise ayubitane ana tur anao gewas sabuw ayubihine tema’am boro hinaso’ob.
46002014	Orot yait Anunin Kakafiyin biyanamaim men ema’am God Anunin Kakafiyin biyanane usar tenan boro men nabow. Nati sawar i’itin i yabin en, naatu hai yabin auman men naso’ob. Anayabin iti sawar etei hai an i ayubine boro nafufun nayamutufur gewas.
46002015	Orot yait Anuninane ebobonawiy karam sawar etei boro nafufunen gewas, baise orot ta ana bowabow isan boro men nafufun.
46002016	Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube “Yait i Regah ana not so’ob? Yait i karam boro Regah ana binan nao?” Baise it i Keriso ana not tabai.
46003001	Taitu ayu men karam boro sabuw iyab God Anunin hibai hima’am au’uwih na’atube kwa au’uwimih. Baise tafaram ana naniyanamaim au’uwi, anayabin kwa a baitumatum Keriso wanawananamaim men ra’at. Kwa a’itinin i kek sosof na’atube.
46003002	Imih kwa i boro kek sosof na’atube anitomani, men bay mafur anit, anayabin kwa bay aanin isan wa’ar men hiyen, tur anababatun wa’ar men hikufot nati bay isan.
46003003	Kwa ama ana itinin i boro’ika tafaram ana yawasamaim kwama’am, anayabin kwa boro’ika kwama kwabibobowen, taiyuw nena kwabigamigam, imih nati ebi’obaiyit, kwa i tafaram nowan naatu tafaram ana naniyanamaim kwama’am.
46003004	Imih orot ta kuo, “Ayu i Paul abi’ufunun,” orot ta kuo, “Ayu i Apollos abi’ufunun.” Nati na’atube kwabiwa’an ana itinin kwa i tafaram ana sabuw tisisinafube kwama kwasisinaf.
46003005	Men kwananot Apollos i orot na’in, naatu men kwananot Paul i orot na’in, En. Aki i God ana akir wairafi, imih kwa aibaisi kwana God kwabitumitum, nati i aki ta’ita’imon ai bowabow God biti’imaim abowabow.
46003006	Ayu ub * atanum, Apollos ufu na tafan harew rir. Baise God akisinamo iwa’an ub kuboun yen ra’at.
46003007	Orot yait ub tatanum naatu orot yait harew ririr i men abisa hiwa’an matar. Baise God akisinamo ub kaif yen ra’at
46003008	Orot yait ub tatanum naatu orot yait harew ririr hairi hai not i ta’imon hinot hisinaf. Imih God boro ta’ita’imon hai bowabowamaim hibowabow isan nibaiyanih.
46003009	Anayabin it etei i tai’ofbonen God isan tabowabow, imih kwa dogor i God ana me * naatu ana bar.
46003010	Manaw kabeber Godane abai, bar ana wabat arouw, wowab so’obayah tewowowab na’atube. Naatu orot afa iti bar ana wabat tafanamaim hibat tewowowab. Baise orot ta’ita’imon matah toniwa’an bar hinanutitiy gewas hinawowab.
46003011	Anayabin God i bar ana wabat ta’imon maiyow Jesu Keriso akisin bai ata wabatamih rouwika.
46003012	Imih orot ta ta boro gold , silver , agim biyah rurumih, ai maiyow, raiyarayar o geyagey rourihimaim boro iti wabat tafan hinawowab nayen.
46003013	Naatu orot ta ta hai bowabow etei boro nibebeyan, anayabin nati ana veya’amaim marakaw boro nakusisiar nare, naatu wairaf nato’ab ata bowabow nafufun etei hina’arat hinadew hinare. Imaibo bowabow yabin anababatun boro nirerereb.
46003014	Naatu bar nati wabat anababatun tafanamaim arahina’e ebatabat wowabayan boro ana baiyan nab.
46003015	Baise orot yait ana bar wairaf ea’arah ana sawar etei boro na’arah ni’en, naatu orot boro nayawas, nayayawas ana itinin i wairaf wanane bihir titit na’atube.
46003016	Kwanaso’ob kwa biya i anababatun God ana kwafiren bar, naatu God Anunin Kakafiyin i kwa wanawanamaim ema’am.
46003017	Orot yait God ana bar egugurus, God boro ibo nagurus, anayabin God ana bar i kakafiyin naatu kwa biya i nati bar.
46003018	Men taiyuw kwanifufuwimih. Orot ta kwa wanawanamaim nanot nao ayu i not wairafu iti tafaram wanawananamaim. Kwaihamiy taiyuwin ifuwifuw, saise i ana baifufuwenamaim boro ana not narerekab.
46003019	Anayabin tafaram ana ukwar rerekab God matanamaim i yabin en. Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio na’atube. “Sabuw not wairafih hai so’obamaim taiyuwih hai warasa hiyai buwih tere’ere.”
46003020	Naatu Buk Atamaninamaim iban eo maiye, “Regah sabuw etei hai not naatu hai so’ob wanawanan nutitiy i’itin i nikuwat.”
46003021	Isan imih sabuw abisa tisisinaf isan men kwana bora’ara’ahihimih, anayabin sawar etei kwa nowa.
46003022	Paul, Apollos, Peter, me tafaram, yawas, o morob, mar iti boun enan, o mar boro nanan, iti sawar tutufin etei i kwa nowa.
46003023	Kwa i Keriso nowan naatu Keriso i God nowan.
46004001	Naatu boun it i Keriso ana akir wairafih na’atube sabuw hina’itit, naatu God ana buriburih koubuna’ayah na’atube hina’itit.
46004002	Naatu sabuw iyab hitutumih iti bowabow hibitih hai orot ukwarih isah hinabosunusunub.
46004003	Ayu au yawas kwanafufun o sabuw au yawas hinafufufun isan men abiyababan. Anababatun a tur ao’owen taiyuwu au yawas men afufufun.
46004004	Ayu taiyuw au not iu’uwu men kakafin ta asinaf, baise boro men nati’imaim anab au kakafin en ana’omih. Regah akisin boro ayu nibatiyu.
46004005	Isan imih orot babin baibatiyin isan veya hiyai’iyai boro enan, kwanakaif Regah nan natitabo. I nanan ana veya gugumin wanawanan abisa wa’iwa’irin inu’in marakaw boro nakusisiar narun naatu orot dogoroh ana wa’iwa’irin etei boro nabow hinatit hinirerereb. Imaibo orot ta’ita’imon abisa hisisinaf isan God boro nabora’ara’ahih.
46004006	Taitu, boun ayu akokok Apollos airi biyai’imaim bai’obaiyen ta anayai kwata’itin, saise tur abisa hio hikikirum yabin kwanaso’ob. “Tur abisa hikikirum ana fofoninamaim kwanao, men kwanatetebon.” Orot ta kwanabora’ah naatu ta kwananuw furuw kwanau kwaniyimih.
46004007	Yait eo kwanowar kwa i turanah etei tafahimaim? Sawar etei kwabow kwama’ama etei i God it. Aisim taiyuw kwabobora’ara’ahi, ana itinin iti usar i kwabai kwaniyibe?
46004008	Kwa a kok sawar etei i kwabow karam kwama’am. Naatu boun kwa i totobuyoy wairaf kwamatar, kwana kwai’aiwoboka, aki baise en. Au notamaim akokok mi’itube kwati’aiwob gewas, saise aki auman bairit tati’aiwob youn.
46004009	Ayu akisu au itinin, aki tur abarayah ai efan i urantoro’ot anababatun God yai, ana itinin dibur sabuw bebeyan ma’o’ow ana efanamaim terouw temomorob na’atube. Aki boro bebeyanamaim ana morob tounamatar naatu sabuw tutufin etei hinamau’uwi.
46004010	Keriso wabinamaim taiyuwi ai’itinin na koko’awabe amatar, baise kwa i Keriso wanawananamaim kwana not wairafi kwamatar. Aki i ariririm, baise kwa a fair i erara’at, aki tinunuw furuwi, baise kwa i tekakakafiyi.
46004011	Iti boun ana veya’amaim aki sikai harewamih mamah, abi’aamorob, ai ar ai faifuw tibiririk, segar hiborabirabi efamaim a’in ama areremor ai bar en.
46004012	Bowabow gagamin maiyow abowabow isan ahahahar, sabuw teo rarafi ana veya’amaim aki baigegewasin abitih, terabi tibia’akiri ana veya aki ewawainabi.
46004013	Tiu’uwi kwanikwaniyi ana veya, yabow turamaim abiyafutih. Boun ana veya’amaim aki i tafaram ana hain naatu bay ana merekas na’atube amatar. *
46004014	Ayu iti fef i men kwa itinin biya’ohow isan akikirumamih. Baise akokok animatnuwi, anayabin kwa i ayu natunatu au yabow.
46004015	Basit kwa ayub ana bonawiyenayah etei 10,000 na’atube tibi’obaiyi, baise tamatanah i men moumurih, anayabin Keriso Jesu ana baikofanamaim ayu ana kwa tamat amatar tur gewasin abai ana ait.
46004016	Imih abifefeyani, ayu abisa asisinaf na’atube kwani’u’uru.
46004017	Ana’an iti isan ayu natu au yabow kek wabin Timothy kwa isa abiyafar. Iti kek i Regah ana bowabow isan ebobosunusunub, i enan boro kwa nuhinakusib, ayu au yawas naatu au bowabow mi’itube Keriso ana yawasamaim ama abowabow boro nao kwananowar, naatu mi’itube ekaleisia sabuw efan ta ta abi’obaiyih auman boro nao kwananowar.
46004018	Kwa afa kwanotanot ayu boro men atan atinanawani kwarouw, imih kwa abai’oro’orot erara’at.
46004019	Baise ayu boro’omo anan aninanawani, Regah nakokok na’at. Imaibo boro taiyuwu anaso’ob, naatu men bai’o’orotoyah hai tur akisin, baise hai fair menane hibaib auman anaso’ob.
46004020	Anayabin God ana aiwob i men turawat namomon, baise ana fair auman.
46004021	Kwa a kok i boro abisa anab anan kwana’itin? Wabir anab anan ana wabir? O taiyuwu ana yara’iyu yabowamaim anan kwa isa?
46005001	Tur anonowar kwa wanawanamaim intabitabir baiwa’an kwanekwan i ra’at, Eteni Sabuw iyab God men hisusu’ub bowabow iti na’atube i men tisisinaf. Iti ao anayabin, ayu tur anowar orot ta kwa wanawanamaim i tamah aawan ufuyey hairi ti’inu’in.
46005002	Naatu kwa aisim kwabi’o’orot? Ana gewasin kwatiyababan kwatarerey, orot nati bowabow kakafin sisinaf a kou’ayomaim kwatabotait.
46005003	Ayu biyau’umaim i ef yok ama’am, baise ayubu’umaim i nati bairi tama’am. Naatu Jesu wabinamaim orot yait nati sisinaf baibatiyen abitin, nati’imaim atama atao efanin iti’imaim ao.
46005004	Ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabinamaim a kou’ay kwabaib, ayu ayubu’umaim i nati wanawanamaim, naatu Regah ana fair ere etatargubi ana veya
46005005	nati orot bowabow kakafin sisinaf i Satan kwanitin biyan ana kakafin nagurus, saise ata Regah nanan ana veya’amaim ayubin boro yawas nitin.
46005006	Kwa taiyuw kwabobora’ara’ahi ana itinin men gewasin, tur hio i kwaso’ob. “ Yeast kikimin maiyow, baise faraw wanawanan hinayai hinakakamat boro nara’at nagadid.”
46005007	Yeast atamanin i kwaisaroun, saise kwa boro faraw boubun wanawanan ana yeast en kwanamatar, boun kwama’am na’atube kwanama. Anayabin Keriso Tar Nowaten ana sheep natun i sibor yai’ika.
46005008	Isan imih Tar Nowaten ana hiyuw isan tanaben taniyasisir, men yeast atamaninamaim, anayabin yeast atamanin wanawanan i baiyow ana koukra’at naatu tafa’asar ema’am, baise faraw wanawanan yeast en, nati faraw i uhew naatu mamarin.
46005009	Ayu au fef kwa isa akikirum i ao kwanowar, sabuw baiwa’an kwanekwaneyah men bairi kwanita’imon.
46005010	Iti ao i men sabuw iyab baitumatum atih hima tibiwa’an kwanekwan, tibikabat, tebabain, naatu umataratar tekwakwafirih haiwih isan ao’omih. Baise sabuw nati na’atube haiwih isan kwa boro tafaram ana yawas tutufin etei kwanakwahir.
46005011	Baise ayu ao i kwa taiyuw a sabuw baitumatumayah, iyab tibiwa’an kwanekwan, tibikabat, sawar umataratar tekwakwafirih, taituwah terararafih, tetomatom kwanekwan, tibifufuwen, i bairi men kwanaa kwanatom isan ao.
46005012	Ayu men au ef ema’am boro ekaleisia sabuw tafaror ufunane tema’am ana fufunih, baise ana gewasin kwa i boro a kou’ayomaim taituwa akisihimo kwanibatiyih kwanayamutufurih.
46005013	God akisinamo sabuw iyab kou’ay ufunane tema’am boro nibatiyih. Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, “Sabuw tafa’asarih a kou’ayomaim kwanunih titit.”
46006001	Kwa taiyuw wanawanamaim o tura ta airi kwabi’osukwaraben, aisim kwabai kwan sabuw iyab God men hisusu’ub teyayabunei? * Ana gewasin i boro kwatab kwatan sabuw iyab God hisusu’ub hitayabunei.
46006002	God ana sabuw tafaram ana kakafin yabuna’in isan hibi’obaiyi nuhibur? Naatu iti tafaram yabuna’in isan ana ef hibi’obaiyi i kwaso’ob ai en? Kwa i karam yababan gidigidih naatu gagamih boro kwanayabuna.
46006003	Naatu tounamatar boro tanabibatiyih isan hibi’obaiyi nuhibur? Sinaf gagamih nati tanasisinaf, it karam yababan etei boro tanayabuna.
46006004	Isan imih bai’osukwaraben iti na’atube hinamamatar, wanawananamaim orot afa yabuna ana ef kaifai hisoso’ob kwanarubinih hinayabuna.
46006005	Biya teohow! Kwa wanawanamaim orot not wairafih i tema’am, karam baitumatumayah wanawanamaim kwabi’osukwaraben boro hinayabuna.
46006006	Baise aisim taituwa ibai sabuw iyab God men hisusu’ub baibatiyinamih kubitih.
46006007	Sinaf nati na’atube kwa wanawanamaim kwasisinaf bebeyan ebi’obaiyi kwa a ef etei i kwasa’ir. Sabuw afa kwa isa hitasinaf kakaf naatu hitifufuwi i boro ana itinin tigewasin?
46006008	Baise nati efanin kwa taiyuw kwabifufuwi naatu kwasinaf kakakaf taituw kwabuwih ubar kwabitih itinin kakafin.
46006009	Sabuw tafa’asarih * God ana aiwob nowahamih boro men hinabaib i kwa kwaso’ob. Men taiyuw kwanifufuwi, kwaniwa’an kwanekwan, turanah a’awah ufuh kwanan, sawar inu’inuwih men kwanakwafirih, orot taiyuw turanah bairi men kwaniwa’an kwanekwan, baibin taiyuw auman men kwaniwa’an kwanekwan,
46006010	men kwanabain, men kwanikabat, men kwanatom kwanekwan, men taituwa kwanararafih, men taituwa kwanifufuwih hai sawar kwanabow. Sabuw yawas iti’imaim tema’am God ana aiwob boro men ninowahimih.
46006011	Kwa afa i marasika na’atube kwama kwasisinaf. Baise boun kwa i ata Regah Jesu Keriso wabinamaim naatu God Anun Kakafiyin ana fairamaim a kakafihine kusouwi, kubaituturi naatu yamutufuri God nowan kwamatar.
46006012	O ta inao Sawar etei i gewasih sinaf isan hibasit. Baise a tur ao’owen sawar etei inasisinaf * boro men ta gewasin nitimih. Orot ta boro inao, sawar ta ta i ayu au kokomaim sinafumih hibasit. Baise ayu men akokok boro nati sawar ta ta nabonawiyu ana akir wairafin anamataramih.
46006013	O ta boro inao, “Biyat i kabutit isan naatu kabutit i biyat isan.” Baise bay naatu kabutit hairi God boro nagurus, imih biyat i men kakafinamaim tanayai taniwa’an kwanekwanemih. Baise Regah isan tanabow, anayabin biyat mar etei Regah ebituw.
46006014	God ata Regah Jesu morobone iyawas misir, imih it auman boro i ana fairamaim niyawasit tanamisir maiye.
46006015	Kwaso’ob kwa biya i Keriso biyan turin, imih men karam Keriso biyan turin tanab baiwa’an kwanekwaneyan biyanamaim tanikofanimih, men karam.
46006016	Kwaso’ob orot yait biyan bai na babin baiwa’an kwanekwaneyan biyanamaim ebikofan i na nati babin biyan turin matar. Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim bebeyan eo, “Sabuw rou’ab boro hinan biyah ta’imon matar.”
46006017	Baise orot yait Regah biyanamaim ebikofan i na Regah wanawanan run biyan turin matar.
46006018	Imih baiwa’an kwanekwan i kwanahaiw, bowabow kakafih afa orot isisinaf i biyan ufunane esisinaf, baise orot yait ebiwa’an kwanekwan i taiyuwin biyan bokarit gubamin matar.
46006019	Kwa biya i Anun Kakafiyin ana bar, * God ana usar kwa it wanawanamaim ema’am, imih kwanaso’ob biya i men kwa akis nowa, baise God nowan.
46006020	Anayabin kwa biya i sawar ta ana baiyan gagaminamaim tubun. Imih biya i ana efamaim kwanasinaf God kwanitin ana marakaw isan kwanabow.
46007001	Boun i kwa fefemaim abisa isan kwakikirum i anao kwananowar. Orot yait tabina’e asir ema’am i gewasin maiyow.
46007002	Baise anayabin baiwa’an kwanekwan ana naniyan i ra’at, imih orot babin iyab tabina’e tema’am mi’itube hitatabin, saise i a’awah bairi’ika hitama.
46007003	Naatu orot ana kok abisa aawan biyanamaim tasinaf tiyasisir na’atube babin ana kok abisa aawan biyanamaim tiyasisir.
46007004	Babin biyan men i akisin nowanamih, baise orot nowan, na’atube orot biyan men i akisin nowanamih, baise babin nowan, na’atube orot biyan men akisin nakaif, baise babin nakaif, naatu babin biyan men akisin nakaif baise orot nakaif.
46007005	Imih orot aawan hairi inumih nakokok babin men nakwahir, na’atube babin aawan hairi iumih nakokok orot men nakwahir, baise veya afa hairi hinibasit mar kafai asir hinama, saise nati veya i yoyoban hinitin. Imaibo veya ta naniyah nakokok na’at aawan hairi hina’in saise biyah ana naniyan na’in bainub, asir boro Satan imaim nan narun routobon nitih.
46007006	Iti i ayu au not kwa au’uwi, baise men nati na’atube sinaf isan abiyunimih.
46007007	Ayu au kok kwa etei mi’itube ayu’ube kwatama, baise orot ta’ita’imon ata usar etei God faramit, orot ta i ana usar ta God itin, na’atube orot ta ibo ana usar ta God itin.
46007008	Baise kwa tabin ati’at, naatu kwafukwafuriy, katukatuwiy, kwa auman au’uwi, gewasin tabin en asir kwatama, ayu ama’ama’abe.
46007009	Baise a naniyan nakukura’ara’ah na’at, gewasin kwanatabin, anayabin tabin i gewasin, men basit baiwa’an isan itanot dogor wairafabe ta’arah mar etei.
46007010	Kwa toutabin sabuw obaiyunen tur iti abit, men ayu, baise Regah ana obaiyunen tur, babin men aaw orot inihamiy.
46007011	Baise babin yait aawan orot nabihamiy na’at, gewasin nati babin men natabin asire nama, naatu nakokok na’at namatabir maiye aawan hairi hitounuw hinama. Naatu orot men aaw inakwahir.
46007012	Baise kwa afa isa ayu akisu au not iti, men Regah ana not. Orot yait babin men baitumatumayan ebi’awan naatu babin ana kok i orot hairi ma’amih, orot men babin nakwahir.
46007013	Naatu babin yait orot men baitumatumayan ebi’awan orot ana kok i babin hairi ma’amih, babin men orot nakwahir.
46007014	Anayabin orot ana baitumatumamaim babin kusouw na kakafiyin matar, na’atube orot ana baitumatumamaim babin kusouw na kakafiyin matar, asire natunatuh boro gubagub auman hitama, baise boun natunatuh i hina kakafiyih himatar.
46007015	Baise orot baitumatum atin ekokok aawan kwahirinamih, kwaihamiy ekwahir, anayabin hairi hai tabin men hifatum. God ana kok it i tufuwamaim tanama.
46007016	O babin aaw baibaisin na baitumatumayan matar isan ana ef boro mi’itube inaso’ob gewas? Naatu o orot, aaw baibaisin na baitumatumayan matar isan ana ef boro mi’itube inaso’ob gewas?
46007017	Ef ta’imon i iti, orot babin ta’ita’imon ana yawas abisa Regah bitin na’atube imaim nama. Yawas wantoro’ot mi’itube tama’ama God ea’afit na’atube tanama. Iti i ayu au obaiyunen tur ekaleisia wanawanan areremor i abi’obaiyih.
46007018	O yait a’ar mo’on hi’afuw ima’am ana veya God ea’afi, men a fit inibunwa’ir, naatu orot yait ana ar mo’on afuwina’e ma’am ana veya God eafi’af, men ana ar mo’on afuwinamih nanot.
46007019	Anayabin orot ana ar mo’on afu’afuw, o afuwina’e nati i yabin en, baise ana’an gagamin i God ana obaiyunen tur tanabosiyasiyar.
46007020	Orot etei mi’itube kwama’am ana veya God ea’afi i na’atube kwanama.
46007021	O yait bai’akir ana yawasamaim ima’am ana veya God ea’afi, men nati isan iniyababan, baise a veya kebor inabaib na’at nati bai’akir ana fafatumane kurufami kutit.
46007022	Anayabin orot yait akir ana bowabowamaim ma’am Regah eaf titit, i Regah ana rufamen orot, na’atube orot yait roufamenamaim ma’am Keriso eaf titit, nati orot i Keriso ana akir wairafin.
46007023	Kwa i sawar ta baiyan gagaminamaim God tubuni kwatit, imih men kwanan orot ta isan kwani’akiramih.
46007024	Taitu, kwa ta’ita’imon ama mi’itube kwama’am God e’afi kwana baitumatumayah kwamamatar na’atube kwanama.
46007025	Naatu kwa baibitar biya numih, kwa isa ayu men Regah biyanane tur ta abaimih, baise Regah ana kabeberamaim ayu not iti bitu ana’o i kwanitumatum.
46007026	Mar iti boun yawas i fokar, imih ayu anotanot ana gewasin kwa mi’itube kwama’am i na’atube kwanama.
46007027	O toutabin na’at men babin kwahirinamih ana ef inanuwet, naatu o tabina’e kuma’am men tabinamih babin inanuwet.
46007028	Baise inatatabin na’at nati i men bowabow kakafin kusisinaf, naatu babitai tatabin auman i men bowabow kakafin esisinaf, baise kwa iyab kwatatabin yababan boro moumurih maiyow kouh kwanayen, imih tarafafari isan tur iti ao.
46007029	Taitu, abisa ao yabin i iti, mar i na kabom, imih boun it ata veya’amaim orot iyab toutabin tema’am hinimonok Regah isan hinabow.
46007030	Sabuw iyab terererey, hai itinin men yababanabe hinama’amih, sabuw iyab tibiyasisir hai itinin men yasisirabe hinama’amih. Naatu sabuw iyab guguw wairafih hai itinin i guguw enabe hinama. *
46007031	Kwa iyab iti tafaram ana sawar moumurih na’in kwabowabow men sawar anot awan nakaratan, anayabin iti tafaram naatu sawar etei boro nan nasawar.
46007032	Ayu akokok kwa etei yababan fatumi kwama’am kwanarufami kwanatit. Orot tabina’e ema’am ana not etei Regah ana bowabow isan ebitin, ekokok nabow Regah niyasisir.
46007033	Baise toutabin orot i tafaram ana bowabow isan enotanot kwanekwan, anayabin i ekokok nabow aawan niyasisir.
46007034	Imih i ana not kusib ef rou’ab himatar, ef ta’imon nati na’atube, babin tabina’e ema’am o babitai biyan numin, ana not tutufin etei i Regah ana bowabow akisin isan enotanot. Baise toutabin babin i tafaram ana bowabow isan enotanot kwanekwan, anayabin i ekokok nabow aawan orot niyasisir.
46007035	Ayu iti ao anayabin akokok kwa anibais, i men ao’ofafari, baise akokok ef gewasin kwasinaf a yabow Regah isan i wan kwanayai kwanabow.
46007036	Monok babitai hairi hai rum hio, naatu monok naniyan i ekukura’ara’ah babitai isan naatu kwamur auman i erara’at ekokok natabin, karam hinatabin men bowabow kakafin.
46007037	Baise orot yait i taiyuwin ana notamaim tabin men ekokok men yait na’okikin, i karam taiyuwin ana naniyan imurub ema’am karam tabina’e nama, iti orot i ef gewasin esisinaf.
46007038	Imih orot yait etatabin i gewasin, baise orot yait tabina’e ema’am i gewasin anababatun.
46007039	Orot yawasin ema’am ana veya babin i aawan biyanamaim hifatum ema’am, baise orot emomorob ana veya babin i orot biyanamaim hirufam tit, orot ta i ana kokomaim boro ni’awan, baise nati orot i Regah ana kou’ayomaim ema’am ni’awan.
46007040	Baise anotanot tabina’e tama’am na’at i boro tiyasisir gagamin maiyow. Ayu anotanot ayu auman God Anunin targabuwu ama’am.
46008001	Boun i akokok bay sawar murubih isah kwasisibor isan kwakirum nan i anao kwananowar. Tur anababatun it etei’imak iti sawar isah i taso’ob. Naatu iti so’obamaim it wowabit tayen tabi’orot. Baise yabow i wowabit gewas orot babin tabibais.
46008002	Orot yait sawar etei so’ob rouw eo, men kafa’imo abisa ta so’obamih.
46008003	Baise orot yait God ebiyabow God nati orot i su’ub naatu ekakaif.
46008004	Sabuw afa bay wagabur isah hisisibor hibow te’aa isah anao kwananowar, wagabur i men God, naatu God i ta’imon maiyow, tafaram wanawanan men god ta sisibinamaim ema’am.
46008005	Turobe sabuw afa boro hinao, mar wanawanan naatu tafaram wanawanan wagabur i awan karatan. Turobe wagabur, yoyom i moumurih na’in.
46008006	Baise it ata God i ta’imon, Tamat i akisin biyanane sawar etei himatar naatu i wanawananamaim it tama’am, naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso i ta’imon, i akisin wanawananamaim God sawar etei eo himatar naatu i akisin wanawanan it tama’am.
46008007	Baise sabuw moumurih na’in iti men hiso’obamih. Sabuw iti na’atube marasika hima hisisinaf au naniyah in, imih bay hibow te’aa i tenotanot wagabur isah hisisibor hibow te’aa terarouw, naatu hai notamaim iu’uwih biyah gubagub matar, anayabin kakafin gewasin kusibin ana not i ririmin.
46008008	Baise bayumaim boro men nabuwit tanan God sisibin tanatitamih, bay tana’ani’aan na’at God boro men natawanamih, naatu men tana’ani’aan God boro men it gewasit narouw na’omih.
46008009	Baise kwanakaifi gewas, kwa hirufami kwatit yawas kwabaib men imaim kwanasinaf taituwa iyab hai baitumatum ririmin tema’am kwanikwarisihimih.
46008010	Anayabin o iso’ob abisa kusisinaf, imih o boro wagabur hai kwafiren bar wanawanan sibor inabow inaa. Baise orot ta ana not ririmin o na’i’iti boro fair na’atube nab naatu gem tafanamaim wagabur isah hisisibor boro nabow na.
46008011	Naatu taituwa ana not ririmin ma’ama o aso’obamaim ana not i’asabun, inaso’ob nati taituwa isan Keriso morob.
46008012	Imih o taituwa isah bowabow kakafin iti na’atube isinaf hai not ririm feher kubitih, nati i o Keriso isan bowabow kakafin kusisinaf.
46008013	Isan imih ayu abisa ani’aanimaim aiwa’an taituwau bowabow kakafin wanawanan re’er ayu nati for men ana’aan maiye, saise men ana sinaf maiye nare.
46009001	Kwanotanot ayu i fatufatum wanawanan ama’am? Naatu kwanotanot ayu i men Regah ana tur abarayan? Naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso men aitin? Naatu kwanotanot kwa i men ayu au abowabow ana ro’on?
46009002	Sabuw afa ayu men tur abarayan na’atube hinabubuwu na’at, baise kwa boro ayu kwanabuwu, anayabin kwa ayawas Regah wanawananamaim ebi’obaiyi, turobe kwa i ayu au bowabow ana ro’on, imih ayu i Regah ana tur abarayan.
46009003	Sabuw ayu tegam tiu’uwu ana maramaim ayu iti na’atube ao awawasfafaru.
46009004	Aki a bowabow isan ai ef ema’am boro anaa, anatom ai en?
46009005	Ai ef ema’am karam boro toutabin babin baitumatumayah bairi anaremor, * tur abarayah, afa ata Regah Jesu taitin naatu Cephas tisisinaf na’atube ai en?
46009006	Ai ayu Barnabas airi’imo, ai aa ai tom isan anama anabow?
46009007	Baiyowayan orot ebowabow men i taiyuwin ana baiyan ebitin. Naatu orot yait masaw bowayan ana masawamaim grape ro’oro’on boro nirut, naatu bobaituw kaifenayah ana cow hai nun boro natom.
46009008	Ayu men orot ana roubabaruwen fairamaim ao’omih, anayabin God ana obaiyunen tur i ta’imon nati na’atube eo ema’am.
46009009	Moses ana ofafaramaim kikirum iti na’atube eo “Bobaituw wabin ox * orot yahon bobosairen sanabey nawawas kweyakweyaren ana veya men awan kwana’utan.” God iti na’atube eo’o kwanotanot i ox isan eo?
46009010	En baise, iti tur eo i anababatun it isat eo, turobe iti tur hikikirum it tananowar isan, anayabin orot yait me ebifufubiy naatu orot yait ai ro’on rab ekibikib, hairi nuhih fot hima tebowabow anayabin hairi boro nowah nowah hinafaramih hinabow.
46009011	Ayubit ana ub gewasin kwa wanawanamaim atatanum isan, kwa biyane sawar baibaisi isan ana bifefeyani, kwanotanot i ra’at kwanekwan?
46009012	Orot afa tebowabow baibais kwabitih na’atube, aki auman karam boro baibais kwaniti. Baise aki nati fair men karam tafan atabat atao kikini, nati efanin aki sawar etei wanawanahimaim wainabi abow saise tur gewasin Keriso isan abibinan men ana ef atahir.
46009013	Kwaso’ob orot iyab Tafaror Bar gagamin wanawanan tebowabow hai bay i Tafaror Bar ana siwarane tebaib, naatu orot iyab gem kakafiyinamaim sibor te’aa auman i gem kakafiyin tafanamaim sibor turin tebaib.
46009014	Ef i ta’imon, Regah ana obaiyunen turamaim na’atube eo, “Sabuw iyab tur gewasin tibibinan hai ma gewas isan baibais kafai i nati’ine nan hinab.”
46009015	Baise ayu iti fair men kafa’imo ta abutubun, naatu iti fef akikirum i men sawar ta kwa biyane bain isan anot ao’omih! Baise mi’itube ata morob, men basit ata ma sabuw afa au ora’ara’at tur hitabotabir yabin en tamatar.
46009016	Tur gewasin abibinan isan men imaim au fair anab anao ra’ara’atamih, nati bowabow i ayu hiyunu abowabow. Naatu tur gewasin men ana bibinan kakafin anababatun boro isou namatar!
46009017	Anayabin iti bowabow au kokomaim ata rubin ata bowabow baiyan boro atab, baise God ana kokomaim ayu rubinu ana bowabow itu abowabow.
46009018	Imih baiyan isan men anao, baise veya kebor abaibimaim Tur gewasin ana binan, ana baiyan en. Naatu men ayu binanuyan anarouw kwa anifefeyanimih.
46009019	Ayu i men yait ta ana fafatum wanawanan ama’ama’amih. Baise ayu taiyuwu ayara’iyu * sabuw etei hai akir wairafin amatar, saise sabuw moumurih ananawiyih Keriso hinaso’ob.
46009020	Jew sabuw wanawanahimaim ayu Jew orot amamatar, saise ana buwih, sabuw iyab ofafar babanamaim tema’am ayu imaim ama’am, (baise ofafar men abi’ufunun) saise sabuw ofafarane ana botaitih.
46009021	Sabuw iyab ofafar ufunane tema’am, ayu i hai ma’abe bairi ama’am, (iti na’atube asisinaf i men God ana ofafar ufunane ama’am baise Keriso ana ofafar wanawanan ama’am) saise sabuw ofafar ufunane tema’am abow Keriso wanawanan tirur.
46009022	Sabuw ririmih wanawanah ayu ariririm, saise ririmih anabuwih. Sawar ta ta etei hai naniyan amatar sabuw etei isah abotawiy, saise ef menatanane nabobotawiy sabuw turin aniyawas.
46009023	Ayu iti asisinaf anayabin Tur gewasin isan, saise tur gewasin ana baigegewasin turin anab.
46009024	Nunuwayah kwana’itih, sabuw etei tinununuw baise orot ta’imon boro nanunuw so’ar ana siwar nab. Imih yuwa kwana’asfofor kwananunuw saise siwar kwanab.
46009025	Fafowayah etei bai’a’it fokarin wanawanan hinarun naatu hinan hai siwar hinab, nati siwar i boro natafofor, baise it abisa tasisinaf i ata siwar wanatowan ema’am bain isan tabowabow.
46009026	Isan imih ayu men orot afa tinununuw kwanekwan na’atube anununuwamih baise au etawanamaim anununuw, na’atube au baiyow i men asir aroberob kwanekwan, orot baiyowayan eroberob kwanekwan na’atube.
46009027	Baise ayu biyou arab baikwatutunen fokarin aitin ayamutufur. * Imaibo tur sabuw afa isah abibinan saise etei nunuw wanawanan hinarun asir ayu boro hinabotaitu siwar baina’e anama.
46010001	Taitu, ata a’agir Moses nawiyih hititit ana veya abisa isah mamatar i kwananot. Ata a’agir etei rofom re tafafarih nawiyih Red Sea yan owasasin hirabon rewan rounane hiyen.
46010002	Rofom wanawanan naatu riy wanawanan hirarabon ana veya, etei bapataito hibai Moses ana bai’ufununayah himatar.
46010003	Naatu Ayubih ana bay itinin ta’imon marane hire’er etei hibow hi’aa.
46010004	Na’atube ayubit ana harew itinin ta’imon marane re’er etei hitom, naatu ayubit ana To’one harew tit hitomatom nawiyih bairi hin, nati to i Keriso taiyuwin.
46010005	Baise God ata a’agir moumurih na’in isah men iyasisir, imih himorob arar yan hai rarik * awan karatan.
46010006	Naatu sawar iti himamatar i bai’obaiyen na’atube it isat, ebimatnuwit saise men kakafin sinafumih nakura’ara’ahit hisisinafube tanasinafumih.
46010007	Wagabur ata a’agir sawar iu’inuwih hikwakwafirih na’atube tanasinafumih. Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo “Sabuw himare hiyuw hi’aa hibiyasisir, hai yasisir botabir hitom hikoko’aw himisir hiwa’an kwanekwan.
46010008	Imih uwatanah afa hibiwa’an kwanekwanabe men taniwa’an kwanekwan, anayabin nati na’atube hisisinaf, veya ta’imon wanawanan sabuw etei 23,000 ah uy hire himorob.
46010009	Ata Regah men routobonamaim tanayai, uwatanah afa na’atube hisinaf Regah hirurutubun etei tuwamorob yubih himorob.
46010010	Men tanagam kwanekwan, anayabin afa na’atube hisisinaf gurugurusen ana tounamatar na etei rouw himorob.
46010011	Sawar iti himamatar etei i bai’obaiyen na’atube it isat, naatu baimatnuwit isan bukamaim hikirum. Anayabin veya iti boun tama’ama i tana mar yomanin tatit.
46010012	Imih o yait kunotanot i kubatabatkikin, inakaif gewas men inare’emih.
46010013	Routobon mar etei o kubaib na’atube, nati routobon ta’imon sabuw etei tebaib. Baise God ana omatanen mar etei ekakaif. Imih boro men nihamiy routobon gagamin inab a fair nanatabir a niyaweyaw inare’emih. Baise routobon inabaib ana veya i boro fair nit inabatkikin naatu ef nabotawiy inahaiw inatit.
46010014	Isan imih au ofonah, wagabur hai bowabow etei kwanihamiyen.
46010015	Ayu iti tur i kwa not wairafi isa ao, saise au tur naniyan kwanab abisa ao kwana’itin.
46010016	Merarayow ana kerowas imaim God ana merar tayiy tatomatom ana veya, Keriso ana rara etei tafafaram. Naatu rafiy taimasib ta’ani’aan ana veya it etei’imak Keriso biyan tafafaram.
46010017	Anayabin rafiy fafar i ta’imon, it moumurit na’in, baise biyat i ta’imon, imih rafiy ta’imon tafafaram.
46010018	Israel sabuw hai sinaf i kwananot. Sheep tebow terouw gem tafanamaim tisibor finimih turih tefaram ta’aau i God bairi nati’imaim tibita’imon maiye.
46010019	Men kwananot ayu nati wagabur naatu sibor nati wagabur isah kwasisibor i abibasit kwanarouw.
46010020	En! Baise, abisa au’uwi ana’an i iti na’atube. Eteni Sabuw hai sibor i wagabur isah tisisibor, men God isan. Imih ayu men akok kwa wagabur bairi kwanikofan.
46010021	Kwa men karam boro Regah ana kerowasamaim kwanatom, naatu iban maiye wagabur hai kerowasimaim kwanatom. Naatu men karam Regah ana gem kakafiyinamaim kwanaa, naatu wagabur ana gem tafanamaim kwanaa maiye.
46010022	Men tanasinaf Regah ana yaso’ar tanakura’ahimih. Kwanotanot it Regah ana fair tanatabir? En!
46010023	Sawar etei i sinaf isan hibasit, baise sawar etei boro men ta ana gewasin nitimih. Naatu sawar etei i sinaf isan hibasit, baise sawar etei boro men hinibaisimih.
46010024	Men yait ta akisin ana gewasin nanuwetamih, baise taituwan hai gewasin nanuwet.
46010025	Ahar efanamaim masanuw kwanatotobon kwana’aamo, men anot hinamour kwanibatebatemih.
46010026	Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo, “Me yan sawar tutufin etei tema’am i Regah nowan.”
46010027	Orot baitumatum atin nifefeyani airi bay aamih kwanamare abisa namaim nayayare ina’aan, men anot hinamour inibatebatemih.
46010028	Baise orot ta tainimaim na’afare nao, “Iti bay i wagabur isah hisibor.” Nati bay men ina’aan, orot eo’otani i inakakafiy anayabin masanuw ina’ani’aan boro inasinaf kakaf.
46010029	Nati i men o kakafin kusisinafumih, baise orot nati eo’otani na’iti boro o kakafin sinaf narouw nao. Aisim boro ayu au roufamen abaib sabuw afa hai notamaim ayu hinafufunu?
46010030	“Ayu au bay isan God aifefeyan igegewasin abai ani’aan, aisim sabuw boro au bay abigegewasin isan kakafin hinarouw hinao?”
46010031	Imih abisa ku’ani’aan o kutomatom o kusisinaf etei God wabin bora’ara’ahin isan inasinaf.
46010032	Jew sabuw, Greek sabuw, na’atube ekaleisia sabuw wanawanahimaim men yait ta iniwa’an yababan nab nare’emih.
46010033	Ayu i mar etei asisinaftobon sabuw afa aniyasisirih, saise anibaisih yawas hinab, men ayu taiyuwu aniyasisiru.
46011001	Ayu Keriso abi’u’ur na’atube kwa ayu kwani’u’uru.
46011002	Ayu sawar ta ta’amaim mar etei kwanunuhu isan naatu bai’obaiyen abit kwabukikin kwama’am isan, a merar ayi abobora’ara’ahi.
46011003	Baise boun ayu akokok kwa etei kwanaso’ob gewas. Keriso i orot ana ukwarin, Babin ana ukwarin i orot naatu Keriso ana ukwarin i God.
46011004	Orot yait aribun sumasum auman eyoyoyoban, o tur God biyanane baib eo’orereb Keriso biya’ohow ebitin.
46011005	Naatu babin yait aribun ana sumasum bosair eyoyoyoban, o tur God biyanane bai eo’orereb, aawan biya’ohow ebitin, ana itinin i babin aribun himafuribe.
46011006	Babin yait aribun men nasumisum, gewasin aribun hina’afuw. Baise babin aribun afuwin o mafurin isan biyan nao’ohow na’at gewasin aribun nasum.
46011007	Orot aribun men nasum, anayabin orot i God ana itinin naatu ana fair, baise babin i orot ana fair.
46011008	Anayabin orot i men babinane namih, baise babin i orotone na.
46011009	Na’atube orot i men babin isan God eo matar, baise babin i orot isan matar.
46011010	Ana’anaban iti isan, tounamatar matahimaim babin aribun nasum, saise nati sumasumamaim ebi’obaiyit, babin i orot ana fair babanamaim ema’am.
46011011	Regah ana yawasamaim tama’am babin men orot nihamiy akisin nabin ana fairamaim nama, na’atube orot men babin nihamiy akisin nabin ana fairamaim nama.
46011012	Anayabin babin orotone na, na’atube babin biyanane taub orot yai. Baise sawar etei i Godane hina.
46011013	Taiyuw kwanibatiy kwana’itin, babin aribun ana sumasum nabosair, bebeyanamaim nayoyoyoban i gewasin ai en?
46011014	It ata so’ob i sawar biyatamaim temamatar imaim ebi’obaiyit, orot aribun ituw manin ere’er i boro biyan na’ohow.
46011015	Baise babin aribun ituw manin ere’ere i ana itinin ebigewasin. Anayabin aribun manin re’ere i yumatan ana sumasum na’atube.
46011016	Baise orot yait ayu ao isan inagamigam, anao inanowar. Kwafiren isan ata ef men ta ema’am boro imaim tani’ufunun o God ana ekaleisia wanawanan kwafiren ana ef men ta ema’am boro i tani’a’ait.
46011017	Roube’aten tur iti anao kwananowar. Ayu kwa boro men merarayow anitimih. Anayabin kwaru’ay a kou’ay kwabaib wanawanan kakafin i erara’at naatu ana gewasin i en.
46011018	Ayu tur anowar kwa ekaleisia tutufin etei kwana kwabita’imon akwafiren wanawan i kouseb ema’am, naatu ayu abitumatum iti i tur anababatun.
46011019	Men kwanakasiy, wanawananamaim kouseb iti na’atube emamatar, saise orot iyab sinaf gewasin tisisinaf boro bebeyan hinatit kwana’itih.
46011020	Kwaruru’ay ana veya kwa i men Regah ana Bay Aafufun kwa’aau’umih.
46011021	Anayabin bay aa ana veya orot afa timatkabikabiy te’aa harew fokarih tetom tibikoko’aw, naatu sabuw afa i tibi’aamoromorob.
46011022	Kwa a bar tema’am boro imaim kwataa kwatatom ai en? Aisim iti na’atube kwasinaf God ana ekaleisia kwabi’afiy, naatu yababan wairafih biya’ohow kwabitih. Kwanotanot boro abisa anao kwananowar, a merar anay nati kwasisinaf isan? Boro men kafa’imo a merar anayimih.
46011023	Anayabin ayu Regah biyanane abisa abaib i kwa ai’obaiyi. Ata Regah gugumin hiyayanuw ana maramaim rafiy bai
46011024	God ana merar yi imasib itih eo, “Iti i ayu biyau kwa abit, kwanab kwana’ani’aan ana maramaim ayu kwananuhu.”
46011025	Ef ta’imon kerowas isan na’atube sinaf, bay hi’aa ufunamaim kerowas wine hisuwai batabat bai, God ana merar yi, iuwih eo, “Iti kerowas i God ana Obaibasit Boubun ayu au rara’amaim ebubusuruf. Imih mar etei iti na’atube kwanasinaf, kwanatomatom ana maramaim ayu kwanuhu.”
46011026	Mar etei iti rafiy kwana’aan, kerowasamaim wine kwanatom, naatu Regah momorob isan kwanabinan kwananan i namatabir maiye nan natit.
46011027	Isan imih orot yait erebosa rafiy nab na’aan naatu Regah ana kerowasamaim natomatom, nati orot i bowabow kakafin maiyow Regah biyan naatu ana rara isan esisinaf kakaf.
46011028	Imih wantoro’ot orot taiyuwin ana yawas nanutitiy na’itin gewas, imaibo rafiy nab na’aan naatu kerowas nab natom.
46011029	Anayabin orot yait Regah biyan naatu ana rara hai buriburih men naso’ob gewas, rafiy nab na’aan naatu kerowasamaim wine natomatom, i taiyuwin ana baibatiyen bai enan.
46011030	Ana’an iti isan kwa moumur na’in biyah hiririm naatu kwabisasawuw naatu afa i himoroboka.
46011031	Baise it taiyuwit anababatun tanabibatiyit gewas, boro men tanan God nibatiyitamih.
46011032	Baise Regah nabibatiyit ana veya baikwatutunen boro nitit, naatu God tafaram baimakiy nabitin it boro men auman nititamih.
46011033	Isan imih taituwau, Regah ana Bay Aafufun isan kwanaruru’ay taituwa kwanakaifih.
46011034	Naatu orot yait aa momorob gewasin ana baremaim bay naa, saise a kou’ay kwanabaib ana maramaim boro men God ana baibatiyen wanawanan narun. Naatu sawar afa i boro ayu anan anatitabo anayabuna.
46012001	Boun i kwa Anun Kakafiyin ana usar isan kwabibat i anao kwananowar. Taitu ayu men akokok kwa aur kasiy na’atube nama’amih.
46012002	Kwanaso’ob kwa baikirisiyana’e, Eteni kwama’am ana veya, wagabur hibonawiy a ef kwawasa’ir kwatit sawar inu’inuwih kwakwafirih.
46012003	Isan imih a tur ao’owen, orot yait God Anunin tatargabuw men karam boro Jesu nao raraf, naatu orot yait wanawananamaim Anun Kakafiyin men ema’am boro men karam naorereb, “Jesu i Regah.”
46012004	Usar i yumatan yumatan, baise Anunin i ta’imon efafaram.
46012005	Bowabow i yumatan ta ta tabowabow, baise Regah i ta’imon isan tabowabow.
46012006	Bowabow hai fair i yumatah ta ta tabowabow, baise God ta’imon bowabow ana fair orot ta’ita’imon wanawanahimaim faram tebowabow.
46012007	Orot ta’ita’imon biyahimaim Anun Kakafiyin ana taragub ef tata’ane ebirerereb saise sabuw etei hina’itin ana baigegewasin hinab.
46012008	Anunin orot ta isan boro ukwar rerekab ana usar nitin, naatu orot ta boro not so’ob ana usar nitin.
46012009	Anun ta’imonaban orot ta isan boro baitumatum ana usar nitin, naatu orot ta boro sabuw baiyawasih isan ana usar nitin.
46012010	Orot ta ina’inan fokarih sinaf isan ana fair boro nitin, orot ta boro dinabatur orereb isan ana usar nitin, naatu orot ta boro turobe baifuwen hairi orereb yamutufurin isan ana usar nitin. Orot ta menan botabirin tur ta o isan ana usar boro nitin, orot ta tur koubuna isan usar boro nitin.
46012011	Baise iti bowabow etei i God Anunin ta’imon akisinamo sawar etei esisinaf, naatu i ana kokomaim usar orot babin ta ta rubinih ebitih.
46012012	Biyat ana itinin i men ta’imonamaim wowab yenamih, baise yow kusisib an moumurih na’in, naatu kukusisib i moumurih, baise biyat i ta’imon maiyow. Keriso ana’itinaban nati na’atube.
46012013	Ana itinin i ta’imon. O Jew orot, o Greek orot, akir orot, roufamen orot, it etei i Anunin ta’imonamaim bapataito tabai biyat ta’imon matar, naatu God Anunin ta’imon ayubit ana harew dogorotamaim isuwaire.
46012014	Biyat i men ta’imon wowab yen biyat tutufin mataramih, baise famen moumurin na’in na ikokofan biyat matar.
46012015	Naatu at iti na’atube nao, “Ayu i men o uma, imih ayu men o biya turin.” Nati na’atube nao men karam boro akisin nabin nabat.
46012016	Naatu tainit nao, “Ayu i men o mata, imih men o biya turin.” Nati na’at nao i men karam boro akisin nabin nabat.
46012017	Naatu biyat tutufin etei i matatawat tama’am na’at, tur boro mi’itube tatanowar? Naatu biyat tutufin etei tainitawat tama’am na’at, sawar yamurih boro mi’itube tatayon?
46012018	Baise boun tama’am kwana’itin, God biyat etei yakitifuw gewas, ta’ita’imon hai efanamaim ya, ikokofan wowab yen biyat matar.
46012019	Biyat wowowab ana itinin ta’imon tama’am na’at, biyat ana itinin boro ai’ab.
46012020	Imih biyat i yow kukusisib ana itinin moumurih na’in, baise an i ta’imon.
46012021	Isan imih matat men karam umat isan nao, “Ayu o a baibais men akokok,” na’atube ukwarit men karam at isan nao, “Ayu o a baibais men akokok.”
46012022	En baise, biyat turin ririmin tarouw tao’o men karam boro tanakusair, nati i biyat ana fair turin.
46012023	Naatu biyat turin isan tanotanot i men hai yabin auman, biyat nati i tabi’abur gewas, naatu biyat turin wabih su’ubin isan awat ihihiririy, ana kaifin i wa’iwa’irin.
46012024	Biyat turin men bai’usin gewas isan tanotanotamih, baise biyat tutufin etei God ita’imon wowab ikawarafut, saise biyat turin ta’itin yabin en tao’o i auman tanabora’ah.
46012025	Saise biyat men nagam nakuseb, baise famefamen etei taiyuwih hinibit aba’abar yabowamaim hinibaibaisbonen hinama.
46012026	Biyat turin ebi’akir biyat tutufin etei ni’akir, biyat turin ebiyasisir biyat tutufin etei ana yasisir hinafaram.
46012027	Naatu boun kwa etei i Keriso biyan, naatu kwa ta’ita’imon i biyan turin kwamatar.
46012028	God ana Ekaleisia wanawanan sabuw hai efan ya, wantoro’ot, tur abarayah, bairou’abin dinab oro’orot, baitounin bai’obaiyenayah, imaibo ina’inan sinafuyah, sawusawuwih baiyawasihiyah, sabuw afa baibaisihiyah, bowabow hai yamutufurenayah, naatu menah botabirin tur ta ta oyah, etei hai usar faramih hai efan ya.
46012029	Orot etei boro men hinan tur abarayah hinamatar, o dinab orot hinamatar, o bai’obaiyenayah hinamatar, o fair hinab ina’inan sinafuyah hinamatar,
46012030	o sawow yumatah ta ta baiyawasihiyah, o menah botabirin tur ta ta oyah, o tur botabirin koubuna’ayah. En baise etei ata usar ta ta tabai.
46012031	Imih dogor wanawanan o a kok gagamin a usar menatan inab inabowabow i akisin kunuwih kubai. Naatu boun i boro ef gewasin anababatun ani’obaiyi kwana’itin.
46013001	Ayu i karam boro menau nabotabir sabuw hai turamaim anao, o tounamatar hai tur anao, baise auru yabow en na’at, au tur ao i naniyan en ber terab etefotef na’atube.
46013002	Naatu ayu i God biyanane tur abai ao’orereb, ayu i so’ob wairafu, tur wa’iwa’irih hai kirikirifot etei aso’ob, ayu i baitumatum auru karam oyaw anao na’uy ra’ah nan. Baise auru yabow en na’at, ayu i au yabin en.
46013003	Ayu karam au sawar etei yababan sabuw ana faramih naatu biyau ana kwahir siboromih hina’afun, baise auru yabow en na’at, ana gewasin boro men ta anab.
46013004	Yabow i yatenuban, yabow i koununub gewasin, yabow i men baibobowenayan, * men bai’o’orotoyan, men ora’ara’atayan, men baitengogorayan,
46013005	yabow i men okwanekwaneyan, yabow men i taiyuwin ana gewasin enunuwetamih, men baiyaso’arayan, sabuw hai kakafih ana bukamaim men ekikirum,
46013006	yabow kakafin isan men ebiyasisir, baise turobe isan i ebiyasisir.
46013007	Yabow i mar etei etatafafar, mar etei ebitumatum, mar etei nuhifotamaim ema’am, mar etei ebitafofor.
46013008	Yabow i ana yomanin en, * dinabatur tao’orereb boro nasawar, menat ebotabir tur afa tao etei boro hinanutanub, abisa tasoso’ob etei boro nasisinasair.
46013009	Anayabin it i turinawat taso’ob, naatu dinabatur tur i turinawat tao’orereb. boro men tutufin tanaorereb nan yomanin tanisawarimih.
46013010	Baise koubaitotor ana veya nanan, sawar men koubatotoramaim ti’inu’in boro nasawar.
46013011	Kek ana veya, kek hai tur ao, kek hai not anot, kek hai naniyanamaim ama, boun ana abi’orot ana veya, kek ana bowabow etei aihamiy.
46013012	Abisa boun ta’i’itin i men ta’i’inan gewas, anayabin kiyam * matan sukwayan na’atube, imih God men tai’itin gewas, baise veya nanan, imaibo yumatan boro tana’itin naatu itabo yumatat na’itin. Naatu sawar tutufin etei boro tanaso’ob nan na’asa’ub, boun i turinawat taso’ob.
46013013	Naatu boun i sawar tounu tema’am, baitumatum, nuhifot, yabow, baise wanawanahimaim yabow i gagamin.
46014001	Yabow i ayawasamaim wan nama nabonawiy, naatu dogor wanawanan akok gagamin Anun Kakafiyin usar bai enan akisin kwananuwih kwanab, usar gewasin naatu au gagamin i God ana tur binan ana usar kwanab.
46014002	Orot yait menan botabir tur ta’amaim eo i men sabuw isah eo, baise God isan eo. Anayabin men yait ta so’ob tur boro nanowar naniyan nab, nati tur i Anun Kakafiyin ana fairane tur anababatun wa’iwa’irin eo.
46014003	Baise orot yait God ana tur eo ebibinan i sabuw isah eo baibais, koufair, nuhifot ebitih.
46014004	Yait menan botabir tur ta’amaim eo, nati i taiyuwin ebibais. Baise orot yait God ana tur eo ebibinan, i God ana sabuw tutufin etei ebibaisih.
46014005	Ayu au kok kwa etei mena tabotabir tur ta’amaim kwatao, baise au kok gagamin anababatun i binan ana usar kwatab, anayabin orot yait tur eo ebibinan ana baibais i gagamin. Orot menan ebobotabir i gewasin, baise orot ta nati kou’ay wanawanan tur nabotabir nao ekaleisia etei hinanowar saise boro nibaisih.
46014006	Naatu taitu, ayu atan kwa ata binanawan ana veya, menau tabotabir tur ta’amaim atao’o na’at boro baibais atit? Baise tur boubuh, not so’ob boubuh, tur binan God biyanane, naatu God ana roube’aten tur ana bow anan, turobe boro imaim nibaisi.
46014007	Ef ta iti na’atube, ben hai sawar douduf na’atube hinirabirab, o fik na’atube hinababin kwanekwan orot benayan boro mi’itube naniyan nab naben gewas?
46014008	Naatu orot yait tour men ebababin gewas, baiyowayah boro mi’itube hinaso’ob gewas hibobuna baiyow isan?
46014009	Ana itinin i ta’imon, o mena nabotabir tur ta sabuw men hisoso’obamaim kuo, sabuw boro mi’itube naniyan hinab o abisa isan kuo? O a tur asir isaroun me yan ere’er.
46014010	Tafaram wanawanan tur i moumurih maiyow, naatu nati tur etei i hai yabih auman men ta yabin enamih.
46014011	Isan imih tur nidun anonowar naniyan men abaib ayu i touman orot amatar, nati orot tur oyan isan, naatu tur oyan auman ayu isou touman orot matar.
46014012	Imih o yait a kok gagamin i ayubit ana usar ta inab inabow, basit God kwi’fefeyan saise usar menatan o inab ekalesia inabibais boro nit.
46014013	Ana’an iti isan sabuw iyab menah ebobotabir, gewasin hinayoyoban, saise tur koubuna isan ana usar auman hinab hinakubuna sabuw hinaso’ob.
46014014	Anayabin ayu mena’umaim ayoyoyoban, ayubu auman ibo eyoyoyoban, baise au not men kafa’imo so’ob ayu abisa ao’o.
46014015	Ayu boro abisa anasinaf? gewasin ayu i boro ayubu airi anayoyoban, naatu au not auman airi anayoyoban, ayubu airi ew anatabor naatu au not auman airi anatabor.
46014016	Ayubimaim God ana merar iyi kubobora’ara’ah, orot ta boro mi’itube naso’ob airi God kwanabora’ara’ah, naatu boro mi’itube naso’ob nibasit. Anayabin nati orot i men so’ob o abisa’awat kuo’o.
46014017	Basit o i merarayow gewasin maiyow God kubitin dogor tutufin etei, baise taituwa nati na ebatabat men kubibais.
46014018	Ayu i God ana merar ayiy, anayabin ayu menau botabirin tur ta’amaim o isan kwa etei ana tabir.
46014019	Baise ekalesia hai kou’ay wanawanan ayu tur etei five akisin anao sabuw etei boro naniyan hinab naatu nibaisih, baise menau nabotabir tur 10,000 na’atube anao ana baibais i en.
46014020	Taituwau, men kek hai notabe kwananot, men kek sosofabe kwanarerey kwanekwanemih, baise orot babin hai not kwanab tur kwanao.
46014021	Buk Atamaninamaim wanawanan ofafar iti na’atube hikirum, “Ayu au sabuw isah tur men hisoso’obamaim boro anao, naatu nah toumanih menahimaim boro anao, baise au tur boro men hinanowar Regah iti na’atube eo.
46014022	Menat ebobotabir i men sabuw baitumatumayah hai i’inan, baise sabuw iyab men tibitumatum hai i’inanen, naatu tur binan i sabuw iyab men tibitumatum isah, baise baitumatumayah isah.
46014023	Imih ekaleisia tutufin etei hinaru’ay, naatu sabuw etei menah nabotabir tur ta’amaim hinao’o, sabuw afa ufunane hina tema’am, naatu sabuw iyab men tibitumatum boro hinao, “Sabuw tibikoko’aw kwa’itih?”
46014024	Baise orot yait God ana tur eo ebibinan ufun orot baitumatum atin ma enonowar boro dogoron narusib. Anayabin tur abisa nonowar ana kakafih etei hina hibebeyan itan.
46014025	Ana not wa’iwa’irin ma’am etei tit irerereb naatu boro sun nayowen Regah nakwafir, bebeyanamaim naorereb nao, “Turobe God i kwa wanawananamaim bairi kwama’am!”
46014026	Taituwau, abisa ao yabin i iti, bora’ara’aten isan kwanaruru’ay ana veya, orot boro ew natabor, orot ta boro ni’obaibiyi, orot ta boro God ana tur naorerereb, orot ta boro menan nabotabir, orot ta boro nati tur nabotabir nakubuna kwananowar, naatu sawar iti etei i ekaleisia wowabin ra’at isan kwasisinaf.
46014027	Menamaim omih orot rou’ab o tounu hinao naatu men tounu nanatabir, naatu tur i orot ta nao nasawar, imaibo ta nao, men auta’imon kwanarahimih, naatu orot ta i nati tur nabotabir nakubuna.
46014028	Baise koubuna’ayan orot nati’imaim men nama’am na’at, orot nati tur eo gewasin ekaleisia wanawanan boro awan nafot, i akisin God hairi’imo hinayoyoban.
46014029	Orot rou’ab o tounu God ana tur hinabinan, naatu hinabibinan wanawanan, binanuyah afa nati tibibinan hai tur hinafufun gewas.
46014030	Naatu nati tur inan wanawanan orot ta kou’ay wanawanan ma’am God ana tur ta boubun na isan birerereb ana veya, nati orot bat ebibinan awan nafot.
46014031	Anayabin kwa ta’ita’imon a veya ti’inu’in na’atube boro kwanabinan, saise sabuw etei boro roube’aten tur hinab hinaso’ob naatu koufair hinab.
46014032	Dinab oro’orot iyab God ana tur hio tibibinan hai tur i hinakaif gewas.
46014033	Anayabin i men baibikwarisen ana Godamih, baise tufuw ana God. God ana ekaleisia tutufin etei tiruru’ay ana veya,
46014034	Ekalesia wanawananamaim baibin i awah nafot hinama. Baibin isah men baibasit ema’am boro tur hinao, baise ofafar eo na’atube awah nafot orot babahimaim hinanutanub hinama.
46014035	Sawar ta isan so’obamih baremaim a’aawah hinibatiyih, anayabin ekaleisia wanawanan baibin tur o isan i biya’ohow ema’am.
46014036	Kwanotanot God ana tur kwa akis biyamaim busuruf? Ai nati tur i kwa akis isa na?
46014037	Orot yait enotanot i God ana dinab orot, naatu God biyanane ayubin ana usar bai ema’am, abisa kwa isa akikirum boro naso’ob, iti i Regah ana obaiyunen tur.
46014038	Baise iti tur nanowar nakwakwahir, God boro ibo nakwahir ana tur men nanowar.
46014039	Isan imih taituwau, dogor kwanabotawiy God ana tur kwanab gewas kwanabinan, naatu sabuw afa menah botabir teo men kwana’otanih.
46014040	Baise kwana’itin gewas sawar etei i hai efamaim kwanasinaf naatu kakaf ana efamaim.
46015001	Taitu, boun i akokok tur gewasin abinan kwanowar, imaim yawas kwabai, naatu imaim kwabatabatkikin isan nuhi akukusib.
46015002	Iti tur gewasinamaim kwa iyawasi, imih tur abinan kwanonowar kwanabubukikin, baise men kwanabubukikin kwa a baitumatum boro nan yabin en namatar.
46015003	Ayu abisa abaib i kwa isa aya’abun, naatu nati tur ana’an gagamin i iti, Keriso it ata bowabow kakafin isan morob, Bukamaim eo na’atube.
46015004	Hibai hin hubemaim hiyai, veya tounu ufunamaim misir maiye, Bukamaim eo na’atube.
46015005	Peter isan irerereb, imaibo tur abarayah nah 12 isah irerereb.
46015006	Nati ufunamaim veya ta’imon wanawanan ana bai’ufununayah etei 500 tafanamaim auman isah irerereb, moumurih na’in i boun yawasih tema’am baise afa i himorob.
46015007	Nati ufunamaim James isan irerereb, imaibo ana tur abarayah etei isah irerereb.
46015008	Uftoro’ot ayu atufuw kokobeya na’atube ama’am isou irerereb.
46015009	Ayu i tur abarayah etei babahimaim imih ayu i men boro tur abarayan hinarouw hinao, anayabin God ana ekaleisia ai nununih arouw ai’a’akirih.
46015010	Baise God ana manaw ana kabeberamaim ayu tur abarayan amatar, naatu manaw kabeber ayu bitu i men yabin en, baise bowabow gagamin na’in abow, tur abarayah etei ana tabirih, men ayu au fairamaim abowabowamih, baise God ana manaw ana kabeber ayu wanawana’umaim ma ebowabow.
46015011	Isan imih i tibibinan naatu ayu abibinan ana itinin i men ta’amih, baise ana’an gagamin i abisa abibinan i kwa kwaitumatum.
46015012	Boun aki abibinan ai tur i Keriso morobone mimisir isan ao’o, baise mi’itube’emih kwa afa kwao moroboyah boro men hinayawas maiye hinamisir?
46015013	Morobone misir maiye men nama’am na’at, ana itinin Keriso morobone men misir maiye’emih.
46015014	Naatu Keriso morobone men tamimisir maiye na’at, aki ai binan i yabin en, naatu kwa Keriso kwabitumitum auman i yabin en.
