58012028	Imih God ana merar tanay anayabin, it i God ana aiwobomaim tarun, nati efan God boro men niyuwiyuw. Imih God tanifai tanabora’ara’ah ata not tutufin etei kakaf bir auman.
58012029	Anayabin ata God i turobe tafaram gurusenayan ana wairaf.
58013001	Kirisiyan ana yabowamaim taituwa baitumatumayah isah mar etei kwaniyabowbonen.
58013002	Sabuw nah toumanih hai merar kwanay, kwanabuwih bar efan kwanitih. Anayabin marasika ata a’agir iti na’atube hisinaf God ana tounamatar hai merar hiyi hibubuwih i men hiso’ob.
58013003	Sabuw dibur tema’am kwananuhih, bairi kwani’akir, o dibur itama itabi’akir na’atube, sabuw iyab hirouw tibi’a’akirih, bairi kwani’akir biya nababan, o hitarab hiti’a’akir biya tabababan na’atube.
58013004	Tabin i kwanakakafiy. A’aw bairi kwanafatum gewas a tabin kwanakaif kwanama, turanah a’awah ufuh men kwanan, naatu men kwana’in kwanisesebar kwanekwan. Anayabin sabuw iyab turahinah a’awah ufuh tenan naatu hi’in tibisesebar kwanekwan God boro nibatiyih.
58013005	Kabay gagamin na’in bain isan a yababan men nara’atamih, baise abis kikimin kwabaib i kwaniyasisir. Anayabin God eo, “Ayu boro men kafai anihamiyi, naatu ayu boro men kafai aninatbuhuruwi.”
58013006	Isan imih baitumatumamaim tanabatkikin tanao, “Regah i ayu au baibaisayan; ayu boro men anabir. Yait boro ayu isou abisa nasinaf.”
58013007	A orot ukwarih atamanih God ana tur hibi’obaiyi i kwananuhih, anayabin God ana tur hibai hina hi’obaiyi kwaso’ob, naatu kwananot namatabir maiye, hai yawas mi’itube hima himomorob i kwana’itin, hai baitumatum kwaniu’ur.
58013008	Kwanaso’ob Jesu Keriso ana itinin i men ebobotabir, baise marasika ana itinin mi’itube ma’am, boun i na’atube ema’am naatu maras i boro na’atube nama wanatowan, wanatowan.
58013009	Imih sabuw afa hinan bai’obaiyen boubuh yumatah ta ta hinabi’obaiyi men kwananowar, kwani’ufnunih a ef kwanasa’irimih, baise ana gewasin God tanifefeyan nibaisit dogorot koufair nitin, men bay ana ofafar tani’ufnunimih, anayabin sabuw afa ofafar hibi’ufunun men baibais ta hibai.
58013010	Jew sabuw hai kwafirin ana sis wanawananamaim sibor ana gemogem tafan, firis sibor hi’a’afusar men hai ef ta ma’ama boro nati sibor hitabow hitaa.
58013011	Naatu Tafaror Bar ana Firis Gagamin bobaituw hai rara bowabow kakafih notawiyen isan ana sibor boro nab narun efan Kakafiyin, Kakafiyin Anababatun imaim nayai, baise biyah i boro hinabow hinatit ufun hina’afusar.
58013012	Isan imih Jesu hibai hitit Jerusalem bar merar ana fur ufunane hi’onaf i’akir morob, ana rara ra’iy sabuw hai bowabow kakafihimaim hima’am kusouwih.
58013013	Isan imih tanatit tanan sis ufunane Jesu biyan tanatit ana biya’ohow turin tanab sabuw etei matahimaim.
58013014	Anayabin it ata ma wanatowan iti tafaramamaim men ema’ama, baise it i bar merar gewasin boro enan isan tama takakaif.
58013015	Isan imih Jesu ana baibaisamaim mar etei merarayow ata siwaramih God tanitin, awat bitit imaim God wabin tanabora’ara’ah.
58013016	Naatu taituwa isah bowabow gewasin kwanasinaf, naatu kwanibaisih men nuhinabur, anayabin fayay nati na’atube taituwa kwafafayayih God i ebiyasisir men kikimin ta.
58013017	A orot ukwarih fanah kwanab abisa hinao kwani’ufunun, anayabin kwa ayub i umahimaim ema’am, naatu hai bowabow tebowabow isan God ana tur boro hina’owen. Fanah kwanab hinao na’atube kwana bi’ufunun na’at, hai bowabow boro yasisiramaim hinabow. Baise fanah men kwanabaib na’at, hai bowabow boro yababanamaim hinabow, naatu kwa boro men ana gewasin ta kwanab.
58013018	Mar etei isai kwanayoyoban. Aki aso’ob, aki ai naniyan etei i men ta kwarisin, ai naniyan etei i mutufurin gewasin. Anayabin aki akokok mar etei i sawar gewasih anasinaf.
58013019	Dogorou tutufin etei abifefeyani, isai kwanayoyoban, saise God iti boro’omo kwa isa niyafaru anan.
58013020	Naatu boun i ata Regah Jesu morobone God iyawas, bai na Bobaituw sheep hai Nabatanenayan Ukwarin mamatar, naatu i ana rara’amaim ma’ama wanatowan ana obaibasit bikwah isan,
58013021	tufuw ana God abifefeyan kwa nibaisi sawar gewasih etei nit, saise i ana kok kwa abisa sinaf isan ekokok kwanasinaf. Naatu Jesu Keriso ana fair wanawanatamaim narun i ana’itininabe tanab i niyasisir, saise mar etei Keriso wabin tana bora’ara’ah wanatowan, wanatowan. Amen.
58013022	Taitu, abifefeyani iti tur an kabumin koufair abit i kwananutanub kwanama kwananowar gewas. Anayabin iti fef isa akikirum i men manin.
58013023	Ayu akokok anao kwananowar kwanaso’ob. Tai Timothy dibur ma’am i hibotait tit, baise ayu isou saisewat nanan na’at boro airi anan ana’iti.
58013024	A orot ukwarih etei hai tur kwana’owen, hai merar ayiy na’atube God ana sabuw nati bairi kwama’am auman hai merar ayiy. Naatu God ana sabuw afa tafaram Italy wanawanan tema’am auman kwa a merar tiyiy. Manaw kabeber Godane kwa etei isa nama.
58013025	Kwa isa ayoyoyoban, God ana yabowamaim mar etei nigegewasini kwanama.
59001001	Baitumatumayah etei a tafaram kwaihamiy kwatit tafaram tata’amaim kwama’am, etei a merar ayiy. Ayu James God ana akir wairafin na’atube ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana akir wairafin kwa a fef akikirum.
59001002	Taitu, routobon fokarih yumatah ta ta isa hinamamatar ana veya, mar etei kwaniyasisir.
59001003	Anayabin a baitumatum routobon nati na’atube nab kwanabisnowah ana veya baitafofor ana ef boro kwanaso’ob.
59001004	Naatu kwanabatkikin nawainabi kwanan yomanin kwanabisawar ufunamaim, boro men abisa ta isan niyababanimih.
59001005	Baise o yait kukokok ukwar narerekab, God isan inayoyoban, God boro nit, anayabin God i dogoron tutufin etei yasisiramaim sabuw etei ebitih.
59001006	Baise inayoyoyoban ana veya initumatum, men ere kasiy auman, anayabin orot yait erekasiy auman eyoyoyoban ana’itinin i tor yan yabat kotar ebabin in ebiyuwiyuw na’atube.
59001007	Orot yait ana not nati na’atube enotanot Regah biyanane boro men sawar ta nab.
59001008	Anayabin nati orot ana not i rou’ab ebinotanot, ana sinafumaim ana not ebiyuwiyuw.
59001009	Kirisiyan orot yait yababan wairafin Regah nabobora’ah isan niyasisir nakawasa.
59001010	Naatu Kirisiyan orot yait guguw wairafin, God nab nayayare isan niyasisir, anayabin guguw wairafin sigar beran na’atube boro hinafenem hinare.
59001011	Veya wabuburinamaim beran earkimow, ana gewasin i’en hea’obow ere’er na’atube, orot guguw wairafin boro namorob ana sawar abisa’awat bow ma tafan yayababar boro nihamiyen.
59001012	Orot yait routobon wanawananamaim nabatkikin nawawainab boro baigegewasin nab. Anayabin routobon nati na’atube nabisnowaten ana maramaim, ana baiyan ma’ama wanatowan boro nab. Iti omatanen i sabuw iyab God tibiyabuw eomatanih.
59001013	Orot yait routobon iti na’atube nabaib ana maramaim men nao, “Iti routobon i Godane enan.” Kwanaso’ob demon kakafin men kafa’imo God erurtubunimih naatu God men kafa’imo orot babin routobon ebitinimih.
59001014	Baise routobon i orot taiyuwin biyan ana kok ebonawiy, kakafih sinaf kwanekwan enan taiyuwin ana warasa eona’on.
59001015	Naatu i taiyuwin ana kakafih nayen namamaririb ufunamaim, ana bowabow kakafin boro nirerereb. Naatu bowabow kakafin ana yomaninamaim boro morob natita’ur.
59001016	Imih taitu au yabow, sabuw men hinifufuwi. God men kafa’imo orot babin erurutubunihimih.
59001017	Usar gewasih naatu siwar mokobfouh etei i marane tenan. Tamat God marakaw ana baimatarenayan biyanane. I men kafa’imo boro nabotabir auwaraunane nigugum ina’itinimih, en anababatun.
59001018	God taiyuwin ana kokomaim Tur anababatun bai na itit ata yawas iboubun i natunatun tamatar. Saise it tatan sawar bimataren wanawanahimaim ata efan wantoro’ot tatab isan.
59001019	Taitu au yabow, iti tur i men nuhi nabur! Tain i kwanarub gewas tur kwanowar, naatu tur o isan i yatenanub kwanao, na’atube yaso’ar isan men ya virivir hiniwa’an.
59001020	Anayabin orot yait yan so’aso’arin God ana kok abisa yamutufurin isan boro men karam nasinaf.
59001021	Isan imih a kato etei naatu a tafasar etei susuw kwama’am kwanihamiyen, taiyuw kwanitaiy, God ana tur dogoromaim tatanum i kwanab, anayabin nati tur i boro niyawasi.
59001022	Men taiyuw inifufuwi ana’itinin o i tur kunonowar, baise tur inanowar naatu inia’ait.
59001023	Orot yait tur nowar baise men ebi’a’it, ana’itinin i orot yumatan kiyam yan i’itin na’atube.
59001024	Orot yumatan itinbunai sawar, tit inan ufunamaim mar ta’imon yumatan nuhin bur.
59001025	Baise orot yait sabuw roufamih isan ana ofafar rousouwin na’itinbunai nanot nabia’ait, nati orot boro baigegewasin nab. Anayabin men turawat nowar nuhin burumih.
59001026	Naatu orot yait taiyuwin i’itin i Kirisiyan gewasin, baise menan ebi’uma’ar, nati orot ana Kirisiyan yawas i yabin en, taiyuwin ebifuwifuw.
59001027	Imih Tamat God matanamaim Kirisiyan orot anababatun gewasin naatu dogoron rousouwin ana bowabow i boro iti na’atube nasinaf. Kwafur baibin, kwatuw oro’orot, gagaganiy boro ninanawanih, naatu tafaram ana kato boro men biyan nikwahikwah.
59002001	Taitu kwa i ata Regah Jesu Keriso marakaw ana Regah kwabitumitum. Imih sabuw men ufuhine hai itininamaim kwanabuwih hai merar kwanayimih.
59002002	Veya ta orot sawar wairafin boro na’abur gewas uman gold ring niyoun nan a kou’ayamaim narun; naatu orot ta yababan wairafin auman boro ana sawar kakafih na’osen nan narun.
59002003	Kwa orot e’abur gewas enan boro kwanab ana merar kwanay kwanao, “Aro, efan gewasin iti kumare kuma.” Baise orot yababan wairafin isan boro kwanao, “Aro nati haw kumare kuma o nati’imaim kubat.” Nati na’atube kwanasisinaf na’at
59002004	kwa i kouseb wanawanamaim kwaimatar. Orot ta efan gewasin kwaitin, orot ta efan kakafin kwaitin, afufunen nati na’atube i men gewasin.
59002005	Imih taitu au yabow, kwananowar gewas, sabuw iyab iti tafaramamaim yababan wairafih God rubinih baitumatum wairafih himatar God ana aiwob boro ninowah hinab, sabuw iyab God hibiyabuw eomatanih bairi.
59002006	Baise kwa i yababan wairafih kwabi’orot bai’ibih. Sabuw sawar wairafih hibokwarakwarar baibatiyenamaim teyaya’i kwa’itih kwasoso’ob ai en?
59002007	Sabuw nati i kwa Jesu wabin gewasin kwabaib isan tur kakafin hio tibi’ibi kwa’i’itin ai en?
59002008	God ana obaiyunen tur ofafar bukamaim iti na’atube hikirum, “Taituwa iniyabow o taiyuw isa kubiyabow na’atube.” Iti ofafar i anababatun turobe’emaim kwanabi’ufunun na’at, nati i ef gewasin kwasisinaf.
59002009	Baise sabuw ufuhine hai itininamaim ta efan gewasin kwanitin, naatu ta efan kakafin kwanabitin, nati i bowabow kakafin kwasisinaf, imih kwa i ofafar asto’obenayah.
59002010	Orot yait ofafar etei ebobosiyasiyar, baise wanawanahimaim ofafar ta’imon ea’astu’ub, ofafar etei i ea’asto’oben.
59002011	Anayabin ofafar eo, “Taituwa aawan ufun men inan.” Naatu eo maiye, “Taituwa men ina’asabun.” Naatu o tura aawan ufun men inamih, baise tura i’asabun momorob o i ofafar etei i’asto’oben.
59002012	Sabuw iyab roufamen ana ofafar ebibatiyih na’atube o auman boro nibatiyi, imih mata toniwa’an abisa kubowabow naatu abisa kuo ina’itin gewas.
59002013	Anayabin o yait taituw men kukakabibirih baibabatiyen ana veya God boro men nakabibirimih. Kabeberamaim boro God dogoron inabotabir baibatiyen boro inisnowah.
59002014	Taitu, orot ta nao, ayu i baitumatumayan, baise men nabi’a’it na’at ana gewasin boro abistan namatar? Baitumatum nati na’atube men karam boro niyawasi.
59002015	Ana itinin ta i iti, taituwa aurih ar faifuw en naatu mar etei ana fofonin isan aurih bay en.
59002016	Nati ana veya’amaim o bay men initih naatu ar faifuw men initih, baise ina’uwih. “Kwana’abur gewas biya hinafora’ab naatu bay kwanaa ya hinagadid, God nigegewasini kwanama.” Tur nati na’atube inao ana gewasin boro abisa namatar?
59002017	Itininaban nati na’atube, imih baitumatum akisin nabin nabat, aurin bai’a’it en nati baitumatum i murubin.
59002018	Baise orot boro iti na’atube nao. “Orot ta i baitumatumayan, naatu orot ta bai’a’aitayan, hairi’ika i karamam,” baise ayu abibatiy, “Orot baitumatumayan aurin bai’a’ait en kwi’obaiyu aitin, baise ayu karam boro au baitumatum abi’a’it ani’obaiy kwana’itin.”
59002019	Kwa kwabitumatum God i ta’imon? Gewasin! Demon auman hitumatum hibir ah umah teo’oror.
59002020	Kwabikoko’aw! Ani’obaiyi kwana’itin baitumatum aurin bai’a’it en ana ub i murubin.
59002021	Kwaso’ob aisim ata agir Abraham yamutufuren bai God nanamaim tit? Ana bai’a’itamaim taiyuwin natun Isaac bai gem tafanamaim siboromih yara’ah.
59002022	Imih kwana’itin Abraham ana baitumatum naatu ana bai’a’it hairi hai bowabow i ta’imon, imih ana bai’a’itamaim ana baitumatum in yomanin easa’ub.
59002023	Imih Bukamaim iti na iturobe eo, “Abraham God itumitum naatu ana baitumatumamaim God Abraham bai ana orot mutufurin matar.” Naatu ana begon rouw eaf.
59002024	Imih kwana’itin baitumatum naatu bai’a’it hairi i tanita’imon ata ef boro namutufor God matanamaim, men baitumatum akisin nabin nabat.
59002025	Ana’itinin ta kwana’itin. Efamaim baiwa’an kwanekwaneyan babin wabin Rahab Israel sabuw hai rafot rouwayah hinan hai merar yi buwih, naatu ibaisih ef ta’awat iuwih hibihir. Imih ana bowabowamaim yamutufur God matanamaim.
59002026	Biya aurin ayubin en, biya i murubin na’atube baitumatum aurin bai’a’it en baitumatum i murubin.
59003001	Taitu men moumur na’in bai’obaiyenayah mataramih kwaniwa’an. Anayabin kwa kwaso’ob, it iyab bai’obaiyenayah, baibatebat ana veya God boro fokarin maiyow nibatiyit, men sabuw maiyow nabibabatiyih na’atube’emih.
59003002	It etei’imak mar etei ef ta ta’amaim tare’ere, baise orot yait awanamaim tur ititit, naatu men nasisinaf kwanekwan na’at, nati orot wanawanan i rousouwin, imih i karam biyan boro nanutitiy gewas nabonawiy.
59003003	Ana’itinin ta i iti, horse mo’on murab ina’utan naatu o menamaim namih kukokok murab inatain, horse gagamin na’in boro natatabir o a kokomaim nan.
59003004	Na’atube wa gagamin na’in kwana’itin, yaurabad gagamin ebababin, baise murab kikimin maiyow nati wa ana gunigamaim hi’utan inu’in, orot menamaim namih ekok ea’abar murab kikimin karam boro wa gagamin na’in narowen mutufur orot ana kokomaim nan.
59003005	Imih kwana’itin menat i kikimin maiyow biyat turin, baise ana o kwanekwan i yumatan ta. Naatu itinin ta i iti, wairaf kikimin maiyow natamun nare’er kutor gagamin na’in boro na’arah ni’afiy.
59003006	Imih menat i wairaf na’atube in etoto’ab. Menat i tafaram ana kakafin an. Biyat wanawanan ma, not kakafih faram at umat etei susuw, ata yawas tutufin etei bonawiy Baimakiy Ana Efanamaim wairaf wan eyayara’ah na’arahimih.
59003007	Me yan ana sawar naatu riy yan ana sawar etei karam boro sabuw hinimanamen, afa himanamenaka, sigarafor, mamu, uway, kok, uma’ar, naatu siy.
59003008	Baise orot babin men yait ta menat imanamimih. Menat i sawar kakafin moromorob naatu bibirin men karam inimutufur.
59003009	Menatamaim Tamat God ana merar tayi tabobora’ara’ah baise menat ta’imonamaim taituwat God ana’itininabe bimatarih i tao’orarafih maiye.
59003010	Awat i ta’imon, baise merarayow naatu orarafen hairi i efan ta’imon tititit. Taitu iti na’atube men nama.
59003011	Harew buruburur ana sou’umaim karam boro harew naatu riy hairi sou ta’imon hinayen? Men karam.
59003012	Taitu, fafou nabiw men karam boro olive ro’on nayai, naatu grape nabiw na’atube men karam boro fafou ro’on nayai. Riy yan i na’atube men karam boro tomatom ana harew inahun.
59003013	Orot yait kwa wanawanamaim not wairafin naatu ukwarin rerekabin nama’am i boro taiyuwin nayare tur hamehamen naatu yawas gewasin nasisinaf kwana’itin. Sinaf nati i ukwar rerekabane enan.
59003014	Baise o dogor wanawanan tenakuyakuy, bobowen, kabat ibun wa’ir ema’am, men o not wairafih inarouw inaora’at, turobe ana bowabow inayaubimih.
59003015	Not nati na’atube i men marane enan, baise iti tafaram nowan. Orot babin biyahine naatu demon mowan biyanane enan.
59003016	Anayabin menamaim bobowen naatu kabat ema’ama nati’imaim i fanasair naatu sawar kakafih ta ta imaim temamatar.
59003017	Baise not marane enan ana itinin wantoro’ot i aurin kato en; tufuw wairafin, ana tur hamehamen, kabeberayan, ana ofonah maumurih, ana bowabow ro’on gewasin, wanawanan men rerekabin.
59003018	Imih sabuw iyab tufuwamaim tufuw ana ub tetatanum yomaninamaim boro gewasin hinafour.
59004001	Kwa wanawanamaim iti gamin baiyow ana ef i menane na kwagam kwabiyow? Iti sawar etei i kwa a naniyanane enan, biya ana yasisir isan, naatu nati sawar i mar etei wanawanamaim in gamin ekukura’ara’ah.
59004002	A kok gagamin i sawar kwatabow, baise men kwabowabow. Sabuw kwa’a’asbunubunuw naatu kwababahiy kwanekwan, baise abisa kwakokok men kwabowabow. Naatu abisa men kwabaib isan kwagam kwabiyow, anayabin God men kwabifefeyan.
59004003	God kwabifefeyan men ibit, anayabin sawar kwa akis a yasisir isan kwakok kwabifefeyan, nati fefeyan i men gewasin.
59004004	Baiwa’an kwanekwaneyah tak! Tafaram bairi kwai’of God ana rakit kwamamatar kwaso’ob ai en? Orot yait tafaram ana of emamatar i taiyuwin iwa’an God ana rakit matar.
59004005	Men kwananot tur iti Bukamaim eo i yabin en. “God Anun Kakafiyin wanawanatamaim yari’iy ema’am, abisa kakafin tasisinaf isan ana yaso’ar i gagamin maiyow ebaib.
59004006	Baise manaw kabeber Godane i gagamin na’in ebitit. Buk Atamaninamaim eo na’atube, “Sabuw bai’o’orotoyah God rukouwih, baise sabuw iyab teyayara’iyih i manaw kabeber ebitih.”
59004007	Isan imih taiyuw God kwanitin. Naatu Demon Mowan kwanarukouw, saise i boro nabihir kwa nihamiyi.
59004008	Kwanan God biyanamaim kwaniyubin, i boro nan kwa biyamaim niyubin, kwa i bowabow kakafin wairafi, imih uma kwanasouwen, naatu dogor kwanasouwen, kwa wanawan rerekabih.
59004009	A kakafih isan kwaniyababan, kwanarerey kwana’osmetan, marib keteketef kwanihamiy kwanarerey. Naatu kawasa kwanihamiy kwaniyababan.
59004010	Naatu au’uwi maiye Regah nanamaim taiyuw kwanayara’iyi, Regah boro kwa nabora’ahi.
59004011	Taitu, men asir taiyuw wanawanamaim kwanagam, kwanigigim, kwana’uwi kwanikwaniyimih. O yait Kirisiyan tura isan igam iu naatu kubibabatiy, o i ofafar isan kugamigim naatu kubibabatiy. Imih o kubibatiy ana veya o i men ofafar kubobosiyasiyar, baise ana baibatiyenayan imatar.
59004012	God akisinamo ofafar ebitit naatu i akisinamo nibatiyit, i akisinamo boro niyawasit naatu i akisinamo boro nagurusit. Baise o a gewasin i men tomar taituwa kubibatiy?
59004013	Iti ao kwananowar, o yait iti na’at inao, “Boun o maras it boro tanan tafaram ta gagamin, imaim kwamur ta’imon tanama tanabow kabay tanab ata kabay tafan tanaya’abar.”
59004014	Baise maras ayawas isan abisa namamatar o men iso’ob. Kwa i sowasow na’atube, mar auman sowasow i’itin, mar kafai in veya nayey sowasow na’am in.
59004015	Baise ana gewasin kwa iti na’atube kwatao, God nakokok na’at basit tanama sawar iti o ni’i tanasinaf.
59004016	Baise kwa i bai’o’orotoyah naatu ora’ara’atayah, nati a ora’ara’at etei i kakafih.
59004017	Isan imih orot yait sawar gewasin so’ob baise men isisinaf, nati orot i bowabow kakafin isisinaf.
59005001	Naatu boun kwa sabuw iyab sawar wairafi kwananowar gewas! Kwaniyababan, fana aumetawat na’in kwanitar kaukuw kwanarerey, anayabin baimakiy gagamin na’in boro isa namatar!
59005002	A sawar etei boro hinamun, naatu a’ar a faifuw boro ganidor hinaa.
59005003	A gold a silver kwaya kwatototo etei boro simur hinabow naatu nati sawar boro hina’e’en, biya etei boro wairafabe na’arah nagurus. Baise kwa i boro’ika iti mar yomaninamaim kwama sawar kwaya kwatototo.
59005004	A bowayah oro’orot a masawamaim hibowabow men kwabibaiyanih isan hirerey tegamigam kwanonowar? Nati oro’orot hai rererey i Regah Fairin nowar.
59005005	Tafaramamaim a kok abisa etei i karam kwabow kwama kwabiyasisir, forobe biya hikabinitut rabi beyahi isan ana veya kwama kwakakaif.
59005006	Sabuw gewasih asir ubar kwa’itih naatu kwarouw temomorob, men uma tirurukouw.
59005007	Taitu, yate nanub kwanama’am Regah nan. Orot masaw bowayan kwana’itin, ana masaw bow bay baiyamur isan yaten nub ma mimiy kumar hairi kakaif bay ebiyaiur na’atube.
59005008	Imih kwa auman na’atube yatenanub kwanabatkikin, anayabin Regah na isan ana veya i na kabom.
59005009	Taitu, men taiyuw ubar kwanit kwanigamigam, taiyuw ubar kwanit kwanabigamigam God boro nibatiyi, anayabin baibabatiyenayan i a etawan awan ebatabat.
59005010	Taitu, dinab oro’orot Regah wabinamaim hibibinan isan hibi’akir ana veya i yatehnub hibatkikin, bai’obaiyen nati kwana’itin kwananot.
59005011	Nati sabuw i baigegewasinayah tao kwaso’ob. Anayabin yatehnub hibatkikin wainabih. Job bi’akir ana veya yaten nub babatkikin i hio kwanowar, naatu ana yomaninamaim Regah mi’itube isan sisinaf i kwaso’ob. Anayabin Regah i yan bababanin naatu kabeberayan.
59005012	Baise taitu, sawar tafantoro’ot i iti, obaifaro’omih men mar o tafaram wabihimaim kwanao baifaro’omih, o sawar afa wabihimaim kwanao baifaro’omih, sinafumih turobe inao inasinaf o men inasinaf, saise God boro men ubar nit nibatiyimih.
59005013	Orot yait kwa wanawanamaim isan yababan emamatar nayoyoban, naatu orot yait ebiyasisir bora’ara’aten ana ew natabor.
59005014	Orot yait kwa wanawanamaim nasasawow Kirisiyan orot ukwarih isah tur niyafar hinan isan hinayoyoban naatu Regah wabinamaim biyan raiy hinisuwei.
59005015	Yoyobanayah baitumatumamaim hinayoyoban orot sawuwin boro nayawas, Regah boro nimisiruw yawas nitin, naatu bowabow kakafih nasisinaf na’at Regah boro nanotawiyen.
59005016	Isan imih taiyuw wanawanamaim abowabow kakafih turanah matah kwana’e’en, naatu turanah bairi isa kwanayoyoban saise kwa boro yawas kwanab. Orot dogoron mutufurin ana yoyoban i fairin yabin boro namatar.
59005017	Elijah i orot it na’atube, baise ana not tutufin etei yoyoban, men kok toun tayar, naatu kwamur tounu tafan sumar six na’atube toun men yar.
59005018	Baise iban yoyoban maiye marane toun yar re me yan sawar hikuboubunih hiyen aau himatar.
59005019	Taitu, kwa wanawanamaim orot ta turobe ana yawas nawas kasiy natitit na’at, o ta nati orot inibais namatabir maiye.
59005020	Iti tur i kwananot. O yait taituwa bowabow kakafin wairafin inibais ana kakafihine inarumutufur namamatabir maiye, nati orot ayubin i morobone iyawas, naatu Regah ana kakafih etei boro nanotawiyen nasawar.
60001001	Ayu Peter Jesu Keriso ana tur abarayan, kwa isa a fef akikirum, God ana roubinen sabuw naatu touman sabuw na’atube earuwsabuy kwatit nanabin Pontus, Galasia, Capadosia na naatu Asia, Bitiniya wanawanan kwa ma’am.
60001002	Kwa i Tamat God ana kokomaim rubiniy naatu i ana Anun Kakafiyinamaim kwa iwani i ana sabuw kakafiyin kwamatar. Jesu Keriso kwanabosiyasiyar naatu i ana rara’amaim nakusouwi uhew kwana matar. Karam kwa biyane, manaw kabeber naatu tufuw naya’abar nara’at.
60001003	God wabin tanabora’ah it ata Regah Jesu Keriso Tamah. Anayabin it isat ana baiwanbabanen i ra’at, Jesu Keriso morobone mimisir imaim yawas boubun itit. Imih it abistan isan tanotanot i nuhifot tama’am.
60001004	Imih it au nat tananuw God ana baigegewasin totobuyoy ana sabuw isah maramaim ya ti’inu’in tanabow. Nati sawar boro men hinamun, men hina’af, naatu men hinakusaisirih.
60001005	Iti sawar i kwa isa, baitumatumamaim God ana fairamaim tafafar yawas bait isan God yabuna yomaninamaim nabow natit hinirerereb.
60001006	Iti isan kwa boro gagaminaka kwaniyasisir, baise anotanot mar kikimin boro kwanibiyababan, anayabin kwa boro yare ta ta wanawanan kwanarun kwani’akir.
60001007	Sawar iti temamatar i kwa a baitumatum efufufun, saise kwa a baitumatum boro narusouw niturobe. Routobon iti na’atube emamatar i gold te’afun terurubunai ana gewasin tebaib na’atube. Baise, kwa a baitumatum ana gewasin i ra’at gold natabir. Imih a baitumatum wainaben wanawanan narun fair nabaib ufunamaim boro nanawiy bora’araten fair baifa’en nit, Jesu Keriso nabirerereb ana veya’amaim.
60001008	Basit men kwa’i’itin baise isan kwabiyabow, men kwa’i’itin baise kwabitumatum. Naatu iti yasisir i igewasin kwanekwan, men karam boro isan tanao taniduduramih.
60001009	Anayabin ayub ana yawas bain isan ana ef i baitumatum akisin.
60001010	Dinab oro’orot afa manaw kabeber God nabit isan hio kwanowar naatu nati yawas ana’an isan hamenamo yatehnub erekakaf hinuwet men kafaita.
60001011	Imih i tita’urin isan hinuwet mar biy boro namatar naatu boro mi’itube namatar. Keriso Anuninimaim dinab oro’orot iwanih hai tur eowen, Keriso nabi’akir ufunamaim wabin gagamin hinifai hinabora’arah.
60001012	God ana dinab oro’orot isah irerereb abistan i hisisinaf i men taiyuwih isah hibowabowamih baise i kwa isa hibow. Naatu sawar abisa inu’in kob abarayah tur gewasin hibai hina boun hiorereb kwanonowar. I Anun Kakafiyin marane hiyafar re’ere ana fairamaim kwa isa hibinan kwanonowar. Naatu iti sawar isah tounamatar auman tekokok kwanekwan hinaso’ob.
60001013	Isan imih a not kwabogaigiwas bai’a’it isan, matatoniwa’an * kwa anuhifot anababatun baigegewasinamaim kwanayai, ana maramaim Jesu Keriso nabirerereb kwa boro nit kwanab.
60001014	Kwa i fanabow kek na’atube men kakafin ana naniyanamaim kwa ayawas nabonawiy marasika kwama’am na’atube kwanama’amih.
60001015	Baise nati efanin God kwa eafi i kakafiyin, imih mar etei asinafumaim kakafiyi kwanama.
60001016	Buk Atamaninamaim eo, “Kwa etei i kakafiyinamaim kwanama, anayabin ayu i kakafiyinamaim ama’am.”
60001017	God kwa Tamat kwarouw isan kwayoyoban, i sabuw etei hai bowabowamaim efufunih * naatu men yait ta oukoun ebatabat. Kwa i nanawan sabuw na’atube iti tafaramaim kwama’am, imih God isan kwanabir. Isan imih mar etei a bowabowamaim God isan kakaf nama. Kwa a yawas tutufin iti tafaramamaim kwanama.
60001018	Anayabin kwa kwaso’ob, kwa a’a’agir hai yawas kakafin hiyabunibun ra’iy na, ine Keriso kwa tubuni botaiti. Iti men boun gold o silver biyan ana gewasin ekukusaisir na’atube.
60001019	Baise Keriso ana rara uhew bitan lamb , boubun biyan gewasin aurin feher en imaim tubunit.
60001020	Tafaram matara’e ana veya God Keriso rubin, kwa baiyawasi isan naatu boun iti yomaninamaim kwa isa irerereb kwa’i’itin.
60001021	I wanawananamaim kwa God kwaitumitum, morobone i yawas misir naatu aiwob God itin. Imih kwa a baitumatum naatu a nuhifot God wanawananamaim ema’am.
60001022	Kwa i boun turobe kwabobosiyasiyaramaim kusouwi uhew kwamatar, imih a yabow a’ofonah isah i gewasin maiyow, dogor babanika a’ofonah isah kwaniyabuwih.
60001023	Anayabin kwa i God ana tur yawasin naatu wanatowanin kwanonowar imaim yawas boubun kwabai maiye. Ana’itinin iti tur i ub yawasin kwabai men murubin ana ubamih, baise wanatowan ana ub kwabai boro nama wanatowan.
60001024	Buk Atamaninamaim eo, “Orot babin i fotan na’atube. Naatu ana mokob i boun sigar beran na’atube. Beran nakekerer boro naha’obow nara’iy.
60001025	Baise Regah ana tur ikwah sawar nama wanatowan.” Nati tur i tur Gewasin kwa isa hibinan kwanowaraka.
60002001	Isan imih yawas kakafih boro kwanihamiyen. Men kwanifuwen, men awa hinaharewan, men kwanibobowen, men turanah isah tur kakafin kwanao.
60002002	Kek sosof na’atube kwanamatar, mar etei sika namamah ayub ananun tom isan, saise i kwanatomatom kwa ayawas boro nara’at nayen.
60002003	Buk Atamaninamaim hi’o hikirum, “Kwa taiyuw ayawasamaim kwaso’ob Regah i kabeberayan.”
60002004	Kwana ata Regah biyanaika kwanama, iti kabay yawasin sabuw hi’itin hikwahir yabin en hirouw, baise God rubin na mokob foun matar.
60002005	Kwa baitumatumayah i wabat wanatowanin na’atube, imaim God bai ayub ana Tafaror Bar ewowowab. Kwa auman i firis ana kou’ay ayubitane ana sibor kwaya’ay. Jesu Keriso ana baibaisamaim, God i iyasisir ebaib.
60002006	Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum, “Kwa’itin, ayu agim gewasin arubin, i Zion tafanamaim ayai, agim etei hai ukwarih matar, naatu yait nabitumitum boro men biyan na’ohow.”
60002007	Kwa iyab kwabitumitum, Keriso i kabay gewasin kwa isa, baise kwa iyab men kwabitumitum isa boro men gewasin. “Naatu bar wowabayah kabay hi’itin yabin en hirouw hikwahir inu’in, ina kabay etei hai ukwarin matar.
60002008	Naatu ibanak Buk Atamaninamaim hikirum hio, “Nati kabay i boun sabuw koun hiyen tere’ere, naatu to ah yow tere’ere.” Anayabin Tur Gewasin men hinowar, imih God ana kok yayakikifut isah emamatar.
60002009	Baise kwa i God ana rubinen sabuw, kwa i firis gewas, God ana sabuw kakafiyi, naatu God nowan, imih God ana bowabow gewasin kwanaorereb, anayabin guguminamaim kwama’am botaiti kwatit marakaw bonamanamarin gewasin kwabai.
60002010	Marasika kwa men God ana sabuw, baise boun kwa i ana sabuw. Marasika God ana kabeber men kwabai, baise boun i ana kabeber kwabai.
60002011	Are au ofonah, kwa au’uwi kwa i nanawan naatu touman sabuw na’atube iti tafaramaim kwama’am! Men biya ana kok nabonawiyi imaim nakaifi. Nati biya ana kok i boun rakit na’atube, boro ayub hairi hiniyow.
60002012	Eteni Sabuw matahimaim kwanakaifi gewas kwanama. Kwa isa boro bowabow kakafih sinafuyah hinarauw hinao, baise anamaramaim bowabow gewasin kwanasisinaf boro men isa tur ta hinao. Imih Baibatebat ana Veya God namamatabir. Kwa isa boro God ana merar hina hinabora’ara’ah.
60002013	Regah wabinamaim kwa kwayar’iy sabuw gagamih babahimaim kwanama. Gawan hai aiwob gagamin aiwob etei ukwarih,
60002014	gawan sabuw iyab gawan ana ukwarin iyafarih hitit tafaram ta ta tekakaif, imih iyab bowabow kakafin tesisinaf boro hinabow baimakiy hinitih, baise iyab bowabow gewasin tesisinaf boro hinabora’ara’ahih.
60002015	God ekokok kwa kwanasinaf gewas saife nati sabuw hai not meyemeye, boro hinanutanubamo hinama, aurih ef men ema’am boro isa tur kakafih hinao.
60002016	Kwa ama i sabuw roufamen na’atube kwanama, baise men nati roufamen ana yawasamaim kwama’am isan afair kwanab kakafin kwanasinaf, baise kwa i God ana’akir wairafihibe kwanama.
60002017	Sabuw etei isah kwanakakaf. A ofonah baitumatumayah isah kwaniyabow kwanakakaf. Naatu aiwob hai ukwarin isan kwanakakaf.
60002018	Kwa akir wairafi kakafemaim kwanayara’iy, a orot ukwarih fanah kwanab babahimaim kwanama, men gewasin isa isisinaf akisin fanah kwanab, baise iyab fokarin isa tisisinaf auman fanah kwanab.
60002019	Kwa anot tutufin etei God ana kokomaim kwabowabow naatu sabuw asir biyababan hinit nawawainabi isan, God boro nigegewasini.
60002020	Bo kakafin kwasisinaf isan hinarab nawawainabi ana gewasin boro abisa kwanab, baise gewasin kwanasinaf isan nawainabi kwabi’akir God boro nigegewasini.
60002021	Kwa afa’af kwabai i bai’akir isan, anayabin Keriso kwa isa i’akir ana bai’obaiyen yare saise i an efanin kwani’ufunun.
60002022	“Bowabow kakafin men ta sinaf, naatu awanamaim men baifuwen tur ta eomih.”
60002023	Hibi’i’iyab ana maramaim i men kafa’imo bai’iyab tur ta wan yi isah eomih, i bi’akir ana veya men hibiruwimih, baise ana nuhifot i God mutufor baibatiyenayan imaim yai.
60002024	Keriso akisinamo ata kakafih i biyanamaim eabar onaf afe’enamaim yen, saise it bowabow kakafinane tanamorob naatu yawas mutuforomaim tanama, i ana fitamaim it iyawasit.
60002025	Anayabin kwa bobaituw sheep na’atube ef kwasa’ir nanabin kwan, baise boun kwa buwi kwamatabir kwana Nabatanenayan naatu anun ana kaifenayan biyan kwatit.
60003001	Baibin, a’aaw oro’orot fanah kwanab kwanayara’iyi babahimaim kwanama, saise a’aaw oro’orot God ana tur gewasin men nabitumitum boro kwa ayawas gewasinamaim dogoron kwanikitabir hinan baitumatumayah hinamatar. Men kwa a turamaim baise kwa a yawas ana itininamaim.
60003002	Anayabin kwa ayawas ana itinin i uhewbitan.
60003003	Kwa baibin men taiyuw biya ufunane ana itininamaim kwaniwa’an kwanan sa’er kwanamatar, arib a baisuwaramaim, tain tenasour o debad ya’amaim, o faifuw osenamaim. Nati sa’er boro men nama manin.
60003004	Baise nati efanin, kwa a yawas wanawanan ana sa’er hina’i’itin i tufuw nuwarob naatu yara’iyen. Sa’er iti na’atube God i’itin i ra’at naatu igewasin kwanekwan.
60003005	Marasika baibin iyab kakafiyinamaim hima’am, i hai nuhifot God biyanamaim hiyei sa’er himatar, anayabin i a’aawah oro’orot babahimaim hima.
60003006	Babin Sarah i nati na’atube ma, Abraham fanan bosiyasiyar naatu ana regah rouw eaf. Kwa i Sarah natunatun, kwa gewasin kwanasisinaf na’at, boro men abisa ta isan kwanabir.
60003007	Kwa oro’orot auman a’aaw baibin kwanasu’ubih gewas bairi kwanama, baibin i ririmih men boun kwa fair kwabai kwama’am na’atube. Isah sinafumih erekakaf kwanasinaf, anayabin wanatowan ana siwar God nabit, i auman boro bairi nafarami. Nati na’atube kwanasisinaf ayoyobanamaim boro men sawar ta a ef nahirimih.
60003008	Abistan anotanot yomaninamaim anao kwananowar auman anisawar. Kwa turanah bairi anot ta’imon, ananiyan ta’imon; sabuw bairi kwaniyabow tait ruburub na’atube, naatu turanah isah kwanayara’iyi naatu kwananot yawananih.
60003009	Tur kakafin hina’u’uwi o hinao’orarafi men wan kwanay, baise nati efanin baigegewasinamaim wan kwanay, anayabin baigegewasin i God eomatani boro nit ana maramaim kwa na’a’afi.
60003010	Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube hikirum hi’o, “Yait ekokok yawas niyasisir. naatu yait ekokok veya gewasin na’itin menanamaim men kakafin nao, naatu ufurinamaim men baifufuwen tur natit.
60003011	Sinaf kakafin nihamiyen natatabir gewasin nasinaf, naatu tufuw isan hinitafofor dogoron tutufin etei.
60003012	Anayabin sabuw hai yawas mutufurin Regah ekakaifih, naatu hai yoyoban isan tainin fa’iwa’an ma erubirub, baise sabuw iyab kakafin tisisinaf Regah i kaun ebitih.”
60003013	Bowabow gewasin kwanasisinaf isan yait boro kwa ni’a’afiyi naborabirabi?
60003014	Baise gewasin kwasisinaf isan kwanabi’akir, kwa i boro baigegewasin kwanab, imih men yait ta isan kwanabir naatu kwaniyababan.
60003015	Baise Keriso isan yatenanub dogor tutufin etei kwanab naatu Regah na’atube isan kwanakakafiy kwanakwafir. Mar etei bobuna’amaim kwanama. Sabuw afa kwa nuhifot kwabai kwama’am isan hinabibatiyi, kwanakubuna hinanowar.
60003016	Baise sabuw isah yara’iyen naatu kakafemaim kwanasinaf. A not gewasinamaim iu’uwi mar etei imaim kwanasinaf, saise ubar hinabit ana maramaim sabuw iyab Keriso ana gewasin isan tur kakafih hina’u’uwi boro hai tur isan biyah na’ohow.
60003017	Anayabin God ana kok gewasin kwanasisinaf isan kwanabi’akir, i gewasin maiyow, naatu kakafin kwanasisinaf isan kwanabi’akir i men gewasin.
60003018	Anayabin sabuw etei hai kakafin isan Keriso mar ta’imon morob, sabuw gewasih naatu sabuw kakafih isah, saise tabonawiyit tatan God nanamaim tatatit. Biyan i morob, baise ayubin i yawasin.
60003019	Naatu Anunin na sabuw murubih ayubih ana diburamaim hiya hima’am isah binan.
60003020	Iti sabuw i Noah ana wa * wowowab ana veya, ayubihine God fanan hisair, baise God yaten nub ma sabuw etei eight buwih wa wanawanan hirun gis yey ana veya, harew wanane tafafarih hima.
60003021	Naatu iti harew i bapataito ana i’inanen boun imaim kwa iyawasi. Men biya kato ekukusouw, baise not gewasin iuwi God kwa’o’omatan isan. Jesu Keriso morobone mimisir imaim kwa iyawasi.
60003022	Naatu yen au mar naatu God ana asukwafune mare ema’am, tounamatar etei naatu mar hai fair hai roubabaruwen etei i babanamaim ebobonawiyih.
60004001	Isan imih Keriso i biyanamaim biyababan bai morob, imih not nati ta’imonamaim kwanabogaigiwas biya nababan, anayabin orot biyan baban ebi’akir * bowabow kakafin i biyanamaim boro na’afuw.
60004002	Naatu ana ma nati’imaim nabubusuruf boro men biyan ana kokomaim nabonawiy nama’amih, baise boro God ana kokomaim nama.
60004003	Anayabin kwa veya manin maiyow Eteni Sabuw hai ma na’atube kwama, ayawas etei i kwabisesebar kwanekwan, baiwa’an isan kukura’ara’hi, kwatomatom kwanekwan, ben kawasa wanawanan kwatom kwararowabon, hiyuw kakafih wanawanan kwasisinaf kwanekwan, naatu hai kwafiren kakafih wanawanan kwaikofanih bairi kwakwafir.
60004004	Turobe kwa a’ofonah bairi marasika kwabita’ay i tibifofofor men kafaita, anayabin abisa kakafin tisisinaf kwabikofanih isan tur kakafih maiyow ti’u’uwi.
60004005	Baise kwanaso’ob, God sabuw etei boro nibabatiyih, sabuw yawayawasih naatu murumurubih etei. Imih i boro God nanamaim hinabat nabibatiyih hiniya futifut.
60004006	Ana’an iti isan tur gewasin hibinan, naatu murumurubih auman isah hibinan. Saise biyahine bai’akir hibai himomorob, ayubihine boro yawasih God bairi hinama.
60004007	Tafaram ana yomanin i na iyubin. Isan imih anot etei naruboun kwanayamutufuri gewas kwanayoyoban.
60004008	Sawar etei tafahimaim, a yabow dogor babanika taituwa bairi kwaniyabowbonen, anayabin yabow i bowabow kakafih etei esusuma’ay.
60004009	A bar etawan kwanabotawiy a ofonah isah, eremerarayow men eregamin.
60004010	Kwa ta’ita’imon God biyanane a siwar ta ta kwabaib, i kwanakaif gewas, taituwa kwanibaisih, saise God ana gewasin kwa wanawanane natit sabuw hina’itin.
60004011	O yait tur o isan ana siwar ibaib, tur inao ana’itinin i God o wanawananamaim eo, o yait baibais ana siwar ibaib, God ana fair bitimaim inabow, saise o a bowabow nati’imaim God boro merarayow hinitin Jesu Keriso wabinamaim. Fair, marakaw i akisinamo isan nama wanatowan, wanatowan. Amen.
60004012	Are au ofonah, * men kwana’oror iti routobon kakafin wanawanan kwarun e’a’arahih isan, ana’itin boun sawar asir isa emamatar na’atube.
60004013	En baise, kwaniyasisir, kwa i Keriso ana bai’akir turin kwabaib, saise i ana fair bonamanamarin nabirerereb anamaramaim kwa boro dogor yasisir awan nakaratan.
60004014	Keriso wabinamaim sabuw tur kakafih hinao hinabi’a’afiyi boro baigegewasin kwanab, anayabin Ayubin gewagewasin, God Anun Kakafiyin i kwa tafa mara’at ema’am.
60004015	Kwai’akir biya ebababan i men sabuw kwa’a’asbunubunuw, o kwababain isan, kakafih kwasisinaf isan, o sabuw hai wau kwayiy isan.
60004016	En baise kwai’akir biya ebababan, anayabin kwa i Kirisiyan sabuw, imih men biya na’ohow, baise God kwanabora’ara’ah ana merar kwanay, bai’akir nati na’atube wabinamaim kwabaib isan.
60004017	Baibatebat ana veya i etitit, naatu God natunatun i boro wan nibabatiyih. Naatu it Kirisiyan sabuw auman boro nibabatiyit, baise sabuw iyab God ana Tur Gewasin men hibitumatum yomaninamaim isah boro abisa namatar?
60004018	Buk Atamaninamaim eo, “Sabuw gewasih yawas bain isan isah nafofokar na’at, Sabuw God men hisusu’ub naatu kakafih sinafuyah isah boro abisa namatar?”
60004019	Isan imih sabuw iyab God ana kokomaim tibi’akir, hai sinaf gewasinamaim God hai Baimatarenayan hinitumitum, anayabin God ana omatanen i mar etei esinaf tibiturobe.
60005001	Ayu auman i bonawiyenayan orot ta naatu Keriso hirab hi’a’akir momorob ana sifrubonayan ta. Naatu Keriso ana marakaw nabirereb ayu boro au nowau turin anab. Kwa * bonawiyenayah ekaleisia wanawanahimaim tur fokarin ao abifefeyani.
60005002	God ana * bobaituw babamaim tema’am kwanakaifih gewas, dogor tutufin etei, men erebaifut kwanakaifen, baise God ekokok na’atube. Men kwananot nati bowabowamaim kwa boro a kabay kwanab, en baise a naniyan tutufin etei i God isan nakura’ara’ahi kwanabow.
60005003	Sabuw babamaim hima kwakakaifen men a baiyonayonayah hinamatar, baise kwa a bowabowamaim i hina’itin hini’u’uri.
60005004	Naatu bobaituw kaifenayan ukwarin nanan anamaramaim, kwa boro a kowas bonamanamarin nit, naatu i ana marakawin boro men namabiyamih.
60005005	Orot boub auman au’uwi, regaregah ai’in fanah kwanab. * Kwa etei’imak, yara’iyen ana faifuw kwana’us turanah bairi kwanibaibaisbonen kwanabow. Anayabin Buk Atamaninamaim iti na’atube eo, “Sabuw bai’o’orotoyah God men ekokok, baise sabuw iyab teyayara’iyih God i ebibaisih.”
60005006	Imih kwanayara’iyi God uman fairin babanamaim kwanama, saise i ana veya gewasin nabaib ana maramaim kwa boro nabora’ahi kwanayen.
60005007	A yababan etei God umanamaim kwaihamiyen, anayabin kwa i mar etei ana kaifen babanamaim kwama’am.
60005008	Mata toniwa’an taiyuw a ef kwana’itin gewas. Kwa a rakit orot Demon Kakafin lion na’atube garan nuwet ereremor orot babin ta yubin tarsisibin aanin isan.
60005009	Baise kwanarukouw, naatu a baitumatum tafanamaim kwanabatkikin, anayabin kwa kwaso’ob tafaram wanawanan taituwa baitumatumayah etei i bai’akir ta’imon wanawanan kwarun kwanan.
60005010	Baise mar kafai kwanabi’akir ufunamaim, manaw kabeber ana God Keriso wanawananamaim ana marakaw wanatowanin bairi faram isan ea’afi boro nabobuna’i, nawowabfuti, fair nit, naatu kwanabatkikin.
60005011	Nati i anababatun. God isan fair ema’am wanatowan, wanatowan Amen .
60005012	Silas * ana baibaisamaim ayu iti fef kabumin akirum kwa isa abiyafar, Silas i ana merar ayiy, bosunusunubayan orot gewasin. Ayu iti fef akikirum ana’an i akokok kwa tafa fair anayai naatu a tur ana’owen kwanaso’ob manaw kabeber Godane, i kwa wanawananamaim ma ebibaisi, imih i tafanamaim kwanabatkikin.
60005013	Babilon ekaleisia kwa rubu na’atube kwa bairi roubinen kwabaib a merar tiyiy, naatu ayu natu Mark auman a merar eyiy.
60005014	Yabow ana efamaim kwanimerarayowbonen kwanimamayen kwanama. Kwa iyab Keriso wanawananamaim kwama’am etei isa tufuw nama. Amen .
61001001	Ayu Simon Peter, Jesu Keriso ana akir wairafin naatu ana tur abarayan. Kwa iyab God ana roumutuforen wanawananamaim kwarun baitumatum gewasin aki abaib na’atube kwabaib isan afef akikirum.
61001002	Ayu ayoyoyoban God ana manaw ana kabeber naatu ana tufuwamaim nigegewasini, saise God naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana so’ob tutufin etei kwanaso’ob gewas.
61001003	It ata ma yawas isan God ana fairamaim sawar etei’imak itit. Naatu i taiyuwin ana fair naatu ana gewasinamaim eafit Jesu Keriso’one Kirisiyan anama yawas taso’ob. Kwa iyab Jesu Keriso naatu God ana roumutuforen wanawanan baitumatum gewasin maiyow aki biti na’atube kwa it.
61001004	Nati fair ta’imon naatu eomatanen gewagewasih maiyow itit, saise nati siwaramaim iti tafaram ana gurusen kakafih boro kwanahaiw, imih wanatowan anama gewas kwanafarambonen kwanama.
61001005	Anayabin iti isan, kwanasinaftobon gewasin a baitumatum tafan kwanaya’abar, naatu gewasin tafan so’ob kwanaya’abar,
61001006	so’ob tafan roumutufuren kwanaya’abar, roumutufuren tafan, baitafofor kwanaya’abar, baitafofor tafan God ana yawas kwanaya’abar,
61001007	naatu God ana yawas tafan Kirisiyan ana yawas kwanaya’abar, naatu Kirisiyan ana yawas tafanamaim yabow kwanaya’abar.
61001008	Sawar hai ah gagamih i iti kwanabow, naatu kwanabow uma awan nakakaratan na’at, boro nakura’ara’ahi a yan kwanabat, naatu ni’obaiyi ata Regah Jesu Keriso kwanasu’ub.
61001009	Baise sawar iti men kwanabow a yawas tafanamaim kwanayaya’abar kwa boro mata hinifimabe, ef yok boro men kwananuw. Naatu a yawas atamanin bowabow kakafinamaim kwama’am God notawiy kukusouwi boro nuhi nabur.
61001010	Imih au ofonah baitumatumayah God eafi naatu rubini imaim yuwa kwana’asfofor turobe kwanabow. Iti na’atube kwanasinaf kwa boro men kwanare’emih.
61001011	Basit ef nati na’atube kwanasisinaf kwa boro ata Regah Jesu Keriso ata baiyawasenayan boro baibasit anababatun nit, ma’ama wanatowan ana aiwob kwanarun.
61001012	Iti ao i an gagamin, isan imih ayu boro matanfufur nuhi anakusisib kwananot. Baise kwa i marasika kwaso’obaka naatu God ana tur kwanowar kwabitumatum i turobe.
61001013	Iti i gewasin maiyow ayu yawasu ama’amamaim a not matanfufur akukusisib kwananot nati boun ao isan.
61001014	Ayu anotanot iti na’atube i ef gewasin, anayabin Jesu Keriso ata Regah bebeyanamaim au tur eowen ayu boro kafa’imo anamorob.
61001015	Imih anasinaftobon koufair anit, saise ayu anamomorob ufunamaim iti sawar a notamaim hinama men nuhi hinaburumih.
61001016	Kwa au’uwi kwanowar, ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana fair auman boro namatabir maiye nan tafaramaim. I ana fair aki aso’ob, anayabin men sabuw hai baifuwenamaim hibinanakwar anowar a’o’omih. Baise aki taiyuwi mataiyan ana fair gagamin a’i’itin i kwa a tur a’o’owen.
61001017	Anayabin aki nati’imaim, God i Tamah naatu ana bonamanamarin auman Jesu Keriso ifai bobora’ara’ah naatu marane fanan Jesu isan eo, “Iti orot i Ayu Natu au yabow, i isan Ayu abiyasisir gagamin maiyow.”
61001018	Aki Jesu Keriso ana bai’ufununayah nai tounu bairi nati oyaw kakafiyin tafanamaim abat, God isan marane eafare eo aki taiyuwi tainiyan anowar.
61001019	Anayabin aki God fanan anowar, dinab sabuw Keriso isan hio i turobe. Kwa kwanabow gewas fanah kwanab anayabin i kwa a hinow na’atube emamarakaw naatu a Maragias ana marakaw na’atube dogor wanawanan ekukusisiar.
61001020	Nati i an gagamin kwanaso’ob gewas. Dinab iyab God ana tur Bukamaim hikikirum i men hai notamaim hikirumamih.
61001021	Naatu men kafa’imo orot babin ta uwih hikirumamih. Aiyabin! Baise iyab God rurubiniyih i God ana tur hikirum Anun Kakafiyih u’uwih na’atube.
61002001	Marasika dinab baifufuwenayah sabuw wanawanahimaim hima’am na’atube, ef ta’imon bai’obaiyen baifuwenayah boro wanawanamaim hinamatar. Sabuw nati na’atube kwa boro men kafa’imo kwana’inanih naatu sawar hai yabih en hinabi’obaiyi kwa God bairi boro kwanakusib. Naatu hai bai’obaiyen i tetebon kwanekwan naatu hinifuwen hinao karam Regah fanan kwanasa’ir men abistan ta. Baise bowabow kakafinane God kwa iyawasi.
61002002	Imih sabuw moumurin maiyow nati baifufuwenayah hai sor hai kew ana ef boro kwani’ufunun. Anayabin kwa ama mi’itube kwama kwasisinaf boro imaim hina’itin tur kakafin hinao God ana bai’obaiyen gewasin isan.
61002003	Nati sabuw i baikabatayah naatu hai turamaim boro hinifufuwi a kabay hinabow. Anayabin mar manin maiyow iti sawar hisinaf tana God hai baimakiy isan yabuna sawar ma ekakaif.
61002004	God ana tounamatar bowabow kakafih hisisinaf ana maramaim men kabibirih. Baise bow ah umah fatum i’asrowen baimakiy ana efan wanu’uminamaim hinama, baibatebat ana veya tekakaif.
61002005	God sabuw men kabibirih baise gis yen sabuw men God hibitumatum hi’atomatom himorob, baise Noah akisinamo iyawas, naatu yawas roumutuforen isan binan sabuw etei seven tafafarih hiyawas.
61002006	Tafaram Sodom naatu Gomorah hairi hai bowabow eaf isan God tafaram eafun. Imih wairaf iyafar ra’iy earah munimuniwat hi’in. God iti sinaf saife sabuw afa imatnuwih i aurih boro na’atube namatar, God men ana kokomaim hinama’am na’at.
61002007	Na’atube God Lot biyawas i kwananot. I God ana kokomaim ma. Naatu sabuw etei’imak hiso’ob abistan kakafin hisisinaf, hisorasor hikewakew hibiwa’an i’itih ana naniyan eaf i futuwih.
61002008	Lot i sabuw wanawanahimaim ma’am. Nati orot God matanamaim i gewasinawat ma’am. Sabuw bowabow kakafih hisisinaf matanyan i’itah, tur nonowar naatu God ana ofafar hi’a’astu’ub isan dogoron wanawanan yababan awan karatan.
61002009	Hai itanen etei kwa’itahika. Regah so’ob God ana sabuw mi’itube hinibi’akir i boro niyawasih. Naatu i so’ob sabuw kakafih isah baikwatutuwen boro nabogaigiwas na’in ana veya’amaim i boro sabuw etei nibabatiyih. Naatu iyab tafa’asarih boro baimakiy nitih.
61002010	I hai ma’amaim taiyuwih isah tebiyasisir naatu hai kok gagamin i bowabow kakafin hiniwa’an naatu men tekokok yait ta nakaifih i babahimaim hinama. Nati sabuw boro baimakiy fokarin maiyow hinab. Baifufuwen bai’obaiyenayah hai itinin i iti na’atube. God isan men tibirubir naatu sabuw isah men tibirubir. I abistan tekokok i tesisinaf naatu i men tenotanot hai yabih boro abistan hinamatar. God ana tounamatar sabuw bairi maramaim hibais tebi’aiwob isah, tur kakafih omih i men tibirubir.
61002011	Nati baifufuwen bai’obaiyenayah i men God ana tounamatar bairi hai fofoninamih, anayabin tounamatar hai fair i ra’at kwanekwan. Abistan sinaf isan i aurih hamehamen. Baifufuwen bai’obaiyenayah hai fair i kikimin. Baise tounamatar boro men Regah Jesu Keriso nanamaim hinabat ubar turanah hinitihimih.
61002012	Baise baifufuwenayah i kaiyaraforobe hai not meyemeye, i hai naniyanamaim hitatam tesisinaf, i hitufuw bow rauw morob akisin. Iti bai’obaiyenayah i kaiyaraforobe, abistan isan hi’o tibi’i’iyab i men kafa’imo tesoso’ob. Nati sabuw God boro narauw boun sabuw for terauw te’a’asbunubunuwen na’atube.
61002013	Sabuw afa isah hisinaf kakaf hi’afiyih isan imih ana wayow Regah boro ni’afiyih. Naatu i hai kokokomaim tesisinaf biyah ana yasisir isan mar bebeyanamaim. A hiyuwamaim terur bay te’aau sabuw matahimaim i biya’ohow gagamin maiyow.
61002014	I baibin isah matanfufur tenunuwet bairi baiwa’anamih. I men kafa’imo baiwa’an tibihamiy. Sabuw afa hai baitumatum ririmih i boro hinabuwih i hai yawas babanamaim hinama. I hai yawas tutufin etei i kabatamaim ema’am. God boro nao rarafih.
61002015	Ef mutufurin i hirusa’ir naatu i hai ef hirukasiy, naatu Balam natun Beor hairi hai ef i hirura’ah, i kabay isan iyabow kwanekwan saise kakafin tasinaf imaim kabay tab.
61002016	Balam bowabow kakafin sinaf isan, bobaituw wabin donkey kwarar iu, bobaituw men tur te’eo baise orot babinabe tur eo Balam isan, naatu dinab orot ana sinaf kakafin rufut.
61002017	Iti sabuw i boun harew buruburur eyey emamamah na’atube, naatu boun mar iuy enunuw ena en esasawar naatu ufunamaim taun men eyarayar. Baifuwenayah isah, God efan gugumin wanu’umin isah yabuna inu’in.
61002018	I tibi’o’orot naatu koka’aw ana tur na’atube te’o. Sabuw tafah fair teya’iy biyah ana yasisir isan tisisinaf. Naatu sabuw iyab bowabow kakafin marasika hisisinaf i hihamiyen naatu i yawas gewasinamaim tema’am i ti’ukikinih hinatatabir maiye ef kakafinamaim hinama.
61002019	Roufamen isan sabuw te’o’omatanih baise i taiyuwih bowabow kakafin fatumih ana akir himatar. Anayabin orot babin bowabow kakafin ana akir matar ma esisinaf i au naniyan in.
61002020	Sabuw iyab ata Regah naatu ata Baiyawasenayan Jesu Keriso hinasusu’ub gewas na’at, nati sabuw i tafaram ana bowabow kakafinane i hihaiw. Naatu ibanak hinamatabir maiye bowabow kakafin hinasisinaf naatu isah nabi’ukwarin. Nati sabuw wan hisisinaf i hamen baise iti uf hisisinaf i hirouwabon anababatun.
61002021	Ana gewasin nati sabuw i men hitan ef roumutuforen ana yawas gewasin hitaso’ob, naatu hitatabir God ana ofafar kakafiyin i bitih hitakwahir kouh hititin.
61002022	Abistan isah mamatar i turobe, mi’itube Buk Atamanin proverb eo, “Haru namout naatu natatabir abistan mamout boro na’aan.” Naatu ibanak ta eo maiye, “For babin inirurub gewasin maiyow naatu i boro na’intabir nan yur yan nare nibour.”
61003001	Are au ofonah baitumatumayah. Iti fef i mar bairu’abin kwa isa akirum abiyafar. Iti fef rou’ab wanawanahimaim mi’itube a not ata kura’ara’ah not gewasin kwatab sawar iti a notamaim hitama.
61003002	Marasika God ana dinab kakafiyih kwa a tur hi’owen kwanonowar i a notamaim nama. Naatu ata Regah Jesu Keriso naatu ata Baiyawasenayan ana tarbaiyunen tur i kwa a turabarayah a tur hi’owen.
61003003	Abistan God ana dinab sabuw tur wantoro’ot hi’u’uwit i kwananot nukwarimaim kwanayai. Mar yomanin sabuw afa boro wanawanatamaim hinatit. Nati sabuw hai yawas i kakafinamaim ebobonawiyih. Kwa isa boro hini’i’iyab men kafaita.
61003004	Naatu i boro hinao, “Regah eomatani namih rauw eo’o i men namih? Kwa’itin aki uwai’inah marasika himomorob boro’ika hai hubemaim ti’inu’in. God marasika tafaram sinaf matar inu’in ana’itinin ta’imon na’atuka ti’inu’in.”
61003005	Baise aneika God ana obaiyunen turamaim eo, mar tafaram himatar. Harew ouyate yen tafaram matar naatu tafaram i harewamaim matar.
61003006	Tafaram atamanin harew tit tafaram etei bufut naatu anababatun gurus sawar.
61003007	God obaiyunen tur ta’imonaban eo, mar tafaram iti boun tama’am kaifen ya ti’inu’in boro wairafamaim na’afuyar. Sabuw iyab men God ana kokokomaim tema’am boro nibabatiyih. Nati ana veya’amaim tafaram iti boun tama’am God boro nagurus.
61003008	Baise au ofonah, iti sawar ta’imon i men nuhinaburumih. Regah God, veya ta’imon ebiyab ana’itinin i boun 1,000 na’atube naatu kwamur 1,000 ebiyab i boun veya ta’imon na’atube.
61003009	Imih Regah Jesu Keriso ana na isan eo’omatanit i men erurubirabir. Boun sabuw afa sinafumih tema tirurubirabir imaibo tenot tisisinaf na’atube’emih. Kwa isa ekakaif, anayabin i men ekokok ana orot ana babin ta kakafin wanawanan narun baimakiy nab. Baise i ekokok orot babin etei hai bowabow kakafih hinihamiyen, naatu men ekokok ta nakasiy.
61003010	Baise Regah Jesu Keriso ana veya natitit it boro tana’ororsa’ir bainowan mowan etitit na’atube. Nati gagub narab nafufudir ana veya mar na’am saniwa’an naatu sawar maramaim boro etei na’am hinan. Naatu wairaf ana fora’abinamaim sawar maramaim tema’am etei boro hinadew, naatu tafaramamaim sawar sinaf himamatar boro owararin na’in.
61003011	Imih ana efamaim kwanama. Anayabin God tafaram boro nagurus isan kwanakakaf a yawas etei mutuforomo kwanama.
61003012	Na’atube kwanama’am God ana veya boro saife’ewat natit. Sawar etei maramaim tema’am boro wairaf nikubar na’arah naatu sawar etei boro ana towa’amaim na’arah nadew.
61003013	Baise abistan God it eo’omatanit, isan tama tanuwanuw nati i mar tafaram boubun, ma gewas yawas roumutufuren ana efan ata baremih tanab tanama.
61003014	Isan imih, au ofonah, kwa aur kato en, ubar en naatu tufuwamaim kwanama kwanakakaif Regah ana Veya nab nanan gewasinamaim kwanama’am nabuwi.
61003015	A notamaim nama, Regah hamenam erurubirabir anayabin i ekokok sabuw etei yawas hinab. Ata of Paul auman God not rerekab itin kwa isa eo kirum.
61003016	Ana fef etei kikirum i tur ta’imon eo kirum iti sawar isah. Paul ana tur afa kikirum i fokarih hai yabih men karam tanaso’ob. Bereberefiy hai baitumatum en, tur iti baifuwenamaim tebobotabir na’atube God ana Tur afa auman tebobotabir kakaf. Imih i taiyuwih hai kakafin bonawiyih egugurusih.
61003017	Baise au ofonah, kwa marasika kwaso’ob. Matatoniwa’an, nati baifufuwen bai’obaibiyenayah isah, saise kwa boro men hai bai’obaiyen kakafihimaim kwa nabonawiyi yawas ana ef kwanarusa’irimih.
61003018	Baise ata Regah Jesu Keriso ata Baiyawasenayan ana kabeber naatu anaso’ob kwa wanawanamaim na’in natit. God tanifai tanabora’ar’ah boun naatu wanatowan! Amen.
62001001	Yawas ana tur anamaim ma’am na tit a’itin, matai yan a’itin biyan abutubun naatu eo fanan anowar.
62001002	Iti yawas na birerereb i aki a’itin, imih aorereb kwa a tur ao’owen, iti yawas wanatowan i Tamat God hairi hima’am na aki isai irerereb.
62001003	Abisa a’itin anonowar, i ao’orereb kwa auman kwananowar, saise aki Tamat Natun Jesu Keriso bairi abita’ayomaim kwanarun kwanikofani tanita’ay.
62001004	Iti tur akikirum saise aki ai yasisir nan yomanin na’asa’ub.
62001005	Tur God Natun biyanane anonowar i iti ao’orereb kwananowar. God i marakaw, i biyanamaim men kafai’imo gugumin ta ema’ama’amih.
62001006	Awatamaim ta’orereb it i God bairi tabita’ay, baise ata yawasamaim * i gugumin wanawanan tama’am, * it i baifuwenayah naatu men turobe’emaim tama’am.
62001007	Baise i marakawinamaim ema’am na’atube it marakawinamaim tanama’am, boro taituwat bairi tanita’ay gewas, naatu i Natun Jesu Keriso ana rara’amaim ata bowabow kakafih etei boro nakusouwen.
62001008	It aurit bowabow kakafih en tanarouw tanayayaub, i taiyuwit tabifufuwit naatu wanawanat men turobe ema’am.
62001009	Baise God matanamaim ata bowabow kakafih tana’e’en i boro ana omatanen nakaif gewasin nasinaf, ata kakafih boro nanotawiyen naatu ata sinaf kakafihine boro nakusouwit.
62001010	Baise it aurit bowabow kakafih en tanarouw tanao’o na’at, nati i tasinaf God baifufuwenayan emamatar. Naatu i ana tur wanawanatamaim ana efan men ema’am.
62002001	Natunatu ayu iti fef akikirum, saise kwa bowabow kakafih men kwanasinafumih. Baise o yait bowabow kakafin inasisinaf na’at, Jesu Keriso ana Yawas Mutufurin Tamat nanamaim wasfafarit ebatabat boro nibaisit Tamah nifefeyan.
62002002	I akisinamo biyan siboromih yai ata bowabow kakafih etei notawiyen, men it akisit baise tafaram wanawanan sabuw tutufin etei hai bowabow kakafin auman notawiyen.
62002003	God ana ofafar tanabobosiyasiyar na’at, nati i ebiturobe it i anababatun God taso’ob.
62002004	Naatu orot ta nao, “Ayu i God aso’ob,” baise ana ofafar men nabobosiyasiyar, nati orot i baifufuwenayan, dogoron wanawanan men turobe ema’am.
62002005	Baise orot yait God ana tur nabobosiyasiyar, God ana yabow nati orot wanawanan i rusouw, nati’imaim boro tanaso’ob it i anababatun God nowan.
62002006	Orot yait Keriso wanawananamaim ma narouw nao’o, gewasin nati orot i Jesu Keriso ma’ama’abe nama.
62002007	Are au ofonah, iti obaiyunen tur kwa isa akikirum i men boubun. Baise atamanin marasika ana tur hio kwanowaraka.
62002008	Baise boun i obaiyunen boubun kwa isa akikirum, tur anababatun i Keriso wanawananamaim hi’itin naatu boun kwa auman wanawanamaim ti’i’itin, anayabin gugumin i au’uf enan naatu marakaw anababatun i busurufika ekukusisiar.
62002009	Orot yait marakawinamaim ma rouw eo baise taituwan ebifa’ifai, nati orot i boro’ika guguminamaim ema’am.
62002010	Orot yait taituwan ebiyabuw marakawinamaim ema’am, naatu i wanawananamaim boro men orot babin ta nabonawiy kakafin nasinafumih.
62002011	Baise orot yait taintuwan ebifa’ifa’ih i guguminamaim ema’am naatu guguminamaim ereremor, i men so’ob menamaim enan. Anayabin gugumin kakafin iwa’an ebobogan.
62002012	Natunatu kwa isa iti fef akikirum, anayabin Keriso ana sinafumaim kwa a bowabow kakafih etei notawiyen.
62002013	Tamai’inah kwa isa fef akikirum, anayabin tafaram anamaim God ma’am i kwaso’ob. Kwa orot boub isa akikirum, anayabin demon mowan kwarab re kwawasatan.
62002014	Natunatu kwa isa akikirum, anayabin Tamat kwaso’ob, tamai’inah kwa isa akikirum, anayabin tafaram anamaim God ma’am kwaso’ob. Naatu kwa orot boub is akikirum, anayabin kwa orot fair, God ana tur wanawanamaim ema’am imih Demon Mowan kwarab re kwawasatan.
62002015	Tafaram isan men kwaniyabow, na’atube tafaram ana sawar auman men isah kwaniyabow. Baise tafaram isan kwanabiyabow, Tamat i men kwabiyabuwimih.
62002016	Sawar tutufin etei i tafaram nowan, abis sabuw hi’itah tekokok, naatu akisih hai kokomaim tisinaf kakafin emamatar. Imih tafaramamaim sawar iti sabuw hi’itah hai bai’o’orot erara’at. Baise sawar iti i men Tamatane enanamih iti i tafaram mowan.
62002017	Tafaram wanawanan ana sawar sabuw tekokok etei boro hini’en. Baise orot yait God ana kok esisinaf boro nama wanatowan.
62002018	Natunatu tafaram ana yomanin i na kabom, hio kwanowar Keriso ana kamabiy i boro nan, imih Keriso ana kamabiy moumurih maiyow iban boun hina hititaka. Imih itaban iti’imaim taso’ob mar yomanin i nakabom.
62002019	Iti sabuw i it ata kou’ay turin rowenatait tit, imih it taso’obaka nati sabuw i men it nowat anababatun. Anayabin it nowat na’at boro bairit tatama, baise hibihamiyitamaim it ebi’obiyit nati sabuw i men it nowat anababatun.
62002020	Baise kwa i Anun Kakafiyin Keriso tafa yan isuwai re, imih kwa etei tur anababatun kwaso’ob.
62002021	Ayu kwa isa fef akikirum i men kwa tur anababatun so’oba’e kwama’am anot akikirumamih, en. Baise nati i kwa kwaso’obaka, naatu tur anababatunane boro men baifuwen ta nanamih, nati auman i kwa kwaso’obaka.
62002022	Imih yait i baifufuwenayan? Orot yait nao Keriso i men Roubininenayan orotomih? Nati orot i Keriso ana kamabiy wairafin. Tamat God Natun hairi eyayaubih.
62002023	Anayabin orot yait God Natun eyayaub, Tamah auman eyayaub. Baise orot yait God Natun ebaib Tamah auman boro nab.
62002024	Imih kwana’itin tur marasika kwanonowar kwanakaif gewas dogoromaim nama. Tur kwanakaif gewas kwa boro mar etei Jesu wanawananamaim kwanama naatu Tamah auman boro wanawanamaim nama.
62002025	Anayabin Jesu sawar ta baititamih eo’omatanit i yawas wanatowan boro nitit.
62002026	Ayu kwa isa iti fef akikirum i kwa abimatnuwi sabuw iyab hina kwa tibifufuwi isan.
62002027	Baise kwa tafamaim Keriso Anunin Kakafiyin isuwai re’ere i ema’am. Imih kwa boro men yait ta ni’obaiyimih. Anayabin Anun Kakafiyin sawar etei ebi’obaiyi i turobe, men ta baifuwenamih. Imih abisa Anun kakafiyin ebi’obaiyi i kwanabosiyasiyar Keriso wanawananamaim kwanama.
62002028	Natunatu Keriso wanawananamaim mar etei kwanama, saise i nabirerereb ana veya it boro koufair auman tanatit, naatu boro men tanibiya’ohow tanawa’iramih.
62002029	Kwa etei kwaso’ob Keriso ana ef i mutufor, imih orot yait ef mutufor esisinaf kwanaso’ob nati orot i Godane tufuw maiye.
62003001	God ana yabow it isat rara’at kwana’itin, ana yabow it isat ra’at, imih God it natunatun rouw ea’afit. It i anababatun God natunatunamih tamatar. Imih iti tafaram ana sabuw men hisu’ubit, na’atube God auman men hisu’ub.
62003002	Are au ofonah, it i boun God natunatun tamatar. Baise men isat ibebeyan taso’ob gewas abisa boro isat namatar. Baise Keriso nanan ana veya’amaim it taso’ob, it boro i ana itininabe. Anayabin boro matatyan ana itinin mi’itube boro i na’atube tana’itin.
62003003	Isan imih sabuw iyab tibitumatum Keriso boro namatabir maiye, taiyuwih hinaya’asairih dogoroh sasouwin hinama Keriso na’atube.
62003004	Orot yait bowabow kakafin esisinaf, i God ana ofafar ea’astu’ub, imih ana ubar boro nab. Anayabin bowabow kakafinamaim ofafar ea’astu’ub.
62003005	Keriso ra’iy ata bowabow kakafih bobosairen i kwaso’ob, i aurin i kakafin en.
62003006	Imih sabuw iyab Keriso bairi tema’am boro men matan fufur bowabow kakafin hinasinafumih. Baise sabuw iyab matan fufur bowabow kakafin tisisinaf, anayabin Keriso men hi’itin o men hisu’ub.
62003007	Natunatu sabuw men hinikubibiruwi, orot yait ef gewasin esisinaf i ana ef gewasin, Keriso ana ef gewasin na’atube.
62003008	Orot yait matanfufur bowabow kakafin esisinaf i Demon natun. Anayabin Demon Mowan aneika bowabow kakafin sinaf. Imih God Natun re’er anayabin i abisa Demon biwa’an i gurusinamih raiy.
62003009	Orot yait God Natun, i boro men matanfufur bowabow kakafin nasinafumih. Anayabin God naniyan anababatun i nati orot yan wanawanan ema’am. Imih boro men mar etei bowabow kakafin nasinaf, yabin i Tamah God.
62003010	Imih God natunatun naatu Demon natunatun hai itinin i bebeyan ta’i’itin. Orot yait men ef gewasin esisinaf, o tain men ebiyabuw nati orot i men God natunamih.
62003011	Tur aneika hiorereb kwanonowar i baiyabowbonen isan hio.
62003012	It men Cain na’atube tanasinafumih, anayabin i demon nowan. Aisim tain easabun? Anayabin abisa sisinaf i kakafin, baise tain ana ef i mutufurin, imih men Cain sisinafube kwanasinafumih.
62003013	Taitu, iti tafaram ana sabuw hinabifa’ifai men kwanakasiyomih.
62003014	Aki aso’ob morob aisnowah arabon yawas ana efamaim abatabat, anayabin taiti abiyabuwih. Orot yait men ebiyabow i morob ana efanika ema’am.
62003015	Orot yait tain ebifa’ifai i farumayan na’atube imih nati farumayan aurin yawas wanatowan wanawananamaim men ema’am.
62003016	Yabow ana ef aki iti’imaim aso’ob. Keriso ana yawas it isat i’inuw, imih it auman taituwat isah ata yawas tani’inuw.
62003017	Orot sawar wairafin tain itin ebi’akir baise baibaisin isan men ekokok, nati orot aurin God ana yabow men ema’am.
62003018	Natunatu yabow i men turawat namomon. Baise yabow i turobe ana itinin auman, saise yabow turobe namatar.
62003019	Ef iti’imaim it boro tanaso’ob it i anababatun turobe nowan. Naatu God nanamaim boro koufair tanab tanabat.
62003020	It dogorot wanawanan abisa kakafin esisinaf boro tanaso’ob, baise God i ra’at dogorot ata naniyan nasair. Imih abisa kakafin tasisinaf etei i so’ob.
62003021	Isan imih au ofonah, dogorot ana naniyan men nabi’afiyit, God nanamaim boro koufair tanab. Naatu abisa takokok isan yoyobanamaim tanifefeyan boro nitit.
62003022	Abisa isan tanifefeyan boro tanab, anayabin ana ofafar tabobosiyasiyar, naatu abisa tasisinaf i yan esisisir.
62003023	Naatu iti i ana obaiyunen tur, Natun Jesu Keriso wabinamaim tanitumatum naatu taniyabowbonen, iyunit eo na’atube.
62003024	Sabuw iyab God ana ofafar tebobosiyasiyar, God i wanawanahimaim ema’am, na’atube i wanawananamaim tema’am. Anayabin aki God Anun Kakafiyin biti’imaim a so’ob, God aki wanawananamaim ema’am.
62004001	Are au ofonah, sabuw etei Anun Kakafiyin bain hinarouw hinao men kwanitutumih, baise wantoro’ot kwanafufunih kwana’itin, turobe i God biyanane Anun Kakafiyin hibai ai en. Anayabin dinab baifufuwenayah moumurih maiyow hitit tafaram awan karatan.
62004002	Ef i boro iti na’atube kwana’itin kwanaso’ob, nati sabuw i Anun Kakafiyin hibai ai en. Sabuw iyab hina’orereb Jesu i turobe Keriso, naatu orot babin biyah bai. Nati sabuw i turobe Anun Kakafiyin hibai.
62004003	Baise sabuw iyab hina’orereb Jesu i men Godane na, nati sabuw i men Anun Kakafiyin hibaimih. Baise Keriso ana kamabiy orot anunin hibai. Marasika hio kwanowar Keriso ana kamabiy wairafin i boro nan, naatu boun i na tafaram wanawananamaim titaka.
62004004	Baise natunatu, kwa i Tamat God nowan, dinab kakafih Keriso isan hibirakit kwawastanih. Anayabin Anun Kakafiyin wanawanamaim ema’am ana fair i ra’at. Tur anababatun ebi’obaiyi, men sabuw iyab iti tafaram ana wagabur hibow tema’am hai fair na’atube’emih.
62004005	Dinab baifufuwenayah tafaramamaim abisa temamatar isah tibidudur, sabuw iyab iti tafaram nowan tenonowar. Anayabin nati sabuw i tafaram nowan.
62004006	Baise iti i God nowan, imih sabuw iyab God hisoso’ob, abisa tao boro hinanowar. Sabuw iyab men God nowan, abisa tao boro men hinanowar. Hai itinin boro iti’imaim tana’itan tana’inanih, menatan i turobe Anun Kakafiyinane enan, naatu menatan i wagabur baifufuwenayanane enan.
62004007	Are au ofonah, akokok taniyabowbonen, anayabin yabow i Godane enan. Orot babin yait ebiyabow, i God nowan naatu God su’ub.
62004008	Anayabin God i yabow wairafin, imih orot babin yait men ebiyabow, i God men su’ub.
62004009	God ana yabow it i’obaiyit, Natun ta’imonamo tafaramamaim iyun re it isat. Saise i biyanamaim it yawas tatab.
62004010	Yabow ana’itininaban i nati, it men God taiyabuw. Baise God it iyabuwit Natun ta’imonamo iyun re, saise ine it ata bowabow kakafih God notawiyen.
62004011	Are au ofonah, God ana yabow iti na’atube iyabuwit, imih it auman taituwat bairi tatiyabowbonen.
62004012	Orot men yait ta God itinimih, baise taituwat bairi tanabiyabowbonen na’at, God boro wanawanatamaim bairit tanama. Naatu i ana yabow boro wanawanatamaim nara’at.
62004013	Taso’ob it i God wanawanatamaim ema’am, anayabin Anun Kakafiyin it itit.
62004014	Naatu iti Anun Kakafiyin naniyan i tatam sabuw afa hai tur ta’o’owen, Tamat i Natun iyun re tafaram ana baiyawasenayan matar.
62004015	Orot yait eo’orereb Jesu i God Natun, nati orot boro God hairi hinita’imon.
62004016	Isan imih it taso’ob God ana yabow isat ebobotan i tabitumitum. God i yabow wairafin, orot yait yabowamaim ema’am, nati orot wanawananamaim God ema’am, naatu God wanawananamaim i orot ema’am.
62004017	Yabow ana ef nati na’atube wanawanatamaim nama’am, boro nakusouwit tanan Keriso’obe tanamatar, naatu baibatebat ana Veya boro men tanabir.
62004018	Anababatun yabow wanawanan i men bir ema’am, baise uhewbitan boro bir kakafin nanun nabihir. Anayabin bir i baimakiy isan boro nibibiruwit. Baise yait dogor wanawanan yabow men ema’am o yabow ana ef men iso’ob.
62004019	God tabiyabuw, anayabin God mat it iyabuwit.
62004020	Orot yait nao, “Ayu God abiyabuw,” baise tain tuwan ebifa’ifai, nati orot i baifufuwenayan. Anayabin nati orot taintuwan itih bairi tema’am, baise men i biyabuwih, naatu God men i’itin boro mi’itube niyabuw.
62004021	Keriso obaiyunen tur eo tanonowar i iti, “Orot babin yait God ebiyabuw, gewasin tain tuwan auman niyabuwih.”
62005001	Yait ebitumatum Jesu i Roubininenayan, nati orot i God natun. Naatu orot yait Tamat ebiyabuw natunatun auman boro niyabow.
62005002	Ef iti na’atube tasisinaf it boro tanaso’ob, it God taiyabuw ana ofafar tabobosiyasiyar, imih i natunatun tabiyabuwih.
62005003	Naatu ata yabow God tabitin, anayabin i ana ofafar tabobosiyasiyar imih i ana ofafar boro men isat hinafokaramih.
62005004	Naatu yait God natunamih baib i boro tafaram ana kakafin nawasatan. Imih Jesu tebitumitum anamaramaim tafaram ana kakafin tawasatan Satan umanane taikisisirit tatit.
62005005	Imih yait boro tafaram ana kakafin nawasatan? Orot yait ebitumatum Jesu i God Natun? I boro tafaram nigegesair Satan umanane nikisisir natit.
62005006	Iti orot Jesu i taiyuwin na i’obaiyit i God Natun ana Roubininenayan. Imih Jesu bapataito baib ana maramaim, God i’obaiyit ta’itin. Naatu morob ana rara suwa re’er ana maramaim auman. Naatu Anun Kakafiyin sif rurubon i turobe. Anayabin Anun Kakafiyin i men baifufuwenayan.
62005007	Naatu iti sawar tounu i Jesu isan sif tirurubon.
62005008	Nati sawar i Anun Kakafiyin, harew, naatu rara, nah tounu hai tur i ta’imon sif hirubon.
62005009	Orot tafaram hai sawar isah sif erurubon i tabitumatum, baise God ana sif rurubon i fair kwanekwan, anayabin God sif rurubon i Natun Jesu Keriso isan sif rubon tanowar, Jesu i God Natun.
62005010	Imih orot yait God natun ebitumatum abisa God eo sif rurubon i dogoronamaim ema’am. Baise orot yait God eo men ebitumatum, nati orot iwa’an God baifuwenayan matar. Anayabin God Natun isan eo sif rurubon men ebitumatum.
62005011	God kukurereb i yawas wanatowan itit. Naatu iti yawas an i Natun wanawananamaim ema’am.
62005012	Imih orot yait God Natun nabaib yawas boro nab. Baise orot yait God Natun men nabaib yawas boro men nab.
62005013	Ayu iti sawar kwa iyab God Natun kwabitumitum isa akikirum kwana’itin, saise kwanaso’ob, kwa i yawas wanatowan kwabai.
62005014	Imih God nanamaim boro koufair tanab, abisa isan i ana kokomaim tabifefeyan boro nanowar.
62005015	Mar etei isan tafefeyan i enonowar, nati i anababatun taso’ob, naatu abisa isan tabifefeyan ebitit auman taso’ob.
62005016	Taituwa bowabow kakafin sinaf kui’itin i boro men nan morob wan nayen, gewasin God isan kwanifefeyan yawas nitin maiye. Baise bowabow kakafin ta i boro nabonawiy morob wan kwanayen. Naatu ayu i men sabuw nati bowabow kakafin hisinaf hin morob wan hiyey isah yoyobanamih ao.
62005017	Ef kakafih tasisinaf etei i bowabow kakafih. Baise i wanawanahimaim bowabow kakafin ta boro men nanawiy inan morob wan inayenamih.
62005018	Taso’ob orot yait God natun boro men mar etei nama bowabow kakafin nasinafumih. Anayabin God Natun mar etei etatafafar, imih Demon Mowan boro men ni’afiyimih.
62005019	Tafaram tutufin etei i Demon ebi’aiwob. Baise taso’ob it i God nowan.
62005020	God Natun na, God anababatun isan bi’obaiyit i taso’ob. Naatu God anababatun wanawananamaim tama’am. Natun Jesu Keriso auman wanawananamaim iti God i turobe yawas wanatowan ma’ama’anin, imih ibasit bairit wanatowan tama’am.
62005021	Natunatu taiyuw kwanatafafari, god baifufuwenayah hinanan kwanahaiwih.
63001001	Tuwat ain biyanane, Kou’ay Bar kafai wanawananamaim natunatun bairi isah abiyabow men kafaita. Men ayu akisu kwa isa abiyabowamih, baise sabuw iyab tur obe hisoso’ob auman isa tibiyabow.
63001002	Ana yabin tur obe it wanawanatamaim ema’am, naatu boro mar etei bairit tana ma wanatowan.
63001003	Tamat God, naatu Jesu Keriso Tamat Natun, baiwan babanen, kabeber, tufuw hinitit. It nowatamih, tur obe’emaim naatu yabowamaim.
63001004	Tamat iu’uwit na’atube, natunat Kirisiyan ana efamaim hai yawas hibabatun hima’am ana atit aitih yau sisir gagamin maiyow.
63001005	Imih are au yabow babin, akokok it etei’imak taniyabowbonen. Iti obaiyunen tur i men boubun. Iti obaiyunen tur i marasika anamaim tanowar.
63001006	Imih God tanabiyabuw boro fanan tanab ana ofafar tanakaif. Naatu taniyabowbonen tanama. Ana yabin iti obaiyunen tur i marasika anamaim hibinan kwanowar.
63001007	Ana yabin yabowamaim kwanama sabuw baikubibiruwenayah afa Jesu Keriso na orot babin biyah baib isan, men tibibabatun i moumurih na’in hitit tafaram awan kakaratan. Imih orot ta nati na’atube nao men nibibabatun i baikubibiruwenayan, naatu Keriso ana rakit wairafin.
63001008	Mata toniwa’an abisa isan tabowabow men kwanabohamiy. Baise kwana bukikin kwanabow, saise a baiyan tutufin kwanab.
63001009	Orot yait men Keriso ana bai’obaiyenamaim ebi’obaibiyen, i men God bai. Ana yabin i Keriso ana bai’obaiyen nasair rabon me’at. Orot yait Keriso ana bai’obaiyenamaim ema’am i Tamat God Natun hairi buwih.
63001010	Isan imih orot yait men Keriso ana bai’obaiyen bai enan, abaremaim men ana merar kwanay kwanabaimih. O men tufuw kwanitin.
63001011	Ana yabin orot yait tufuw ebitin, nati orot i ana ofomih matar naatu abisa kakafin esisinaf boro ana ubar turin nab.
63001012	Ayu akokok boro tur moumurih na’in atao kwatanowar, baise men akokok fefemaim ana kirum, imih anotanot boro ayu taiyuwu anan aninanawani, yumatau kwana’itin bairi tanao. Saise boro bairit taniyasisir gewas.
63001013	God akisin iti tai a yabow babin rubin, i natunatun iti tema’am kwa etei a merar tiyiy.
64001001	Iti fef i ayu John, ekaleisia hai nabatanenayan Gaius isa akikirum. Taiu isa i turobe abiyabow.
64001002	Are au ofonah, isa ayoyoyoban saise sawar etei kwasisinaf boro hinanunuw gewas, ayub kwakaif gewas kwama’am hina hitenya’u asoso’ob na’atube, biya auman kwanakaif gewas kwanama.
64001003	Kwa turobe kwabukikin kwama’ama isan naatu mar etei turobe ana yawasamaim kwabowabow auman. Taituwat nati’ine hina hitit au tur hio’owen ana veya ai yasisir gagamin maiyow.
64001004	Natunatu turobe ana yawasamaim kwama’am isan hio anowar abiyasisir. I men sawar afa isah abiyasisir na’atube’emih, iti tur anonowar i ai yasisir gagamin maiyow.
64001005	Taiu, o i bowabow gewasin maiyow taituwa isah kubowabow, basit taituwa afa i menah tatabirih, baise o kubibaisih.
64001006	O a yabow nati’imaim sabuw isah mi’itube kubiyabow isan iti ekalesia wanawanahimaim teo’orerereb. Imih abifefeyan nanawan sabuw hai remoramaim hai yababan abisa’awat ana efamaim inibaisih saise God niyasisir.
64001007	Ata Regah Keriso wabinamaim hitit hin tebowabow, naatu Eteni Sabuw biyahine baibais men ta tebaib.
64001008	Imih it Kirisiyan sabuw iti oro’orot tanibaisih saise turobe isan it bairi tanita’imon tanabow.
64001009	Ayu iti bowabow isan i fef kabumin marasika ekalesia sabuw isah akirum, baise Diotefes bai’ukwarin isan ana yababan ebaib imih aki ai fair etei bai haw yare.
64001010	Ayu ananan ana veya, sawar abisa sisinaf etei boro ana bow bebeyah ana ya. Naatu sawar kakafih maiyow aki isai eo yanuw bifufuwen auman boro anaorereb. Men nati akisin baise Kirisiyan sabuw afa tibinanawan auman boro men hai merar nay nabuwih, naatu sabuw afa nanawan buwihimih tekokok eo’otanih, naatu tafaroromaim ebobotaitih.
64001011	Au of abisa kakafin men iniu’ur, baise abisa gewasin i iniu’ur, orot yait sawar gewasin esisinaf i God Natun, baise orot yait sawar kakafin esisinaf God men su’ub.
64001012	Sabuw moumurih na’in tur gewasih maiyow Demetrius isan teo. Naatu ana bai’obaiyenamaim i tur sabuw ebi’obaiyih, naatu aki auman ana bowabow gewasin ebowabow isan ao’ofokafok. Naatu kwanaso’ob aki isan abisa ao’orereb i turobe.
64001013	Ayu au kok i boro tur moumurih maiyow ata kirum kwa isa, baise men akokok fefemaim ana kirum.
64001014	Anotanot boro’omo boro anan ayumat ana’itin naatu bairit tanama tanidudur gaigiwas.
64001015	Tufuw isa nama. A ofonah iti’imaim bairi ama’am a merar tiyiy, ta’ita’imon hai tur ina’owen hai merar ayiy.
65001001	Ayu Jude i James airi atufuw, baise Jesu Keriso isan abi’akir. Kwa iyab Tamat God iyabuwi e’afi ana yabowamaim kwama’am naatu Jesu Keriso ana tafafaramaim kwama’am etei isa a fef akikirum.
65001002	Kabeber, tufuw, naatu yabow kwa wanawanamaim wanatowan na’in nasuwa nare.
65001003	Are au ofonah, ayu asinaftobon yawas boubun tafafaram isan atakirum, baise nati efanin ayu dogorou wanawanan i kokok kwanekwan mi’itube akikirum ana’ototofari, saise God mar maumurih efanin mar ta’imon ana sabuw baitumatum bitih, nati baitumatum i kwanafair kwanawasfafar gewas kwanama.
65001004	Anayabin sabuw afa God ana ef ufunane tenan i wa’iwa’iramaim hina wanawanat hirun, bai’obaiyen hibotabir te’o, “God i manaw kabeber wairafin imih karam boro tanisesebar kwanekwan, naatu Regah Jesu Keriso ata Bonawiyenayan ta’imon teyayaub.” Iti sabuw i marasika Buk Atamaninamaim isah hi’oka inu’in baimakiy boro hinab.
65001005	Iti sawar etei isah i kwaso’ob, baise akokok nuhi anakusib maiye, Regah ana sabuw Egyptane nawiyih hitit, baise nati ufunamaim sabuw iyab men hibitumatum etei gurusih himorob.
65001006	Naatu tounamatar iyab hibi’ukwarin hai fair men hikakafiy, baise hai efan nowah anababatun hikwahir hire fatum wanatowan inu’inuwinamaim God fatumih gugumin wanawanan ya hima Baibatebat Ana Veya gagamin tekakaif.
65001007	Ef nati ta’imon Sodom Gomorah sabuw naatu bar merar nati sisibinamaim hima’am hai yawas etei baisesebar kwanekwan hitin. Orot taiyuwih naatu baibin taiyuwih hibisesebar kwanekwan isan God wairaf wanatowan iyafar re nati bar merar sabuw etei e’arahih himorob. Naatu nati sawar etei i sabuw bowabow kakafin wairafih hai baimatnuwen.
65001008	Ef nati ta’imon sabuw mim kwanekwaneyah hai baifuwenamaim biyah hibokarit, God ana aiwob hikwahir, naatu Auyom mar ana sabuw hi’uwih higigimih.
65001009	Baise tounamatar hai ukwarin Michael, Demon mowan hairi Moses biyan isan higamigam ana maramaim, i men taiyuwin ana fair tafanamaim bat awan fokar demon mowan iu kwanikwaniy baise eo, “Regah boro nakwarar narumutufuri.”
65001010	Iti sabuw tur naniyah men hiso’ob, baise asir hio tibigigim kwanekwan, naatu sawar afa naniyah i hiso’ob baise haru forobe tisisinaf kwanekwan, imih nati sawaramaim boro nagurusih.
65001011	Baimakiy boro kakafin anababatun hinab, Cain sisinafumaim ana ef hi’ufunun tenan, naatu kabay isan yah rab. Balam sawar kakafih sisinafube tisisinaf, naatu Korah ana konakon wanawanan hirun higugurusibe boro nagurusih.
65001012	Iti sabuw aurih biya’ohow aurih biya’ohow en naatu bir kakaf en, farumayah na’atube a kau’ay wanawanan hirun a’aa atom ana yasisir i teo’of nowah, sakuk aurin toun en ebabin enan na’atube. Naatu maur ana veya ai baiwa’e tekerer tebatabat tiu’uyarir na’atube,
65001013	taiyuwih hai biya’ohow ana itinin tor yan yabat erab fus ekubar rougoy erarouw na’atube. Naatu daman hai efan hisa’ir tibibib kwanekwan na’atube, baise nahimaim i gugumin kakafin God isah ya’asair wanatowan inu’in.
65001014	Naatu Adam ana rara’ane hitutufuw renan Enoch i Adam ana’agir bai seven tufuw, i sabuw isah eobaimanih eo, “Kwa’itin, Regah ana sabuw kakafiyih maumurih na’in ai rourin na’atube bairi hitit tenan.
65001015	Sabuw etei baibatiyih isan, naatu sabuw iyab God ana ef hisa’ir kakafin tisisinaf kousirih isan, naatu sabuw bowabow kakafih sinafuyah God ana ef hisa’ir tur kakafih hio hibigigim isah.”
65001016	Iti sabuw i gamin okwanekwaneyah naatu bai’ubabarenayah, taiyuwih hai yawas kakafih tibi’ufunun. Naatu taiyuwih isah teo’o ra’ara’at, sabuw afa isah awah heaharewan saise i hai ma gewas isan.
65001017	Baise au ofonah, abisa ata Regah Jesu Keriso ana kob abarayah marasika hio kwananowar i kwananuh.
65001018	Iti na’atube a tur hi’owen hio, “Mar yomanin ana veya, sabuw iyab God ana ef hisa’ir hai naniyan kakafinamaim ebobonawiyih boro hinatit hinao hini’ibi.”
65001019	Iti sabuw i kausesebayah, hai kok gagamin i tafaram ana yawas kakafih hinasinaf, aurih Anun Kakafiyin en.
65001020	Baise kwa, au ofonah, baitumatum kakafiyinamaim nawowabi kwanara’at, naatu Anun Kakafiyinamaim kwanayoyoban.
65001021	God ana yabow wanawananamaim natafafari kwanama ata Regah Jesu Keriso kwanakaif. I ana kabeberamaim boro yawas wanatowan nit.
65001022	Sabuw iyab hai baitumatum ekwakwaris kwana kabibirih baibais kwanitih.
65001023	Sabuw afa wairaf wan teyey saisewat wairaf wanane kwanarowen sukwarabih kwaniyawasih. Naatu kwanabir kwanakakaf auman sabuw afa kwaniwanbabanih, baise hai faifuw hi’usi’us karitanin auman men kwana’us.
65001024	Imih God ta’imon ata Baiyawasenayan tanabora’ara’ah. I karam kwa boro natafafari a boro men narusukun, naatu a aubar en nabuwi ereyasisir kwanan bonamanamarin gewasin nanamaim kwanatit,
65001025	Ata Regah Jesu Keriso’one God isan tanaorereb, marakaw, bonamanamarin, fair, onowaten marasika na boun naatu mar etei nama wanatowan, wanatowan. Amen.
66001001	Iti sawar abisa boro’omo hinamamatar isan God Jesu Keriso i’obaiy, saise Jesu ta’orereb ana’akir wairafin John taso’ob. Imih Keriso tounamatar iyafar tur bai na John biyan tit ana tur eowen.
66001002	Naatu John sawar etei i’itah i eorereb bukamaim kirum. Nati sawar i God ana tur naatu tur anababatun Jesu Keriso ana orereb tur.
66001003	Orot yait iti tur ebiyab boro baigegewasin nab, naatu yait dinabamon ana tur nowar naatu abisa hikikirum bai ebi’ufunun boro baigegewasin nab, anayabin sawar matar isan ana veya i na kabom.
66001004	Kwa ekaleisia a kou’ay etei seven Asia wanawanan kwama’am, ayu John kwa a fef akikirum, ayoyoban God wanatowanin, marasika ma’am, boun ema’ama, naatu boro nama’am, manaw kabeber tufuw nit. Na’atube wagabur gewasih etei seven ana urama’ama nanamaim tebatabat auman hinigegewasini.
66001005	Naatu Jesu Keriso kourerebayan gewasin, morobone misir maiye ana etawan botawiyinayan, tafaram hai bonawiyenayan etei hai aiwob ukwarin auman nigegewasini. Keriso iyabuwit naatu ana rara’amaim ata bowabow kakafihine rufamit tatit
66001006	aiwob na’atube tamatar tabi’aiwob naatu botaitit firis tamatar i ana God naatu Tamah isan tabowabow. Isan imih marakaw, fair, bora’ara’aten etei Jesu Keriso tanitin wanatowan, wanatowan. Amen .
